1b1(rnying rgyud): rgyu gar skad du/ de bAdz+wa la ma hAn
1b2(rnying rgyud): du/ 
1b3(rnying rgyud): ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud/ bcom ldan 'das gsang ba
2a1(rnying rgyud): chen po la phag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis gsungs pa
2a2(rnying rgyud): nyid du gyur pa'i tshe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin pa/ shegs pa nam mkha'
2a3(rnying rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor chen po dang / rnal 'byor mtshan mo dang / shin
2a4(rnying rgyud): tu mos pa chen mo dang / mos pa dang bcas pa srung bar byed pa rab tu rnam par srung ba
2b1(rnying rgyud): byed pa nye ba mo dang bcas pa nye bar zhi ba chen po dang zhi bar mdzad pa chen po mdzes pa dang mdog tu ldan pa/ 
2b2(rnying rgyud): shes pa dang skyabs su ldan pa ni 'di lta ste/ gtso bo rnal 'byor 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor
2b3(rnying rgyud): chen po rdo rje nyid du 'dus pa zhe sa bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po pa tang snyoms zhes bya ba dang / 
2b4(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor chen po dbang du mi dzad pa zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor shin tu rnam par rgya gram gyi tshul 'dzin pa
2b5(rnying rgyud): dang bcos pa ni cir yang ston pa'i gzugs kyis kha dog bzhi dang ldan te 'dug pa'i cha lugs kyis
3a1(rnying rgyud): cod pan lnga dang ldan te/ ma bsgribs mi sgri sgribs pa mi 'gog pasgrib tu med pa'i bya/ 
3a2(rnying rgyud): nas yang dag pa'i gzhal yas chen po na mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rjes skum bkag pas mdzad pa bsam
3a3(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab pas bzhugs so// de yang 'di ltar so sor gsal bar ma dam pa chen po dang 'khor dang ba
3a4(rnying rgyud): ba mnyam pa chen pos yo byad chen po ni kun gyis gdung 'dzin pa'i rang bzhi nadu gnas pa ni brten pas phyin
3a5(rnying rgyud): ci ma log pa dang gnyis dang du ma med pa ni gzungs rnal 'byor ma chen mo ste/ byang chub chen mon mkha' zhes bya ba dang // 
3a6(rnying rgyud): byang chub chen mo na mkha' 'dzin ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mos srungs ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo
3b1(rnying rgyud): brlan par byed pa chen mo dang / byang chub chen mo rnam par 'khengs pa spang ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo las grub par mdzad ma zhes
3b2(rnying rgyud): bya ba dang / byang chub chen me rdo rje rab tu chags pa chen mo 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / rab tu ma chags pa gsod ces bya ba dang / byang chub chen
3b3(rnying rgyud): mo rab tu rmongs sel zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo gsung gyi 'khor lo ma zhes bya ba ste/ de dag kyang 'odi lta ste/ shin tu ud pa la
3b4(rnying rgyud): lta bu'i mdog dang / shag kra dang /  dur+ya dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / a sa mgar ba la sogs pa rdzas kyi bsngags pas
3b5(rnying rgyud): 'phags par 'tsher ba ma smin pa med par be zhugs pa ni rnal 'byor ma kun tu bzang po 'khor dang bcas pa'o// de yang gus pa chen
3b6(rnying rgyud): po gsang ba dang / gus pa chen po sna tshogs pa'i dri dang / gus pa chen po dbang sgyur ba ni gsang ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / gsal
3b7(rnying rgyud): ba 'dzin byed ma dang / rnam par dri'i gnas su gyur pa dang / rnam par sgra byed pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o// de nyid mthong bar byed pa'i
4a1(rnying rgyud): dbang po dang / nyan par byed pa'i dbang po dang / gsung byed chen po'i dbang po dang / gtar ba chen po'i dbang po dang / shin tu gtong bar
4a2(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa dang / shin tu rtog par mdzad pa dang / shin tu 'dzin dbang chen po dang / shin tu grub par mdzad pa dang / cha lugs mi gtong ba'i btsun mo dang bcas
4a3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// yod pa rnam par rtog par mdzad pa dang / med pa sel bar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'du shes rgyal ba yin par mdzad pa dang / shin tu 'gog pa rnam par 'jom
4a4(rnying rgyud): pa chen mo dang / mngon spyod kyi las kyis gnyis su med par 'khril nas chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa chen po'i gzhal yas na bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan
4a5(rnying rgyud): 'das gsang ba chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma'i gan la yas su dgyes nas ma skyes pa'i dbyings shes rab kyi gas chen mo mu khyud kun dang ldan pa zla rgyas lnga
4a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med par khyab pa/ rin po che kun dang ldan pa gra dang ngos dang kha dog dang dbyibs rgya khyon dpag tu med par gyur pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab
4a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i cha lugs kyis rnam par mdzes pa/ yid bzhin chen po'i rgyan gyis rnam par spras pa/ sna tshogs pa'i bye brag gis rgyal ba rnams kyi gdung 'dzin pa/ sgyu 'phrul chen
4a8(rnying rgyud): bo'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa theg pa phyi'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi theg pa chen po 'bab gzhol dge sdig chen po'i mchog shin tu gsang ba chen mo dang bcas pa/ pad+ma chen po'i dbus
4b1(rnying rgyud): nalce kha dog bzhi'i bye brag gis mdzes par gyur pa phyogs bzhi bre ba rim pa gsum gyi cha lugs kyis gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sgrib pa mchog tu
4b2(rnying rgyud): sel ba ste le'u dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po gdung ba mchog tu sel bar mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'dzum pa chen pos rab tu chags pa chen po
4b3(rnying rgyud): la dbang sgyur bar dgyes te/ gsang ba chen mo'i mkha' la pad+ma dbang gi mdog gis rgyas par mdzad de/ oM su ra tra su khe zhes brjod pas rdo rje rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa btsun mo dang bcas par gyur to// de nas rab tu
4b4(rnying rgyud): 'di brjod par mdzad do// bzhi pa kha dog dkar la 'tsher// btang snyom sa kun gyi spro bsdu yis// gsum pa rdzogs par gsal ba dang / dag rgya'i tshogs mchog de dag las// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes/ 
4b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs kyis// che chu/ med par gsal bar bsgom// dbul gnyis pa'i yi ger/ ldan// gsal ba nyid kyi dus dag tu// cod pan lnga yi rin chen las// 
4b6(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang brgyan dam pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gsum pa mthing 'a bar yi ge che// rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdulas// phyag brgyar gsal nga
4b7(rnying rgyud): skur gsal ba// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes// sgrib pa kun spangs sdig med sdoms// gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las// cod pan lnga ldan yi ger gsal// thams cad blo sbyangs yid bzhin gter// mnyam pa 'khril
4b8(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshul 'dzin pa// rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// las thams cad kyi mchog rgyal mo rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog/ chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa// gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa ni/ 
5a1(rnying rgyud): thams cad ma lus dbang du mdzad// sbyar dang bskyed dang bsdu ba yis// phyag rgyar gsal bas dbang gi sku// btsun mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes// gnyis su med par 'khril ba yis// dbu ru yi ge gnyi/ 
5a2(rnying rgyud): nga ldan 'arin chen rigs kyi spro bsdu las// cod pan rigs lnga kha dog ste// ji bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad+ma'i tshul// mnyam par bsam pas dkyil 'khor yin// mi 'byed pa yi ting 'dzin/ 
5a3(rnying rgyud): gyis/ rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog/ pad+ma rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin// gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom// chu skyes 'dzum pa'i 'od du ldan// steg dang sprod pa'i ros
5a4(rnying rgyud): mo yis/ dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod par bsham// 'di ltar gsal dbas dbang yang rdzogs// thams cad sdud pa zhes su bya// de ba bzhin dbang ste las thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// dus gsum pa yi
5a5(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa me// rigs kun 'dus pa bde gshegs las// mnyam pa ji bzhin ting 'dzin te// yi ge 'bru gcig kun gyi mchog/ bshad pas khyad par las kun rdzogs// chu skyes gsal ba'i 'dab
5a6(rnying rgyud): ma steng gnyis su med par gsal ba ni// rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis// 'dus pa gsal bskur gyur pa// 'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing // blo la yid gnyis med pa dang // phyag rgyar gsal bas rgyal ba'i sku/ 
5a7(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo dang ni mnyam dgyes// dbu gnyis pa yi yi ger ldan// sbyin pa rgya chen khengs pa na// rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas bsdu// bong chod lo grangs khyad par med// gnyisu med par 'khril bar gsal// dus kun du ni mnyam
5a8(rnying rgyud): ldan pas// gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu rdzogs// zla rgyas lta bu'i gtso bo bsgom// chags pa med par 'dod sdud pa'o// yum dang lhan cig bsgom pa ni// A li kA li byed pa'i don// phyag rgyalas kyi bye brag gis// bdeng
5b1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i tshul gnas pa// rgyal ba kun kyang de bzhin 'thun// phyag las snol mar gnas pa yi// kun kyang sems pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// phyag rgya thal mo rdo rje ni// kun kyang yum gyi rgyab du stsol// zhal gnyis mdzes
5b2(rnying rgyud): par sa rgyas nas// blags pa'i ljags gnyis mdzes// dung gi phur bus 'khur chos la// gdabs shing sdebs pa'i tshul du bzhugs// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa// rgyal ba kun gyi sku yi mchog/ gzhang dang
5b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzum pa'i gtsogazungs bsgom// rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don// gsang ba spyod la shin tu dgyes// gsang ba nyid du sems can 'dren// thams cad kun gyi rmongs pa sel// yum gyi las kyi khyad par ni// sa
5b4(rnying rgyud): yi rim pa kun sbyong zhing // zas la bgol dbang med pa// nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa// byang chub sems kyi char chen gyis// dam por bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad// dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste
5b5(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin// phyag rgya chen po'i tshigs mag ni// dag pa don gyi rigs mchog yin// myur bar rtag tu ma yengs na// gdon mi za bar 'grub pa ni// 'dod khams lha yi'id bye
5b6(rnying rgyud): kyis 'gasang ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor mchog/ gsang ba nyid kyi mkha' dbyings nas// yi ge a ldan tsheg drag bcwa
5b7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor bde chen thugs kyi sras// gzugs khams la sogs byin brlabs nas// phyag mtshan 'khor lor gsal ba dang // bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs// gtso ma gser gyi kha dog la// nyi ma zer gyi
5b8(rnying rgyud): 'od bzhin du/ gsal ba 'tsher ba bcom ldan 'das// dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa las// rin chen myu gu khang pa 'bar// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis// legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs// rdzogs pa
6a1(rnying rgyud): chen po'i bzhugs tshul dang // ting 'dzin 'thun pas 'gro la dmigs// pad+ma ge sar dbus gnas pa'i// thig bzhi gsang ba bzhi dang ldan// mdun du lha mo chags pa mo// lo grangs
6a2(rnying rgyud): nyi shu mdzes dang ldan// ma hA pu ka'i gnas la dgyes// mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang chas// gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs tshul ni// gtso la brtan pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rgyab du lha mo dgyes chen mo// sangs rgyas
6a3(rnying rgyud): brten par mdzad tshul gyis// thal mos 'dzin pa sku brtan pa// sku tshe bcu drug rtsa dmar sku// sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin chags pas sbyong // 'dod chags can la 'thun par mdzad// g.yas su zhe sdang gdul ba mo// rdo rje bcwo
6a4(rnying rgyud): sbyor la dgyes// ma dad pa rnams dbang med par// drag por sbyor mdzod zhe sdang sel// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis// gtong ba med par bstan pa'i tshul// sngo
6a5(rnying rgyud): bsangs mdangs ldan khyad par che// khru tshad bco lnga chags pa can/ dus mtha' med par sbyor la dgyes// steg dang sgeg pa 'i cha lugs kyis// sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal 'khru/ rab tu
6a6(rnying rgyud): skams pa 'gog pa rnams// brlang nas rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// ad tA ma la'i phrin las kyis// thams cad byang chub chen por mdzad// mig gnyis 'dzums dang sbom po yis// dbang mor ldan par byas pa na
6a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med par sbyor 'dod yin// sna'i rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin// ma btang bzhugs la brtson byos pa'o// so rnams bsdams nas kha phye ba// dus la bab ces bya ba ste// ting 'dzin gsal bar rgyu ba na// dus la
6a8(rnying rgyud): bab ces bya ba yin// 'di ltar brda ldan ting 'dzin la// dam can bud med mi 'dud pa// dngos grub mi 'gyur dam tshig nyams// tshe rabs kun tu brlag par 'gyur// 'di ltar brtson par byed pa na// ge man pa bslangs/ 
6b1(rnying rgyud): panasas/ rgyas bu lag//  la mas du/ kyis drug rdzam s+ho ldanapas// ngas dus ba sa gtsu dang / sa sa rgyal drus/ drag pa tshas pa sa pas/ 
6b2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi bad+ma gang // sbom po dbang ngas lnga rnams kyis// yum gyis blangs te gtsol mchid// nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs pas// bsnyen pa ma mu rdzogs par bskum// byang chub sems kyi dkyil
6b3(rnying rgyud): las/ mchod pa brgyad kyis bstod par mchod// de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // gnyis su med par lung bzhin du// mnyam par 'a khril ba'i tshul du bstan// dus gsum kun tu gdung 'dzin pa// g.yon phyogs brten par
6b4(rnying rgyud): rgal dang ldan// jong tshod lan bcung gu pa'i// sdong ba dul ba dgal da// g.yas par bzung ba'i spyadan gyis gzigs// dri gu bun khrol la bkrol// rdo rjerje tu glegs byed pa/ sangs rgyas sngam
6b5(rnying rgyud): dab rgyan can// mngon du sbyor la rab brtson pa// brda dang bcas pa'i gargya sa ni// sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma// byang chung rje/ mas kyi sprin chen gyis// mchod pa chen pos rab mchod mnyes// sprul
6b6(rnying rgyud): ba bsam yas mtha' klas pa// dus gsum 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// ngo sor chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni// mnyes dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod// gru chad bzhi yi rim pa la// thos byed gsal byed
6b7(rnying rgyud): gsung ba che/ dri dang ldan pa la sogs pas// btsun mo dag dang thabs gcig tu// gnyis su med pa'i tshul du bzhugs// bar 'khyams bzhi la gnas pa ni// thos byed dbang dang nyan byed dbang // dri mchog dbang du
6b8(rnying rgyud): lta byed dbang // dus ni bzhi rnams lha mo bzhi// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// zhe sdang 'joms byed la sogs pas// sgo rnams kun tu gnas pa ni// snying rje'i yum dang bcas par gnas// nyi ma zla ba pad+ma mchog ri
7a1(rnying rgyud): chen dung dang bcas pa ste// tshangs pa brgya byin gnyis gnyis kyis// bteg pa'i khri la rab tu bzhugs// rdzogs pa chen por kun kyang gnas// sems dpa' chen po'i bzhugs tshul du// kun kya
7a2(rnying rgyud): rab tu gnas par bstan// zhal ni kun tu sa le ba// thugs ni kun tu lhan ne ba// sku ni kun la khyab par gsal// e ma mi skye mi 'gag mchog/ e ma mi sel mi len mchog/ e mtsham ngam drag shul spyod// e ma
7a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i stabs dang bcas// oM ma mtshan ma sel bar ston// e ma gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrogs// e ma byol song spro ba bskyed// e ma sprul pa bsam yas mchog/ e ma mya ngan 'das par mdzad// e ma
7a4(rnying rgyud): gsang ba des don mdzad// e ma gzungs dang mnyam par sbyor// e ma tsi dayang mi mdzad mchog/ ngo mtshar sprin las 'di dag gis/ des yi rim pa 'byongs par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas pa nyid mngon par
7a5(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas pa la gleng ste mnyes par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rnal 'byor/ bde ba chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 
7a6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po kun tu bzang mo rnal 'byor ma la 'jug par dgyes te rab tu 'dris pa chen po dgongs pa dang / kun tu bzang mo rnal 'byor mas// zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pa// e ma sems dpal
7a7(rnying rgyud): thig le che/ bag chags kun gyi bsnyen por gsungs// 'di las 'jug pa'i chos 'ga' med zhes brjod do// de nas gsang ba chen mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril bar gyur te/ g.yon pa bskyed pa rnam pa mad
7a8(rnying rgyud): pos mnyes pa dang pad+ma sbas pa la sogs pa 'byung ba spel bar mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so// e ma bde ba mchog las skyes pa phyag na rdo rje can// chos kun dngos po med par gsal ba la// 'byung
7b1(rnying rgyud): nas chen pos ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen pa e mngo mtshar che// rgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu btsal med pa'i// rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyang rgyal bas yong mi rnyed// stong pa nyid la dga' ba'i chags pa'i cho / 
7b2(rnying rgyud): ba de phyir skye 'gag med ces rgyal ba rnams kyis 'di la brjod// chos kun dbyer med ma rnyings pa nyid las// kun gyi dga' ba 'byung ba rgyal ba kun pas shin tu 'phags shes brjod pas gsang ba'i
7b3(rnying rgyud): mkha' la kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor 'jug par mdzad de shin tu rngam pa'i glu 'di blangs so// sgyu ma kun las 'phags pas dbyer med rnam par 'phrul byed pa// kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor de ni bder gshegs/ 
7b4(rnying rgyud): yum chen kun gyis gsos// sdug bsngal kun sbyong bder gshe rags yum la 'jug pa thugs ngam yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs// oM hUM mi 'gog ji yang mdzad pa nyid ni mi mdzad mnya
7b5(rnying rgyud): pa yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// mya na 'das kun 'gro ba'i mgon// stong pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor la// dka' thub chen po thob par 'gyur zhes gnyis su med/ 
7b6(rnying rgyud): pabar glengs so// de nas snying po mchog gi yi ge ni// dang po'i gnas su bsgom par bya// de snying yi ge bzhi pa ste// rdo rje chen po gsal ba mchog/ yi ge a ldan thig le che// chos kun
7b7(rnying rgyud): 'dus par rnam par bsgom// dang por me long lta bu ste// mnyes pa'i kha dog shin tu 'bar// phyag lag 'khyud pa spong ba yis// thams cad de dang 'dra bar gsal// oM hUM su ra ta su ke dz+nyA nad
7b8(rnying rgyud): si A hUM/ bder gshegs rgyal mo mkha' dbyings su// gsal dag las rnams 'grub par bsgom// chu skyes pad+ma 'dab ma stong // bzad pa'i sgras ni rnam par brgyan// de steng chos kyi sku ru gsal/ 
8a1(rnying rgyud): zla rgyas lta bu'i mkha' dbyings nas// thams cad bsdu ba gsum gyis bsdus// oM su ra t+na su khe d+harma d+ha tuswa b+ha bA oM A ng+ku/ gnyis su med pa'i yi ge mchog/ mi skye ba ni sa dang ldan// 
8a2(rnying rgyud): byin rlabs rgyal ba kun gyi gnas// mchod pa brgyad dang gsal bar ldan// so sor gsal ba'i mkha' dbyings la// hUM gi zer gyis reg par mdzad// oM su ra tA su khe na pradz+nyA b+ha k+Sha na sarba bA oM A hUM/ 
8a3(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi char chen ni// yi ge gnyis pa rtsa dmar sku// gnyis su med par ldan pa na// bdud kun rnam par btul ba dang // dbyings kyi bde la gsal ba ni// sgo dbye ba yi tshul gyis ni// pad+ma dbye ba sna
8a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs bya// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba yis// bya ba nan tan ye shes pa skyed// 'di ltar rgyal ba kun mdzad pa// sprul pa bsam gyi sa mi khyab las// mchod pa mang po lha mor ldan// oM su ra tA su khe na duSh+Ta
8a5(rnying rgyud): dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+ha bA oM A hUM/ rnal 'byor skal ldan chen po ni/ skal ngan kun gyi gsos su gsungs// gnyis su med pa/ 'i byang chub sems// mangs bshang gci rdzas rnams ni// dogs pa
8a6(rnying rgyud): med pa'i dngos grub ste// rgyal ba nyid la rgyal bas mchod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po las/ bag chags gtan la 'bebs pa gnyis su med par gleng ba'i le'u ste/ 
8a7(rnying rgyud): gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang gnyi su med pa'i phyag rgya'i mchog ni 'di lta ste/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phyag rgya las// mdze
8a8(rnying rgyud): par gsal ba yab yum bcu// sor mo phan tshun spel legs pa// rdo rje thal mo byang chub rgya// gsang ba rnal 'byor thugs kyi mchog/ dam tshig sdom pa 'da' bar dka'// rnal 'byor pa la a lI gsal/ 
8b1(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang la kar byed// lnga char zur du ldan pa ni// gcig tu gyur pas gar gyi bzhi// oM hUM tra AHhUM/ mA A kA hU rA/ thal mo btang snyoms tshul gyis ni// mdzes pa'i mtha' na gar gyis bya// snying kar baH/ 
8b2(rnying rgyud): pas rnal 'byor dan// gar gyi phyag rgya dang nyid pas// gar du byas pas thal mo snol// mjug tu dbul ba'i tshul gyis bstod// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// g.yon pa rtse gsum g.yas pas gzung // 
8b3(rnying rgyud): de nyid gzhan du 'bebs par bya// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// dga' ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa yis// g.yas su bdud pa'i tshul gyis ni// g.yas pa yi ni thugs kar sgreng // g.yon pa gsung nyan 'a khril
8b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshul// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// mdzes pa'i mtha' nas gar byas shing // gzhan nas bsdus nas g.yas g.yon 'o// ga/ rdo rje gar ni de dag las// lag pa g.yas pa 'degs pa dang / da
8b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du rnam par brtag/ rdo rje gar ni de dag las// spyan dang nga bu ni g.yon du 'dud// cang te'u thogs pa'i tshul gyis/ ni// mchod pa byed par rnam par bsngags// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las
8b6(rnying rgyud): lus ni g.yas g.yon bsgyur ba dang // gar las lag po phral bkyed pa'o// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// g.yon pas g.yas pa'i gru mo gzung // g.yas pa nyug pa'i tshul du bya'o// de nyid rdo rje gar dag lnga/ 
8b7(rnying rgyud): dam tshig phyag rgya 'thor bar bstan// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// dam tshig phyag rgya steng du bsgyur// de nyid g.yon pa'i nang dag las// g.yas pa'i dam tshig phyag rgyas gto// de g.yas pas drang bar ldan// 
8b8(rnying rgyud): de nyid gnyis pas gzung ba yin// de nyid gnyis ka thal mo bsdam// de nyid dril bu 'dzin par bsgom// oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu ka ka ra su khe na oM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma rA ga ste su ge na hUM/ oM sarba ta/ 
9a1(rnying rgyud): thA ga ta dz+wa la yA nA na ma ma hA su ken traM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma b+ha shra su khe na hA hA hA/ de nyid gtso bo'i phyag rgyar bcas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba bud d+ha lo tsan Ad ma naM/ sur tra su khe na
9a2(rnying rgyud): maN+Da la pU dza ya pU dza ya/ oM oM oM/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA d+hu dzA dzA/ oM su ra tA su khe na b+han d+ha b+han d+ha/ pU dza ya pU dza ya/ hUM hUM n+tu A/ oM su ra tra su khe na/ man sha mo ha/ pU dza ya pU dza ya/ hrihriM hri/ oM su ra tra su/ 
9a3(rnying rgyud): khe na sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma dan tra/ sA d+ha ka nad ho ho/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shri badz+ra la s+ye/ badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ oM hUM hUM hUM a/ sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya tra traM lnga a/ oM sarba/ 
9a4(rnying rgyud): ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra gan d+he badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na/ d+he pa d+he pa/ pU dza ya pU dza ya/ hri hri hri a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra nir te badz+ra gar+b+ha ma hA ti la ka su ke na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ a a a/ oM hUM/ oM
9a5(rnying rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra du be badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ oM tang tang tang hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra puSh+pe badz+ra gar+b+he swA/ khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ hA tsA ny+dzas/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra sa
9a6(rnying rgyud): lo ka dz+nyA maN+Da la ti la ka bud d+ha su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ oM hri hri hri oM A hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra gan+d+ha badz+ra gan+d+he ma hA maN Da la ti la ka su ke na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ a a a/ oM AHhUM/ de bzhin gshegs
9a7(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad mnyes pa'i mchog las gar gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen mo dang bcas pa dam tshig bla na med pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
9a8(rnying rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// thams cad sdom pa la gnas par mkhyen no// dam tshig chen po 'di dag gsungs// so so'i theg pa bsam yas pa// so sor nyes pa med na bde// 'jig rten pa la chang mdo
9b1(rnying rgyud): brtsan// 'dul ba 'dzin la srungs na bde// gtsang sbra spyod la gtsang sbrar spyad// mi dge bzlog na dge bcu// spyad pas lhag pa'i 'jig rten 'dzin// rang gi don gyi ting 'dzin gyis// byang chub sa la gnas pa'i
9b2(rnying rgyud): rnams/ nyams pa med de ma bcol na// nyams pa med de las kyang 'grub// rnal 'byor spyad pa spyod pas 'grub// tshig cis goms pas theg pa 'joms// gtso mchog bshes gnyen mi spang zhing // bkur
9b3(rnying rgyud): rim 'gro mchog kyang bskyed// ting 'dzin goms par cha lugs bsgom// chog gi bzlas pa bar mi gcad// dam tshig mched la gdung ba bskyed// sku yi dam tshig bsam mi khyab// gsung gi dam tshig sngags pa yin// thuH/ 
9b4(rnying rgyud): kyi dam tshig lhag par gsung // rigs lnga bsrungs pa'i dam tshig da rnams// nyams na shin tu skongs par dka'// spyad pa'i dam tshig rdzas rnams ni// nyams na myur bar bskang ba yin// nyams pa ma ngas
9b5(rnying rgyud): le lo yis// sangs rgyas kun dang bcugs chen te// 'khyam pa rnam pa bcu por ni// myur bar skye bar nges pa ste// de bas rigs/ kyi bu mchog ni// mchog dang tha ma 'bring gi rnams// rab kyi bar chad
9b6(rnying rgyud): med par spyad// 'bring gis lo zla dus drug ste// tha mas lo 'tshams mi bzla zhes// rgyal ba rnams kyis shin tu gsungs// rdo rje dri dang byang chub sems// rag ta dri chen tshe chen po// dag pa'i snod dang rab ldan pas// byin gyi/ 
9b7(rnying rgyud): brlabs te 'thung byed pa// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ste// 'das na rlag pa chen por 'gyur// mnyam par gzhag pa'i chos thams cad// mnyam par shes pas sprad pa dang // mnyam pa nyid tu gsal ba na// rnal 'byor
9b8(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' yin zhes gsungs// rnal 'byor snod du bya ba gang // rdzas kyi sngags pa yod pa rnams// rab tu bkru zhing byi dor bya// ka la bing ka'i mdog bzhin du// gzhong bu phor bu snod kyi rnams// dri ma bkru zhing mdzes
10a1(rnying rgyud): par bya// dus gsum du ni sman sbyar ba// dang por dngul gyi gzhong bar sbyar// de nas ragan gzhod pa ste// zangs kyi gzhong bar sbyar ba ni// srang re sbyar ba'i sman rnams las// zangs
10a2(rnying rgyud): dang dngul dang ra gan nam// gser dang lcags su rab bsres la// rnam rtog nad la sman sbyar ba// man dA ra ba'i mdog bzhin sbyar// man dA ra bar ma gyur tshe// nam yang sbyar bar ma gsung
10a3(rnying rgyud): teganyi zla dus gcig shar ba na// de nas rdzas kyi bsngags pa las// sman gyi sbyor ba rab tu brtsam// shin tu sman rnams 'byor pa ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bas ma yas su/ 
10a4(rnying rgyud): ka la bing ka'i mdog tu brtag/ 'di la gang zhig mi brtson dpa// dam tshig mi btsun sdom pa med// rdo rje spun las dben par gdon// lha dang rdo rje slob dpon la// bag med
10a5(rnying rgyud): par ni brnyas pa dang // rmongs pas ma mthong g.yel ba dang // dam chos srog la mi lta ba// sangs rgyas rgyal ba bdun la brnyas// dkyil 'khor ba yi las byas pa// 
10a6(rnying rgyud): sems can dmyal ba chen po ste// tshe thung nad kyis btab pa dang // 'jig rten 'di ru gnod pa mang // shi nas dmyal ba ngan song skye// de bas sdom pa 'di dag las// 'da' bar mdzad pa gong yang
10a7(rnying rgyud): med// 'di los 'das par mi byed pas// tshe 'di nyid la rgyal ba'i sku// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la gnas zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid la nyid dam tshig chen po'i sdom pa
10a8(rnying rgyud): 'dis shin tu bsnyengs par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bde ba sdom pa thams cad kyi mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom
10b1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rdul 'byor ma dang bcas pa dgongs pa gcig tu gnas par mdzad do// rnal 'byor gyi dbang drug chen po stong pa mchog dang ldan pa'i spyong pa ma lus pa/ 
10b2(rnying rgyud): nyid dang zab mo'i don yin par mkhyen to// mkhyen nas sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i thabs 'di gsungs s+ho// e mchos dbyings rnam dge spyong yul las// sangs rgya sa sems can gnyis stom/ 
10b3(rnying rgyud): ya mtshan 'phrul chen yin// de yang ye shes tshogs las sna tshogs snang mod kyi// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma las ni rab tu sprul te 'char// bden gnyis so sor snang ba nyid kyang yum gyi mkha
10b4(rnying rgyud): zhes rgyal bas gsungs// ma nor lam chen sgom na kun tu zing mo bsgoms pas lam du zhugs pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun shes rab bud las ni mchod
10b5(rnying rgyud): cing bsnyen pas ye shes chen por 'grub bo// dkyil 'khri/ ra gdon pa'i las kyi dngos grub mchog gi la/ rdo rjeglu'i don de nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa lags
10b6(rnying rgyud): bar gyur te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid/ dpal kun tu bzang pos thabs dang shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so// mngon spyod las kyis 'jug pa ni/ 
10b7(rnying rgyud): phan tshun du ni dga' spyod pa// rnal 'byor sdom la gnas pa yin// de la mchod pa dam pa ni// sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste// kun tu khyab pa kun tu sbyor// rjes su chags pa dam tshig
10b8(rnying rgyud): mchog de phyir kar sham mdog dang ldan// bcu drug bong tshod ring ba la// lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste// lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang // dpral ba dbyes che kos ko pra// num chung
11a1(rnying rgyud): ning sor me ring // yid tsam bzur la mig kyus ring // dka pa ni rtsa dmar mdangs su chags// so dkar thags bzangs 'tshams thung zhing // skad sdom gdangs dang ldan/ 
11a2(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste// 'di la rtse bar byed pa ni// rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// gnas rab dben par rab brtag ste// sha dkar
11a3(rnying rgyud): mdangs ldan mdog dang ldan// lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can// so dkar thags dam mig dkyus zlum// skad phra mdog dkar spro ring ba// dpral dbyes la sogs bzang gnas pa// 
11a4(rnying rgyud): rma dag gnas pa la sogs ni// rtag par chos la 'dud pa yi ngan// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rigs can te// 'di la brtso ngan byas bsgrub pa yis// de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin
11a5(rnying rgyud): la 'phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// tshangs pa'i snga drog/ cig tsam gyis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// / rnal 'byor sbyor ba dga' ba ni// sbyor ba brtson pas 'gru
11a6(rnying rgyud): par gsungs// bud med cha lugs legs pa ni// bong tshed mi ring lus phra zhing // rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba// mig legs ngo zlum rtsa dmar tshe// lhun du chags
11a7(rnying rgyud): la mi shes med// lus la mtshan gyi rma 'dras brgyan// tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang // so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan// chos sems pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang
11a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od// rdo rje pad mar ldan byas te// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// 'dod khams lha yi skad cig gis// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// lus zlum brtun dang / 
11b1(rnying rgyud): ngargyal bcas// khong na tshig rnon sems la 'dzin// bya bar dran la mi gtong ldan// bsgrub pa blo rdul sha rus che// mdangs bkag glan phyi phyir che// sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dang // rin chen
11b2(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bag chags yi ges rtsad gcod cing // ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na// bsgrub pa dus la bab pa ste// de tshe rab tu brtson pa yis// yum gyi pad ma
11b3(rnying rgyud): kha phye ste// bde ba thugs kyi 'du 'phro yis// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// rigs kyi rin chen 'grub pa ni// cha 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// thugs rje mdzad spyod bye brag gis/ 
11b4(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs// rab tu bkug ste dag 'aspyod na// snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen por gsus// shan pa rigs ngan smad 'chob
11b5(rnying rgyud): ba 'angan pa'i rigs dang longs spyod rnams// 'joms pa po yis ting 'dzin gyis// myur du spyad na 'grub par/ gsungs// yi dgas gnod sbyin byol song dang // kyi dang
11b6(rnying rgyud): ru srul spre'u la sogs// mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun// so sor 'tsham par dga' spyad na// dregs pa can la zhi ba che// brtson la dga' ba brtson par mdzad// thabs kyi mdzad spyong/ 
11b7(rnying rgyud): kun gyi mchog/ sems can 'di dag don gyi phyir// phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams// 'dul ba'i mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med// shin tu gtum pa'i cha
11b8(rnying rgyud): lugs kyis// gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad// shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis// dregs pa can rnams dbang du mdzad// shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis// chags pa'i yid rnam
12a1(rnying rgyud): dbang du mdzad// e ma shin tu ngo mtshar che// ci yang yin pas cing mi dgongs zhes gsungs pas thams cad rab tu brtson pa chen po dang ldan par gyur to// bcom
12a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed rab tu 'dun pa'i thugs kyis mnyan pa brtson par mdzad do// rdo rje chos kyi mchog la
12a3(rnying rgyud): sogs pa rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu mnyan pa dang gus pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su gzung ba'i le'u mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen mos rab tu brtson par mdzad/ 
12a4(rnying rgyud): rab tu brtson pa'i yid kyis spyod pa dang 'khyud pa dang gyud kyidagyes pa dang mgu ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyad do// de nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas sku dang
12a5(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di gsungs so// oM hUM/ shes rnal 'byor mchog ldan pas// skal bzla ngas mchog gi dngos grub stsol// rab tu rmongs pa
12a6(rnying rgyud): gsal phyir 'gog pa kun slong ba// rnal 'byor bde mchog gnyis su med pa 'di dag shin tu ngo mtshar che// rin chen yid bzhin gzungs ni kun gyi dbang ldan pa// tshangs ma'i mdangs
12a7(rnying rgyud): ldan gzungs ma drangs te de brtson pas// grub par 'gyur ba 'di la dga' spyod a la la// shin tu srid pa 'di dag bzhin du spyad pas 'grub par gsungs pas sa la gnas pas 'phags
12a8(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba kun gyi nang na kun du bzang po rgyal ba kun pas 'phags// de yang kun tu bzang mo yin zhes sngon gyi rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// mtshan ma kun bral rab tu dga' sbyor mi gto/ 
12b1(rnying rgyud): bAs+yA/ sems da rjin nyid kyang de yin rna lnga bkun gyis gsungs// mangs pa mchog gi glu 'di dag/ brtson par byed cing len pa ni// du/ 'thub rnal 'byod cing 'dzin te// tshangs pa/ 
12b2(rnying rgyud): mchog gi drogacig gis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par gsungs zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu brtson pa chen pos gcig go rang bzhin du gyur par mdzad do// 
12b3(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas dus gsum gyi ston pa thams cad bde bar gshes
12b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin te rab tu mchod pa chen pos mnyes shing ma rig pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dul bar mkhyen to// mkhye ngan nas ma rig pa grol bar mdzad pa dang zhe sdang rnam par grol
12b5(rnying rgyud): bar dgyes te/ de dag mnyam pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis 'dul ba'i thabs su sgrol ba dang / dbang gi ro gas kyi sbyor bas rab tu bsrungs shing bsrung ba mdzad do// 
12b6(rnying rgyud): bdag gi rnal 'byor kun tu bzang // mtshan nyid kun brtags gnyis su med// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam stor na// mnyam pa'i sa la gnas pa yin// rang sems zla rgyas dbus gnas
12b7(rnying rgyud): pa rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin te// don rtogs gsal bar gyur pa yis// rab tu bsgral ba chen po ste// mchog gis la gnas rgyud yin// sku yi cho 'phrul rigs kun rdzogs/ 
12b8(rnying rgyud): gsung gi sbyin pa bla na med// thugs kyi mdzad pa rtags dang ldem// ting 'dzin 'di ltar gsal ba yis// blo rmongs sdug bsngal snang ba'i phyir// gnyis su med par gsal ba yis// ji chu bcom
13a1(rnying rgyud): bsdu ba mdzad// mngon spyod las kyi sgrol ba mdzad// gnyis su med par 'grub par 'gyur// rtags dang shes pa phun sum tshogs// byams pa mdzad pa rnal 'byor thugs// 
13a2(rnying rgyud): gzungs kyi mchod pa mnyam ldan pas// rgyal ba mnyes par sbyor shes na// mnyes pa chen pos bdag nyid mchod// bden pa'i tshul du dbyer med pa'i// sems nyid rtogs pa rnam sbyang phyir// ting
13a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin shugs kyis kun bsgral te// mngon spyod las kyis sgrol bar mdzad// gsang ba'i mkha' la kun du sbyor// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad spyod bsam gyis mi khyab pa las
13a4(rnying rgyud): mchod pa de kho na nyid de le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor rab tu skyong ba la dgye/ des te/ slob ma mchog dang 'bring dang tha mas yon gyi dbul ba/ 
13a5(rnying rgyud): mang po byas te dkyil 'khor du gzud pa mdzad do// bgegasatshar gcad pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gdong bar bstan rin po ches lag sor bkang ste snying po 'di
13a6(rnying rgyud): zlos su gzhug go/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pu dzi ta d+hi d+ha tiSh+Tha hUM// oM ma hA maN DA la de ba ka ra pU dza ya pU dza ya hUM a// zhes brjod de me tog 'thor du gzhug go// gang la bab pa'i bshes gnyen bstan/ 
13a7(rnying rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya dam tshig bstan// de nas dam tshig chu blud cing // tshig 'di rab tu ga par bsgo// sems can gyi ni gzugs chen po// las la sogs te dbang bskur ba// rgyal ba'i sras
13a8(rnying rgyud): su dbang bskur yin// di ring phan chad bu khyod kyis// dam tshig gnyen po 'di dag ni// srog gi phyir yang mi gtang zhing // slob dpon ma btang grogs la mchod// bka' la gus par mnyan
13b1(rnying rgyud): ba byos// gal te dka' las pas 'gyung na// gnos dang gzhig dang sa rgyal dang // snod sA dang dmyal bar ste// sems la cu 'di gnas pa ni// drin las rnam pani 'jam par byanas
13b2(rnying rgyud): brjod nas// rdo slong dpon dkyil 'khor dang // kun du bzang dang mched la sogs// zhabs la gtugs dang gus par bya// rgyud kyi mnyan pa thams cad bya// bsgrub pa'i gzugs la brten pa
13b3(rnying rgyud): 'grub/ de nas rigs kyi bu mchog la// gsang pa'i ming gi dang yang bsrur// gus pa ldan pa'i bu mchogangs// rgyal ba drabang yod rgyal po srid// ra'i lus gnas dang 'khor lu
13b4(rnying rgyud): dang // bu dang chung ma cha rgyud dang // rin po ched 'brel dang / ngul// sna bdun rin chen nor gyi dbyig/ rta dang ga/ nga po shing rta dang // ma ge ne'u la ci yod rnams// gtor
13b5(rnying rgyud): dang dbyig drang yid 'thad pa// sems la the tsom med pa yi// bkur sti rim gro mchog bskyed la// phul na rgyalab mnyes par 'gyur// de nas dang mnod theg pa'i tshad/ 
13b6(rnying rgyud): rim pa bzhin du mnod par bya// mnyan pa grub pa la sogs dang // las dang ging dang rgyal 'theb dang // spyan dang rdo rje tshad 'dzin pa// bye brag mngag pa la sogs rnams// gsang ba'i dbang rnam
13b7(rnying rgyud): gang nod pa// nyi shu 'am bcu gnyis lon pa la// gos dang dbu rgyan bza' btung dang // phyag rgya dril bu la sogs pa// dkyil 'khor 'di ltar gsal bsgoms te// rgyal ba
13b8(rnying rgyud): kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// mngon du bstan pa ting dga' spyod cing // steng nas rgyal pos dbang bskur na// gdon mi za bar dngos grub thob// tshig gi legs pa bstod ra bya/ 
14a1(rnying rgyud): de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// zhabs la gtugs de gta' rag gtang // rdo rje spun dang gzungs ma yis// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba yin zhes brjod// dus gsum kun/ 
14a2(rnying rgyud): gyi sras chen po// dus gsum kun gyi spyad pa spyod// khams gsum kun gyi sgrol ba po// sgrol ba mchog gi spyad pa spyod// shin tu rnal 'byor skal ldan pa// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa dang / 
14a3(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma med pa'i chu 'thung zhing // ji ltar bsgo ba'i las byed pa// kun la phyed par rab grags yin// phyi rabs 'dren pa'i gadrung 'dzin pa// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sa la gnas// de
14a4(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gas dang bde kho na nyid las mchod yon dam pa dang snying rje'i le'u sde brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
14a5(rnying rgyud): 'das gsang ba rdo rje dkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnas par mdzad do// mdzad nas sde la zhi dang bya byed yan man mang po mi 'gog pa la snyoms
14a6(rnying rgyud): par zhugs so// de nas yang las la lhod pa rang thad kyi sdug bsngal rnams mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'jog par mdzad do// de nas yang mu stegs rtag par lta bather thug pa la rtag pa
14a7(rnying rgyud): the zug gi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do// chad pa phyis mi 'dod ces bya ba la cha lug de mnyam pa la 'dzud par mdzad do// mdzad nas rab tu 'gog pa'i dka' thub kyis myur ba bden
14a8(rnying rgyud): la gnas par mi steng ba rnams la dka'athung 'gyur ba chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul dbang chen po mdzad do// drag shul gyi brtsan thabs la dga' ba de thags zangs ris kyi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar/ 
14b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad do/ gzhan la snying rjer ma gyur pa'i phyogs gcig pa'i sa rgyal rnams la yid bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul bar mdzad do// gling bzhi'i dge sdig cha mi shes pa la 'khor los
14b2(rnying rgyud): sbyar ba chen por mdzad nas 'dul bar mdzad do// sgribs pa chen po dang gtum pa chen po dang btsa ba dang rab tu so tham tham che chung rnams gnyen po dang rdzangs kha dang / gshed
14b3(rnying rgyud): chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul bar mdzad do// de dag kyang chos mnyam pa chen po byang chub kyi tshul rdo rje thug pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin gyi tshul gyis gnas pa thabs dang shes rab dbyer med de rol pa bsam gyis
14b4(rnying rgyud): mi khyab pa gnas par mdzad do// thabs kyidang pa khro bo rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan da'adas kun tu bzang po chen po 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rnam
14b5(rnying rgyud): par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa bzhugs par/ mdzad do// de nas bdud zhe sdang chen po zhes bya ba de bskal pa stong gi dus na sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pazlas pas byung
14b6(rnying rgyud): chub tu sems ma bskyed pa/ rab tu gdug pabasgyi rung ba/ bong che ni tshangs che ba/ mngon chang nga drug gi gdug pas sems can la gnod pa/ mtshon gyi mche dang bcas pa dpag chad nas dri tshar
14b7(rnying rgyud): te rab tu gsod gcod pa 'thung byed cing me dadung gi dkyil na gdug pa'i 'da' 'phen cing g.yo ba chen pos bsngo ba drag po dang tsamang du gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bas kun tu bzang mo/ 
14b8(rnying rgyud): 'dzum pa mdzang do// ya ga lus kyi byang chub kyi sems kyi smin las/ oM du d+ha d+ya d+ha d+hur coH/ hu~M hU~M d+ha/ dzatr-i/ gtsags brjo nga sa ngas pa'i du me dad bang po'i drung ma dang / khya 'jug
15a1(rnying rgyud): gi chung ma dang / bi spu'i chung ma dang / tsakra'i rlung ma dang / de ba'i chung ma dang / ru tra'i chung ma dang / ka ru na'i chung ma dang / yul 'khor srung gi chud ma dang / rnam thos kyi/ 
15a2(rnying rgyud): chung ma dang / 'phags skyes kyi chung ma dang / mig mi bzang gi chung ma rnams rab tu chags pa'i 'du shes rang dbang med par skyes te/ 'du bar mdzad do// de yang byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ 
15a3(rnying rgyud): satwa badz+re ha ruka/ ma hA sa ma ya sarba sid d+hi hU~M hUM hUM/ ho ho ha zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mang pos mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te bzhugs pa la tshangs pa'i chung ma la
15a4(rnying rgyud): la sogs pa 'dus pa thams cad kyis so so re re shin tu chags rapa chen po'i yid skyes te 'khril bar gyur to// 'khril na/ das kyang rol pa'i byang chub kyi sems las chu'i dkyil 'khor
15a5(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pas 'jig rten 'khru zhing 'jig par mdzad// me'i dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten rab tu bsregs par ma dzad do// rlung gi dkyil 'khor mang pos 'jig rten sems can
15a6(rnying rgyud): gtor bar mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems kyi sprin gyis rigs nges par dbang bskur bar mdzad do// de nas gnyis su med pa las bzhengs te/ oM oM sarba bi si du sha sh+ma dza dza dza zhes brjod
15a7(rnying rgyud): pas tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug gi chung ma la sogs pa gzungs las bran mor dam mnos te slar gnas su phyin par gyur to// de nas sku'i cha lugs de las mnyam pa chen po las gnas par mdzad de/ oM b+ha
15a8(rnying rgyud): rA mu tA ma hA tsaN ra tsa dur yo gi ni maN+Da la kro d+ha ha la ha la hUM hUM hUM phaT ces brjod pas so so'i chung ma dang bu sring rdo rje gsod byed ma chen por gyur te/ bdud gdug pa chen po zhe sdang can la sogs pa la jo bo dam/ 
15b1(rnying rgyud): gnas bzhengs zhes smras te/ bdud gdug pa'i lus la jug bshings nas gnas so// 'on kyang ngamanyan par ma btub ste g.yo ngag med pa zhin rdzo ba gnas par gyur to// de nas bam
15b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das sprul pa thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba mdzad de dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi tho ba dang / rdo rje dang ze'u chung dang mnga' gzhu dang / zhags pa dang sdigs pa'i 'dzum mo dang / banang
15b3(rnying rgyud): 'khrug pa'i rol pas kun tu bzang mo dang 'i khril nas dbu gsum gsogs te/ sarba b+hA \u0f7f sarba thA ba hUM hUM Ta phaT ces brjod pas zhangs kyi 'og tu bdud pa ni dang tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa
15b4(rnying rgyud): rgyal chen phyogs skyong bsdus te/ khA hi khA hi phaT la da lu ru lu ru lu hU~M hUM shes pas bsgral tibi na dang bkang nas gsol te mi gnas par mdzad do// yang zhabs g.yas/ 
15b5(rnying rgyud): pa 'phen cing 'gro sbyor gyi tshul gyis/ oM sarba ta thAg/ ta ma hA dz+nyAn gAr b+ho ho d+hu d+d+ha hong+ku/ tsan ra la b+ha/ ma hA shrI hi ru kats+tshadz+dzan+tu/ hUM d+hAd+d+ha/ hriM hriM hriM/ phaT la pa/ 
15b6(rnying rgyud): ces brjod pas so so'i chung ma bu mos rang dbang med par bteg ste phyin to// de nas bdud zhe sdang chen po de yang dregs pa'i chung mas bteg ste phyin te/ phyin na so bcom ldan 'das dpal
15b7(rnying rgyud): he ru ka sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan chen pos oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya shrI he ru ka duSh+Te d+ha ka ha na/ dgang had ha/ bcab cab tsa/ hA hA hA hA hA zhes brjod pas rdo rje rnal 'byor
15b8(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug chen me rnal 'byor ma sul byed ma dang rnal 'byor ma gsad byed ma dang / dpyid ma dang rnal 'byor ma gtum mo dang / las la grub pa chen mo dang / rdo rje srig byed ma dang dbang sdud
16a1(rnying rgyud): chen pa rnams yum migs pa'i ma pa las byang chung gi sems kyi sbyin las pod nas gdug pa'i tshogs bcu sa shA / mngon pa
16a2(rnying rgyud): te lU sug bral nas bsgrubs shing bstabs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po dang la rde rje khrag 'thung chen pos 'gro ba gnod sbyin bdud kyi rigs kyi 'khor dang yi dgas kyi lus
16a3(rnying rgyud): lus kyi srin mo chen mo dang jug pa ma chen mo dang / du bya chen mo dang sug deng seng ge ba lang wu dang khyi dang bawang dang / spre'u dang / bya rog dang / bya rgod dang / rnga mo dang ngag la sogs pam
16a4(rnying rgyud): ru tra dang chas te gnas pa la mtshan mar ma chags pa'i sbyor bam dzad nas/ he he he he he hUM hUM hA hUM hUM/ @ phaT phaT ces brjod pas byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las seng ge
16a5(rnying rgyud): spangs chen po dang / stag gi cha lugs chen mo dang myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang / 'ug pa'i mgonan dang bya rog dang bya rgod dang mdzu mas laso/ 
16a6(rnying rgyud): pa srin mo'i cha lugs dang ma bral ba'i mdog gis 'thon nas/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsan Da ma hA maN+Dal hUM phaT/ zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i tshogs bsgral bar mdzad de bya dang mche ba can dang / 
16a7(rnying rgyud): sder chags kyi za stangs kyis 'phrog cing mnabs pa mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal sgyu 'phrul chen mos yang phyis bstan pa la mi sgribs par bya ba'i ched du las kyi bzlas pa 'di bka' stsal
16a8(rnying rgyud): te/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu ru// 'khor yug dur khrod chen po ste// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal 'gyur nas// drag po 'dul ba'i don ched du// dkyil 'khor 'bar bde/ 
16b1(rnying rgyud): dngas su// khrag 'bung me shes chen po ste// dbugasum phyag drug zhabs pazhing bgrang // ser nag 'jigs pa chen po su// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // mang su pa'i rdul du/ 
16b2(rnying rgyud): 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// sku yi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// rdo rje ban / 
16b3(rnying rgyud): ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// skal pa'i ma dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkan sgra drag pos/ 
16b4(rnying rgyud): srog chags brgyal// spyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jigs shing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// sdigs pa rnge'u chung tri shu zhing // phyag na bsnabs shing
16b5(rnying rgyud): ril mig mdzad// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bzhi bcu gsod cing tshul bzhin du// ha ha ha sa ni dgye sa par mdzad// he he ha sa ni yum dang rol// hU hu hUM gis
16b6(rnying rgyud): char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi sgrol zhing gnon// gzhal yas mthing nag chen pos ni// 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen
16b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i skul brgyan// srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang // tsham ngam chen po'i na bzar gsol// ci yang sgyur yang gzugs can te// 
16b8(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed su ste tshe 'phrul ba// drag shul gsung zhing tshe yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngan sems khrag chen 'thung // gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shin tu
17a1(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen po ston// swA s+yAd+d+ha/ ga6/ khwami hrI / gangs/ rba rma ga ta/ kaka ma margan/ rdum dus ma du/ rdordo rigs chen ma chu
17a2(rnying rgyud): thugs// rdo rje khrag 'thung chen po ste// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi rab tu gnon// smug nag 'jigs pa chen
17a3(rnying rgyud): po'i sku/ rdo rje khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // ma hA su ka'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// thugs kyi
17a4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// snying rje ban dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa de'i ral pa gyen du 'khril// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus
17a5(rnying rgyud): gzhog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// skan smras rigs kun brgyal zhing 'jug// sprugs pas bsod nams mu sa 'jigs cing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// rdzog
17a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i ri rab tri shu zhing // phyag na bsgrubs shing khrag 'thung ba// sangs rgyas kun tu bzang mo dang // rol pa'i tshul gyis mnyam sbyor zhing // stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// zhing chen
17a7(rnying rgyud): gsod cing dung mdzad pa// ha ha has ni dgyes par mdzad// he he he sa ni yum dang rol// hUM hU hUM gis char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// gzhal yas smug nag chen po ste// 'jig
17a8(rnying rgyud): rten stong gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po ma'o rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang // tsham che ma chen po na bzar gsol// ci yang rgyu
17b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzugs chen po// che'i tshe 'od nga la chen po// sangs rgyas su yang chem chem gsol// srog chags gzhan sa slo dgos// 'jig rten su sre tsho 'ardul ba// drag shul gsung ging rmongs/ 
17b2(rnying rgyud): gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje ma ngan sems khrag chen 'thung // gsod cing sbyor ba mchong ba la// shin tu gyes pa chen por rtson// khrag 'thung 'bar ma mi rtogs par // gci
17b3(rnying rgyud): kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin drugs dam nyid bas nas// gsang pa'i rgyal shin tu dgyes// s+'u ts+tsha hUM/ gas6/ khA si~M bA si~M dzA hi/ gagags/ ru ru ga ta/ kA kakangam/ 
17b4(rnying rgyud): yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ rin chen rigs chen yon tan su// rin chen khrag 'thung chen po ste/ dadabug sum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // sIr che chung
17b5(rnying rgyud): gdan la bzhugs// bdud bzhi steng du brkyang bskum pa// nyon mongs lnga dge tshar gcod cing // mthe'u chung srin lag rtse gnyis kyis// a mr-i ta la sogs pa yi// bdud/ 
17b6(rnying rgyud): rtsi zir ngar chen po dag/ dang ba'i sku la rab brgyan cing // sngo gnag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku// rin chen khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // ma hA su khI tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum
17b7(rnying rgyud): gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// yon tan dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol/ 
17b8(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// bskal pa'i ma dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkan smras yon tan rigs kun brlag/ spyugs pas bsod nams lus
18a1(rnying rgyud): 'jig cing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// sti ra'i glo snying 'byin cing gsol// dgra sta tri shul rgyu 'dren zhags// phyag na bsdams shing khrag 'thung ba// rin chen/ 
18a2(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang mo dang // rol pa'i tshul du mnyam sbyor zhing // stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// thams cad thams cad gcod par mdzad// rol pa chen po'i tshul bzhin du/ 
18a3(rnying rgyud): khrag chen po yang zhal gyis 'jings// ha ha ha sa ni dgyes par mdzad// hi he he sa ni yum dang rol// hUM hUM hUM gis char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT khe byed che// gzhal yas sngo nag chen
18a4(rnying rgyud): por ni// 'jig rten stong gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan/ srog chags chen po'i lpags pa yang // tsham ngam chen po'i na
18a5(rnying rgyud): bzar gsol// ci yang sgyur ba'i gzugs can te// cher che'o dpal chen po// sangs rgyas sku yang tshim chem ga/ sol// gzugs khams lha tshogs mang po yang / 
18a6(rnying rgyud): mgo yi phreng bas rgyan du byas// 'jigs byed skra ste cho 'phrul pa// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje ma ngan sems khrag chen 'thung // 
18a7(rnying rgyud): gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shin tu dgyes pa chen por ston// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas nas// gsad pa'i
18a8(rnying rgyud): las la gon tu dgyes// hUM hUM hUM/ ha hahahaha/ khA ni khA hi khA hi/ gahags/ ru ru rag ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo ga ni/ ru lu ru lu ru la ru lu ru lu hU~M/ drag po gdul ba'i don ched du/ 
18b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phyog dag du// khrag 'thung pad+ma chen po ste// mtshungs pa med pa'i khyad par mnga'// dbugasum phrag drug zhangs bzhir bgrang // dmar nag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku/ 
18b2(rnying rgyud): pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs ngam snying rje chen po yis// gsung gi
18b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// rdo rje ban dar ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral ba gyen du 'khyil// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog spa ngas
18b4(rnying rgyud): pos stong gsung g.yo// dkan sgra drag pos srog chags pargyal// spyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing / yum chem mo dang mnyam par sbyor// tri shul rnge'u rdung rgyu 'dren/ 
18b5(rnying rgyud): zhags// phyag na bsnams teg khrag gsol// gzugs khams lha tshogs mang po dag/ dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa'i sa// mgo yi phreng brgyan du byas// dgongs
18b6(rnying rgyud): nges brtsan thabs chen po myos// 'dod chags bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// gzugs can bud med lus kun sdud// nga rgyal bsnyengs pa'i mthu yis ni// bsod nams can rnams thams cad gnon// 
18b7(rnying rgyud): pra dog bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// gzugs kun kun sdud 'phrog cing sbyor// gti mug bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// dbye bsal mi mdzad nges pa'i thugs// mchod do mchod do stobs chen po// bdag la bdag
18b8(rnying rgyud): mchod mnyes pa che// khro mo pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jigs pa'i stabs dang gang mdzad pas// mi bzad mkha' 'gro'i klong chen 'byung // stangs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// zhing bcu bsod cing tshul bzhin du/ 
19a1(rnying rgyud): ngos la longs spyod chen por mdzang // gtangs ni dgyes par mdzang // ti ces ni yum dang rol// rgyu gis cha chen 'bebs// Ta laT las kyis pabyed ma// nangs pani drung ba'i sgrol zhing gad/ 
19a2(rnying rgyud): gnal yas dmar nag chen por ni// 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i skul brgyan// srog chags chen po'i lpags chen yang // cham ngam chen po'i na bzang gso
19a3(rnying rgyud): cir yang smra ba'i gzugs chen te// 'jigs byed sku sde cho 'phrul ba// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngan sems khrag chen 'thung // gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la/ 
19a4(rnying rgyud): shin tu dgyes pa chen por ston// hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ ru ru rag ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu/  ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM// drag po'i dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa/ 
19a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phyogs dag tu// khrag 'thung las kyi sku gsung thugs// dngu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // ljang na/ ga 'jigs pa chen po'i sku// las kyi rgyal cing khros ma dang / 
19a6(rnying rgyud): ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// stong khams rnam pa mang po rnams// sku yi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// 
19a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ngan dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// bskal nga'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkan sgra drag pos srog chags/ 
19a8(rnying rgyud): brgya la// spyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// rgya gram dbyug pa rde'u chung dang // tri shul zhing chen rgyu zhags 'dren// tshams rnon sti ra za byed che// stabs glu phyag rgya
19b1(rnying rgyud): sngags tshig gis// zhing bcu gsod cing tshul bzhin du// phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid la mchod// gaha has ni dgyes par mdzad// he he ces ni yum dang rol// hU hUM hUM gis char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis rba
19b2(rnying rgyud): byed che zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi sgrol zhing gnon// gzhal yas ljang nag chen por ni// 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i skul brgyan// srog chags chen pos/ 
19b3(rnying rgyud): lpags chen yang // tsham ngam chen po'i na bzar gsol// cir yang sgyur ba'i gzugs chen po// che'o che'o dpal chen po// sangs rgyas sku yang chem che ma gsol// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ 
19b4(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phrul pa// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngan semasad khrag chen dang // gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shin tu dgyes
19b5(rnying rgyud): pa chen por ston// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig/ kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid bas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha
19b6(rnying rgyud): ha ha khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha has/ ru ru rag ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// kro d+hi shwa ri de bzhin rigs/ 
19b7(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang// khro gnyer spyan gsum mche gtsigs shing // dbu skra mun dzA rgya bcings te// thod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// ser
19b8(rnying rgyud): nag gyad kyi 'dor tshul du// band rag tar ldan pa yis// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis gcol stobs// dur khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gnon tshul du// zhing chen gshings pa'i gdan
20a1(rnying rgyud): la bzhugs// rdo rje gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing // srin lag mthe bong rtse gnyis kyis// a mr-i ta la sogs pa lnga// blangs te thugs dam skul bar mdzad// dgyes pas rdo rje padAr 'jo// 
20a2(rnying rgyud): rol phyir lta na mchog kyang mdzad// ka la gyi la dgyes pas rol// rdo dbyug ti shul sti ra za// a a hi hi gad mos 'gengs// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jig rten ji srid thams cad sdud// khams
20a3(rnying rgyud): gsum kun gyi dbang bsgyur mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// dpags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par// kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlog/ khros pa'i snying/ 
20a4(rnying rgyud): rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang chem che ma gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i dgyes chen yang // rol pas dbang du bsdud nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// zas su srog chags kun gsol
20a5(rnying rgyud): bam hA mangs sku brgyan cing // zla gam mchod pa chen po/ yis// khrag 'thung chen po 'dzum par mdzad// yid du'o// nga ba'i gzugs ston cing // nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad/ 
20a6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ste// dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// hub tu bachub kyis zhal du gsol// rdul gyi gong bu mang po rnams// chem che ma chem gyis zhal du
20a7(rnying rgyud): gsol// sod cig sod cig dpal gyi yum// chom shig tshom shig dpal gyi yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig dpal gyi yum// sregs shig sregs shig dpal gyi yum// chings shig tshings
20a8(rnying rgyud): shig dpal gyi yum// gnod par byed pa'i bdudu rnams kun// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrage 'thung chen po nal du stongs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs pa pa// gcig kyang gson par mi
20b1(rnying rgyud): mang pe 'de bzhin thugs ngam nyid pas na// gsang pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// hAg h+ya/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ A hosarba thA ga ta pradrA par mi tA/ si dang ru be dza/ lo ha ni la sha ta car na a khi ya me du zlog
20b2(rnying rgyud): soka sa ma yo thabe/ ta ru la sa rbal gi ma hAn nri// rag ta dz+wa ya/ so khyim nu bi la si/ ka pa sa ma le ma ku d+h+we/ tri shU la ra khyog ma gni/ mthus du maN+Dal ti la ka/ b+han d+ha na/ a la la so// 
20b3(rnying rgyud): yum chen rgyal gcig sa// kro dz+haiMg ri dpal gyi yum// sangs rgyas lnga yod bu rgyan can// nyi ma 'dzum gyi gzi ldan mo// ke dus 'bum gyi gdan la bzhugs// spunag khyad kyi 'drang tshul du// ban nga/ 
20b4(rnying rgyud): tegacol stobs// gdug pa'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// mnyes pa byed phyi na yul 'khril// dbu gsum phyag drug zhangs bzhi ru bgrang // khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // dbus su/ 
20b5(rnying rgyud): dza rgya bcings te// thong rnon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// cing taglo snying mang po rnams / zhal du gsol nas 'khril zhing bzhugs// chags pa'i ga
20b6(rnying rgyud): chen po yis// gdug pa chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing // las su gsod le shin tu dgyes// du khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus// zhabs ni brkyang bskum chen por bzhugs// rdo rje gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing / 
20b7(rnying rgyud): srin lag mthe bong rtse gnyis kyis// a mr-i ta la sogs pa lnga// dang ba'i sku la rab brgyan cing // dgyes pas rdo rje pad+mar 'jog/ rol phyir stan mchog kyang mdzad// ka la ki las rol pas dgyes// rdo rje rje'u chung
20b8(rnying rgyud): rdung ba dang 'dri shul 'phel cing stir za// a a hi hi gad mos 'gengs// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jig rten ji srid thams cad sdud/ khams gsum kun gyi dbang sgyur mdzad// sangs rgyas kun
21a1(rnying rgyud): gyi yum chen mo// lpags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par// kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rlog// khros pa'i snying g.yos pa na// thabs
21a2(rnying rgyud): chen po yang che mche ma gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang // rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po zhal du stobs// se ral kha yi tshul dag tu// kha T+wAM ga la rgyab brten byas// rol la/ 
21a3(rnying rgyud): rngam pa'i cha lugs kyis// bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas su srog chags kun gsol ba// ma hA mang sas sku brgyan cing // zla gam mchod pa chen pos ni// khrag 'thung ba yi mdog skyed cing / 
21a4(rnying rgyud): yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston cing // nyams na rab tu brlag par ma dzad// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo ste// dam tshig can la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag du bsgyur nas ni// hub
21a5(rnying rgyud): hub tub kyis zhal du gsol// keng rus rdul gyi gong du rnams// chem chem gyis ni zhal du gsol// sod cig sod cig/ rdo rje yum// chom shig chom shig rdo rje yum// gtogs shig/ 
21a6(rnying rgyud): gtogs shig rdo rje yum// sregs shig sregs shig rdo rje yum// chings shig chings shig rdo rje yum// gnod par byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang // rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// 
21a7(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs pa// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// oM hUM sa twa ka ra rU pa// rag ta dz+wa la si pan tsa ta thA ga ta sing
21a8(rnying rgyud): d+ha ka ya rU pa/ ban tsa tsid ta ta thA ga ta rU po// ta tha ga ta b+ha ga sid d+hi/ yo ga yo gi dza la d+ha/ han b+han d+ha na A la la la ho// rin chen khros pa'i rgyal gcig ma// tshad med bzhi yi yon tan can// bsgres skom phongs la
21b1(rnying rgyud): gter sbyin mdzad// rang bzhin rnal 'byor ying bzhin gter// mi rang mdzod du gyur pas na// rnal 'byor ma zhes mtshan du gsol// ye shes khrom khro rgyal gtso// dag pas mtshan rdzogs rgyal ba'i yum/ 
21b2(rnying rgyud): bzing nag gyad kyi 'dor tshul gyis// ban da rag ta gcol stobs// nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi ldan ma// gdug pa'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// mnyes pa'i phyir ni sku la 'khril// nu 'bur stong smad dbye zhing 'gyeng/ 
21b3(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // g.yon du 'gying stabs sbyor ba yis// thal sgra drag pos gdug pa gsod// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing // dbu skra mun dzA rgya bcings shing // thod / 
21b4(rnying rgyud): mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// yan lag bcad gtubs phral nas kyang // zhal du gsol na/ ngas chags pas 'khril// chags pa'i gar thabs chen pos ni// 
21b5(rnying rgyud): gdug pa chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing // las su gsod la shin tu dgye/ sa// du khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus// zhabs ni brkyang ba skum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// 
21b6(rnying rgyud): rin chen gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing // srin lag sbar gyis khrag chen 'thung // dgyes pas rdo rje pad+mar 'jog/ rol phyir stan mchog kyang mdzad// ka la ki las dgyes pas rol// dbyug pa rde'u chung kha
21b7(rnying rgyud): tsA 'dzin raglo snying yan lag kun gsol zhing // a a hi hi bzhad mos 'gengs// rol pa'i rkan sgras thog thog g.yo// rdo rje spyugs pas dgyes mdzad pa'i// thugs dab sku yi dkyil
21b8(rnying rgyud): 'khor du/ gsad pa'i du khrod kun gsol mdzad// khams gsum kun gyi dbang mdzad ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// lpags tshon brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtog/ 
22a1(rnying rgyud): / par/ kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rnyogs// khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang chem chem gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs chen yang // rol pas dbang du bsdus
22a2(rnying rgyud): nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// ro la brkam pa'i yum chen mo// bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// zas su srog chags kun gsol ba// ma hA mangs sku brgyan cing // zla gam
22a3(rnying rgyud): mchod pa chen pos ni// khrag 'thung ba yang 'dzum par mdzad// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston pas// nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal 'byor yum chen chen mo ste// dam tshig can la dngos grub
22a4(rnying rgyud): sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// hub hub hub kyis zhal du gsol// stir che chung mang po rnams// chem che dam gyis ni zhal du gsol// sod cig sod cig rin chen yum// 
22a5(rnying rgyud): tshoms shig choms shig rin chen yum// gtogs shig gtog/ sa shig rin chen yum// sregs shig sregs shig ri/ na chen yum// chings shig chings shig rin chen yum// gnod
22a6(rnying rgyud): bar byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang // rab tu rol la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na/ 
22a7(rnying rgyud): gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// oM hUM sangs rgyas kun gyi mi zad rgyan dang ldan pa rang bzhin he ru dang la// dur khrod bdag po za byed yum chen mo// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan gter ldan ma// byang chub snying po'i
22a8(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa nges ldan bsnams shing gsol// rmongs pa log pa lnga dang ldan rnams drongs la tshul bzhin stobs// kun gyi dbang mo dbang dang ldan pa'i sum chen kun rol cig/ sems dpa' khrag 'thung nyid kyang su
22b1(rnying rgyud): la thim par rol// khrag chen gsol zhing gro snying zal bskam pas rnal 'byor kun gyi las mdzod cig/ bdag dang ldan pas dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad rdzogs pa yin// a la la la ho// sku gsung thugs
22b2(rnying rgyud): ldan rnal 'byor ma// pad+ma'i gsung gi sangs rgyas yum// chags pa'i pad+ma rgya cig ma// yum chen kro d+h+r-i ka ri ste// sangs rgyas lnga yi bu rgyan can// dmar nag sku yi cha lugs ma// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs/ 
22b3(rnying rgyud): bzhir bgrang // rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// chags pa'i thal mong brkyang nas kyang // khrag 'thung pad+ma'i sku la 'khril// glog stong 'gyur ba'i 'od mnga' bas// mun pa nag
22b4(rnying rgyud): pothobs po sel// sdang mig mche gtsigs tshems rnon gsod// dze chung rdung zhing stir chen za// sha khrag 'dzag cing rol brkam/ bya byed mang po'i nus mthu yis// lha chen po yi mgo yang 'gems/ 
22b5(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa chen po'i lpags chen yang // yum chen mo yin bzar gso// la// mun dzA cod pan ral pa can// gdug pa tshogs chen mang pos bskor// thed rlon rgyan gyi phreng bas brgyan// brkyang
22b6(rnying rgyud): bskum sti ra'i gdan stengs na// gyad kyi dgyes pa'i 'dor tshul gyis// snga na pyod cing ro la brkam// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// bgegs chen kun la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// bskal
22b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// tshogs la rol la tshul bzhin du// dang ba'i sku la rgyan du byas// tsham ngam drag shul sder tshogs dang // dur khrod las la shin tu dgyes// 'di dag dgongs pa'i dam tshig ste// de bzhin ma byas
22b8(rnying rgyud): nyid sgrol zhes// dbang phyug rgyal pos rab tu gsungs so// oM pan tsa rU pe b+hi ta rU la pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri sa ma ya yod b+ha bad// sarba b+hi sha rU pe sa ma yo gi ni hUM/ b+hi yu li ga tha pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri sa ma yo gi ni/ a haH
23a1(rnying rgyud): ma na sa ma ya yo ka ni/ banya tsa rU pe si hU/ ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na khA hi hi// las kyi rigs kyi yum chen mo// sku mdog ldang nag 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag gnyis kyang kyi 'dod thabs kyis// ban / 
23a2(rnying rgyud): rag tas gcol stobs// snum chen ldan zhing ro la brkam// kro d+hi shwa ri yum chen mo// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrang // khro gnyer sdang mig mche gtsigs shing // nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi ldan zhing // 
23a3(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// gnyis byed phyir ni sku la 'khril// nu 'bur stong smad dbye zhing 'gying // g.yon du 'gying stabs sbyor ba yis// thal sgra drag pos gdug pa gsod// dbu skra mun dzAH
23a4(rnying rgyud): bcings shing // zong rlon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum / jigs pa'i sdang mig can// yan lag nang grol drangs nas kyang // zhal du gsol nas chags pas 'khril// chags pa
23a5(rnying rgyud): gar thabs chen po yis// gdug pa chen po'i sprin 'phro zhing // las su gsod la shin tu dgyes// dur khrod 'bar ba'i/ me chen dbus// zhabs pani brkyang bskum snol mar yang // ke
23a6(rnying rgyud): rus tshogs chen gdan la bzhugs// pad+ma gshabs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing // snyim pa sbar gyis khrag chen 'thung // dgyes pas rdo rje pad+mar 'joms// rol phyir stan mchog kyang mdzad// ka la ki las dgyes
23a7(rnying rgyud): pas rol ral gri dgra sta rje'u chung zhing // 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis phyag na bsnams// sti ra'i zhags pa 'dren cing gsol// a a hi hi bzhad mos dgyes// rol pa'i rkan sgras stong gsum g.yo// 
23a8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sprugs pas dgyes mdzad pa'i// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// khams gsum ma lus kun 'dus pa// khams gsum kun gyi dbang mdzad ma// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// lpags
23b1(rnying rgyud): brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs pa// kun kyang thal ba bzhin du rnyogs// khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang che mche ma gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i bgegs/ 
23b2(rnying rgyud): chen yang / rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung las kyi zhal du stobs// rol brkam pa'i yum chen mo// bka' las 'das pa 'phrog cing gsol// rdzas su srog chags kun gsol/ 
23b3(rnying rgyud): ba ma hA mngasas sku brgyan cing // zla gam mchod pa chen po stobs// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston pas// nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal 'byor yum cig chen mo dang // dam tshig can/ 
23b4(rnying rgyud): la dngos grub sbyin// khams gsum khrag tu bsgyur nas ni// hu chub kyis ni zhal du gsol// stir che chung mang po rnams/ chem chem gyis ni zhal du gsol// sod cig sod cig las kyi yu
23b5(rnying rgyud): choms shig tshoms shig las kyi yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig las kyi yum// choms shig sdoms shig las kyi yum// srogs shig bsnoms shig las kyi yum// gnod par
23b6(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i bdud rnams kyang // rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs pa// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas
23b7(rnying rgyud): na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// ha ha khA hi khA hi// oM hUM las su gsod la dga' ba'i rnal 'byor ma// bde gshegs las kyi rigs kun sku la rdzogs par rab snang yum chen mo// tshang ngam brlang ba'i za stangs/ 
23b8(rnying rgyud): gar dang bcas te gcol stobs// kun gyi dbang dang ldan pa bsod nams lus la dbang sgyur ma// sngar chags mang po'i tshogs dang bcas te ril cing dgyes par mdzad// sha khrag dmar chen mchog la dga'
24a1(rnying rgyud): bas dang du kun long la// rnal 'byor dam tshig can la byin gyis rlobs// a la la so// dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs ka nas// rnam par sbyar ba'i gzugs byung ba/ gcir yang 'gyur ba'i
24a2(rnying rgyud): sku mnga' ba/ parnal 'byor sngonag ke'u rim// khro gnyer spyan dgrang mche gtsigs shing // ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs
24a3(rnying rgyud): bzhir bgrang // mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// ster chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i ma dkyil nas// tsham ngam gzugs sku chen po yis// 
24a4(rnying rgyud): zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// sder chen glo snying 'dren tshul du/ 
24a5(rnying rgyud): khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// dbyug pa rde'u chung phyag na ba/ snams// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang / dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar
24a6(rnying rgyud): gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs nas tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs gla phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams
24a7(rnying rgyud): kun// tsham ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// ro la brkam pa'i stangs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs tsa nas rgyam jug ros shig rnal 'byor ma/ 
24a8(rnying rgyud): stong cig sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma// choms shig tshoms shig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid bas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// drongs shig drongs shig dza dza// chings
24b1(rnying rgyud): shig chings shig hUM// sdoms shig sdoms shig sa // rol cig rol cig Ta phaT// de bzhin ma byas de bzhin brlag/ sku yi dkyil 'khor mdzod stong pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// 
24b2(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor ser nag tsi'u rim// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 'chang ba// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dza lA// thong rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// 
24b3(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // me lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me dkyil/ 
24b4(rnying rgyud): nas/ tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa 'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje ngan dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen po
24b5(rnying rgyud): yang 'khrug cing gsol// ster chen glo snying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// drag shul mda' 'phen 'gengs pa yis// dpal chen 'bar ba'i
24b6(rnying rgyud): thugs kar gzo// rnge'u chung tri shul phyag na rnams// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// dpal chen 'bar ba'i thugs kar gzo// se gol snol mar gtogs
24b7(rnying rgyud): nas ni/ zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sku la stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams
24b8(rnying rgyud): kun/ se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung 'bar ba'i sku la stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag
25a1(rnying rgyud): sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// tsam ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// rol brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// khrag rngub
25a2(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor ma// sod cig longs shig rnal 'byor ma// gtogs shig spongs shig rnal 'byor ma// choms shig choms shig rnal 'byor ma// de
25a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// drongs shig drongs shig dza dza// chings shig chings shig hUM hUM// sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha// sgrol cig sgrol cig/ 
25a4(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de bzhin brlag/ khro mo rnal 'byor dmar nag sku// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shig/ 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ral pa mun dzA rgya bcings
25a5(rnying rgyud): shing // thod rlon mang po'i cod pan can// sI ra'i phreng bas rgyan du byas// ko rlon mang po'i na bzar gsol// mi lA// gas g.yang gzhi sham thabs can// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs
25a6(rnying rgyud): bzhir bgrang // gsung gi dkyil 'khor mdzod gtong ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// rnal 'byor chen mo pra mo ha// dur khrod mang po'i tshogs dang ni// gsur chen sregs pa'i mtshan
25a7(rnying rgyud): dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshings pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje ban d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// 
25a8(rnying rgyud): stir chen gro snying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// chu srin rgyal mtshan rnga'u chung brdung // 'jigs su rung ba'i dkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis/ 
25b1(rnying rgyud): sogol sdol ma gtogs nas ni// ning bcums rdul bzhin du/ khrag sru bar ba'i zhal du rdzos/ khas gsum bye nal du stongs// padra gsung gisum chen mo// gzhal/ 
25b2(rnying rgyud): yas dmar nag chen po nas// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen kun// tsham ngam skus ni tshul bzhin du// dbang du bsdu ba mdzad nas ni// gar mkhan
25b3(rnying rgyud): chen mo'i stobs tshul gyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khro mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis rol// khro mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis song // khro mo rnal 'byor khyod kyis ni// longs shig
25b4(rnying rgyud): chings la tshul bzhin du// gtogs shig sbyongs la bsnams dasu gsol// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// de ba zhin ma byas de bzhin brlag/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ rnam
25b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor khro mo mthing nag sku// sting chen za ba'i be ta li// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la// 
25b6(rnying rgyud): thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rkyen
25b7(rnying rgyud): du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me dkyil na// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud pa ni gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje gdug po'i glang
25b8(rnying rgyud): chen 'gems// 'khril bas gyad kyi 'dor tshul du// banang rag tas zhal du stobs// stir chen za zhing rnge'u chung rdung // stir chen glo snying 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stongs
26a1(rnying rgyud): gas nga da/ Ang nga// dgyes pa chen po gas payis/ semam tshul ma ga gas nasan/ de tu zas te dul bzhi du/ khrag drung / 
26a2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i nam du stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen po// skabs klu phyag rgya sngags tshigagis// log par lnga ba'i bdud rnams kun// rngam ngam smras ni tshul bzhin du// dang du bsdu mdzo/ 
26a3(rnying rgyud): nas ni/ 'ol brnam pa'i ljongs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po ponal du stongs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byong ma// sod cig yo shig rna 'byor ba// gang cig smos shog rnam 'byor
26a4(rnying rgyud): ma ma mas pa la ngas/  sa// gas pa ngas pa kyisagisanas ga pa/ sa ga
26a5(rnying rgyud): rjems sa sdoms shigasasas// sgrol cig sgrol cigaphaT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brla/ rnal 'byor khrom ldang nag su// sna chen pa po'i gas ma/ 
26a6(rnying rgyud): khrog nyer kun pazang mche gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la// thong rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs
26a7(rnying rgyud): bzhir bgrang // mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang ba'i gsol// sIr chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyun du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me chen dadus// tsam ngam bcung
26a8(rnying rgyud): bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshebs pa'i gdan stengs na// bdud bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du btsugs// rdo rje ban dong ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang bkrug cing gsol// ster
26b1(rnying rgyud): chen po snying 'dren rdul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i gal du stobs/ dri shul 'ben nu la rnger chung zhags// 'jigs su rung ba'i dkan smra dang / dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa dang / 
26b2(rnying rgyud): segol snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po zhal du stobs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags
26b3(rnying rgyud): tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// ro la brkam pa'i za stengs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'o zhal du spobs// rol cig sprul cig rnal 'byor
26b4(rnying rgyud): ma sod cig long shig rnal 'byor ma// gtogs shig/ sbyong shig rnal 'byor ma// choms shig choms shig rnal byor ma// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang pa'i wa
26b5(rnying rgyud): la shin tu dgyes// drongs shig drongs shig dza dza dza// chings ni go chings shig hUM hUM hUM// sdoms shig sdoms shig/ ha ha ha// sgrol cig sbrel cig phaT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas/ 
26b6(rnying rgyud): de nyid brlag/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi// rnal 'byor khro mo ser nag sku// stir chen za ba'i tsaN Da li// gtum mo chen mo zhe sdang 'joms// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs
26b7(rnying rgyud): shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// stir chen nang grol 'byin cing gsol// ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
26b8(rnying rgyud): bgrang zhing lpags sar pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rkyen du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me chen dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen
27a1(rnying rgyud): bsan// rin chen ga shings pa'i gdan sdes na// bdu bzhinanon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo ldan dang ldan pa mas// khrag chen po dag la jug cing gsog/ 
27a2(rnying rgyud): traM shu la rnge'u rlung phyug na bsnams// 'jigs su rung ba'i dkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// si go la snol mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu dras te tshul bzhin du// khrag
