27a3(rnying rgyud): 'drung chen po'i zhol du stongs// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// skabs gru drug rgya sngags tshigagis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// rab tu dris la tshul bzhin du// rol bdam/ 
27a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bsnas kyis// khrag zung chen po 'o nal du stobs/ rol cig sbrul cig rnal 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs das nyid ngas na// gas dnga'i las la shin tu dgyes/ 
27a5(rnying rgyud): drongs shig drongs shig dza dzadza// chings shig chings ni/ gats+tsha hUM hUM// sdoms shig sdoms shig ha ha ha/ sgrol cig sgrol cig phaT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid
27a6(rnying rgyud): brlag// rnal 'byor khra mo 'bring nag su// stir chen za ba'i yum tshan mo// chags pa chen po sna she na// khro gnyer spyan bslad mcha gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig cam/ 
27a7(rnying rgyud): rol pas sting chen 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang/ 
27a8(rnying rgyud): ning lpags sang pa'i g.yang ga 'i gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i mi dkyil dbus// tsham ngam bachung bskum chen po yis/ 
27b1(rnying rgyud): dang chen ga gabs pa'i gdan rnyengs na// bdung bzhi gnon pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang dkrug cing gsol// smyu gri 'dengs shing rje'u chung rdung / 
27b2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs su rung ba'i dkun sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa mas// se gol snol ma gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu dras te rdul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po la zhal du stobs// gnas
27b3(rnying rgyud): yas 'thing nag chen mo nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// stabs glu phrag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud rnams kun// rol brkam pa'i bstangs kyis// khrag 'thung
27b4(rnying rgyud): po la nal du stongs// rol cig sbrul cig rnal 'byar ma/ dasod cig ling shig rnal 'byor ma// gtogs shig sbyangs da shig rnal 'byor ma/ choms shig choms shig rnal
27b5(rnying rgyud): 'byor ma// de bzhin thugs ngam nyid pas na// bsad pa 'i las la shin tu dgyes// drongs shig drongs shig rngadza// tshangs shig chings shig tu hUM hUM// sdoms shig sdoms
27b6(rnying rgyud): shig ha ha ha// sgrol cig sgrol cig phaT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ rnal 'byor khro mo dmar ser skya// gsod byed sting chen zab mo// rol po'i rnal 'byor puk+ka si// khro
27b7(rnying rgyud): gnyer spun bgrad mche gtsigs shing // spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// rol pas stir chen 'dren tshul du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// ral pa 'khyil ba'i mun dz+wa la/ 
27b8(rnying rgyud): thod rlon tshigs kyis rnam par brgyan// ma hA rag tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang// ye shes sku yi cha lugs kyis// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi
28a1(rnying rgyud): gsol/ skyer chung du mang pa tshigs// bsdus nas su sa rgyan dubyas// srin lag mdze 'o smra pa/ a mra la sogs pakra// rtags pa/ 
28a2(rnying rgyud): dbang por sku brgyan cing // a ho srakas dgyes shing 'khril// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bsku ma chen pos ni// zhing chen gshings pa'i gdan stengs ni// bdud
28a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi gnon po'i tshul du bzhugs// bka' las mi 'anga' thugs dam skong // 'das na lha yang brlag pa'i phyir// lha chen mang po'i glang 'gems shing // bsod nams sku yang tshim
28a4(rnying rgyud): chem gsol// rdo rje ban dang ldan pa yis// khrag chen dpo yang dkrug cing gsol// zangs gri rnon pos yan la ngagra gcod// rde'u chung rdung zhing kha T+wAM 'phen// sha khrag
28a5(rnying rgyud): za ba'i rnal 'byor ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang / dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol/ mar gtogs nas ni// zhing bcu drangs te tshul bzhin
28a6(rnying rgyud): du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// gzhal yas dmar nag chen po nas// sangs rgyas sku yi yum chen mo// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// log par lta ba'i bdud
28a7(rnying rgyud): rnams kun// rol brkam pa'i bstengs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// rol cig sbrul cig rnal 'byor ma// sod cig le zhig rnal byis
28a8(rnying rgyud): ma// gtogs shig sbyongs shig rnal 'byor ma// choms shig choms shig rnal 'byor ma// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs
28b1(rnying rgyud): dam nyi ngas na// gsod pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// thos shig thos shig dzaH// chings shig chos shig d+hA d+hU hA// sdoms shig sdongs shigs can// sgrol cig rnam
28b2(rnying rgyud): cig paT phaT phaT// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brla// oM hwA ta thAg ta su ba u go ba/ krod+ha ka li/ sa ma ya yo ga ni/ ma hI baN+Da la/ er+tha pra t+te/ ka la kraSh+Na bi ta lo ha ti su khe na ma
28b3(rnying rgyud): so ga kA ya/ sarba bud dral/ ma hAH ruka/ sa ma yo ga ru lu yod tam rdul ni/ ngan ba rU pe badz+ra/ sarba si d+hi kA ru NI// ma kha su le na/ bzar du kho na sa ma sa yo ga dz+wa la a
28b4(rnying rgyud): A bo g.yo gi sing d+ha a la la ho// mu ba gsod dred seng gedamago// ser nag gyang kyi 'gying stabs kyis// phyag gil mo bsngal nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stongs
28b5(rnying rgyud): khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // spyan gsum 'jigs/ nga'i sdang mig can// mchi tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas// zhe sdang 'joms ma'i za byed ma// ma hA rag tas sku brgyan cing // 
28b6(rnying rgyud): dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // mthing nag seng ge'i ral pa 'phyar// thod rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sku yi tshe lugs na// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// ster chung ngu ma
28b7(rnying rgyud): po'i tshegs// rgyas nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil nas// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan stengs bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skongs// srog
28b8(rnying rgyud): chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol// band dag tas zhal du stobs// rdo rjes glang 'gems rde'u chung rdung // zhing chen za ba'i mu ka ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang / 
29a1(rnying rgyud): / dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen bras te tshul bzhin du/ khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag cung chen po'i mkhar 'grom/ 
29a2(rnying rgyud): stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad bang pa'i bgegs chen rnams// rol rkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka gsod
29a3(rnying rgyud): byad stag go ri go// dmar nag gyad kyi 'gyid stobs can// phyag gnyis bdud rtsi thal sbyar zhing // shin tu dga' ba'i mdangs kyis 'khril// khroganyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // spyan gsung 'jigs pa'i sdang mig
29a4(rnying rgyud): can mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i thadabyed ma// ma ha ra ga tas sku brgyan cing // dbugasum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // thod rnon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes
29a5(rnying rgyud): sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sa 'al kha yi tshul dag du// thod rlon phreng bas lus brgyad cu // dur khrod chen po'i mi dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang skum chen
29a6(rnying rgyud): nizhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong // srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams lus kyang che mche ma gsol// banang rag ta zhal du stobs// dgra stas
29a7(rnying rgyud): glang 'gams lcags kyus 'dren// rnge'u chung rdung zhing stir chen za// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan smra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// sa gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag
29a8(rnying rgyud): 'asung chen pa'i nal du sbyangs// khrag zung can po'i mkhar 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar du bcod pa'i bgegs chen rnams// rol rkam pa'i thastangs kyis// rab tu dros la rdul bzhin du// 3
29b1(rnying rgyud): 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka sod byed ngur kun mgo// sngonag gyad kyi 'gying stabs kyis// stir chung za zhing gcol stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // spyan gsum
29b2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// mche tshogs mang po 'khor du byas// 'dod chags 'joms ma'i za byad ma// thal chen rag tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug 'bas bzhir bgrang // thod rnon tshogs kyis ra
29b3(rnying rgyud): tu rgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gni gsol// ser la kha yi tshul dag tu// dzod rjen mang po'i phreng bas brgyad// dur khrod chen po'i mi dkyil dbus// tsham ngas
29b4(rnying rgyud): brkyang bskum chen pos ni// ning chen gshings pa'i gdanal ba dazugs// bka' las mi 'drar thugs dam stong // srog chaganas chen po'i snying 'dri cing // bsod nams lus kyang chem chemags
29b5(rnying rgyud): spu gris mgo gcod rde'u rdung zhing // kha Ta 'phen cing band 'thung / gsod la dga' ba'i mu ga ste// zhags pas 'ching ba'i ma kha' 'gro ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen
29b6(rnying rgyud): me'i sprugs pa yis// sa gol snol mer gtogs nas ni// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// rol brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// rab tu drangs ti tshul bzhin du// khrag
29b7(rnying rgyud): 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka gsod byed shA na'i mgo/ 'thing nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// glo snying 'dren cing gtso la stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gzings shing // 
29b8(rnying rgyud): spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// mche tshogs mang po'i 'khor du byas// phra dog 'joms pa'i za byed ma// thal chen khrag gyis sku brgyan can// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // thod rlon
30a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sku yi che lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshigs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// dur khrod chen/ 
30a2(rnying rgyud): bo'i mi dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'ang 'a thugs dam skong // srog chags mang po'i snying 'drin cing // bsod nams lus
30a3(rnying rgyud): kyang chem chem gsol// ban ta rag tas zhal du stobs// kha T+wAM 'phen cing rde'u chung rdung // zhing chen za ba'i mu ka ste// 'jig su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar
30a4(rnying rgyud): gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag thung chen po'i nal du stongs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha'/ grom// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bste/ 
30a5(rnying rgyud): chen rnams rol brkam pa'i thastangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs/ de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka gsod byed bya rgod mgo
30a6(rnying rgyud): dmar nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// zhing chen rgyu 'dren zhal du stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrang zhal gdangs shing // spyan gsum 'dzegs pa'i sdang mag can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas// gti ru
30a7(rnying rgyud): 'joms pa'i za byed ma// thal chen khrag gis sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol/ 
30a8(rnying rgyud): stir chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// bskus nas sku yi brgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i mi dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshings pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'ad 'thugs
30b1(rnying rgyud): das gong 'asrog chags mang po'i snying dren cing // bsod nams lus kyang che mchem gsol// ban 'thung shing rje'u chung rdung // shing chung ril ming bang gros 'debs// ning chen za pa'i mu ka sde// 'jigs ru / 
30b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen mo mkha' 'gro ma// 
30b3(rnying rgyud): stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// rab tu grongs la tshul bzhin du// rol brkam pa'i tha stangs kyis// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin
30b4(rnying rgyud): ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka sod byed snar mgo ring // ser nag/ gyad kyi 'gyid stabs can// zhing chen lag gis gcol sngo dpas// khro gnyer spyan bgrang zhal gdangs shing // spyan gsum
30b5(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sdang mig can// gshog tshogs mang pos brgya na du byas// bka' las 'das pa za byad ma// ma hA raH/ tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang
30b6(rnying rgyud): thong rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// ster chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi brgyan du byas// dur khred chen po'i me dkyil dbus/ 
30b7(rnying rgyud): tshamangam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs drab skong // srog chags mang po'i snying nas 'dren// bsod nams lus kyang che mche ma gsol// ban d+ha
30b8(rnying rgyud): rag tas zhal du rtsibs// dadrug pas glang 'gams rje'u chung rdung // ning chen pa ba'i mu ka ste// 'jig su rung ba'i rkan sma dang // dgyes pa chen po'i sprugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs
31a1(rnying rgyud): den d+ha sa te rdul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po gal du stongs// khrag thung chen pa ma khar 'grom// snrubs gru brag d+hA sngags tshig gis// bang chang byed pa'i dgegs chen rnams/ 
31a2(rnying rgyud): rol bdam pa'i thastangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thungs chen po nal du springs// de bzhin ma byas de nying brla// mu ka sing byed bya rog mgo// 'thing nag kyang kyi 'byed skabs can// rdo rjes
31a3(rnying rgyud): gams spu gris gcod// banang khrag chen gcol stongs// khri gnyer spyan bgrang zhal gdangs shing // 'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyun du byas// zhing bcu gsod cing za byed ma// ma hA
31a4(rnying rgyud): ragangs sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug nabs bzhir bgrang / thong rlon tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// ye shes sku yi cha dgas ni// mi 'jigs sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu ma
31a5(rnying rgyud): po'i tshigs// bslus nas sku yi brgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me dkyil dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'ang
31a6(rnying rgyud): thugs dam skong // srog chags mang po'i snying 'dren cing // bsod nams sku yang che ma che ma gsol// kha T+wAM 'phen cing rde'u chung rdung // 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se go
31a7(rnying rgyud): snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkha' 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed
31a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la rkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu ka song byed 'ug pa'i mgo/ ser nag gyad kyi
31b1(rnying rgyud): 'gying stabs kyis// lag gnyis ban d+has khrag chen stobs// snying chen glo snying 'dren tshul du// khro gnyer spyan bgrang mche gtsigs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang rig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i/ 
31b2(rnying rgyud): rgyan du byas// sha khrag zaba'i mkha' 'gro ma// ma hA ra ga tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // thong rnon tshogs kyis rab tu brgya ni// ye shes sku yi cha lugs ni// mi 'i/ 
31b3(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba'i g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung ngu mang po'i tshigs// brgyus nas sku yi brgyan du byas// dur khrod chen po'i me chen dbus// tsham ngam brkyang bskum chen pos ni// zhing chen gshings pa'i gdan la bzhug/ 
31b4(rnying rgyud): bka' las mi 'ang 'thugs dam skong // srog chags chen po'i dang 'dren cing / bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol// lcags kyus 'dren cing rje'u rdung rol// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra/ 
31b5(rnying rgyud): dang / dgyes pa chen mo'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar/ gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drang te tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung chen po'i mkhar
31b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// bar chad byed pa'i bgegs chen rnams// ro la brkam pa'i za stangs kyis// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// de bzhin ma byas/ 
31b7(rnying rgyud): de nyid brlag/ khA hi khA hi/ rdo rje bka'i pho nya rnams// rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po ste// sna tshogs las rnams grub par byed// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma/ 
31b8(rnying rgyud): 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar ser mi srid chags pas 'gying // dbu cig pa la phyag drug gzugs// ban das khrag chen gcol stobs// g.yag tshan mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas
32a1(rnying rgyud): bka' bzhin byed// zhing za lcags kyus tri shul 'phen// spu gris gsod cing rgyu 'dren nags// thong rlon ga yang gnyis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis ning chen gnon// rnal 'byor mos/ 
32a2(rnying rgyud): kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmer sku tshangs ma chags pas 'gying // bu gcig
32a3(rnying rgyud): phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ban ngas khrag chen gcol stobs// sbrul gdug mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// rtse lnga rdo rje ning chen za// kha T+wAM 'phen cing lcags kyu zhags// 
32a4(rnying rgyud): zing drin ga yang gni rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum tshul gyis ning tshe dani gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin byed// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzad/ 
32a5(rnying rgyud): dbang drug tshogs kyi bka' 'anam// 'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig tsa na// sar nag khrom chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag/ drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dril khrol dbyug to stor chen ma// Shan
32a6(rnying rgyud): d+has khrag chen gcol stobs// gzigs chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bkara' bzhin byed// lcags kyus 'dren tshul spre gros 'debs// thong rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bsum
32a7(rnying rgyud): rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dkar
32a8(rnying rgyud): dmar khyab 'jug chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// band khrag chen gcol stobs// bya bang mgo yi zhal gdangs nas// sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// ster khrag chen kha T+wA~M rdirdza
32b1(rnying rgyud): thong rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par mdzod// dbang phyug chog/ 
32b2(rnying rgyud): kyi bka' bzhin byed// 'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ser nag gzhon nu chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen rgyu 'dren gcol stobs// pha bang mgo can zhal gang
32b3(rnying rgyud): shing sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// ban dmar kha Ta 'khor lo 'dril// thod rlon g.yang ga'i rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhining chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu/ 
32b4(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las da grub par mdzod// dab/ dang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sra dang mig can// dmar ser dbang mo chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig
32b5(rnying rgyud): phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen khog 'dren gcol sto bas// dred chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing / sgra dang bcas bas bka' bzhin byed// banang mar dbyug chen lcags kyus 'dril/ 
32b6(rnying rgyud): thod rlon g.yang bani rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod lnga de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jig
32b7(rnying rgyud): su rung ba'i sdang mig can// dmar mo 'brog chen chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing / dren zhags pas stobs// ngom chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// 
32b8(rnying rgyud): dril 'khrol lcags kyu dung dmar dbyug/ thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// 
33a1(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug tshogs kyi dka nyan ma// 'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngonag bdud rtsi chags pas 'acing // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// pan ngas khrag chen gcol stongs/ rgyu
33a2(rnying rgyud): mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// kha T+wAM mda' 'phen rin chen yum// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bani/

33a4(rnying rgyud): gzugs 'gro snying 'dren cing gcol stobs// sdig chen mgo sa zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dadril 'khrol rtse lnga dung dmar dang // rin chen bum pa khros pas 'dzin/ 
33a5(rnying rgyud): thozong rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis ni gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du stabs glu phywa/ gargya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug
33a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jig su rung ba'i sdang mig can// nag mo be con chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// stor chen glo snying 'dren cing stobs// khra chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra
33a7(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// khrag chen dung thung kha T+wAM 'phen// gris 'debs rgyu zhags dbang phyug ma// thod rlon g.yang gzhi rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka'

33b4(rnying rgyud): la stobs// stag chen mgo yi zhal gangangs shing // sgra dang bcasadapas dka' bzhin byed// dung mar dril khrol kha D+ga gri// dzang rlon g.yang gni rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing

36a1(rnying rgyud): 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// sngon ma na chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'ang rjer rgyu gas 'debs ning nobs// bachen mag/

36a3(rnying rgyud): kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdeng mig can// dmar mo bum rna chags pas
36a4(rnying rgyud): 'gying dbug cig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// ban d+has khrag chen gcol stobs// sde'u chen mgo yizhal gradangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed/ 
36a5(rnying rgyud): shi chem bcu ben tshuladu/ lcags sgrog kun 'dzin pa/ sa gros 'dings/ zong rnon g.yeng gnyis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum dang gis ning chen gno// rnal 'byor ma
36a6(rnying rgyud): kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis/ ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ljang
36a7(rnying rgyud): nag gsus 'dzin chags pas 'gying // dbu gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen glo snying gtso la stobs// sbrang chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas
36a8(rnying rgyud): bka' bzhin byed// dril chen sgra sgrogs dung mar 'thung // kha T+wAM 'phen cing rde'u rung za// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka'
36b1(rnying rgyud): bka' bzhin du/ stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// pho nya rdo rje dbang phyug ma// ci yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs can rnams// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang ba
36b2(rnying rgyud): yis dam bcas bzhin du las kun byos// de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i sprin rnam par spros pa bdud btul ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal
36b3(rnying rgyud): he ru ka khrag 'thung chen po rnams byang chub sems kyi sprin las// oM ma hA tsing tA maN+Da Da la/ kro d+ha ha ha ha/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsa tur yo ga ni hring hring hring / tring ti tring / gling sring mring / 
36b4(rnying rgyud): kri kring kr-i hA/ zhes brjod pas rdo rje rje dug su debs ma gyis mi khyab pa khros pas rngam par gnas so// rang na he rugaka sbyin pa'i khri ba mdzad do// chags pa'i se gde du
36b5(rnying rgyud): dbang gi tshul gyis shin tu khro ba mdzad do// las kyi he ru ka/ kun tu mi mdzad pa med pa'i tshul gyis gdug pa'i khro bo chen/ po'o// de dag kyang rdo rje 'dzin ma khro mo dang // rin chen dbyug na
36b6(rnying rgyud): ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang pad+ma band 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang / las kyi dbyug tom zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang bcas pa rnams brgya nga bskum gyi stabs kyis dpal he ru ka la 'khril nas gnyis su
36b7(rnying rgyud): med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa chen por gnas so// de'i phyi rim na rnal 'byor chen mo dkar mo dang / rnal 'byor chen mo skul byed ma dang / gsod byed ma dang / za byed pa dang / rnal 'byor
36b8(rnying rgyud): ma dang gtum mo dang / rnal 'byor ma las grub par byed ma las rdo rje rigs byed ma dang / dbang sdud chen mo dang / drag po'i cha byad kyis khrag dang keng rus kyi dkyil na zhabs gnyis
37a1(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du brkyang bskum kyi tshul du gnas so// de'i phyir man rdo rje phra men ma chen mo dang / seng ge mgo chen mo stangs dang ldan ma dang stag mgo chen mo stabs
37a2(rnying rgyud): dang ldan ma dang / myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / bya rgod mgo gsod byed stabs chen mo dang / mchu rings mgo can gcod byed chen mo dang / wa'i mgo can skul byed
37a3(rnying rgyud): ma'i stabs chen mo dang / rab tu sgra 'byin gyi mgo can dang / rnam par rab tu sgyus gsod mdzad pa wang mgo can chen mo dang / mi gtong bar za bar byed ma phag gi mgo can zhe sdang chen mo rnams rong rang / 
37a4(rnying rgyud): gi lag cha dang / gdug pa'i mtshon dang chas nas gnas par ma dzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang / ba las rnam par bsgyur ba'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste le'u bcu
37a5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das gtu ma pa chen mo dang / rnam par sgyur ba'i tshogs rmongs pa se la ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dgyes par mdzad de 'di dag phyung bas
37a6(rnying rgyud): kun tu g.yo ba chen po mdzad do// oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba kha tha ma/ d+hu pa tsa ma hA tsaN ra hUM hU hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA ra na he ru ka sarba kha ta ma d+hu/ pa tsa ma hAHna
37a7(rnying rgyud): Da traM tr-i traM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA shrI pad+ma he ru ka sarba kha ta ma d+hu/ hri hri hriM hri/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA shrI karma he ru ka sarba kha tam d+hu/ pa tsa ma hA tsaN Da ha sa/ ts+tsha
37a8(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT/ ha la ha la ha la hUM/ oM sarba me hA kA ru Ni ka ya/ bud d+he lo tsa na DA ki ni/ ha na ha na han/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ka ru Ni kA ya/ badz+ra lo tsa na ma hA DA ki na~M d+ha ka d+ha ka hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ rang na la/ 
37b1(rnying rgyud): paT phaT phaT/ oM ru lu ki ra~M/ oM ru lu tsau ri/ i ru lung+ga mo ha/ oM ru lu pre ta li/ oM ru lu tsan DA li/ oM ru lu g+has ma ri/ oM ru lu s+pha sha ri/ bin d+ha bin d+ha/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ ha na ha na hi ni/ hU hU hUM/ phaT
37b2(rnying rgyud): oM tser ka ra sing nga he he/ oM go ra kar bya gri hi he/ oM tsi ru ka ka ra sri ka he he/ oM sho na ka ra kri te he he/ oM kang kaDa ra ka ka phaT phaT/ oM ga ta kar pan tsam he hi phaT/ hasta ka ra u lu ka he he he/ hri hriM hriM/ phaT phaT/ 
37b3(rnying rgyud): ma hA \u0f7f dur lo ga ni hag ha/ he he he/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ ts+tsha b+h+yor+d+ha ts+tshuD+D+h+ya n+yA/ dz+yo d+huT+Ta b+hU b+hU b+h+yo/ ts+tshi r+m+ma D+D+h+ya g+huD+hu ts+tsha/ ts+tsha b+hU D+D+h+yag+h+nAts+tsha dz+nyA/ ts+tshedz+dza dz+yots+tsha/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu rba la
37b4(rnying rgyud): ru lu/ khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi/ phaT phaT phaT/ sa ma ya sa ma ya/ yoM ga yo gi ni phaT phaT phaT/ hUM hUM hUM ne sa brjod pas thams cad rab tu brgyal/ rab tu sngangs/ rab tu myos// 
37b5(rnying rgyud): rab tu bsgral bar gyur to// bsnams shing gsol nas mi gnas par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mnyes pa las sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas
37b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das sku gsung thugs rngam pa'i stabs kyis dza dza dza hUM hUM ho ho zhes par mdzad do// mngon spyod kyi las kyi sbyor ba sbyor ba chen po mdzad do// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mdzod nas gsang ba'i yum gyi pad+ma yongs
37b7(rnying rgyud): yangs pa'i nang du sems can gyi tshogs byang chub sems su mdzad nas mkha' phab ste sras su bskyed par mdzad de mdzad nas dran pa rnyed do// sangs rgyas kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ me dpung bsam gyis mi khyab
38a1(rnying rgyud): pa/ mtshon cha dang dbu dang zhal mang zhing skyi bung zhes byed pa sngangs shing gsod par mthong ste smras pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo rnams// shin tu bde ba'i gnas shig na/ khaton bskal pa rab
38a2(rnying rgyud): tuchung nga ni ci mdzad la gor mdzod// lha cig rje cig 'on zhes smras pa'i tshig gis sems can gyi mtshan ma 'byor gyur bar mkhyen to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rab tu spros la gnod long shig/ 
38a3(rnying rgyud): la gus par dam nos la// 'di la gnas par skal med pas// phyi yi dkyil 'khor sa la 'dug/ ces bka' stsal pas gdangs brtas par gyur te/ rdo rje bran mo'i mna' bor nas smras pa/ skye mchog lha
38a4(rnying rgyud): rjes su zhig lags// 'bangs dang bka' stsal bdag cag nyan/  phyi yi gnas su gnas su bgyi// ma sring bran g.yog 'khor yug rnams// 'jigs pa'i skus ni bzhes su gsol// ci mdzad khye
38a5(rnying rgyud): mkhyen gzhes su gsol// yun du skal ldan gnas su gsol// bde gcag 'jig rten skyong ba rnams// de ring dam mnos blan chad tu// 'khor rnams skyongs par mi bgyid dam// bka' bzhin las kun
38a6(rnying rgyud): mi sgrub bam// theg pa 'dzin la mi stong ngam// bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor ma zin na// da lta bzhin du 'jigs pa dang // shi nas dmyal bar shor ces smras te mna' bor ro// de nas khrag 'thung chen po cang mi gsung bar bzhug
38a7(rnying rgyud): pa las rab tu gsod byed ma dang / tshangs pa mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dbang mo dang grub mo dang / bskyod chen mo dang rdo rjer gdong chen mo dang / mi mo rlag par byed pa chen mo dang / phag mo gsod byed ma dang gtum par mdzad
38a8(rnying rgyud): mdang / brlan par mdzad ma dang / phag chen mo dang nag mo ral pa chen mo dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mo dang rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang / rdo rje rgan byang chen mo dang / rdo rje yid 'phrog par byed ma dang rab tu gcig tu zab mo dang / 
38b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje srin mo'i che byed chen mo dang / sngonag chen mo dang / ljang nag chen mo dang be con chen mo dang / zhi ba bum sna chen mo dang / las la grub pa chen mo dang / bka' nyan par byed ma dang / tsham ngam gyi gzugs dang drag shul ma dang / 
38b2(rnying rgyud): nyul ba mor tshul ston ma de dag la sogs pa ma dang / srin mo bu mo rnams rab tu gus par bka' nyan te/ rje rje bran mor bka' nyan te/ rdo rje bran mo ngam blangs nas// ci dod las rnams bdag cag bgyid ces man
38b3(rnying rgyud): bor de 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang / mtshon cha dang gnas pa'i gzhir bcas te phyi'i snam bu la gnas pa'i las byed par gnas so// de dag gi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa bshad de/ dkyil
38b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor phyi rol gru bzhir bcas// dbus su zla gam rag tar bcas// ba su ta yi maN Da la// dri chu rag ta'i tshem bur bri// hri las dbus su bcwa brgyad gzugs yang ning bu gsum phyag drug pa// 
38b5(rnying rgyud): thod pa nad dmar chen bkang // brgyad ngam nyi shu dgu ru ldan// yang na lnga dung ldan pa la// lnga pa'i yi ges byin gyis brlab// zada'/ phreM phung dang ldan pa la// u tsus sta yi sngags kyis bzlas// thod pa
38b6(rnying rgyud): dmar lags btung bya zhing // ming ngam b+h+yo'am ru lu yis// mngon sum phyin par bos nas ni// kha nas rag tas rab gtor te// he ru ka yi las rnams kun// gong nas 'byung ba'i las bzhin bya// sgeg mo na chung
38b7(rnying rgyud): de dag la// dbang gi chags pas 'dod spyad de// ta ma la yi pur bus gdab// ci 'dod las rnams grub par sbyin// chags dang gsod dang rgyag pa che// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// tser ka'i 'khor rna
38b8(rnying rgyud): kyang bzhi yi las la 'jug par ni// ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bskul na rtse gcig las rnams 'grub// de nas kun tu bzang mo chen mos ming tsam du chos thams cad gnas par mkhyen to// gsang bsgyu 'phrul/ 
39a1(rnying rgyud): chen po'ang bsdu chen po ma da // de nas sems pa rdul 'byo mchog/ kun kyang sems dpa rnal 'byung mchog/ chos kun ma mnar 'byong lam// meng camanam 'gyur/ 
39a2(rnying rgyud): ma yin par// sems dpa' rnal 'byor 'ga' yang med// de nyid dus gsum rang bzhin te// de nyid kun du bzang po mchog/ sgyu 'phrul dra nga'i rgyud dag las// sems mardo rje de dag las// gsang ba'i nges rten/ 
39a3(rnying rgyud): gang yang med// ces chos thams cad 'dus pa chen mo mkhyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi he ru ka dus pa chen mo dkyil 'khor te la'u bcu gnyis pa'o// a so rgyu
39a4(rnying rgyud): nyid stong ngas 'bras bu mngon gsum ba// byin gyis brlab tu med pas byin gyis brlab pas 'grub// sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyid/ dang sems can yin// zhes rgyal bas gsungs// de nyid mi mdzad
39a5(rnying rgyud): med par shes pa kun gyi nang na rab tu bsngags// chags pa rmi gtong chags pa med pa mngon gsum dgongs pa yin pas / kyil 'khor gong ma kun gyi dang / sbru la dga' bas bsgru du med kyi
39a6(rnying rgyud): sbubs pas 'grub ces rgyal bas rab tu gsungs/ po ma med byer po mo snang la dga' ba spyod brtson rgyal bas 'grub ces bsgrub pa kun gyis gsungs// stong par rtog rgyal gi yel ba rnal 'byor mi ni zhes rgyal
39a7(rnying rgyud): bas gsungs// med la gtod cing dag sdig 'chol bsdig can yin par rab tu gsungs// med la gdod cing dgi sdig yod phyir brtson pas 'grub ces theg pa kun las 'byung // bag dang mi ldan rang bzhin
39a8(rnying rgyud): ri pa gas pa la// ga chog pa 'i kus rungs phyin chos la ma bdun sems can yin par mngon sum gsal ba sbeng // dngos sgyu phrul gsang ba mchog 'a du dngas gang zhig zhan tsun pas// 'grus pa
39b1(rnying rgyud): brlabs pa bag dang ldan pa longs pa dang po tshogs bya// skad cig gzugs la 'phangs pa med par gus ldan gsang ba'i sdud pa yin// rje slob dpon mchog la dad pas sangs rgyas ma lus kun la mchod pa chen po yin// 
39b2(rnying rgyud): lam la mkhas pas rdo rje slob dpon bkur ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'dun pa chen po skyes te/ mchod pa chen po bkur bstis mchod// dkyil 'khor
39b3(rnying rgyud): dang po phun sum tshogs// gnyis pa gsang ba'i mchod pa la// gsang ba rol pa gling slong ba// khros pa'i sprin las bdud rnams btul// don cig sgyu 'phrul bka' stsal pa/ tshogs kyi mchod pa dgyes
39b4(rnying rgyud): pa che dus gsum rtag tu ma byung ba// lam la mkhas pa da yin par bsngags// brtson dang ldan pas rangab mnyan dang // gas dang ba'i bsgrub pa 'di bsgrub pa// kun kyang kun tu bzang po yin// bco
39b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das rmongs pa sel ba zhes bya ba sgyu 'phrul chen po rdzogs so// / bod skad du/ gsaba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'o// bcom ldan
39b6(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes bla ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na// sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma ste/ rnal 'byor kun gyi gsang mchog bde/ 
39b7(rnying rgyud): gnas gsang ba na bzhugs nas su// snying po bla ma 'di skad bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba bla ma'i longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhin
39b8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje'i bdag nyid can/ ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyang so so ma yin tha mi dang dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ shin tu
40a1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba bla ma chen po'i dbyings 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na/ gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas/ 
40a2(rnying rgyud): khang nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan bla ma chen po dpag tu med pas rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che bla ma'i glo 'bur bzhis
40a3(rnying rgyud): mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes bla mas kun du 'khyil pa ye shes bla ma bsam gyis mi/ 
40a4(rnying rgyud): khyab pa'i dbyibs dang / kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa da'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa lpags pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa ye shes rin po che bla ma'i phreng ba
40a5(rnying rgyud): dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang gzugs dang / sgra dang dri ro reg bya la sogs pa mi sgrib par gsal bar rang khyung la/ gsal ba'i rgyan khyad par can bla mas klubs pa/ 
40a6(rnying rgyud): tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nad med kun tu yang bla ma chen po nang du gyur pa/ shin tu gsang ba bas khyab bdag
40a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i bla ma chen po'i gzhal yas khang na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i khri/ mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang / stobs glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang / dbang rma bya'i khri dang / thogs
40a8(rnying rgyud): pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan brtsegs pa ni/ ye nas gsang ba bla ma'i phyir// yum gyigs
40b1(rnying rgyud): yas phyogs bcur 'bar// ye nas pha rol phyin pa'i phyir// thogs pa med pa'i khri rkang brtan// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing // gdong nas dri ma med pa'i phyin
40b2(rnying rgyud): rnam par dag pa pad+mo gdan// re ba yid bzhin skong ba'i phyir// yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi gdan// ma bsags lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan// yon tan chen po'i gdan stangs
40b3(rnying rgyud): na sku mdun dang rgyab med par thams cad du zhal bla ma tha le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pas thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las sna tshogs par snang ba/ 
40b4(rnying rgyud): thabs de lashes rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi dkyil mo dkrung du bzhugs pa ye shes drug gi phyag/ dmi shes rin po che bang ba'i phyag d+ha can/ sku gsung thugs
40b5(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'a/ sa de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po bladang / btsun mo ba pa sraba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin
40b6(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mongs pa snang ba dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa mnyen pa 'dabyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin
40b7(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa dro ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mongs pa bskyod pa'i dbyangs kyi bla ma la sogs pa ye shes
40b8(rnying rgyud): rgyal po stang ma dbyil su kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / sor po dang / le brgan dang / ljang khu'i mdog bla ma la rab ste gnyis su meng bar 'khril bas chos kyi dbyings kun du thang yas pa
41a1(rnying rgyud): bla ma chen po'i spyod pas khyab pa ni 'di lta ste dper na/ til gyi gang bu'am mngar gyi sbrum bu bzhin kun tu bde ba chen pos khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po// 
41a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mthong dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo gzigs par byaba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo gsan par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje sdom dbang bla ma dang / btsun/ 
41a3(rnying rgyud): mo bsdam par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo myang bar bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje sogs shes bla ma dang / btsun po sgrol ma'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po
41a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rjeg cid shes bla ma dang / btsun mo gdug pa'i bla ma dang /  chub chen po rdo rje 'jug shes bla ma dang / btsun moda'ababs bla ma dang / byang nub chen po rdo rje 'dus pa'i bla ma nga
41a5(rnying rgyud): btsun mo rgyas pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yas bla ma dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa'i bla ma pa/ 'joms pa chen po rdo rje rig g.yon bla ma dang / btsun ma
41a6(rnying rgyud): chad par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg gsang bla ma dang / btsun mo bdag tu ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg 'dus bla ma dang / btsun mo mtshan mar ma
41a7(rnying rgyud): yin pa'i bla ma dang / de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par gsang ba dgyes pa'i dbyengs bla man bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis
41a8(rnying rgyud): su med pa ri kyil 'khor bla ma de nyid kyigs ba blam 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo // e ma 'ode bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dang sgyur dkyil 'khor bram ring
41b1(rnying rgyud): // rgyas da sa myong ga ga yan ma kun dugs med byu byu gag sems / 
41b2(rnying rgyud): na pa rgyas nga su rgyas ma na sa ma sa na kyilams ma ma
41b3(rnying rgyud): shes da/ jigs bathapa ma na gas pa nga ngas pa'i tham las dkyis dang mi shes gas pa ri pa'i bri mangs pa'i
41b4(rnying rgyud): nges ma ldan 'das yang byed pa thas ni kun tu nga ba thams cad ma lus pa'i dus rjes btsun ma tha'am kun tu/ 
41b5(rnying rgyud): bzang mo blam la 'jug par gyur to// gsang ba'i bla ma'i tshiga'adi cid du brjod do// mi chos kyi chos nyid bya byings// kun tu ba'ang mo bde ba'i yum// ma g.yos
41b6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// bdag yin bdag gis spyod yul bas// phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal// nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog du// mchags pad+ma'i gdan gting ba// dus
41b7(rnying rgyud): gsum rgyal ba gzugs pa'i gnas// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gzhi la// phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dbang med skal ngan gsal ba'i phyir// nang gdan phyi rome lcags dang ldan
41b8(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba yongs kyis gsang ba'i chos// sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba ste// kun tu bzang po nyid kyis gzigs// ho de nas btsun mo byab mo kun tu bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// oM
42a1(rnying rgyud): sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso// kun tu bzang po rdo rje yid// ye shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin te// shar phyogs mngon dga' bas ma yas nas// ni la lta bu'i gter byin/ 
42a2(rnying rgyud): pa// gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste// byang chub mchog gi nang bstan bkrol// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'gro don byang chub sems bskyed de// 'gro lnga skye
42a3(rnying rgyud): zhing dbang du bsdus// sku gsung thugs nas dbang bskur ro// zhes gleng ngo // de nas bya ba mo kun tu bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i mchod pa 'di ched du phul lo// oM rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di// 'dzum pa'i
42a4(rnying rgyud): mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyis// bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig ste// gyes mchog rdo rje gser nas ni// bdud rtsi char chen dpa tu gsol// zhes ched du gleng ngo // de nas yang yid byed pa po rdoH
42a5(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang pos bdud rtsi bla ma'i char pas snod bcud kyi 'dzam bu'i gli/ nga tshim par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod // oM rdo rje bla ma'i dgyes rab 'di// gsor nas bdud rtsi'i char
42a6(rnying rgyud): dadabapa phyir/ 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas su gsor// mi dmigs bde dang spro ba 'dis// kun du bzang mo dbyings su bskyil zhes ched du gleng ste// gnyis su med pa las nyid kyi spyod yul thams cad gsang ba'i
42a7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bla ma khyad par du spags pa rdul phra mo snyed 'thon nas sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzad pa ni// la la ni gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du zhugs te yan lag thams cad rdo rjer
42a8(rnying rgyud): byin gyis rlob// la la ni 'gro ba drug gdul ba'i don du thub pa chen po drug tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ lha'i gnas na brgya byin mgon// lha ma yin la thag zangs ris// mi la bdud 'dul shAkya mgon/ ya
42b1(rnying rgyud): dgas gnas mkha' bar bde// byol song seng ge nyid du smra// dmyal ba la ni gshin rje mgon// sku dang cha lugs tshul ston cing // la la ldum zhugs sku la bltam// la la tshul srung rab tu byung // la la bsnyen/ 
42b2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs dka' thub byed// la la dam nod 'gro ba sgrol// la la bcu drug chos la btsud // la la me 'bar chur yang 'brug/ la la nam mkha' sgra ru 'bar// la la rdo rje brag tu sra// la la gso gsod 'pham rgyal
42b3(rnying rgyud): byed// la la bcing sgrol 'gug sgrol byed// la la bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong // la la dkyil 'khor mchod sprin 'khril// kun kyang chos kyis 'khor lo skor// de ltar rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'di/ 
42b4(rnying rgyud): lta ste// theg pa dang po bcu drug mgon// gnyis pa bzhi yi lta spyod pa srung // gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan// bzhi pa gnyis kyi lta spyod sbyangs// bzhi pa'i theg pa mdor bsdus na// bla med theg/ 
42b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyings su btsud// theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la// theg pa ga ce ga gis 'bras bur gnas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul che// mngal 'brel pas dra ba'i don// thun mong min pas
42b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don// theg pa'i bcud de snying po'i dbyings zhes ched du gleng ste// snod bcud kyi 'jig rten rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang bar gnas bsgyur ba dang / phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
42b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzigs mos gnyis par gyur to// de nas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang / snyigs ma med par gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sangs rgyas nas ched du
42b8(rnying rgyud): brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA maH
43a1(rnying rgyud): me long gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum yenas sangs rgyas zhing // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// 
43a2(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs thams
43a3(rnying rgyud): cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di gsung so// e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing // snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams
43a4(rnying rgyud): cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal // nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal ba ngas mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas
43a5(rnying rgyud): par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa las ched du brjod pa 'di badz+ra do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs snang
43a6(rnying rgyud): ba rang bzhin gsang // gzhan du mi la shin tu gsang // gsang mchog snying po bla na med// thams cad gsang ba'i dbyings su nges// bla ma mchog gi snying po las// sangs rgyas sems can/ 
43a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med ces brjod pas thams cad dbyings su nges par mkhyen to// de ltar yin na yang 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pas 'gro ba'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i
43a8(rnying rgyud): ye shes bskyed pa'i phyir rdo rje bla ma'i tshigs 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug
43b1(rnying rgyud): bsngal la sogs pa'i/ bdag dang dag gangasas badzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod pa yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa las// nad kyis mthar
43b2(rnying rgyud): la mdud pa bor// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sang rgyas chos// bstan phyir slob sde tshogs mdzad// spros kyang 'phel 'grib med pa'i dbyings// de ltar yin na yang de ldan
43b3(rnying rgyud): ma rtogs pa rnams la kun rdzob kyi phung po byang chub kyi sems bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du sems kyi ngo bo bskyed pa'i phyir// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshogs 'di ched du brjod do// stong zhing dben pa'i sems
43b4(rnying rgyud): nyid ni rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med de/ ci yang medang la bcir yang snang // mi skyong rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'byu dang // rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyang // sems ca
43b5(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul chen po yin// gcig dang du mar mi dmigs te// mngon shes drug gis thams cad byed// bla ma rje 'dzin po yis// pa la 'khor chen po byed par bstan/ 
43b6(rnying rgyud): sgyu lnga rgyan bzhis bsdus pa la// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che phra bsgom// bzhi yi rim pa tshul bzhin byed// rgyan dang phyag rgya'i tshul rnams kun// til 'bru'i nang du ri rab skyed// sangs rgyas
43b7(rnying rgyud): stong gi dkyil 'khor dang // stang dbul gnyis kyi phyag rgya yang // ri rab til 'bru'i tshul bzhin du// dpe byad rgyan gyis brgyan spras pa'o// nges pas bzhi bcu rtsa lnga bsgom// dbyings dang ye shes
43b8(rnying rgyud): stangs dbul gnyis// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa'o// ho gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de// yul la kun du bzang mo'o// ngo tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan te// yul la khams gsum byam/ 
44a1(rnying rgyud): ma shes snang bas pa yas te// yul lan pa ga mam// so' du byed na mod gru bste// yul la cheg stsol ma'o// dornams nas/ 
44a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' ste// yul la yangs pa'i spyan can ma// go dmigs la sa'i snying po ste// yul la dkar mo sgeg chen no// ho sna la nam mkhar snying po ste// yul la me tog dpal
44a3(rnying rgyud): phreng ma'o// ro lce la spyan ras dbang phyug ste// yul la chos kyi dbyangs can no// sorna bar phyag na rdo rje ste// yul la las kyi gar mkhan ma'o// ho kun 'dus sgrib pa rnams sem
44a4(rnying rgyud): te/ yul la me tog char 'bebs so// kun shes kun tu ba zang po ste// yul la gsal ba'i sgrol ma'o// hog dang shes byams pa'i bdag nyid de// yul la gdug pa'i
44a5(rnying rgyud): sprin 'phro ho// 'jug shes 'jam dpal gzhon nu ste/ yul la tsan dan char 'bebs so// g.yas gnyis stobs chen khro bo ste// yul la gdong ma 'jigs tshul to// 
44a6(rnying rgyud): g.yon gnyis gshin rje gshed po ste// yul la sder 'phro 'jigs tshul to// gsang ba rta mgrin dpa' bo ste// yul la dur khrod bdag mo'o// lte bar bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste// yul
44a7(rnying rgyud): la gtum mo 'jigs tshul ho// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i gnas drug tu// thub drug phyag rgya chen po'o// kun tu sku dang kun tu gsung // kun tu thugs kyi phyag rgya yang // lus ngag yid la
44a8(rnying rgyud): de bzhin to// sems nyid sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// sgyu ma'i tshe 'phrul chen po las// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu lnga// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nges pa las// snying po'i dkyil 'khor ba/ 
44b1(rnying rgyud): ma yin/ zhes brjo ngas sems can thams cad pad par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de banan gshegs pathams cad dang byed med par gyes te/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dbya na
44b2(rnying rgyud): bzhug so gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ngang du sems kyi rang bzhin cir yang 'grub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// 
44b3(rnying rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang bzhin gcig dang du mar dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma 'di dbyung bar bzhes
44b4(rnying rgyud): nas ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// oM ye shes bla ma rol pa yis// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar brtags na// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// rdzogs
44b5(rnying rgyud): chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor che na por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis rgyan rdo rje'i khyams// kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud
44b6(rnying rgyud): ldan rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung // nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan
44b7(rnying rgyud): la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas mthong thos snom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshigs su bcas// gru chad la ni gcod byed dang // 
44b8(rnying rgyud): snang byed sogs byed 'jug byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thug drug dag/ rgyud drug sbyong ba'i phyag rgyar gnas// de bzhin thig le chen po dag/ mdun
45a1(rnying rgyud): dang rgyab tu byed pa dag/ bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgro byung bzhi 'joms dag/ btsun ma chags dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo lon po che// pad+ma'i ril/ 
45a2(rnying rgyud): gri nor bu 'bar// ud dpal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ka dkar po ser leb rgan// ljang ku la sogs sna tshogs mdog/ mnyen lcug 'khril
45a3(rnying rgyud): ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil/ 
45a4(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// ho zhes brjod pas 'ji ngag rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad tu dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul
45a5(rnying rgyud): rnyed tu gsal bar to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang / gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin
45a6(rnying rgyud): las 'di dag phyung ngo // a ho/ bde mchog ngo mtshar byang chub sems chen po// thig le mnyam sbyor sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i dbyings// rnam dag thig le byang chub sems kyis rol// ngo mtshar rmad byung ba
45a7(rnying rgyud): mchen po'i dbyings// ho dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs gsang ba'i dbyings// ye shes rang rigs dkyil 'khor bla ma bsam mi khyab// mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab gsang ba'i dbyings// 
45a8(rnying rgyud): ye shes kun gas la dkyil 'khor spros med bla ma'i dang // ho rdo rje gsang pa'i tshig tu'o// gsang nga'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u gsum pa'o// 
45b1(rnying rgyud): de nas ye shes rgyal po de btsun mo bla ma'i dbyings dang gnyis su med par gyur nas/ bde chen po byang chub kyi sems rim par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs brtser tshing nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa phyogs
45b2(rnying rgyud): bzu dus pazhi dgod par bzhid nas/ sku gsung thugs bla ma'i dbyings nas 'di dag byung ngo // dang po bla ma'i lung bstan pa// mngon du med pa'i byang chub se nas// ye shes sna
45b3(rnying rgyud): po gsal ba dang // bsgom pa rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs// byang chub sems kyi tshig lel// ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pas nas// de ni theg la chen po 'don// don
45b4(rnying rgyud): bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// de ni kun tu snang ba'i nga // dani rgyu mi darim par ldan to// gsang ba bla ma'i tshig tu'o// dgasang ba bla ma'i nges don las// gsang ba gsung gi dkyis
45b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor grags// bruM bi shwa bi shud d+he badz+ra swAhA// hUM hUM hUM badz+dza tsi ta ta oM// a a a badz+ra pa ta sa ma ya oM/ hUM ba dz+ra d+h+ri ka/ muM d+ha tu i shwa ri/ oM dzin dzi ka/ laM dwe sha ra ti/ 
45b6(rnying rgyud): swar tan d+h+wi ka/ me mo ha ra ti/ oM A ro la ka/ byer gar ti/ ha pradz+nyA d+h+ri ka/ taM badz+ra ti/ k+Shi hir dza ya hUMl ses ma ya s+t+waM/ tra a ger b+ha ya/ tre ma le sa ma ya ho// hIg co nga / 
45b7(rnying rgyud): ma ngan d+ha me/ hri gir ti rA ga ya haM/ d+hi ku ru ba na hri/ a nir ti rA ga ya mi/ me d+ha ri ni swAhA/ dza du bapre be sha/ tha ling ni sa ram pa yA swAhA/ hUM puSh+pa a dre sha/ hUM sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ baM d+hu ba~M su k+Sharbi/ 
45b8(rnying rgyud): mu shrI I ri ga ya swAhA/ cogan d+he tsi tata/ oM mu ne kr-ing swAhA/ oM mu ne hU~M druM swAhA/ oM mu na~M br-i swAhA/ so mu ne sU swA hA/ oM mu nai k+Sha swAhA/ oM mu ne ye swAhA/ hUM la mAn ta krita phaT/ oMm
46a1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ su pradz+nyA na dkrita phaT/ oM ma hA rang na d+ha ram hA kro d+hi sha ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ tsu pad mAn kri hUM phaT/ oM ma hA bad+ma d+ha ram hA kro rje sha riH
46a2(rnying rgyud): la ni hUM phaT/ oM big+h+nAn ta kri hUM phaT/ oM ma krarma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni hU~M phaT/ oM e h+ye he b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA ka ru ni ki tri sha ho/ sa ma s+t+rai/ dza~M hUM ba~M ho/ oM e hUM swAhA/ badz+ra sa
46a3(rnying rgyud): ma ya/ badz+ra sa ma ye/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ oM e hUM swAhA/ oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad pi che// skyon dril byang chub
46a4(rnying rgyud): sems chen po// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor bas// phyag rgya bla mar bdag sbyor gcig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ste/ badz+ra sa ma ya ho// dzaM hUM be ho zhes gsung/ 
46a5(rnying rgyud): pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen pos 'jig rten drug gi/ phyogs bcu thams cad du grags/ rab tu grags/ kun tu grags so// grags pas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten
46a6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen pos sgrub par gyur to// de nas yang ye shes rgyal po ltangs dbul dag gnyis su med par rol pa mdzad pa bla ma la thim par gyur te/ de nas ye shes rgyal po de
46a7(rnying rgyud): nyid dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM chos dbyings mnyam pa chen po las// ye shes gsal ba rnam par dag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// skye med
46a8(rnying rgyud): chos la dbang sgyur shog/ oM mo hA gu h+ya ma shU n+ya tAd+harma dz+nyA na swa b+hA ba Ad mako ha/ hUM dag cing gsal ba'i rang bzhin te// skyon med sems nyid rin po che// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// 
46b1(rnying rgyud): srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA A dar sha dz+nyA na badz+ra sa b+hA ba ad ma ko hA/ sde khams gsum re skong rgyal po ste// yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi mchog/ mnyam pa nyid kyi
46b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyis// 'gro bar skong rgyal por shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA sa man ta a be shadz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko tsa/ e nyes pa'i skyon bral dri ma med// skye 'gag med pa'i dngos
46b3(rnying rgyud): gru ste/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar shog/ oM ma hAgu h+ya ma 'apras pra be shadz+nyAn badz+ras b+hab Ang mako haM/ ha byis kyi dkyil 'khor mthar phyin cing / 
46b4(rnying rgyud): grub pa las kyi bye brag las// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis/ skye 'gro dbyings su sgrol bar shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA kr-i tra a nu ste na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko NaM/ a ni stong dang mi stong
46b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis dbu ma la yang mi gnas shing / stong pa chen po'o ye shes kyis// mi 'gyur dbyings la dbang sgyur shog/ oM me hA gu h+ya ma hA a be sha shU n+ya tadz+nyA na badz+ra sab+hA
46b6(rnying rgyud): ba.Ad ma ko ha~M/ oM bder gshegs sku yi ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje rgyal ba'i gtso// sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje sku yi gtso bor shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga te kA ye badz+ra swa b+ha
46b7(rnying rgyud): ad ma ko&haM/ aM bde gshegs gsung gi ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje chos kyi dbyings// sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje gsung gi ngo bor shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta bAka badz+ra
46b8(rnying rgyud): swa b+hA ba ad ma ko&haM/ hUM bde gshegs thugs kyi gtso bo las/ mi shigs rdo rje rdo rje'i thugs// sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje thugs kyis byin rlobs shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta
47a1(rnying rgyud): tsi ta ta badz+ras zla ba Ang mag/ Na/ sa mi 'gyur ba'i zhing khams nas// ma bskyed pa yi 'bras bu lags// ma bsags pa yi longs spyod 'byung // cir yang 'grub
47a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i ye shes kyis// rang dang thabs kyis sgyur bar shog/ sre ma hA gu h+ya sarba thA ga ta ma hA pu dza~M badz+ra swa b+hA ba Ad ma ko he zhes gsungs pas/ gsal la 'bar bas thim par gyur to// e mdza
47a3(rnying rgyud): mtshar rab 'byam gyi// ngo mtshar ya mtshan gsang ba'i chos// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams dbyingasasu gsal// gsung gcig yan lag dkyil 'khor ni// bas
47a4(rnying rgyud): gyis mi khyab khyab mchog dbyings// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog/ hogasang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla mche na po las dkyil 'khor bsdu ba dang / gsang sngags kyi le'u
47a5(rnying rgyud): ste bzhi pa'o// de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor bla mar lhun gyis
47a6(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i dgongs pa rtser chi ba nas rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// 
47a7(rnying rgyud): snying po phyag rgya mda' ka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// hUM dang muM gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru
47a8(rnying rgyud): brgyad bsna ba nas thugs kar bkan// rgyal bkun dang mnyam sbyor ba/ bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bani sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hUM bslong rtse mor rdo rje'abar/ rdza brtul hU~M
47b1(rnying rgyud): sgras drigasi latshang // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas na thugs kar bkan// mu bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyid 'bru lngas las su la dril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mang / 
47b2(rnying rgyud): kyis lnga/ 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus na// ston pa rdo rje sems dpa' dag/ yum mchog yangs ma'i spyan dang ni// gnyis med dbyings kyi nga du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkam// 
47b3(rnying rgyud): oM bsgang mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla 'dul 'bru sbas dril gsil cing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// laM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// 
47b4(rnying rgyud): nyim 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis dalta// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad dag/ yum mchog kun tu bzang mo dang / 
47b5(rnying rgyud): gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas na sa thugs kar bkan// sa rtse 'bar ba rin po che/ zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis
47b6(rnying rgyud): chos la brtan// 'bru sras bzhi nas thugs kar bkan// maM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// 'dud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// lho phyogs 'khor lo cis
47b7(rnying rgyud): stengs nas// bder gshegs rin chen 'byung ldan dag/ yum mchog khams gsum byams ma dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru sbas bzhi nas thugs kar bkan// oM bsgreng
47b8(rnying rgyud): rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla btul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// baM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las
48a1(rnying rgyud): su 'khril// btud nge 'dzum pa'i mdang zas kyis lha// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na// bde gshegs snang ba mtha' yas dag/ yum mchog na bza' dkar mo dang // 
48a2(rnying rgyud): gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// ha bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru slas dril gsil zhing // 'khril pa'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru
48a3(rnying rgyud): bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// tAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga'i las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi lha// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na// bde gshegs
48a4(rnying rgyud): don yod grub pa dang // yum mchog dam tshig sgrol ma dang /  gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rin chen myu gu g.ya/ das phyogs na// sgeg cing 'gying ba g.yon phyogs na// sa snying
48a5(rnying rgyud): dkar po rdo rje'i rigs// yum mchog dkar mo sgeg chen dang // dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar phyogs na// gnyis med dbyings kyingangadu 'khril// ral gri 'byin pa g.yas phyogs na// phreng ba bgrang ba
48a6(rnying rgyud): g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyam lho phyogran// nam snying ser po rin chen rigs// yum mchog dpal gyi phreng ba dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// pad+ma dkar po g.yas phyogs na// pi bang 'gyed pa
48a7(rnying rgyud): g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub phyogs na// spyan ras leb rgan pad+ma rigs// yum mchog chos kyi dbyangs mkhan dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas phyogs na// gar
48a8(rnying rgyud): gyi cod pan g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang phyogs na// phyag na mthing ka las kyi rigs// yum mchog gar gyi cod pan dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// mdzes pa'i klu shing
48b1(rnying rgyud): g.yas phyigs na// bdug spos 'dren pa g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar ljon// byams pa dkar ser bde gshegs rigs// yus mchog bdug pa'i sprin 'phro dang // gnyis med dbyings/ 
48b2(rnying rgyud): kyi nga ngul khril// gser gyi 'khor lo ga yas phyogs na// me tog 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho nub na// sgrib sel dmar ser rin chen rigs// yum mchog me tog char
48b3(rnying rgyud): dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rin chen snye ma g.yas phyogs na// sgron ma 'debs pa g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub byang na// kun bzangs dmar ljang las kyi rigs/ 
48b4(rnying rgyud): yum mchog gsal ba'i sgrol ma dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// ud dpal sngon po g.yas phyogs na// tsan dran 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang shar/ 
48b5(rnying rgyud): na/ 'jam dpal dkar ljang rdo rje'i rigs// yum mchog tu/ nadan char 'bebs dang // gnyis med dbyings kying / nga du 'khril// thub drug phyag rgya chen po ni// rgyud drug gnas
48b6(rnying rgyud): nas 'dren pa ste// gseg par phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas// sku mdog ser pos mi rnams 'dren// pi bang phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas// sku ma dog dkar po lha rnams 'dren// go cha mdung thung phyag rgya yis// sku
48b7(rnying rgyud): mdog mthing nag lha min 'dren// rin chen 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// sku mdog sngon po yi dgas 'dren// po ti brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis// sku mdog ser nag byol song 'dren// me 'bar chu 'bedra
48b8(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya yis// sku mdog sngon po dmyal ba 'dren// sgo bzhi phyag rgya tshul gnas pa// rdo rje gnod pa g.yas phyogs na// lcags kyu 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na// stobs chen khro bo chen po yang // 
49a1(rnying rgyud): sum mchog rdo sngags dang // gas da kyis kyi dul khril// rdum mgo ga ngas pa g.yas phyogs na// zhags pa 'bed pa g.yon phyogs na// tshwa chen gzhin rje gshe sa/ 
49a2(rnying rgyud): yang / yum mchog rdo rje zhags pa dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// sbrul mgo gdengs pa g.yas phyogs na// lcags sgrog sdom g.yon phyogs na// khro chen rta mgrin dpa' bo yang // yum
49a3(rnying rgyud): mchog rdo rje lcags sgrogs dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rgya gram gnon pa g.yas phyogs na// dril bu 'khrol ba g.yon phyogs na// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil ba yang // yum mchog
49a4(rnying rgyud): rje dril 'khrol dang // byang gi sgo nas dbyings su 'khril// kun bzangs mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzog/ sa pad+mo'i dkyil// gnyis med dbyings kyi gsang chen spro// ba
49a5(rnying rgyud): mchog ngo mtshar thugs kyi dkyil// spro bsdu rdo rje thal mo dag/ bsgyur bas rang sems ye shes gsal// de nyid shes rab thabs/ rdzogs// rgyu 'phrul dra ba nges pa'i bla ma chen po las phyag rgya
49a6(rnying rgyud): spros pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas ye shes rgyal po de rdo rje bkod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig rgyan rnam par spros pa'i dgongs pa la gcig char bzhugs te/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod do// 
49a7(rnying rgyud): shin tu phra ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ dpe dang tshad du mi gzung zhing // gzhal yas phyag rgya la sogs te// mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom// shin tu phra bas rnams sbyangs te// rig pas rgya khyon tshad med pa// gzhal
49a8(rnying rgyud): yas phyag rgya la sogs pa'i// mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // tshogs chen gnyis las 'grub pa yi// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan rnams// nar kha'i mtha' dang mnyam
49b1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs te// rags dang pra dang 'bring la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa rang gar bya// tsa ka li dang tshen rtsi dag/ bya dang mi bya med pas na// de la dgag par ma gsungs so// 'gro don 'tsham pa de bzhin te// sna tshogs
49b2(rnying rgyud): mchod pas rgyas par mchod// bdag nyid chen pos mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus kun// dga' ba chen pos tshim pa yin// sgyu 'phrul dra
49b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i dgongs pa yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // rigs drug 'gro ba mngon du 'gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na'ang yod pa ma yin te// rnam dag ye shes sbyor ba
49b4(rnying rgyud): yis/ dbyings la dbyings nyid sgom pa yis// kun byas da dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas dang ldan gus 'jug pa// de nas da rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang
49b5(rnying rgyud): chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad 'bul// sti/ nga yang yon gyi mchog yin te// bla ma mnyes phyir gus lnga na dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor
49b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad mnyes pa yin// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// skyon rnams ma lus nges par 'byung // dang ldan brtson 'grus bskyed byas na// phan pa'i dbang nod theg tshad sbyin// des na dbang phyug rgyal po
49b7(rnying rgyud): yis/ dbang gi rim pa rnams bstan to// 'gro la phan phyir las rnams sbyin// grub pas 'dzin rgyal po sbyin// mi 'gyur rab 'khyam bde chen no// gang 'dod rims kyis sbyin par bya// blo dang ldan
49b8(rnying rgyud): pas theg tshad mod// yang na sras kyi dam pa ste// chung ma zos par rdzogs dbang sbyin// sems kyi rnam pa nyid khu blud// sgo byed bde bas gyen du bskyil// de nas dbang phyug chen po des// mi 'gyur sgrol mar sku bskyod
50a1(rnying rgyud): cing sems kyi thig le sgo phye ste/ tshangs pa chen po'i dbyas bzhed nas// go byed rdorje 'i ljags brkyang ste/ dang ldan skyes bu dbang bskung ba// rdzogs pa chen po'i bde dang ni//  ma/ 
50a2(rnying rgyud): gong na med pa na// gsang ba'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang dang // thabs mkhas byin rlabs che bas na// las rnams kun gyi dbang dang ni// khams gsum dbang du bsdus pas ni// slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ngo // hUM thungs
50a3(rnying rgyud): mkhas thugs rje'i byin rlabs kyis// rigs kyi bu mchog dbang bskur phyir// gsang ba'i dbu rgyan 'di bcings pas// rigs kyi bu mchog deng ban chad// 'jig rten che bkun gyi bla// che ba'i che ba zil/ 
50a4(rnying rgyud): gyis gnon// sangs rgyas che ba'i mchod gnas ni// rnal da'abyor chen po khyod nyid yin// oM sarba thA ga to gu h+ya bar+thard nam kuT twA twAM// badz+ra ga h+ya si d+hi hUM// hUM thabs ma pas byin
50a5(rnying rgyud): rlabs chen po ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te// byin rlabs chen po rnam bzhi po// dbang bskur gnang phyir btad pas na// rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad// sems can kun la snying bde
50a6(rnying rgyud): phyir mu stegs rtag chad yan chad nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad spyod la// khyod kyis mi bya gcig kyang med// rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa yis// sems can kun gyi re ba skongs// oM sa ma ya/ 
50a7(rnying rgyud): gu h+ya e baM ma ya a// slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ni// khams gsum kun la dbang yid bzhin du sbyar te/ hUMng ni rgyal ba kun gyi bla// thig le byang chub sems chen po// nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje/ 
50a8(rnying rgyud): ye shes rol pa'i 'byung gnas gter// nga ni spyi dpal bla na med// skyon bral thabs kyi rgyal po yin// sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu// khyod kyi lce la bab pa 'di// snying gi dkyil du gzung bar byos// rigs/ 
50b1(rnying rgyud): kyi bu khyod dang pan cad// ji sems dpa'i thugs mchog zung // sangs rgyas kun gyi ga ma thams// byang chub sems dang mnyas pa'i phyir// sems dang 'a ku kyi mcho gnas can// rigs kyi bu
50b2(rnying rgyud): chad/ byi dang na dang gsang ba yis// bstan pa phyi nang zab mo gan// sems kyi dkyil du bsdus nas kyang // rdo rje lce yi sgo byi ste// bdud rtsi sman mchog dam pa 'dis// dang ldan skyes bungams
50b3(rnying rgyud): par byos// sems kyi thig le dkyil 'khor du// zhi khro 'byam pa'i gter sgoms la// srid pa gsum la dbang bsgyur cig/ dbang can thams cad bkol bar byos// skye 'gro kun la snying brtse'i phyir// gdul
50b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya 'di yang spyod// dus gsum rtsa ba gcad par byos/ phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rnam dag chen po nyid kyil mu// byed spyod thabs tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa// 'gro don byang
50b5(rnying rgyud): chub sems kyi dbyings// sems kyi chu 'di btung bar byos// rnal/ 'byor chen pos dam du gzung // hUM de nas rigs kyi bu mchog/ des// mnyam pa'i don la gzhol ba'i phyir// ye shes
50b6(rnying rgyud): rgyal pos 'di skad gsungs// snying gi dkyil du rnam sbyangs pa/ hU~M nyid ring pos mtshams sbyar te// thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings// dge sdig las kyis mi bcos shing // sgom dang sgrub pas
50b7(rnying rgyud): mi 'byangs pa'i// rnam dag sems nyid rin chen gter// rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis// khro rgyal kun gyi gtsor gyur cig/ shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra bo d+hi hUM ho// oM ai/ mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes/ 
50b8(rnying rgyud): gnas/ ma brtsal phyin pas bde ba'i mchog/ ma bltas gsal bas ye shes spyan// gong na med pas kun gyi rje// ye shes rang byung bdal ba la// mi 'gyur g.yung drungs thob shog/ oM ma hA gu ha thun
51a1(rnying rgyud): na maN+DaN+Da la dz+nyA na gu h+ya sid d+his b+ha ba A ma ko ho// gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs pa// 'gyur ba med pa'i sman mchog thig le lnga// mtshan mchog
51a2(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa chen pos lus brgyan cing // oM sarba te thA ga to gu h+ya Ad pe a b+hi shin+d+ra hoha// khyung gi gshog pa g.yas g.yon gdengs pa yis// klu rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa ltar// srid
51a3(rnying rgyud): gsum yon tan mchog tu rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas kun la mdzes pa'i cod pan mchog/ mchog tu che bas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// oM sarba thA ga tom hA gu h+Na badz+ra a b+hi shiny+tsa so// hUM bde
51a4(rnying rgyud): ba chen po rang gnas la// ye shes rgyal po stangs dbul du// 'gyur ba med par longs spyod cing // thabs dung shes rab 'pho 'du yis// skye 'gro sras su 'dzin par
51a5(rnying rgyud): shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya a nu rA ga ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// dbyings nas nyi shar mkha' la rdzogs sras 'gyur// rgyu 'phrul drab bla ma chen po las rdo rje brgod pa gsang ba dam tshig
51a6(rnying rgyud): dang dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po des thugs rje chen po gdung ba'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig stan chen po'i
51a7(rnying rgyud): drin las mdzad do// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyis gsang // zhing bcur ldan pa'i longs spyod la// gsung gi 'phro 'dra rnam sbyangs te// lnga yi chos
51a8(rnying rgyud): bu yang dag gsal// sgo lnga byin rlabs 'dren pa'i mchog/ ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i lam// gtsug du snang mdzad sems dpa' che// skur skyed byin rlabs rmang po che// pho nya mang po'i 'phro du/ 
51b1(rnying rgyud): yis//  zhing bcu gnas nas blangs nas su// nyi zla steng du de bzhag ste/ shes pa gsum po dbyings su bstim// rang rgyud 'khor ba 'i sa bon las// ljang ku ni ru 'bang bstod de// ni ljang cu du gnas
51b2(rnying rgyud): bsgyur nas// yas 'dus mas 'dus hUM la 'dus// hUM ni bde gshegs ye shes lnga// dkar la gsal bar bskur bskyed de// bde chen 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga po// yab yus
51b3(rnying rgyud): bcu yi byin rlabs nyid// leb rgan hUM ni dbyings su sbyor// kun tu bzang po bde ba'i mkha'// sangs rgyas sems can gnyi ga'i yum// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas gtso// sras su gyur pas bde
51b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i mchog/ zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// gnas 'di kun bzang yum gyi mkha'// sa 'di rdo rje sems dpa'i nas// mi ldog nyi zla'i gdan stengs su// mkhas pas sku yi phyag
51b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas bskyod// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// rtag tu sku ma cho ga g.yung drung sbyin// ho rdo rje gsang pa'i tshig tu'o// de na sa ye shes rgyal po ngas// gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod sprin gyi
51b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rdul snyed na// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed// de kun gsang mchog mnyes pa'i phyir// nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal modo// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi dbyings su thim/ 
51b7(rnying rgyud): 'khril nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa mdzad// bco brgyad drag gnyis hUM spros pas// klong du hUM chen gcig tu 'khyil// kha dog rnam pazhi yang dag ldan// rigs pani lha mo rnam spros te// stong kham/ 
51b8(rnying rgyud): gang nas mchod pa byed// la la gas mchog dbyings su la khril// la la 'dod lnga'i mchod pa byed// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang / bla rgyal mtshan 'ban gdugs dang // rin chen don pa/ 
52a1(rnying rgyud): se modo// dbyings legs rin chen phung po mdzes// bas ma rdzogs rin chen sdong po lngas/ rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod// lal 'gro bar bskong // la la bdud 'dul
52a2(rnying rgyud): ngan song sbyong // kun kyang gsang ba'i mchod 'bul byed// nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang // gnyis su med par 'khril nas su// 'khril nas 'ga' na'i mchod par byed// stong khams nyungs
52a3(rnying rgyud): 'brur gzhugs tshul du// ga na'i mchod pa chen po yis// thams cad mnyes pa chen por gyur to// de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril nas ched du brjod do// 
52a4(rnying rgyud): e ma'o bde gshegs spyod pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs spyod la rang bzhin gsang // ma chags pa yi ngo bo las// chags pa chen po'i spyod pa 'byung // spyod pa chen po rnams gnyis la// 
52a5(rnying rgyud): rtogs nas chags pas su spyod pa// yang dag chags pa chen po ste// 'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin// sem sa kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis// bzhi bcu mnyes pa'i las bya'o// 
52a6(rnying rgyud): zhes ched du gsungs so// de lta bus phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams kyis bsdus pa thams cad mnyes pa chen pos thim par gyur to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las thugs
52a7(rnying rgyud): rje gdung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de mchod pa bla ma'i rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad
52a8(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor blam dgongs pa'i mchog/ bro ga 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya mas// 'dzul lam namakhar 'gro bar nges// glu tshig sgra yi phye rgya/ 
52b1(rnying rgyud): sa chos snyings pa nam chung ses/ bab nga rdung ba'i blag rgyams// yang pazhin sems dpa das gru lem/ rgyamang bag pa'i byeg rgyams// 'ad shA ma'i sa
52b2(rnying rgyud): chung me/ ma ma ma'i drug rgya sa// thangs pa dbu rjes// rgyu bras dkyis su spyo shes shing / khri dgas pagang spyong pa// rigs badzin rgyal pa'i ni dus
52b3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa'i rgyu srungs nas// mtshan rdzogs sa la gdon meg// zhes gsangs pas tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis rdzogs par gyur to// de nas nyid kyi bla ma'i mang skyod la dgyes pa
52b4(rnying rgyud): bos gru 'di bla // mau gas bcu dus pa rdzogs rab y-i// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le bsod nams del 'khor su la tshogs// snang srung sa
52b5(rnying rgyud): lekun tu rdzogs// dzArje.oM rdo rje bsod nams thag lin/ rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha/ 'ayas pa// ji rgyal po thog le che// tsa a mi dmigs
52b6(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po// ho/ oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs
52b7(rnying rgyud): po che// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang // 'dus pa'i rdzogs chen thig le che// hoHoM phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul/ 
52b8(rnying rgyud): phran snyed// sprul pa rdul phran pas ma yas kyi// skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub// ho/ oM thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyi kun tu khyab// 
53a1(rnying rgyud): drug su gas kyi cig na/ nadamamatha mas sa sa sa/ dbyis nyid byang chub sems chen po// snying po blamanges pa don// jig le nyid las g.yos pa med/ 
53a2(rnying rgyud): snu sul dra ba byur chen po'i sonags chen po rnam pa gnyis mashes pa'i leru ste brgyang pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal ba de sgyu 'phrul dumachen par
53a3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu lta ba dang rmongs pa'i dbang gis gab pa'i gsang ba chen po ma rtogs sbas pa'i gas pa la ma
53a4(rnying rgyud): ba nan pas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don ni bral bar bor/ bram ze dran sngags mang po ni blo'i gang du blangs nas snying rje chen po'i da las dang ni dral gnas su ming bdags nas zhe sdang sgrob pa
53a5(rnying rgyud): las ni rgyun tu byed thabs pa shes rab 'du 'bral med/ ba'i don ni ma rtogs 'dod chags spyod pardzi/ las dang skad cig tsam yang ma grol/ rang rig pa'i ye sa
53a6(rnying rgyud): niblol rub don dam pa la kun tu gti rugapas rgyun tu khebs/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan ni ma rtogs/ nga rgyal khengs pa'i dregs pa'i las ni rgyun du byed/ tshad med pa bzhi
53a7(rnying rgyud): las dang ni bral/ phrag dog gi chub mas ni rgyun du khrid de/ bdag tu rmongs pa dang rtog pa la zhen te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bral bas rgyu dang 'bras bu rmongs te srid pa'i sa bon rtsub
53a8(rnying rgyud): mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po stong phrag drug cur skyes so// de las thar nas nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po drug tu skye so// las kyi sgrib pa
