53b1(rnying rgyud): rtsuchub mo de las thar te sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dgas srin po chen po lus gcig mgo bo brgya pa mgo bo sna tshogs pa lus brgya pa mgo bo gcig pa lus dang yan lag mang po 'dug pa mtshon/ 
53b2(rnying rgyud): tshesna tshogs pa thogs shing gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul mang po ston pas klu'i ris nas 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus nas sa bon rtsub mos mang po 'debs so// de nas ston legs par spyad pa'i 'bras bus
53b3(rnying rgyud): bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sku'i dbyibs legs par brgyan pa ye shes byin ci ma log pa'i spyan gyis gzigs te/ las ngan pa'i srin po de nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sbyong ba dang / khams
53b4(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi mams can bde ba la bdag par drugasarje chen po'i mishes skyes nas/ de bani gshegs thams cad kyi su dang gsung dang thugs kyi dag pod kyis pachen
53b5(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi rgyal po de nyid 'jigs byed chen po rgyal ba'i dkyil lazo/ ra bla ma chen po sprin rnam par spo bsgyu 'phrul bla ma'i ting nge/ 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi bra mchen
53b6(rnying rgyud): pa rgyang mnas nyid kyigs pa'i dgas khri ma rgyal mchen pa nga du b+h+ya shes rjes pa'i ga sa sa rgyas pa sa sa
53b7(rnying rgyud): sa stsogs bzlama'i na satsun chu brdadag na dza sam la ga la la hrIzhes pa dngas ga tu mug tsunas thugs pa du zang ba ba na nas can/ 
53b8(rnying rgyud): rgya 'tshus 'ju pa la/ ni 'i'i mi / ga gro po la byi pa
54a1(rnying rgyud): khyams gsum rdo rje rin pa che'i gro bur du mdzes pa sgo bani rta babs mu khyud du bcas pa rje rje rin po che rgya gram mthing ka' bar ba'i rtsig pa dra ba ris su
54a2(rnying rgyud): brtsigs pa/ steng yid bzhin gyi rin po che 'bar ba rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i bla re mig mangs su bres pa/ rtse mo dbyings bla mas 'og min gyi gnas nas srid pa'i rtse mo man chad bum pa'i tshul
54a3(rnying rgyud): du dbyibs rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs gcig tu 'khyil ba/ ye shes rdo rje rgya gram gyi cho 'phrul bla ma'i 'od 'bang bas phyogs pa nir 'phros shing 'khrugs pas khams gsum thams cad bdal ba rgyal mtshan blam
54a4(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / ru mtshon bla ma chen pos phyogs ba ni grwa bzhi nas nga bsgreng ba gsang ba bla ma'i rtsig pas phyi rim bas rab rdo rje rin po che'i phyi rol gyi shing ljon pa bla mas phyogs
54a5(rnying rgyud): mtshams gtibs pa phyi dang nang med pa kun du yang ku/ na du yang bla ma chen po'i nang du gyur pa khams ga/ sum thams cad rdo rje ba'i rtsig pa 'tshor ba med de'i gnal yas
54a6(rnying rgyud): khang ma khro bo dang khro mo'i rol pa'i phyag rgya stong gi 'jig rdul phra mo snyed 'dzin par gyur to// de nas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du'ur 'ur dang ne mche ma dang / shig shig dang / 
54a7(rnying rgyud): za ba dang / gtogs shig dang / ma shig dang / sid cig dang / dril zhig dang sbyongs shig la sogs pas 'jig rten dpa da 'a nga la dunas / 
54a8(rnying rgyud): rnamam rgyal brgyang rgya 'gyur to// de sa gyes pa chen pas le shes rgyal ba de nyid du grang pa chen par kyi seM nas thag gi rnama'i la she dus chen pa rdo da
54b1(rnying rgyud): slong dkyi na rdo rje le shes kyi khor lo rtsings bzhi pa la nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang / mchod pa bla ma chen po mdzad de gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas 'di byung ngo // hU badz+ra du rtenan su r+yargyan dra ba d+mam/ 
54b2(rnying rgyud): Da la de ba tiSh+Tha naM zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa 'od 'bar ba'i steng du dur khrod gdug pa'i tshogs seng ge la sogs pa bla ma chen po'i khri btsugs te
54b3(rnying rgyud): gdar bla ma nyi zla dang pad ma spel bar gting ba'o// de nas cho 'phrul bla ma chen pos btul ba/ bsam gtan bla ma chen po sbags pa tshad med pa/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes bla
54b4(rnying rgyud): mchen pos dregs pa thams cad dus gcig tu btul ba'i snam rten bla ma chen po la mtshon pa dang dmigs pa'i yul las 'a dras pa'i phyag rgya bla ma 'od 'bar ba bzhugs pa ni bcom
54b5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po chen po sku mthing nag cir yang 'gyur ba// rdo rje ljags kyi gsung 'brug stong gi sgra sgrogs pas stong kha mas thams cad dus gcig tu 'jig pa/ ye shes me'i
54b6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyis snang srid kyi bud shing dus gcig tu bsregs pa/ steng 'og med par kun tu spyi bung zhes byed pa dbu dgu phyag bco brgyad pa/ zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs
54b7(rnying rgyud): bsnams pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spyan 'bar ba nyi shu rtsa bdun mnga' zhing rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje mthing ka khyung gi gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams yob par bkab pa/ 
54b8(rnying rgyud): khros pa'i rgyal mo mthing nag 'bar ba dang gnyisu med par bzhugs so// gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang / nyi zla'i steng du ma hA de ba dang / 'dod pa
55a1(rnying rgyud): lnga gan la du brtul ba'i snying nyid kyi gzugs kyi bung po de bcom ldan 'das bung dU hwe du// s+ya mdog ser nagang dbu gsum phyag drug zhangs pazhir gyur bdur khrod kyi rgyan gyis
55a2(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa'o// phyag na mtshan ma sna tshogs bsdams pa'o// bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so// lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi l+la
55a3(rnying rgyud): gdang stengs su gshin rje gan rgyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das rang na he ru ka sku mdog sngon gang bu gsum phyag drug zhabs pazhir gyur pa/ mtshon chas/ 
55a4(rnying rgyud): tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril pa chen mo'i tshul gyis bzhugs sa// nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'o rtsibs stengs la khri dang
55a5(rnying rgyud): zla'i steng du chu bdag gi rgyal po dang 'khor lo nag po 'bring / gi ri ti gan rgyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi/ phung po de bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka sku mdog dmar nag dbu
55a6(rnying rgyud): gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin @/ dur khrod kyis brgyan pa'o// pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal ma dang 'khril ba'i rdul du bzhugs pa'o// byang phyogs 'khor/ 
55a7(rnying rgyud): lo'i rtsibs stengs la khril dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gnod sbyin stobs bzangs gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ljang nag dbu
55a8(rnying rgyud): gsum phyag drug zhabs pazhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// 
55b1(rnying rgyud): de nas dregs pa chen po la sogs pas gdug pa'i sems kyis gdus pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs bstan pas mgrin gcig tu gdug pa'i ngos gtum pa'i brnang tshig tu smras pa/ thong zong snying rje'i bdag
55b2(rnying rgyud): lngar byed ngapa zhes zer ni zhin tu gtum pas rngam mo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid su gzi brjid chen po'i mdangs su gyur te/ thugs rje chen pos 'dus
55b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i gdangs skad chen po 'di dag phyung ngo // hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs
55b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gdug pa'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung nas nang rol kun drangs yan lag kun bcad ga tubs te sha zos/ khrag 'thungs rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas 'jig byed chen po
55b5(rnying rgyud): de nyid kyis hUM hUM b+h+yo e a ra li dzA dz+ra zhes brjod pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na mkha' dang bcasapa yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so// de nas
55b6(rnying rgyud): 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad kyi rje bo'i yang rje'o// dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo/ srin mo chen mo mi srun mo dang / tshangs ma dang / khro mo dang
55b7(rnying rgyud): dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar mo dang bdud rtsi mo dang / zhib mo dang be chen mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag thung
55b8(rnying rgyud): mo dang gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang grub mo dang / rlung mo dang gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chen mo dang / chu lha mo dang nag mo chen mo dngar
56a1(rnying rgyud): mgo par ser chen mo dang bum sna sngonag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin sngonag chen mo la sogs pa bran dang / yang dran dang g.yog dang / yang g.yog la
56a2(rnying rgyud): sogs pa 'khor zhing gi rdul kyang bsdus so// de nas yang dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid dgyes pa bla ma'i gsang ba chen po sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par 'du
56a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad de/ sku gsung thugs bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo // oM A hUM/ badz+ra pad+ma pra be sha pad+ma hUM a la la ho zhes brjod pas/ 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad shin tu chags pa'i yid
56a4(rnying rgyud): g.yos nas gsang ba rgyas par byas nas/ khab lan gyi rdol lcags 'du ba'i tshul du bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po de'i skul mi srin la sogs pa brgyad 'khril lo// bcom
56a5(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das ser nag chen po'i sku la tshangs ma la sogs pa lnga ya/ nga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das sngon ga chen po'i sku la bdud rtsi mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom
56a6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i skul khrag gis myos ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das ljang nag chen po'i skul me mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// de nas dgyes pa chen po
56a7(rnying rgyud): de dag gis hUM zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i tshogs bsdus te shin tu bcum par gyur to// de nas dgyes te ha ha zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs rnam par shes pa brgyad las dkar po la sogs pa brgyad
56a8(rnying rgyud): rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thon par gyur te// 'thon nas kyang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rol shar phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying rje 'jigs tshul gyis stan la gnas so// de nas dgyes te/ 
56b1(rnying rgyud): shes parjo bas na kyigs pa susu brgya mas meng gang na mo la sogs pa brgya gi lag dang sa 'grus te yongs yang kho sa pa sa byangs su ning rje jigs pa'i dum gyis na/ 
56b2(rnying rgyud): la shin tu rngam pa'i skabs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes te phaT ces phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsgrags pas phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus pan 'gro rnams kyi nam lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen 'drug
56b3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug 'dul ba dang / yid chos dbyings nas rol te/ sprod byed ni zer nags pa can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te/ 'ab
56b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i bde khyams gsum pa la zhing skam gsher spel ba gdan stengs su rang gi lag cha dang / shin tu rngam pa'i ste/ rabs kyis shar phyogs nas 'khor bar gnas so// de nas dgyes
56b5(rnying rgyud): te phaT ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bani las rdo rje sri ngas 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar dun sa nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje 'jigs
56b6(rnying rgyud): tshul gyi stan la shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du gnas so// de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las bud d+ha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phaT ces brjod pas
56b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad khros nas 'byung mo thams cad kyang rang gi gnas su yud tsam gyis phyin par dgye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa cig
56b8(rnying rgyud): char zhugs te/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi aM aM zhes brjod pas/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po'i snam
57a1(rnying rgyud): logs nas 'don to// 'das bu drung de dran pa rnyed do// de nas khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun yamatshan chen por gyur te tshe 'phrul chen po mdzad pa mthong ngo // de dag gi dus su 'jig rten
57a2(rnying rgyud): drug na gnas pa'i dregs pa chen po rnams dus gcig tu brtul bar mthong ste/ shin tu zhum zhing bred nas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ 'bangs su mchi 'bangs su mchi// 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na/ 
57a3(rnying rgyud): mgo dang lus kyang brgyar 'gas shing // snying yang gas shing gtubs gyur cig/ rul myags tshig nas rlag pa dang // dmyal bar ltung nas 'bod par shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi bar rang rang gis slong
57a4(rnying rgyud): btsugs so// de nas de dag kun dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du ban ga go/ de nas yang de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras ba/ rang rang gi chung ma dang bu mo dang / rang rang gi ma dang sring mo
57a5(rnying rgyud): rnams dkyil 'khor du phul te/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis khrang dang ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams// dkyil 'khri/ ra chen por bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su
57a6(rnying rgyud): gsol// bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad kyis// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par su bgyid pa// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// de yi dgos pa rdzogs par bgyid ces
57a7(rnying rgyud): smos btsugs so// de nas de'i ma dang sring mo dang chung ma dang / bu mo rnams yud tsam gyis phyin par 'ongs nas las kyi dngos grub stsol ba las/ de nas khrag 'thung ye shes chen pos ming btags/ lag
57a8(rnying rgyud): tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje bran dang pho nyar dbang bskur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i don phyogs bcu dus bzhi 'di bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsal zhing 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir/ ye shes rgyal po de nyid
57b1(rnying rgyud): kyi gsang pa'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su med par gyur nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje bla ma las 'di dag byung ngo // e ma'o ye nas gas pa'i chos// ma nga' dbyings gnyis su med pa las// mkha' la zla pa'i
57b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor shar// khri btsugs nyi dkyil gdan stengs su// de ba lha tshogs gdan du bting // hUM 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su// khri bshams nyi dkyil ya bdud gdon// de yi steng du
57b3(rnying rgyud): bsam bya ba// byang chub sems las sku bskyed pa// dpal chen bla med he ru ka/ dpung dgu phyag kyang bco brgyad de// spyan yang 'bar ba nyi shu bdun// dbul rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gsol/ 
57b4(rnying rgyud): zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad tu gtams// rdo rje mthong ka khyung gigashog/ 'jig rten khams kyang yog par bkab// sbrul na/ ngag 'jigs su rung ba dang // dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// dbu
57b5(rnying rgyud): gsum dang la byung ba ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ma thing zhal// rnam par thar pa'i dbu gsum gyis// kha/ mas gsum mya ngan zlo ba'i zhal// dbu gsum par nas rngam
57b6(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ g.yas sngo g.yon ljang dbus mthing zhal// thabs dang shes rab sems kyi dbu// srid gsum dbyings su rdzogs pa'i zhal// dbu gsum mtha' nas rngam pa ni// g.yas mthing g.yon
57b7(rnying rgyud): mthing dbus mthing zhal// khams gsum re ba skong ba yi// lung dang man ngag sems kyi dbu// 'gyur ba med pa'i mthing nag zhal// skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshems// dbu dgu rol pa'i byin rlabs
57b8(rnying rgyud): las// g.yas gsum glog stong lce 'byin cing // g.yon gsum 'brug stong sgra sgrogs pa// dbu gsum rdo rje ser chen 'bebs// spyan dgu dang la gzigs pa ni// chos dbyings kun tu bzang po dang/ 
58a1(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang mo 'om par dbyings la// 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gzigs// spyan dgu bar nas gzigs pa ni// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyis// srid pa'i sems can thams cad la// 
58a2(rnying rgyud): byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan gyis gzigs// spyan dgu mtha' nas gzigs pa ni// g.yas gsum zhe sdang khros pa'i spyan// gzigs pas bdud dang mu stegs sgrol// g.yon gsum byams mgon snyom
58a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i spyan// gzigs pas mtha' yas bde la 'jog/ dbu gsum ye shes rol pa'i spyan// gzigs pas skye 'gro gnas su stobs// dbu dgu rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan dgu// lnga dgu bani bcu rtsa lnga yang // 
58a4(rnying rgyud): bung du bzhi bcu rtsa lngas brgyan// stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// khyab bdal chen po'i rtag su bsnams// bco brgyad phye dag na rol pa yis// stong pa bco brgyad dbyingasu sbyor// zhabs brgyad
58a5(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal dregs pa 'joms// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// rdo rje mthing ka gshog pa brkyang // bco brgyad phyag na bsnan/ sa pa yis// rdo rje glo snying zhing chung g.yas// dan zhing chen stir chen
58a6(rnying rgyud): g.yon// nang zhags nyi ma khyung chen g.yas// zhing chen zla bdug pa g.yon// me dang rgya mchog 'u g.yas// rlung dang rin tshoni ri rab g.yon// yon tan bco brgyad dbyings su rdzogs// dang po rdo rje dung chen ni// khams/ 
58a7(rnying rgyud): gsum dbang du bsdus nas kyang // bdud dang mu stegs kun 'joms pa'o// gnyis pa stir chen glo snying ni// srid pa'i sems can thams cad kun// dam tshig stan dbyings sgrol// gsum pa stir chung ril ming ni// 
58a8(rnying rgyud): dus gsum rnam par sgrol ba'i rtags// bzhi pa stir chen nang zhags ni// rgyud lnga'i sems can dbyings su 'dren// lnga pa nyi zla zung tu 'dzin// byang chub sems las g.yos pa med// drug pa khyung dang 'ug pa ni// 
58b1(rnying rgyud): mapar 'gro thams cad 'khol ba'i rtags// bdun pa med pung rlung gis 'thor// srid pa'i bag chags thal bar rlog/ brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho rnams// thams cad ma lus g.yeng gnas shing // 'byung ba lnga la mnga' bsnyes/ 
58b2(rnying rgyud): ba'o// dgu pa rin chen garu ni// dngos grub sprul pa 'byung ba'i chags// dgu gnyis zung du ldan pa las// stong pa bco brgyad dbyings su rdzogs// dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa ni// thod skam 'bar ba phreng ba yis// 
58b3(rnying rgyud): nib phyogs gcig mya ngan blo// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku bsnyes pa'o// thong rlon 'bar ba'i bring ba ni// khams gsum dang du bsdus nas su// sprul pa'i skul mnga' bzlas pa'o// 'od pa phyed tshal phreng bas ni// dug rdza/ 
58b4(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsir sbyor ba ste// longs spyod sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// zhing chen rlon pa'i na bza' ni// chos dbyings mnyam pa chen po ste/ chos kyi sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham
58b5(rnying rgyud): thabs ni/ phrin las rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje'i sku la na/ ngar brnyes pa'o// sbrul nag tshun 'phyang mang po ni// ye shes thams cad 'byung ba'i rtags// rtags chen sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// 
58b6(rnying rgyud): zhabs brgyad lha brgyad brdzis pa ni// nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcod pa'o// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo ni// kr-i d+hi shwa ri yum gyi gtso// mthong nag 'bar ba'i ral pa can// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang 'thun// 'khril
58b7(rnying rgyud): pa chen po'i tshul gyis su// ban da rak+ta gcol stobs// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// khri dang nyi dkyil nyi zla'i gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// gzugs kyi
58b8(rnying rgyud): phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung bud d+ha he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // g.yas ljang g.yon sngo dbus ser zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// 'khor lo dgra sta zhags pa g.yas// 
59a1(rnying rgyud): ban rje'u rung kha T+wAM g.yon// ser nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na// khri
59a2(rnying rgyud): dang nyi dkyil gshin rje'i gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// tsher ba'i phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung rad na he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal// phyag
59a3(rnying rgyud): drug mngon par rol pa las// rin chen gshol dang gtun shing g.yas// ban da dgra sta rde'u chung g.yon// sngo nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// rin chen khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// 
59a4(rnying rgyud): nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// khri dang nyi dkyil klu yi ga/ dun// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// 'du shes phung po gnas gyur pa// / khrag 'thung pad+ma he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang
59a5(rnying rgyud): g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ldang zhal// phyag drug mngon par/ rol pa las// pad+ma rje'u chung spu gri g.yas// ban da kha T+wAM/ so phreng g.yon// dmar nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// pad+ma khros
59a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyal mo dang // khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// khri dang nyi dkyil gnod sbyin gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// 'du byed phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung kar ma he/ 
59a7(rnying rgyud): ru ka dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dmar g.yon ser dbus ldang zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// ral gri zhags pa rnge'u chung g.yas// ban da thod dbyug kha T+wAM g.yon// ljang nag
59a8(rnying rgyud): dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bzhugs// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyir men// me dpung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las// 
59b1(rnying rgyud): mkha' las skyes pa'i 'dra men ma// shar phyogs su ni bsam bya ba// sa bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// kun zhi gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor sngo nag ke'u rim// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil/ 
59b2(rnying rgyud): mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// dpyugs par glu blangs ha ha sa bzhad// stir dbyugs pa g.yas pa na// band rag ta g.yon pa na// kye shi ma la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho phyogs
59b3(rnying rgyud): ngos su bsam bya ba// gsod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// rnam shes gnas gyur phra men la// rnal 'byor ser nag rtse'u re ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// 
59b4(rnying rgyud): dbugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// thabs kyis mda' drangs g.yas pa na// shes rab bzhu brdungs g.yon pa na// ya ma ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogasu bsam bya ba// nyi ma bsgyel
59b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i gdan steng su// nyon mongs gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byo ra dmar nag pra mo ha// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gni gyon// dpyugs pas gru
59b6(rnying rgyud): blangs ha has bzhad// chu srin rgyal mtshan g.yas pa na// ban da rag ta g.yon pa na// sUr+ya ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su bsom bya ba// zla ba bsgyel ba'i gdan steng su// reg bya gnas gyur phra men ma/ 
59b7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor mthing nag be ta yi// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// dbyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na// stir chung mgo gcod g.yon pa na// tsan
59b8(rnying rgyud): tra ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// me lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// lha byed phra men gnas gyur pa// rnal 'byor dmar nag pu ka si// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shis
60a1(rnying rgyud): dur khrod g.yang gzhi skrag pa gyon// dpyugs pa glu blangs ha has bzhad// sti ra chen po g.yas pa na// tshems par sgyu 'dren g.yon pa na// ag ne ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtsham su
60a2(rnying rgyud): bsam bya ba// bden bral bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyan byed gnas gyur pra men ma// rnal 'byor mthing nag sma sha ni// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing // srog chags chen po g.yang gzhi gyon// dbyugs/ 
60a3(rnying rgyud): pas glu blangs ha ha sa bzhad// stir chung ngu g.yon pa na// tsid tabyung ba g.yas pa na// ni ro ti la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub byang 'tsham su bsam bya ba// rlung lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengasu// snom byed gnas
60a4(rnying rgyud): gyur pra man ma// rnal 'byor ser nag tsan Da li// skra 'bar mche/ dgatsigs rkan brdabs shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i smag pa gsol// dbyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// stir chu ngu g.yas pa
60a5(rnying rgyud): na rab nad bcad pa g.yon pa na// ba ya be la brkyang bskum bzhug sa// byang shar 'tshamasu bsam bya ba// dbang ldan bsgyel ba 'i gdan stengs su// myong byed gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor
60a6(rnying rgyud): ljang nag g+has ma ri// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing // stir chen po'i shun pa gsol// dbyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// band rag ta g.yas pa na// rtse gsum 'khrug pa g.yon pa na// i shwa ra
60a7(rnying rgyud): la brkyang bskum bzhugs// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rim du// smug nag 'bar ba'i bar khyams na// gsang ba'i mkha' las skur bskyed pa// shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// dri za bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// kun gzhi/ 
60a8(rnying rgyud): yul las gnas gyur pa// phra men thogs med seng ge'i gdong // rnal 'byor ser nag seng ge ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis bsnol nas shin tu 'gying // stir chen po sdug cing gsol/ 
60b1(rnying rgyud): in dra yel brkyang bskub bzhugs// lho yi phyogs su bas ma bya ba// gul bum bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// rnam shes yul laganas gyur pa// 'dra men dpa' bo stag gi gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag bya grim/ 
60b2(rnying rgyud): mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis gyad kyi 'dor tshul gyis// stir chung bsgyur nas 'bru tshugs lta// ra tri'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba/ 
60b3(rnying rgyud): yi dgas bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyon mongs yul la gnas gyur pa// 'phra men rtog 'dul wa yi gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag srig ma// mchi gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis
60b4(rnying rgyud): stir chen nang grol 'dru// hri 'di gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba// gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// reg bya yul la gnas gyur pa// 'phra men btang snyom
60b5(rnying rgyud): sprang mo'i gdong // rnal 'byor mthing nag shon ma// mche gcig/ sa rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis rol pa chen/ po yis// ster phyed mar gtsal nas gsol// yak+Sha'i gdan pa
60b6(rnying rgyud): brkyang bskum bzhugs// shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan sdengasu// lta byed yul las gnas gyur pa// 'phra men gzi brjid bya rgod gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag kri tam// 
60b7(rnying rgyud): mchu bdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// zangs gri rnon po g.yas pa na// rgyu zhags drang ba g.yon pa na// rAk+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshamasu bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i
60b8(rnying rgyud): gdan stengs su// nyan byed yul la gnas gyur pa// 'phra men gsal byed dur bya'i gdong // rnal 'byor rnal ma kang ka ma// mchu bdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung stong smad g.yA/ 
61a1(rnying rgyud): g.yon na// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phrag la bkal// rAk+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// 
61a2(rnying rgyud): snom byed yul la gnas gyur pa// 'phra men sa le bya rog gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag kha kha ma// mchu ba dang rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// zangs gri dmar po g.yas pa na// ban da rag ta/ 
61a3(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa na// rAk+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar mtshamasu bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// myong byed yul la gnas gyur pa// 'phra men rdzogs byed 'ug
61a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gdong // rnal 'byor ljang nag hu lu ma// mchu ba dang rkan dbardabs g.yang gzhi gsol// rdo rje lcags kyu g.ya sa pa na// stir chung spyi 'joms g.yon pa na// rAk+Sha sa la brkyang
61a5(rnying rgyud): bskum bzhugs// 'bar ba'i bar khyams tha ma la// thongaskam 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// zhing chen bsnol ba'i ga dan stengs su// shar gyi phyogasu bsam bya ba// nyul byed yul
61a6(rnying rgyud): las gnas gyur pa// spongar byed chen mo mi bzang ma// sna tshogs 'gyur ba'i sku mdog ma// zhing chen rol pa'i skrag pa gsol// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// dpyugs pas glu blangs sred gsum
61a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar/ ha ha gad mos ye shes rol// nyi zer zhags pa g.yas pa na// band rag ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba// mi mgon
61a8(rnying rgyud): thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed chen mom dung thung 'phen// rnal 'byor ser nag nyul chen ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mi yi ga yang gzhi gos su gyon// dbyugs pas grung
61b1(rnying rgyud): srid gsum sbyas// gang bgang mos pa rnams spyod// rdo rjem du thung g.yas pan// banang rag tagayon pa na// ro rlung steng du brkyang bsum bcugs// rub kyi phyogs su bas ma bya ba// chos
61b2(rnying rgyud): dbyings las gnas gyur ba// spor byed rdo rje dril 'khrol ma/ rnal 'byor mtshan du med pa'i sku// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// chos nyid dbyings kyin bza' gsol// dbyugs
61b3(rnying rgyud): bos gru grangs stong khams spong // ha ha'i gdamis dbyings su sbyor// gsung bsgrags dril bu g.yas pa na// banang rag ta g.yon pa na// r-i rlan steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su bsam
61b4(rnying rgyud): bya ba// lha min thub pa gnas gyur pa// spong byed thong phreng skur mnga'i gdong // rnal 'byor sngon gnyul chen ma/ srog chags chen po'o g.yang ga ni gyon// ral pa kham nag gyen
61b5(rnying rgyud): du'abang // dbyugs pas glu blangs khams gsum sbyangs// ha ha gad mos lha min sngar// rdo rje skar mda' gal/ sa pan// banang rag ta g.yon pa na// ro rlan steng du
61b6(rnying rgyud): brkyang bskum bzhugs// shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// lha 'dul thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed khyung thogs gnod sbyin ma// rnal 'byor mthing nag nyul chen ma// 'jigs byed g.yang
61b7(rnying rgyud): gzhi gos su gyon// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// dpyugs pas glu blangs stong khams grags// ha ha gad mos lha rnams sbar// rdo rje khyung chen g.yas pa na// ban da rag ta
61b8(rnying rgyud): g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba// yi dgas thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed me khyer grogs phreng 'dzin// rnal 'byor dmar
62a1(rnying rgyud): nag nyung chen ma// yi dgas 'grin rings g.yang gzhi gyon// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// dbyugs pas glu blangs snang srid sbyangs// ha ha'i gad mo yi dgas sngar/ 
62a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje glog 'phreng g.yas pa na// band rag ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub byang mtshamasu bsam bya ba// byol song thub pa gnas gyur pa/ spor byed 'jigs
62a3(rnying rgyud): chen skrag sha rdebs// rnal 'byor smug nag nyul chen ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// smag chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gyon// dpyugs pas glu blangs stong khams grags// ha ha'i gad mos byol
62a4(rnying rgyud): song spor rdo rje smag sha g.yas pa na// band rag ta g.yo na pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang / ru mtshams su bsam bya ba// dmyal mgon thub pa gnas
62a5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa/ spong byed gshin rje ral gri skra// rnal 'byor sngo nag nyu/ la chen ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// gshin/ rjeg yang gzhi gos gyon// dpyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum
62a6(rnying rgyud): sbyangs pa'i gang mos dmyal ba sbar// rdo rje ral gri g.yas pa na// banod dag ta g.yon pa na// ro rAn steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi la// phyin ci log bzhi gnas gyur pa/ 
62a7(rnying rgyud): shar gyi sgor ni bsam bya ba// phag chen po yi gdan stengs su// rta gdong srin mo'i g.yang gzhi gsol// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na// band rag ta g.yon pa na// phag chen po
62a8(rnying rgyud): yi gdan stangs su// stobs chen khro bo chen po dang // 'khril pa chen po'i tshul du bzhugs// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir ltas pa'o// lho yi sgor ni bsam bya ba// ra gdong chen mo'i gdan ste
62b1(rnying rgyud): ma kyi ya ga na/ thugs sags smra/ 'a na pa yon pa/ ga na gas ldaH/ dz+nyA shA me nga/ 
62b2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i dul gyis bltas pa'o// nub kyi sgor ni bsam bya ba// bum rna chen mo'i gad stengs su// dreng gdong chen mo ga yang gni byin// lcags sgeg ma 'ang
62b3(rnying rgyud): g.yas pan// banang rlon pa g.yon pa na// srin po bum na'i gdan stangs su// khri chen rnamagrin chen po dang // 'khril po chen po'i tshul gyis su// rnam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o/ 
62b4(rnying rgyud): byang gi sgor ni bsam bya ba// gsus po che yi gdan stengs su/ spyang gdong chen mo g.yang gni gyon// dril bu thal byed g.ya sra pa na// ban da rlon pa g.yon pa na// gsus po che yi
62b5(rnying rgyud): gdan stengs su// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang // 'khA la ba chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyi blta/ sa pa'o// ho badz+ra gurgya tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po'i de kho na/ 
62b6(rnying rgyud): nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las bdud btul ba dang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi che ba'i yon tan phyogs bcur gsal ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// 
62b7(rnying rgyud): de nas dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yang dag par grags shing dam tshig rjes su 'dzin pa'i dgongs partser chib nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // bru bi shwa
62b8(rnying rgyud): kro d+ha badz+ra dz+wa la maN TA la tsakra hU~M paT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la du tri tsakran+dan// sUr+ya can drang dwe de pa tiSh+Tha nAn// hUM hUM haha hU hU badz+ra ma hA shrI hi ru ka ma hAn na \u0f7f sarba duny+dzan da ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ hUbadz+rad+ha
63a1(rnying rgyud): ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga mA hA shri he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TA na da ka ha na da ha pa tsa hU~M phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga to bud d+ha ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT
63a2(rnying rgyud): oM tre rad na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsan Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ tAM sur+ya rad na ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM hrI pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na daha pa tsa hUM phaT/ 
63a3(rnying rgyud): hri shwa pad+ma ba mu ka ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ ha karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsan Da sarba duSh+TA na da ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ karma ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ badz+ra kai'u ri ha/ badz+ra tse'u ra~M ha/ 
63a4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra pra mo hA ha/ badz+ra be ta li ha/ badz+ra pu ka si ha/ badz+ra su sha ni ha/ badz+ra tsan Da li ha/ badz+ra sing ha mu ka/ he/ badz+ra bya gri mu ka he/ badz+ra si la mu ka he/ badz+ra shon mu ka he/ 
63a5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kri ta mu ka he/ badz+ra kang ka mu ke he/ badz+ra kha kha mu kha he/ badz+ra ru lu ka mu ka he/ badz+ra Ar+ya te tsi ting tsa/ badz+ra a mo g+ha hU~M/ badz+ra a lo ka ba/ badz+ra bsI pA la ya ba to haM/ e h+ye ha hra
63a6(rnying rgyud): ta Ar+ya ni tsa tu ra ba ya phaT/ badz+ra be yo gi pra ti Ar+ya ni tsa tur thA ya hU~M phaT/ badz+ra mu a ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya pa ne shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a sum pa a ni ba shi kar
63a7(rnying rgyud): phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni tra su ba shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu tri ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a du br-i ti a ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ e h+ye hi a na ya ho/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU/ 
63a8(rnying rgyud): dzadrub so/ badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM phaT ces gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis stong gsum gyi dkyil 'khor khyab par dus gcig khyab par grags pa dang / dam nod pa bka' nyan gyi tshogs ma'i srin mo la sogs pa/ 
63b1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis kyangs sa'i srog gi snying po phul lo// badz+ran nu rdzasi/ badz+ra na badz+ra d+ha/ badz+ra ba sna ba/ badz+ra bi ga lam badz+ra ka ma raM/ badz+ra yin dran/ badz+ra su ra ya tra/ badz+ras
63b2(rnying rgyud): du mya/ badz+ra a prita/ badz+rad ta/ badz+ra kA si/ badz+ra bak+Sha sa~M/ badz+ra tiH/ badz+ra ru tshe/ badz+ra mi ka tsar/ badz+ra ma no ha/ badz+ras ni dzA \u0f7f/ badz+ra ba ya d+ya/ badz+ra ma hA mar man/ badz+re ag na
63b3(rnying rgyud): ye badz+ra tsa mun tI/ badz+ra bu dran/ badz+ra pa ru ni/ badz+ra ma hA ka la/ badz+ra tig+na ba~M/ badz+ra lam po d+ha ra/ ye shes rgyal po dgongs su gsol// khrol khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs
63b4(rnying rgyud): rje khro dpa la rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rmad po che de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ 8/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho// badz+ra sa ma ya phaT/ a li u
63b5(rnying rgyud): li ta li ta pa li de staM kho na ro tri kha raM yo ga ni kha ra hUM ha he phaT ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu kun// tshig cing 'bar bas thams cad khyab// gsung gi khro tshags
63b6(rnying rgyud): chen po yis// kun tu khyab cing gang gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir/ nges par brjod pa 'di brjod do// 
63b7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// gru tshad bzhis brgyan par khyams dang / gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum gyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs
63b8(rnying rgyud): nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa dem gyi sper bas ni// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs pa// dregs pa chen po gtum tshogs mnan// 
64a1(rnying rgyud): gdan du byas te sku bzhugs pa// sdug nag sngonag ser nag dang // dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu dgu phyag ni bco brgyad dang // dbu gsum phyag
64a2(rnying rgyud): drug zhabs bzhir dgung// rngam bi'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// sdug lug sbrul dang nyi mar chas// stir che chung nang zhags dang // khyung dang yid bzhin nor bu dang // stong gi 'jig rten khor
64a3(rnying rgyud): yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // ral gri dgra sta bshol las sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang // btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang
64a4(rnying rgyud): spor byed chen mo brgyad rnams dang // dbyug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyar mdzes pa dang // lha gras kyu la sogs thod pas mdzes// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshigs/ 
64a5(rnying rgyud): bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag/ char chas// ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas zhes gsungs pa/ dang // 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du// sku gsung
64a6(rnying rgyud): thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang zhing khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po de nyid don yod pa'i 'bras bu chen po dam tshig chen pos gzung ba'i phyir 'da' bar
64a7(rnying rgyud): dka' ba'i dam tshig rdo rje 'di gsungs so// bla med mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir sgra mi bya// rtsa ba'i dam
64a8(rnying rgyud): tshig chen po na// rdeng chen bcu yi don rtogs kyang // rtsa ba gsum po mi 'da'o// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis ni// gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal phra dog mi spang ngo // dkar
64b1(rnying rgyud): ci dmar rtsi drig chu// dag pa'i snod bcud ma dor ro// spyi pa la bcu yi mnga' brnyes kyang // yan lag bcu po mdor ro// gzhan yang yan lag dam tshig rnams// 'da' bar mi mdzad rdo rje dang/ 
64b2(rnying rgyud): sa ma ya ni rdo rje che// mi 'da' rgyal ba nyid kyi dam// bsam rdzogs lhun grub tshe mthar phyin// srid gsum dag pa dbang chen sbyar// mi 'jigs kun tu bzang por spyod// theg pa mtha' yas 'dul ba'i thadra// 
64b3(rnying rgyud): ji snyed sdoms pa mtha' yas pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis rdzogs// nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // tshe thung bsam pa log pa dang // mya ngan sdug bsngal chen po dang // dmyal ba
64b4(rnying rgyud): nyid ni rdo rje byed// dgu rdzogs bcu ldan gsum gyis sbyangs// bskang ba la sogs mtha' yas mchog/ ces gsungs pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis
64b5(rnying rgyud): 'dul bar 'gyur ro// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las 'jigs khyed chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang dam tshig rdo rje'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
64b6(rnying rgyud): 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid chos thams cad man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i ngang du snyigs ma med par byungs btab pa'i phyir gsung thugs bla ma chen po'i
64b7(rnying rgyud): thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // byang chub sems kyi bde chen la// rgyu rkyen rten dang len bcas pa'i// skyon med thig le chen po las// ma rtogs pa dang
64b8(rnying rgyud): log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge tshig la rab rten te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin
65a1(rnying rgyud): pa ston pa rjo thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil
65a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig le dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// byed pa rigs kyi gtso bo ste// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa
65a3(rnying rgyud): rnams bdag nyid chen po lhag par rdzogs// thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes chen por rol// ye shes dgyes pa mchog tu 'dul// zad med zag
65a4(rnying rgyud): pa med pa yis// bsod nams ye shes sgyu mar rol// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i dbyings// sku gsung
65a5(rnying rgyud): yon tan phrin las thugs// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams ca/ da kun// ma lus bdag gis dbang sgyur ro// dbang sgyur la/ shes rol pa yis// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor rdzogs/ 
65a6(rnying rgyud): rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa chen po yis// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus 'byung // 
65a7(rnying rgyud): phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor ma lus sgrol// bya ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor
65a8(rnying rgyud): bas rang 'byung kun nas lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// rgyu rkyen rten dang ldan pa yi// thams cad byang chub sems kyi dbyings// byang chub
65b1(rnying rgyud): sems kyi bde chen gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyings su thim// thig le chen po bla ma las// sgyum byang chub lam du bstan// skyon dang yon tan thams cad kyang // byang chub thig le nyid kyi dang // spyod pa rnam pa gnyi
65b2(rnying rgyud): kyi yang / thig le chen po'i lam dunges// sgyu ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor yang // thig le chen po'i dbyings su sbyor// sdom po rnam pa bcu gsum dang // spyi yi dam tshig mtha' yas pa// thig le chen po'i nga du/ 
65b3(rnying rgyud): gsal/ snod bcud 'jig rten ma lus pa// thig le nyid kyi rol pa'i dbyings// tshogs chen rnam pa gnyis po yang // byang chub sems kyi dbyings nges// gzhal yas khang dang rgyan rnams dang // cho 'phrul byang chub/ 
65b4(rnying rgyud): sems su thim// khro tshogs bdud 'dul rol pa yang // byang chub sems su nges pa yin// 'gro drug sems can gsum po yang // ye shes drug dang sku gsum du// nges pa'i thig le chen po
65b5(rnying rgyud): yin/  lnga yi rten dang rkyen bzhi yang // dbyings kyi ma dang dus kyi srid thig le chen po'i ngang du 'dus// snga phyi gsum dang yod medakhams// sku gsung thugs su nges bstan pa'i// thig le byang chub sems
65b6(rnying rgyud): su nges 'phung po khams dang skye mched kyang // phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis po yang // thig le nyid las gzhan na med// bzhi yi wa dang gcig po yang // thig le sems kyi ngang du gsal// 'gro ba'i don du 'byung ba yi// dgu dang stong
65b7(rnying rgyud): phrag brgya bcu bzhi// byang chub sems las gzhan na med// bde skying sdug bsngal mang po yang // rtogs pa bde chen dbyings kyi don// ye shes ye shes rol pa yang // rdo rje snying po'i dbyingasu nges// kun bzang rdo rje
65b8(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' dang // dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams// nyag cig yab tu nges par rdzogs// thar pa'i lam mchog dbyings kyi yum// kun tu bzang mo la sogs kyang // thig le ma yi ngang du gsal// gzhal yas khang
66a1(rnying rgyud): dang kyil 'khor dang / bzhugs gnas khyad par mang po yang // ye shes chen po gan su bsdu// mchod pa'i rgyan dang los spyod kun// rigs pa'i byang chub sems chen po// cho 'phrul chen po'ong
66a2(rnying rgyud): du 'dus rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi ngo bo dang // chos so cag gi rang bzhin rnams// byang chub sems su nges pas ni// dkar nag las kyis ma gsung so// byang chub sems kyi bde chen ni// ci yang med las cir yang snang // 
66a3(rnying rgyud): ces kyang ma bcos g.yung drung sku// cir mi mdzad la thams cad sgrol// dmigs pa med par kun la khyab// ma bskos rgyal po yang dag pa// ma sbyangs ye shes snying po che// ma bsgoms gcig car don gnyis rdzogs// 
66a4(rnying rgyud): ma bsgrubs rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// ma sbyangs skyon dang yon tan med// tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon te// sangs rgyas nyid kyis rnyed par dka'// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rnyed nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil
66a5(rnying rgyud): 'khor spyod// spyod pas 'gro ba sgrol ba ste// de la nyes pa'i skyon mi mang2/ zhes gsungs pas/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i nga bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas stug pos
66a6(rnying rgyud): brgyan pa'i rkyen nyid du bzhugs so// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las man ngag snying po byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// de nas yang ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs
66a7(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa'i phrin las chen po 'di ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ched du sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo // e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtum chen
66a8(rnying rgyud): rngam pa la// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje'i bur bas gdab// rdul du byas nas tshogs la 'a
66b1(rnying rgyud): e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bcings gyur bskyod nas phyogs bcur g.yos// mos 'gyur gas te tshig par 'gyur// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i gzi brjid ldan// 
66b2(rnying rgyud): chen la chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsum yang dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma meng du bcas par bya// rdo rje chags pa'i bur pas gdab// chags pa'i tshigs la thim par
66b3(rnying rgyud): dngul/ baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// ci 'dod de bzhin byed par 'gyur// ma yi tshigs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro'i gzi chen la// dga' ba'i yid kyis
66b4(rnying rgyud): mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam kha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud lnga'am bas lnga la// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/ nga rgyal dga' 'phro bur bas gangab// rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar brtags
66b5(rnying rgyud): yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sprul bsdams nas/ gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro// yid bzhin na mkha'i/ mkha' dang mnyam// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog
66b6(rnying rgyud): gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tshe ba la// dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// gtum chen rngam po'ang lha ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// gtum chen 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ ldan ner gsal ba'i
66b7(rnying rgyud): phur pas gdab// 'bar ba lha ne'i tshogs la dbul// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// 'bar ba lha ne'i byin gyis khyab// thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur// aHthams cad rdzogs
66b8(rnying rgyud): pa chen po ste// las su ma gyur gcig kyang med// las kyi khyad par rdzogs pa yi// srid pa gsum du bsdus pa rnams// byin gyis ma brlabs gcig kyang med// rdzogs pa chen po'i 'phrin las kyis// sbyangs pas/ 
67a1(rnying rgyud): bsam rdzogs lhun gyis grub bo// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag ma kha chu 'dod pa sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrubs te// gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs te// dro
67a2(rnying rgyud): gar glu tshig chen mos ni// ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad kun// thams cad ma lus byed pa yin// mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs te// blo gar glu tshig chen mos ni// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod
67a3(rnying rgyud): na 'phel bar byed// spos me chen mo la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// rmongs par 'dod na rmongs par byed// mos par 'dod na mos par byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// 
67a4(rnying rgyud): thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// nga bzhad sdong chen mo la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// a/ 
67a5(rnying rgyud): spor byed chen mo la sogs te// nyul byed chen mo brgyad rnams la// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la nyul bar byed// ma lus gnas nas spongar bar byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshigs/ 
67a6(rnying rgyud): bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// sbad cing gtang bar bya ba ste// thams cad ma lus byed pa yin// ljon shing dang ni lcug phran tshal// sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu// dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang // khros pas ka li/ 
67a7(rnying rgyud): rab tu bya// zhes gsungs pas phrin las rnam pa bzhi sti ra'i rnga dang bcas par phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po 'jigs byed chen po de nyid dam tshig ste
67a8(rnying rgyud): ra'i rnga bram rdung zhing ste re rngam pa'i mdangs 'di phyung ngo // e ya tshogs chen 'byam pa ru// ste ra'i rnga chen sgra bsgrags pas// hUM ha he phaT sgra 'byin cing // yig 'bru brgyad kyi byin rlabs kyis// ru lu hU b+h+yo'i gsung smraH/ 
67b1(rnying rgyud): pa/ khro bo rngam pa'i sgra skad kyis// srid pa gsum char bshig nas kyang // stong gsum bsgral pa'i sgra 'byin pa'o// snyir rje chen 'di brdungs pas// gnod sbyin srin po kun bsgral te// mu stegs kun gyi snying las
67b2(rnying rgyud): 'byin// stir 'i rje chen 'di bsgrags pas// stong gsum khro ba'i tshogs kyis bkang // kun kyang rnga brdung di r-i// rnga sgra chen pos stong gsum shig/ rngardu sgra chen pos bdud dpung bsgral// rnga sgra chen pos sring gsum stu/ 
67b3(rnying rgyud): dusgra chen pos sgra bgegs 'dul// rngasgra chen pos ngan song sbyangs// rnga sgra 'drug gi sgra bsgrags pas// na rag dmyal khams stongs par byed// rnga sgra stug chen ri rab rnyil// stir rnga chen skra phyung bas// phyin ci log rnams
67b4(rnying rgyud): snying mang 'byin// rnga chen 'drug gi sgra bsgrags shing // rngathabs dbyig stong 'grub bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam skang // ma mo mkha' gra 'das tshig bskangs// rnal 'byor rnam ldan
67b5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig bskul// snyir rje chen 'di brdungs pas// nyan thos mdo sde gnas nas spar// rang rgyal lta ba dbyings su sgrol// s+t+wa~MTarje chen 'di bsgrags pas// lha dang ma'i theg pa yang // bla med
67b6(rnying rgyud): theg pa'i dbyings su btsud // stir rnga sgra 'di sgrags pas// stong khams sti ra'i rnga sgras bkang // kun kyang rnga brdung dirari ri// rnga thabs glog stong lce 'byin cing // rnga skad 'brug stong sgra sgrogs pas// byin rlabs
67b7(rnying rgyud): lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs// stong gsum 'khrug cing srid gsum 'thor// rnga thabs g.yab mor bor ba dang // kha dang ka yi ru mtshon gyis// thams cad gnam lcags chen pos btab// ka la chen po la sogs te// rdo rje/ 
67b8(rnying rgyud): chags 'og ldegs pa'i rnams// dus gcig tu ni tsita ta 'byin// stir chen po'i rnga sgra yis// srid pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bskyil// dus gcig tu ni dbang chen rdzogs// rnga sgra rin chen khang pa brtsegs// bsam rdzogs
68a1(rnying rgyud): tshe la dbang thang thob// rnga sgras g.yo ba med par byed// chos la 'dzud pa'i sgra yang 'byin// rnga sgras ci 'dod dgongs pa rdzogs// byang chub sems ltar de ma thag/ ces gsungs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
68a2(rnying rgyud): thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sbyor bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po man ngag gi snying po dang bcas pa de la shin tu rngam pa'i gdangs kyis
68a3(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so// hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i ma ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche bzang lag za byed che// hoHhUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug
68a4(rnying rgyud): stong ldir// tug chen ri rab 'bum rnyil skad// a la la yi ga nga rgyangs che// dbyugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che// ho hUM khro po'i shes rab 'ong po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal/ 
68a5(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i ye shes kun tu 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le/ che// ho hUM khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil/ 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// 
68a6(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che// ho hUM bdud rnams kun gyis bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po gangadal ba che// hUM rdo rje drag chen sra
68a7(rnying rgyud): ba po// rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che// ho hUM stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// 'jig sa byed mtshon du med pa'i sku// sna tshogs gsung dang sna tshogs thugs/ 
68a8(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed rngam pa'i ye shes gter// tshe shes blangs pas stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs byed chen po rnams dbyer med pas mnyes par gyur to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las lhun gyis grub pa'i
68b1(rnying rgyud): phrin las dang yongs su mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i don// gsang ba kun gyi bla ma ste// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po yin// nges don
68b2(rnying rgyud): chos kyi snying po las// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'phros te// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun yang // 'byung nas ga/ 
68b3(rnying rgyud): las nges par 'bebs// 'gro drug sems can gsum po yang // stan chen po'i dbyings su bsten// ling ga pad+mar bcas pa yang // 'ga' na chen po'i dbyings su sbyar// snang sring kha dog mang po yang // 'ga'
68b4(rnying rgyud): na chen po'i lam du bstan// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// rta dgas nas smra bar gang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs/ rtag tu byang chub sems la gnas// tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon sangs rgyas
68b5(rnying rgyud): nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'a/ grub// ces gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes te/ mnyam pa
68b6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi dbyings na lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las garjeng chen po'o le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgyu
68b7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las lung gi spyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par 'phros pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog
68b8(rnying rgyud): rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya many+dzu shrI karma tsad ta ri tsakra gu h+ya tan tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal ye shes
69a1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di ska bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen por gyur te/ yum chen mo dang gnyis su med pa'i mkha' la bzhugs pa la 'dis
69a2(rnying rgyud): steng 'khor khro bo dang khro mo dang / ma mo dang mngag gzhugs dang / 'bangs la sogs pa rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa chen po la 'dud pa'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das btsun mo dang gnyis su
69a3(rnying rgyud): med par gyur/ skye 'gag dang bral ba'i don 'di ston to// ye nas ma skyes gshin rje chen po'i tshogs// rnam dag dbyings kyi rang nyid rnam par dag pa la// gnyis med 'dus pa'i sras mchog gshin rje gshed// thabs dang shes
69a4(rnying rgyud): rab rnam par dag pa yi// kun gyi ye shes thams cad 'dus pa ste// thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// sems can ma lus mya ngan 'das pa'i lam// ye shes thams cad de yi ngang la rdzogs// 'kho
69a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i nyes skyon thams cad tshar gcad phyir// 'dod chags 'dus pa/ 'i dpal ldan gar gyi bdag/ bye ba phrag brgya dpag tu med par yang // 'dul ba'i dbang gis de lta bu yi gzugs su bstan zhes/ 
69a6(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas 'khor gyi khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa thams cad mgu bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen po la 'di skad ces gsol ba btab po// sems can 'khor bas gdungs pa
69a7(rnying rgyud): larnga mya ngan 'das pa'i lam mchog bstan// bstan pa dam pa 'di gsungs pas// thams cad sgrol ba ngo mtshar che// zhes gsol to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yum dang gcig tu 'dus te/ 'di skad ces
69a8(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// sprul pa'i sku dag tshad med dpag tu med// thun mongs ma yin 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// sku gsungs thugs kyi phrin las rmad du byung // mi dge bcu dang mtshams med tshar gcad pa// zug rngu mi
69b1(rnying rgyud): mnga' chos nyid rmang po che// chos kyi sku dang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// sprul pa'i sku dang gsum ni don dam kun tu sbyor// phyogs bcu bde bar gshegs pa thugs kyi dpal// yang dag ye shes dpal yin 'jam dpal
69b2(rnying rgyud): yin zhes bstod de gnyis su med par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa de la 'khor gyis de bzhin du gsol ba la dgyes te/ 'di skad ces gsungs so// zhi ba gnyis med chos kyi ngang nyid las// snying po
69b3(rnying rgyud): gnyis med byang chub sems dpa'i don// thams cad 'dus pa'i bla med dam pa ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po 'di bshad do// oM sarba ta thA ga ta e h+ya hi ta thA ga ta pra ba ti/ bo d+hi satwa d+harma d+har du e h+ya hi dzi hUM h+yaH
69b4(rnying rgyud): d+hu/ zhes brjo sa/ 'das mtshan par byu'o// de/ das bcom ldan das steng gi phyogs su sems can thams cadasnab ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa rnams par bzhugs sa// rnams par
69b5(rnying rgyud): zhugs pas phyogs la phyogs su bltas ste/ rang bzhin gyis sgrom ba'i nus pa can du gyur te/ thams cad kyang sgrol bar gyur// de nas yum gyi tshogs thams cad kyis dgyes pa chen po'i brda' 'dis
69b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la bskul lo// e mdo phyogs bcu dus gsum rdzogs pa yi// ye shes 'dus pa'i phrin las mchog/ bla med theg pa nges pa la// sbyor ba mchog gis bshang du gsol// zhes
69b7(rnying rgyud): bskul bas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par gyur to// de nas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dbang phyug gi 'khor mya ngan las 'das pa thams cad dang bcas nas sku'i brgyan gyis
69b8(rnying rgyud): brgyan te/ so so'i btsun mo'i dgyes pas sku'i nyams su btang bar gyur to// de ltar gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad baspu langs ste/ 'di skad ces ched du brjod do// sku gsung thugs rnams 'gro ba
70a1(rnying rgyud): so sor 'dul// rang gis zhi ba'i dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // phrin las rnam bzhis 'gro ba so sor 'dul// de phyir mchog gi rgyal po 'di bshad do// zhes gsungs pas 'khor rnams rab tu/ 
70a2(rnying rgyud): dga' mgu rangs par gyur te 'di skad ces gsol to// sku gsung thugs kyis 'gro ba rang rang 'dul// dbyings las 'dren pa rdo rje gsor byas te// 'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad pa ngo mtshar che zhes brjod do// sku
70a3(rnying rgyud): la zhugs nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khro bos 'dul bar mkhyen nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// khwa dang spyang ki srin mo mu stegs rnams// bdud dang log 'dren thams cad tshar/ 
70a4(rnying rgyud): gcad phyir// chos nyid sgyu ma lta bu sprul nas phrin las mdzad ces gsungs pas 'khor rnams ngo mtshar du gyur te/ 'di skad du/ e ma'o che ba'i yon tan kun la khyab pa la// ngang gri
70a5(rnying rgyud): khro bor bstan pa 'di lta bu// ngo mtshar rmad byung sprul pa 'di// lta bu// rab tu mi srin 'dul ba ngo mtshar che// zhes ga/ sol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ma bskul bar 'di skad
70a6(rnying rgyud): ces gsungs so// khyad par rim par bstan pa'i khro gnyer ni// ye shes dbyings kyis kun la khyab par ston// khro bo bzhi dang brgyad dang bcu la sogs// ston pa mchod phyir khro song sa stan/  bya sa tsha
70a7(rnying rgyud): ba yi bye drag sor rab tu shes bya la// mtshan ma drag po zhi ba dbang dang rgyas// go rims bzlog ste rab tu bshad par bya// lte bar bcas pa'i rtsibs can la// 'khor ba btsod byed rtse mo can// gru gsum e yin
70a8(rnying rgyud): brang la/ zla gas rnam gsum dbang gi tshul// mu khyud dang can rgyas pa phyi// rnam bzhir ldan pa'i 'khor lo la// rab tu mdzes pa'i thig gdab bo// dbus su ma he'i zhing gdan la// rtse dbus zhing brkyang
70b1(rnying rgyud): re re lo rus pa tshogs kyi tharlabs brag tu spungs/ rag ta khrag gi rba glong mtsho lta bu/ gnam lcags ngung mo rab tu ta la la/ dur khrod rab tu brgyan pa de bsham mo// dbus su khro rgyal gshin rje ga shes/ 
70b2(rnying rgyud): sku ni nag po dug 'dral// dbu gsum dkar dmar mthing ba ste/ ral pa kham nag srid rtser 'bar// rtse la me 'bar rked nas zhag kyang 'dzag/ rtsa ba chu ste sdang mig rab tu bskrad// phyag drug phyag mtshan
70b3(rnying rgyud): bsnams pa'i thor tshugs ni// sdibs 'dzub rgyu zhags lcags kyu g.yas// dung chen mdung thung gsal shing g.yon// zhabs bzhi thur du bstan pa ni// brkyang bskum tshul gyis 'gro ba dbang du sdud// 
70b4(rnying rgyud): sku stong glang chen ko bzhing drag la// sku smad stag ste sham thabs tsham ngam can// e yis pho brang dbus su'o// yum yang yangab dang sku 'thun te// pho brang dbus su g.yon du'o// zhal
70b5(rnying rgyud): gcig phyag gnyis mche ba can// khram bam ban d+ha bsnams pa'o// rtsel khro bo yab yum bcu// rab tu khros pa'i sdang mig/ can// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya// zla ga ma dur khrod ma mo/ 
70b6(rnying rgyud): ste sgol de bzhin bsrung ba'o// de la rim pas mgu bar bya// zhes brjod de/ 'di sku gsung thugs las phyung ngo // oM a kro many+dzu shrI mu/ hUM badz+ra kro d+ha b+hi nan hUM/ oM badz+ra be ta le rag shamaH
70b7(rnying rgyud): tsu hu tsu tsu ru hu~M tsu hu hu~M tsu oM ru ru dun oM ya shug b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ dzaHhUM ba ho/ zhes brjod pas/ phyogs bcu thams cad 'khrugs te/ g.yos so// 'gul to// ldeg
70b8(rnying rgyud): go chem mo// bur te g.yo gul du gyur te 'khrugs par gyur to// de nas yum gyis ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs par gsol ba gang ba ste/ gsol bar nus pa/ e ma'o rab tu blo ldan khyod// 'jig rten/ 
71a1(rnying rgyud): 'khrugs par mdzad pa'o// dbang med las kyis man ra ba la// bder gshegs gsung du gsungs pa ste// rab tu bde bar mdzad du gsol zhes glengs pas/ bcom ldan
71a2(rnying rgyud): 'das kyis ting nge 'dzin mchog gi rgyal po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs te 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra na la ka la hU badz+ra ga ta pra be sha ho/ zhes gsungs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag
71a3(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'jam par gyur to// gyur pas sems can thams cad slar sngon kho na bzhin du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshad chen po la skyabs su dong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thabs dang
71a4(rnying rgyud): shes rab kyi phyag rgyas mnyes par bya ba 'di gsungs so// rtse gcig mnyam par gzhag bya ste// sgeg mo g.yon du gnas par bya// bskul ba'i ting 'dzin brlan pa la// bskyod
71a5(rnying rgyud): pa byang chub lam du drangs// gnas nyid bder gshegs skyes/ pa'i rkyen// rtse mo oM la phaT du bstan// zhes pa/ sungs pas/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
71a6(rnying rgyud): rol mos mnyes par gyur to// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsong ba'i rgyud las/ gleng bzhi rtsa ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phrin
71a7(rnying rgyud): las zhi bar bya ba 'di ched du brjod do// rab tu dkar ba'i yul dag la// mgu ba'i sems dang ldan byas te// dang bas mgu ba'i las byas zhes// bla med rgyal bas rab tu bshad// sa gzhi
71a8(rnying rgyud): dkar ba rab mnyam la// gru bzhir ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor la// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs brgyad pa// mkhas pas bsgrims te bri bar bya// dkar dang ldan pa'i zla ba la// gcig nas gsum nas/ 
71b1(rnying rgyud): mgo bcugs la// khams gsum rab tu mgu bya'i phyir// nyams su lon par byas la bsgrub// dbus su ye shes bdag po la// shar du nag 'joms chen po ste// lho ru ya ba ti zhes bya/ 
71b2(rnying rgyud): nub du khro bo dmigs pa la// byang du bdud 'joms dgod par bya// shar lho lho nub nub byang dang // byang shar 'tshams su dgod pa ni// glang mgo khro che gcod skyong rje// las grub brgyad de go rim
71b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin steng 'og dmar po brag dgon bsgrims te dgod// zla gam lam mo gsum rnams so// sgo sgror sgo srungs ma rnams bri// de yi yum dang bcas pa rnams// khro bo nyid dang sku 'thun pa'o// 
71b4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa'i 'dug stangs gnas byas la// sgeg mo g.yon du bsten byas la// sngags g.yog mdzes par tshogs dbyas la// mgu ba'i phrin las brtsam par bya// ske rtse
71b5(rnying rgyud): thal ba rus pa la/ dzam pa la yi gzugs lta bur/ byas la snying khar bri ba ni// a ma pa la si ti 'am// ga nga 'dod pa yi ge de// phaT dang swAhA sa dam ltar bya// ming byang
71b6(rnying rgyud): gong ltar bri byas la// gang ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du gzhag/ de la 'di yang rab tu brjod// oM a kro badz+ra shan ting na ga badz+ra swAhA// oM a kro ta ka shan ting ba la buM zhes brjod la snying khar brgyab na/ thams
71b7(rnying rgyud): cad mgu nas dang pa'i sems kyis zhi bar 'gyur ro// de nas ni ba'i las byas zin nas/ phyogs bcu'i gdug pa zhi bar bya ste/ bdag la mi dga' ba med na las 'grub pa yin no// 'phags pa
71b8(rnying rgyud): las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad zhi ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad rgyas pas bya ba 'di ched du brjod do// 
72a1(rnying rgyud): gser las grub pa'i yul dag la'ang // dpal rgyas sems dang ldan byas te// rgyas par bya ba'i sems kyis su// dkyil 'khor dam pa bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor snga/ 
72a2(rnying rgyud): ma bzhin byas la// ba yi tshig chag btab byas te// rnal 'byor dam pa blo ldan pas// thig ni gdab pa rab tu brtsam// gser las grub pa'i thig skud la// dpal ldan 'phel ba'i sems dang
72a3(rnying rgyud): bcas/ slob ma dam pa las grub par// bsams la thig ni gdab par bya// pho brang gsar la rtse mo g.yu// rdo rje rtsig pa gser las grub// gru chad sgo rnams lcag las grub// rnal 'byor sngags
72a4(rnying rgyud): pa blo ldan pas// thig bzhi re'u cha brgyad du 'gyur// mtha' nas thig gdab man ngag can// de la sogs pa bsam par bya// rin chen dkyil dkrung 'dug byas la// dbus su gsang
72a5(rnying rgyud): sngags bdag pos te// phyogs phyogs sgo ba dam pa rnams// snga ma bzhin du bsgoms nas kyang // rang sngags skyes bu de/ bskyed do// oM a kro te ke puSh+pa ba lan hUM/ oM a kro puSh+Ta
72a6(rnying rgyud): tib ta na ste zhes brjod pas bdag po yab yum la// 'khor rnams 'bru re ba las sam// rang rang bskyed pa da pa ste// sngags dang ldan par ting 'dzin gsal// bzhugs dang brtan dang mchod pa dang // 
72a7(rnying rgyud): phyag byed pa la sogs pa yi// las kyi bya ba ma lus par// thams cad ma lus tshang bar bya// skyed dang grub pa'i 'bras bu ni// rgyal ba bsnyen te thag mi ring // rang grub 'bras bu de la sogs// 
72a8(rnying rgyud): phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa yi// dngos grub dam pa rab tu ster zhes// 'dren pa dpa' bos yang dag bshad// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas nas// sa zhag
72b1(rnying rgyud): gser las grub pa la// gzugs ni dam pa rab tu bya// byi kan gan rkyal mnan byas la// nang hUM puSh+Ti a pu tsi swAhA// snying khar bris nas brjod byas pa// snying po sngags kyi dam pa ste// bla med dam
72b2(rnying rgyud): pas rab tu bshad// oM badz+ra puSh+Ti A yu pa shang shrI puSh+TiM swAhA zhes brjod na thams cad rgyas par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ thams cad rgyas par bya ba'i le'u
72b3(rnying rgyud): ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bdag nyid dbang gis 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod do// zangs las 'brel pa'i yul dag la// rang
72b4(rnying rgyud): dbang med de dbang bsdus nas// 'du ba'i sems dang ldan byas te// dkyil 'khor rab tu bshad par bya// zangs sam dmar po'i sa dag la// dkyil 'khor snga ma dag dang 'dra// legs par khod
72b5(rnying rgyud): snyoms zin pa dang // thig ni rab tu gdab par bya// lte ba can la rtsibs brgyad pa// kun tu zlum pas rgyas pa mtha'// lte dbus gzhu rdungs bris byas la// de stengs bdag po dam pa
72b6(rnying rgyud): gzhag/ thams cad ma lus mchog tu 'gugs// sa pa la yang thogs pa med// zhes ni yang dag bla med des// bshad par bya ste rab tu bsten// gzhan yang rab tu bshad bya ba// sems kyi dkyil
72b7(rnying rgyud): 'khor dam pa ste// bla med yang dag nges pa'i lam// sangs rgyas byang chub la sogs rnams// gzhung las 'byung ba'i tshig don rnams// ma nor gsungs pa'i bka' bzhin du// bsgrubs na 'grub par bshad
72b8(rnying rgyud): pa'o// de dag 'gugs par gyur pa na// phal pa gzhan lta smos ci dgos// bsdu dang 'dren pa byang chub lam// 'di dag go 'phang thob bya'i phyir// yungs dkar rkang rjes sa 'am gzhan// khrag gsum
73a1(rnying rgyud): thal chen sdes byas la// ga bu'i nang du blugs byas la// gzhu gnyis ni kha sbyar te// skud pa dmang po rangs la sogs// bcing ba bsdams te dkris byas la// dkyil 'khor gyi ni thog du
73a2(rnying rgyud): gnag yungs dkar zangs gnyis bsreg byas te// dud pas ga bu de la bdug/ de la bdugs par gyur pa dang // bzlas pa'i snying po brjod bya zhing // lan grangs khri tshang du ma ru// brjod na sangs rgyas la
73a3(rnying rgyud): sogs rnams// 'gugs pas gyur na phal pa gzhan// smos ci dgos te nges par 'gugs// oM badz+ra a kro many+dzu shrI ba shang ma hA sarba til bruM// lan grangs mang du brjod byas na// ci ltar bsams pa tham
73a4(rnying rgyud): cad 'gugs// rgya shugs bkrus pa'i khu ba dang // ma yi lag pa'i khu ba gnyis// snga ma bzhin du bkug byas na// 'gugs par 'gyu shes dpa' bos bshad// yang na rang gi lag pa'ang rung na/ 
73a5(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas/ thams cad ma lus par 'dus te/ dper/ na phyogs thams cad nas mtshol sbrang ma 'du ba bzhin du/ 'dus te/ bdag gi dbang du bya ba de dbang du 'gyuraro zhes bcom
73a6(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rjes gsungs// 'phags pa las ba zhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po
73a7(rnying rgyud): gshin rje'i tshogs 'du mdzad de/ rang bzhin gyi mthu can 'di gsungs so// 'byung byed ye shes dkyil 'khor ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin byas la// bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste// yum yang de/ 
73a8(rnying rgyud): bzhin de yi'o// yab yum gnyis med byin brlabs las// thabs dang shes rab 'phro 'du las// thig skud rgyus pa lcags las byas// de ni las kyi thig ces bya// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad
73b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor la phyobs bzhi su khyung bcas// kun du gru bani sgo khrung can// gru chang ldan te dur khrod rgyan// mdzes par bris te gzhan na med// rten pa'i lha ste snga ma bzhin// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di brjod byas pas/ 
73b2(rnying rgyud): bdag dang 'dra bar bskyed par bya// oM a kro te ka hUM a hU badz+ra ba ta li rag sha man/ b+h+yo b+h+ye b+h+yo/ hu~M hu hu hu hu tsu hu hu ru s+ya dzaHhUM baM hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yAM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad
73b3(rnying rgyud): g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul lo// ldeg ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun du rab tu ldeg go// chem chem/ rab tu tshim/ 
73b4(rnying rgyud): kun du rab tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun du rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// dbus mtho na mtha' dma'/ mtha' mtho dan dbus dpa' ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag rab tu g.yos par
73b5(rnying rgyud): gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i bdag nyid des/ 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rab tu gsung gi ga sang sngags gsungs pas bdag cag spro lagaso// 'jig rten du 'di
73b6(rnying rgyud): lta bur mthu can la bdag zhu lags so// bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis khro bar mdzad pa de la bdag mngon du sems can thams cad rab tu yang zhu bar 'tshal lags so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen por 'du/ 
73b7(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa des 'di skad ces gsungs so// oM shrI pa ra yag sha gu ya sarba ti kri badz+ra ka la ru pa ma ra na phaT ces gsungs pas 'jig rten na dbang che ba dang // mthu' che ba la sogs pa thams cad btul nas 'di skad ces
73b8(rnying rgyud): gsungs so// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gang nas kyang // gsung du med pa'i chos nyid la// rang sems 'phro 'dur gyur pa las// phyogs bcur gsungs pa de dag yin// de bas nan tan bskyed byas ste// drag po
74a1(rnying rgyud): tshamangam bshad par bya// 'jig rten bcud kyi gdug pa kun// tsham ngam glog ltar 'gyur ba las// ngo mtshar ya mtshan bsgrag par bya// e ma'o yab yum gnyis med rol pa'i
74a2(rnying rgyud): mkha' dkyil nas// phyogs bcur 'phro ba byang chub sems// rigs kyi yab dang de bzhin btsun mo ni// rtag par bsgoms te de bzhin gshegs par bya// rdzas dang phyag rgya sngags dang bcas rnams ni// 
74a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs dang 'dod pa'i 'bras bu gang 'dod grub par ro// mi dge bcu dang ldan pa'i rnam par 'dren pa der byas te/ sngags dang phyag rgya rdzas rnams dang // ga'u pad+ma dam pa dang // kham pa rdza yi 'ji ba yi// 
74a4(rnying rgyud): khrag sna gsum dang 'gi wang ngo // de dag phrin las mchog yi na te// grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// bla med dpa' bos yang dag gsungs// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus kun// 'dul
74a5(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur te the tsom med// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor logs nga ba'i rgyud las drag po'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// ye shre/ 
74a6(rnying rgyud): lhun gyis grub pa'i ngang la longs spyod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// rang bzhin 'phags pa kun du shes rab ste// de bzhin rnam par mi rtog yin pas na// 'di gnyis chos kyi sku zhes rab tu bshad// chos kyi
74a7(rnying rgyud): longs spyod 'dul ba'i don la rgyas// 'gro ba'i don rdzogs ma lus skur 'byung dang // bdud dang mu stegs srin po gdul ba'i phyir// mtshan dang dpe byad gzugs su sprul nas ni// ma lus tshar gcod don du 'di gsungs so// 
74a8(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad mu khyung grub por bcas// sbrul gyi rgya gram dag gi mthara' bskor la// lte bar rdo rje rgya gram bri bar bya// de yi steng du ka pa la gnyis la// gcig la gshin rjeng bu drug pa yi gzugs// gcig la/ 
74b1(rnying rgyud): yum chen khro gnyer gzugs bris la// nang du dgra bo rkang rjes sa dang ni// dri dang de bzhin khrag sna gsum// thal chen rgya shug bkus nga'i khu ba dang // brdzis la dgra bo'i gzugs byas la// bcug la skud pa dkar pos
74b2(rnying rgyud): bcing / dkyil 'khor thog tu gzhag par bya// oM ya man ta ka hrI Sh+Thing badz+ra kro ta ya man ta ka badz+ra kro ta phaT phaT a zhes brjod pa tsam gyis ni// yab yum sku mdog mthing nag la// dbu skra kham nog ral pa gyen duH
74b3(rnying rgyud): nga thos can du sbrul nag rkun po dang // zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum tshul du bzhugs// phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni// g.yas kyi dang po sngags 'dzub la// rgyu nags lcags kyu bar tha ma// dung chen rje
74b4(rnying rgyud): shul gsal shing g.yon// de ltar cha lugs gsal ba dang / dbyangs 'di blang bar nan tan bya// hUM rngam po'i rgyal po khrag 'a thung gshin rje gshed// khams gsum dbang sdud rtags su zhal gsum
74b5(rnying rgyud): po dbyings nas sprul pa'i yab yum lhun gyis grub// las ngan/ 'khrul pa'i sems can gdul dka' ba// gdug pa de dga'/ dul phyir gshegs su gsol// dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas la/ dzaHhUM
74b6(rnying rgyud): baM hoHsa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ zhes pa lan grangs mang du brjod// des ni brtan par bzhugs par 'gyur// khrag chen rgod khrag sha dang tshal// chen po la sogs gtor ma bsham// de ni dkyil 'khor thog dag tu// bdag nyid ting
74b7(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gsal ba las// sngags 'di 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas// oM badz+ra hasta ba ba he ha dA na hISh+Ti che ge mo ma ra ya hUM hUM phaT phaT/ che ge mo hasta ba bri ti nir te sa hUM hUM phaT phaT/ nyin zhag gcig la 'bum bzlas// nyin zhag
74b8(rnying rgyud): gsum gyi bar du bzlas// de dag bzlas pa rdzogs pa dang // gtor ma'i las dag brtsam bya ste// bskyed dang bskul dang rdzogs pa dang // phyogs bcu'i khro bo spyan drangs te// bzhugs dang brtan dang mi g.yo sogs// ma/ 
75a1(rnying rgyud): lus rdzogs pa'i phrin las bya// de ltar phrin las rdzogs pa dang // yang nas yang du bstab pa bya// de ltar bstab pa byas pa na// dgra bgegs dbang 'gyur smos ci dgos// de nas yang 'di ched du
75a2(rnying rgyud): brjod de gsungs so// oM nga ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// bder gshegs thugs kyi sras yin par// bdud dang srin po log 'dren rnams// ma lus tshar gcod byin brlabs ste// mgon po gshin rje nyid kyi sras
75a3(rnying rgyud): don rnams thams cad ma lus pa// de nyid du ni bsgrub par bya// dgra rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// phrin las rdo rje can gyi mdzod// zhes brjod cing sngags kyis brdeg pa ni// 'phrin las mchog gi rgyal po zhwa
75a4(rnying rgyud): / gsungs so// dus dang dus dang zhag grangs ni// nyi ma gcig la stong rtsa gcig/ nam gyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig/ tho rang thun gci dag brgya rtsa gcig/ srod kyi gung la brgya rtsa gcig/ de ltar nyin zhag
75a5(rnying rgyud): gsum par du// bzlas pa zhag grangs tshang bya zhing // phyag rgya bca' zhing / gzugs la brdeg/ nyal byas na gdon mi za// oM ma ra na kha da/ sarba tISh+Ti ya ma ya/ hUM hUM t+ye kha da pa ran pa la huM huM phaT phaT swA hA/ 
75a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dgra bo'i gzugs la brdeg go// oM badz+ra hU~M khaM s+pha ra na phaT// huM a be sha a/ huM hu~M phaT phaT a/ yang phyag rgya gong ma bcas la/ oM badz+ra kro ta ni la tan du tsu hu tISh+Ti bi kri ta na da nan zhes brjod la
75a7(rnying rgyud): bdag gi lag pas dbang bkur ro// yang phyag rgya bcas la/ sngags 'di la lan grangs mang du bya'o// oM badz+ra tsan Da hrISh+Ti badz+ra stir baM/ kha hi hU~M hUM che ge mo dbang du sdus shig/ hril hril zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do// rdo rje rgya gram
75a8(rnying rgyud): gyi phyag rgyas brdeg go// yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go// oM badz+ra kang ka ma ka la ya na hUM phaT phaT a/ zhes 'bum zlas la rdo rje rtse lnga pa'i phyag rgyas brdeg go// yang phyag rgya bcas la sngags 'dis brdeg go// oM
75b1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra a gu sha tre tha sIr ba cu chu baT paT che ge mo mar ya dza Ta zhes dbang du sdus shing / hu hu phaT phaT zhes lan grangs mang du brjod do// rdo rje gdengs pa'i phyag rgya bcas la dbang du bsdud do// yang phyag rgya bcas la
75b2(rnying rgyud): sngags 'dis brdeg go// oM huM huM phaT phaT 'dus 'dus rang rang yaM yaM re re hring hring du ba b+h+yo hUM phaT che ge mo dun b+h+yo zhes bzlas la/ kha T+wAM ga~M phyag rgyas brdeg go// de ltar las de dag yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge
75b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dang ldan par byas la bzlas pa byas na las ci byas pa thams cad dbang du 'du bar nges zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ ngan sngags
75b4(rnying rgyud): dbang sdud kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//  // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i gshed/ bcom ldan 'das kun la khyab pa'i phrin las bsgrub pa 'di/ sku dang gsu
75b5(rnying rgyud): dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // lnga pung yan lag gzhom pa dang / dug gsum rtsad nas gcad pa dang // 'bras bu rgyal bar bsgru kha bya'i phyir// nan tur phrin las bshad par bya// dang po'i las
75b6(rnying rgyud): ni rgyas dang gsad// dgug dang gtang dang bcing dgrol dang // sbyor ba'i gdug pa ma lus kun// phrin las 'di yid byed par 'gyur// dang por btsal ba'i btsal thabs ni// rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal/ 
75b7(rnying rgyud): stag mo gang la mchod stabs dang // seng ge gangs la 'gying tshul dang // khwa spyang gzan la rgyug tshul dang // bya rgod gzan la 'babs tshul dang // don chen rmi lam rmi tshul dang // khwa sgeg thang shing snyag tshul gyis// ro yi
75b8(rnying rgyud): phung po btsal bar bya// ri la 'dug na 'gying bas btsal// sribs la 'dug la mchod pas btsal// gdags la 'dug na 'dug pas btsal// 'ong na 'dug na 'babs pas btsal// brag la 'dug na rna bas btsal// nags la
76a1(rnying rgyud): 'dug na steg pas btsal// rgyal rigs yin na seng ge gtang // bram ze yin na sdug mo gtang // rje'u rigs yin na bya rgod gtang // rmang rigs yin na dom gyis bya// ma ning yin na spre'u gyis bya// dog
76a2(rnying rgyud): la yin na wa spyang gtang // de ltar ro yi tshol stangs ni// rnam pa drug dang ldan pas btsal// brtags nas 'ongs pa gyur pa dang // gshin rje rgyal po'i tshem ngam bya// khro bo bcu yi stangs stabs kyis// ro la kun du bskor byas/ 
76a3(rnying rgyud): la/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su gzhag/ de ltar gzhag pa'i las byas nas// mgo ni lho nub 'tsham su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// lag pa g.yas pa lho yi phyogs// lag pa g.yon pa nub kyi phyog
76a4(rnying rgyud): rkang pa g.yas pa shar gyi phyogs// rkang pa g.yon pa byang gi phyogs// dade ltar gan rkyal bzhag byas la// da ni phur pa dgod bya ste// mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// lag gnyis rkang gnyis pho mtshan dang // lkog ma de
76a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin snying kha dang // lte ba pus mo dpung pa gnyis// gru mo de bzhin long bu gnyis// mchogs ma de bzhin spyi bo dang // sku dang de bzhin ma chan khung gnyis// dpral ba rnamasu gdab byas la// phur pa de dag lha yi/ 
76a6(rnying rgyud): skur/ rab tu brtags te goms pa dang // rang bzhin gnas nas gshegs pa dang // ting nge 'dzin du bsgoms pa dang // gzugs brnyan nang du bkod pa gsum// tshad pas gdungs pa'i bye ma la// mar zhu de bzhin thim pa bzhin// gnyi
76a7(rnying rgyud): su med par shes bya la// gong du bstan pa'i lha rnams ni// rnam shes bzhi dang dbang po bzhi// de las gyur pa'i yul rnams ni// brgyad po ngang du shes par bya// sgo ma lus la grags pa'o// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i phyir// steng
76a8(rnying rgyud): 'od khro bo de las gyur// de dag kun gyi sku gsung thugs// ma mo gsum gyi nga nyid de// yab ni kun la khyab pa la// yum ni kun la sdud pa ste// bya ba byed pa bdag nyid do// phung po kun la khyab pa la// mnyes pas phul byin lha yi tshigs// 
76b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro drug kun la ma lus snang // de ltar las rnams zin pa dang // zhag grangs du byadam yang bca'// dngos grub thob par 'dod pa yi// rnal 'byor chen po'i ting 'dzin gsal// de ltar byas nas mi la sogs// thams cad dbang du'adu
76b2(rnying rgyud): bar gsungs// dgra bgegs la lta smos ci dgos// drag po'i phrin las grub 'dod pas// dgra po'i ming byang bris byas la// bgyi kha yi nang du bzhugs// rdo rje rgya gram rgya yi gdab// he ru ka yi phyag rgyas mnan// yung kar rgyal
