76b3(rnying rgyud): pos drag tu brdeg/ rgya shug bkus pas drag tu glug/ nyi ma bzhi la drag tu brdeg/ sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi bcad// dam rdzas mchod pa shin tu bgram// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin drag tu bya// yengs na bar chad 'byung bar gyug
76b4(rnying rgyud): g.yeng bar mi mdzad khro bas gsungs// des ni las kyi 'bras bu la dra // shin tu zad pa med pa ste// mkha' la 'phur dang sa la 'dzul// / tshul bying med mngon shes ldan zhes gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen
76b5(rnying rgyud): po las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las ro langs kyi bsgrubs pa/ la ngan sngags kyi phur bus gdab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid rang
76b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin lhun gyis grub pa 'di ched du brjod do// ye shes 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor bskyed steng na// ye shes nyi ma gsal ba'i thig phran gang ba// mu khyud zlum po sbrul gyi zhags pa bri// stegs bu phyogs mtshams phur bus bskor
76b7(rnying rgyud): bar bya/ de ltar bris pa'i dkyil du dgod pa ni// oM ni dbus kyi lte ba la// shar du hri la lho ru s+t+waM// nub phyogs hUM la byang du ha// byang shar 'tshams su dza zhes pa// shar lo trai la lho nub me// nub byang a la rab tu rten// rten pa'i yi
76b8(rnying rgyud): ge de bkod nas// dbus su bstan par bsgom pa ni// gshin rje ste sku dmar nag la// dbu gsum po la phyag kyang drug// dbul thod pa tshal gyis brgyan// zhal g.yas smug nag g.yon ldang ba/ dbus ni sku dang rab 'thun pa/ skul po/ 
77a1(rnying rgyud): ba brgyan gyi tshal// zhabs bani brkyang bskum du bzhugs pa// yab kyi skul rang 'jug pa// g.yon phyogs gnas pa gong ma bzhin// oM a mr-i ta ta ka sarba a mr-i trakro ta hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i ta kro Ta s+phu baT/ de la
77a2(rnying rgyud): yab yum gsal bar bskyed// pad+ma'i gdan la rab tu bzhugs pa'o// 'khor la sogs pa'i rim pa ni// bskyed pa gong ma'i rim pa'o// rtag tu bzlas pa bsnyen pa'i sngags// mi drag mi bul mi zhan par// ting 'dzin gsal
77a3(rnying rgyud): bar bsgoms byas te// zhi la 'tsher ba'i ting 'dzin la// ri rab dbus kyi lte dbus la// rab brten 'og gi go go nas// rdo rje tshe yi dbang stsol te// phyogs bcu gdug pa'i tshe 'dren te// gdug pa ma lus 'gugs par
77a4(rnying rgyud): 'gyur// tshe'i snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas// oM sa ma ya many+dzu shrI mu datra a ko A yu pa la si ti ni bruM a// des ni tshe'i dbang thob na/ sa// sangs rgyas sku dang mnyam pa dang // bskal pa ma zhig bar du ni// 
77a5(rnying rgyud): lnga lon pa bzhin du gnas// de nas bskul ba'i gnas 'di gsungs / e ma'o phyogs bcu kun nas 'dus pa yi// ye shes rgyal bo'i thig le 'di// gsang chen rmad du byung ba ste// rgyu drug 'khor ba'i
77a6(rnying rgyud): sems can rnams// ye nas lhun gyis grub pa'i bcud// thams cad ma lus chos so chog/ chos kyi sku 'am chos kyi dbyings// don dam tshig dang mngon gsum pa// dngos po mtshan ma thams cad las// khyab pa'i mya ngan
77a7(rnying rgyud): thugs rje che// phra mo sems kyi rang bzhin ste// gti mug mun pa sel ba ste// nyon mongs dri ma kun dang bral// shin tu gsad pa mya ngan 'das// thugs rje'i rang bzhin gshin rje ste// rdo rje tshe'i rang bzhin mi 'gyur ba'o zhes
77a8(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar gshegs pa thams cad rngam pa'i zhal nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// e ma'o phyogs bcu 'jig rten ye nas dben// bder gshegs thams cad ye nas lhun gyis grub
77b1(rnying rgyud): mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i// phyogs bcu'i stong khams 'jig rten rgyan du bcas// thabs pang shes rab kyis ni dbang skur na// bdud dang srin po log 'dren tshe bsdus te// dbang bskur gnang ba des
77b2(rnying rgyud): kyang byin bskyed de// shar phyogs dri za'i gnas nas tshe drongs shig/ oM badz+ra ku la oM swa shwa ra na ha ha he ha hUM hUM zhes ni dbyangs dang bcas pa yis// rdo rje rigs la grub pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi/ 
77b3(rnying rgyud): mgon po gshin rje tshe dbang bskur/ de nas rin po che'i tshe'i dbang bskur ba'i phyir 'di gsungs so// e ma'o rin chen 'chang ba kun gyi bdag/ 'jig rten dbang phyug dbang byed pa// gtso mchog khyab par byin/ 
77b4(rnying rgyud): brlabs te/ mi 'gyur rigs kyi tshe thob nas// lho phyogs gshin rje'i nga gnas nas tshe drongs shig/ oM rang na ku la A yu he he ho ho haM//  rin chen dgyes pa'i dbang bskur bas// khyad par byin brlabs thob
77b5(rnying rgyud): gyur cig de nas pad+ma rigs kyi tshe'i dbang 'di yang gsung so// e ma 'o khro ga tum rngam pa'i tshogs// pad+ma rigs kyi dbang phyug ste// snang ba med las lhun gyis grub// rdo rje 'chang gis dbang skur bas// 
77b6(rnying rgyud): klu 'dul tshe yi dbang thob shog/ pad+ma ku la A yu he he he he ha// lhun gyis grub pa tshe yi dbang // thogs med dam pa thob par shog/ de nas las kyi rigs kyi tshe'i dbang bskur ba 'di brjod do// e ma'o rang bzhin mtshan ma/ 
77b7(rnying rgyud): med pa yi// ye shes lnga ldan phrin las gtso// gnyis su med pa las kyi rigs// las rnams thams cad dbang bskur bas// gnod sbyin gdon la chetshe drongs te// gnod sbyin bgegs 'dul dbang thob shog/ oM ka ra ma ku
77b8(rnying rgyud): la A yu he ge go ho ha zhes brjod pas thams cad che'i dbang nyid du gyur te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// tshad med bzhi yi thugs rjes kyang // nyon mongs dgra rnams ni gyur cig/ ces phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi bde bar ga/ 
78a1(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyis tshe'i dbang bskur ro// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las 'jam dpal tshe sgrub pa'i le'u sde brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das bcom
78a2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid des// mtha' byed 'byung ba de nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ngo // gshin rje las kyi phrin las 'di// myos dang mgo 'khor byed pa dang // yid 'khrug khrag tu skyug par byed// 
78a3(rnying rgyud): log 'dren rnam pa drug tu bstan// log 'dren mthar byed dkyil 'khor ni// bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de// yi dgas kyi ni gos la bri// sum rtseg ldan pa'i mu ran la// dbyangs kyi yo ges kun tu bskor// hriSh+T+rIH
78a4(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis mnan byas la// tha la thod pa gtang bar bya// de nas snga dgas kyis dgang bar bya// ya ma na ste ra tsa'i tshogs// sa ste 'byung bye dad to yi rten// me ste thams cad sreg pa'o// bdag nyid gshin rje mthar byed
78a5(rnying rgyud): skur bskyed la// yum yang de ru bsgom byas la// phyogs bcug/ dug pa thams cad kun// ma lus tsham ngam drag par bya// bzlas pa'i snying po ma nor bar// sgra dang 'du byed rab spangs te// bde zhing yid 'ong
78a6(rnying rgyud): gnas dag las// rab tu sdang mig sdang sems bcas// sgra dang bcas pa'i sems spangs te// nyi ma shar nas nub kyi bar// rgyun dang dus su bstan pa'o// bar bar bskul ba'i las bya zhing // bcol ba'i las dag rab tu brjod// 
78a7(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo gshin rje'i tshogs thams cad yum btsun mo dang gnyisu med par byas te/ bzlas pa'i sngags 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ngo // oM hriSh+Ti bi kri tA nan hu~M hu pa na a nud b+ha ba/ sarba d+harma tsa
78a8(rnying rgyud): tsAr+ya a ti ba haM/ oM la yaM aM/ badz+ra bo d+hi ta tha ga ta kro ti shwa ri// a byi ta badz+ra kro ti sha ri/ he he haM haM/ sngags 'di rab tu brjod byas pas// kha dog che zhing lus bong che ba dang // rgya dag yongasu ma chad thams cad namakha' ste// gsal
78b1(rnying rgyud): ba'i shes rab thams cad namakha' 'dra// mthar phyin sngags kyi lung la mkhas par bya// de yi sbyor ba thams cad dgyes skongs shig/ dbang sdud sngags te drag po'i las dang sbyar// mi dmigs gtso bo'i sngags dang phyag rgyar
78b2(rnying rgyud): gnas/ sgrol dang mthar phyin phrin las gnas su bstan// ting 'dzin rim pa 'di dag ldan par bya// khro bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang // sgyu ma la dbang sgyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // go 'bang chen po la sgyu
78b3(rnying rgyud): bi'i thabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang // rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / thugs rjes zhe sdang sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab kyis 'dod chags spro ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes kyis gti mug
78b4(rnying rgyud): sgrol ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan gyis nga rgyal 'joms pa 'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis phragadadog 'joms pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de dag 'joms pa'i sngags ni 'di dag/ 
78b5(rnying rgyud): pradz+nyA ku la/ dz+nyA na ku la/ d+ha ku la gun ku la/ bir+ya ku la/ b+hu ta ku la/ badz+ra ku la/ pad+ma ku la/ kar ma ku la/ rad na ku la/ sarba tathA ga to ho zhes brjod nas 'di skad ces gsungaso// dper na me dang 'od bzhi/ 
78b6(rnying rgyud): du'i 'od la sbrang ma 'dun yang // me lce'i drod ni 'od la yod// 'od kyis sbrang tshig ci bzhin du// skyon gyi dri ma thams cad dang // bdud dang mu stegs log 'dren dang // mi 'thun pa yi dgra dang bgegs// shes rab thabs kyi
78b7(rnying rgyud): gzir gnon pa'i// me lce dang ni sbrang ma 'dra'o// tha dad pa yi mi 'thun pa'ang // 'phags pa 'jam dpal gshin rje nyid// 'khrigs pa med cing sgrol bar byed// mi skye ye shes ral gri yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal
78b8(rnying rgyud): dral byas nas// gnas dang gnas ma yin pa yi// rgyu dang rgyu ma yin pa yi// nyon mongs sems can mtho ris gnas// bsgral ba'i zhing du smos pa de// de la de bzhin drag du bya// rigs dang lo grangs 'thun pa la// de bzhin
79a1(rnying rgyud): byas na skyon pa ste// de dag yongs su shes par bya// las dang bya ba rtsol ba rnams// nyams kyi phyag rgyas rang don sad// de rtags bka' ba mi 'gyur te// mi la ya yi 'og gos la// 'gi wang dag
79a2(rnying rgyud): / gis bris byas te// 'og nas 'byung ba'i gsang sngags dang // gang bya spel bris byas la// rag ta dag gi kha chus bran// thub pa drug gi snying po bri// gsang ba'i sngags 'di drag tu brjod// oM hri b+hI kro ti bi ka ta/ priSh+Ti kro ti ma ra ta/ pra
79a3(rnying rgyud): sang he te ba mu ka/ he hang he hang / ka la ru ba huM huM phaT phaT a// de skad gsung gi sgra bsgrags pas// dgra dang bgegs dang mu stegs dang // bdud dang srin po ma lus rnams// gzir cing gnan pa drag tu bya// mi 'thun phyogs kyi
79a4(rnying rgyud): 'byung po de// gdul bar bya ba'i don ched du// khro bo'i sku ru bsgom bya sa te// thams cad bsgral bar bya ba yi// rang bzhin grub pa 'di gsung so// oM pra marta na/ na mo badz+ra badz+ra ki mo na ta/ a hang pra khu ma khum mo mu
79a5(rnying rgyud): tiswA hA/ de skad ces ni gsungs pa yis// rang bzhin gyis ni dbang du 'gyur// bdud rnams dag ni khro zhim gtum// srin po dag ni 'jigs shing rngam// mu stegs log 'dren rgol bar byed// de dag gdu
79a6(rnying rgyud): bar bya ba'i phyir// phrin las dam pa 'di brtsam so// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// dbus kyi pho brang lte ba la// bdud rnams 'dul ba'i snying po bri// shar gyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengasu// dri za dbang bsdu'i snying po bri// lho yi phyogs/ 
79a7(rnying rgyud): kyi 'khor lo la// mu stegs sgrol ba'i snying po bri// nub kyi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la// klu rnams tshar gcod snying po bri// byang gi phyogs kyi 'khor lo la// gnod sbyin tshogs rnams dbang sdud bri// huM big+ha nan/ hu rag sha nan// oM tir/ 
79a8(rnying rgyud): ti ka nan/ oM ma ra na nan/ 'tshams kyi dkyil 'khor lte dbus su// 'tshams kyi bgegs gnon snying po bri// huM d+ha hu bA/ hu lA/ huM swA/ gru chad rnam pa bzhi po la// thod pa rlon pa bri bar bye// mu khyud thod pa'i phreng ba gtang // phyi rol/ 
79b1(rnying rgyud): sbrul gyis yongasu dgang // de ltar dkyil 'khor zin pa dang // rnam par 'tshe ba'i gzugs rnams kun// kham pa rdza yi ga bu la// gzugasu yongs su bri byas te// dbus yongasu gzhag par bya// kha dog dmar pos bcings nas
79b2(rnying rgyud): ni rtse gcig phyag rgya bcas byas la// gsang sngags 'di yang 'bum khri brjod// oM pra martan mo ha sra badz+ra dza ki mon d+ha a hang pra khu ma mo tha tha swA hA/ na mo de gi kha d+ha mu pra ba tha byi tha u ste ni nan sarba ta ta na phaT/ phyag rgya
79b3(rnying rgyud): rgyade dang bcas pas brdeg/ zhag gsum bzlas pa byas na ni/ bgegs dang log 'dren dbang du 'dus// gzhan yang de bzhin bzhugs pa'i khro// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // spu nag ldang nag kham pa dang // so so'i cha / 
79b4(rnying rgyud): rngam pa'i gzugs// mgon po gshin rje nag po yis// bgegs dang log 'dren gzir cing gnon// rngam pa'i zhal du 'di bstabs so// oM che ge mo kha ram kha hi/ oM hriSh+Ti che ge mo kha ra ma kha'i// oM ka la ru/ 
79b5(rnying rgyud): ba che ge mo kha re kha'i// du hu~M phaT phaT a/ nyin zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas// de nas phyag rgya gsum bcas te// yang nas yang du gzer/ cing gnan// phyag rgya de dang gsang sngags 'dis// lan grangs stong
79b6(rnying rgyud): gcig tu brdeg/ ma hri Sh+T+rI badz+ra ma yan pan su dung nga cu bu paT phaT ya~M// las dang rjes dang sngags dang ni// phyag rgya brtson 'grus ma yangs par// bum mam grangs na ci mang du// yang nas yang du nan sa/ zhes bcom ldan
79b7(rnying rgyud): 'das 'jam dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal pos rab tu gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las log 'dren mthar byed kyis mnan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom
79b8(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das gshin rje'i bdag nyid des mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo // gnod sbyin mthar byed brini pas 'di// dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin bris la// bzlas pa'i snying po breb
80a1(rnying rgyud): bya// ya ste skyed pa me ste sreg/ tos la snying rje rul chags// nA ni 'byung byed yab kyi gsang // yo la kun 'byung tal bsdu// bdag nyid las kyi mthar byed sku// yab yum gnyis med rol pa la// bya
80a2(rnying rgyud): chu sems kyi 'od zer 'phro// 'dzum dang bcas pas yul la 'bul// byang chub bla med sangs rgyas la// mchod cing ci ltar mdzad pa ltar// bdag kyang rab tu bsgral slad du// ting 'dzin 'du ba namakha' 'dra// zhes
80a3(rnying rgyud): gsungs pas phyogs bcu'i gdug can thams cad spa gong ste bred nas myos mar 'gyur te/ dper na mi ra ro ba bzhin no// de nas nan tan gyi phrin las 'di nyid kyi sku dang thugs yon tan phrin las las byung ngo // gdug pa
80a4(rnying rgyud): ma lus 'dul mdzad pa// khro bo chen po hUM sgra can// las rnams dathar byed phrin las sku// gnod sbyin sdang sems ldan pa kun// bar chad bya bar sems pa ste// de dag zil gyis mnan pa'i phyir// sku
80a5(rnying rgyud): mdog nag po chen po ste// dbu skra kham nage gyen du 'khyil// thod ba tshar gsum dbu rkyen can// phyag g.yas zhing chen g.yon ban d+ha/ spyan gsum mche gtsigs zhabs bkyang skum ste// mi mthun
80a6(rnying rgyud): bgegs dang sdang ba'i sgra// ma lus dbang sdud phrin las mchog gi sku// mi sdug tshul 'chang dregs pa'i khyo shug ldan// zhing chen g.yang ga'i rgyan du byas// zhe sdang dbang sdung stag gi sham thabs can// nyon mongs dpang
80a7(rnying rgyud): sdud glang chen ko rlon can// 'dren pa'i khro rgyal gdug 'dul dam pa 'di// dus ngan tha ma'i sems can 'dul dka' ba// nyon mongs dbang sdud dpal gyi zhal du stobs// 'gro ba ma lus thugs rjes dbyings la
80a8(rnying rgyud): dgeng lazhe sda zhugs 'chang khrod 'ogaso// gdug par gyur pa'i dgra bgegs 'dul mdzad pa// nga rgyal la sogs rtag tu dug gsum sku// ye shes dang las thams cad rdzogs par mdzod// oM badz+ra Sh+Ti biH/ 
80b1(rnying rgyud): tAnan/ ta thA ga tam tsa cu Ta ya/ zhes pa'i sngags dang bcas la bdag nyid las par byed kyi skur bsgoms la phrin las bcol zhing gnan pa drag du bzlas pa'i snying po bzlas so// de'i dus su sbyin sreg byed na drin/ 
80b2(rnying rgyud): las btsam par bya ste/ mthab e yi dbyings 'dral// bang rim sum brtsegs kha khyer tsan// ngos la me'i phreng ba gtang // kha khyer rdo rje rabal// mu ran thod pa'i phreng ba ste// me ste bsreg bya
80b3(rnying rgyud): wang zhes pa// kha dog nag pa shin tu ring // phyag na zhugs gling bgrang breng dang // be tson ril pa thogs pa ste// tshul bzhin spyan drangs gdan bzhugs bstod// dbang dang phyag chang gshegs pa rnams// gang ltar
80b4(rnying rgyud): pa bzhin du bya// gnyis 'og rang bzhin la ma'i sku// gnyis med spyan drangs bzhugs la bcol// sbyin sreg phrin las zin pa dang // bcol bskul dag kyang rab tu bya// rdzas ni dug dang lan tsha dang // 
80b5(rnying rgyud): sketshe sbrang rtsi yungs nag dang // gu gul nage po la sogs pa 'i// lcags 'dra'i rdzas la rab tu bsngags// bdag nyid lba yi skur bsgoms la// dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlab pa yi// 
80b6(rnying rgyud): sngags 'di rab tu rtse gcig bzlas/ oM hUM ya khang me traH mu kha hrISh+Ti ya ma ra tsa phaT hUM/ phyag rgya zil gnon phyag rgya bca'// dkyil 'khor bskor zhing gsang sngags bzlas// bdag nyid nub kyi phyogs
80b7(rnying rgyud): 'dug ste/ las kyi thar byed skur bsgoms la// gsang sngags mi bul mi drag par// bzlas na myur du 'grub pa ni// yid 'khrugs myos nas dbang med 'gyel pa dang // rab tu brgyal nas thal por
80b8(rnying rgyud): 'jig pa dag/ de rnams mi 'grub pa ru ngas ma bshad// ces bcom ldan 'das don yod pa'i khro bos gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las gnod sbyin mthar byed kyis
81a1(rnying rgyud): gnan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// de nas yang 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed chen pos mthar byed 'byung ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs las byung ngo // 
81a2(rnying rgyud): srin po mthar byed phrin las 'di// dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya bar bstan// ya ste rgyu la te ste rkyen// yo ni kun tu bskul ba la// ni ni sdud pa'i don yin te// ri zhes bya ba lhun stug pa// ya la 'dus te kla
81a3(rnying rgyud): la thim// bdag nyid chings zhes bya ba'i sku// dbu gsum po la phyag drug ste// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus ser nag/ phyag drug phyag mtshan bsnams pa ni// g.yas pa ba su ta yi zhabs// g.yas par
81a4(rnying rgyud): gsal shing tha ma lcags kyu'o// g.yon gyi dang po chu srin pa na ma ka ta ri// tha ma rdo rje rgya gram bsnams pa'o// sku stong glang rtse na ko rlon la// sku smad sdug gi sham thabs te// zhing chen g.yang gzhi
81a5(rnying rgyud): sku la brgyan// gzhan yang dur khrod rgyan mchog rnams// ma lus sku la rdzogs pa la// bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di/ blang bar bya// mi shigs rdo rje gar gyi bdag/ rdo rje gsang ba'i
81a6(rnying rgyud): go shin rje ste// phrin las rgyal po grub pa'i las// oM dang aM dang hUM zhes pa// i ni dpral ba'i steng du dmigs// aM ni lce'i steng du la// hUM ni thugs kha nyid du'o// de las 'od zer rab spros te// bdag lus
81a7(rnying rgyud): nam mkha' lta bur gyur// phaT ces bya ba rab rjod pas// 'jig rten khams rnams 'od kyis khebs// de nyid sreg pa ma yin te// yid kyi ye shes me 'bar ba// gcig gi stong nyid gang yin pa// 
81a8(rnying rgyud): kun gyi stong pa de yin no// ji ltar mkha' la mtshon snang ba// nam mkha' nyid las byung ba ltar// sngags kyi 'phro 'du btang ba yang // sems las byung ba nam mkha' la// rnam shes stong pa'i ngang la 'dra// bdag
81b1(rnying rgyud): nyid chos kyi skur bsgoms la// zhe sdang 'bro 'du mang byas la// bskyed pa'i sngags 'di drag tu bzlas// oM ma hA dang stod ka per a ra tsa na ka ta khaM che ge mo la dus zhes pa dang / sngags gong nas 'byung ba dang
81b2(rnying rgyud): spel te las byas na gdon mi za ba'o// zhes gshin rje khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las klu mthar byed kyis gnan pa'i le'u ste bcu
81b3(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// / de nas yang khro bo chen po gshin rje gshed kyis mthar byed 'byung ba 'di nyid kyi sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo // ya ma mthar byed phrin wa
81b4(rnying rgyud): ni dkyil 'khor snga ma 'dra bar dmigs// bzlas pa'i snying po 'di yang bri// ya ste 'byung byed k+She yis sreg/ ya ni yang dag nga ni skams// ni zhes pa ni khug shig pa'o// ra zhes bya ba
81b5(rnying rgyud): bsgral ba la// ma las skyed byed slar sdud pa'o// bdag nyid ya ma mthar byed sku// sku mdog ldang nag zhal cig phyag gnyi sa pa// sku la thod pa phyed tshal brgyan// dbu yi skra ni kham nag la// 
81b6(rnying rgyud): ral pa gyen du 'khyil pa ste// phyag g.yas chu srin dbyug tho 'phyar// g.yon pa phyag na zhing chen za ba'o// sku stong glang chen ke rlon la// sku smad stag gi sham thabs can// dur khrod me dbus bzhugs pa la// yum yang de
81b7(rnying rgyud): dang 'dra bar bsgom// bzlas pa'i ting 'dzin me 'dra la// bzlas brjod rlung 'dra g.yo zhing bskyod// lce la nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la// steng du bzlas pa'i snying po dgod// thams dbyangs dang bcas
81b8(rnying rgyud): pa la triSh+Ti'i sngags kyi brang ba gdags// par 'bros rnam shes 'gugs par bsam// tshul bsdus gshin rje nyid la thim/ 'phro 'du bzlas pa de dag kun// gong du bshad/ 
82a1(rnying rgyud): bdag la yang // de dag rab tu sbyar zhes bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje'i khro bos bskul ba 'di gsungs so// oM ya ma las kun 'jigs par byed pa ni// thams
82a2(rnying rgyud): cad dbang sdud ya mthar byed sku// zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog ljang // zhabs gnyis dor thabs klu rgyal gnon// sku la sbrul nag steng gis brgyan pa ni// bgegs rnams 'dul zhing rtag tu 'chi bar
82a3(rnying rgyud): mdzad/ sku lazod pa'i phyid tshal brgyan pa ni// 'gro ba thugs rje phyogs gcig dgongs pa'i rtags// dbu ska ral po gyen du 'khyil ba ni// srid gsum ma lus dbang du sdud pa'i rtags/ 
82a4(rnying rgyud): phyag g.yas chu srin dbyug to bsnams pa ni// dgra bgegs/  'jigs pa che las sgrol ba'i rtags// g.yon pa zhing dbyug phyag na bsnams pa ni// thugs rjes sems
82a5(rnying rgyud): can mya ngan lam la 'jog/ ke rlon g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni// dug lnga ma spangs gnas su dag pa'i rtags// stag gi g.yang gzhis sku la brgyan pa ni/ 
82a6(rnying rgyud): dug gsum gnas bsgral nas chos kyi sku// skye med ngang la g.yo bskyed mi mnga' yang // zhe sdang phrin las bya ba'i dus la bab// oM hriSh+Ti ya ma ra tsa sarba mar ya nan dza sa ma ya zhes brjod cing zhe sdang dang
82a7(rnying rgyud): ldan par ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas pa dang sbyar te las byas na gdon ma ze'o// de dag ni 'os pa tsam gyis ma yin te yang dang yang du 'dris par byas la nan tan gyis ma byas la nan tan gyis ma byas na 'bral
82a8(rnying rgyud): du phra mo tsam gyis 'grub pa ma yin no// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las ya ma mthar byed kyis gnan po'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// 
82b1(rnying rgyud): de nas yang las phran tshegs bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las las phyung ngo // zla ba 'dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// pad+ma 'am 'khor lo gang yang rung // yang na rin chen dra ba
82b2(rnying rgyud): la/ dra mig rnams ni 'dug par gnas// rin chen phung bu nang du bltas// de ru bri 'am gzugs par bya// tha ma sbrul gyi zhags pas bskor// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// khru gang thur du
82b3(rnying rgyud): bskos byas la// ga'u kha sbyar nang du ni// yungs kar blugs la bzlas pa bya// rtags la ma yengs 'phro 'du yis// rgyun mi 'chad par bsgrub par bya// oM badz+ra ka lang du kha la/ 
82b4(rnying rgyud): pra ma rta na hUM phaT/ sle kha sle kha phaT phaT ces bzlas la/ bad/ gnyid ya man ta kar bsgoms la/ sngags 'di nus tshad du bzlas na 'grub nges so// yungs kar rgyal po bsgrub pa'o// 
82b5(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor khro bo la sogs pas/ bcom ldan 'das gshe na rje gshed la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma dbyings las byung ba dang / mkha' la rgyu dang sa la dbang ba
82b6(rnying rgyud): gsum gyis bskul ba'i dbyangs 'di bdag cag len lags so// ye shes mkhwa ldan ma mo'i dpal// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i phrin las can// dpal gyi phyag brnyan rag ta'i dri snom ma// ma mo khyod
82b7(rnying rgyud): ni kun gyi gtso mo dpag tshad brgyad khrir rgyug/ bud med lus la 'jigs byed tshul 'tshang ba// kha nas me 'bar rgya mtsho'i ting nas skems// mig nas zhag 'dzag ri rab thal bar brlog/ skad cig tsam
82b8(rnying rgyud): la stong khams dbang du sdud// 'jig rten lha chen brgyad kyang 'dar yeng yod// che ge mo zhig dbang du sdud par byed// bud med gzugs can dus la bab// che ge mo o trag rag sha hriSh+Ti ya ma ma
83a1(rnying rgyud): mnan zhes bskul ba ni dbyings kyi ma me'o// namakha'i gting dpag yangs la gnas bcas shing // bar snang khams la rgyu ba'i tshogs// khams gsum thams cad dbang du sdud// lcags
83a2(rnying rgyud): kyi bya khra lta bu ni// ma mo rnams kyi mchog kyang yin// kha' bar stong gi gtso mo ste// 'jigs byed rnams kyi dbang byed ma// srid gsum dbang du sdud pa mo// gzigs pa'i go 'phang na mkha' 'dra// gshegs shing
83a3(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa glog pas mgyogs// g.yas kyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis// bdud dang srin po rdul du klog/ g.yon gyi gshog pa brdabs pa yis// dgra bgegs 'byung po dbang du sdud// dam tshig can gyi dus la
83a4(rnying rgyud): bab// oM ma ra trag rag sha ti yo ya ma ra tsa ka ka ru pa hriSh+Ti dza zhes bskul ba ni// mkha' lding gi tshogs so// ya ma na ste grub pa mo// // la la lag na rgyu zhags 'chang // la la lag na thod phreng 'dzin// la la
83a5(rnying rgyud): zhing chung ba su 'dren// la la me khyer rgya mtsho skams// la la/ 'gugs byed nyams pa 'dzin// la la sbrul nag zhags pa 'dzin// la la po nya 'gugs shing 'dren// sngags pas bos shing
83a6(rnying rgyud): gdungs pa'i tshe// dam tshig dus la bab po sa ma ya// sdang bar sems pa'i snying nas drongs// brtse ba'i tshogs kyis dus la bab// oM ka ha trog rag sha rad na ka la hriSh+Ti swA hA/ zhes spyan drangs zhing bskul ba ni gter/ 
83a7(rnying rgyud): bdag gi tshogs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gshin rje gshed kyis 'di skad ces gsungs so// rgyud kyi rgyal po las bzhi 'khor lo 'di dus phyi ma la rnal 'byor pa gang zhig bsgrub pa'i las byed na/ nga yang thugs
83a8(rnying rgyud): dam las mi g.yel la/ 'khor khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pas kyang / nga'i thugs dam rjes su bsgrub par mdzad pas/ dus tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'di rnal 'byor pa'i sku la bsngo ba la sogs pa la dam tshig 'byung bar
83b1(rnying rgyud): zhal gyis bzhes so// de nas 'khor rnams bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rjes/ dus tha ma la 'byung bar zhal gyis bzhes pa la dga' nas yid rangs te mngon par bstod do// / 'phags pa
83b2(rnying rgyud): las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ 'jug bskul ba dang gnang ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba chen po rtsa ba'i rgyud rdzogs so// // de nas
83b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor khro bo dang khro mo la sogs pa rnams kyis/ ngag 'thun pas bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// e ma'o bcom ldan khro rgyal gtso// las gni 'khor lo'i rgyud 'di la// ngomaH/ 
83b4(rnying rgyud): rmang byung bstan pa la// bdag cag the tsom 'tshal ba rnams// bder gshegs gsung gi ngo bo yis// zhu ba'i dmigs rnams pa shad du gsol// 'phags pa zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// las gzhi
83b5(rnying rgyud): zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// 'khor lo zhes bgyi ji ltar lag/ sa// gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// rgyud ces bgyirgya kha ji ltar lags// rje dag dbyings las bzhengs nas ni// zhu ba'i
83b6(rnying rgyud): dmigs rnams bshad par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro bo gzhan la gdug par mdzad pa yis/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis gsung phyung ste// 'di skad 'khor la bka' stsal to// rigs kyi 'kho
83b7(rnying rgyud): rnams zhu ba yi// dmigs rnams zhu ba rab tu legs// 'phags pa zhes su bstan pa ni// gdug pa ma lus kun las 'phags// ye shes sems dpa' 'byung ba'i gzhi// dpe yis de la bskrun du med// 
83b8(rnying rgyud): las gni zhes su grags pa yang // de la las ni rnam pa gnyis// thabs dang shes rab 'dul dbang dang/ sku gsum phrin las 'dul ba ste// thabs dang thabs su 'brel ba la// shes rab 'brel pa yum zhes bya// chos
84a1(rnying rgyud): dang longs spyod pa yi sku// 'dul dbang las zhes bya bar grags// de la gzhi zhes bya ba yang // ni brgyas pa dbang mngon no// zhi ba bya ba nges tshig kyang // ting 'dzin rim pa byams pa la// 'phro 'du
84a2(rnying rgyud): dkar la 'tsher ba ste// thams cad mgu bor byed pa dang // mi 'thun pa rnams zhi bya'i phyir// de phyir zhi ba zhes bya'o// rgyas pa gser ltar sar ba la// ting 'dzin sprul pa mang por khyab// phyogs bcur 'gro ba'i don
84a3(rnying rgyud): byas te// bskul ba'i sa la gzhes pa yi// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs te// bdag gi ba spu'i bu gnas// kun tu zhugs te rgyas pa la// tshe dang dbang thang dpal la sogs// thams cad rgyas pas rgyas zhes
84a4(rnying rgyud): bya/ de la dbang gi nges tshig kyang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten tham sa cad nas// bdag gi yid la bsams pa kun// yab yum sprul rang bu'i khyad par las// ci 'dod thams cad dbang du sdud// las dang bya ba
84a5(rnying rgyud): ma lus dang // bdag nyid lha yi skur bsgoms pas// 'du bar la gyur pa gdon ma zi// de la drag po'i phrin las kyang // gshin/ rje gshed dang gshed bdag mo// yab yum khyad par sprin lta bu// nam
84a6(rnying rgyud): mkha' khebs pa byed pa ltar// gnyis med byang chub khyad par las// 'phro 'du 'od zer sprin lta bu// nam mkha' gang bar khyab pa la// khro bo'i sgrol pas khebs gyur te// 'jig rten rdul du bshig nas ni// gdug pa ma
84a7(rnying rgyud): lus kun btul te// slar bsdus yab yum sku la bsdu// de ltar nas dang yungs 'bru tsam// ma lus kun tu 'gengs byed cing // dmigs pa gang na gnas pa dag/ btsal te slar yang 'gugs la sogs// 'di dang 'di zhes bya med/ 
84a8(rnying rgyud): par/ 'khor ba tshang nas sprugs bsams te// drag po'i phrin las grub par bsam// 'khor lo zhes su bstan pa yang // mi 'khor 'khor phyir rtse mo 'phro// lte ba la 'khor rtse mos gcod// de phyir 'khor lo zhes su grags// 
84b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba zhes su grags pa yang // kun la mi stan rtsa ba ste// thun mong kun gyi ma yin pas// de phyir gsang ba zhes bya'o// de la rgyud ces bya ba yang // tshang zhing 'brel pas btags pa dang // brang chags dgos pa sgrub pa yi// de phyir
84b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// nyi ma bzhi la las bzhi zhig/ gsungs shing nges par bstan pa ste// dngos po ci la bsgom par bgyi// zhi ba la ni ji ltar bgyi// sngags rnams
84b3(rnying rgyud): ji ltar bzlas par bgyi// phrin las nges par bstan pa ste// rgyas pa dag la ji ltar bstan// sngags rnams brjod pa ji lta bu// dbang la ji ltar bsgom par bgyi// sngags rnams brjod pa ci lta bu// drag po'i las su bstan pa/ 
84b4(rnying rgyud): la 'a lha ni ji ltar bsgom par bgyi// bzlas pa'i sngags rnams ji da ltar lags// phrin las rnam bzhir bstan pa des// las ni ji lta bu zhig 'grub// gzhi 'am gnas ni ji lta bu// de dag ji lta bu yis bri/ 
84b5(rnying rgyud): nges par bstan pa'i man ngag la// bdag cag rnams la bstan du gsol// de nas bcom ldan khro 'dul des// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// gang bsgom lha rnams sku mdog dkar// yum yang
84b6(rnying rgyud): de dang 'dra ba la// phyogs bcu'i 'khor rnams rigs dang sbyar// bdag nyid ya man ta ka ru// sku mdog gsal bar bsgoms nas ni// bzlas pa'i sngags 'di mgu bas bzlas// ya ma ra tsa sa to ma ya/ che ge mo ba lu ka shan ting / 
84b7(rnying rgyud): ku ru swA hA// ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mok+Sha ra tsa shan ting ku ru swA hA// ya ta yo na ri yak+Sha ya/ che ge mo pa la mu sti shan ting ku ru swA hA/ yak+Sha ya tsa ni ra ma ya/ che ge mo ma ra ya shan ting ku ru swA hA/ mi drag mi bul mi
84b8(rnying rgyud): gzhan par// ting 'dzin sbyor ba ldan byas te// nyi ma re la rim bzhin sbyar// grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za'o// phrin las nges par grub pa ste// bsgom par bya ba sku mdog ser// yum yang de dang 'dra ba la// phyi ma
85a1(rnying rgyud): rim bzhin sbyar bar bya// gser lta bu yi ting 'dzin la// 'phro 'du byang chub sems lnga bu// phyogs bcu ma lus don byas te// bdag gi phung po ma lus dang // tshe dang longs spyod 'phel bar bsam/ 
85a2(rnying rgyud): de tshe sngags 'di bzlas par bya// ya ma ra tsa sa to ma ya/ che ge mo pra ma ya/ pus ting ku ru swA hA/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mo ka k+Sha pus ting ku ru swA hA/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ che ge mo zhig sasti pus ting ku ru swas+ya/ 
85a3(rnying rgyud): yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo zhig ma ra ya pus ting ku ru swA hA// de tshe rang rig ting 'dzin gyis// mthu dang ldan par byas te ni// sngags de bzlas pa byas na ni// 'grub par 'gyur te the tshom med// thams cad dbang
85a4(rnying rgyud): du bsdu ba'i phyir// lha yang sku mdog zangs lta bu// yum yang de dang 'dra bar bsgom// lha rnams gzhung bzhin bskyed pa ni// mthar byed 'byung ba'i bzlas pa'o// ya ma ra tsa sa to me ya/ che ge mo huH
85a5(rnying rgyud): pa shang ku ru swA hA/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mo hu~M hu~M phaT phaT/ swA hA// ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya/ che ge mo hu huM phaT phaT/ ka la ru/ pa swA hA/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo hUM hUM phaT phaT/ ka la ru pa tsurbu
85a6(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT/ sngags kyi bzlas pa byas nas ni// bla med sangs rgyas thams cad kyang // 'du zhes gsungs te gdon mi za'o// lha ni sku mdog lcags lta bu// mthong ka rab tu khros pa la// gcer bu ral pa gcig ste 'jigs// 
85a7(rnying rgyud): ma rungs 'dul ba bsgoms nas ni// bzlas pa 'di ni drag tu bzlas// ya mar tsa sa to me ya che ge mo a mu khaM pra ma ya ni hUM phaT/ ya me to ru na yo ta ya/ che ge mo a mu khaM mur tsa ya huM phaT/ ya ta yo ni ra yak+She ya che ge mo a
85a8(rnying rgyud): mu khaM rag ta tsa ra hU~M phaT/ yak+She ya tsa ni ra ma ya che ge mo a mu khaM ma ra ya hu~M phaT/ bdag nyid 'jigs byed skur bsgoms la// sngags kyi phreng bas phog gyur na// mngon shes ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyang // 'chi bar 'gyur/ 
85b1(rnying rgyud): bar gdon mi ba// zhi ba'i dus su bzlas pa yis// dang po sems ni g.yos par 'gyur// gnyis pas yid la 'byung bar 'gyur// gsum pas dkar po'i ngo bo dang // bzhi pas thams cad zhi bar 'gyur// rgyas pa'i
85b2(rnying rgyud): dus su bzlas pa yin// dang pos dpal yang 'phel bar byed// gnyis pas dbang thang skyed par byed// gsum pas gzi byin rnyed 'gyur te// bzhi pas tshe ring ma lus rgyas par 'gyur// dbang gi dus su bzlas
85b3(rnying rgyud): pa yis/ dang pos sems kyang g.yos par byed// gnyis pas 'jug par nus pa ste// gsum pas dmigs pa dbang du 'du// bzhi pas thams cad dbang du 'du'o// drag po'i bzlas pa byas pa yis// dang pos mgo ni/ 
85b4(rnying rgyud): 'khor bar byed// gnyis pas yid 'khrugs gsum pas khrag tu sdug/ bzhi pas gdon mi za'o// gzhi 'am gnas su bstan pa ni// bcu gnyis 'khor lo rtsibs can de// yi dgas kyi ni gos la
85b5(rnying rgyud): bri zhi ba pad+ma zla ba la// rgyas pa glang po'i rgyab du bya// dbang ni bu/ de meng snying khar te// dgug pa seng ge dre'u dang gnyis// dbye ba/ rtag dang ma he gnyis// smyo 'bog sha ba'i rgyab du bya// lkug pa lug
85b6(rnying rgyud): gi khong du bzhugs// bskrad pa rnga mo'i rgyab du bya// gsad pa skyes pa'o snying kha ste// gnan pa ri rab 'og tu bya// snag tsha'i mtshan nyid bstan pa yang // khrag sna gsum dang byi la'i gcin// po rog dag gi sgro rtsal/ 
85b7(rnying rgyud): shi ba'i sgra la pir byas la// gang brtsams 'grub par nges par bshad// de nas bcom ldan 'das brtsam pa'i rgyal po'i ting nge 'dzin mchog de la 'di skad ces gsol to// nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di la// khro bor/ 
85b8(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa ji ltar lags// yum gyi bzlas pa ci ltar lags// ma mo'i sngags rnams ji ltar lags// khro bo'i tshigs rnams ji ltar lags// zhe sdang 'joms mdzad khro bo nges// gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// 
86a1(rnying rgyud): khro bo yab yum lce la gzhag/ ma mo sngags kyi mthu byin che// khro bo mang po 'ong 'phro ba'o// de yi bzlas pa 'di dag go// oM a kro te ka ya man taka ka la ru ba pa tsa te ni hu~M phaT/ oM oM hUM be ta li rag sha
86a2(rnying rgyud): man oM ro ga ma dun b+h+yo/ tsa mun ta kyi kyi ma b+h+yo/ nam grum pa ya ti b+h+yo/ oM oM au/ kro ta badz+ra pasmi/ badz+ra kro ta tis+tha/ badz+ra kro ta kang ka/ badz+ra kro tasmig sha/ badz+ra kro ta rag khang / badz+ra kro ta ta ki ni/ badz+ra kro ta rag sha/ badz+ra kro ta/ 
86a3(rnying rgyud): rak+Sha badz+ra kro ta kuN d+ha la~M/ badz+ra kro ta kri ta/ badz+ra lo ka/ badz+ra pasmi/ badz+ra shu la/ badz+ra ku lan/ badz+ra mu la/ badz+ra sri ti/ badz+ra ba mu/ badz+ra shul/ badz+ra sma ra/ tsu hu tsu tsu tsu rbu hu hu du dzu/ tsu hu tu hu d+hu/ tsu tsu tsu tsu hu/ dza tsu
86a4(rnying rgyud): hoHb+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' khro bo'i rgyal po de de la 'di skad ces gsol to// / nges par bstan pa'i rgyud 'di skad ces gsol to// nges par bstan pa'i
86a5(rnying rgyud): rgyud 'di la// tshe zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags// yungs kar bsgrub pa ji ltar lags// de yis las ni ci zhig 'grub// phur bu zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// dang po dam bca' ji ltar lags// bcom ldan khro
86a6(rnying rgyud): bo'i rgyal po la// de skad ces ni zhus pa dang // gsung ni 'di skad bka' stsal to// tshe zhes bya ba'i don 'di yang // chos nyid spros pa med pa la// kun tu mi 'gyur na mkha' 'dra// bskyod med dus kyis gshig du med// 'gro ba 'khrul/ 
86a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngo gang la// bag chags ngan pas bslus pa yis// tshel bar chod 'ong bar gsungs// de phyir tshe ya bsgrub pa gsungs// yungs dkar bsgrub pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // bag chags 'khrul pas gnod 'gyur ba// mi mthun pa
86a8(rnying rgyud): dang gnyen po ste// de dag 'dul ba'i don du bstan// de ni las kyi 'bras bu yang // sngon nas las ngan mthu rtags te// mi mthun pa de 'gugs par byed// de nas yungs dkar rgyal pos bya'o// phur bu zhes su bstan pa yang / 
86b1(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid khro bo chen po ste// gnyis med mkha' la gnas bsams te// pur bu zhes ni de la bya'o// phyogs bcu'i thugs las skyes pa ste// de phyir phur bu zhes su bstan// dang por dam bcas 'di ltar ro// lnga brgya dus
86b2(rnying rgyud): kyi tha ma la// mtshams med ldani kun spyod cing // gos ngan re bgon pa dang // zas ngan gci bza ba'i tshe// de cheng yi bstan pa 'byung // dus dgra ma byung ba'i tshe// lha mo'i nang na 'od zer can// 'phags pa'i nang na 'jam
86b3(rnying rgyud): dpal gnyis// 'di gnyis ma gtogs dngos grub gzhan// rigs 'dzin kun la ma yin no// khro bo'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// nges par dbang du ma gyur pa'i// dang po 'das dang da ltar gyi// phyis 'byung ba ni gang yang med
86b4(rnying rgyud): dgra bgegs 'bum mo stong yang rung // de ma thag tu brlag par byed//  khrag gi char yang 'bebs par byed// ces gsungs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad tshar bcad de/ drag po'i phrin las
86b5(rnying rgyud): grub par gyur to// de nas 'khor rnams kyis 'jam dpal khro bog/ shin rje gshed po la 'di skad ces bstod do// 'phags pa khro/ bo 'jam dpal gshin rje gshed// chos sku byang chub sems kyi rang
86b6(rnying rgyud): bzhin las 'tshad med pabazhi yi ngang nyid rnam dag pas// bdag nyid khro bo 'bar ba'i sku ston cing // tshangs pa brgya byin lha chen drag po rnams// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi sgrol bar mdzad// mdo'i steng na zhabs ni
86b7(rnying rgyud): brkyang bskum gnas// las kyi dudug pa dag gis rdul du glog/ klu yi rgyal pos sku la brgyan pa ni// snyan cha mgur dang dbu dang phyag zhabs rnams// yan lag lnga la nges par dkris te gnas// dbus skra khaM nag ral pa
86b8(rnying rgyud): gyen du 'bar// spyan gsum gnyis med rnam thar don la gzigs// mgo bcad phreng bas dbu yi rgyan du byas// ljags dang mche ba glog ltar 'dril zhing 'bar// 'jigs byed drag po'i zhal spyan rab tu bskrad// mi lpags
87a1(rnying rgyud): rlon pa dag gis stong g.yogs shing // stag lpags rlon pas sku yi rgyan du byas// de 'dra'i sku mdog 'bar ba'i cha lugs 'chang // ngo mtshar rmad byung che la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bstod nas gnyisu med
87a2(rnying rgyud): par gyur to// 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ le'u bcu bzhi pa'o// / 'phags pa las bzhi 'khor lo gsang ba'i rgyud las/ rgyud kyi phyi ma rig
87a3(rnying rgyud): par bkod pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta bud tro pu na gu h+yab no shi a shad dam bi na sa ma ta tan tra nA ma/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa
87a4(rnying rgyud): bla na med pa gsang ba rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos dpa'i dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bde ba chen po phyogs buH
87a5(rnying rgyud): dang dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas ma lus pa'i 'byung gnas/ sku gsung thu/ gas yon tan phrin las rdo rje gsang ba gzhan las khyad par du gyur pa mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pas spras pa/ bkod pa
87a6(rnying rgyud): rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor lhun po brtsegs shing yon tan rin po che'i 'byung gnas sna tshogs rnam par snang ba'i ngo bo/ zab pa dang rgya che ba'i yan lag thams cad gsal bar byed cing ye shes kyis tshegs kyis chos ma lus pa mthar
87a7(rnying rgyud): phyin pa kun tu phrin las rgya cher 'phrul pa'i bdag nyid dpal bde byed pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug chags pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin brnyes pa med pa'i chos nyid kyis thams cad la dbang bskur ba de nyid lha thams cad 'du ba'i gnas
87a8(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas khang bar du gyur pa/ 'og min rdo rje lhun po'i gnas ye shes kyi snang ba rin po che sna tshogs ni 'od 'bar ba'i khang bzangs 'dod pa'i yon gzugs sdug pa sna tshogs dang / dri zhim pa sna tshogs dang ro bro ba sna tshogs dang chos
87b1(rnying rgyud): bde ba bskyed pa sna tshogs phyogs bcur 'phro zhing 'phrig pa rtse mo mtho zhing khyams kyi rnam par bye bar sgo zhing sgo khang dang bcas par bzhug so// de'i tshe bde bar gshegs pa'i rol pa chen po kun tu snang ba dang / 'od kyi dpal dang dag
87b2(rnying rgyud): ba'i dbang phyug dang cho 'phrul bkod pa dang rnam par gzigs dang mi skyod rdo rje dang / mngon par snang ba dang / brtan pa'i dbang phyug dang 'brug sgra dang dri ma med pa dang / rin chen phung po dang na mkha'i mdzod dang rin chen dra ba dang / dkon
87b3(rnying rgyud): mchog mtshan dang rin chen tog dang / 'od zer snang ba dang tshe mtha' yas dang chos kyi dbang phyug dang / chags pa med pa'i 'od dang dga' ba'i spyan dang don thams cad yod pa dang brtson 'grus shugs can dang / las chen 'phrul las dang / 
87b4(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin 'dul ba dang sna tshogs dbang phyug go// gzhan yang byang chub se mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde ba'i blo gros dang / rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang gzi brjid bkod pa dang 'khor lo rnon po dang / shes snang ba
87b5(rnying rgyud): / dang rdo rje rgyal mtshan dang / 'od zer 'phro ba dang / drag shul can dang / dri ma sems dpa' dang sgyu ma'i sprul pa dang rin chen rgyal po dang / dri ba can dang lag bzangs dang gser 'od 'phro ba dang / rin chen snye ma dang
87b6(rnying rgyud): chos kyi mthong ba dang / dri ma med pa dang mun pa sel ba dang dga' ba'i dbyangs dang / gzhon nu rin chen dang rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang gar mkhan dang bro'i rgya mtsho dang thogs med bkod pa dang pad+mo dga' ba dang sa li dbang phyug dang / 
87b7(rnying rgyud): rin chen spungs pa dang sprin gyi phreng ba dang / yid 'ong me tog dang ye shes sgrol ma dang spobs pa brtsegs pa dang / kha lo sgyur ba dang dran pa'i dbang phyug dang / pad+ma'i blo gros dang las byed pa'i stobs dang / snying po blo gros rnams// de dag
87b8(rnying rgyud): kun kyang rang rang gi btsun mo'i tshigs dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis bzhug so// gzhan yang pad+mo 'phro ba dang pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / pad+ma sgrogs pa dang pad+ma spyod pa dang pad+ma tshim byed dang pad+ma 'thor ba dang pad+ma snang ba dang pad+ma dbang byed rnams
88a1(rnying rgyud): kyang rang rang gi phrin las kyis bkod do// gzhan yang 'jigs byed chen po byams pa'i dbang phyug btso ba'i dbang phyug dang ba grol dbang phyug dang / grol ba'i dbang phyug dang / sbyin pa'i dbang phyug dang spyod/ 
88a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug dang smra ba'i dbang phyug dang 'thun pa'i dbang phyug kyang rang rang gi rig pa bcas pas 'khod do// de dag la sogs pa'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnam par 'byed pa dang / 'byed pa med par snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang byang
88a3(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'bum phrag bcu gnyis dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po pad+ma ma chags pa'i spyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ thugs khri/ 
88a4(rnying rgyud): dpal be'u la sogs pa'i gnas rnams nas/ 'od zer gyi dkyil 'khorarar gsal bar byed pa bkye bas/ des phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gsal bar byas pa dang / ya mtshan gyi ltas chen po
88a5(rnying rgyud): bco brgyad 'byung bar gyur to// de nas gnod dang bcud du bcas pa'i gsal zhing 'bar bar gyur nas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas dang bya nga chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thugs dam bskul te/ de dag gis kyang
88a6(rnying rgyud): cho 'phrul rnam par 'khod pa zhes bya ba phyag rgya chen pos rang gis 'khor lo'i khyams dag tu spro bar byed mdzad do// des yang zhing khams rnam par spong zhing slar 'khor gyi 'khor dang bcas pa 'od zer 'phro ba'i gnasu 'duso// 
88a7(rnying rgyud): de ltar 'chad pa'i rgya chen po'i rnam par rol 'phrul pas rol zhing zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas par gyur nas bzhugs pa las 'khor thams cad kyis the tshom skyes par gyur to// de'i dus na 'thun par gleng ba ni kye ma ho// ya man+t+ra
88a8(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs chos// rgyal ba'i mdzad pa ya mtshan che// cho 'phrul dpag med gyur pa yi// dgos pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// rgyu rkyen med par sangs rgyas ni// gsang gsum dam tshig sgro mi mdzad// de yi mtshan nyid yang snang ba/ 
88b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i dbang po bskul bar mdzod// khyod ni rgyal ba kun gyi sras// dgongs don rgya mtshod na mnga' ba// bka' yi bdag po dgongs mdzod dag/ legs par mu ning gsol gdab mdzod// de nas gsang ba'i bdag
88b2(rnying rgyud): po lag na rdo rjes lnga brgya dang bcas pas gzhan dag gi the tshom rnam par gcod pa dang rang nyid kyi sgo gsal bar bya ba'i phyir mdun rol nas langs te/ phyogs bcu nas 'khod nas mchod pa'i tshogs rgya chen po bkod cing rgyal
88b3(rnying rgyud): ba kun la mchod de/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bskor ba byas shing rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag 'tshal nas/ dga' ba'i bzhin gyis gsol ba btab pa// e ma rgyal ba nyid kyi sku// rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor dag
88b4(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin ye shes gnas las byung // dga' mdzad dkyil 'khor la dadus pa dang // byang chub sems sprin char chen gyis// nyon mongs dal sogs sbyong mdzad cing // thugs rje chen po ye shes kyis// tshogs
88b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'bras bu legs smin mdzad// sku mdangs dga' ba'i bzhin bcas pas// gsang ba'i theg pa bstan du gsol// khyod kyi dgongs don gting dpag dka'// zab cing phra la rgya che bas// 'khor rnams
88b6(rnying rgyud): the tshom ri bos non// thugs rje che mnga' gsal bar mdzod// 'di dag thams cad bstan pa'i snod// mgon po btang snyoms lhun mnga' mdzod// dus 'dir rtsom pa don che ste// smon lam 'bras bu mthar phyin mdzad// 
88b7(rnying rgyud): de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i brtan g.yo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs mnyam pa nyid rtse gcig gi sgo nas gzigs so// rnam par gzig
88b8(rnying rgyud): kun tu gzigs// de ltar dgongs nas dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad smra bsam las 'das par sna tshogs rnam par smros shig/ de nyid dngos po dang bar gzigs nas/ gzigs pa'i mtha' dang dgongs pa'i mthu
89a1(rnying rgyud): dang mdzad pa'i mtha' kun la snyoms pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te/ bkod pa dang rnam par bkod pa dang rnam par bshad pa dang dgongs pa dang rnam par dgongs pa dang / rol pa dang rol pa/ 
89a2(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / mdzad pa dang sna tshogs mdzad pas kun tu spro bar mi byed de/ 'jig rten drug gi rnam pas bsdus pa'i stong gsum gyi dngos po 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di las gzhan du snang bar mi dgongs so// 
89a3(rnying rgyud): de'i dus dang sa dang sa'i khyad par dang / dkyil 'khor bkod pa dag kyang rnam par mi gzigs/ kun tu mi gzigs shing dgongs pa yang mi 'gog go// de dag ni mthar yang mi gnas shing na mkha' lta bur bzhugs
89a4(rnying rgyud): so// de nas ting nge 'dzin de la bzhugs ma thag tu 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang chos thams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rang bzhin na mkha' lta bur rtogs par 'gyur ro// de nas yang gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo// 
89a5(rnying rgyud): rje ngo mtshar gyi sgo nas bskul zhing gzhan dag gi don thugs g.yo bar ma/ dzad pa'i glus g.yo slong bar mdzad de tshul ban don gyi rgyal po che// 'dren pa kun gyi rgyud nyid pas// namakha' lta bu'i rgyud nyid/ 
89a6(rnying rgyud): pas/ na mkha' lta bu'i dkyil 'khor nas// thugs rje chen po'i ya mtshan ston// kye ma'o mgon po don kun nas// zhi ba'i las dam 'jug byed pa// byang sems thugs rje'i rlan bral lam// rdos can chos dang 'grang 'gyur/ 
89a7(rnying rgyud): cing \u0f7fzhes gsol ba btab pa las kyang ci yang mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de nas yang yum gzi ldan pad+mo zhes bya bas rnam par mi rtog pa'i ting nge 'dzin las slong ba'i glus skul bar mdzad de/ mi dmigs ting 'dzin bsam
89a8(rnying rgyud): 'das brjod dang bral// bde ba chen po ye shes byang chub sems// mi dmigs thugs rje mi 'da' dam tshig gis// rol pa'i cho 'phrul rgya chen bstan du gsol// de skad ces yang bskul ba'i rjes// mgon po'i gnas
89b1(rnying rgyud): rnams la dgongs nas// 'od zer rnams bkod 'dzub mdzad de// 'khor ba legs sbyin skabs dbye mdzad// leg so lags rdo rje can// pad+mo 'dzin pa'i grogs bcas pas// yang yang bskul bar mdzad pas na// gnang
89b2(rnying rgyud): zhing bstan par mdzad pa la// dga' ba'i spyan rjes dang bar gyis// gang 'dod rtogs pa zhi bar mdzod// ma 'ongs rtogs pa mtha' dag rnams// thugs rje shugs kyis bzung mdzad de// don kun khyab pa'i snang ba yis// 
89b3(rnying rgyud): gzung bar bya ba'i skabs dbye mdzad zhes gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las rnam par sprul pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
89b4(rnying rgyud): de nas dga' zhing 'khor 'dus pas// dga' ba'i bzhin bzangs rgyas ma dzad de// gtso bos ci ltar bka' stsal bzhin// thugs rjes 'byung ba 'i dkyil 'khor gzungs// de nas gzi ldan pad mo can// 'dzum ma dang
89b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas pas bskul mdzad de// 'o byed 'khyud pa la sogs pa// dga' ba/ zhin chags par rnam par 'gyur// e ma rig pa'i rgyal po khyod// thugs rje chen po nyi 'od bzhin// thugs rje 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gzu
89b6(rnying rgyud): phyogs rigs med pas go 'byed pas// yul du gyur pa kun rgyad dgongs// mi dmigs cho 'phrul na mkha' las// bkod pa rgya mtsho sprin phung ba zhin// thugs rje sprul pa'i char chen pos// sna tshogs las brgyad dag
89b7(rnying rgyud): par mdzod// de nas gtso bo rdo rje 'chang // ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs mdzad de// rang gis mtshan mos rab mdzes pas// rgyal po zil gnon gzi brjid can// phyag gi 'khor lo rab bskor cing // phyogs rnams
89b8(rnying rgyud): kun tu gzigs mdzad de// mi dmigs na mkha'i dbyings dag na// rdo rje sbrul sku mngon phyung nas// gzi ldan pad+mo chen mo dang // rol pa'i tshul du bzhugs mdzad de// 'dzum mig chags pa'i bzhin dag gis// 'khor
90a1(rnying rgyud): slong ba'i sngags brjod do// oM A hUM ma hA b+hasmi sha ku ru bi na hri da ya oM b+ha ba hi a la la ho// gnyis su med pa'i byang sems kyis// dkyil 'khor sbyor zhing bsdu bar mdzod// bsod nams ye
90a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs rdzogs sku// rdo rje gar gyis rol mdzad cing // dga' mchog rdo rje byang chub sems// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i pad+mo'i gnas// dkar mtsher dag pa'i rang bzhin te// dmar po dbang dang gnyis med par// gsal
90a3(rnying rgyud): khyab kun tu spros pa las// dkyil 'khor sprul pa mtha' yas 'thon// zhi 'gog mya ngan 'das pa dang // byang chub mgon gnas lam zhes dag/ gnyis med gnyis su sbyor mdzad cing // rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas
90a4(rnying rgyud): la bkod/ ngo mtshar sprul pa rnam par rol// brjid dang bcasadapas gar mdzad cing // 'dzum par mdzad dang rol pa dang // kun tu 'gying dang spyan mdzes bltam// smin ring bskyod cing bsgyur ba
90a5(rnying rgyud): dang / rdo rje phur pas g.ya' ba slong // 'dor zhing skum dang 'jog/ ldeg dang // rnam par rol pa'i gar gyis kyang // rigs/ kyi phrin las sna tshogs sprul// na mkha' kun tu khyab par mdzad// 
90a6(rnying rgyud): rnam par rol pa'i bde 'byung bar// byang chub sems sogs zhi zhing gsal// rol pa'i char nyid mngon 'bab pas// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// brtan dang g.yo ba ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing khams
90a7(rnying rgyud): dag byas nas// byang chub sems tshegs rol pa las// brdeg dang 'khyud dang sdom pa las// sbyor dang bstim dang mnyes pa dang // kun tu rab dgyes ye shes thig/ sna tshogs snang ba nyi ma 'od // yang dag bde la
90a8(rnying rgyud): rab gnas mdzod// de 'dus po'i tshe tshogs pa'o// phyogs bcu kun nas bzhengs mdzad de// thabs dang shes rab byin rlabs pa'i// byang sems rnam dag rgyun gyis mchod// rnga dang sil snyan sgra sgrogs shing / 
90b1(rnying rgyud): dbang po tshim pa'i ro rtsed dang // gar dbyangs glu drug sna tshogs kun// stong gsum gang bar srung byas te// bcom ldan pad+mo bde'ang bde// gzi ldan yum dang bcas par mchod// e ma 'dus pa'i tshogs
90b2(rnying rgyud): dbus na/ thugs rje che mnga' nyi dkyil bzhin// 'khor lo kun sgyur sgrol mdzad pas// rang gi dkyil 'khor rgyas par mdzad// rdo rje 'chang ba'i gsol 'debs kyis// dkyil 'khor dag la
90b3(rnying rgyud): lhun grub rdzogs// pad+ma'i dpal ldan sems pa che// phrin las ye shes gnas kun sbyong // khyod zhabs bskyed pa thugs rje'i stobs// khams gsum ma lus dag pa yi// de bzhin nyid kyi ye
90b4(rnying rgyud): shes mchog/ mgon po bka' drin mdzad pas legs// de skad gsol btab dgyes par 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po'i ga nas la bzhugs// de nas dga' ba'i byang chub sems// sngon gyi
90b5(rnying rgyud): rgyud dang lam bzhi las// sprul pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang // sngon gyi rgyud dang lam grogs rnams// dgod/ sa shing thugs rje'i ye shes thugs// rang bzhin gnas nas
90b6(rnying rgyud): kun dgongs te// phyogs bzhi nas ni bskul bar mdzad// kye kye mchog gsum bde ba'i sku// byams pa'i thugs mnga' sku gsal mdzad// rdo rje rgyal po byang chub sems// bdag dgongs 'gro
90b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i don chen mdzad// kye kye yon tan rin chen tshogs// thugs rje mnyam nyid ye shes che// rgyal po 'khor lo byang chub nyid// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs sprul pa'i mdzod// kye kye rnam par dag pa'i sku/ 
90b8(rnying rgyud): dga' ba'i rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i gnas// so so'i ye shes sna tshogs 'byed// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin nyid// kye kye 'gro ba'i don chen bdag/ btang snyoms mi 'dor sna tshogs dor// bya ba grub pa'i
91a1(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin mchog/ phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag ston// rang dga'i skum pas g.yo mdzad de// phyogs pa ni byang chub dga' nas 'jug/ kye ma'i 'gro rnams de bzhin nyid/ 
91a2(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul las// nyon mongs gzung 'dzin sgrib pa yis// rang gi mtha' lam 'ges par byed// 'di dag thugs rje'i gnas su rung // ye shes gsal ba'i thabs mang pos// thams
91a3(rnying rgyud): cad dus gcig bsgral byas nas// rang gi bde chen don ston mchog/ zhes gsungs pad+ma'i rig pa 'dzin// sangs rgyas sras bcas dga' bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa gsang
91a4(rnying rgyud): bdapal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las thugs rje sprul pa'i rol pa'i le 'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// rdo rje 'chang bstan
91a5(rnying rgyud): las langs// bde gshegs bsngags brjod byed cing // bcu mangs dbyangs kyi gsol ba btab// kye maho mchog sa sum dam tshig sku// ye shes bla na med pa'i bdag/ byang chub
91a6(rnying rgyud): sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rnam 'phrul thugs rje'i dus nyid pas// rigs kyi 'khor lo dpag med sku// de ring bkra shis phun sum tshogs// thugs rje chen po yal 'dor na// ci phyir theg chen mchog tu/ 
91a7(rnying rgyud): sngags/ yang dag zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas// thugs rjes dkyil 'khor gzigs par mdzad// mgon po'i pad+ma'i sku de nyid// gzi ldan yum dang rol mdzad cing // dri med ye shes phyogs gzigs
91a8(rnying rgyud): shing nga gnyis med byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// theg pa gsang chen cher 'byung ba'i// lam 'di dpal ldan rol mo'i mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bcas bsdud mdzad de// gzhan 'phrul gnas
91b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs g.yo mdzad cing // stong gsum 'di dag sbyong mdzad cing // ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'byug ste// sku la 'od zer spro bar mdzad// des khyab rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal// ye shes 'od 'dangs sems
91b2(rnying rgyud): dpa'i sku gnas lngar gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzhug/ phyag rgya chen po yongs rdzogs sku// zhal gsum phyag drug dga' ba'i mdangs// dmar gsal pad+ma ra ga'i mdangs// g.yas g.yon zhal gnyi
91b3(rnying rgyud): sngo dang sar rigs rgyan mtshan ma kun gyis mdzes// phyag na pad sdong bum pa dang // rdo rje rtse lnga dpal be'u dang // mtha' mas mnga' gsor gzhu 'dzin pa'o// rin chen sna tshogs na bza' dang // phyag rgya'i
91b4(rnying rgyud): yum bcas rol pa mdzad// gzhal yas khang pa sgo bzhi dang // rin chen sna tshogs rta babs bcas// dra ba dra phyed mu tig phreng // ban d+ha dril bu sogs kyis spras// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor cher
91b5(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa'i// pho brang ka ba gdung rnams la// pad+mo rdo rje so/ gas pas spras// 'dod pa'i yon tan phun sum tshogs// gnas rnams kun tu rin chen khri// pad+ma 'khor lo nyi zlas ma
91b6(rnying rgyud): phyi rol par khyams 'khor ba dang // snod rnams kun du pad+ma la// thabs dang shes rab bye brag gis// nyi ma zla brkyang ba'o// de nas pa d+mo rnams dag kun// dbus kyi gdan la bzhugs mdzad de// dgyes
91b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i gar dbyangs bskyod pa'i mthus// thabs dang shes rab rdzogs par mdzad// de tshe thugs mchog byang chub sems// mkha' glong rnam par dag pas na// rig pa bde ba chen po'i sku// sna tshogs sna tshogs/ 
91b8(rnying rgyud): shar ba de gsung nyis yi ge 'khor lo'i tshogs// 'bar ba 'od zer rtse lnga pa// cho ga'i yan lag rim bzhin du// thugs kyi mtshan ma dam tshig bya// sngags bcas 'phro zhing 'du ba'i tshul// rgyal po bden/ 
92a1(rnying rgyud): gshegs yab yum dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems ma dang // las mdzad khro bo yab yum dang // phyag rgya chen po'i skur gyur nas// rigs kyi rgyal phreng mtshan mas ma/ 
92a2(rnying rgyud): rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs shing // rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'khod// de tshe mgon po bde chen po// rigs kun bdag 'gyur zhes bya bas// pad+mo rnam par 'phrul pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po
92a3(rnying rgyud): 'byin par mdzad// byang sems kaM las rnam 'phrul pa'i// bde shes 'od zer snang ba'i sku// zhal dang phyag la sogs pa'i brgyan// gtso bo'i cha lugs ci ltar bar// rang 'od yum dang 'khril bar mdzod// 
92a4(rnying rgyud): bkra shis mtshan ldan bde ba la// rAg pad+mo hUM zhes pas/ sngags mchog yi ge 'bru brgyad de// las kun grub par mdzad pa yin// gang gi pad+ma sha ri dang // b+hud+d+ha hUM gis bsnan byas na/ 
92a5(rnying rgyud): zhi rgyas dbang drag las kun dang // grub chen brgyad kyi tshogs so// rnams// sbyor ba tsam gyis grub 'gyur zhing // yun rings gnas pa gnas pa yin// 'byin pa'i dus su gsang sngags la// yi
92a6(rnying rgyud): ge dza yis bdags byas nas// rnam 'phro rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor// rigs bdag sku gnas dgyes pas bzhugs// thugs rje skul ba'i glu dang sngags// 'od zer tshogs kyis skul ba mdzod// dam tshig gsum ston
92a7(rnying rgyud): sngags kyi mthus// dgyes chags brtan pas gzi dang ldan// oM rnam dag pad+mo bde ba'i dbyings// ye shes byin las gsal ba'i mchog/ dkyil 'khor gsang gsum dam tshig che// mnyam nyid rigs bdag
92a8(rnying rgyud): / thub pa che/ byin brlab 'dor bar mi mdzad pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// gsal mdzad gnyis su med pa'i sku// rang gi ngo bos gnas pa yin// gtso bo sngags kyis bskul byas te// 'od zer
92b1(rnying rgyud): rgyan bcas thugs kar bsdus// yi ge a nas a'i bar// bcu drug 'od zer 'phro byas pas// 'gro kun sangs rgyas sku bkod cing // rigs 'thun dkyil 'khor kun gsal 'gyur// sngags kyis 'od zer sgral bcas pas// 
92b2(rnying rgyud): chos rnams bcu drug dag pa'i dbyings// rang gi gnas su bkod byas pas// mtshan mchog sum cu rtsa gnyis rdzogs// de bzhin ka nas k+Sha'i bar// sum cu rtsa bzhi'i rim bzhin bsal// brnyan pa'i yi ge drug dang bcwa/ 
92b3(rnying rgyud): 'od 'phros thams cad sangs rgyas sku// ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal byas na// sngags kyi 'od zer sgrar byas nas// chos mang ye shes zag pa med// slar nyid sku yi gnas bzhugs pas// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu rdzogs// 
92b4(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang rin chen sna bdun dang // bkri shis brgyad sogs kun gyis spras// khaM las rnam 'phrul tshe mtha' yas// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dmar mdangs// pad+ma sogs dang ral gri 'dzin// chos kyi snang ba'i rgyan gyis bskrun
92b5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma rgyan 'bring rang bzhin mchog/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// gaM las sprul pa'i chos dbang phyug/ dmar so ranal gcig phyag gnyis pa// pad+ma'i phreng ba bum pa 'dzin// dkyil
92b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor gan su bzhugs pa'o// g+ha la sprul pa'i chags med 'os// zhal gcig phyag gnyis byu ru'i 'od// bang gnas glegs bam me long dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// de las sprul pa'i spyan
92b7(rnying rgyud): dag ma zhal gcig phyag gnyis brtsod kyi mdog/ rin chen phreng bas bsil yab 'dzin// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs pa'o// tsa las sprul pa'i mi bskyod pa// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mu shel mdog// rdo rje dril 'dzin ma/ 
92b8(rnying rgyud): ba'i tshul 'dapal be'u bum sogs 'od phreng rgyan// tshe las sprul pa'i rta dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi bai DUr+ya// rin chen snyem dung por 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// dza las sprul pa'i 'brug sgra ni// zhal
93a1(rnying rgyud): gcig phyag gnyis gur dgum mdog/ rin chen chags shing 'gu 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// nye las sprul pa'i drimed dpal// zhal gcig drug bzhi mar gang mdog/ rin chen pang / 
93a2(rnying rgyud): srungs za ma tog/ byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// taM las sprul pa'i rin chen dbyangs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin chen dril bu yum dang 'khril// rin chen mdzod spungs 'khor lo sogs// the las
93a3(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i na mkha'i mdog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi sngo skya'i mdangs// rin chen gling bu pad+mo 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// de las sprul pa'i dra ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthing ka'i mdog/ rin chen phreng
93a4(rnying rgyud): dang pad+mo 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// d+haM las sprul pa'i dkon mchog rgyan// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// chos kyi rgyal mtshan rgyud mdangs 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'gro/ 
93a5(rnying rgyud): gnas la bzhugs// ni las sprul pa'i rin chen tog/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra ta// dgos 'dod bum pa dpag bsam shing / byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// TaM las sprul pa kun tu snang
93a6(rnying rgyud): zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ 'khor lo dril 'dzin yum dang bum pa 'dzin// gtsug tor dri med rdo rje 'dzin// thaM las sprul pa'i 'od kyi dpal// zhal gcig phyag bzhi shel gyi mdog/ 'khor lo dra ba ral gri 'dzi/ 
93a7(rnying rgyud): shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// daM las sprul pa'i dga' dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi nyi ma'i mdangs// 'khor lo rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i mdzod// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// taM las
93a8(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i cho 'phrul bkod// zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// nyi ma'i 'od phreng rdo rjes smras// nub kyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// ne las sprul pa'i rnam par gzigs// zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldang
93b1(rnying rgyud): skya'i mdangs// kun sha'i chun po'i a mra'i mdangs// byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// baM las sprul pa'i don yod pa// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang sngo'i mdog/ rgya gram dril bcas yum dang 'khril/ 
93b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gdengs pos ral gri 'dzin// paM la sprul pa'i brtson 'grus 'khyugs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ti ka/ rgya gram phreng ba rtse gsum 'dzin// shar gyi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// baM wa/ 
93b3(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i las chen po// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdog/ pad+ma'i phreng ba nor bu 'dzin// lho yi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// b+he las sprul pa'i gnod sbyin bdul// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad+ma'i
93b4(rnying rgyud): mdangs/ phyag na rdo rje mche ba 'dzin// nub kyi dkyil 'khor ba/ nas la bzhugs// maM las sprul pa'i sna tshogs dam// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdangs// zla ba rin chen dbyug pa 'dzin/ 
93b5(rnying rgyud): byang gi dkyil 'khor gnas la bzhugs// bder gshegs rgyal ba de dag kyang // tsakra bsgyur rgyal ma lus dang // mtshan dang / dpe byad sna tshogs brgyan// rigs btsun btsun mo mdzes par bya/ 
93b6(rnying rgyud): yang sprul byams pa'i dbang phyug ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gangs ri mdog/ rdo rje gdengs dbyug ral gri dang // dri shul thod bcas pad+ma'i lcug/ rnga ma brjid 'khor bcas yum dang 'khril// drag po'i rgyan cha shar gyi sgo// kha las
93b7(rnying rgyud): sbrul pa rtse ba'i dbang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi gser gyi mdog/ rin chen dbyug pa pad+mo dang // thod lnga rdo rje myu gu'o// raM las sprul pa'i rnam grol dbang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar mdangs gsal// pad+ma dang ni dril bu dang // 
93b8(rnying rgyud): sbrul ras sngon pa dan 'dzin// le las sprul pa'i 'gro dbang phyug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i mdog/ rdo rje rgya gram pad+mo dang // gri gug gtun shing phreng ba can// rin chen phreng bas mdzes byas nas// 'khor bcas rngam pa'i
94a1(rnying rgyud): mdangs bcas gra lho la sogs pa'i sgo bzhi ru// gzhan 'jig drag po las kyis 'khod// shi las sprul pa'i byin dbang byug/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi dkar dpa 'od// rtse gsum pan d+ha rin chen/ 
94a2(rnying rgyud): 'khril me yi thod pa ri mos mtshan// ShaM las smra ba'i dbang phyug ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser skya'i mdangs// rin chen rtse dgu bgreng phreng dang // pad+ma'i lcug ma sdigs 'dzub mdzad// sa las sprul pa'i spyod dbang phyug/ 
94a3(rnying rgyud): zhal gcig phyag bzhi dmar skya'i mdangs// dbyug pa rtse gcig pad+ma dang // dgra sta zhags pa phyag na 'dzin// haM las sprul pa'i dbang phyug ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i sku// ral gri lcags kyu dgra sta dang // me yi
94a4(rnying rgyud): phreng ba 'khor lo 'dzin// gzhan 'jom 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i mchog da rang 'od rigs 'thun yum dang rol// drag po'i rgyan tshogs dam lus 'gengs// pad+ma'i 'dab ma bzhin du 'khod// ka las bde ba
94a5(rnying rgyud): blo gros dang // zhal gcig phyag bzhi na mkha'i mdangs// yum pa/ ces rdo rje dril bu dang // na mkha'i mdzod kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'a khor dang // kha las khang pa rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs can// zhal gcig
94a6(rnying rgyud): phyag bzhi pu sha ra// rin chen pi bang phreng ba dang // rnga yab rdo rje cod pan thogs// ga las gzi brjid bkod pa ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rgya skegs mdog/ pad+ma'i lcug ma zla ba dang // 'khor lo yid bzhin bum pa dang // g+ha wa
94a7(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i 'khor lo gnon pa ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma ra dang // 'khor lo dbyug pa ma mo shing // rgya gram rin chen lcug ma 'dzin// tsa las shes rab snang ba ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang skya'i mdangs// rin chen pud
94a8(rnying rgyud): po pad+ma dang / rtse gsum dril thabs 'od dkyil 'khor// tsha las rdo rje rgyal mtshan te// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ser gyi mdog/ rin chen gdugs mdzes nyi ma dang // dpa' bo longs spyod pad+ma'i spyan// dza las 'od zer 'gro ba / 
94b1(rnying rgyud): zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdangs mar gsal// pad+ma 'khor lo mchod sdong bu// mu tig chun po za ma tog/ dz+ha las sprul pa'i drag shul can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog/ 'od kyi me tog phung 'od dang // ral
94b2(rnying rgyud): gri 'bar ba g.yas dang g.yon// ta las sprul pa'i dri ma sel// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dmar skya'i mdangs// nyi ma'i phreng ba gaN DI rdeg/ chos kyi tsakra rdzogs byed pa'o// tha las sgyu ma'i 'phrul pa ni// zhal gcig phyag
94b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa la sha/ seng ge rgya mtsho rin chen phreng // rin chen bum pa de bcud bcas// las kyi rin chen rgyal po ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rA ga'i mdangs// ri bo pad+ma chu dri dang // gserare nya 'phyo ba'i rdzing bu yin// d+ha las 'phros
94b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i dra ba can// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang khu'i mdog/ rgya gram dril dbu 'phro ba dang // ban d+ha sbrang yab 'dzag pa'i rgyun// ta las sbrul pa'i lag bzangs ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi kar ta'i 'od// pad+ma'i rgyal
94b5(rnying rgyud): mtshan dkar dmar mdangs// dri yi zhong pa kun sha'i tshul// tha las ser 'od 'phro ba 'dzin// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mthong ka'i mdo/ ga glegs bam mdzes pa'i sku gzugs dang // rin chen mdzod dang zla/ 
94b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'od Da las rin chen snye ma ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi pad rA ga/ pad+ma'i sdong bu dang ga bsam shing // ban d+ha rtse gsum zla tshes gzugs// d+ha las chos kyi mthong ba ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi sna tshogs sku// go cha ye
94b7(rnying rgyud): shes sgron ma dang // dpal be'u zur brgyad nor bu tog/ sna tshogs sprin phur ser gra bcas// mche ba dril bu ngang pa 'dzin// b+ha las gzhon nu rin chen ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi ljang ser mdog/ rgya gram 'khor lo'i
94b8(rnying rgyud): phreng ba dang // 'od zer rtse gsum sngags pa'i bum// sems dpa' chen po de dag rnams// rgyan phreng cha lugs 'od zer dang // yum gnas 'khril zhing rang gnas kyi// gtso la 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs// nya ma na
95a1(rnying rgyud): la 'phrul pa yi// rdo rje rnam par gnon la sogs// rigs kyi mtshan ma ci bzhin du// pad+ma rA ga rag ta mdangs// be'u gser mdog in dra bzhin// pad+ma rdo rje rims sogs mtshan// zhal gcig phyag bzhi
95a2(rnying rgyud): yum dang 'khril// 'og ma'i phyag mtshan 'thun pa yi// rang rtags mtshan ma sna tshogs dang // pad+ma'i lcug mas mtshan byas pa'i// me tog 'bras bu rnams kyis mdzes// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs bzhi ru// byang
95a3(rnying rgyud): chub sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas su 'khod// yarba ra las sprul pa yi// pad+ma 'phro ba la sogs bzhi// zhal gcig phyag gnyis dkar dang ser// dmar ljang pad+mo me long dang // rin chen
95a4(rnying rgyud): phreng ba pi dang gar// mchod pa las mdzad nang gi 'tshams// Sha da sha sa ha las 'phrul pa'i// pad+mo tshim byed la sogs bzhi// de zhal gcig phyag gnyis rigs gnyis gzugs// gdug spos me
95a5(rnying rgyud): tog dung dang dri// 'ging tshul tri shul las kyi tshul// mchod pas bya'i mtshams na gnas// de dag gi gsang sngags ni// oM d+hi hi rA ga pad+ma shi ri bu ta hU hUM swA hA// oM pad+ma ma hA d+ha ba ra bu na si ta ma hA d+ha
95a6(rnying rgyud): ma hri da yA hUM hUM/ prad tad ya dza swA hA/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gyi'o// oM tsakra a na ka na ma rak+Sha saM b+ha rad na hri ti pa ya ba ti dza swA hA// nub phyogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// oM badz+ra dar ba kri ta ya ni sha ra ti pa shaM ni dza swA
95a7(rnying rgyud): shar phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la'o// oM ra na ku ti du man ta ban d+ha ban d+ha dun du na bi dza swA hA// lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor ba'o// oM pi sha tsi na d+ha ma du ru ha ha ha ha sarba gurba ni hU~M phaT swAhA// byang gi dkyil 'khor ba'o// oM ma ma
95a8(rnying rgyud): a ba lo ka na ru ru yu ru si de b+h+yo de satwa ma ma hUM dza swA hA/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// oM bi lo ka na ma si ta na ma ku ru ku ru bo b+hi satwa b+ha ra bun dza hU dza swA hA// rigs las sprul pa'i byang chub sems kyis
95b1(rnying rgyud): oM bin d+ha bin d+ha sarba karma si de bi ku ru pro te saM bo ha hUM oM aM dza swA hA/ lha mo rnams kyi'o// oM a pasma ra kro d+ha sni lag sha hUM hUM hUM bi ta pa ka phaT swA hA/ khro bo rnams kyi'o// gsang sngags rgyal po ma zad pas// rnam par
95b2(rnying rgyud): sprul pa sku yis ni// stong gsum gnas nas g.yo mdzad de// rang gi lha la gsal bar mdzod// de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// bde chen gor gyi dbang phyug gis// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum gsal byed pa'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms hA
95b3(rnying rgyud): nas/ dkyil 'khor byin brlabs dbang bskur zhing // rigs kyi bdag pos gsal bar mdzod// gnas kun mtshan ma yongs dag nas// rnam gsum snang ba gnyis med 'gyur// oM na ma sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bAg tsit+ta ma hA bo d+hi h+ya su tra tri \u0f7f
95b4(rnying rgyud): shu d+he so na khya hU hUM hUM/ oM rin chen dbu rgyan gyi sngags/ sarba pu ta ku dard na ma ma ku ta/ a a bir+ya sad ma ma ku a b+hi Shiny+tsa oM AHhUM sU hA/ oM pad+ma a mo ka sa ma ya shrI ha ha ha tshin d+ha ma ni asmi sha bi ma ma ya hUM hUM/ 
95b5(rnying rgyud): sngags gsum gyis gsal ba'i byed pa'o// oM bi sha tsin d+ha ma ni a ba saM bo da ma ma ku ru si la la ta si na ba bud pa paM da hUM hUM hUM/ rnam par spro ba'i sngag so// oM ma ta la ni bi sha tsakra ku ma ta bu ta na ma sil du tI si hUM ban
95b6(rnying rgyud): swA hAHdkyil 'khor gsal ba'i sngag so// oM aM a a min du she ma la shan dun d+he ta thA ga ta b+h+yod ti pad+ma ku ru AHhUM swA hA/ rbad pa'i sngags so// oM pad+ma mu khaM pad+ma babs po ti dir yaM gu ru hUM hUM hUM haM ha da ra sha swA hA/ snying po'i sngags/ 
95b7(rnying rgyud): oM na ma su traM b+ho ga na gu ma le saM sa ra hUM phaT swAhA// rigs pa mchog gi sngag so// oM ba gag pa saM po pad+ma d+ha a h+ya hi ma hA ka ru mad a ma d+hu na dza dza// spyan drang ba'i sngags so// oM pad+mo sa ga ga su ra ta ra ga sa ye s+t+waM// gdan gyi sngag
95b8(rnying rgyud): so/ oM a mu ka si na sarba b+h+yo ga ga ta pu tsa me da na da hUM tri swA hA// mchod pa'i sngag so// oM pad+ma bi la ku ma la su naM tu traM swA hA/ pa se hi hi// dgyes par bya ba'i sngag so// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po mchog/ rdo rje gsang ba rmad
96a1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba'i// sku dang gsung thugs gsang sngags che// byin gyis brlabs pa don bshad mdzad// bde bar gshegs pa'i ye shes mchog/ de dag dkyil 'khor rnam 'phrul mchog/ dri ma med
96a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub sems// de ni dkyil 'khor snying po mchog/ rdo rje gsang ba'i gnas chen po// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i tshul// rang bzhin byang chub sems nyid la// rang bzhin lhun grub rdzogs chen po// 'gro ba'i
96a3(rnying rgyud): snang ba dam pa'i mchog/ rang bzhin dag pa dri med chos// dkyil 'khor gnas mchog gnyis med pa'o// phung po khams sogs rnam dag sku// e ma'i chos sku mya ngan 'das// e ma'i chos rnams ye shes sku// e mdo// 
96a4(rnying rgyud): chos kun rnam par 'phrul// rgya che sngags kyi tshul ldan pa'i// dkyil 'a 'khor gsang gsum ngo mtshar che// thabs lnga mdzad pa sna tshogs dkyis// sngon dang da ltar 'brel don 'byung // thabs mkhas pha rol phyin
96a5(rnying rgyud): bcu rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes dag pa'i shugs// sa dngas 'dasadon chen po// ta thA ga ta'i byin brlabs dbyings// la la sku dngag/ sung dang thugs// zab pa de nyid rang gi mthus// gsang gsum gnas
96a6(rnying rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// ya mtshan chos la phyag 'tsha lo// rnam 'phrul sku la phyag 'tsha lo// byang chub sems la phyag 'tsha lo// zhes so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol
96a7(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyud las dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// dga' ba chen po ngo mtshar gyis// rgyud gsum rnam dag tshim gyur/ 
96a8(rnying rgyud): nas dgyes pa'i dbyings kyis gsol ba btab// e ma'i ngo mtshar ya mtshan te// gnyis med rol pa ya mtshan che// dri med dag pa ya mtshan che// 'od 'phro 'du ba la mtshan te/ byang chub sprin bung la mtshan te// sangs rgyas
96b1(rnying rgyud): 'byung ba la mtshan che// 'phrul pa 'byung ba ya mtshan che// khro bo 'byung ba la mtshan che// byin brlabs chu 'phrul ya mtshan che// tha brnyan mdzad la mtshan che// 'gog pa rlung mdzad ya mtshan che// bdag cag 'khor tshogs 'dus pa/ 
96b2(rnying rgyud): rnams 'dam tshig can du byin brlabs mdzad// za 'og rim pa ci bzhin du// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral du 'god// de nas bcom ldan bde chen pos// chags pa chen po rdo rje'i sku// sku dang gsung thugs gnyis med pa'i// 'khon
96b3(rnying rgyud): rnams rab tu sbyang ba'i phyir// rdo rje rgyan gyi ting 'dzin gyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod// de tshe byang chub sems chen po// 'od zer kun tu khyab pa des// dga' chen po'i mchod pa yis// gnas kyi mtshan ma gsal
96b4(rnying rgyud): bar mdzod// 'du shes med dang 'gog gnas sogs// rang gi rtog pa/ 'i mtha' zhes rnams// dri ma med pa'i byang chub sems// rin chen/ dachungs dbang skur nas// rang gi ye shes dbang thob ste// 'gro ba'i don
96b5(rnying rgyud): byed nus dang ldan// las la spyod pa'i gnas rnams dang // rang skyob pa yi sems dag gis// thugs rje chen po'i byang chub sems// sangs rgya sa brtan pa 'di gnyer ro// byang chub sems kyi mtshan ma yis// 'du
96b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i gnas lnga rig par bya// oM gu h+ya badz+ra sa ma sto/ a la la ho// rdo rje ro langs bsdus pa yi// gsang ba'i dam tshig chen po rnams// rigs kyi dgongs pa ci lta bar// rdo rje gsang ba'i las la gnas// skal bzangs dam tshig chen
96b7(rnying rgyud): po ste/ de las 'das na brlag par 'gyur// bka' yi sgo ba'i don chen pos// 'das pa'i 'khor tshogs bsam yas pas// dam tshig thob pas gral 'khod do// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po nyid// dbang thob las mdzad chen po des/ 
96b8(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la gtsug gi phyag/ rnal 'byor lug su byas nas ni// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod// mnyam 'gyur gsol ba rab tu gtab// 'di ltar ma byung ngo mtshar khyod// sangs rgyas rnams kyi dbang phyug che// mngon spyod ya man+da/ 
97a1(rnying rgyud): ston par spyod// bkara' yi 'khor lo dam pa nyid// smra bas ma yul las rab 'das kyang // dpes mtshon snang ba la brten nas// yi ge ming tshogs la sogs kyis// gsal bar mtshon te go bar mdzod// 
97a2(rnying rgyud): ston pa dbang phyug dam pa des// gsol ba btab pa'i don dgongs nas// brjod bsam 'das pa'i ting 'dzin las// mnyam par bzhugs nas mi gsung bzhugs// de na 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs kyis// stobs mchog seng ge chen
97a3(rnying rgyud): po lang logasu btud de phyag 'tshal nas// rmad 'byung mchod pa sna tshogs byas// gsol btab blo mchog seng ge khyod// bdag cag zhu ba'i gnas skabs phye// stobs mchog seng ge gsang bdag gis// gsol ba btab pa'idi/ 
97a4(rnying rgyud): dgongs nas// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshegs khyod nyon cig/ bdag la zhus cig/ spobs par byos// slar nyid gsol ba btab pa'i don// kun gyi sa 'thun pa'i tshig smras pa// mgon po rgyal ba kun gyi mdzod// sangs
97a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas rnams kyi sras kyi mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' rje btsan la// cho sa rnams ston pa'i gnas la gsan// bcom ldan gsang ma/ cho ga dam pa des// gsang sngags lam rnams mi ston cing // dgongs
97a6(rnying rgyud): mdzad 'brel bas mi mdzad pa// rgyu dang rkyen gyis gang lags pa// 'khor ni tshegs la bstan du gsol// gsal zhing dbye bar mdzad par rig/ zhus pa'i don nyid slar gsungs pa// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i mdzod// sku gsung
97a7(rnying rgyud): / thugs kyi rdo rje dngos// sna tshogs snang zhing gsal bar mdzod// de nyid rdzogs pa'i gsang sngags can// bshad las 'das pa'i don de ni// dgongs don rgyal bas gsung mi mdzad// de ltar ston pa rgyal mchog gis// rnam par
97a8(rnying rgyud): brjod pa mi mdzad pas// yang dag don gyi snying po nyid// rgya cher bka' ni gsal ba yin// 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams nyon cig/ byang chub dam pa'i snying po ni// smra bsams las 'das brjod med pas// tshig tu brjod pa
97b1(rnying rgyud): legs ma yin// gnyis mtha'i rtog pa las gzhan dag/ tshig gi snang bas the tsom skyed// grol ba nyid kyis 'ching 'gyur zhes// 'das dang ma byon thams cad dang // da ltar byung ba'i dgongs pa'i don// ma gsung mi gsung
97b2(rnying rgyud): gsung du med// de nas sems dpa'i snying po ni// spros dang bral ba'i byang chub sems// kun rdzob bden pa'i tshig dbang du// mtshon ma'i tshig gis rnal 'byor rnams// don dam rtogs dka' 'gro ba'i phyir// 
97b3(rnying rgyud): rgyal bas tshig skor bstan pa yis// 'dus tshegs 'khor gyis yang zhus pa// stobs mchog seng ge de ltar na// bdag sogs ma 'ongs rnal 'byor pas// tshig gi rjes 'brangs don dag tu// gsang
97b4(rnying rgyud): ba'i las brjod gsal byed pa// ji lta bu yis mtshon par 'gyur// da dpa' bo khyod ni rgyal ba'i sras// dbang bskur thob pa dar zhu ba spobs// bcom ldan dbang mchog dam pa la// zhus shing
97b5(rnying rgyud): stobs mchog seng ge khyod// des kyang 'khor gyis zhus pa bzhin// rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa la// phyag 'tshal rmad 'byung mtsho de rdzas nas// rdo rje tshig tu 'di skad gsol// kye ma ston pa thugs
97b6(rnying rgyud): chen po/ phyogs bcu rgyal ba kun 'dus pa// byang chub sems kyi mtshan nyid de// tshig tu brjod pa ma mdzad na// ma 'ongs dgra la rten pa dag/ don la rag par mi 'gyur phyir// mtshon bya mtshon par byas
97b7(rnying rgyud): nas ni/ snying po byang chub don 'di la// dpes mtshon 'thad par grub byed pa// gsang ba de nyid stan du gsol// de nas mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// ye shes lnga dang rtags ldan pa'o// phyag gi mtshan ma gsor mdzad
97b8(rnying rgyud): cings rmad 'byung ya mtshan ston par mdzad// thams cad pad+mor 'gyur ba yi// rmad 'byung chos kyi sgra yang sgrogs// oM AHhUM swA hA// bo d+hi tsit+ta gu h+ya/ sa ma ya as/ a nu bo d+hi tsit+ta a nan/ ta gar ba/ ma hA satwa pra ta
98a1(rnying rgyud): a hUM/ 'di ni gsungs ma thag tu yang // sangs rgyas grags chen thams cad dag/ rab tu drag cing brgyal 'gyur nas// gzhan lta ma lus smos ci dgos// bcom ldan 'das kyis
98a2(rnying rgyud): yang dag bka'// bshad kyis rigs kyi bu rnams nyon// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med par// yang dag bden pa'i don bstan pa// de ni dngos po mtshan nyid de// mkha' ldan chen po rnams kyi/ 
98a3(rnying rgyud): gdeng / ji srid blo yi chos dag tu// gnyis su snang ba'i mtshan ma la// bsam brjod kun rdzob zhes bya ste// de las 'das pa don dam yin// sku gsum gnyis su med pa yi// snang
98a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i dngos po ma 'gags pa// dus gsum bstan pa chen por gnas// yid bzhin pa yi don nyid do// thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i tshul// thams cad rang bzhin stong pa nyid// zung
98a5(rnying rgyud): du 'jug pa'i ye shes ni// de nyid bla med mchog dam pa// de skad ces ni bka' stsal nas// a la la yi sgra brje di do// stobs mchog seng ge dri ba dris// de ltar lags so// 
98a6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das// sngags kyi lha la blo gnas gang // sprod pa gnas pa gang dag gis// phan tshun 'brel 'gyur ci lta bur// blo yi rim pa 'jug bya 'am// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bdag
98a7(rnying rgyud): po khyod nyon cig/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa'i don// mtshan nyid rnam dag du lags pa// bgrang dang bgrang ba las 'das pa'i// dngos po mtshan nyid de bzhin no// legs spyod bden pa'i lam 'jug cing
98a8(rnying rgyud): rnam gsum sngags kyi don spyad na// 'brel pa shugs kyis sgrub byed na// lta spyod gnyis ldan bden pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor sa la legs gnas shing // bden gnyis 'brel pa'i don bsgrubs nas// yang
98b1(rnying rgyud): dag rtag pa'i don gsal 'gyur// rnal 'byoras sbyongs thob shog/ ma skyes thabs kyi ye shes ldan// thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings// bden gnyis dbye ba med pa yis// yang dag don mchog sgyu ma'i sku// kun
