98b2(rnying rgyud): rdzob sgyu ma thabs kyi gsung // phyag rgya sgyu ma'i tshul nyid de// med pa ma yin mtshan med de// rnal 'byor gnyis dang ldan phyir ro// slob pa'i rnal 'byor gnyis rten nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa goms nas/ 
98b3(rnying rgyud): bden 'gyur bden pa gnyis la gnas// che chung mthu yis grub pa yin// sgra yi rjes 'brangs rnal 'byor pas// don med spyod la gnas par 'gyur// yang dag kun rdzob bden gsal bas// gnyis
98b4(rnying rgyud): med don dam bden par gnas// sna tshogs chos kyi g.yul ngo// bzlog/ rig pa'i skyes bu rnam par grags// zhes pas/ dgyes par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
98b5(rnying rgyud): kyis dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyu da las de kho na nyid snyan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas rig pa'i skyes bu mchog/ gsang
98b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i bdag pos yang zhus pa// bcom ldan snying po byang chub sems// dgongs pa'i don ni ci lta bu// las dang nyon mongs dag byed pa'i// ye shes sgrol ma ci ltar lags// rgyal bas dgongs pa'i
98b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems// rdo rje lta bur mnyam gzhag nas// mi rtog ye shes gsal mdzad de// sna tshogs rnams kyang byang chub sems// bde ba che las gzhan med do// lus ngag yid gsum rnam pa
98b8(rnying rgyud): tshogs chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te// rnam gsum rdo rje lta bu nyid// sku gsum gsal ba rnam par snang // dngos po gsal ba'i chos med de// gcig las rnam 'phrul sna tshogs nyid// phyag rgya gar
99a1(rnying rgyud): thabs dbang sgyur bas// 'ching ba'i tshogs las rnam par grol// dngos po thams cad bral ba yi// phung khams skye mched rnam par dben// gzung 'dzin rtog pa'i yul bral bas/ 
99a2(rnying rgyud): dpag med pa yi ngo bo nyid// rnam gsum mchog gi don las byung // 'od gsal chen po'i rang bzhin no// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i don// rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i thugs// skye dang skye med sna tshogs
99a3(rnying rgyud): dngos// phyogs 'dzin mtha' yis bcing bar byed// de dag chos las rnam grol ba'o// bden pa chen po'i ting 'dzin rgya// ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad kyi chos// me long gsal ba'i rang bzhin can// rgyal ba
99a4(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi gsang ba'i mdzod// 'gag pa med pa'i chos na mas la// byang chub sems nyid skye bar 'gyur// mnyam nyi dad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// ya mtshan rmad du 'byung ba'i chos// sna
99a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs snang byed gnas grol ba// rang bzhin zhi ba'i byang chub se/ mas// gnyis kyi mtha' las grol ba'o// gnas dang ga/ nas med byang chub sems// ya mtshan rmad kyi don byung ba'o// rgya cher
99a6(rnying rgyud): so sor gsal ba'i ngang // kun rtogs byang chub sems chen po// dmigs med gsang ba las byung ba'i// dmigs dang mi dmigs sna tshogs ni// bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'o// ma 'gags pa yi chos nyid/ 
99a7(rnying rgyud): bya ba grub pa'i tshul can du// spros med spros pa sna tshogs snang // spro bsdu 'dun dang spros bral ba'i// mdzad pa'i byang sems brtan pa las// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul bla na med// ye shes rgya mtsho rmad du byung // rang
99a8(rnying rgyud): gi de nyid gsal bar 'gyur// rgyal bas bshad pa'i dgos don la// 'khor rnams ya mtshan ngoms par 'gyur// mchod dang zhal dag sgra 'byin cing // rang gi de nyid gsal 'gyur nas// byang sems de nyid bstod
99b1(rnying rgyud): par bya e ma'o stong nyid byang chub sems// e ma'o dag pa dri ma med// e ma'o mi sgrib gsal ba che// e ma'o mnyam nyid dbyer med chos// e ma'o so so rang gi sems// e ma'o bye byed lhun gyis grub// de bzhin
99b2(rnying rgyud): nyid la phyag 'tshal bstod// bcom ldan 'das nyid byang chub sems// byang chub sems nyid thugs kyi mchog/ bdag cag rig 'dzin tshegs pa rnams// byang chub sems nyid smon pa dang // 'jug dang ldan dang gnyis
99b3(rnying rgyud): med de/ rang gi byang chub sems g.yo bar bgyis// reg par bgyi zhing nye bar bgyi// nyam su myong bar 'tshal lags na// thugs rje che dgongs byin gyis rlobs// bde bar gshegs pas byin gyis rlobs// de skad tshig tu gsol
99b4(rnying rgyud): btab pas bcom ldan snying po 'di skad gsung // sna tshogs rnam nga dag ngo bo nyid// chos rnams 'phro ba'i tshogs rnams kun// rang ba bzhin brjod bral rtog pa med// rang gsang rtogs pa'i dka' ba'i don// srid
99b5(rnying rgyud): gsum ye nas rnam dag chos// bdag rtog 'khrul pa'i nye sa dmigs gyis// dus ring 'khyams 'gyur 'gro ba rnams// / rang rtog dngos po'i las la spyod// log pa'i sems kyis kun brtags
99b6(rnying rgyud): kyang rang bzhin nyid la 'gyur ba med// ye nas don gyis sangs rgyas la// 'khrul pa'i bde sdug 'khor los 'khyams// log rtog dngos med byang chub sems// 'khrul rtog mi gnas rgyan gyis mchog/ tha ba'i gnas
99b7(rnying rgyud): nyid byang chub zhing // srid dngos sangs rgyas mngon rdzogs sku// 'dzin rtog byang chub snying por gsal// brtan g.yo dngos po thams cad dang // bde chen sku las gzhan med do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dge/ 
99b8(rnying rgyud): pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las de bzhin nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// / bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor snying po bsdus pa'i don// de nas gsang
100a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag pa yis// dkyil 'khor rnam par 'gro 'don/ mtshan nyid 'phro nang rtogs pa dag / rgyal bas bshang phyir bskul 'debs mdzad/ bcom ldan rgyal ba thams cad kyi/ dkyil 'khor snyi
100a2(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa'i don// rgya che mdzad pa'i mthu ldan pa// rdo rje gsang ba gsum gyi gnas// rab rgyas mtshan bzhin choga'o// yan lag dag la bstan du gsol// de nas mgon po gsang ba'i bdag gnyis med ye shes la 'gro ba'i// ti 'dzi/ 
100a3(rnying rgyud): la snyoms zhugs gnas// rgya cher sprul pa'i don bstan mdzad// stong nyid ye shes las byung ba'i// ri bo rgyud 'dzin rigs mtshan can// dbyangs kyi yi ge'i tshul 'jug pa'i// rta bdun 'od sogs gsal byed ldan// skar ma'i tshogs
100a4(rnying rgyud): dang 'dra ba las// mnyam nyid 'od kyi gong bu'i gzugs// snang ba'i 'od zer lnga de yi tshul// phyag rgya mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rnam 'phros rang ri gzhing khams skyed // de dag gong du'i gzugs mardungs par// gtsos
100a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sku// stong nyid snying rje chen po yis// ma lus rgyud rnams gsal mdzad nas// namakha' dang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// thugs rjerjen po skyon skyong mdzad// sa bon gsang ba'i las byung ba'i// mkha' sngam
100a6(rnying rgyud): gsal ba kun khyab las// sna tshogs kun nas so so nyid// 'byung bzhi'i dkyil 'khor rim bzhin bkong // kun 'phrul sa bon las bskyed pa'i// ye shes rin chen sna tshogs gzugs// shar du do shal phreng ba dang // gdugs dang rgya
100a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan rnga yab sogs// me long rol mo'i tshogs bsam yas// 'khor lo rin chen rdo rje pad// tA ra na bzhi rgyan mdzes pa// sgra dbyangs sna tshogs nyi zla'i tshigs// tsakra bar khyams phreng ba dang // dam pa'i 'dod yon lha mo khrig/ 
100a8(rnying rgyud): rin chen 'bar ba'i khri rtsegs gnas// nyi zla pad+ma'i rin chen rgyan// gnas rnams khyab par ci bzhin par// dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub pa'o// a a/ i i/ u U/ e ai/ o au/ aM aHri rI/ li lI/ ka kha ga g+ha/ 
100b1(rnying rgyud): pa mthang rdzam rba rnas ta thang d+han/ pa la brnam/ yA la wa sha Shas hak+Sha/ de bzhin nyid byings rma 'byung ba'i// bder gshegs kun gyi thugs gsal ba// byin parlabs la mtshan sprul pa'i sku// dkyil 'kha
100b2(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs kun gyi gnas// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma med// phung po ches rnams sangs rgyas te// 'byung lngang dbyings phyag yum gyi mkha'// khams dang skye mched sems dpa'
100b3(rnying rgyud): dang / sems ma'i tshogs dang khro bo'i sku// byi nang srid gsum dngos snang ba'i// dkyil 'khor rigs kyi bdag nyid che// gzugs bung rnam par snang mdzad che// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan sku// 'du shes snang ba
100b4(rnying rgyud): mtha' yas sku// 'du byed don yod grub pa yin// rnam shes rdo rjes dmas dpa' ste// thams cad bder gshegs lnga yi sku// sa/ dmas sangs rgyas spyan yin te// chu khoms lha mo mA ma ki/ 
100b5(rnying rgyud): me khams na bza' dkar mo ste// rlung khams dam tshig sgrol ma'o// namakha' kun du bzang mo'i sku// 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa'o// dbang po'i spyod yul ma lus kun// thams
100b6(rnying rgyud): cad bder gshegs rigs kyi sku// mig la rnam par snang mdzad de// rna ba rin chen 'byung ldan che// sna la snang ba mtha' yas nyid// lce la don yongad grub pa'i sku// lus nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin// de ltar sna
100b7(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ye nas lhun grub gnas pas na// rnal 'byor gsang don shes bya// phyi rol don shes yul drug 'di// yum chen lnga yi phyag rgya'i dbyibs// gzugs khams sangs rgyas spyan ma ste/ 
100b8(rnying rgyud): sgra tshogs lha mo mA ma kI/ dri tshogs na bza' dkar mo'i dbyings// ro drug lha mo sgrol ma yin// reg tshogs lha mo kun tu bzang mo'i sku// dus gsum mnyam sbyor 'du 'bral med// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam sbyor bas
101a1(rnying rgyud): rang rigs dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzod// thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rol pa'i rgyun// nga nyid 'du 'bral med pa'i dbyings// thabs
101a2(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab rol pa'i mchog/ sa yi khyad par ma lus pa'ang // rdo rje chos kyis sbyor mdzad dang // yon tan phrin las mtha' phyin pas// tshe 'di nyid kyi go 'phang mchog/ rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshigs
101a3(rnying rgyud): che// rang gi mthu yi sbyor byed pa// rtag tu mnyam gzhag sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas bzhugs te// dri med byang chub sems kyi tshul// 'gro rnams tshegs bcas dag par byas// 
101a4(rnying rgyud): rtag tu gsang sngags brjod byas shing // rdo rje mgon po'i sgog/ sal brtan// rtag tu gtor sbyin gtang byas ste// khams kyi 'dzin pa med par grol// rtag tu lha la mchod byas te// rang gi bdud
101a5(rnying rgyud): rtsis mchod cing rol// rtag tu mi gnyis bstod bya ba// rnam grol thams cad drag cha'i sgra// pha rol phyin bcu dus cig tu// pad+ma cho ga rtogs par 'gyur// zag pa zad pas sku lnga dang // pad+ma
101a6(rnying rgyud): rigs kun mnyam par sbyor// pad+ma'i dam tshigs la gnas pa// gnas kun dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// pad+ma rang gi gnas su bsgom// 'dod chags chos kun spyod pa yi// mgon po rang rang gnas la
101a7(rnying rgyud): gsal// dri med dag pa'i thig le las// 'od zer lnga yi snang ba bcas// rang gi gnas nas 'phro mdzad cing // de nyid mgon po'i sku 'dod gzugs// kun tu pad+ma chags med pas// gnas kun
101a8(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// thub pa chen po'i mtshan rnams dang // dpe byad rdzogs par gyur nas ni// yon tan ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// kun tu dregs pa'i sangs rgyas mchog/ rdo rje'i dam tshig la/ 
101b1(rnying rgyud): gnas pas// rdo rje rang gi gnas su bsgom// 'od 'phros 'dus pa'i gnas phyag rgya yis// ye shes mnyam nyid kun don mdzad// thugs rjes rnam mang yul bral zhing // 'joms par mdzad pa'i khro bo'i sku// rang gi
101b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dri bral ba// mngon gsum gsang ba'i ye shes sku// 'khor lo'i dam tshig la gnas pas// 'khor lo rang gi gnas su bsgom// rgyal ba kun gyi rin po che// 'phro 'dra nyi shu rtsa lnga'i tshogs// phung
101b3(rnying rgyud): po khams rnams rnam dag cing // phrin las ye shes bla na med// byang chub dag pa'i cha lugs gnas// dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i byin rlabs sku// dga' ba'i thabs dang shes rab sbyor// phyag rgya chen
101b4(rnying rgyud): po'i rigs 'dzin gnas// rnal 'byor dang brtson ting 'dzin ldan// 'grub 'gyur ring por thogs med spyod zhes gsung des pas 'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams mnyes pa
101b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na me ba'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las ting nge dzi gyi le'u ste drug pa'o// 
101b6(rnying rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje stan las langs te/ dga' ba'i mchod pa dang gar thabs kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te gsol ba btab/ 
101b7(rnying rgyud): kye ma rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// sangs rgyas tshogs rnams bskyed pa'i yab// khyed kyis dkyil 'khor skul mdzad nas// gdul bya'i lam 'di grol byas na// phyi yi 'gro bci ltar gzung // gang dag dang
101b8(rnying rgyud): bo ma smin pa'i// dkar po chos rnams mthong mi 'gyur// de dag zugs rje chen po yis// bzung zhing las la gzhug par snang // ma 'ongs 'gro ba la la dag/ 'di ltar dkyil 'khor mthong ba rnams/ 
102a1(rnying rgyud): ji ltar dkyil 'khor brtan par 'dul// zhes gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu ma 'ongs pa'i 'gro ba theg pa gsang sngags kyi lam du 'jug
102a2(rnying rgyud): par 'dod pa dag gis ni/ rdo rje slob dpon la brten te gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor du bzhugs par bya'o// rdo rje slob dpon blo gros mchog/ dad brtson shes rab stobs dang ldan// bdag chos ma lus
102a3(rnying rgyud): shes 'gyur nas// skyob pa byang sems sdom pa blangs// byang sems snying rje chen po dang // dga' ba btang snyoms bzhir bzhag nas// sems can thams cad 'gron du gnyer// slar nyid byang chub lam la/ 
102a4(rnying rgyud): dgod// pha rol phyin pa drug rnams dang // bsdu ba bzhi la leg ngas gnas pas// theg pa chen po'i lam gnyer zhing // nyan/ thos la sogs blos pa med pa'i blos// gsang ba'i theg pa don
102a5(rnying rgyud): gnyer zhing // dkyil 'khor dbang thob dam tshig ldan// gsang ba'i rgyud rnams don shes shing // de nyid bcu las goms gyur pas// rang gi ye shes rnam grol zhing // dngos po de nyid brtan par
102a6(rnying rgyud): gnas/ mu stegs la sogs mi skyod cing // thig dman la sogs 'gyur ba med// rtag tu 'gro ba bzung ba'i blos// dkyil 'khor la sogs las la brtson// mi gnas mya ngan 'das pa yi// grong khyer chen po/ 
102a7(rnying rgyud): 'gro byed dpon// 'jig rten drag brtson chos brgyad dag/ btang snyoms spong len med pa nyid// dbus long tshegs kyi mig bu bas// bla ma'i gtso bor gzung bar bya// 'jug pa'i gang zag phun sum tshogs// / 
102a8(rnying rgyud): zhi des gsong por smra ba dang // 'jam zhing 'gro ba'i yid 'ong ba// rtse cig dad pa brtson 'gyur byed// blo gros yon tan kun la 'jug/ lha dang bla ma la sogs gus// theg pa chen po'i lam dag pas// ngan pa'i
102b1(rnying rgyud): tshogs spangs gzhan du gnas// de ni blo gros bzang po yon tan ldan// theg chen gsang ba 'dzin pa'i snod// sa mchog shin tu dben pa'i gnas// ri bo nags tshal 'bras bu dang // me tog tu rgyun phun sum tshogs
102b2(rnying rgyud): gnod byed skye bo tshogs bral ba// rnal 'byor grogs bcas dga' 'gyur ba'i// bdag da' bar chad med pa'i mchog/ brten pa ci bzhin rdzogs pa yis// dkyil 'khor bri sogs las rnams bya// phun sum tshogs pa
102b3(rnying rgyud): bdun ldan pas// bdag gnas gzhi'i grogs bcas dang // mchod rdzas yo byad ma lus pa// bsrung zhing byin gyis brlabs par bya// rdo rje sa gzhir ba dang // gur dang bla re bcas pa yis// khro bo me 'od
102b4(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha'i tshogs// bsrung zhing 'khor lo rim bzhin bsgom// sems can thams cad bsgral ba'i blos// bsod nams tshogs gyis dag par bya// phyag 'tshal mchod pa dbul ba dang // sdig bshag/ 
102b5(rnying rgyud): bsod nams rjes yi yang // sangs rgyas mya ngan mi 'da' zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba dang // lus dbul byang sems bskye/ da pa dang // lam gnas dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo// rgya cher yongasu bsngo
102b6(rnying rgyud): byas shing / sems can don du smon lam gdab// dmigs med pa yi rang bzhin gyis// de dag brtson bral na mkha' bzhin// rnam thar gsum las 'das pa yi// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes che// thams cad na
102b7(rnying rgyud): mkha'i mtshan nyid sde// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// nam mkha' 'dra ba rnal 'byor pas// don kun mnyam pa nyid la gsal// de la rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor chen po sprul byas pas// rigs
102b8(rnying rgyud): kyi zhing khams sbyong byed cing // rnal 'byor chen po las kun 'grub// sa phyogs dri med yid 'ong ba'i// grong ngam grong khyer dgon pa 'am// ri bugs nags tshal gang rung bar// nyams dga' yan lag rtag par bya// 
103a1(rnying rgyud): gang du bzang ni 'bras bu bcas// ne'u sing chu 'gram me tog bcas// dpal rdzogs yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas// de ni rab gus brtag par bya// namakha' 'khor lo dra ba dang // sa gzhi
103a2(rnying rgyud): pad+ma dra ba dang // bkra shis phun sum sna tshogs gzhi// bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid yin// sa gzhi zhom rdib med pa yi// dbus su mtho ba phyag rgya che// shar dang byang du gzhol ba ni// phrin las rnam gzhis
103a3(rnying rgyud): dngos grub 'gyur// lho dang nub du gzhol bas ni// 'jig rten pa yi dngos grub 'gyur// nub dang byang du gzhol ba ni// ting 'dzin phra mo'i las gzhan 'gyur// gang zhig shar phyogs mtho ba dang // dbus su
103a4(rnying rgyud): dma' bar spang bar bya// sa dpus mo nub tsam du// brkos te slar yang dag par bya// mang 'phel gyur na dngos grub mchog/ gang bar gyur pa shis pa yin// dma' zhing ma legs
103a5(rnying rgyud): gyur pa yin// sol dub rus sogs byung na yang // yang na chu/ yis dag byas te// slob dpon rdo rje dril 'dzin pas// mnyam bzhag lha yi sngags brjod cing // shar du mi drag gom pa brgya
103a6(rnying rgyud): song ste slar log blta bar bya// 'grib pa med na dngos grub 'gyur// snang dang mi snang sa'i bdag/ mgu byas rin gyis nyo ba dang // blangs te bar chad med pa'i phyir// bgegs gzhan phra mo bskrad par bya// bar chad med// 
103a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa dbus su// rigs kyi bdag po 'byor ldan pas// chos gos la sogs rgyan thogs shing // pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor legs bzhugs te// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis// mchod sogs sbyang zhing byin
103a8(rnying rgyud): brlabs te// rdo rje bsrung ba'i phyag rgya yis// phyogs su'i dkyil 'khor rig par bcas// sa yi lha mo srungs ma rnams// spyan dang mchod pa mnyes par bya// khyad par sa yi bdag po dang // 'gro drug bgegs rnams
103b1(rnying rgyud): ma lus kun dgug cing bu lon mchod sbyin gtang // dri zhim chu yis kun gtor zhing // sngags dang phyag rgya sbyar bar bya// gang zhig dngos grub la sogs 'dod// rab 'bring tha ma grub don du// lto 'phye brtag pa'i/ 
103b2(rnying rgyud): ga bzhin// yan lag ku dbang rgya yang bya// de nas dkyil 'khor rgyar mnyam pa'i// sa gzhi khru la sogs tshad du/ brkos te sa yi skyon bsal zhing // sa zhag mdog bzangs 'jam phyin pas// 
103b3(rnying rgyud): gang zhig dri zhim chur bcas pa'i// sngags brtab gang zhig 'thas par bcag/ bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor khru dor stod// rgyar ni khru drug pa yi tshad// tshogs bsag khru gang 'phang du bstod// mtha' skor khru gang
103b4(rnying rgyud): ba yi tshad// dbang skur sor bzhi'i tshad bstod de// ji ltar gru bzhi rgya dar bskyed cing // dbyibs legs me long bzhin du gnas// da mnyam grog sbur la sogs pa// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // snying po
103b5(rnying rgyud): lnga dang 'bru lnga dag/ dri chu sngags kyis btab byas nas// dkyil 'khor snying por bzhag par bya// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmi gas te// stong pa nyid kyi sngags kyis sbyang // dri zhim sngags kyis byin
103b6(rnying rgyud): brlabs pa'i// chu rgyun phyogs bcur gtor byas shing // sna tshogs gtor mas mnyes byas te// lha tshogs 'gron rnams tshim pAm slob dpon rigs kyi gtsor gnas pa'i// rgyan dang cha lugs rdzogs byas nas// sgrub pa'i/ 
103b7(rnying rgyud): grogs mchog blo gros ldan// tshul bzhin du ni gsol ba btab// dbus kyi sa yi char gnas pa// kun 'byung na mkha' dag pa'i sngags// brjod cing 'byung ba'i sa bon las// dkyil 'khor re rtsegs bsgom par
103b8(rnying rgyud): bya/ rdo rje bsdam pa sar bzhag cing // byams pa'i rdo rje rnam dag cing // rdo rje dkyil 'khor thugs dang bcas// phyag mtshan dran pa thog mthar rgyan/ rdo rjes gzhi ra ba dang // gur sogs khro bo me 'od bcas// gtso
104a1(rnying rgyud): bo gar gyi dbang phyug skus// pad bcas thal mo lan gsum brdab// 'od 'bros gnas kun g.yos pa la// lha mo gser mdog rgyan gyis mdzes// me tog phreng ba bum thogs pa'i// lus
104a2(rnying rgyud): byed sa la 'thon byas te// 'thun na bka' nyan tshul du gnas// mchod stong zhal bsil sogs 'bul zhing // dri zhing las rnams ma rdzogs par// de srid mi 'gyur brtan bzhugs nas// bdud sogs bsgo ba'i ngaH
104a3(rnying rgyud): bcas mdzad// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// spyod pa'i tshul dang khyad par gyis// sa dang pha rol phyin pa las// lha mo khyod ni dbang du shog/ ji ltar rgyal ba thams cad kyi// bdud kyi sde rnams 'joms
104a4(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa/ de bzhin bdag gis bdud las kyang // rgyal bar bya/ sa pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam// de nas slob dpon rgyan rdzogs ba'i// rdo rje dril 'gying bcas pa la// dam tshigs nye bar bskul ba yi/ 
104a5(rnying rgyud): glu dag phyogs bzhi'i gnas nas gdon// rgyal bas 'gro ba'i ma gon gyur pa'i// chos kyi me long gsal ba ston// bder gne/ gas rnams kyi gsang ba pa// rdo rje gsang gsum dam tshig mchog/ 
104a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes dri ma med pa'i tshul// sgrib sogs ma lus bral byed pa'i// rdo rje pad+mo mnyam pa'i dbyings// dkyil 'khor chen po drug bcu'i bdag/ theg chen chos kyi 'khor lo'i mdzod// gsang gsum pad+mo dag pa'i dbyings// / 
104a7(rnying rgyud): sor gsal ba'i don bstan pa// rdo rje lta bus gnas kun sbyor// zab cing rgya chen sgra sna tshogs// chos kyi 'khor lo bshad pa'i dus// rgyal po yon tan dpe dang bral// rin chen lhun po'i mdzod mnga' ba// nyams dgra
104a8(rnying rgyud): thugs rje'i zhing rnams dgongs// bad med mnyam pa'i ye shes can// phrin las dag pas zad par mdzod// gsang gsum sna tshogs rdo rje'i bdag/ rigs mchog shes rab brtson byed cing // spyan bzang
104b1(rnying rgyud): dgangs 'grol gzigs// slar zhing khro ba chen po'i sku// nam lnga phyag cha sna tshogs 'dzin// 'jigs byed 'bar ba'i skur gnas te// mgur nas chu bsgoms sgra sgrogs shing // rdo rje pad+ma la ba yis// rdza na/ 
104b2(rnying rgyud): bdag la bsdu byed cing // ma dang ta las byung ba yi// mi gnyis ni zla'i dkyil 'khor brjid// 'bar zhing thams cad dag byas nas// slar nyid rang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// shangs kyi rlung spo bar ba nas// 
104b3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad 'bar byed pa// rdo rje'i 'gros las byung ba yi// sna tshogs sa gzhir brtan par byas// oM sum smin sum b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na grih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM hUM/ a na la sa~M thA ga bAn bing+ga ra dza/ 
104b4(rnying rgyud): ya hUM hUM phaT/ phyag gi mtshan ma kun 'khrol zhing // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor spro bar byed// hUM lha dbang rlung lha'i tshogs// gnod sbyin dri za srin po dang // sha za ga shin rje ma mo'i tshogs// mkha' 'gro
104b5(rnying rgyud): gnod sbyin ma lus rnams// gang dag sa gzhi 'dir gnas pa// srung byengs yi bdag bor bas// thos pa tsam gyis myur bar dengs// nga yi bka' las mnga' ma byed// gang zhig gnas pa'i
104b6(rnying rgyud): mthu bo che// pad+ma rdo rje kha Te ba// tha ba'i tshigs bzhin rlag par byed// rab 'bar khro bo'i gnas 'joms pa'o// pad+ma'i 'bar ba'i gzugs 'di yis// gal te gang gi dam tshig bcag/ 'dod gsum skye gnas gsal
104b7(rnying rgyud): byas te/ 'jigs par 'gyur zhing gzhan 'di med// sa las yongasu bskor byas te// 'gegs byed bya phyir phur par gdab// oM g+ha ta ya g+ha ta ya sarba duSh+TA na phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra ki la ya badz+ra d+ha rod a dz+nyA pa ya ti ka ya
104b8(rnying rgyud): bAg tsit+ta badz+ra kI la ya hUM phaT// lag pa bskyod cing rkang pa bskyod// ngo mtshar khro bo'i zur mig bzhin// smin ma khro gnyer g.yon mdzad cing // kha yi pad+ma 'dzum bcas pas// so so'i phyag rgya gnas sbyar// 'gying bag
105a1(rnying rgyud): bcas pas gzhal la bstod// rnga mchod khro bo'i gar thabs kyis// zhi rgyas dbang dang drag po'i tshul// ba yi rnam lnga dri sres chus// dkyil 'khoras gzhi nyer byugs nas// lha rnams gan/ 
105a2(rnying rgyud): su dri yi chus// thig le gru bzhir zlum por bya// rang gi sngags dang me tog rnams// so so'i gnas su bgram par bya// dbu rgyan rol mo mchod pa'i tshogs// lha mgon gnas kyi nye 'khor mdzes// dkyil
105a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lha rnams nye ba'i sa// mched cing bstod pas mnyes par bya// cho ga'i yan lag rdzogs pa dang // bzod gsol bskang ba'i don ched du// rdo rje dril 'dzin dpa' bo yis// phyogs rnams kun tu bskor ba bya// oM
105a4(rnying rgyud): badz+ra satwa sa ma ya/ ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ra sa twe twe no pa tiSh+Tha TI D+hi me b+ha ba/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ a nu rag to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ sarba sid+hi me pra yats+tsha// sarba karma su tsa me/ Nit+ta shrI yang ku ru ts+tshats+tsha
105a5(rnying rgyud): ha ha ha ha ho/ b+ha ga bAn/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra ma me muny+tsa/ badz+ri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa a// gsang sngags rgyal po bla med pa'i// lan gcig brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // sdig pa ma lus zad
105a6(rnying rgyud): byed cing // las rnams thams cad 'grub par byed// pus mo sa la btsugs byas te// lag pa g.yas pa spos 'dzin cing // g.yon pas dril bu dkrol byas te// tshig 'dis gsol ba gdab par bya// 
105a7(rnying rgyud): oM bder gshegs stobs bcu brtson ldan 'gro ba'i mgon// mi 'jigs la sogs yon tan rtsal med ldan// rigs gnyis thabs kyis brgyud pa'i dkyil 'khor che// brnyengs pa mi mnga' thugs rje shugs chen po// 
105a8(rnying rgyud): dga' mdzad dbang gi dkyil 'khor tshogs chen la// tshul khrims la sogs phung po gnyis gyur cing // pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtsor byas pa'i// dri bral thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor 'di nyid ni// mnyes pa'i tshogs rnams su
105b1(rnying rgyud): las rnams grol zhing // bde gshegs yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// 'dod yon 'bras bu phun sum tshogs bsgrub dang // 'gro rnams ma lus thugs rjes bzung byed cing // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa bya ba'i// 
105b2(rnying rgyud): phyir/ dkyil 'khor rnam dag rgya chen rtson lags na// mgon po'i bka' drin rje su brtse dgongs te// khyed kyis rab tu gnas par mdzad 'od lags// me togs dri bzang phreng sogs 'di bzhes la// ji srid 'gro ba'i don
105b3(rnying rgyud): rnams ma grub par// de srid thugs rjes bzung zhing bzhugs nas ni// bdag gi gnas sogs 'di dag byin gyis rlobs// de nas slob ma la bos te// kye rigs kyi bu khyod theg pa snod// rdo rje theg pa'i gzhung di
105b4(rnying rgyud): nyon dad gus dga' ba'i shugs byung shog/ sngon gyi de bzhin ga shegs rnams kyis// cho ga bzang po 'di bstan bya// mgon bro rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams dang // ma byon de bzhin gshegs
105b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshegs// de bzhin da lta'i sems can rnams// 'gro la phan phyir gnas bzhugs te// gsang ba zab mo bla na med// cho ga/ bzang po 'di spyod pas// skyes mchog rang gi gnas nyid du/ 
105b6(rnying rgyud): kun mkhyen ye shes bde chen brnyes// gsang sngags sbyor ba mnyam med par// pad+ma gar dbang dkyil 'khor gyi// bdud tshogs shin tu mi zad pa'i// dpung rnams ma lus 'joms par mdzad// de phyir kun mkhyen
105b7(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi// blo gros mchog 'di khyod kyis kyang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// kun tu skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro gsang sngags can// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor so so yi// 'khor lo
105b8(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa'i tshogs rnams la// kun nas skyobasu 'gro bar gyis// dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor dang bcas// byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// khyad par du yang slob dpon la// khyod kyis skyabasu 'gro bar gyis// de nas
106a1(rnying rgyud): legs spong slob ma yis// bskyabs 'gro byang sems sdom pa gzung // dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum po gzung bar bya// bdag gis sdig pa byas pa dang // bgyid
106a2(rnying rgyud): brjes su yi rang ba// mgon po'i spyan sngar mchis nas su// de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi// rgyal ba sras bcas 'khor rnams dang // rang rgyal dgra bcom 'gro rnams kyis// bsgom bzlas la sogs
106a3(rnying rgyud): bsod nams la// dad pas rjes su yi rang ngo // sems nyid mngon par sangs rgyas dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byed pa'i// tshogs spyod byang chub sems dpa' la// bdag ni rab tu skyabasu mchi// sangs
106a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas rnams 'byung ci lta bar// skal ldan byang chub sems dpa' yis// byang chub sems mchog dri med pas// 'gro ba rgya che tshogs la dmigs// dus gsum bzhugs pa'i 'gro rnams kyi/ 
106a5(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal mdzad pa// de bzhin nyid dbyings byang chub sems// dus gsum dag tu gtang mi bya// rdo rje slo ba dpon la gus shing // dus kun du ni yon tan bzung // rnal
106a6(rnying rgyud): 'byor gsang ba smad mi bya// rdo rje spun la mig bzhin blta// gsang sngags phyag rgya'i rnam pa dag/ brtson pas dus gsum dran par bya// de nas shis par bya ba'i phyir// rang dang mtshan ma'i yi ge sngags// byin brlabs
106a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes bskyed par bya// slar yang gdug pa me tog dang // mar me dri cha ba la sogs pa'i// rang gi gnasu 'dug cing dbul// bkra shis shing mchog 'o ma can// lo ma me tog 'bras bur bcas// rlon pa drang zhing 'bu rjes med// 
106a8(rnying rgyud): chag gas med pa'i tshems shing ni// sor ni bcu gnyis dri bzangs byug/ rtse mo me tog phreng btags pa// sngags zlos dri chus bsang bar bya// rigs kyi mtshon char byin brlabs pas// oM sarba pA pad ha na badz+ra shi ta ni swA hA// 
106b1(rnying rgyud): yi ge sum bcas sngags brjod cing // shar du kha bltas slob ma la// bden pa bdar zhing sbyin bya zhing // des kyang mi smra blang bar bya// gri rtse lta bus lce banar zhing // phra mo'i phyogs kyi so brus ste// sa ga ni dri yis byugs pa ru// 
106b2(rnying rgyud): phan tshun mi lta dor bar bya// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun gyis// zhi sogs dngos grub mtshan ma brtag/ kyen thur rab dang 'bring gis lta// 'tshams kyis 'jig rten las rnams 'grub// las dag pa yi sngags bzlas
106b3(rnying rgyud): nas// sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas pa'i// chu gtsang dris sbyang khyor ba gsum// nye reg 'thor ba'i tshul du sbyang // oM tri byi shud d+ha sarba d+harma pA pa ni tsa sha bi sho d+ha ma sarba ki la pa a pa ni ya hUM// gtsang ma'i ras la
106b4(rnying rgyud): legs dkal ba'i// srung skud mdud pa gsum ldan pa'i// yi ge/ gsum gyis sngags bzlas nas// de yi dpung pa g.yon par dbacing // ku sha rtse mo ma 'khrugs pa'i// bam po gnyis sbams pa
106b5(rnying rgyud): yis nga yab yum gnyis su byin brlabs pa'i// sngas dang stan du byi na par bya// oM sarba dusti ku ru swA hA// dga' ba'i gtan gyis gzeng bstod cing // mchod pa gtor ma'i tshogs bcas pas// lha
106b6(rnying rgyud): tshegs rnams la sngo byas nas// bden pa brjod cing ci bder nyal// mi smra dge ba'i sems bcas pas// rmi lam mtshan ma brtag par bya// slar nyid slob dpon nang song ste// dkyil 'khor gsal ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// lha
106b7(rnying rgyud): rnams mchod cing bstod bya ste// dge ba'i sems kyis nyal bar bya// de nas skya rengs shar dus su// slob dpon slobs ma sngas 'ongs te// kye kya bzhin bzangs rnams longs cig/ rmi lam mtshan ma ci mthong ba// bden pa
106b8(rnying rgyud): brjod pa'i dus yin no// des kyang ci bzhin smra bar bya// rab 'bring mtshan ma'i lhas bstan cing // ngan pa'i ltas rnams bzlog par bya// sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs dang // ba yi rnam lngas byug par bya// dngos rnams
107a1(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma las grol ba'i// stod pa chen po ye shes bsgom// rin chen rgyu las byung ba yi// bum pa mgul ring lto ba zlum// kha khyer zhabs bteg bel ka che// dri zhim mtshon dkar leg
107a2(rnying rgyud): byugs te// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor legs gnas te// so so'i mtshan ma'i yi ge rgyan// rnam rgyal bum pa la sogs rnams// mchod nas stan la bkram par bya// rin chen sna lnga 'bru lnga dang // snying po lnga dang sman lnga/ 
107a3(rnying rgyud): dang bkra shis rdzas lnga gzhug par bya// mgul chings gzungs thag kha rgyan sogs// dam tshig lha rnams gsal byas nas// ye shes sku dang gnyis med par// mchod bstod sngags kyi bzlas pa bya// 
107a4(rnying rgyud): sngags bcas chu dang gnyis med gnas// dkyil 'khor grub dpa'i dus dag tu// rang rang gnas kyi phyogs su dgram// dam tshig dkyil 'khor gsal byas nas// ye shes lha dang gnyis
107a5(rnying rgyud): med pa'i// thabs dang shes rab 'brel byas pas// dkyil 'khra ra sa la thig gdab bya// shes rab spyan mdzes bcu drug lon pa 'am// ji bzhin byin gyi brlabs nas kyang // dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa
107a6(rnying rgyud): gnas bya'o// gtsang ma'i rgyu las byung ba'i ras// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// lnga las byung ba'i skud pa dag/ byin gyis brlabs cing bsgril bar bya// stong pa nyid kyis sbyang byas na/ rigs kyi lha ru gnas pa dag
107a7(rnying rgyud): mchod bstod sngags bcas bsgril bar bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya mu tra ma ti kra ma hUM/ oM AHhUM/ dzaM gdags pa'i sngags brjod cing // rdo rje slob dpon thugs kha na// slob mas smin mtshams drang por then// de lag
107a8(rnying rgyud): kyi nub dang shar// 'od 'phros byang sems thugs rje che// na mkha'i dkyil 'khor mngon par lta// rdo rje lte bas phyogs dang mtshams// dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs par bstan// stobs mchog dpa' bo dgongasu gsol/ 
107b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gsung snar ldan pas// nam pa'i dal 'khor legs grubacing // 'gro ba'i don la bskul bar mdzod// oM a nun sa nu ga tos rba rnam par par a nu ga ta sa rbas na ta/ a ba ta nga sarba d+ha rman+tu/ ldan
107b2(rnying rgyud): mdun du bzhugs 'gyur nas// mchod bstod dang po'i tshul du dgongs// rdo rje khu churas gzhig cing // shar nas nub de brkyang ba yi// tshangs zig dang po gang pa byas nas// de bzhin sgonas chad kyis ni// ru
107b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi shin tu legs par gzhal// rdo rje lho byang gnyis pa dang // 'tshams kyi thig rnams gdab par bya// logs thig grub ni mnyam 'gyur nas// brgyad dang bcu drug dag tu 'go// bar khyams phyi khyams ma gtogs
107b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i gzhan dag cha bran pa ni bzhir bgo/ thig gi cho ga rdzogs dpa dang // ye shes skud pas mchod bstod cing // rdo rje khutsun sngags bcas kyis// rang gi gnas su gshegs gsol bya/ ma
107b5(rnying rgyud): badz+ra ga dzaHdkyil 'khor bdag po'i nga rgyal gyis// mig gnyis ma dang ta las byung bar bsam// dkyil 'khor gnas rnams kun bltas te// sngags dang phyag rgya bcas pa yi// sgo dag bzhipa/ 
107b6(rnying rgyud): dbye byas nas// cha bran dag kyang blo yis brtag/ rdo rje spong ba'i phyag rgya yis// ri mo'i mkhar ni btegs byas te// 'byung 'jug gsang ba'i cho ga dag/ rnal 'byor brtan pa yid kyis bya// oM be gakram hUM/ pad+ma rang / 
107b7(rnying rgyud): bzhin rnam dag pas// dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas chen po// thugs rje ye shes rnam 'phrul tshogs// khyab mdzad byin rlabs ston pa'i gtso// rgyal ba rnams kyi sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad du 'byub
107b8(rnying rgyud): ma lus sems can don gyi phyir// pho brang dag par byin gyis rlabs// phyogs mtshams ma lus rnam dag pas// byang chub ye shes gnas gsal 'gyur// nyon mongs nyes tshegs kun bcom pa'i// thugs
108a1(rnying rgyud): rje chen po dri meng shugs// ye shes byin brlabs las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba grub par mdzod// rin chen rnam lnga'i phyi ma dang // sa tshon la sogs gang 'byor pa// rin po che
108a2(rnying rgyud): yi snod blugs te// dkyil 'khor gnas kyi phyogs lngar gzhag/ sbyang zhing byin gyis brlabs byas na// rigs lnga'i skud tshogs yum bcas la// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dbus sogs dang // mchod bstod sngags kyi/ 
108a3(rnying rgyud): mnyes par bya// oM badz+ra tsi ta ma tri sa ma ya hUM// dkar mthing sar po ljang khu dang // dmar po'i tshon rnams rim bzhin du// dbang ldan 'tshams gnas tsam byas te// pan tsa rAg drang bar bya// g.yas pas
108a4(rnying rgyud): pad+ma rdo rje bzung // g.yon pas 'dren pa'i las bya'o// de la mtsho/ dad 'bul sngags brjod cing // bden pa bdar te dga' bar bya// 'di ni chos dbyings rnam par dag/ sems can khams ni rab sgrol/ 
108a5(rnying rgyud): byed/ dpal ldan pad+ma gar dbang ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// yang dag bden pa'i byin brlabs kyis// dkyir 'khor las rnams shis par mdzad// dbus kyi lte ba nas brtsam
108a6(rnying rgyud): te/ dang po slob dpon gyis bri zhing // phyis ni ci dgar shes par bri// mthong man me snyoms drang por bya// de nas mtshan ma brtags brtan te// changad cing smra bas mi 'grub ste// yon pas gdung ba'i las rnams skye// chang/ 
108a7(rnying rgyud): bas slob dpon slob ma dag/ shi tham ngan par 'gyur ba yin// lhag dang bcas pas g.yul 'khrugs shing // phyogs 'khrul pa yis spro bar 'gyur// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gnas dag tu// ri'u mig nyi shu
108a8(rnying rgyud): rtsa lnga las/ bde gshegs gtso bo'i rigs su bcas// phyag rgya'i yi ge mtshan ma bri// phyi rol pad+ma'i 'ad ba gnas pa// nyi shu rtsa bzhi tshogs rnams la// byang sems khro bo bcas pa dag/ shar nas rim bzhin gyi/ 
108b1(rnying rgyud): bar bya// byi dang nang gi 'tshams rnams su// mchod pa'i lha mo brgyad rnams gzhag/ bar khyams bskal bzangs sems dpa' rnams// sgo bzhir khro bo'i tshigs gzhag go// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus song ste// 
108b2(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs 'od zer snang ba yi// pad+mo rdo rje dril bcas pas// rang gi kha dog mchod bcos bzhag/ de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la// tshe mtha' yas dang chos dbang phyug/ chags med 'od dang spyan dga'
108b3(rnying rgyud): ba'i// pad rtsegs pad+ma'i phreng ma dang // pad gnas rin chen gleg bam rin chen phreng // rang mdog sngags kyis brgyan pa gzhag/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bde bar gshegs pa mi bskyod pa/ 
108b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dril bu'i sngags bcas pas// rang gi 'od bcas gdan la ba zhag/ de yi shar phyogs re'u mig la// 'brug sgra dri ma med pa'i da rigs// mngon par snang mdzad bstan dbang phyug/ chags shing rin/ 
108b5(rnying rgyud): chen pa spungs pa// rin po che yi dra ba ste// rim bzhin rang ma dog sngags kyis rgyan// lho yi dkyil 'khor dbus ga/ sa pa// bde gshegs rin po che sbyangs kyis// rin chen brtsegs
108b6(rnying rgyud): dang dril bu la// rang mdog sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'o// de yi shar phyogs ri'u mig la// nam mkha'i mdzod dang dra ba can// dkon mchog rgyal mtshan rin chen gtog/ rin chen gleng bu rin chen phreng // 
108b7(rnying rgyud): rin chen rgyal mtshan rin chen bum// rang gi 'od bcas sngags kyis brgyan// nub kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bde gshegs kun du snang ba'i 'od// 'khor lo dril bu mtshan ma la// rang 'od sngags kyis
108b8(rnying rgyud): mtshan ma bri/ pad+mo rigs kyi 'khor lo'i tshad// byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// bde gshegs don yod grub pa 'o// rdo rje sna tshogs dril bu bsnams// rang gi sngags dang kha dog gsal// de yi shar phyogs re'u migs
109a1(rnying rgyud): brtson 'grus dang ni shugs chen po// gnod sbyin 'dul ba sna tshogs dbang // rgya gram phreng dang pad+ma breng // rdo rje gdengs po zla bam can// 'od 'phros sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i// 'tsham
109a2(rnying rgyud): kyi re'u mig bzhi rnams la// 'od 'phros pad+ma 'dzin pa dang // pad+ma gnon dang bang skyong dang // me long rin chen phreng ba dang // bi bang gar gyi phyag rgya la// rang 'od sngags kyis mdzes par bya// phyi rol pad+ma'i shar brtsam
109a3(rnying rgyud): te// rigs kyi byang sems bzhi bzhir gnas// bde ba'i blo gros rgya mtsho'i sgra// gzi mdangs dang ni 'khor lo yi// namakha'i mdzod kyi 'khor lo rin po che// pad lcug 'khor lo dbyug pa rnams// rang 'od sngags kyi
109a4(rnying rgyud): mtshan mar gnas// shes rab snang ba rdo rje rgyal// 'od zer 'phro ba dedrag shul gyi// rin chen phung po rin chen gdugs// pad ma da'i sdong po 'od bung bri// dri ma'i tshigs dang sgyu ma 'khrul// rin chen
109a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po dra ba can// rin chen ri bo rgya gram bri// lag bzang gsera'od 'phro ba dang // rin chen skem chos mthong dang // pad+ma'i rgya gram glegs bam dang // pad+ma'i sdong po 'i go cha bri// dri med
109a6(rnying rgyud): mun pa sel ba dang // dga' ba dbyangs dang gzhon nu yi// chu shel nor du'i phreng ba dang // sprin phung rdo rje rgya gram bri// de ni rigs lnga'i sems dpa' ste// rang 'od sngags kyis mtshan byas pa'i// de mthar khro na
109a7(rnying rgyud): bzhi rnams kyis// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bri byas te// sbyin bdag smra ba'i dbang phyug dang // rtse gsum rin chen rtse dgu dang // dbyig pa rtse gcig ral gri'o// gru chad mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi// gdug spos me tog
109a8(rnying rgyud): mar me dri/ phyi rol par 'khyams gnas dag la// phyogs ra sems dpa' bzhi bzhi ste// rdo rje rnam snang gar mkhan dang // blo yi rgya mtsho thogs med bkod// rdo rje mtshan ma gsang sngags bcas// rang 'di gnas gdan
109b1(rnying rgyud): dgal bring pad mo dga' ba'i sa la dbang // rin chen spungs pa sprin gyi phreng // rin chen mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang 'od gdan la gnas pa bri// yid 'ong me tog sgron ma dang // spos brtsegs kha lo bsgyur ba
109b2(rnying rgyud): dang / pad+ma'i mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang 'od gdan la gnas par bri// dran dbang pad+ma'i blo gros dang // las byed snying po'i blo gros dang // rgya gram mtshan ma sngags dang bcas// rang 'od gdan
109b3(rnying rgyud): la gnas par bri// shar sogs pa yi sgo rnams su// khro bo'i 'jigs pa'i rgyal po yi// rdo rje rgya gram rdo rje gdengs// rin chen dbyug pa pad+ma 'phreng // rang gi yi ge gdan gnas pa'i// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma
109b4(rnying rgyud): bri bar bya/ phyogs bzhi rgyan dang phreng ba dang // 'dod yon lha mo la sogs pa yi// rgyan rnams pad+ma rdo rje dang // rin chen 'khor lo rgya gram bri// 'bri bas mtshan ma kha dog lnga// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'od bca
109b5(rnying rgyud): pa'o// phyi rol rta babs dra ba sogs// ban d+ha dril bu nyi shu bzhi// gdugs dang bum pa bya yi phreng // dpag bsam rdzing bung nga ba dang // nyi zla me long rgyal mtshan lnga// chos kyi 'khor lor
109b6(rnying rgyud): dgas rnams// mdzes byas phyi mtha' pad+ma dang // rdo rje me 'od mtshon gyos bskor// dbus mig kha dog nyi shu lnga// pad phreng dmar po bar khyams dkar// sgo bzhi'i rin chen sna bzhi la// gru chad gser gyi kha
109b7(rnying rgyud): dog can// mchod pa lnga dang bum dgram bzhi// bla rgyan na bza' phyogs rgyan bre// me tog tshom bu sngags bcas pa// so so'i gnas su dgram par bya// gtor ma'i tshogs mang sbyar byas nas// phyi rol phyogs dang
109b8(rnying rgyud): 'tsham su dgod// lha yi ting 'dzin gsal byas pas// dkyil 'khor shis pa'i las 'grub 'gyur// de nas lha rnams bstod byas te// rdo rjes pad mo dam tshig gzhug/ thugs kha'i sngags kyis dgug byas pa
110a1(rnying rgyud): mgron rnams tshim par 'gyur ba dang // dam tshig sngags kyis bskul byas shing // rang gi phrin las bcol bar bya zhes gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa bla na
110a2(rnying rgyud): med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las gzugs brnyan rtsam pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gtso// rdo rje 'chang sogs mgu 'gyur nas// 
110a3(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba sar yang bskul ba mdzad// kun don thugs rje chen po'i shugs// ma 'ongs gsang sngags spyod rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor chen por gang 'jug pa// dbang bskur tshul bzhin ji lta bur// de bzhin
110a4(rnying rgyud): rab tu gnas pa gang // bdag gzhan don gyi yan lag bsrungs // sbyin sreg rim pa ji ltar lags// gtso bo thugs rje cher rtswa ngan pas// ma lus gdul bya kun gyi phyir// dus 'di snang bar mdzad nas
110a5(rnying rgyud): kyang 'cho ga'i yan lag rgyas pa gsungs// de nas byang chub sa/ mas tshogs kyis// gus par gzung ste spyad par bgyi// de na/ sa bcom ldan 'das kyi dbang // phyag rgya shes rab rab skyod cing // rab tu
110a6(rnying rgyud): ngag po bzhin rgyas pa// rigs rnams kun la gzigs mdzad de// mchog gsum sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i// don 'di rab tu gnas par mdzad// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan pa'i// ma 'ongs gdul bya gang dag gis// 
110a7(rnying rgyud): gnyis med gsang ba'i theg pa 'dir// smin pa'i lam la 'jug 'dod pas// gang gis nyes pa'i las rnams kyis// rdo rje slob dpon mgu byas nas// yang dang yang du gsol btab te// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i
110a8(rnying rgyud): don du gnyer 'am lus sdug bsngal las bsgral phyir// byang chub sems mchog rgya chen blos// phyi nang 'byor pa'i yo byad dag/ thams cad byang chub don du bsngos// 'dod chags rnam dag pad+mo'i dbyings// chos kun gyi
110b1(rnying rgyud): ni de bzhin nyid// ye shes sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ de ring yid 'ong don chen gnyer// oM u ta ga ta sa ma ya ste// pad+ma dga' ba'i sku mchog mnyes// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i gnas// mtshan dpe
110b2(rnying rgyud): phun sum tshogs pa yi// bder gshegs sku la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chen pos gzhu rnams 'joms// mi shes dri ma kun sel ba'i// thugs mchog gsang ba'i chos mthar byir// rdo rje thugs la phyag 'tsha'o// 
110b3(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags snying po gsang ba'i chos// rab snang pad+ma'i dbyings nas 'khrul// byang chub na mkha'i mtshan nyid can// rdo rje gsung la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rin chen char 'bebs shing // de bzhin
110b4(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa'i rgyal 'gyur ba// dpal mchog bkra shis pun sum tshogs// theg pa che la phyag 'tshal lo// kun tu gnas 'gyur khyab pa po// las mdzad rdo rje dam tshig mchog/ mi
110b5(rnying rgyud): mthun gnas rnams rab 'joms mdzad// rdo rje 'joms la phyag 'tshal lo// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug rgya/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas nyid du// dbang bskur gsang ba las
110b6(rnying rgyud): byung dam tshig ye shes rab grub mdzod// shes rab chos nyid las 'phrul pa'i// rjes su 'jugs pas snying rje'i tshegs// yang dag bden pa las byung ba'i// byin rlabs 'dod pa thams cad rdzogs// bde gshes
110b7(rnying rgyud): sprul pa'i tshig tshogs ni// dbang bskur rdzogs mdzad pa yi rigs// me tog phreng ba la sogs pas// slob ma rgyan par byas nas ni// phyir phyogs stegs bu la bzhag ste// gtor ma phyogs kun las
110b8(rnying rgyud): byin nas// kun la gsol 'debs bsgo bya zhing // slob ma gzhug pa nyid du bya// ras gtsang dmar po'i rgyu las byung // gnas gzhan ma spyad ma nyams par// rang gi sngags kyi byin brlabs nas// leg
111a1(rnying rgyud): par 'dod na g.yog par bya// pad mo'i thil sbyar rin chen phreng // sngags brjod gdungs 'dzin rtse gcig tu// brtan por byang chub don gnyer bas// dkyil 'khor gan su mos pa
111a2(rnying rgyud): bskyed/ de nas slob dpon blo ldan pas// theg chen lam la zhugs pa'i phyir// slob ma dag la slar smras pa// gsang sngags lam mchog zab pa 'di// shin tu bzung ba dkara' ba yin// khyod kyis bzung
111a3(rnying rgyud): babarjod pa rnams/ mi snyengs pa yi blo bskyed nas// sa spyod mchog la gnas dgongs so// kyem rdo rjegs pa'i'adon// theg chen snying po blan red // me dis byang chung 'dru bye ca pa// yongs rnam rje/ 
111a4(rnying rgyud): chom skye bar gyur/ nga tshul babang po 'di rtogs pas// dus sum pa dazhugs pa'i sa sa rgyas rnams// byin pa rdzas mchog shes te// sems can da phyi rdul dang ldan// khyod kyis
111a5(rnying rgyud): sgraspu dang bral zhing // dang 'artson po tshom med par rung // de nas slebams slar gsol ba// yang dag zugs rje 'am raba'i// rago chog dngas kyis bdag la gad // da / 
111a6(rnying rgyud): bdage la rtol med pas / khyed kyis gsungs bzhin gsol bar 'chal/ Ar yang rab gus dang pa'i ming // tshul chen ma nyin dam tshig mchog/ slob dpon che la skyabs su ma'i// sangs rgyas dkyil la khos
111a7(rnying rgyud): bcas tshogs// thugs mchog dri med bdag la dgongs// bdag gis byang chub don gnyer bas// dkyil 'khor gan su mos pa bskyed// gar gyi dbang phyug bde chen mchog/ mgon 'gyur rnams
111a8(rnying rgyud): laskyabs su mchi// mya ngan las 'das po brang 'dir// bdag nyid zhugs par mdzad pa legs// de nas las kyi rdo rje yis// gsang ba'i mtho bo nas brdung ste// yol ba'i nang du gzhug par bya// maM ng+ga/ 
111b1(rnying rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya yo ga tsa ti u pa ta ya mi hUM swA hA// de nas gsang ba'i gnas zhugs pas// mchod brnyes rgyun gshegs la sogs kyis// snod du rung bar gyur pa dang // dam tshig gsum
111b2(rnying rgyud): sgrogs chu blud cing // rdo rje gsang ba'i dam sgrogs shing // phyag rgyas sngags kyi gnas gsum sbyang // oM rgyal ba kun gyi khyod nyid ni// byin gyis brlab cing brtan mdzad pas// pad+ma gar dab
111b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dir// bdag med dam tshig spangs pa dang // dad med brtson 'grus nyams pa dang // blo dman rtogs 'dzin la gnas la// srog gi phyir yang brjod mi bya// bde chen mgon po pad
111b4(rnying rgyud): 'chang sku khyod kyi snying la zhugs pa na// gsang ba'i ye shes gzhan brjod dus// snying khrag 'thung zhing ga/ zhan du shes// bdag ni gar gyi dbang phyug sku// khyod la thug
111b5(rnying rgyud): rjes bzung byed pas// nga yis bsgo ba'i tshig 'di dag/ 'da' bar rung ba ma yin no// bdag la brnyas shing 'a khu byed na// rab sham khro bo chen po'i sku// klad pa tshal ba brgyad
111b6(rnying rgyud): 'gas shing lus sems ngal sogs rdul du byed// gnas gzhi 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rang sngags sa bon 'od zer bcas// dbab pa'i gsang sngags lan stong du// dri zhim bdug spos
111b7(rnying rgyud): dril dkrol zhing // ye shes sems dpa' gzhug par bya// des ni mtshan ma'i rtags mthong 'gyur// sku yi ye shes phyogs bcur g.yos// gsungs gi ye shes gsang ba brjod// 
111b8(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi ye shes mngon shes gsal// sngags gsum phyag rgyas brtan par gnas// bden pa'i ye shes byin brlabs kyis// dkyil 'khor rigs kyi lha gang yin// bdag gis bskal pa/ 
112a1(rnying rgyud): ci lta bar/ dus 'dir dbab par mdzad par rigs// nor bu phreng ba gar bab pa// rigs de rang gi dam tshig nyid// sngags dang phreng ba ma lus pa// slar nyid de la sbyin par/ 
112a2(rnying rgyud): bya// gser gyi thur ma byin brlabs pas// ma rig ldongs pa'i ling rtogs gsal// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// khyod kyi mig 'byed brtson par mdzad// ma rig bsgribs g.yog
112a3(rnying rgyud): gsal mdzad nas// pad+mo spun bzangs dri ma med// oM pad+ma tsak+Shu dz+nyA na pra be sha phaT// rdo rjes gdong g.yogs gsal byas nas// dkyil 'khor gsal ba bstan par bya// legs par ltos cig blo
112a4(rnying rgyud): gros che sngon gyi rgyal ba la sogs rnams// gsang sngags sa/ dang po dkyil 'khor 'dir// legs par zhugs te grub dpa bzhin// me tog gang la bab pa yi// lha de rigs kyi
112a5(rnying rgyud): dam tshig yin// shar gyi sgo srungs nas brtsams te// gtsu kho'i bar du dkyil 'khor bstan// zhal zas na badz+ra ral sogs pas// bla ma blo ldan mnyes par bya// yi dam lha
112a6(rnying rgyud): sku phyag rgya sogs// gsang ba'i ming dang bcas par bstan// de ring dus nas bzung byas te// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gnas thob par// rab rib tha ma'i blo ldan pas// dus kun tu ni bzung bar bya// kye ma ho blo gros
112a7(rnying rgyud): rgya mtsho'i gnas// 'gro la bskyab pa'i don brtson la// khyod zhabs pad+ma la btud de// pho drang grong mchog nyams dga' 'dir// dbang bskur ba yi rin chen mdzod// snang mdzad lus la bab pa lags/ 
112a8(rnying rgyud): rigs bzhin thugs rje rtse dgongs pas// dri ma'i skyon sol byin brlabs mdzod// gnang bar mdzad pa'i dus lags pas// skyob pa'i sku mchig thob par mdzod// shar gyi sgra phyogs khru do'i rgyab// dbang na
112b1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dbus kyi tshad// pad+ma mad ba brgyad sgo dang bcas// dmar po'i mtshon gyis legs byugs te// seng ge'i khri bshams pad+mor bcas// 'khor lo sgyur rgyal tshul gyis bzhag/ spyi bor 'dug
112b2(rnying rgyud): mdzes rgyal mtshan g.yas// dung dang zang dung sil snyan rnams// rol cha mchod cha phyogs 'tshams dgod// rgyan phreng gos kyis legs klubs pa// dri chu sngags bcas yungs dkar dang // ku sha'i chu yis dag
112b3(rnying rgyud): bar bya oM ma hA bin ta ha na ha na hUM phaT// de nas rigs kyi lhar bskyed de// bkra shis dag pa'i klu blangs shing // rol mo rgyan phreng bkod byas te// bum pa'i chu yis dbang bskur bya// de yi phyir
112b4(rnying rgyud): na sgrib tshogs dang // bag chags nyon mongs gnas dag nas// / lha yi chu rgyun dag pa'i mthus// ye shes phung po/ dbang phyug mchog/ oM lha yi chu ni dag pa'i chu// rdo rje gsang
112b5(rnying rgyud): gsum gnas las byung // byang sems chu yis tshogs rnams dag/ dbang bskur ba yi don thob mdzod// yon tan rin chen rnam ngag mchog/ rigs lnga'i sku rgyan byas pa yi// dbu/ 
112b6(rnying rgyud): rgyan bzang po'i cod pan bcas// kun 'byung rin chen phung po mchog/ tra yon tan ma bcas pa'i rgyan// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed// khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po che// mtshan dang dpe
112b7(rnying rgyud): byang kun rdzob kun// ye nas rdo rje rje lnga pa// 'od phreng sngags kyis brgyan byas pa'i// rtogs bcas tshogs rnams kun las rgyal// bde gshegs thugs rje rtse gcig pas// khams gsum gan+da/ 
112b8(rnying rgyud): rnams der mi mdzad/ byang sems rdo rje rtse lnga pa/ rang rig ye shes gnas gsal byed// chos rnams skye ba med pa'i don// sgra brjod dngos po brag cha bzhin// stong pa'i dril bu gsung rang bani/ 
113a1(rnying rgyud): de las sna tshogs rgya chen tshogs// haM chos kun rgyun las rnam grol zhing // de bzhin rkyen med 'bras bu'i tshogs// rang bzhin pad+ma dag pa'i dbyings// nges pa'i thegs pa ston byed gsung // 
113a2(rnying rgyud): ho rdo rje che ge mo// rigs kyi mtshan gyis dbang bskur te// chos sku 'od gsal bde ba che// pad+ma'i sgra dbyangs ming dang bcas// oM phyag rgya chen po gsang ba'i gnas// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// mi mthun
113a3(rnying rgyud): la sogs bcom byas te// rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs// oM badz+ra pad+mo a bi shin+tu mi// oM ra na mu ku ta a bi shin+da hUM// oM a ti ba ti tra a bi shin+da haM// oM na ma che ge mo a bi shin+d+ra mi// slas
113a4(rnying rgyud): dpon lha la rab gus pas// tshegs bcas ston gzung byed cing // rdo rje dam tshig pa yi spun// mig gi 'bras bu bzhin du ba rkyang // 'di dag la gus slong byed pa// tshe srog rdo rje gtum pos 'phrog
113a5(rnying rgyud): sngags rnams dus su brjod bya zhing // phyag rgya rgyun du bcing / bar bya// gsang ba'i tshig dang mtshan pa'i tshogs// du sa kun dag tu snga byas te// bdud rtsi lnga po sha sogs rnams// mnyam
113a6(rnying rgyud): par shes pas rgyun tu spyad// bro drug glu drug stabs pa yi// brtul shugs gnas skabs dag tu bya// nyon mongs chos lnga 'dod yon lnga// dam tshig nyams pas shes par spyad// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya che// gnas
113a7(rnying rgyud): gsum brtul zhugs la gnas shing // lung bstan rjes gnang dbugs 'don pa'i// cho ga bzang po spyad par bya// des ni rdo rje slob dpon mchog/ yon tan bza' ba'i gnas thob 'gyur// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag/ 
113a8(rnying rgyud): rgyas+ya/ yang dge sngags kyis byin brlabs te// ma 'ongs gzung ba'i blo gnas pas// gsang ba'i dam tshig rjes su zung // oM sarba ta thA ga tas pad+ma sa ma ya s+ho// oM dpu shrI bad+mo b+han d+ha ya/ oM ma \u0f7f
113b1(rnying rgyud): swatwa sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya bag tsit+ta hUM phaT// mchod pa bkra shis bzang la klags// brtul zhugs mchog tu gyur pa yin// bdag dang gzhan gyi don spyod pa'i// dngos grub thun mong cho ga'i las// 
113b2(rnying rgyud): ni rgyas dbang dang dgug pa dang // dub rmongs bskrad pa'i cho ga dang // gsad pa la sogs las rnams kun// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di yi tshul// khyod kyis gang 'dod grub par gyis// de nas rang
113b3(rnying rgyud): bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor rab sbyor bas// 'khor ba'i chos rnams zil gnon cing // phyogs bcur dam chos gsung sgrogs shing // pha rol phyin drug gnas 'phags te// sgro 'dogs the/ 
113b4(rnying rgyud): chom gcod par byed// lung bstan bde gshegs sras bcas kyis// rigs mchog mdzad pa bla na med// rgyal ba kun gyis lung bstan mdzad// khams gsum 'dzin bcas kun las grol// 'dod cha/ 
113b5(rnying rgyud): bral ba lta bu'i sdig/ khams gsum kun na gzhan med de// de zhes 'dod la chags bral bar// khyod kyis nam yang ma byed cig/ oM ma hA sa ma ya hUM phaT// gsang sngags rgyun rnams 'dzin
113b6(rnying rgyud): bya dang / lha dang slob dpon gzung bar bya// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsung gcig sgo nas gsungs pa yin// 'gro rnams kun la phan pa'i blos// dkyil 'khor la sogs brtson par
113b7(rnying rgyud): gyis dang brtson shes rab blo ldan pas// gang 'dod 'bras bu'i tshul la sbyor// mchog tu gsang ba'i grong khyer 'dir// gang gis 'dod don gang gnyer ba// des ni sgrib sogs kun spangs shing / 
113b8(rnying rgyud): mchog gnas ye shes gsal bar sbyor// bde chen gsang pa'i theg pa che// tshe 'di byang chung 'grub par byed// nyon mongs dgra sogs las grol ba'i// bde ba chen po'i gnas thab pa'o// de nas lnga
114a1(rnying rgyud): dang bzhugs gnas pa'i// rnam dag de nyid bstan bya ste// mchod sbyin gtor tshogs mgron gnyer cing // bkra shis 'gro ba'i tshogs bsag bya// slar yang slob ma blo ldan pas/ 
114a2(rnying rgyud): yon mchog bla ma la phul te// maN+Dal mchod pa'i tshogs rnams kyis// mnyes byas gsol ba gdab par bya// shes rab yan lag phun sum tshogs// bcu drug yang na nyi shu bzhi// rdo rje bla ma la
114a3(rnying rgyud): phul ste// byin gyis brlab pa'i cho ga bya// khrus byas dri zhim rgyan gyis blugs// sna tshogs sngags dang phyag rgyas spang // rigs kyi lha dang ldan byas pas// dam tshigs bskul ba'i brdas
114a4(rnying rgyud): mtshon ste// gnyis med ye shes snyoms 'jug bya// byang chu dab sems kyi chu rgyun gyis// rang gi dkyil 'khor mchod dbyas pas// slob dpon tshogs la dbang yang bskur// ji ltar rgya
114a5(rnying rgyud): bsras mchog gis// 'jug pa po rnams tshim mdzad pa'i// gnyis med ye shes gsang ba'i don// dbab pa'i phyag rgyu las byung ba'i// a la la ho// oM AHhUM/ a ho su ka rang gi
114a6(rnying rgyud): gnas/ a hor ti rim par mdzad// dkyil 'khor kun la rang bzhin gnas// shes rab mchog ldan byin brlangs pa// slob ma'i lag tu gtad par bya// rang bzhin bde ba'i ye shes nyid/ 
114a7(rnying rgyud): zag pa med pa'i don gsal 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa'i sems kyis ni// rang gi dngas nyid mthong bar gyur// se ma mo 'gro ba'i gnas 'di dag/ de bzhin nyid las gan du 'khrug// de dag bdin
114a8(rnying rgyud): ye shes pas// gzhan du 'gyur ba ci yang med// ye shes 'di ni shin tu 'phra// rdo rje snying po mkhara' 'dra nang // rdul bral thar pa zhi pa'i chos// rang gi rang bzhin de nyid do// de ni byi glegs gsang ba'i din/ 
114b1(rnying rgyud): khyed rnams kun la phyir bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po phyogs bzhi 'am// gzhan yang gnas gzhan gang thad par// zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // las kun pa yi thab khung brtsam// zlum po
114b2(rnying rgyud): gang zla kham dang // gru gsum sna tshogs dbyibs can no// de dag dkar ser dmar dang nag/ sna bzhi kun gyis mtshon pa'o// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma'i rgyan// sna tshogs rdo rje mtshon cha can// khru gang bzhi/ 
114b3(rnying rgyud): dang gnyis med dang // khru gsum de yi zhabasu phyed// bud shing yam shing so so yi// mtshan nyid lo 'bras kha dog ro// rtse mo cha las sor bzhi dang // sor rgyad bcu drug nyi shu'i tshad// sbams pa'i so
114b4(rnying rgyud): se'i mar gyis byug/ rim bzhin rtsa ba bud khang ni// zlum dang gru bzhi zla gam dang // gru gsum tshul du rtsig par bya// / lha rnams kun gyi khang pa nyid// me yi gnas su gzhag byas
114b5(rnying rgyud): te so so'i las dang 'thun pa ste// ag ner ci bod pa rabya// g.yas pa mi 'jigs phyag rgyas g.yab// gsuM na ba bgrang phreng bzung bar bya// oM e h+ya he ag ne ye ma hA ba ba hi swAH/ 
114b6(rnying rgyud): khro bo rgyal pos gsung bya ste// me lha'i gdan mchod pad+ma dbul// de rjes mchod pa rnam lnga dang // sreg rdzas ma lus dbul byas nas// lha rnams mchod pa'i phyag brtsang du// bstod cing gsol ba
114b7(rnying rgyud): gdab par bya// g.yas g.yon dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis// khu bcud 'dzag pa'i rnam grangs dbul// oM ma hA a na la ma hA b+hu tA badz+ra la basmi ku ru hUM sar+b+ba duSh+Ta Na hUM phaT// me lha mchod pa'o// oM ma hA/ 
114b8(rnying rgyud): ku ru panu hUM// dgang lugs dbul ba'i sngagaso// oM sarba ba d+ha ha na badz+ra swA hA// til gyi'o// oM badz+ra pusme hUM// me rtog gi'o// oM sarba ag+ne ye swA hA/ yam shing ngo // oM badz+ra pu tsa ma ga ga lo ka shar hUM/ 'jig
115a1(rnying rgyud): rten dbang phyug bya ba'i mchod pa'o// oM d+hU be rdi pa bu sha ldan d+he sbyar ba'i mchod pa rnams so// oM a pra ti badz+ra ye swAhA/ ku sha'i'o// oM badz+ra A yu she swAhA// ngur ba'i'o// gzhan
115a2(rnying rgyud): yang rdzas rnams gang tshogs pa// rang ming yi ge gsum sngags dbul// de nas dkyil 'khor kun mchod cing // 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab// sdig bshag bag chag kun byas pas// lha yi dngos grub
115a3(rnying rgyud): thob par 'gyur// tha ma me lha mchod byas nas// phrin las so so'i sngags brjod cing // oM badz+ra na ma sarba ta thA ga ta hri d+ha ya ma ku ru hUM// lha rnams gshegasasu gsol zhing // dam tshig lha la bsdu bar bya// de nas rab
115a4(rnying rgyud): gnas bzang po ni// 'gro la phan phyir bshad par bya// sa phyogs nyams dga' mdzes pa ru// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'kho dar legs byas te// mchod rdzas rdzas kyis mnyes byas nas// 
115a5(rnying rgyud): slob dpon chas su gzhug par bya// dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgrub sa byas nas// rten tshogs sbyang ba'i cho ga bya// ji ltar rdza/ gas pa'i sangs rgyas kun// dga' ldan gnas nas gshegs
115a6(rnying rgyud): mdzad/ lha mo sgyu ma'i lhums zhugs nas// de bzhin 'dir yang bzhugs su gsol// dkon mchog gnas 'dir bzhugs nas kyang // me tog la sogs mchod ba zhes la// 'di don bzung bar bya ba dang // byang chub
115a7(rnying rgyud): sems mchog spel bar mdzod// nang par rab gnas bgyid par 'tshal// slob ma rnams la rtse ba dang // khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir// bcom ldan bdag ni grub pa la// bka' drin chog mdzad par
115a8(rnying rgyud): 'os// de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas// 'gro drug gnas kun sgrol byed pa// thams cad dus 'dir dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom dang // gsang ba'i sngags ldan lha rnam
115b1(rnying rgyud): kun 'jig rten mchod pa'i don phyir ro// rab gnas bzang por 'os pa lags// de nas gnas rnams kun sbyangs nas// byin gyis brlabs pa rdzogs byas te// rang gi dkyil 'khor ji lta bar// dbang du
115b2(rnying rgyud): / cho ga rdzogs byas nas// sbyin sreg gtor ma la sogs gtang // zhes gsung so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ lam khyad par
115b3(rnying rgyud): du'aphags pa'i le'u ste/ brgyad pa'o// / de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthus thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa de'i bdud kyi rgyal po shin tu mya ngan skyes te/ 
115b4(rnying rgyud): kye ma'o ho sangs rgyas 'dir ni bdag gi gnas la sogs pa bcom zhing brlag par byed na thabs ji lta bur gdul bar bya// da'on kyang 'di nyid la ni bdag ci yang bya ba'i gnas med// shin tu
115b5(rnying rgyud): dman par 'gyur ba dag dang mtshungs par 'gran nam/ de bzhin du 'jig rten gsum pa 'di dag ni srid pa mi bsreg brlag/ par bya ba'i phrin las yin pas/ thams cad la dka' bsgo zhing / 
115b6(rnying rgyud): las ngan pa 'di dag la bzlog par bya'o zhes bsam mo// de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi gnas na mthu che ba dang / dbang dang gzi brjid thams cad 'dus nas/ kye khyed rnams bdag la nyon cig/ 'jig rten gyi khams
115b7(rnying rgyud): 'di dag ni/ rgyal po gcig gi dbang du ma gnas na/ thams cad srid pa 'jig par 'gyur ro// des na phyogs thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa 'dus la/ bdag gi bka' nyan par mdzod cig ces bsgrag so// 
115b8(rnying rgyud): de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi drag byed chen po'i tshigs kyis rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul bstan cing smras pa/ khyed ji lta bu'i nga rgyal can cig yin/ nged rnams re res kyang 'khor dpag tu med pa skyong ba'i rgyal po chen po yin pas// 
116a1(rnying rgyud): yul 'khor grangs med pa la dbang byed cing / gzhan gyi re gnas dam par gyur pa lags pas khyod rang bzhin gnas na legs so zhes 'thun par brjod par bas bdud kyi rgyal po yang
116a2(rnying rgyud): shin tu nyon mongs pas rgyas de gzhan dag la smras pa/ lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di dag kun// nga yi bka' las gnas pa yin// skye 'gro ma lus gang dag kun// rgyal po'i bka' gsang nyan
116a3(rnying rgyud): bar gyis// khams gsum bdag po lha'i lha// sa rnams kun gyi sa steng ba// bdag ni mthu dang rdzu 'phrul tshad// kun gyi 'dran par nus ma yin// nga yi bka' las 'da' byed na// srog srid
116a4(rnying rgyud): brlag cing gnas kyang 'thor// zhes brjod do// de nas tsha dras pa'i rgyal pos// rang gi 'khor dpag tu med pa bsdus te// de dag gi dbus nas srin po chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa'i khro/ 
116a5(rnying rgyud): bor gnas nas/ rang gi mthu las sprul pa'i khro bo dang / mtshon cha'i tshegs spro bar mdzad do// de bzhin du khya/ ba 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin dang / 
116a6(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyi bdag po dang / 'bring gi ri ti dang / gzhon nu gdong drug pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang dpag tu med pa bsdus te/ de dag gi dbus na 'gying zhing sprul pa bsam mi khyab par spros te/ 
116a7(rnying rgyud): dbang dang rdzu 'phrul ston to// ri rab kyi kha khyer la gnas pa'i rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang rang gis kyi dbus na 'gying zhing mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston par mdzad do// gser gyi ril gnas pa'i phyogs skyong brgya byin
116a8(rnying rgyud): dang dbang ldan dang / gshin rje dang / bden bral dang / chu lha dang / gnod sbyin dang / nyi ma dang / sa'i lha rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi gnas dang bcas par 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha dang bcas par 'a'o
116b1(rnying rgyud): de'i nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / mig dmar dang / pur bu dang / srab sangs dang / spen pa dang / gza' chen po rnams kyis kyang rang rang gi 'khor dang bcas pas 'jigs pa'i khro bo'i tshogs dang / mtshon char
116b2(rnying rgyud): bcas pas 'khod do// mtha' yas dang / 'jog po dang / stobs kyi rgyu dang / rigs ldan dang / nor rgyas dang / dung skyong dang / pad+ma dang / chu lha rnams kyis rang rang gi g.yog 'khor rnams dang / 
116b3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs pa'i sprul pas 'khod do// de bzhin du khams gsum gyi dregs byed kyi tshogs gnas pa'i gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / grul bum dang / 'gro ba drug gtso bo dbang che zhing mthu yod pa rnams/ 
116b4(rnying rgyud): dang / ma mo rnams dang / gshin rje dang / lha ma yin rnam sa dang / 'dab bzangs dang / srin pa dang / na mkha 'alding dang / rgyu skar gyi tshigs su bcas pa rnams kyis kyang rang rang
116b5(rnying rgyud): gi dbus na 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyi mtshon cha dang nga ro dang bcas pas rnam par 'phrul zhing 'khod do// de nas bdu da kyi rgyal po yang nyon mongs pa skyes te/ rang gi 'khor rnam
116b6(rnying rgyud): 'du bar mdzad cing / rdzu 'phrul gyi nus pa ci yod pa dus 'di dag cig tu ston nas mtshon cha sna tshogs 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang nas drag po 'bar bar 'jigs pa'i skur ston to// khro mo'i tshigs dang rol
116b7(rnying rgyud): pa mdzad pa lags/ 'khor ba'i tshogs mtshon cha ma 'od bcas pa phyogs bcur spros te/ nam mkha' thams cad gang bar byas nas thog ser nad dang tshub ma thams cad skyes so// des 'jig rten
116b8(rnying rgyud): gyi lha kun myos shing rmongs par gyur pa dang / 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyis phyogs thams cad nas/ 'khor ba'i me 'od 'bar ba'i mtshon chas bsad cing gtub pa las/ so so'i tshogs bred par gyur te/ 
117a1(rnying rgyud): rang gi snying po phul zhing skyabs su gsol lo// de nas lha thams cad 'du bar byed pa'i bdud kyi sde de dag la gnas dor zhing dam tshig byin te/ so so'i snying po blangs te/ 'khor
117a2(rnying rgyud): tshogs thams cad rje dpon dang bral te/ lha chen po brgyad ni rang gi rtse la 'khod do// rgyal po chen po bzhi ni shar gyi gling la 'khod do// gnod sbyin dang phyogs skyong dag ni shar gyi gling 'phran gnyis su
117a3(rnying rgyud): 'khod do// 'gro ba'is drug gi sems can rnams ni lhor bskod ngo // dri za dang ma mo rnams ni lho'i gling phran la dgod ngo // lha ma yin rnams ni nub tu dgod do// gshin rje dang 'dab bzangs dang smin
117a4(rnying rgyud): po rnams ni nub kyi gling gi gling phran gnyis la dgod do// gapa'angang rgyu skar rnams ni byang du dgod do// de bzhin pa/ dgegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba blan med pa las bdud
117a5(rnying rgyud): sprul pa bstan pa'o// de nas bdud kyi rgyal po de nyid shin tu dga' zhing 'khor tham sa cad la dka' bsgo// rgyal po gcig gi 'khor du gnas pas mi
117a6(rnying rgyud): yod dang 'thun par spyod pas gnas pa yin pas// khyed rnams kyis kyang ngas ci ltar bsgo ba'i bkar bzhin nyon la/ thar pa'i lam 'di tshong la ston pa gzhan la gus par ma byed cig/ kho bo'i 'jig
117a7(rnying rgyud): rted bangs por 'ong ngo // bas ma brgyanan po meng pa'i gro ba 'di dag ni// gangasug can gyirang bzhin ste// byol song lta bu yin ngas// 'de legs kyi gnas thob ba'idan med pa yin no// yang / 
117a8(rnying rgyud): tshigs su cad de smras pa// kye 'dugs rid pa'i 'gro ba dag/ rang ga bde ba spong byed cing // tha pa'i lam gzhan sru byed pa// de dag 'khrulangs nga chung badrag zhes 'dod pade legs slong byed pa
117b1(rnying rgyud): bas 'gro rnams snying re rje// re shig thugs rje skal ldan pas// bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa yin// gnas gzhan gong mtho 'dod pas// bdag la dang sems gus par gyis shig ces bsgo'o// de dag gis kyang de ltar
117b2(rnying rgyud): nyan ste/ rang rang gi gnas shor zhing mya ngan gyi sems skyes kyang ci ltar bya ba'i thabs med de/ de ltar 'khod cing gnas so// de nas bdud kyi rgyal po rang gi gnas su song ste/ 'khor dang bcas pa rnams
117b3(rnying rgyud): dga' ba'i long spyod 'dod pa'i yon tan la spyod cing / dgyes pa'i glu gar dang rol mo la spyod do// ji ltar khams gsum kun gyi bdag po ni bdag yin pas/ 'di las lhag pa'i bsgrub bya ni gzhan dag yod
117b4(rnying rgyud): par bdag gis ma mthong ngo // da sangs rgyas kyi tshogs dang / byang chub sems dang 'dag kyang bdag gi dbang du bsdu na thabs ci ltar brtsam zhing / rang gi 'khor dag la yang 'dri bar byed do// de nas
117b5(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi grong khyer kun la bsgo ste/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor rnam sa la mi dge ba'i bltas dang mtshan ma ngan pa'i cho 'phrul sna tshogs kyi bsgrub pa thams cad du rab tu 'chad cing / ci 'dod pa rnams la
117b6(rnying rgyud): grub par bya na bdag cag la mos pa byed do// de'i rjes la de dag gi gtso bo rnams bdag gi 'khor du 'dus pa'i tshe thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas gdul bar bya'o// gal te 'ongs par ma nus pa dag ni kho rang gi gnas
117b7(rnying rgyud): de nyid dang bcas pa gzhom par bya'o zhes brjod do// de'i stong gsum g.yo bar byed pa'i tshogs kyi khro bo'i mtshon cha'i tshegs dang bcas pa sprul nas/ dkar po'i ris la dga' ba'i 'gro ba rnams ma lus bco
117b8(rnying rgyud): zhing / sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang brlag par bshams pa las/ bden pa'i mthu gang la gnod par ma gyur to// de nas rab tu khros te/ bdag gi khams gsum 'di dus
118a1(rnying rgyud): gcig tu gdul bar baspyod pa la/ ngan pa'i tshul can g.yo sgyu dang bcas pa 'di dag mi 'dul lam/ de rang gi sde tshan 'og ma la gnas pa kun bskul te/ thar pa'i lam
118a2(rnying rgyud): la gnas pa 'di dag rigs kyis 'dul bar bya'o zhes brjod do// de nas tshangs pa la sogs pa bsgo bar mdzad pa dang / de dag gis kyang rang rang gi sprul pa dang / mtshon cha rnams phyogs kun tu sgo
118a3(rnying rgyud): zhing / rang gi gsang sngags drag po'i tshogs dag kyang brjod par byed do// des 'jig rten 'khrugs shing g.yos nas thams cad bred par gyur to// bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol
118a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud la/ bdud kyi sde dang bcas pashugs 'byung ba'i la~M 'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan pade chen mchog/ sangs rgyas
118a5(rnying rgyud): kun gyi bdag nyid kyis// stong gsum so sor 'dul mdzadaphyir// rnam 'phrul ting 'dzin gnas la bzhugs// de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos kyang // thugs rje che dang
118a6(rnying rgyud): smon lam mthus// so so'i las rtog 'thun bzhin du// sna tshogs rtog pa'i tshul ma ston// 'dod chags la zhen smon pa dag/ chags pa chen pos 'dul bar mdzad// de bzhin zhe sdang gti mug
118a7(rnying rgyud): dang nga rgyal phrag dog 'dul don du// 'thun byas snang ba sna tshogs dang // mi mthun sgo nas 'dul bar mdzad// pad+mo bde gshegs rdo rje don// rin chen rin chen las sna tshogs// phyag
118a8(rnying rgyud): rgya che sogs 'khor lo sgyur// ji lta ba bzhin dag par mdzad// thabs chen rnam dag pad+mo'i dzin// shes rab sprul pa'i mchog 'gyur bas// gar gyi dbang phyug bde bache// rdo rje lha nyid spru
118b1(rnying rgyud): pabar mdzad/ gzhan yang mdzad pa rgya chen po// sna tshogs mthu yis 'dul mdzad de// dag pa'i 'gro ba 'thun byas sku// gser 'od mtshan dang dpe byad ldan// go byed theg pa bla na med// zab mo gsang
118b2(rnying rgyud): sngags ji bzhin par// rgyal ba bde ga shegs phyag rgya gu// rab sdus dkyil 'khor sna tshogs pa'i// la las byang sems rgya chen mchog/ la lang lam lda dag par myong // la lar pha rol gyi
118b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs/ la la nga 'bras du'i don la spyod// la lang dag ldan lnga yul 'phags// lhums su zhugs dang ba lnga ma dang // 'jig rten spyod 'thun rol rgyang sogs// gzhan gyi skur rdza
118b4(rnying rgyud): bya ba bsnams// bcas ka'i can gyi bsam 'phrul pa// 'thun 'jug thabs kyi bya ba ma chog/ dka' thub mdzad dang ngag 'a bstod// rdo rje gdan la yang sangs rgyas// bdud
118b5(rnying rgyud): 'dul mngon rdzogs sangs rgyas shing // rtse gcig ting 'dzin pa skul nas bzhugs// cho 'phrul mdzad pa kun 'dul zhing // chos kyi 'khor lo rims bzhin bskor// mya ngan
118b6(rnying rgyud): 'da' tshul ring srel ston// zhi tshogs khro bor 'khyil pa dang // rang byung dud 'gro'i gzugs sna tshogs// snod kyi 'jig rten kun mthu skra// tshangs pa khyab 'jug 'jig rten skyong // bdud dang srin pa
118b7(rnying rgyud): gzugs sogs kyis// 'gro ba'i las rtog dag mdzad cing // rang gi ye shes don bkod bya// de tshe 'gro ba'i gnas mtshon tshogs// las kyi stobs tshogs mthus brdabs rnams// de bzhin
118b8(rnying rgyud): nyid mthus tshogs chen pos// yang dag lam las rab grol zhing // nga rgyal chen po'i dregs tshogs skyes// rang gi mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ston// nyon mongs las kyi lam la zhen// rang gi rigs
119a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs bsdu bar byed// 'jig rten gsum 'jig a la la// khams gsum gtso bo bdag cag rnams// su zhig sprul pa a la la// 'jigs par mdzad pa'i 'os ma lags// rang gi ba/ 
119a2(rnying rgyud): thub bde gnas pas// mya ngan 'das pa'i lam mchog ste// gzhan gyi bstan pa ci zhig bya// bde tshogs 'jigs pa'i yan lag go// su zhig rang gi bde spong zhing // gzhan nas sdug bsngal don gnyer ba// 
119a3(rnying rgyud): gzugs mang sprul pa bsam yas kyang // rang gi sku mdzes bsgyur ba bka'// sgra mang sprul pa bsam yas pas// rang gi gsung nyan 'phro byed dam// sems rtog bya ba'i 'od bcas kyis// ting 'dzin
119a4(rnying rgyud): rtse gcig 'gyur ba med// drag po'i stobs mchog gzi ldan rnams// rang gis rang spyod bde bar sdod// de nas bdud dpung dang po dang // dbang phyug tshangs pa khyab 'jug che// rgya byed glu
119a5(rnying rgyud): dang dregs byed rnams// rab tu khros te rang gi mthus// ston zhe/ nga drag po'i gsang sngags dang // gtum tshig nga ro 'ab nga sgrogs byed// de tshe rgyal po'i byin brlabs mthus// 'thun 'jug
119a6(rnying rgyud): thabs kyis 'dul mdzad de// theg pa gsang ba bla med mchog/ khyad par sgo gsung gsang byed cing // yang dag don la bde bkod phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'thun mdzad de// 'jug pa'i lam ring bde bstan zhing / 
119a7(rnying rgyud): dga' ba'i sgo nas bde mdzad kyang // rang gi nyon mongs dregs pa'i mthus// don 'jug 'thun pa'i spyod sgo 'jig/ gti mug chen po mun gtibs nas// nga rgyal ri bo kun tu bkod// zhe sdang me lce 'bar
119a8(rnying rgyud): sreg shing / pra dog rlung gis bskyod byas nas// 'dod chags chu bos 'byin par 'gyur// dregs pa'i mthu yis rab khros te// tshogs rnams gcig la gcig bsgo zhing // gsang sngags rdzu 'phrul
119b1(rnying rgyud): stobs phyung nas// rab tu bsgrags pa'i mthu yis ni// 'jig rten gsum dag 'khrug par byed// mi nad mu ge 'khrug pa dang // mtshon cha lo tog 'bras bu 'phrog/ 'byung po'i 'jigs gzugs nyes tshogs rnams// 
119b2(rnying rgyud): rgyun mi 'chad du 'khor bar 'byung // sa ga ni me 'bar chu bdag byed// dug dang dbyig dug rlung bzhin g.yos// bde lam mtho ris thar lam gcod// mi dag sems kyis non 'gyur zhing // 'gro rnams sdug
119b3(rnying rgyud): bsngal bskyed byas pas// sangs rgyas rnams kyis thugs khral bskyed// de nas byang chub sems bcas pa'i// 'khor rnams dus gcig bstan par bzhengs// gtso bo'i phyogasu 'du byed cing // lan
119b4(rnying rgyud): grangs bskor zhing phyag kyang 'tshal// mgon po bde ba mnyes byed/ da cing // mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya// thugs rje che mang lha yi lha// byams sogs dga' ba'i bdud rtsi chus// gdos bcas
119b5(rnying rgyud): thal bar brlag mdzad pas// thim 'gyur rdo rje ye shes tshogs// cho 'phrul dkyil 'khor bstan du gsol// mdzad pa'i byin pa rlabs bstan du gsol// de dag nyon mongs rlabs 'khrugs pas/ 
119b6(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin thar lam bde bar 'joms// byang chub sems nyid rlan bral lam// srid gsum yal bar dor byed na// thugs rje chen po gang la gdags// e ma ho 'bras bu mya ngan 'das// e ma ho byang sems pad+ma'i
119b7(rnying rgyud): brdzings// e ma ho brjod bral ku mu ta// e ma ho me tog 'bras bcas shing // 'di dag dkyil 'khor rnam dag pas// rigs mchog mtshan nyid yon tan gnas// dus 'dir dag par ga la mdzad// thugs rje
119b8(rnying rgyud): chen po ga la gdags// 'di dag skal ldan gsung ba'i snod// rdo rje theg pa'i bstan pa 'dzin// da ltar rnam rtog ri bos non// thabs kyis 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas// shugs kyis bsgral bar bya ba'i phyir/ 
120a1(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bstan du gsol// zhes gsol to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las mdzad pa
120a2(rnying rgyud): chen po'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha chen po rnams 'dul bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje bdakod pa'i dkyil
120a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po 'di nyid sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings nas phyung ste sprul pa mdzad do// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa'i// rta babs rgyan tshogs kun gyis spras// rin chen nor bu'i phreng sogs dang // ban d+ha dril bu 'dod/ 
120a4(rnying rgyud): pa lnga yi tshigs// mchod pa bla re rgyal mtshan gdugs//  dadog nyi shu rtsa lngas spras// 'khor lo re'u mig dgu pa las// seng ge la sogs gdan khri spras// ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta nam/ 
120a5(rnying rgyud): D+ha Na ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ shaSha sa ha kA/ ye shes ma 'dres bde chen gsal// rnam 'phrul rigs ma cho ga gzungs kyi dam tshig dang // khro zhing 'dren pa'i mdangs kyis gnas
120a6(rnying rgyud): rigs gnyis lung gis rgyud pa'i sku// dmar nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa// ser dkar dmar ba'i zhal gnyis dag/ bzhin mdangs tshangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas// dbus ma khro 'dzum brjid pag dang // pad+ma rdo rje
120a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo dang // dril bu rin chen rtse gsum 'dzin// rin chen phreng ba'i chun 'phyangs dang // mu tig do shal dpung rgyan sras// stod g.yogs smad dkris na bza' klubs// dbu rgyan snyan cha sor rngub tshogs// mtshan bza
120a8(rnying rgyud): dpe byad mdzes par brgyan// rigs kyi mchod pas dbu skra sil// rang 'od btsun mo'i sku bcas pa// phyung nas phyogs bcu'i sngags kyis spros// hUM phaT pad+mo d+hi ga dza swA hA/ oM du druM b+hin d+ha dza pra mo haM/ mdzad pa'i
120b1(rnying rgyud): phrin las rdzogs byas nas// slar 'dus bdag po'i skul thim// shar du rnam snang phyug rgya che// gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rtse gsum be con pad+mo la gri ban d+ha 'dzin// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan nyid// 
120b2(rnying rgyud): mthing gzhal gsum phyag drug pa// rin chen pad+ma gro gug dang // shul bu'i rtse gsum 'dzin// nub tu snang ba mtha' yas su// dmar po zhal gsum phyag drug pa// thod dbyug rtse gsum pad+mo dang // dgraH
120b3(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo ral gri 'dzin// byang du don yod grub pa nyid// ljang khu zhal gsum phyag drug pa// ral gri rdo rje dbyug pa mdung // pad+mo rtse gsum gshin rje'i rkang // kun gyi g.yas dkar g.yon pa ni// dmar
120b4(rnying rgyud): ljang ser dang le'u rgan mdag/ rang gi btsun mo'i 'gul na/ da'akhyud // zhal gcig phyag gnyis bdag po ltar// skum dag gsang ba'i mdangs dang ldan// phyag dang cha lugs kun gyis btsun
120b5(rnying rgyud): oM dzi na dzig lam te sha sha ra ti/ swa rang na d+h+r-ig/ ma mo ha ra ti/ oM a ro l-ig/ byaM ra ga ra ti/ ha badz+rA d+h+r-ig/ taM badz+ra ra te/ hUM badz+ra ra ti/ hUM phaT swA hA// 'od zer 'gro ba'i tshogs bcas pas/ 
120b6(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal bar mdzad// 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal cha lugs dang // dgyes pa'i dkyil dkrung tshul gyis bzhugs// khyams kyi phyogs dang mtshams rnams su// sems dpa' brgyad dang sa
120b7(rnying rgyud): ma brgyad/ thugs kyi ye shes yi ge las// rang gi gsang sngags dag gis gdon// sa snying dkar ser rin chen 'dzin// nam snying mthing ka ral gri 'dzin// spyan ras dmar sku pad+ma 'dzin// gsang bad
120b8(rnying rgyud): ldang sa rdo rje 'dzin// g.yon pa pad+mo yu ba can// bsnyems pa'i tshul gyis phyog su 'dud// sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs dang gar// dkar ser dmar ldang 'od 'phro mdog/ me long rin chen phreng ba dang / dbyang / 
121a1(rnying rgyud): skan gang thabs mdzes pa'i tshul// oM kr-i ra tsa ya/ rdul ses ma ya sto/ tra ma les ma ye ho// tra pad+ma banad+ha dz+r-i/ gin+ti tsaH/ a ni ti ga la mi hUM phaT// byams pa dkar ser / 
121a2(rnying rgyud): shing 'dzin// sgrib sel 'khor lo mthing ka ste// 'jam dpal dmar skya ud pa la// kun bzangs ljang ser rin chen ste// g.yon pa pad mo lcug ma 'dzin// sems dpa'i stabs kyis gdan la bzhugs// bdug
121a3(rnying rgyud): spos me tog 'thor ba dang // mar me dri chab lha mo rnams// ser dkar dmar ljang go rim bzhin// mtshan dang 'thun pa'i rdzas kyis mdzes// oM mer ni/ dza du ba bra ba sha/ thi ling sA ra ma pa ya/ hUM pus pa a be/ 
121a4(rnying rgyud): shahUM sA ra tsa ya/ be di pa bu gi ni/ mu shi ra tsa ya/ ho gan da d+he tsi ta ya hUM phaT// shar sgor gshin rje gshed po che// mni dang nag be con rtse gsum 'phreng // lho sgor stobs chen ser skya'
121a5(rnying rgyud): mdangs// rdo rje zhags pa rin chen phreng // nub sgor rta mchoga'ajigs byed rgyal// thod sbrul dril bu lu gu rgyud/ dzi kyi de khri gsus nga// khro bo cha lugs rngam brjid dang / 
121a6(rnying rgyud): dur khrod rim pa'i chas kyis brgyan// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// spyan dmar 'jigs byed 'od dpung dang // rdo rje mchi sogs khro gnyer can// yab yum 'khyim pa brkyang bskum sku/ 
121a7(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT ru lu'i gsung 'don cing // las kyi 'khor lo gnon pa'i tshul// oM ru lu pad+man ta krid hUM phaT/ dza badz+ra kro ti shwa ri hUM pradz+nyA ta krid phaT/ hUM rang na kro ti shwa ri/ hUM pad+man ta krid phaT/ baM pad+ma kro ti sha ri hUM
121a8(rnying rgyud): ngig nan ta kr-id ho karma kro ti shwa ri hUM phaT swA hA// phyi nang med par dkyil 'khor chen po ste// thugs rje ye shes che las sprul// phyag rgya bzhi yi rgyas gtab cing // dbul rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan// 'od/ 
121b1(rnying rgyud): dpung sprul pa'i lha 'khor gyis// 'jig rten gsum po snang byed cing // tshangs pa la sogs lha chen brgyad rnams 'gugs// rdo rje brjid gnon sngags kyi mthus// de dag dran pa med par 'gyur// mtshon cha'i
