121b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs kyis sgrol byas te// dug gsum phung po gsol bar mdzad// 'phrin las khro bo brjid glu yis// lha chen 'khor rnams dbang du bsdud// dkyil 'khor chen por gzhag byas nas// snga ma'i
121b3(rnying rgyud): rus gnas nas ston// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i ting 'dzin gyis// lha chen rnams kyis slar lus gsol// 'khor bcas pa yi dbang bskur zhing // rdo rje 'chang gi gral la dgod// dam tshig gsang ba'i brdas
121b4(rnying rgyud): bsgos shing // phrin las bka' nyan gnyer gtad de// ga zhal yas khang gi brgyan du gzhag/ kun kyang tshig dpyad sa mthun pa spos// dam tshig mna' srog thal myong 'gyur// 
121b5(rnying rgyud): zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgodas pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud/ chen po las rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu
121b6(rnying rgyud): gcig pa'o// / de nas pad+mo chags pa'i skus// gsung gi gzi mdang rgyu mdzad do// phyag rgya rdzu 'phrul gnas sbyor bas// gser mig 'dab bzangs grong khyer dang // lang
121b7(rnying rgyud): ka'i gnas tshogs srin po'i sde// klu rgyal dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul kun stobs 'khor lo yis// lha chen la sogs gdul ba dgongs// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs te// pad+ma rta mchog
121b8(rnying rgyud): sprul pa mdzad// de bzhin nyid dbyings snyoms 'jug las// sems dpa' rgyal ba kun gyi yab// rdo rje 'dzin thub dbang nyid dang // rigs nyid sprul pa'i lung las grub// sku mdog dmar por ga ni
122a1(rnying rgyud): mdog ngazhal gsum rta mgo ljang khu can// phyag na gri gug khA tre kha// thod pa khrag med dadung sbrul lnga// gnas brgyad krung dag zod phreng dang // glang chen sdug gi lpags pa gyon// 
122a2(rnying rgyud): sgra skad drag po phyogs bcur sgrog/ bgegs la sogs pa'i cha lugs can// drang srong khros de'i cha lugs kyis// klu yi 'gro ba rmongs mdzad pa// pad+ma'i gdan la brkyang bskum gyis// yum chen dpal/ 
122a3(rnying rgyud): ldan ma dang sbyor// oM pad+med+ma gu ru he he ru lu hUM phaT// 'khor lo 'bar ba phyogs mtshams su// ye shes khro bo chen po brgyad// hri las grub pa'i 'jigs gzugs can// rta mgo ljang khu brjid
122a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i// shar du pad+ma'i dbang phyug ni// dkar po zhal gsum bya/ ngag drug pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma klu zhags dang // rin chen dbyug pa rul gri mdung// seng ge rgyal mo sku dang 'khril// sna tshogs/ 
122a5(rnying rgyud): mi mthun zhabs kyis gnon// nyi ma zla ba'i snyan chas brgyan// sbrul gyi phreng bas gnas kun brgyan// lho ru gzi chen dragapo ni// mdog nag ral gri rtse gsum lnga// rdo rje rtse gsum
122a6(rnying rgyud): mda' dang gzhu// drag po gnas kyi sku dang 'khril// mi ri 'bar bas kun tu khyab// stag mo bcings pas gzhan gnas 'jig/ sprul pa'i pho nya me 'brug gi/ khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor tshogs/ 
122a7(rnying rgyud): nub du rdo rje dra ba mchog/ dmar ser rdo rje dbyug pa bri// 'khor lo sbrul zhags me long chu// lha mo 'jigs rten zhabs kyis gnon// 'od 'bar glog gi phreng ba can// sprul pa'i pho nya lce spyang gdong // 'bum
122a8(rnying rgyud): drag dri dang zod khrag 'dzin// byang du 'ong byed 'jigs chen sku// ljang khu rtse gsum mda' bo che// nor bu dung khrag lcug ma dung khrag 'chang // ra ro mig dmar zil gyis non// rgyal bdag khro/ 
122b1(rnying rgyud): po'i sku dang 'khril// cod pan klu mgo gdengs ka'i rgyan// dus mtshungs phud kyi sgra chen sgrogs// kun kyang thod phreng g.yang gzhi dang // dur khrod gnas 'byung cang me byed// 'tshams kyi khro bo chen po bzhi// 
122b2(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi phyed gzugs thig les mtshan// zhal gsum phyag drug 'od mdangs can// rdo rje thong dbyug klu yi sgra// lce spyang bya khyung gnas lcags sprin// 'od phreng thig le dbyug gu'i rgyan// rnam 'phrul/ 
122b3(rnying rgyud): klu thabs u ta ra// 'dod yon lha mo'i tshigs kyis bskor// kun tu spyan dmar rdo rje'i mtshan// gnas su 'jigs pa'i hUM sgra sgrogs// glu yi rgyal po gnas na bzhugs// gzhan gyi rdzu 'phrul 'joms
122b4(rnying rgyud): bar byed// oM ma hA ha ya gri ba pad+ma d+ha ru naM bi d+ha ha ra hUM phaT/ dartsa ba'i sngags so// oM na mo ad taMte he ru lu ru kaM ba mu kha/ a kar sha ya rak+Sha na gaM gu ru hUM phaT// snying po'i sngag so// oM
122b5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma rag ma ku ru ra ga ru lu ru lu hUM phaT// nye ba'i snying po'o// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyogs bzhi ru// lcags kyu lcags sgron zhags pa dril bu rnams// dkar dmar ser ldang 'od mang/ 
122b6(rnying rgyud): 'bar// seng ge lce sbrang stag 'brug dang // mgo brtsegs sprul pa'i 'khor dang bcas// rang gi las kyis 'khod pa dang // 'jigs pa'i cha lugs rngam gzugs gnas// las mdzad klu yi dkyil 'khor 'dul/ 
122b7(rnying rgyud): klu chen brgyad sogs bsdus byas na// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par bya// rang gi dam tshig dran pa'i shugs// spyan rnams spyan ngar 'dod par byed// oM na ga drings meg na na ga ra tsa ya sa ma ya hUM// dkyil 'khor
122b8(rnying rgyud): gsang bar dbang bskur nas// 'od bzangs gzi mdangs mi dpung 'bar// rigs kyi dbu rgyan gsal byed phye// ye shes 'od tshogs gnas bcas te// dkyil 'khor gsang bar goms zhugs kyis// tshul 'dzin dkon mchog
123a1(rnying rgyud): mngon du dbye/ tshogs rnams ma lus 'grin gcig tu// gar dbang skul skyabs gsol zhing // 'dod yon gsol 'debs dam pa// bsod nams phung po'i gter la spyod// kye ma dkyil 'khor la
123a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan che/ bdag cag 'khor rnams rab sgrol mdzad// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor dpe bral bas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du gnas// bde chen lam 'di sngon ma rtogs// da ltar thugs rje drin gyis rnyed// 
123a3(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor gsang bar 'dzin byed kyi// ji ltar bsgos pa'i bka' bzhin bgyid// rdo rje gsang ba'i dam 'di las// gal te nyams na 'das par shog/ ces dam bcas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
123a4(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud che na po las rta 'grin dbang gi dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan
123a5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i skus// yul la phyags tshul 'dzum mdangs kyis// bka' yi bsgo bas dgyes mdzad de// mi shigs ting 'dzin la/ gnas mdzad// phyogs skyong dri za rgyal chen po// rang gi chung ma chog
123a6(rnying rgyud): bcas pas 'ganas gzhan 'jig par mdzad pa dang // rang gi mthus bcus 'dul bar mdzad// sku ni bai dUr 'tsher ba'i mdangs// zhal gsum phyag rgya drug gis rol// rin chen mdzod bum sngags chen lcug
123a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo phreng ba ma ga ta// rgyan dang cha lugs rin chen tshogs// dbyings kyi dbang phyug yum chen mo// dmar skya zab mo'i tshul du sbyor// 'od 'phro sems dpa'i gdug pa'i 'phro// rigs lnga'i dbu brgyan rin
123a8(rnying rgyud): chen phreng // phyag rgya bzhi yis brjid pa'i lha// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // gru bzhi sgo bzhi rta babs brgyan// bar 'khyams 'khor gyi dbus nas bgying // pad+ma'i lte bar dkyil dkrung bzhugs// 
123b1(rnying rgyud): shar du 'joms byed rdo rje'i sku// dkaragasal rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// lho ru rin chen blo gros sku// dpal be'u gdugs mdzes 'od mang ser// nub kyi phyogs kyi rgyal po rtog/ dkar dmar pad+ma glegs pam 'dzin
123b2(rnying rgyud): byang du 'jig rten kun sgrol po// ljang sku rdo rje rgya gram bri// shar lho dra ba'i dbang phyug ni// se re skya rin chen 'bring kar// lho nub chos kyi lhun po mchog/ rtse gsum pad+ma'i lcug ma 'dzin// nub byang rgyal ba'i ye shes te// 
123b3(rnying rgyud): sngo skya seng ge'i bum pa 'dzin// byang shar rgyu 'phrul dra ba brtsegs// ljang ser g.yung drung rdo rje mtshan// 'di dag 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal byen// mtshan dang dpe byad 'od mdangs rgyan// skyes bu chen po'i longs spyod 'phe
123b4(rnying rgyud): cha 'thun yum dang 'khril bar bzhugs// oM bi ta dz+nyA na ta na saM bog tra hUM phaT// oM d+harma mu ni na sa na sa hUM// oM bi ha ra pra mo tha na hUM phaT// oM dz+wA lo tra saM bo ga ya hUM phaT// oM rang na ma rung te sa gr-i hUM
123b5(rnying rgyud): phaT/ oM ma hA shu ti mu sa mo ha hUM phaT// oM bud d+ha bud d+ha sa/ r+ya na ku ma ra hUM phaT// oM na ma ga gan si ta yo ga hUM phaT/ oM ni sa ha he hi hu mu ga ra ba ra hUM phaT// 'khor lo'i gsang sngags/ 
123b6(rnying rgyud): rab brjod pas// lha rnams phyi yi gnas su spro// drag po'i rgyu 'bras sbyong byas te// gnas kun dag pa'i ye shes che// rigs mchog ye shes 'od gsal bas// shar gyi dbang po dri za sogs// 
123b7(rnying rgyud): gnas mgon skyabs dang dbang du mdzad// nyon mongs las kyis dregs pa'i tshogs// rang rgyud zhi nas byang sems bcas// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod// snying po mdongs gsol phul
123b8(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur/ oM trag sha ka sarba ra ma ma sa hUM hUM swA hA// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi rig pa 'di byin gyis brlab du gsol// bstan pa myur du spel cig/ rgyun chad pa'i sngags kyis thams cad bsrung bar gyur pa bde/ 
124a1(rnying rgyud): legs su bya ba'i gnas pa bdag cag dus thams cad dkyil 'khor 'dir gnas shing de 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pa dag bsrung bar bya ba dang / bran bzhin du gnas par bgyi'o// slar yang bdag
124a2(rnying rgyud): cag rnams mgon pos bzhengs la byin gyis brlabs te dbang bskur ba dang grol bar mdzad du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis rig pa'i snying po 'di byin gyis brlab so// oM u aM mri ta
124a3(rnying rgyud): rig na shu ta hUM phaTaT hA/ zhes gsungs pa dang / de dag dang po'i sangs rgyas bzhin du 'od zer dang bcas par gyur nas gzhal yas khang gi rgyan du 'khod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gas
124a4(rnying rgyud): bdapal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las thugs ye shes sems dranga'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste/ bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bde byed gar dbang phyug/ pad+ma 'tshe/ 
124a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sku chen pos// yon tan rin chen sgyu ma'i chos// ting nge/ 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// mkha' 'gro tshogs pa/ ces gshin rje rnams// rgyal po rgyal chen rgyal mor gnas/ 
124a6(rnying rgyud): 'khor bcas 'dul bar bya ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro chen mo'i tshigs 'phrul mdzad// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med las// gzi ldan gar gyi dbang phyug ma// pad+ma ra ga na mkha' mdog/ zhal gcig pa
124a7(rnying rgyud): la phyag bzhi ste// pad+ma'i sdong po bdud rtsi'i snod// rdo rje bzong zhags pa thogs// rin chen phreng ba'i rgyan gyis klungs// khyod bzhang 'jigs mdangs tshul 'dzin cing // brkyang bskum zhing mchog nyi ma
124a8(rnying rgyud): dkyil// g.yang gni nyi ma'i phreng bas rgyan// oM pad+ma ma hA kro ti sha ri hUM phaT// dpal gyi lha mchog nyid dang // oM dang sbrul te phyogs dang 'tshams// pad+ma'i gdan la zhing gis mtshan// brkyang bskun
124b1(rnying rgyud): sku mdog sngon mo'i tshogs/ phyag na gri gug zod pa khrag/ 'bar ba'i cha lugs skra 'bar ma/ phyi rol sprul pa'i tshogs bcas pas// dur khrod chen po'i gnas su rol// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // las dang / 
124b2(rnying rgyud): sgyu 'phrul mkha' la bzhad// sna tshogs sgyu ma bzhin rgyas spyan// kha dog phyogs mtshams ji lta bu// gsal zhing mun pa'i rdul gyis gos// zhing gi dbyug pa rtse gsum dang // gser gyi mnga' dang rdo rje dang / 
124b3(rnying rgyud): chu srin rgyal mtshan zhags pa dang // zhing chen rdo rje rtse dgu gdengs// gri gug rgyu ma'i zhags pa sdom// rdo rje gdengs pa rtsa gsum khrag/ zhing chen khog phyes snying 'dren cing // de bzhin rlung yang thod pa 'chang // 
124b4(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra da krid ma hA la ti ti hUM hUM phaT// oM badz+ra dzatri me dar hUM phaT/ da.oM DA ka ming gum pa ya hU~M phaT// oM DA kani ti pra sha hU~M phakra/ sa.oM badz+ra DA ka~M bi las hU~M phaT// oM badz+ra ta kr-i pri ku rba ma le hUM phaT/ 
124b5(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra DA ki dza la dz+wa la hUM phaT// phyi rol pad+ma'i 'dab ma las/ seng ge rta dang lte spyang wa/ bya rgod kang ka bya rog 'ug/ ma go brnyan mcheg shog chen mo brgyad// hUM las sprul te mdog
124b6(rnying rgyud): dbar po phyag na gri gug thod pa khrag/ rdo rje ral gri rtse gsum mdung // 'khor lo dgra sta be con mda'// gtun shin zhing khog g.yang gzhi sprul// ne'u gnong pa rin chen khyung // zhal gdang / 
124b7(rnying rgyud): so so'i phyogs mdangs bzhin// kun kyang khro bcas khyams par gnas// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi thod phreng sbrul// khrag zhag thal ba'i tshem bus brgyan// mkha' gro rigs bdun ma sring sprul pa'i
124b8(rnying rgyud): tshogs mcheg shog 'bar ba phyogs bcur la khrugs// oM se ra bar na hU~M/ oM nir taM sha pa mu ba hUM pakra// mo ke na mdun du sa// mi mu ka ra nan hUM Ta// oM suHsa mo ka hUM phaT// oM badz+ra smig na n+du/ 
125a1(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT i ni sha kur+ya ran hUM phaT/ oM re laM su bag sha hUM phaT// mkha' 'gro bcu drug 'di dag kyang // 'od 'bar glog gi phreng ba can// 'od kyis ru lu'i sgra 'byin cing / 
125a2(rnying rgyud): spyan mur khro gnyer mche ba can// zhal gnyis phyag bzhi rol pa'i stabs// dbyings dang shes rab rab rtogs la// so so'i phrin las mdzad pa'i phyag/ zhal dang sku ni so so'i mdog/ oM ru khu se ta gu na De tas mo rag
125a3(rnying rgyud): hUM phaTa' snying po'i sngags so// oM badz+ra DA ki dza la shaM ba ra ku ma ra hUM phaT// nye ba'o// oM DA ki hUM sam pa ra dza li mu kha ma me hUM phaT// rtsa ba'i sngags so// mkha' 'gro ma'i dkyil 'khor spro ba'i mthus// de dag dran pa med
125a4(rnying rgyud): par brgyal/ slar nyid rang gi 'khor du bsdus// dam tshig dkyil 'khor chen por bkod// de nas mkha' 'gro'i tshigs dang bcas/ gdul bya rnams kyi gnas dor nas// rgyal ba'i bstan pa bzung byed
125a5(rnying rgyud): cing / rdo rje theg pa sbyor bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las mkha' 'gro ma sprul pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// 
125a6(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa'i gtso// gar gyi dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs// gzi ldan yum dang zhal sbyor zhing // phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor sprul pa'o// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms zhugs nas// phyogs kyi bgegs/ 
125a7(rnying rgyud): 'dul byed pa'o// khams gsum gnon pa'i dkyil 'khor sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin gnas// rin chen 'bar ba'i khang bzangs na// rin chen pad+ma seng ge'i gdan// dri med nyi zla spras pa la// dbus
125a8(rnying rgyud): kyi lha mchog chen po ni// zhabs brgyad phyag ni bcu drug dang // dmar ser nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bzhin// bgegs la sogs pa'i tshul dang ldan// pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo dri// thod pa rin chen dgra sta ras// yum chen dang
125b1(rnying rgyud): byug sgeg mo dang // rgyan tshogs rin chen phreng ba can// dri med pad+mas klungs pa'o// oM ba ga ba te ru ka sa bo ga ta ma hUM phaT// mdun du rdorje sems dpa' ni// dkar ser rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// g.ya su rin chen sem
125b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' ste ser po rin chen 'khor lo thogs// rgyab du pad+mo'i sems dpa' nyid// dmar ser rtse gsum bum pa thogs// g.yon du las kyi sems dpa' ste// ljang ser dril bu tri ku la// oM badz+ra satwa hUM phaT/ a
125b3(rnying rgyud): rat+na swatwa hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma swatwa hU~M phaT// oM karma swad+d+ha hUM phaT// 'khor lo pad+ma'i rtse mo la// yum dang 'khril ba'i tshul gyis 'khod// phyi rol pad+ma'i rigs bdun la// bde gshegs yab yum nyis stong tshegs/ 
125b4(rnying rgyud): bde gshegs rdo rje rin chen dang // pad+ma rgya gram sna tshogs mkha'// sku mdog pad+ma ra ga dang // in+d+ra la sogs rim bdun la// ral pa rtse mdzod bum pa la// lcug ma dril bu glegs bam dang / 
125b5(rnying rgyud): chos kyi rgyal mtshan phreng ba 'dzin// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// rin chen rgyan phreng 'od mdangs can// phyag mtshan gri gug thod pa dang // pad+ma'i phreng ba rtse gsum bsnams/ 
125b6(rnying rgyud): lhag pa'i phyag bzhi 'dzin par 'dzad// dang po rang rtags phyag rgya bsnams// oM badz+ra du kri pi she ka du kuM di ka ma hri saM ga ta s+t+waM sra mo ta phaT swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi'o// oM badz+ra sa mo
125b7(rnying rgyud): yo ga ha sa ra la su hUM phaT// rin po che rnams kyi'o// oM pad+ma bum si nyi haM he he maM be hUM phaT/ pad+ma'i rigs rnams kyi'o// oM kar+m+ma b+h+yo truM hUM rak+Sha mur+ya sa hUM// las kyi rigs kyi'o// oM badz+ra
125b8(rnying rgyud): tsakra bruM si ti yo gi shwa ri hUM phaT// 'khor lo'i rigs kyi'o// de nas dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i tshogs// phyogs rnams kun tu spro byas pas// rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya yis// phyogs kyi rgyal po'i gdon rnams
126a1(rnying rgyud): 'gugs// skrag shing byed nas dgra 'gugs shing // so so'i rigs dbyer 'khrug pa dag/ rdo rje gsang ba'i sngags kyis gzer// rang gi dam tshig rjes su dran// srog gi snying po dbul ba/ 
126a2(rnying rgyud): bya rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis// dbang bskur byin brlabs rdzogs byas nas// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i gnas 'khod// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i gnas 'dor gnas// rang gi lus su gnas byas te/ 
126a3(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas khang gi brgyan du gzhag/ de dag gi snying po ni/ oM sa mu dar dzi na na ga su tra b+ha ba si tri sni sha hUM bruM phaT zhes pa'o// slar gso ba'i sngags ni/ oM su mu ge DI saM nyag he he ru tu pa la si ta dza hUM phaT/ 
126a4(rnying rgyud): lha rnams kyi snying po bsdus pa ni// oM sarba sa ka ra bruM bag sha saM me praM mu rak+Sha hUM zhes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs nga ba bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ kham/ 
126a5(rnying rgyud): gsum gnon pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan gar dbang sku// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus mdzad nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
126a6(rnying rgyud): sprul byas te// gnod sbyin grul bum 'dul bar mdzad// gzhal yos gru gsum mthing nag la// dbus su 'khor lo nyi ma'i gdan// dpal chen pad+ma he ru ka/ dur khrod chen po'i rgyan gyis brjid// zhal
126a7(rnying rgyud): gsum pa la phyag drug ste// sku mdog pad+ma ra ga'i mdangs// rtse gsum gtun shing ral gri dang / pad+ma zhags pa thod lnga 'dzin// glang chen ko ba thod rlon sbrul// yum dang zhal sbyor 'khril ba'i tshul/ 
126a8(rnying rgyud): thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba las// yi ge las sprul khro bo'i rgyan// shar du rnam rgyal mdog dkar sngo// zhal gsum phyag drug rdo rje dung // 'khor lo ron chen pad+ma dang // ral gri me 'od kyis mtshan
126b1(rnying rgyud): pa// lho ru gshin rje gshed po ni// sngo nag zhal gsum phyag drug pa// thod dbyug rin chen ne'u le dang // rtse gsum me dpung thod rnga 'dzin// nub du rta mchog khro bo'i sku// zhal gsum phyag drug dmar sku
126b2(rnying rgyud): mdog 'khor lo'i bsdigs 'dzub rtse gsum dang // ral gri thaMd pa DA ma ru// byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// ljang sngo nal gsum phyag drug pa// rgya gram gri gug pad+ma dang // be con rtse gsum seng ge
126b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// shar lhor dbyug pa sngon po ni// sngon skya zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dbyug pa tsakra pad+ma dang // rnga yab ban d+ha dril bu 'dzin// lho nub mi g.yo mgon po ni// zhal gsum ser skya phyag drug pa// rin
126b4(rnying rgyud): chen ral gri gtun shing 'dzin// pad+ma thod khrag mdung rtse gsum // nub byang 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni// dmar skya zhal gsum bya dag drug pa// rdo rje bam pa rin chen bum// thod pa bdud rtsi
126b5(rnying rgyud): snying po 'dzin pa'o// byang shar stobs chen dung ka'i mdog/ zhal gsum phyag drug 'jigs pa'i mdangs// rdo rje rtsag/ sum bam chen khog/ sna tshogs rdo rje bam chen khrag/ 'jigs
126b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i cha lugs khro phreng dang // gyad kyi dor thabs rol pa'i stabs// oM badz+ra kro ta thi dza ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ya man ta ka hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ha la 'gri ba hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kro ta a mri ta kun DA li hUM paH
126b7(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra kro ta ni la tan tra hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kro ta ar+ya a tsa la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro ta ta ki ra tsa hUM phaT// oM badz+ra kro ta ma hA pa la hUM phaT// phyogs skyong gi rgyal po gnod sbyin dang // grul bum tshogs rnam/ 
126b8(rnying rgyud): dbang bsdus te// gsang sngags drag pos bsgral byas na// slar gsol ye shes lhums su gyur// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dbang bskur zhing // dam tshig la gzhan dkyil 'khor tshul// kun gyi
127a1(rnying rgyud): srog snying phul ba ni// dam tshig chen pos byin brlabs mdzad// sngar yang dam tshig 'dzin pa'i sngags// 'khor rnams kun la sbyin par mdzad// oM badz+ra kra kar murdzasi nab su
127a2(rnying rgyud): kahUM phaT/ oM AHhUM/ badz+ra su ka ta d+ha mo tre a la la hUM phaT// lha rnams kun gyi dam tshig ni// rdo rje gsang ba gsum las byung // rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po'i sku// khams gsum dus kyis dbang bskur na// 
127a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor ba'i chos las rgyal byed cing // byang chub sems kyis de nyid gsal// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las khro bo phrin las
127a4(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan gar dbang skus// gzi brjid da bgod pa'i brgyan bkod cing // lha min grong khyer 'dul ba'i phyir/ 
127a5(rnying rgyud): yum gyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul bar mdzad// chos dbyings sprul pa'i gnas bzang mchog/ rgyal ba'i rang bzhin rin chen spros / gru bzhi khang pa sgo dang bcas// rta babs ka ba brgyad kyis
127a6(rnying rgyud): mdzes/ dbus kyi pad+ma'i gdan bzhugs pa// gnyis med rol pa'i yum gyi sku// mdog dmar rgyan du zangs chen gzugs// zhal gcig phyag bzhi mdzes pa'i mdangs// 'khor lo dung khrag pad+mo dang / 
127a7(rnying rgyud): rin chen 'bar ba rtse dgu 'dzin// rin chen pad+ma'i phreng ba can// stod bzangs na bza' dkyil bzangs bzhugs// oM pad+ma mu sha ra sa ma ka ta hUM phaT/ shar la sogs pa'i phyogs rnams su/ 
127a8(rnying rgyud): pad+ma dbyings phyug gsal ba mo// rin chen phreng ba klu ma che// dkar dmar ser dang ljang khu'i mdog/ rdo rje gsum pa pad+mo dra ba dang // na ra si la'i snod rin tshogs// rang gi dkyil 'khor ma spros shing // sna tshogs
127b1(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// oM tsun sde shwa ri hU~M phaT/ oM Sh+Ti shi badz+ra saM bruM ga hUM phaT// oM bi tsu swa te hUM phaT// mtshams kyi pad+ma'i 'dab ma la// de bzhin bde ba bskyed byed yum chen ba ni// drab mo dang
127b2(rnying rgyud): klog 'gyur rgyan// gshog pa can dang 'dod pa'o// dkar ser dmar skya sde sangs dang // ljang khu mdog legs la bzhugs nas// rdo rje rin chen pad+mo dang // ud pal ljang khu legs mdzad
127b3(rnying rgyud): pa'o// oM nu ta su no tsakra hUM phaT/ oM se bo ga ta su he bya hUM phaT/ oM ma ma kri bru he he hUM phaT/ oM ta ra ga ga na a ma la hUM phaT// phyogs rnams kun tu mkha' khyab pa// til gang bzhin du gnas
127b4(rnying rgyud): gyur pa 'am mo gshin rje'i tshogs rnams kun// 'khrug rngam drod rong por gyur nas// thugs rje can la skyabasu mchi// srog dgi snying po dbul bar byed// de nas dkyil 'khor bsdus byas
127b5(rnying rgyud): te rang gi gnas su dbang bskur zhing // dam tshig dga' ba'i sdom pa rnyed// bde gshegs ye shes gsal bar 'gyur// kun gyis 'thun par khas blangs te// dam tshig bsrung zhing rnam
127b6(rnying rgyud): 'byor skyong / oM ma ma rag ta sa pra ti i daMs buta phaT/ oM trag sho ra la si bad Ta ta phaT// ma mo dang 'byung po rnams kyi snying po'o// oM yu me si d+ha ru lu ru lu hUM phaT// gnod sbyin rnams kyi'o// oM AHhUM mo
127b7(rnying rgyud): ga bri gu me/ ha sa ha sa/ ru lu ru lu hUM phaT// slar gso zhing byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las
127b8(rnying rgyud): rin chen dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'phrul pa'i le'u ste/ bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo / 
128a1(rnying rgyud): sa 'ogs blas stengs rnams// 'joms byed gza' drang rgyugar dang // bdud dang de yi rigs 'khor kun// 'du bar bya ba'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms zhugs 'khor lo sprul pa mdzad// thabs
128a2(rnying rgyud): dang shes rab bsgrub byas pa'i// 'od zer gsal bas stong gsum gang // rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // sgo bzhi rta babs phreng bas brgyan// 'khor lo rim gsum gdan dang bcas// rdo rje pad+ma rin chen
128a3(rnying rgyud): gyis/ 'khor yug seng ge glang chen mchog/ nyi mas mdzes pa'i pad+mo yi// dbus kyi dpa' bo yum dang bcas// zhal gcig phyag bzhi rdo rje rin// pad+ma ral gri 'dzin par mdzad// dmar ser kun tu rgyu ba ni// lngas
128a4(rnying rgyud): ser pad+ma dril bus 'khyud// mtshan dang dpe byang rgyan phreng klubs// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i dbu rgyan can// phyag rgya ba ni yis/ mdzes byas pa'o// rdo rje 'khor lo brtsibs rnams la// rigs kyi
128a5(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' nyi shu bzhi// dkar dang dmar dang ser pa'i mdangs// rdza rje dril bu pad+ma bsgom// 'khor lo rin chen skem bsnams / dang po'i phyag gnyis mtshan byas shing // lhag ma gri gugazod pa
128a6(rnying rgyud): thogs khro zhing sems dpa'i cha lugs kyis// rgyan phreng rigs kyi dbang po gsum// rin chen 'bar ba'i brgyan gyis klubs// oM badz+ra swa trakro ta he he ru lu hUM phaT// rdo rje rigs rnams kyi'o// pad+ma te shwa sAng
128a7(rnying rgyud): na ma ku ru ku ru hUM phaT// pad+ma rigs kyi sems dpa' rnams kyi'o// oM i ku ri tsig ban d+ha si d+hi phaT phaT// kro ti shwa ri hU~M phaT// de bzhin gshegs pa rigs kyi'o// sgo bzhi mdzes gzugs khro mo ni// 'thun pa'i/ 
128a8(rnying rgyud): blo gros dpa' chen mo// ye shes mkha' dbyings bzhi rnams te// dkar ser dmar dang rim pa bzhin// rdo rje lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu mtshan ma'i phyag/ oM badz+ra aM gu sha dza a sha hUM/ spo
128b1(rnying rgyud): g+han d+he ho phaT/ dgug gzugs bcing ba'i las dag dang // dbab pa'i cho ga mnyes par byed// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kun// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dus// rigs gsum sarba
128b2(rnying rgyud): dpa' khro bor bstan// 'jigs byed cha lugs rngam pa'i stabs// rdo rje gcod byed 'jigs pa che// rdo rje 'joms pa'i yid 'phrog byed// rdo rje rab bzang blo gros mchog/ rdo rje'i bstan pa g.yul las rgyal// pad+ma'i
128b3(rnying rgyud): sprin chen 'brug sgra'i dbyangs// pad+ma'i blo gsal mya ngan 'joms// pad+ma'i sdong po nga ro myos// pad+ma'i 'od zer bdud rtsi 'ong // 'khor ba brtsegs pa myur du bzlog/ 'khor lo dga' basbrang rtsi'i mchog/ 'khor
128b4(rnying rgyud): lo sgrol dang rtse gsum 'ching // 'khor lo rol pa dga' byed stobs// 'di dag sprul pa 'khor tshogs skus// gnas gsum po dag 'dul bar mdzad// de nas gza' dang rgyu skar rnams/ 
128b5(rnying rgyud): gdug pa'i nga ro chum shums// sgra chen sgrogs shing sprul nas kyang // ma thu dang rdzu 'phrul med par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po skyab sa gsol zhing // bstan pa bzung bar dam bcas so// de dag so sor
128b6(rnying rgyud): srog snying dag/ lus sems dad pas phul byas pas// dkyil 'khor chen po dbang bskur zhing // rab gnas gdan la gzhag par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba
128b7(rnying rgyud): dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad khro bor byung ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan dbang gi lha// pad+ma bde chen yum bcas
128b8(rnying rgyud): la/ 'gro drug rgyu 'bras bya ba'i phyir// bde chen byang sems dkyil 'khor sprul// dkyil 'khor chen po'i gnas 'bar ba'i// rin chen phreng sogs 'jigs byed rgyang // dur khrod chen po'i gnas bzhin/ 
129a1(rnying rgyud): brgyan// dbus su 'khor lo gdan bcas la// rigs lnga'i he ru ka bzhugs mdzad// yum chen lnga dang 'khril bar sbyor// kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug pa// dmar nag dkar
129a2(rnying rgyud): ser ljang khu'i mdangs// rdo rje kha Ta ral gri dang // tri shul zhing dbyug tho ba bsnams// g.yas par dung por g.yon thod khrag/ bar mgri gug pad+ma ste// tha ma yum dang 'khril ba'i rdul// spyan dgu sdang mig
129a3(rnying rgyud): pa' ba ste// khrob ma pa snyed du ma sa/ khong dus khrag da pa can/ g.yanganan sa rkyen gyis mangs// ma badz+rash+tha jus/ sa sa rgya
129a4(rnying rgyud): o na gris ru/ hUM bas// rad na kro ta ga'i hU Ta// pad+maT+Tadadu/ su phaT// oM 'dra kro ti ga hu laH/ oMkarma shri ka hUM phaT/ ka mr-i kr-i ta shA hU~M baHbide chen byang chub/ 
129a5(rnying rgyud): sems kyi rgyan// rol pa kun tu khyab mdzad de// khams ga/ sum ma 'dres rnam par dbyings// bde ba chen po gnyis med 'gyur// dbang bskur byin brlabs rigs kyis bskur// bskyed
129a6(rnying rgyud): de dbu la rang gi bdag pos rgyan// smon 'jug g.yo ldang bskyod pa yi// lha mo bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog
129a7(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i rgyud las bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs pa nyid la bzhag ste bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na bdud kyi brgyal
129a8(rnying rgyud): bo ma dra ru dzas/ rang gi rdzu 'phrul chen po stan zhing / 'khor dang bcas pas phyogs bcu rgyug cing rig pa 'dzin pa dang / rnal 'byor mtha' dag gi bar bcod byed cing bde 'gro'i bde ba thams cad rgyun gcod
129b1(rnying rgyud): pa dang / rang nyid kyi nyon mongs pa bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rigs kyi 'od zer mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i stong gsum gyi
129b2(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad skad gcig gis gsal bar mdzad do// rgyal ba'i dbang po stong gsum 'dir khang bzangs mdzes par byin brlabs te/ rin chen ka ba gdan phreng dang // gzugs mdzes la sogs kun
129b3(rnying rgyud): gyis spras nyim zla ba rin chen khri// pad+ma seng ge la sogs gnan// sgo bzangs khyams su bcas pa yi// rnam dag gzhal yas khang bzangs sprul// de nas bcom ldan pade chen pos/ 
129b4(rnying rgyud): dngal ldan gar gyi dbang phyug skus// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rigs tshogs rnams// dga' ba'i sprin gyis bskul bar/ mdzad// bde ba chen po gnyis med mthus// rigs kyi dkyil
129b5(rnying rgyud): 'khor cig tu gyur// yongs rdzogs gsal ba rgya chen po sa// dkyil 'khor rgya chen sprul par mdzad// dbus su pad+ma'i rigs rgyal po// gtso bo pad+ma rdo rje'i mdangs// zhal
129b6(rnying rgyud): gsum phyag drug 'jigs byed sku// rdo rje dga' ba'i spyan 'dril zhing // shar la sogs pa'i phyogs kun tu// bde gshegs rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog/ rnam snang rin chen don grub rnams// rin chen phyogs kyi
129b7(rnying rgyud): mtshon mdangs gsal// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // ral gri pad+ma sna tshogs dang // gtso bo pad+ma'i drug mtshan can// stong pa'i sgra snyan dril bu g.yon// sangs rgyas spyan 'dzes ma ma ki/ dkar mo dam
129b8(rnying rgyud): tshig sgrol ma dag/ mdog bzangs phyag mtshan gtso bo bzhi// sangs rgyas ting 'dzin rdzu 'phrul stobs// thabs dang shes rab nyis stong tshegs// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo la// rang gi mtshan ma so so'i tshul
130a1(rnying rgyud): dam mangs dkar dang ser gyi mdog/ ni la ka ta'i mdog 'tsher zhing // pad+ma rdo rje 'khor lo ran// pad+ma tri shul bcas pa 'dzin// g.yas na 'khor lo go rims bzhin// rdo rje skyil dku
130a2(rnying rgyud): legs brgyan brjid// gzhan yang khro bo'i tshigs 'bar ba// phyi rol 'khor lo'i bar khyams dang // sgo la sogs pa'i 'jigs gzugs kyis// rngam pa'i mdangs bcas 'khod pa ni// khri tshegs yang
130a3(rnying rgyud): sprul mtshon cha dang // rigs kyi sprul pa'i don byed pa'i// khams gsum 'jigs byed khro bo dang // mkha' 'gro'i dag pa'i tshogs bcas rnams// dur khrod rgyan gyis rab mdzes shing // rigs kyi kha dog mtshon cha
130a4(rnying rgyud): dang 'od zer 'phro ba 'khrigs pa'i tshul// gsang sngags drag po ba brjod mdzad pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor zhi yi tshogs// skadagacig gsal bar rdzogs byas nas// phyi yi gnasu spro zhing byas// gas
130a5(rnying rgyud): sngags rgyun gyi skal bar byed// hUM a la la ho/ ma hA pad+ma hri da ya/ a A oM AHhUM/ ma hA pad+ma ku ru/ ha la ha la b+hi sha na hUM hUM phaT/ stong khams sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas// rab 'khrug bred
130a6(rnying rgyud): rgyas rmongs pa dag/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od kyis bder byas shing // rang gi sangs rgyas zhing la bkod// dkyil 'khor gnas su bsdus byas nas// rang gi 'khor lo mdzes byas te// dbang bskur byin ba
130a7(rnying rgyud): rdzogs 'gyur nas// dbu la rigs kyi bdag pos brgyan// oM pad+ma kun d+ha li hri da ya na bi mu ku ru ha na d+hAH hUM phaT// gsang sngags kun gyis brjod byas na// 'jig rten gsum po bsdud pa yi// bo&
130a8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ki la ya// drags byed gtso bo ngag rengs bya// de nas bcom ldan pade chen skus// sangs rgyas thams cad bskul ba'i phyir// rdo rje se gol lam gsum brdab// dam tshig chen po'i sngags chen brjod// 
130b1(rnying rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs tshogs rnams// ting 'dzin bsdu ba'i rdo rje las// gcig tu gnas nas 'gro ba gzigs// drags byed gtso bo ma rungs rnams// rgyu dang 'bras bu log 'khrul zhing // sangs rgyas/ 
130b2(rnying rgyud): bstan pa log mi 'gyur// log pa'i lam la mngon zhen cing // mngon pa'i nga rgyal mthus bsnams nas// 'jig rten gsum dag phung byed na// zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur na// khro bo'i ril pa mdzad
130b3(rnying rgyud): mod kyi 'dul bar gzigs nas bka' dros mdzad// kye ma 'dul ba'i tshogs chen dag/ 'das pa'i dus na sngon 'byung ltar// da lta'i dus 'dir byung ba ste// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// 
130b4(rnying rgyud): log pa'i lam du 'khrul pa ste// khro ngo'i tshul du byung gyur pa/ de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro zhing ga/ tum par 'gyur// de ltar gyur pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// mnar
130b5(rnying rgyud): med la sogs gnas ngan len// mi zad sdug bsngal mtha' la ba rten// ji lta bu yi thabs kyis 'dul// shin tu ga ti mug mdongs pa'i tshogs// de bzhin bag chags ngan pa yis/ 
130b6(rnying rgyud): rig 'dzin bdun rgyud gcod byed cing // bstan pa'i gsung rab 'jig par 'gyur// las kyi mun pas 'gro bar 'khyams// dus ngan rigs ngan 'phra men ma// gnod byed gdon dang log 'dren dang // 
130b7(rnying rgyud): srid gsum 'jig cing dam tshig 'dral// 'di lta bu yi thabs kyis ni// sangs rgyas thugs rje rnam 'phrul bstan// nga rgyal chen po mdongs pa yi// lta ba ri bo mthu snyes tshogs// da lta'i tshe ni 'di byung 'gyur/ 
130b8(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba 'das dus sbyor byed cing // ji bzhin las la 'khrul par byed// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mdzod// mngon spyod rol pa'i thabs chen gyis// 'di dag bstan pa'i dus la bab// srid gsum
131a1(rnying rgyud): gdug cing gtum pa la// zhibs phan par mi 'gyur ste// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo las// khro ba de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// khro bo'i tshul can khros pa yi// 'jig rten gsum/ 
131a2(rnying rgyud): dag sreg byed na// sangs rgyas thugs rje khros pa yis// khams gsum ma lus smos ci dgos// rang bzhin dag pa'i ngo bo las// phrag dog 'khrul pa'i rlung dag gis// 'jig rten phyin ci log tu 'khyams// 
131a3(rnying rgyud): ji bzhin gnas pa lam bral bas// khams gsum brlag pa'i lam la zhugs// 'jig rten 'di dag snying rje zhing // mngon shes gdul dka'i rmongs tshegs rnams// khro bo'i tshogs kyis
131a4(rnying rgyud): sbyor bar mdzad zhes bsgrags so// de bzhin gshegs pa tha thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta/ dmachog rol pa'i rgyud las/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i dkyil 'khor sgo
131a5(rnying rgyud): bya'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug skus// ma trang ru tra la sogs pas// bdud kyi
131a6(rnying rgyud): tshegs bcas 'dul ba'i phyir// yum chen sku cig rol mdzad de// byang chub sems sprin phyogs bcur spro// dkyil 'khor rnams sum dkyil 'khor gsal// dkyil 'khor 'dul tshogs dkyil
131a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor che/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i bdeg nyid che// dgyes bcas gar bcas gdan la bzhugs// zhal gsum gangs ri mdangs ldan pa// pad+ma gtun shing rtse gsum thogs// rin chen rgyan
131a8(rnying rgyud): sogs dbu rgyan bcas// dkyil 'khor sprul pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// snod gcig dus cig sprul pa mdzad// mtha' dang dbus med 'jig rten gnas rnams kun// drag po 'thing nag 'bar ba'i gzhal
131b1(rnying rgyud): yas khanga' 'khor lo rtsibs drug par khyams nyi rims ldan// kun tu zla kham sgo khyud gru bzhir bcas// rin chen 'bar ba'i thod dbyug rgyan dang bcas// tshad med ye shes 'khor lo la brten cing // 
131b2(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed khro bo'i rgyan tshogs mang po klubs// nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas// smon lam dbang dang thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// 'jig rten drug dang dus bzhi phyogs bcu na// gzug
131b3(rnying rgyud): khams ma lus dbang du bsdu ba na// drag po lha brgyad nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir// lha chen phyogs skyong tshegs kyis rtsig pa byas// sku bzhi dpal brgyad tshang bar bya ba'i phyir// rgyal chen rigs bzhi
131b4(rnying rgyud): bzung nas ka ba byas// theg pa gzhan las 'phags pa'i don/ glang chen ka la ling gis ka rten byas// gling bzhi'i mi rnam sa dgos 'dod bskong ba'i phyir// gza' skar mig tshags byas pas
131b5(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ldog med// 'jig rten zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// seng ge ka la sha yis ka zhu byas// 'khor ba'i gcong / rnying gtan nas sbyang ba'i phyir// seng ge'i kha nas bdud rtsi'i 'o ma 'ja/ 
131b6(rnying rgyud): tho da rus par khyams rdo rje'i gzer gyis brgyan// zhing chen rnga yab bla re phan gdugs dang // thugs rje byang sems kun tu khyab pa'i phyir// nyi zla 'bar ba'i rgyan chas gsal bar ldan// sprul pa'i me rlung 'brug
131b7(rnying rgyud): gis dus bzhir phye// khro bo'i 'byung gnas thugs rje'i sgra dang bcas// rin chen khri dang pad+ma nyi zla gdan// gser gyi seng ge spyan gsum pa// drug bzhi rtsal 'phags nyi shu brgyad// khri rkang brgyad kyis bar khyam
131b8(rnying rgyud): ngag la gnas// thugs rje che nyi ma nyi shu brgyad// 'jigs pa spangs pa'i seng ge nyi shu brgyad// sbrul sku thob pas dbang mo nyi shu brgyad// kun tu 'od kyi sa la rab gnas pa// rin chen khri rkang 'degs pa'i stobs dang / 
132a1(rnying rgyud): ldan mgon nas dben par gzhan dag gis// mthong rkang sbas pa'i chos nyid lung // phrin las rnam par rdzogs pa'i gnas// rigs bzhi khrag 'thung he ru// gzugs gnas mi 'gyur chos kyi sku// / 
132a2(rnying rgyud): nyid kun tu 'od kyi lung // pad+ma leb rgan phyogs bcu'i 'od// sangs rgyas thams cad skyed pa'i tshul// chags par gyur par pad+ma ste// che ba 'am yon tan lung du ston// mkha' dbyings rnam dag dri med pas// ma chags
132a3(rnying rgyud): pad+ma can gyi lung // stong zhing gsal bas gzhan gang 'phags// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gtsigs pa yin// seng ge 'khor lo tshegs chen pos// thabs dang shes rab ye bral bas// spros med rang gis bzlums pa ni// 
132a4(rnying rgyud): ma skyes pa yi chos nyid lung // 'od zer gsal bas 'tsher ba das na// yang gab sbas pa ye shes lung // 'phro 'bu bya ba par gyur pa'i tshogs// shes rab rigs kyi gsang ba'i yum// thabs dang shes
132a5(rnying rgyud): rab dgyes pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// tshogs chen yongs rdzogs dkyi la 'khor chen po ni// bdag po khro bo chen po'i sku nyid du/ gsang sngags 'di yis yongs rdzogs bya// oM pad+ma shri he ru ka pad+ma kro ti shwa ri hUM/ 
132a6(rnying rgyud): ma hA tsan d+ha sar+b+ba du stan phaT// dkyil 'khor bdag po rngom brjid cha lugs dang // 'bar ba'i me 'od dmar gsal 'phro ba'i mdangs// dbu lnga phyogs bzhir las bzhi'i tshul du bzhugs// dbu ma mnyam nyid bde ba
132a7(rnying rgyud): dbyings su gzigs// ral pa'i srid rtse me 'od bzhin du 'bar// smin ma khro gnyer slar sogs myur ba// lus thung sku rgyan gyad kyi cha byad la// bco lnga'i spyan gyis rang gi yul rnams gzigs// rdo rje rin chen khyung gi gshegs
132a8(rnying rgyud): bas gtams// bcu drug rol pa'i spyan dang phyag mtshan dang // sgeg po'i zhabs brgyad chas dang 'chas par gnas// 'jig rten gsum po zil gyis gnon pa'i phyir// khro bo'i tshigs bcas 'gying bag yum bcas/ 
132b1(rnying rgyud): gnon// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba'i rtse mo la// bde gshegs rigs lnga'i snang ba sna tshogs ston// rang gi ning sbyong drag po'i gnas 'dul zhing // thams cad rigs kyi dkyil 'khor che la dgod// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba'i
132b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor ma lus kyis// yab yum gnyis kyi dga' ba bskyed par mdzad// gnas su nyi zla pad dkyil zla ba la// sku gsung thugs kyi sa bon yongs rdzogs gsal// oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad mako/ 
132b3(rnying rgyud): haM oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA bag badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ko haM// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mo drug rnams la// mkha' 'gro'i rgyal mo kham rgya chen mo drug/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'jigs pa'i cha lugs can// rigs drug mtshan
132b4(rnying rgyud): mcha lugs ci lta bu// b+hud+d+ha badz+ra a~M/ swata badz+ra hUM/ ra badz+ra traM/ pad+ma badz+ra hri/ karma badz+raH/ g+hun badz+ra phaT/ phyi rol dkyil 'khor khyab par spro byas te// 'gro rnams dung sogs khams
132b5(rnying rgyud): / rnams dag byas nas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen pad+ma dang // ral gri kha Ta rtse gsum dril bu bcas// g.yon pa bdud rtsi thod pa gang ba thogs// mkha' 'gro rab gtum rigs kyi dbu rgyan can// rang gi
132b6(rnying rgyud): phreng ba dur khrod rgyan gyis klubs// las kyi kham rgya sna tshogs gzugs kyis bzhugs// dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// long ba rgyab 'brel rgyan rnams rdzogs// sku mdog mdog mtshan ma tshogs la// phyag
132b7(rnying rgyud): sbrel zangs kyi thod pa thogs// oM shri kha'i oM shwa ri kha'i/ haM/ shri kha'i a/ dmus long 'khor ba bcu drug dag byung ste// thod rus par khyams gnas su bkod par bya// oM shri kha'i hUM/ shri kha'i hUM/ lcags kyi sprang mo
132b8(rnying rgyud): brgyad rnams yang sprul bcas// ye shes sprul pa'i khyi bcu rngam par 'khod// me ri sprin ltar bsgribs pa ril zhing 'khrugs// bar 'khyams phyi ma'i gnas la kun tu 'khod// oM tib ta tsakra sho na mu mor khaM hUM phaT/ ku kur lag
133a1(rnying rgyud): rdus dab chen drugs kya dkyil la khogs// 'chu drug rgyalas// mgong gu rdzogs pa na cig go// mag rgyad lag brgyad ma bdang // mag drug la gzug dun
133a2(rnying rgyud): dpa' mgo gsum rkang gsum lag gsum po// dkyil 'khor chen po sgo bzhi ru// tshad med sprul ba'i phyag rgyas rol// de dag rol pa'i byin brlabs las// steng 'og phyogs mtshams ma lus pa'i// thabs pa
133a3(rnying rgyud): shes rab byang chub sems/ me 'drug rlung 'brug phyag rgyas gsal// rab tu rdzogs pa'i tshul du byung // ma dzin la to tsar lag shasu ru ban cu hU~M phaT// gzhan yang sprul pa dkyil 'khor chags// 
133a4(rnying rgyud): byin ga dpar po dang // dadu ba khrung chung mi rigs sa/ dag rten ma pa'i tshogs kyis zhis/ sa ca ma rje gan ma du hU~Ms// n+d+hatsa rtsa 'i sngags so// ma ba
133a5(rnying rgyud): dz+nyA ya/ stong ba rdzogs sa// ngas e ma mar mjung / ba'i slong bag// mab+h+yA sa nas dra ngas rnab lams ma lus bdan dpa/ 
133a6(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor gnyis su med par gyur nas/ sedu chen po nyid kyi kyil lakhor chen po rgyu'i dkyil 'khor du gnas shing / rang gi kyil lakhor rnams dam tshig gargod par mang // de nas sprul pa la mas chags/ 
133a7(rnying rgyud): ma lus rol par byed parlabs shing // bdud dang grags byed rmongs byed cing // rang gi gnas su 'du bar mdzad// sa gu lu du lu re dza la e Ar mi nu bco// yal la// oM ma dza ru drag las sasrung // 
133a8(rnying rgyud): dug gdus dngos po sbyang bar byer// rnam pa'i khri tshigs phyogs cur TI// khro 'dus phyag tu na mang cing // cig du gsang sngags brjod// gal rje'i gang kyang tsas// bdu dang dron pa lasags rgyal
133b1(rnying rgyud): bar mdzod/ oM sarba pa ba kar he ta pa byi sha ma tang ruHhUM phaT/ oM sarba pa pa he ta byi sha kha tang ru tra hUM phaT/ oM sarba ba pa ka re he ta pa byi sha kha tang rutra hUM phaT// dpal chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor lo nya'i tshogs/ 
133b2(rnying rgyud): dpal chen rdo rje thog ser chen 'bebs// hUM dang phaT kyis srid gsum 'khor ba 'jig/ hUM dang phaT kyis byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// rdo rje khrag 'thung khrag gi rgya mtsho skems// rdo rje mtshon chagan ma lcags thu lum
133b3(rnying rgyud): 'dril gsang sngags log par lta ba'i bdud rnams 'joms// rdo rje ser chen thog bcas 'bar zhing 'khrugs// nyams pa'i snying dang dbang po thal bar lhogs// ye shes thugs rje a la la// oM ma hA shri he ru ka b+han+d+ha
133b4(rnying rgyud): b+han+d+ha gardza gardza ha la ha la hU~M phaT/ de nas bdud dang da ru tra bcas// rdo rje mtshon chas bsgral bsgral nas// 'kho dkyi longs spyod rol mdzad cing // sha khrag nang grol bdud rtsi dang / rus
133b5(rnying rgyud): rkang dbang po bcas pa la// tshogs kyi longs spyod ston mor mdzad / kun gyi dgyes pa rdo rje'i glus// 'thun par sgra dbyangs gci ga gis bstod// thugs rje rnam dag pad+ma'i rang bzhin las// thugs
133b6(rnying rgyud): / khar lam las sprul pa'i byang chub sems// phyogs bzhir dbus lngar brjid pa'i sku mchog ni// grub pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa'i ye shes lnga// dpal lus khyad par 'phags pa zhal gyi dbyings// dbang mchog ldan
133b7(rnying rgyud): gyis grub pa'i rta skad can// thar lam thugs rje thabs mkhas sprul pa yi// ye shes byin brlabs khro rgyal 'bum du sprul// smin mdzad smon lam yun rings grub pa'i// dmig pa'i mtha' bral pad+ma yum gyi tshul
133b8(rnying rgyud): chos rnams ma lus gsal bar gzigs pa'o// chags med thugs rje pad+ma'i tshul// sgra skad thams cad mtha' las grol// zab dang rgyang rings chos kyi don rnams mtshan nyid las// shangs kyi rlung sgrom du gsum
134a1(rnying rgyud): gcad nas chod/ zhal gyi tshol 'brel bas rgyud lnga gcod// no dbang mche ba skye shi rtsad nas gcod// leb rgan ljags kyi gsung sgra rgya mtshor 'chad// rol pa'i phyag gis 'gro ba 'dul la mkhas
134a2(rnying rgyud): gshog bzhi bskyod pas phrin las rnam pa ni mdzad// zhabs rol pas ni zil gnon mdzad pa'i tshul// sku tshe yan lag rags pa ri bo bzhin// thugs mchog ye shes stong nyid nyi ma brdal// ye shes lha
134a3(rnying rgyud): mchog byin brlabs 'byung ba'i gnas// ngo mtshar rol pas khro bo kun gyi rje// dpa' bo sku mchog mnga' la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bde chen dbang gi skus// 'khor lo dam tshig sgrogs mdzad cing // rdo rje gsang
134a4(rnying rgyud): ba'i sku gsung thugs// gsang ba'i byin brlabs bskyed par mdzad/ oM AHhUM sarba ban+d+ha a mr-i ta sa ma yo gis to hUM/ ba ho ka/ dam la su ta sa hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya kro ta sa ma ya oM AHhU~M/ mahA
134a5(rnying rgyud): mo gau tsi tar ba rag ta mel khre'i kha'i hUM/ oM ga ba la la ru lu ru ru hUM phaT/ id+han sa ma la a la la ho zhes rdo rje'i glu blangs/ pad+mo gar mdzad do// bde ba chen pos mchod pas tshim par 'gyur
134a6(rnying rgyud): de'i dus na bdud la sogs pa rnams bsgral ba'i tshogs rnams byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i ye shes kyis brgyan te/ dbang bskur ba'i thugs sogs kyis// bdag po rigs 'dzin thams cad kyi bdag po zhes
134a7(rnying rgyud): bya bar 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyi rol du 'khod cing gsangadra ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dzin par gyur to// de'i 'khor rnams kyang dam tshig gi snying po blangs na bran du mdzad par khas blangs to// snying po brjod
134a8(rnying rgyud): ba ni mam trag sha ru rngam ma b+h+yo/ slar bsgo ba'i sngags ni o ru lu ru lu hu b+h+yo badra sbed d+ha ru ru hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa blan mang pa'i gsang pa dang la rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las
134b1(rnying rgyud): gsang chen 'dus pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan gar dbang gis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bsdu mdzad nas// bdag dang gnyis med rol pa'i mthus// khro bo ma
134b2(rnying rgyud): rgyal po sku chen dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gsang gsum dam tshig phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor rgyu yi dam tshig sku// bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor mdzes pa'o// chos dbyings yon tan 'byung gnas
134b3(rnying rgyud): gzhal yas khang // rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rigs kyi gcod pan can// rigs kyi dbang phyug skye 'gro ma lus sgrol// rdo rje bkod pa rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor che// dbang po yul tshogs rigs kyi sku lngar ldan// shes rab
134b4(rnying rgyud): thabs dang mi gnyis 'du 'bral med// dus gsum gcig char sgrol bas tshar gsum rgyan// khams gsum yongs sgrol mdzad kyi rgyan du che// mi gnas mya ngan gsung rab rgya mtsho bsgrogs// ma bsgrib
134b5(rnying rgyud): ma gsal go 'phang mdzes par mthong // mi ldog g.yul sgrol stabs/ drug mdzes par mgyogs// gar yang thog med byin brlab/ sa shugs dang ldan// mtsher skad gdangs snyan ma sring spro ba 'gyed
134b6(rnying rgyud): khaM dmar ral pa'i dbus nas dbyugs 'byung ba// dpral ba zhur po brjid pa'i khyad par dang // rta mgrin 'od 'bar gsal ba'i khyad par ni// don mchog khyad par yon tan rmad du 'byung // ljang khu'i me 'bar rta mgor
134b7(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin ni// 'gyur med ye shes ji bzhin gsal// byams pa'i mdangs kyis khams gsum khyad par gzigs// rdog ma le'u rgan 'bar ba'i khyad par mchog/ stug po bkod sogs zhing khams rab bya/ 
134b8(rnying rgyud): na// rdul gcig steng na rdul snyed khro bo kun// zhing khams gsum dag ma lus dbang du bsdud// shes rab thabasu 'brel ba'i rta skad ni// grub pa'i dpal tshogs tshangs pa'i rta dbyangs yin// dang po'i gdangs
135a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba'i zhing khams sgrogs// gdangs skad gnyis pa ri rab rtsel mtsher// gsung snyan gdangs gsum snyan pa'i khyad par ni// bcu drug slad ma'i ngan rtog thar lam ston// spun mig glog ltar 'gyur ba
135a2(rnying rgyud): cher 'phags zhing // sha khrag rlon pa za ba'i srin po 'joms// mtsher can yid la gdung ba'i rta skad ni// mun mthu'i 'gro ba ma lus gsal bar mdzad// rgyu dbyings grangs dang gzigs thabs rtogs pa'i don// hUM las dpal chen khro
135a3(rnying rgyud): bo'i dkyil 'khor bskyed// gnas ni sna'i dbugs rings gro ba lags// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung // shangs kyi rlung sgom yangs pas ye shes srog/ gsang ba'i chub mas sdug bsngal snying nas 'byin// rgya chen
135a4(rnying rgyud): sprul pas bag chags tshar gcod de// 'khor ba'i rgya tshe lugs la ngas bzlog pa yi// rigs kyi rlung gis dug lnga dbyings su sgrol// zlum dkar bzang rims rno dpal tshems// zhal du bdar ba'i byang chub sems// 
135a5(rnying rgyud): ma skyes chos nyid kun la rol// zhi rgyas dbang bdud drag po yi// cir yang 'gyur ba'i hom khung ste// las lnga 'brel pa'i zhal zhes/ bya// 'khor ba yongasu smin pa dang // las mangs nyon mongs dbang btsan
135a6(rnying rgyud): / dang / skye ba mi skye lung ma bstan// des smin mdzad pa chen po yi// 'jog ldog cir yang gyur pa dang // brjod byed gnyis ka'i bstan gyur nas// 'byar zhing bskyod pas ljags nyid do// yig 'dru'i rgyu nyid bde gshegs thugs// rdo rje
135a7(rnying rgyud): myu gu ting 'dzin thugs// 'od nyid nyon mongs rnam dag 'joms// rigs byed ye shes phyag rgya dang // yig 'bru sa bon phyag rgya dang // yon tan rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// srid pa gsum ste lta ba dang // rgyu dang las kyi rim pa'o// de
135a8(rnying rgyud): phyir ye shes rol pa'i dbyings// snying po phyag mtshan phye mo dag/ bstan par gyur nas mkha' yi dbyings// chos sku chu'i zla ba bzhin// sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin med// dur khrod chen po'i gnas kun tu// gar gyi dbang
135b1(rnying rgyud): phyaphyug rnam par rol// shar du rol pa'i phyag bzhi mtshan ma ni// khro chen snying 'byin kha tam 'bar ba dang // rdo rje lcags kyu sbrul gyi zhabs pas rol// de bzhin lho la sogs pa'i phyag kyang bzhi// thod pa khrag bkang rdo rje lu gu/ 
135b2(rnying rgyud): rgyud/ rdo rje be con thod rlon 'dzin par rol// me'i zhags pa dag dang khyung gi khra// bsdigs 'dzub rtse la ye shes 'bar// rdo rje khA Tang kha ni rab tu 'khro// rdo rje rtse dgu rtse lnga gdengs pa dang // rtse gsum
135b3(rnying rgyud): rtse gcig 'bar ba gsor zhing 'ardeg/ ye nas ma skyes dang ba'i cho 'phrul ston// ye shes lnga yi yon tan khyad par ni// rin chen dra ba sangs rgyas stong gis brgyan// klu rgyal nag po 'dra ba'i thabs shes kyis// 
135b4(rnying rgyud): rtse ba rnam thar sgo gsum sku gsung thugs// sprul pa'i don mdzad dkyil 'khor sna tshogs ston// gsang ba'i yum bzhis/ sku la 'khril byed cing // byang chub sems bzhi de nyid ston par byed// 
135b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dra bas rin chen klog 'gyub// khyung gshog a mo theb gshog sder mo can// sangs rgyu sgo rtsa gnyis kyi thugs rje shar/ thabs kyis rnam par 'phrul pas g.yas
135b6(rnying rgyud): nas brkyang // srid gsum ma rig mun pa sel byed pa'i// shes rab zla stong rtsa gnyis g.yon nas khyab// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i byin brlabs che// sprul pa 'phros pas dug gsum rgyun mi 'chad// sna tshog
135b7(rnying rgyud): rol pa'i phyag rgya zhes pa yi// phrin las brgyad kyis bdag nyid sku che ba'i// dpa' bo stag gis steng phyogs 'dul zhabs brgyad// rgya bye'u lcags kyi shar lho'i zhabs brgyad de// rdo rje 'chol bas lha'i phyogs na brjid
135b8(rnying rgyud): bse khrab smug pos lho nub rkang pa brkyang // sna tshogs brjid pas byang shar 'tsham su gyon// shu ken dar gyis byang shar zhabs mdzes shing // mche ba dmar pos nub byang brgyangs pa'i gdan// sbrul nag 'khril ba'i
136a1(rnying rgyud): zhabs kyis 'og phyogs 'dul bar mdzad// khro brgyad gnan cing gzir bas zhabs brdebs shing // dug chen bcom zhing sgal rtsigs gnan// brang gnon ldan pa 'joms zhing 'jigs mdzad dang // 
136a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi sku la sbas pas ye shes gsal// sku nyid 'khor la sbas pas dbyings kyi brgyan// thugs rje'i rol pas gzhal yas khang du bstan// phrin las rol pas hUM mdzad hUM gis brgyan// sa bcu zil gnon/ 
136a3(rnying rgyud): stobs bcu dbang dang ldan// de nas gar gyi dbang phyug che// dam tshig gar gyi byin brlabs kyis// rgyun gyi ting 'dzin la gnas nas// yum chen gzi ldan dgyes par mdzad// dam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya ni// gnyis
136a4(rnying rgyud): mdzad gzi ldan dbang phyug ma// ji snyed bud med sna tshogs dang // gsung gi rdo rje mi smad do// gtso bo rab tu gdungs pa la// rab tu smra bar gang byed pa// bsgeg pa'i tshig gis brgyan nasu// srid zhu'i sem
136a5(rnying rgyud): kyis gdungs pa la// ye shes tshogs kyis rab bskor ba'i// lha mo'i tshogs rnams bskor byas te// rang gi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du / gnyis med mnyam pa'i rgya gzhi gdab// byang chub sems tshogs gsal
136a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i rgyun 'thim pa'i dkyil 'khor don chen gsal// dbyings phyug sprul tshogs bsam yas dag/ nges pa'i ye shes rol pa'i sku// stong gsum dbang por gdon mi za// 'jig rten gsum gyi 'byung gnas mchog/ dus gsum kun gyi ga
136a7(rnying rgyud): dang rten// phyogs bcu dkyil 'khor thams cad na// dam tshig chen po de nyid mangs// phyi nang gsang ba'i mthar phyin pa// thams cad pad+mo rnam dag pas// cho 'phrul rnam kun de bzhin nyid// thugs rje chags pa'i phrin las kyis// dbang phra
136a8(rnying rgyud): phrin las gnod sbyin gnas// gnyis med 'bar bas thams cad sreg/ las dang bag chags sgrib sogs kun// gnas nas gshegs mdzad ye shes tshogs// lhun gyis dang bas kun tu 'joms// snying ma lnga rgya dus kyi mtha'// 
136b1(rnying rgyud): srid gsum sems can 'dul dka' ba// 'phro du 'khyil ba'i 'od mdangs mdzad// 'jig rten mkhyen dang mya ngan 'das// gnyis med thugs kyis sa le mkhyen// de ltar dgongs pa'i khyad par de// 'gro ba mtha' dag 'dul don du/ 
136b2(rnying rgyud): rnam par thar pa dbu gsum bstan// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus 'thing ka/ ye shes drug gi phyag mtshan ni// g.yas pa'i rdo rje rje'u chung dang // mdung rtse gsum pas 'dzin pas rol// dril bu rgyu zhags thong rlon g.yon// 
136b3(rnying rgyud): bskal pa'i me ri sgral zhags dang // thod rlon phreng ba rgyan du byas// sgeg po dpa' bo 'jig su rung // dgod dang gshe dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje rngam dang zhi ba'i sku// sku gsung thugs kyi gar thabs can// 'jigs byed
136b4(rnying rgyud): khro bo rnam par rgyal// skye ba med pa'i chos dbyings su// mtshan ma med pa'i chos bshad pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rgyal// lo rangs sku mtshan dang dpe byad kyis// mi 'jigs stobs mchog gdan sdeng
136b5(rnying rgyud): na sangs rgyas zhing khams thams cad du// zab mo rgya chen tshe/ sa ma stan// dngos dang dngos med gsal byed pas// me lo/ nga lta bu'i ye shes dang // sprul pa 'gro mang don gyi phyir// pal mang brko/ 
136b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sa rnams su// dngos po mtshan ma rnam 'phrul gyis// bya ba grub pa'i ye shes tshogs// thams cad mtshan ma na mkha'i dngos// de nyid sgro btags chos dang bral// kun ldan byams sems de kho na// rang bzhin dag pa dri ma
136b7(rnying rgyud): med// he ru ka yi bde chen dbyings// chos rnams kun gyi rgyu yin te// 'od gsal ba yi gnas 'jug pas// rnal 'byor chen po zhes bya bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa gsang ba dpal rta
136b8(rnying rgyud): mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor rgyu'i don phyung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan dpal gyi skus// gar gyi dbang phyug lhun grub mchog/ thugs rje brjid pa'i
137a1(rnying rgyud): stobs ldan pas// yon tan khyad par bstan pa'i phyir// na mkha'i ri mo phyag rgya'i rngom// cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs pa'i rngom// zil gyis gnon pa'i gnas mchog rngom// 'tsham rngam chen
137a2(rnying rgyud): po'i stengs stabs rngom// sku mdog brgyad kyis brjid pa'i mchog/ phyag rgya'i don dang ldan pa'i sku// ho lnga 'brel bar gyur pa'i zhal// zla kham cir yang 'gyur ba'i ljags// skye shi gtsang nas gcod pa'i tshems/ 
137a3(rnying rgyud): rnam pa'i 'brug ltar sgrog pa'i dbyangs// ting 'dzin na mkha'i skar tshogs bzhin// phrin las rgya mtsho rlabs tshogs ltar// byin brlabs cho 'phrul sprin phung tshegs// mdzad pa'i rol mo gar thabs rngam// bdud
137a4(rnying rgyud): dang srin mo 'joms byed rnams// khams gsum zil gyis gno nu ba'i gdan// stong gsum dus cig bsgral ba'i zhing // rtog/ ba 'joms pa'i brtul zhugs mchog/ sku gsung thugs mchog yon ta/ 
137a5(rnying rgyud): ni// rngom brjid sum cu rtsa drug mnga'// rgya chen yan lag rags/ khas brjid// grangs ma rkyen dang mtsham pas brjid// bkur ga sh+logatso bo mthong bas brjid// khyad zhugs bla ma yin pas brjid// 
137a6(rnying rgyud): gdang chen stong gsum gang bas brjid// don la nyi tsher ston pas brjid// gsal bas mtha' gnyis yangs pas brjid// thugs rje thugs dam mthar phyin brjid// ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid// ma 'gas/ 
137a7(rnying rgyud): sa le mkhyen pas brjid// med la zang mi shes pas brjid// gcig la 'dod dgur bsgyur bas brjid// gnod sbyin phaT par mdzad pas brjod// thabs mkhas skyon gyis ma gos brjid// rems bram
137a8(rnying rgyud): nyam thag rol pas brjid// 'khor ba yun rings mgon mdzad brjid// cig char zil gyis gnan pas brjid// bya ba'i ye shes rdzogs pas brjid// sku gsung yon tan 'phrin las thugs// zil gnanang / 
137b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal bcag par bya// des su ro yi nang nas ni// glog 'gyur lce ni lan gsum 'byung // so 'am sen mo gcad par bya// de nyid ral gri bzang por 'gyur// rnal 'byor pa yi grangs bzhin dbyangs// de thogs nam mkha'
137b2(rnying rgyud): la song nas/ rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags brjod bya// oM b+hu ru na ra sa ma ta ya hUM phaT// gar gyi dbang phyug nga rgyal gyis// gang 'dod gnas su 'gro bya zhing // dregs byed tshegs rnams zil gnan te// cu kun tu
137b3(rnying rgyud): pas klu blang zhing // brtul zhugs spyod pa sna tshogs pas// yud tsam gcig la gnas su dag par byed// bcom ldan pad+ma he ru ka'i// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// ji ltar sprul zhing cir yang snang // mtshan nyid cig
137b4(rnying rgyud): tu ma nges pas/ sku gsung thugs sprul bsam yas che// rang bzhin las dang yon tan gyi// byin brlabs ya mtshan sgrib med gsal// khams gsum kun las rtsal 'phags
137b5(rnying rgyud): shing / rang gi dkyil 'khor rnam gsal las/ byin brla bas 'gro la rgya chen ston// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // sbrul sku sna tshogs 'dul ba'o// tshig gi gsung rab
137b6(rnying rgyud): rig pa'i gsung // bzhi la gsum bcu drug gis brjid// dug gsum sku gsung thugs kyis sbyangs// dug lnga bde ba chen pos spyad// dbyings las ye shes rol pa'i mthus// skye 'gro ma lus rgyas ba
137b7(rnying rgyud): nas/ rang bzhin dag pa'i dbyings su sbyong // rgyal ba gang gi thugs rjes kyang // 'di la skyabs su yod ma yin// srid pa gsum du dag byas nas// srid pa'i phyag rgyas phyag rgya gsang bas 'debs// 
137b8(rnying rgyud): thig le chos sku rig pa'i mchog/ gar gyi dbang phyug zhes su bsngags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ khro ba rngom brjid ston pa'i le'u/ 
138a1(rnying rgyud): ste nyer gsum pa'o// / de nas 'khor gyi gtso bo mchog/ gsang ba'i bdag po la sogs pas// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal lo// mchod pa rgya chen phul byas te// 
138a2(rnying rgyud): 'gro brtse ba'i sems can las// bsgrub pa'i rim pa zhu bar mdzad// bcom ldan dngos grub kun gyi bdag/ 'dul bya kun gyi don gyi phyir// thun mong dngos grub ji lta bur// de bzhin mchog gi dngos grub dag/ 
138a3(rnying rgyud): sgrub par bya ba'i thabs ni gang // las kyi cho ga ji lta bur// yan lag tshogs pa'i ldan byas nas// tshe 'di mchog tu gyur ram ci// thabs mang cho ga bshad par bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang // 
138a4(rnying rgyud): rang gi dkyil 'khor gnas bzhugs te// ma 'ongs 'grol ba/ dan pa'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba las// ngo ma tshar 'phrul pa 'di gsung so// rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig che// rnam
138a5(rnying rgyud): gsum phyag rgya la gnas nas// las kyi dngos grub bsgrub pa ni/ gnas bzangs dag du brtsam par bya// phyag rgya'i grogs la/ brten pa na// bzlas brjod yan lag ma nyams par// gsang snga/ 
138a6(rnying rgyud): yi ge bcu bzhi pa// sum 'bum dag du brjod byas nas// rol pa mtshan ma bsgrub pa'i phyir// mchog chen mtshan ma ma nyams pa// rab rtags dur khrod gnas nas blangs// khro bo chen po'i tshem rngam gyis// yung/ 
138a7(rnying rgyud): dkar thal ba la sogs pas// sum b+ha ni'i sngags brjod cing // yi dgas gshin rje bskrad par bya// de nas dri zhim sbyar ba yi// dag byed chu yis legs dkrus te// me tog phreng srogs rgyan gyis rgyan// gsu/ 
138a8(rnying rgyud): gi phyag rgya byin brlabs cing // dpa' bos rang gi khyim du blang // klu drug dbyangs drug bcas pa yis// khro rgyal rol pa'i bro yis sbyangs// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor nyams dga'i mchog/ rgya khyon 'dom
138b1(rnying rgyud): gang khru yis bstod// ci bzhin la sogs cho ga bzhin// rdzas dang sa gzhi dag bya zhing // sa bon gnas pa'i las rdzogs nas// bsrung zhing dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// yab yum bsgrub pa'i grogs bcas rnams/ 
138b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir gnas bzung ste// mchog chen dkyil 'khor kha ru bzhag/ bsrung ba'i 'khor lo legs ldan pas// stong nyid ting 'dzin nas brtsams te// dkyil 'khor mnyes bso/ 
138b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs byas nas// ro langs dgug cing gzhug bya ste// bar chad med par bzlas brjod bya// oM bi ra na trag sha ta ta la ta'i lo ma ta ya man ta tsan tra hUM phaT// ting 'dzin 'od zer gsal ba'i rgyun/ 
138b4(rnying rgyud): zur ma chag par brjod byas te// 'bum tshe gcig gis g.yo 'gyur zhing // gnyis kyis 'od dang bcas par snang // 2bum phrag gsum gyis sgra bstan zhing // langs te kun tu lta bar byed// 
138b5(rnying rgyud): de tshe rnal 'byor dbang po yis// skra nas bzung nas bsgyel byas la// rta mchog sngags kyi dbang du bya// rdo rje khyung gshogaphyag rgya yis// don gyi gsung gis go bar spyod pas bro yang
138b6(rnying rgyud): brdung // ting 'dzin sngags dang yan lag rnams// ma bral rang gi gnas 'ongs te// dkyil 'khor mtha' mas bskor byas nas// mchod pa bro glu dang bcas pas// lha rnams mnyes pa'i cho ga bya// de nas
138b7(rnying rgyud): rturdul zhugs chen po yis// go la lang g+ha gnan pa yi// bro la sogs pa rdzogs byas nas// ro de gser du gyur pa yin// de ni mtsho dang sbyin pa dang // rang la dgos pa'i yo byad bya// de bzhin gshegs pa
138b8(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las ro langs bsgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// / de nas gar gyi dbang phyug gis// gzi ldan yum
139a1(rnying rgyud): dang rol mdzad cing // 'khor gyis zhus pa'i tshig gsan nas// thun mong dngos grub bzang po nyid// ma 'ongs 'gro la phan gdags phyir// rim pa bzhin du pan gdags mdzad// dbang thob
139a2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig la gnas pas// yid 'thun gnas mchog bzang po ru// mig sman sbyor ba bsgrub byas te// byin rlabs ldan pas 'gro don byas// rang gi ting 'dzin la gnas pas// rang gi gsang sngags 'bum
139a3(rnying rgyud): rdzogs nas// mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang // bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor brtsam par bya// dkyil 'khor gang yang rung ba yi// phyag rgya gsang sngags ting 'dzin ldan// rin chen sngags kyi bzlas brjod ni// 'bum dras
139a4(rnying rgyud): gsum du gsung bar bya// oM pad+ma ma tsag hU a la sa ma ra si ti yo/ na hUM phaT// dkyil 'khor gnas kyi rtags mthong nas// grong ma tha'i gnasu 'gro byas te// dus kyang ma mthong mtshan mo rung // lba
139a5(rnying rgyud): 'dre gtum po'i grong du bsdad// rang gi 'khor gyi tshogs rnams kyis/ mi rgod btsan 'brang bsrung bar bya// der ni ban d+ha mtshan ldan du// gapa chen mar ni bltas nas// mtshan gcig yal bar bsngags bcwa
139a6(rnying rgyud): shing 'a ting 'dzin ma nyams sbyor bar bya// skya rings dang po 'char dus su// dud pas bdugs te bcang bar bya// glu dang bro yi brtul zhugs dang // lha rnams kun gyi spangs stabs kyis// gnas de'i bdag po dbang du bsdud// 
139a7(rnying rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags ldan pas// slar nyid mig sman shas cig byug/ de nas 'khor gyi tshogs sgo zhing // skye 'gro kun la gsang bar bya// pad+ma bsgrub pa'i A rdza lis// ci 'dod dngos po mthong bar 'gyur// 
139a8(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang ri lu'i bsgrub thabs ni// bdud rtsi lnga las 'byung ba yi// rdzas dag sha lnga dang bsred te// thod pa mtshan ldan nang bzhag nas// dkyil 'khor rgyan dang ldan gan su// thabs dang shes rab ldan gnasu// 
139b1(rnying rgyud): gar gyi dbang phyug sku bsgoms zhing // yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags kyis// 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas te// mtshan ma phra mo mthong ba dang // bdud rtsi gong bu bsgril byas te// rgya shug 'bras bu'i tshad tsam bu
139b2(rnying rgyud): rin chen za ma tog du gzhug/ dkyil 'khor ba'i dbus gzhag pas// bsrung ba'i tsakras bsrung bya zhing // rig pa 'dzin pa'i gsang sngags ni// 'bum phrag lnga ru brjod par bya// 'od zer lcags kyu 'byung bar 'gyur// oM
139b3(rnying rgyud): ma hA pad+ma saM po ta hu lu hu lu hUM phaT swA hA// de nas ri lu de blangs te// kha'am lag tu bzung byas nas// gang 'dod gnas su 'gro byed cing // ci 'dod pa dag grub par byed// lha'i gnas mchog nyams dga' bas// snga dro gcig
139b4(rnying rgyud): gis 'khor bar nus// gzhan yang bcud len bzang po nyid// skye bu gang gis bsgrub 'dod pas// bdud rtsi rgyal po a ru ra// gser gyi mdo rag tu 'dug pas mchog/ nyi shu rtsa gcigar por swa// sul rangs rgyas
139b5(rnying rgyud): par gyur pa dang // ba gcin phur mo thal ba dang // ser skya'i ba mar gtso ba ra bya// de nyid sbrang rtsi dang sbyar bas// nyi shu rtsa gcig zhag gi bar// zho ro'i tshad du bskyed cing bza'// dkyil 'khor gsang ba la rten mu// 
139b6(rnying rgyud): gar gyi dbang phyug skur bsgom zhing // rigs 'dzin pa yi sngags brjod cing // mtshan rtags gsal bar ma mthong bar// yan lag ma nyams brtson 'grus bskyed// oM pad+mo bi ha ra ha ra ta sa ni hUM phaT swA hA// gsang sngags sum
139b7(rnying rgyud): 'bum ma rdzogs par// a ra ru'i 'bras bzang stong gi tshad// legs par sbyar te zos pa'i mthus// nad dang zug rngu'i tshogs 'joms shing // tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// rgas la sogs pa'i skyon sel cing // rigs
139b8(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gnas su 'gro bar byed// de bzhin dbang po'i lag pa dang // kha ra bu ram nye shing dang // zur rdul mu zi la sogs pas// rang gi cho ga shes pa yis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i sngags kyis grub// gar dbang dkyil 'khor
140a1(rnying rgyud): ni rten byas te// so sor ma nyams sbyangs pa'i sa// ba yi 'o ma dang sbyar zhing // ba yi mar gyis gzungs btab nas// mtshan ma ma byung bar du bzhag/ de ni rig 'dzin dngos grub thob// oM pad+mo i dra dra a he de 'i/ 
140a2(rnying rgyud): na hUM phaT/ oM pad+mor rgya a gar tad rasha hUM baT/ oM pad+mo sa mon bi sha le hUM phaT/ oM g+hu li sa po ta mgo ra na hUM phaT/ oM pad+mo me sha a na nad ta ya ka ra hU~M phaT/ de dag las rnams 'grub pa dang // rtag tu rang gis 'char
140a3(rnying rgyud): byas shing // gsang ba'i sngags lam la brten nas// tshe 'di grub par gyur pa lani// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dang la rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud las/ thun mong gi dngos grub sgrus
140a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i le'u stesde lnga pa'o// // de nas gar gyi dbang phyug nyid// phyag rgya rol pa'i skur bcas kyis nga // snod ldan byang chub sems dpa' dag/ mchog gi dngos grub bskyed/ 
140a5(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i// rig 'dzin gnas kyi mtshan nyid bshad// dmar po dbang gi dkyil 'khor du// ban d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa brgyad// pad+ma/ 'i 'dab ma la bkram nas// tshe 'das sngags kyis brgyan par bya/ 
140a6(rnying rgyud): de ni bza' btung longs spyod tshogs// ma nyams phun sum tshogs par spyad// gar dbang lha la mos pa yis// gsang sngags rgyal po brjod byed cing // sum 'bum bzlas pa'i grangs tshang nas// mtha' sngags
140a7(rnying rgyud): gzhan gyis brgyan byas te// rtags mthong bar du bzlas brjod brtsamo// oM a su sha oM a yu sha so ta bruM/ 'od zer dub lta bu dang // phyag rgya'i dbyings dang 'byung ba'i dus// bro drug glu dang gar bcas pas/ 
140a8(rnying rgyud): brtul zhugs chen po bdud rtsi spyad// sku gsung thugs mchog phyag rgyache// gsang ba'i yum bskyed snying po mchog/ oM e ga te bgate ma tang ka te swAhAH// ma nyams nyams pa'i phyag rgyags pa/ gnyisu me
140b1(rnying rgyud): par sbyor ba yis// rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas pas// thabs kyi phyag rgya'i cho 'phrul la// gzi ldan gsang ba e gru gsum// nyi ma pad+ma shes rab ldan// so so gsal ba'i brdas mtshon ste// oM bruM pad+ma a yu she/ byin brlabs
140b2(rnying rgyud): rnam par 'phro ba yis// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thugs bskul zhing // byang chub sems mchog tshe yi rgyun// bsgrub pa po la gsal bar mdzad// pad 'dab brgyad pa nyi mar bcas// dbus su gsang ba'i rdo rje che// hUM gis
140b3(rnying rgyud): gsor zhing a yis bskyod// yang dang yang du bskul ba ni// sku gsung dbyings su gyur pa'o// de la byang chub sems mchog rgyun// ban d+ha mtshan ldan nang du bcug/ rnal 'byor gar dang legs bcas pa// bkra shis tshig/ 
140b4(rnying rgyud): bcas glu blang zhing // bkra shis gar dang dbyangs su bcas// longs skyo dang ston mo kun gsol zhing // dngos grub don phyir gsol ba gdab/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang
140b5(rnying rgyud): ba dpal rna mchog rol pa'i rgyachen po lnga che bsgrub pa'i le'u sde drug pa 'o// / de nas gar gyi lha mchog na/ sa// thams cad bdud rtsir byin brlabs nas// phyi nang sdong
140b6(rnying rgyud): bcud ma lus kun// rigs lnga'i sku ru bsgrub pa yi phyir// rang las byung ba'i rang bzhin dang // dngos grub snying po kun bsdus bshad// chos rnams ma lus rnams btags nas// rigs lnga'i dkyil 'khor tshul du gnas
140b7(rnying rgyud): de nas 'byung ba'i dngos rnams kyis// de nyid lta bur sbyor ba bya// dang por bsod nams tshegs bsag cing // rdo rje bla ma mnyes byas pas// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu// lha nyid nye bar bsgoms
140b8(rnying rgyud): byas pas/ dkyil 'khor chen po brtsam par bya// rigs kyi lha'i dkyil 'khor gyis// rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgrub par bya// dri dbyibs kha dog rol la sogs// sha lnga bdud rtsir bcas pa dag/ ban d+ha mtshan ldan lnga/ 
141a1(rnying rgyud): ru ni/ dkyil 'khor 'khor dang phyogs bzhir bkram// rdo rje bkod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// so sor spang ba sbyar byas te// phyag rgya sngags dang ting 'dzin mthus// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor
141a2(rnying rgyud): mngon par bsgrub// mchod cing mnyes par byas nas ni// las kun grub pa'i gsang sngags brjod// oM pad+mo badz+ra hri g+hu na sid+hi sar+b+ba pan ts+tsha a mr-i ta// oM AHhUM swA hA// de las 'od dang du ba dang // dri dang lha
141a3(rnying rgyud): mo rtags dag no// bzlas brjod thun mong khyad par dag/ 'bum tsho gsum gyis 'grub par 'gyur// de nas grub pa'i rtags mthong nas// de dag btag tsam sbyang bya zhing // mkha' 'gro rol pa'i rdul zhugs kyis// 
141a4(rnying rgyud): bsod nams sbyang zhing byin gyis brlab// dkyil 'khor dkod pa rgyan dang bcas// khro bo 'bar bar zhal bsgyur zhing / dayab yum gdung ba'i glu dbyangs dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'phro/ 
141a5(rnying rgyud): 'du yis dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas bzhugs par// badz+ra dkyi gar gyi dbang phyug bskyed// slar nyid khro bo'i dkyila'akhor gyis// gzugs 'dul gtso bo'i thugs khar zhugs/ 
141a6(rnying rgyud): ye shes dkyil 'khor kun bkug nas// dam tshig bdud rtsi gnyis med 'gyur// slar 'byung pad+ma'i rgyal po'i sku// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor gdan la bzhugs// mchod stod dga' bas gnyis byas nas// bro gar glu
141a7(rnying rgyud): yis thugs dam bskang // khyad par gsang sngags rgyal po'i mthus// ye shes lngar ldan 'od zer can// oM ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta pan tsa a mr-i ta ru lu ru lu hUM phaT swAhA// ji srid mtshan ma ma byung bar// sngags
141a8(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyal po brjod par bya// de nas rtamagrin phyag rgyams// bsgrub pa chen po gsang ba'i den// rdo rje rje mchog phyag rgyache// bdud rtsi rdzas kyis dbang bsrung zhing // rnal 'byor grogs bcas tshim par bya// 
141b1(rnying rgyud): phyogs rnams kun nas gdungs pa'i glus// dkyil 'khor lha dang bla ma mchod// dngos grub gsol ba'i tshig brjod cing // dga' ba'i longs spyod rgya cher bya// lha rnams kun la dgyes 'dul zhing // dam med
141b2(rnying rgyud): dbang po sngags kyis bskrad// bdud rtsi gtor bas lus rlag 'gyur// rang gi ye shes las las skyes// de nas las mdzad srungs ma dang // 'gron tshegs gtor mas mnyes byas te// bsod nams
141b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes tshogs chen po// rab tshegs 'gro ba'i don phyir sngo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las bdud rtsi bsgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun
141b4(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas rta mchogarol pa'i sku dbus su// dkyil 'khor dbus su dgyes tshu/ gyis// 'gro rnams kun la bskol mdzad cing // phrin las
141b5(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i don bshad mdzad// bsam gtan las kyis 'byung ba yi// zhi rgyas dbang drag mngon spyod dang // gnam bzlog reng sa dang gsad la sogs// ting 'dzin gsal nas goms pa'i
141b6(rnying rgyud): mthus// bdag dang gzhan gyi don las sbyar// zhi ba zhi pa'i yi ge ste// bsgrub bya zla dkyil la gzhag nas// rnam par snang mdzad 'od sngags kyis// dus gsum lha dang mngon sbyar zhing // byang chub
141b7(rnying rgyud): sems kyi bde bskyed de// zug rngu rtog pa rnam par sel// yun rings goms par bstan pa'i mthus// me 'bar gnas kyang zhi bar nus// rgyas la rgyas pa'i gzugs bgyis te// rin chen 'byung
141b8(rnying rgyud): ldan la 'byung ba'i// 'khor lo bsgyur rgyal cha lugs kyis// ser po 'od dpung 'bar ba brjid// rang gi btsun mo'i tshigs dang bcas// bde gshegs byin brlabs kun bsdus shing // sku gsung thugs kyi/ 
142a1(rnying rgyud): yon tan dang // phrin las sgonas brtsam par mdzad// sngags dang 'od zer gsang ba yis// rin sna bdun gser la sogs// mkha' mdzod char sprin bzhin du 'bebs// tshogs
142a2(rnying rgyud): rnams rang gis longs spyod cing // 'gro rnams gzhan la sbyin par byed// thabs dang dbang du bsdu phyir ro// 'od dpung dmar po mtha' yas sku// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus bzhugs shing // chags pa che
142a3(rnying rgyud): pos 'gro 'dul ba// rigs kyi ting 'dzin sngags kyi mthus// lha tshogs 'gro rnams dbang bsdud cing // 'khor bcas dang bar gyur pa yin// gang zhig sdang ba'i sems yod pa// 'phrad pa bzhin
142a4(rnying rgyud): rgyas chags par 'gyur// gang zhig gsad pa'i las grub mdzed de ni mthing na gi las kyi khro bo'i ting 'dzin las// khron dasprul pa'i 'bri' du yis// bsgrub bya dang phra zhing dgug pa/ 
142a5(rnying rgyud): me yi dkyil 'khor la gzhag ste// shin tu ma rungs mtshan char ldan// dkon mchog gsum la sngo byed cing // skye bo yongs la 'che ba dang // slob dpon kun la sngo ba dang // sangs rgyas
142a6(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes bzod mi mdzad// las kyi khro bo sna tshogs kyis// mtshon cha me 'od 'bar 'bros nas// sdig pa can de bsgral mdzad cing // bya khyi lce spyang sha za dang // khrag 'thung mang po 'dus pa yin// bstod
142a7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du rol zhing dgyes// trail tsam med par zos pa dang // sems nyid bde ba chen po'i gnas// de dag ting 'dzin gsang sngags dang // dkyil 'khor so so'i rnam pa bsgrub// oM b+hu ta tsakra sam pa ga
142a8(rnying rgyud): ti lo con chog mo gan ti su ru swAng+ga// mi rang nas bla gu ru ma ma ga ci go mo puSh+Ti ku ru swAhA// oM ya mo ti sa rabar ri mgo mo waka ku ru swAhA/ oM kA san ti ba krota ni che ge mo ha yA swA hA// rang gi dkyil
142b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor gnas bzang po// rang gi dkyil 'khor la gnas te// sngags dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba'i mthus// cho ga mngon du 'grub par byed// gzhan yang rmongs dang rengs pa dang // dbye zhing dgug dang bskrad pa dang / 
142b2(rnying rgyud): gnan la sogs pa'i las rnams kyang // rang gi rta ba'i sbyor ba yis// bsam gtan sngags kyis 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta/ 
142b3(rnying rgyud): mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ bsam gtan gyi sbyor ba'i rim pa ste nye brgyad pa'o// / de nas sbyor ba'i rgyal po dang // phrin las kun gyi mchog
142b4(rnying rgyud): gyur pa'o// rdzas rnams rten pa'i mtshan ma nyid// 'dod de 'dod 'bras bu bsgrub byed pa'o// gar gyi dbang phyug phyagargya'i sku// rnam spro lnga yi dkyil 'khor gyis// so so 'ad/ 
142b5(rnying rgyud): don bsgrub par byed// rdo rje tsakra rin chen dang // pad+ma rgya gram la sogs te// las kun lha yi nga rgyal gyis// mtshan rtags ma byung bar du bsgrub// gzugs snyen dkyil 'khor
142b6(rnying rgyud): bzhir gzhag nas// lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgrub byed cing // mtshan ma'i rdzas la rten byas te// brten par mchod cing mnyen pa dang // las kun pa yi gsang sngags brjod// oM ma ma sarba byi ta ha ra ku ru swAH
142b7(rnying rgyud): sarbas mo ku ni/ lam pa shan ting ku rud ni tsU puSh+Ti rat+na ma ku ru swAhA// pa shaM ku ru pad+mo hri da ya aM/ staM pan mo sha a karma ba ni hUM phaT// cung zhig gzugs ni 'du ba'am// 'od 'phros
142b8(rnying rgyud): bskyod par 'gyur ba dang // nga rgyal ldan pas lags thogs te// gsang sngags drag tu brjod par bya// gang zhig zhi dang rgyas pa dang // dbang la sogs ni bsgrub 'dod pas// de dag de dang
143a1(rnying rgyud): mthun pa dang // las kyi dkyil 'khor la gnas bsam// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma bskul byas te// rang gi las la rnam par gnas// dgug la sogs pa'i las dag dang // lcags kyul
143a2(rnying rgyud): sogs las kyis bsgrub// rten gyi mtshan ma dang bral bar// cir 'dod bya ba mthar phyin 'grub// thabs dang bsgrub byed gsang sngags la// so so'i las kyi mtha' brgyan te// yi ge bcu bzhi'i rjes
143a3(rnying rgyud): thogs su// sum 'bum grangs kyis bsgrub par bya// oM bi lo gi ma ma du shA na ga ga na ru lu ru lu hUM phaT/ dang po rtsa ba'i sngags ni// sum 'bum dag du bzlas byas nas// slar yang de yi grangs 'thun
143a4(rnying rgyud): pa gang 'dod las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin pa/ shegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba/ dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud chen po las/ rten gyi sgo nas
143a5(rnying rgyud): spyad pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o// / 'gro gnas thams cad bsrung byed ci phan gdags cho ga bzang po nyid// rgyal ba'i byin brla
143a6(rnying rgyud): gnas pa'i thabs// rnam pa yis ni brtsam byas te// grong khyer la sogs srung 'dod pas// chu dang bye ma la sogs la// gsang sngags rgyal po brjod par bya// oM na mo ku ru sarba byi dar
143a7(rnying rgyud): ni mos de ni ra sha ni ra sha kra ra kra ta hUM phaT// rang gi lha yi sbyor ldan pas// stong du brjod cing phyogs bcur gtor// gang bsrung ba dag shis 'gyur cing // 'byung po'i tshogs kyis mi tshug
143a8(rnying rgyud): 'gyur/ gzhan yang ri'u ma dgu 'i 'khor lo shing shun tshogs la bri// mu khyud dag gis mtha' bskor nas// gsang sngags rgyal po dgod par bya// dngos su dgod pa'i gas
143b1(rnying rgyud): sngags ni yi ge bcu bzhi gsang sngags bsam// de'i mtha' ma mo mthar ce te dang // su ruka pa bag sha ha ta ma mra bri hUM phaT swAhA// de mthar dbyangs dang gsal byed gang // bsrung ba'i sngags dang / 
143b2(rnying rgyud): bcas pa ni gur gum bzang pos byugs byas te// rdo rje rgya gram dbus su gzhug/ gang gi ming bcas 'bum bzlas shing // btags pa'i srung ba'i mchog tu 'gyur// gzhan yang bum pa bza
143b3(rnying rgyud): po ru/ bdud rtsi 'o ma sbyar ba dag/ rang gi gsang sngags yungs dkar bcas// gar dbang chags pa'i skur bsgoms shing // sngags thod bsrung bar 'gyur bar byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
143b4(rnying rgyud): cad kyi// gsang ba 'di nyid bshad par bya// phyogs bcu byang chub sems bcas pas// de la thams cad dga' mdzad cing // lha rnams kun la slar bsgo mdzad// de dag
143b5(rnying rgyud): dad pa'i shugs kyis ni// rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di bzung zhing // de 'dzin gzhan la'ang byams par 'gyur// de bzhin gan/ gas pa thams cad kyi gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud
143b6(rnying rgyud): po zhes bya ba las bsrung ba'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa/ bla na med pa'i gsang ba dpal rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud
143b7(rnying rgyud): chen po'i rtsa ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI he ru ka kA ru Na krI Di ta tan tra gu h+ya ge b+hI ra ud ta ma nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal he ru ka snying rje rol pa'i rgyud
143b8(rnying rgyud): gsang bzab mo'i mchog ces bya ba// dpal rdo rje sems pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / pad+ma/ 
144a1(rnying rgyud): dang / las kyi rigs thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po dam tshig gi sdom pa gnyis su med pa'i bde ba chen po dbang gnyis pa/ thabs dang shes rab kyi rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po/ 
144a2(rnying rgyud): khams gsum thams cad kyi bdag po chen po/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i skabs dang ldan pa/ che mchog
144a3(rnying rgyud): he ru ka'i shes rab dang ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rin po che gsang ba rdo rje mchog tu gsang ba'i bcom ldan 'das bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod
144a4(rnying rgyud): pa med par bzhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mkha'i dbying ngas kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dab du phyag chen po dang / rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ba dang / na mkha' la
144a5(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba chen po dang / skal ba ldan pa dang / 'jib par byed pa/ 'i gsang ba chen mo'i g.yog dang / 'byung ba chen po lnga dang // 'byung ba las gyur pa'i lha'i tshigs 'bum phrag brgya stong gis
144a6(rnying rgyud): khyab pa 'di lta ste/ snying po ye shes rdo rje dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rdo rje dang / me long ye shes rdo rje dang / so sor kun tu rtog pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / mnyam pa nyid ye shes rdo rje dang / bya ba
