144a7(rnying rgyud): nan tan ye shes rdo rje dang / na mkha' ye shes rdo rje dang / rlung ye shes rdo rje dang / me ye shes rdo rje dang / chu ye shes rdo rje dang / sa ye shes rdo rje dang / thabs dang shes rab ye shes rdo rje dang / gzugs pa
144a8(rnying rgyud): shes rdo rje dang / sgra ye shes rdo rje dang / dri ye shes rdo rje dang / ro ye shes rdo rje dang / reg ye shes rdo rje dang / sku ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung ye shes rdo rje dang / thugs ye shes rdo rje dang / bde ba chen po ye shes rdo rje dang
144b1(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung gi dbang po ye shes rdo rje dang / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / zhi nga'i ye shes rdo rje dang / gdul dka' 'dul ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / me to// 
144b2(rnying rgyud): gi ye shes rdo rje dang / rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / dbang gi ye shes rdo rje dang / nyi ma'i khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyal mtshan ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje sgra ye shes rdo rje dang / 'gro ba 'du ba'i ye shes
144b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dang / gzhon nu ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyu ye shes rdo rje dang / gsung med pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / sna tshogs kyi ye shes rdo rje dang / go cha ye shes rdo rje dang / yang dag par zab par byed pa'i ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dus pa'i ye shes rdo rje
144b4(rnying rgyud): dang / bde ba chen po'i ye shes rdo rje dang / byang chub sems ye shes rdo rje dang / rin chen dbang bskur ba ye shes rdo rje dang / pad+mo dam/ dar po ye shes rdo rje dang / dam tshig ye shes rdo rje dang / mchod pa'i ye
144b5(rnying rgyud): shes rdo rje dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo g.yog dang bcas pa rnams la 'di lta ste/ shin tu dga' ba'i dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par byed pa'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gsod ces
144b6(rnying rgyud): bya ba'i dbang mo ye shes rdo rje dang / rdo rje dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rin chen dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / pad+ma'i dbyings phyug ma ye shes rdo rje dang / las kyi dbyings phyug
144b7(rnying rgyud): ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gnon par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dzums par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rmongs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / rgyas 'debs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'dren par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 
144b8(rnying rgyud): gsod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / 'bibs par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gcod par byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / sdigs byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / tshig byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / yan lag thams cad
145a1(rnying rgyud): 'brog byed ye shes rdo rje dang / 'jib byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / khrag la dga' ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gcod byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / pham byed ma ye shes rdo rje dang / na mkha' la 'gro ma ye
145a2(rnying rgyud): shes rdo rje dang / ngag 'phrog ma ye shes rdo rje dang / zas sha rlon za ba ye shes rdo rje dang / srin mo ye shes rdo rje dang / gnod sbyin ma ye shes rdo rje dang / gnod byed ces bya ba ye shes rdo rje dang / sbrul ye shes rdo rje dang / se
145a3(rnying rgyud): ge ye shes rdo rje dang / stag ye shes rdo rje dang / ri dgas ye shes rdo rje dang / phag ye shes rdo rje dang / spe'u ye shes rdo rje dang / khyi ye shes rdo rje dang / byi la ye shes rdo rje dang / ra ye shes rdo rje dang / bya rog ye shes rdo rje dang
145a4(rnying rgyud): wa ye shes rdo rje dang / bya rgod ye shes rdo rje dang / sre mo ye shes rdo rje dang / mi'i keng rus dang / 'bu chen po'i ro dang / yi dgas dang da sha za dang / gzig dang / bong bu dang / rta dang / ma he dang / ba lang dang / 'ug
145a5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa chen mo dang / rdo rje rdzas 'dren ma chen mo/ dang / de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog mi mnyam pa dang / ma nyam pa dang bcas pa/ chos kyi dbyings rdo rje na mkha' la 'gro ma'i tshogs
145a6(rnying rgyud): g.yog dang bcas pa/ rdo rje'i rigs ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes kyi khro bo ye shes rdo rje dang / ye shes kyi khro mo ye shes rdo rje dang / sprul pa'i ye shes dang / sprul pa'i phra men ma ye shes rdo rje dang / yang sprul ma chen mo ye shes
145a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dang / bdud rtsi lha mo ye shes rdo rje dang / de dag la sogs te bye ba phrag brgya stong po rnams sgra ca co 'byin cing na mkha' dbyings rab 'byam chen po'i tshogs rnams kyis mchod par byed cing / bud med kyi dkyil na gsung brjod
145a8(rnying rgyud): pa med par bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal che mchog he ru ka kun tu bzang po dpal rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu dgyes pa gdon mi za ba'i tshogs rdo rje gtong ba dbang mo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
145b1(rnying rgyud): zhugs so// rnam pa sna tshogs kyi rol pa chen pos rnam par rol pa/ sprul pa chen po'i gar dang glu dang / sil snyan dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa'i bde ba chen po dang 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rol
145b2(rnying rgyud): pa la sogs pa'i rig pa bde ba la spyod pa'i gar nye bar ston cing / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs kyi tshul chen po 'phags par 'gyur ba dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnon pa dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sprod pa dang / gar byed pa dang / 
145b3(rnying rgyud): za bar byed pa dang / 'jib par byed pa dang / smras par byed pa dang / zlog par byed pa dang / myang bar byed pa dang / 'gyur bar byed pa dang / 'phrog par byed pa dang / rtsom par byed pa dang / kun tu 'bebs par byed pa dang / bde ba
145b4(rnying rgyud): nye bar stobs shing reg pa ro'i bye phrag mang po bye ba phrag brgya stong tshad me/ dad pa na mkha'i dbyings rdul phran las 'das par mnyam par 'jo dag pas nye bar gnas shing mtsho skyong ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / 
145b5(rnying rgyud): da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mi gzigs/ dag ngas pa nye bar mi 'jog/ thabs dang shes rab ston pa mi mdza / shin tu 'gal byin ci log pa la 'jog par mi mdzad/ nye bar 'jog par
145b6(rnying rgyud): mi mdzad ma dad pa rnams dad par yang mi mdzad/ ma dul ba rnams dul bar yang mi mdzad/ nye bar gtses pa rnams 'tshe ba zhi bar yang mi mdzad/ ma 'gags pa rnams 'gog par yang mi mdzad/ ma bskul ba rnams bskul
145b7(rnying rgyud): bar yang mi mdzad/ ma rgyas pa rnams rgyas par yang mi mdzad/ rnam par rmongs pa rnams sel bar yang mi mdzad/ dga' bar 'gyur ba rnams mi dga' bar yang mi mdzad ga dga' bar ma gyur pa rnams dga' bar
145b8(rnying rgyud): yang mi mdzad/ ma khros pa rnams khros par yang mi mdzad/ mi gdug pa rnams gdug par yang mi mdzad/ 'jigs byed chen po dang / drag po ma rungs pa chen po dang / gdum po chen po dang / lha dang lha ma
146a1(rnying rgyud): yin dang / log 'dren dang gdug pa chen po dang / yi dgas dang / sha za dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / shin tu gdug pa'i gdug pa chen po dang / tsha ba'i don dang / nad dang / sbrul dang / 
146a2(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad la 'tshe bar byed pa rnams nye bar zhi bar yang mi mdzad// rnam par dul bar yang mi mdzad/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus nas dgongs pa nye bar bzhag ste/ spyan gnyis mi
146a3(rnying rgyud): 'dzums par gzigs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po la bskor zhing sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i phyag gis phyag byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
146a4(rnying rgyud): kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbyangs kyis bskul zhing gsol ba btab bo// rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas kun// rnam dag sras bcas bya/ ngang chub rnams// yun rings bsgoms nas shin tu gdungs// dga'
146a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i yid kyis dgyes par mdzod// kye 'dod chags dri med kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ste// 'dod chags dam tshig la no/ phye mdzad nas// dga' ba drug spyad shin tu gsungs pa yis// 'dod pa
146a6(rnying rgyud): bde ba nyid kyis 'jig par mdzod// rnam dag rdo rje las byung ye shes chu// rin chen 'bar ba'i byang chub sems ni rab phyung nas// rgyal ba thams cad rnams kyi dbu ni skams pa la// dri med rin chen char gyis spyi bor
146a7(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur mdzod// mnyam dang mi mnyam 'dod chags tshul dag pa// pad+ma'i gnas rdo rje mdzod gtod pas// sna tshogs sems dpa' sems brlan brlag gyur pas// sbyor ba gzhan min ma rtogs bshad
146a8(rnying rgyud): du gsol/ rdo rje sems khyod dbang mchog bde ba byed pa'i mchog/ rdo rje pad+mo dbye ba'i tshul gyis sbyor mdzod de// rgyal ba kun gyi gzugs kyi sku ni rab btud nas// thams cad bde ba'i sgrub pa nyid kyis mnyes pa
146b1(rnying rgyud): mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun tu dpal rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbyangs kyis nges par bskul ba thugs su chud nas bzhengs te/ brjid dang bcwa
146b2(rnying rgyud): pas gar mdzad cing / zhal 'dzum pa dang 'dor ba dang / bskum pa dang / 'gying ba dang / spyan mdzes pas smin rings bskyod cing bsgyur ba dang / pad+mo phyag gis g.yas g.yon gar gyi phreng ba'i tshul gyis sa'i ngos
146b3(rnying rgyud): la zhabs 'phen cing bsgyur ba dang / 'dor zhing bskum pa dang / 'jog cing 'degs pa'i rnam par gnon pas na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du khyab par mdzad de/ rlung gi khams dang / me'i khams dang / chu'i/ 
146b4(rnying rgyud): khams dang / sa'i khams kun khyab par mdzad de/ bcom nga ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems la kun tu khyab par mdzad de/ dgas dang / pra ba dang / sbam pa dang / bud med dang / gzhon nu dang / rgan/ 
146b5(rnying rgyud): pa dang / skyes pa dang / skyes pa ma yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / skar ma dang / gshin rje dang / chu bdag dang / brgya byin dang / 'byung ba dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa thams cad la
146b6(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos rgyas par byas te yang dag par gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas phyag gar dang bcas nas thal mo sbyar ba
146b7(rnying rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po la spyi bos btud nas gsol ba btab pa bcom ldan 'das kun gyi gsang ba'i he ru chen po rol pa'i thig le 'di/ gnyis med ye shes yang dag 'byung // bcom ldan
146b8(rnying rgyud): khyod kyis bshad du gsol// sems can kun gyi ma skyes pa// skyes dang ma skyes rnam spang ba'o// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rab sbyor ba'i// mchog tu rtag pa'i sbyor ba'o// thams cad rin chen 'byung gnas
147a1(rnying rgyud): dag rnam pa'i dri med 'dra ba yi// rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bste// rdo rje chen pos dbang bskur ba'o// longs spyod chos ni yang dag 'byung // pad+mo'i mchog ni dmar po mdog/ 'dod chags
147a2(rnying rgyud): de nyid gsang ba che// bde byed thams cad bdud rtsi'i mchog/ la la ar ni don dang ldan// yang dag mdzes pa 'gying po'i 'gros// sa phyogs ye shes bde ba che// byang chub sems thig mchog nyid do// de nas
147a3(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu bzang po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i bdag pos gsol ba btab pa mkhyen nas 'gog pa chen po ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
147a4(rnying rgyud): zhugs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhug so// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po kun tu bzang po chen po la de kho na nyid kyi dbyang
147a5(rnying rgyud): kyis bskul te bzhe pa mdzad do// oM AHhUM/ mi skye ye shes bde mchog rol mnams// sems dpa'i mchog nyid 'gro ga pa rnams la bslang // chags med kun tu mya ngan 'das mdzad
147a6(rnying rgyud): bzhengs shing mnams// mchog tu gsang ba'i dam bcas 'jig rten sgrol// byang chub skye nas dbyings las gar mdzod cig/ sngon gyi nyon mongs rdo skams gzir ba yi// bde mchog rgyan dang ldan pa'i thabs
147a7(rnying rgyud): kyis bskul te go bar mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi gsang ba'i
147a8(rnying rgyud): thig le shin tu dgyes pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer gyi tshogs phyung nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po'i thig le'i dbus su rgyas par byas te/ namakha'i dbyings thams cad du snang bar byas te/ 
147b1(rnying rgyud): steng dang 'og tu yang bzhugs te/ ma lus lus pa med pa'i rol dang / sems can thams cad la gsal bar byas nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i ro bde ma mnyes par byas nas slar de nyid du slar log nas/ bcom
147b2(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i snying po gsang ba mchog gi thig le'i dbus na bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'od zer gyi tshogs kyi phreng ba mchog tu bde bar gyur pa snying po des bskul
147b3(rnying rgyud): ba ni gar mdzad cing rang rang gi ting nge 'dzin du dmigs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po'i thugs kyi dbus su mchog tu gsang ba shin tu dgyes pa chen po'i bde bar bsgrubs te/ sku rang gi bud med
147b4(rnying rgyud): kyi tshul du bskyed nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas mdo ngan par 'byung bar gyur to// de la la la ni spyan pad+ma// lta bur bsgyur cing smin kyus rings// sangs rgyas tshul gyis gar mdzad
147b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor dkyil 'khor du// rab dgyes rdo rje gdon mi za// rdo rje sems la dgyes mdzad cing // bde ba'i sangs rgyas bde ba yis// bcom ldan sangs rgyas bzhugs
147b6(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// zhal bsgyur smin ma bsgyur ba yis// spyan yang bsgyur zhing shin tu gnon// sor mo rnams kyang rab bsgyur dang // rdo rje tshul gyis gar mdzad cing // sems dpa' che la mnyes par mdzad/ 
147b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// skra ni skad cig bskul pa yi// bcom ldan rdo rje gnas par 'gyur// zhal ni brjid cing rin chen dbu// dri med spyi bor gar mdzad cing // dkyil 'khor zhal gyis rnam bsgyur
147b8(rnying rgyud): ba// byang chub sems ni med par mdzad// dur khrod yon tan tshogs dag gis// pad+ma'i spyan gyis gzigs mdzad cing // bde ba'i bdag po chen po la// rin chen tshul gyis mnyes par mdzad// rab tu
148a1(rnying rgyud): dgyes gsal bde ba yi// pad+ma dmar la che mdzad de// 'dod chags bral zhing rab tu bsgyur// pad+ma'i dra bas 'brel ba yi// pad+ma'i rnal 'byor ma dkyil du// brjid pa'i spyan gyis kun gzigs
148a2(rnying rgyud): pa'i/ bde ba che la mnyes par mdzad// bcom ldan pad+mo gnas par 'gyur// phyag gi sor mo rtse mo mtha'// rnam par bsgyur bar gar mdzad cing // phyag sbyar khong stong pad+ma yis// glog bzhi bral nas spyi gcig
148a3(rnying rgyud): tu/ mchod pa'i sprin gyis longs spyod pas// sna tshogs bde byed gtso nyid la// las kyi tshul gyis mnyes mdzad cing // bcom ldan sna tshogs gnas par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen
148a4(rnying rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba byang chub sems kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de ba bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba thig le byang chub
148a5(rnying rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po shin tu dgyes pa bde ba chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // dkyil 'khro ra nyid kyi tshul gyis su// cho ga sbyor bas spros byas te// de dang 'thun
148a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor gdon// sbyor ba'i gar gyis gar byas shing // ci ltar yang dag brtag par byas// ci ltar dkyil 'khor de kho na// he ru ka dpal dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bos kyang // brtag
148a7(rnying rgyud): par nus pa ma yin no// dkyil 'khor ye shes kyis brtag pas// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig gis// lha'i sbyor ba rgyas btab pas// cho ga shes pas bri bar bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi dang
148a8(rnying rgyud): yang dag ldan// thig gis yongs su 'khor bar btab// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhir ldan// kun tu yongasu mu khyud bcas// phyi rol rdo rje rabs bskor// de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka rigs
148b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi he ru kas ni bskor/ ga bzhi shwa ri yum dang bcas de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug la ye shes khro mo bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug la sprul pa'i phra men ma bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma bcu drug la sprul pa
148b2(rnying rgyud): pra men ma bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim snam bu gcig la yang sbrul bcu drug/ de'i phyir ma snam bu cig la zhe sbrul bcu drug/ de'i phyi rim snam bu cig la sman gyi lha mo sum cu rtsa gnyis/ de'i phyi rim snam bu la bcom ldan 'das de
148b3(rnying rgyud): kho na nyid kyi sku bsil dpag bsam gyi shing bzhin/ de'i rtsa ba na sman bdud rtsi lhag ma re re/ gser gyi me tog gzhon nu re re/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod cing bdud rtsi bum pa thogs nas sku khrus mdzad pa re re
148b4(rnying rgyud): de'i phyi rim snam bu la dbang phyug ma las las grub pa/ mgo brnyan dam nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod/ yang bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil la/ khor gyi dgod pa'i don bzung zhing bka' stsal pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi
148b5(rnying rgyud): dbus nyid du// bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka/ dbu ni nyi shu rtsa gcig la// phyag ni bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis so// zhabs brgya da lha chen pho mo mnan// glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon// zhing chen g.yang
148b6(rnying rgyud): gzhi skul bskor// sbrul nag chun pos dbu la brgyan// thod pa rlon pas se ral kha// stag lpags mgo chen sham thabs can// khrag dang zhag gi tshem bur bcas// bde gshegs rigs bzhi he ru ka/ khyung mchog ma he gzig dang
148b7(rnying rgyud): stag/ mi 'jigs sems can bzhi yi khri// smug nag sngonag ser nag dang // dmar nag ljang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrang // cha lugs mgo bo yab dang 'thun// dbus kyi dbu
148b8(rnying rgyud): gyen du lta ba'i zhal gyi nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba tshul bzhin tu mdzad cing bzhugs so// rigs kyi yum kun gtso yab dang 'thun/ ye shes las grub pa'i khro bo rdo rje thogs me dang / khro bo rdo rje mdzu
149a1(rnying rgyud): dang zla brda me dpal dang / khro brdu mngar bstag dang / khro brjo phur bu dang / khro ba rdu tho ba dang / khre brdo bye gri dang / khrob du ljon po dang / khro ba rdardar ma gri dang / khrobarda rnganags
149a2(rnying rgyud): pa dang khro bo rdo rje gtum khung 'dzin pa dang / khro bo rdo rje gcu 'dzin dang / khro ba rdo rje ral pa gcig dang / khro bo rdo rje ye shes dang / khro bo rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / khro ba rdo rje rgya gram 'dzin dang / khro ma rdo rje padrA b+h+ri ku Ti dang / 
149a3(rnying rgyud): khro mo rdo rje ral gcig ma dang / khro ma rdo rje rtse mo dang / khro ma 'jig su rung ma dang / khro mo mi thub rdo rjes 'dul dang / khro mo bkra shis ma dang / khro mo dpal ldan ma dang / khro mo pad+ma'i phreng thogs ma dang / khro mo nor ba / 
149a4(rnying rgyud): ma dang / khro mo grags ma dang / khro mo grags chen mo dang / khro mo rina'o dang ldan ma dang / khro mo pad+ma'i spyan mnga' ma dang / khro mo za/ des sbyin ma dang / khro mo bdud rtsi 'khyim ma dang / khro mo rdo rje dur khrod
149a5(rnying rgyud): ma dang sku mdog gcig tu ma nges te/ sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur ba'o// sprul pa'i khro bo 'di dag kyang sku mdog sna tshogasu 'gyur ba'o// khro bo hUM ka ra dang / khro bo rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro ba
149a6(rnying rgyud): nI la tan tra dang / khro bo ya man ta ka dang / khro bo mi g.yo mgon po dang / khro ba ha ya 'gri ba dang / khro bo Ta ki rA dza dang / khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang / khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / khro bo ma hA ba
149a7(rnying rgyud): la dang / khro bo bskud kyi rgyal po dang / khro bo zla ba'i gtso bo dang / khro bo rdo rje khu tshur dang / khro bo go ba 'dor ba dang / khro bo gnod sbyin rdo rje dang / khro bo las thams cad dang / khro mo sprul pa'i 'dra men ma dang / rnga
149a8(rnying rgyud): rje ke'u dang / rdo rje rje'u ri dang / rdo rje pra mo ha dang / rdo rje pe ta li dang / rdo rje puk+ka si dang / rdo rje gasma ri dang / rdo rje sla sha ni dang / rdo rje tsan d+ha li dang / rdo rje sing ha mu ka dang / rdo rje bye kri mu ka dang / rdo rje sri mu ka dang / rdo rje phran du/ 
149b1(rnying rgyud): kAng rdo krig mug dang / rdo rje kagasuka dang / rdo rje khrag mug dang / rdo rje su lu ga suka dang / 'dri rnams su mdog cig tu mnges so// 'di kun ning snol pa'i khril bzhus so// dud rtsi lha ma de rnams kyang // phyags
149b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bum pa 'dzin// sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan la sku lus glang po che'i cha byad du sprul nas mdzad/ yang sbrul chen mo seng ge lcam dral da
149b3(rnying rgyud): stag lcam dral dang / wa lcam dral dang / sbrang mo lcam dral dang / bya rgod lcam dral dang / kang ka lcam dral dang / bya rog lcam dral dang / 'ug pa lca ma dral dang / 'di dag kun gyi ye shes sprul pa'o// pa bang lcam
149b4(rnying rgyud): dral dang / zer mo lcam dral dang / po rog ldum dral dang / sgra kal+yA ma dral dang / khwa tAlcam dral dang / byi la ldum dral dang / spra 'u ldum dral dang / khyilham dral dang / sprul pa sna tshogs kyis 'gro ba
149b5(rnying rgyud): don mdzad do// las grub pa dbang phyug ma/ byo mi'i srin mo dmar serashing chen tri shu g.yag mgo ma/ tshangs pa'i dmar skya ban da mar rtse lnga sbrul mgo ma/ khro bo khyab 'jug 'byung sdig snying 'dren
149b6(rnying rgyud): gzig gi mgo// khyab 'jug dkar dmar du dmar byi zhags sre mo mgo/ gzhon nu ser mo rdo rje pa bang mgo/ dbang mo dmar skyab ma chen khro chen dred kyi mgo// dmar po dung dmar rgyu zhags dmar mo dom gyi mgo/ bdud rtsi sngonam/ 
149b7(rnying rgyud): rin chen chu srin mgo/ zhi ba sngo skya bam chen snying 'byin stag gi mgo/ be con nag mo bam chen thod rlon khra yi mgo/ sring mo nag mo bam chen rgyu zhags wa yi mgo/ za byed nag mo bam chen snying 'byin stag gi mgo// dga' byed
149b8(rnying rgyud): nag mo khong chen bgegs rgyal bya nod mgo// khrag 'thung dmar po rdo rje byug dung dmar rta'i mgo// gcig pu dkar dmar nam par lding gi mgo// yid 'brog dmar sor bzhis bsdus byis khyim mgo// grub ma dag dpa
150a1(rnying rgyud): sadam byib pu shud mgo/ rlung mo dmar ser ro ba rdo rjeg pa'i mgo// gsod byed stsal ldang ba mchen rje'u chung skye ka'i mgo// me mo dpar ser mo srag rgyu 'dren sbyin gyi mgo/ phag mo lngang nag rje sbyin dran
150a2(rnying rgyud): dmar ngag gi mgo// dmar mo ljang sngon bdud rtsi'i khrag zung khra yi mgo/ sna chen ljang nag bam chen longs spyod pa lang mgo// grub mo ljang ser bdud rtsi ban mar sbrul gyi mgo/ phag mo lcags kyu phu tra rdo rje khu byug
150a3(rnying rgyud): mgo Sha ni ser mo rgyu zhags ra yi mgo/ bum sna dmar mo lcags sgrog kun 'joms seng ge'i mgo/ gsus 'dzin ser mo bdud rtsi dril chen gzig gi mgo/ sems can thams cad mchog dag dang // dgyes pa thad
150a4(rnying rgyud): rab bsgrub phyir// nga yi de nyid gsung gis ni// dkyil 'kho dar de nyid bstan pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub bde chen po// gang gis chud pas rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems can mchog gi ston byed
150a5(rnying rgyud): na 'do nyid sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub// de nas bcom ldan gci ga 'dus nas// rab tu spro ba'i spyan gdangs nas// zhabs dang zhabs kyis gnon pa yis// sdud cing 'dor ba 'jug par mdzad// 
150a6(rnying rgyud): g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag gnyis kyi// brjid pa'i rtse mo mtha' nas dgrol// cung zad zur gyis gnon pa yis// mdzes pa'i spyi gtsug rnam sbyar ba'i// spyan gyi phyag rgyas phyag mdzad pa'i// 'gro la phyag rgyas btab
150a7(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur /  dpa' bo rdo rje sems dpa' la// bskul ba'i dbyangs kyis rab tu bskul// gsang ba dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor du// shin tu dgyes tshe rdo rje dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// mchog tu dgyes pa'i
150a8(rnying rgyud): 'khor du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// rnam pa kun tu skye med rol cing chung mdzad pa// bdag cag gzugs dang bcas te rnam spyod 'gyur med pa'i// bde mchog byang chub sems dpa' ni// rnam pa kun
150b1(rnying rgyud): tusdug bsngal yongs bral te/ che ba'i ye shes lhun grub mchog dang ldan// bde spyod de la rol pas tshul bzhin mdzad// rdo rje glu ni bladrangs pa yis// shin tu srid pa'i mya ngan 'das// ngag chen de bzhin gshegs pa rnams// 
150b2(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'di la byin gyis brlabs// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa dang bcas pas spyan ud pal kha bye ba bzhin smin ma dang sku rnam par bsgyur ba/ glog dang chu rlabs su gyur pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
150b3(rnying rgyud): rje las de kho na nyid 'di gsungs so zhes dkyil 'khor zhes ni rab tu bya/ ye shes rdo rje thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog nyid do// nyid kyi sbyor btags pa yin// rdo rje dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor
150b4(rnying rgyud): du 'od zer dkar po phreng bas mdzes// byang chub sems dang / dang 'dra ba'o// rdo rje dpa' bo dkyil 'khor du// zla ba ka ma ma 'dzes pa yi// 'thing ka' bar bkun rgyas pa// me la rlung gis bus pa bsti
150b5(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa'i mchog ni rab bsgrubs pa'i// rin chen rdo rje dkyil 'khor ra ni// dga' bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// rab tu dga' ba nyi ma bzhin// dkyil 'khor dgyes mchog 'byung byed pa// dar
150b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i dbang po pad+ma 'dra// 'dab ma brgyad po dgyes pa yi// ge sar ze bas mdzes byas pa'o// las ni thams cad 'grub byed pa// rdo rje las ni dkyil 'khor ni// dga' byed dkyil 'khor gru gsum ste// 'bar ba chen po
150b7(rnying rgyud): me dang 'dra ba de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// dkyil 'khor rnams ni brtag bya ste// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yis// ci ltar de nyid sprul pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bzhengs nas rdo rje brjid
150b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i gar mdzad cing glu dang / sil snyan dang / gling bu dang / pi wang dang / rdza rnga dang / dun wa dang / pa na wa dang / pa la ki dang / zhi ba'i thal mos sogs pa kun tu gdungs pa dang / sil snyan la sogs pa rol pas lha/ 
151a1(rnying rgyud): ro dang / ro'i zas dang / bza' ba dang bca' ba dang / btung ba dang / theg pa dang / snyan pa dang / gos dang / bldag pa dang / 'jib pa dang / 'jam pa la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos
151a2(rnying rgyud): bstabs nas gus pa dang bcas pas 'dzum pa dang bcas pa'i spyan gdangs te/ dbyangs 'dis bstod pa mdzad do// byams pas kun tu gzigs pas thugs rje'i spyan// grol bar mthun pa'i lan ston dug lngas 'brel
151a3(rnying rgyud): gzungs kyi rang bzhin bde gshegs kun la stobs// bde chen kun tu rgyas pas che ba'i ye shes 'dren// sku nyid stong pas tshogs pa'i rgyal po bzhin// chos nyid bde ba reg pas sku nyid ston// byang chub bgrod
151a4(rnying rgyud): phyir chos kyi sgo mo stan// gzungs bstan rigs lnga'i gtso bo rnam des mdzad do// dgyes pa drongs la mnabs shing rol mo ma/ dadzad// bde ba mnabs shing dbyings nas bslang ba'i phyir// skye 'gag med
151a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul du rnam par ldan// snying rjer rgyun bcas bde ba chen po ston / chos nyid bde ba chen pos na mkha' bzhin// bde ba mtsha ga gi ngang las sprul pa'i lha mo kye// rol pas 'dul ba'i tshogs la
151a6(rnying rgyud): stsal bar mdzod// bde la bsnams shing bde la mnos hUM// bde mchog char pa rab tu dbab par gsol// dbyings las bde gshegs slob ma gzung du gsol// ci ltar bzhugs pa'i gnasu bzhug su gsol// ngo mtshar
151a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub tshe 'di bde ba thob// pha rol phyin drug gang la mi rten par// mi skye mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs dang rnam par ldan// bde ba chos kyi dbyings la gnas pa yis// rmongs pa'i bde bas 'gro la snying rje che// byang chub sems
151a8(rnying rgyud): kyi dgyes mchog mi chags pa'i// glu 'di dag ni blangs pa yis// yid dang 'thad pa'i bde chen po// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol pa/ 
151b1(rnying rgyud): dbyangs kyis bstod pa// pad+ma dang 'dra ba'i spyan gnyis kyis kun tu gzigs shing / 'dzum pa dang bcas pas zhal rgyas par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phran gyi tshogs 'jig rten gyi khams mang po bskal par rgyas pa'i
151b2(rnying rgyud): sprin gyi rgya mtsho chen po snyed ma lus lus pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje dang / nor bu dang / rin po che dang / pad+mo dang / las kyi rigs las byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin dang / rin chen 'dzin
151b3(rnying rgyud): dang rnga chos 'dzin dang / sna tshogs rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs dang / thugs las byung ba dang / mtshon dang / dga' ba dang / sgeg mo la sogs pa rnal 'byor g.yog gi tshogs tshad de/ 
151b4(rnying rgyud): byed par 'dren pa dang / 'gugs par byed pa dang / 'jig par bye/ dad pa la sogs pa'i nam mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / gra/ gas pa med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'phrog par byed pa'i tshogs dang / 
151b5(rnying rgyud): gzhan yang phyi rol gyi rdo rje dang / rin chen pad+ma dang / las kyi rig sa las byung ba'i rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyu ga chen po dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs rnams la rnam par gyur pa
151b6(rnying rgyud): dang bcas pa kun tu gzigs pa'i spyan gyis gar mdzad ma dang / kun tu gnon pa dang / chags kyis 'debs pa dang / phyag na gar mdzad ma dang / 'gying ba dang / kun tu rnam par 'dor ba'i gnon pas/ 'khor gyi dkyil la
151b7(rnying rgyud): la byin gyis brlabs nas dgyes pa'i gdon mi za ba zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsungs pa de nyid bdag nyid mnyam gzhag dang / de bzhin lha'i de bzhin nyid
151b8(rnying rgyud): dang / sngags dang phyag rgya de bzhin nyid// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'gyur// yan lag thams cad bsam las 'das// yod med gnyis las mi gnas pa// 'dren dang tshig las yang dag 'das// 'di ni dkyig
152a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor mchog ces bya'o// chos min chos ni rnam dpyod pas// chos rnams thams cad brtags par bya// rnam dag nam khar 'dra ba yi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bstan pa yin// 'dod chags
152a2(rnying rgyud): ma tshigs 'dod chags mnyam// chu yi pad+mo dmar ba 'dra// rang sems 'dod chags shin tu chags// 'di ni dkyil 'khor mchog yin no// gzugs med gzugs ni dri med pa'i// khams gsum las ni 'jug
152a3(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i/ sems ni chu nyid dang ba bzhin// dkyil 'khor zhes bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad g.yog dang bcas/ pho nya dang / pho nya mo dang / na mkha' la 'gro ba'i tshogs dang / yang bcom
152a4(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po bzhengs nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ma rab dgyes dpa' ba mchog/ kye ma rab bgegs byo/ dgas bsgyur ba// rnal 'byor chen po tshogs mchog ni// gsang ba/ 
152a5(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// sangs rgyas sbyor ba rab tu zab// rdo rje spyod pa bla na med// 'jig rten gsum po bde thob pa'i// dkyil 'khor gsang ba nyid kyis gsungs// pad+mo
152a6(rnying rgyud): rin chen sna tshogs che// thabs kyis sbyor ba gar mdzad pa// rnam grangs sems kyi 'jig rten du// bde chen dkyil 'khor nyid kyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// thams cad gar dang bcas pa'i phyag
152a7(rnying rgyud): sor mo 'dab ma kun tu 'brel// rdo rje thal mo gar rnams bsgyur// brjid dpag dag tu rab tu bcas// grol zhing ma mchu tshems kyis mnan// chu skyes 'dab ma bzhin du gzigs pas bshad// dbyangs len pa dang gcig
152a8(rnying rgyud): la gcig bskul dang // snang zhing kun tu ma chags par// chags med bde ba mchog gis ni// bde ba'i rnal 'byor gzungs kyis rnams// stobs shing bde ba sbyin mdzad pa// namakha'i rang bzhin bsam gyis mi khyab
152b1(rnying rgyud): ste/ stobs shing zhengs te grub par mdzod// chags pas rab tu mi gos pa'i// bde ba reg cing dgongs su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po dgyes pa chen pos bskul bas thugs sad par
152b2(rnying rgyud): gyur te/ shin tu dgyes nas rdo rje dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas shin tu dgyes pa chen po rnal 'byor gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du shin tu dgyes pa'i rdo rje dbyangs kyis mgur len cing / 
152b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje rnam par rol pa yis bcom ldan 'das dgyes bzhad pas bzhad cing / nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gsang ba'i thugs ka nas ma hA su ka hUM zhes brjod/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
152b4(rnying rgyud): kyi bdag mo ye shes kyi dbyings dbang phyug ma 'di phyung ngo // zla gam ste da du ldan pa yi// ye shes gnyis po ma lta bu// thig le mtshan du ldan byas nas// gsal ba ye shes rnal 'byor ma// A li kA li 'dren byas
152b5(rnying rgyud): maHri mo dbus su brtag byas te// de yi mgo dang mjug nyid du// khA kho gnyis po mchog pos bya// 'di ni btsun mo rab gsang ba'i// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor ma'i// dran pa tsam gyis 'di dag kyang // 
152b6(rnying rgyud): bsod nams kun gyi byin brlabs 'gyur// A li gnyis dbus ri mo bri// 'dren pa yang dag ldan pa ste// steng du zla gam thig ler dga'// mgon mjug tu yang gzhan yang dri// 'di ni gsal ba'i don dam ste/ 
152b7(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor rin chen dbang bskur sbyin// bstan pas bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sdig pa rnams kyang 'jig par byed// A li gnyis dang ldan bya ste// tsheg drag yi ge gnyisu bshad// 'di ni rab 'gal kun tu/ 
152b8(rnying rgyud): chags/ chu srin ma zhes bstan pa yin// dang po bskal pa chen po yi// tshe ga drag po dang bcas par bzhag/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// bdag nyid la ma bzhag yang rung // phyag rgya 'di yis rgyas btab ste// bsgrub
153a1(rnying rgyud): yu kyil 'kho sgru byedan// ngos grab myu ba par gyur// kyil la yo ma pa rnams kyis // ye shes byag rgya ngon gas pa'i// 'dzin pa'i yod/ sa dra y-i// rjes pa ma pa rgya
153a2(rnying rgyud): 'gyur/ e ma'o bde ba ye shes che// 'di ni ye shes tshig cig 'di la// gnod byed pa ni bsten byed cing // 'di yi tshul gyis thob par 'gyur// khams gsum mchog gi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'di las rgya na gzhan pos
153a3(rnying rgyud): sgrub pa po dang sems can kun// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas 'grub// che mchog he ru ka gsang ba 'di bcom ldan 'das dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor rgyas pa mchog tu gsang ba las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje btsun mo rnam/ 
153a4(rnying rgyud): kyi gsang ba chen mo rnal 'byor ma dbang phyugs chen po rnams kyi mchog tu ga dasang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo mtshar du gyur
153a5(rnying rgyud): dgyes pa'i yid ches pa dang / mgu ba dang / yid dga' ba skyes nas shin tu rgyas pa chen po rdo rje bzhad pas mdzad cing / yang he ru ka 'i sku mdog ni sna tshogs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das che mchog he ru ka
153a6(rnying rgyud): zhabs brgyad phyag mtshan sna tshogs pa'o// de las spros nas phyag stong spyan stong gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa ni/ shin tu mi srun pas gdung ba nga rgyal che zhing dregs pa/ 
153a7(rnying rgyud): can thams cad la badz+ra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs 'od zer du gyur te/ de las spros pas rigs bzhi he ru ka dregs pa can thams cad tshar gcod pa'i phyir rak+Sha he ru ka nyon mongs pa'i dug gsum dbang du sdud cing 'joms pa'i
153a8(rnying rgyud): bya samigs dang cung rgyab cig/  da tshigapa sa pa byings mas thas/ delas 'grugs pa du lung / sru dog phyogs
153b1(rnying rgyud): spul nas 'grong 'don padzad do// kro d+ha gA su mdog sna tshogs pa'o// dpung gu drug bco brgyad/ zhabs pa ni phyag na sna tshogs pa'o// zhabs brgyad rdo rje 'bar ba med dung gan na/ he rug bzhin ma
153b2(rnying rgyud): bzhis mnan pa badz+ra he ruka/ pad+ma'i sbubs su dpral ba'i spyan phyed tsam nub par bzhugs pa/ shin tu rngam pa'i khro mo dbu'i steng na he ru ka zhabs brgyad kyis khro mo dbu brgyad mnan pa yang dbus kyi gyen du
153b3(rnying rgyud): bltas pa'i zhal ni nang du rdo rje bcug nas gnyis su med par sbyor zhing byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims byang chub kyi sems kyi rigs kyi he ru ka zhabs 'og tu mnan pa yang gnyisu med par sbyar zhing byang chub
153b4(rnying rgyud): kyi sems 'bebs badz+ra dza li'i sgra sna tshogs pas rab tu g.yo sa par gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi lha chen po rnam par rab tu skrag nas skyabasu gsol lo// mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces
153b5(rnying rgyud): gsol te/ rdo rje 'bar ba me dpung gis// bskal pa bas kyang / bsreg mdzad cing // 'jigs chen rngam pa'i khyad par can// dbu mangs bsgrub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing // phyag mangs 'jigs
153b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// zhi ba'i phyag stong spyan stong yang // 'jig rten rab tu spa bkod na// khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong yang // rgod dang gshe zhing za byed pa// 'bar ba'i mtshon cha sna tshogs can// 
153b7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa// khro chen khyod la skyabs su mchi// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // chung ma slas 'di rnams phul nas skyabasu gsol lo// chags pa med pa'i dbang gi thabs kyi sbyor bas dbang bsdus te/ 
153b8(rnying rgyud): dam tshig dang ming btags lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje 'chang gi gral du dgod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol pa chen po'i don gyi gsang ba rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyal po sku dang gas
154a1(rnying rgyud): dang thugs kyi rol pa 'di byung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni// gru bzhi sgo bzhi mu khyud bcas// thig gis yongasu 'khor bar btag/ dbus su pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri// dbus kyi pad+ma'i/ 
154a2(rnying rgyud): snying po la/ bcom ldan che mchog he ru ka/ shar du badz+re he ru ka/ lho ru rad na he ru ka/ nub du pad+ma he ru ka/ byang du kar ma he ru ka/ shar lhor rakra he ru ka/ lho nub yak+Sha he ru ka/ nub byang byi sha he ru ka/ byang shar sa ma/ 
154a3(rnying rgyud): ya he ru ka/ bde gshegs yum dang bcas pa dgod// de'i phyi rim snam bu la ye shes las grub pa'i 'phra men ma bcu drug dgod/ de yi phyi rim sgo bzhi thod pas bskor// gshin rje 'joms dang stobs po che// rta
154a4(rnying rgyud): 'grin dang ni bdud rtsi 'khyil// sgo bzhi dag tu rim bzhin no// sku dang phyag mtshan cir yang 'gyur te gcig tu ma nges pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de kho na nyid sku dang
154a5(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dpal pad+ma he ru ka dbu lnga phyag bcu drug pa/ gshog pa rdo rjes pa/ snyams pa/ zhabs brgyad chas dang brgyan cing / 'phra men ma bcu
154a6(rnying rgyud): drug gi 'khor dang / dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi 'khor gyis bskor nas bzhugs te sprul pa las bcom ldan 'das rta mchog chags pa chen po rag ta dang / rus gong gsar snying gi nang na thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul
154a7(rnying rgyud): du zhing bsnol ma'i gdan khril bzhugs so// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhis klu chen po rnams brdzis pa/ rdo rje drag ris bsnams pa/ rdo rje me phung 'bar ba'i nang na bzhugs pa/ dbu gtsug nas rta mgo/ 
154a8(rnying rgyud): ljang khu lnga byung ba/ sbrul nag gi chun po stag lpags kyi sham chu srog da'i phre sa brgyan pa/ zheng bsnol ma'i khril bzhugs pa/ bcom ldan 'das rta mchog chags pa chen pos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// hUM nub phyogs
154b1(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing khams nas// de nyid rang snang mnyam nyid dkyil 'khor na// bde ba chen po dpal 'bar mchog gi lha// 'du 'bral med pa'i thugs rje dbang gi lha// dbang mchog ngo mtshar rngom brjid dbang gi lha// dpal chen dad+ma/ 
154b2(rnying rgyud): thugs ni rin po che/ khro bor ston kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs can// snying rje yum gyi mkha' la sprul pa sna tshogs cir 'gyur yang // 'gro ba'i don du dpal chen ba ning su gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rta mgrin
154b3(rnying rgyud): de nyid yul la ma chags brag phug dgon pa/ zas la ma chags rtsa'i rtsa ba/ gos la ma chags shing gi shun pa/ skom lam chags brag gi thigs pa/ brag ri mi brten shing la brten// shing la mi brten
154b4(rnying rgyud): / tshuchul brten// chu'i snying po 'tshe ba gcig tu sprul nas 'gro ba/ don mdzad do// ha ya 'grib rta mchog dpal// sku mdog dmar po stug gi sham thabs can// sbrul nag stong gis brgyan pas brjid
154b5(rnying rgyud): chags pas// dbu skra kham nag ral pa mun tsa cod pan can// dbu/ 'i gtsug nas bdud rtsi rnam sprul pa// smi mtshams sna brag kun/ nas glog stong 'phro// dbu'i gtsug nas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas
154b6(rnying rgyud): bskyed nas ni// snyan nas sgra byung 'brug skad ldir// spyan nas me byung khams gsum sreg/ shangs nas rlung 'byung 'jig rten 'thor// zhal nas khrag 'dzag rgya mtshor 'khyil// ma mo dam can rnams kyang dam la 'du
154b7(rnying rgyud): rta skad theng gsum tshe rabs sred pa dbang du sdud// rta bro tha~Mng gsum brdungs pas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// pad+ma rgyal po rta mchog dpal// dkar po'i mdog la dmar po'i zhal// sku mdog mthing ka'i khro/ 
154b8(rnying rgyud): gnyer can// snyan mi dung gi khong seng can// mu med khams ni ci mchis gsan// spyan gnyis nyi zla'i phrugs su bcas// khams gsum dag ni ci mchis gzigs// rtog pa mtshon gyi lcang lo can// rnga ma
155a1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyigs pa ma 'dadas// gang sa nas ma jung par pa'i chub 'thor// gal nas mi dngad krugs kyis chen 'byengs// gams pa 'asum pa bdan byar// gsan pa sngags pa'i 'jun
155a2(rnying rgyud): no sbeng / ke'u ga shog pa gsang pa'i phyag rgya yi// na ba rnams ni sos par byed// rta skad pa zhad la rnga bro brdung // rtaskad chen po zang gcig gis// klu rgyal ris drug dbang du sdud // rta skad chen po thang gcig gis
155a3(rnying rgyud): mchogs dbang drug dbang du sdud// rta skad chen po thang gcig gis// bgogs kyi tshogs rnams dbang du spyod// na brolan gsum brdungs pa yis// bdud pa ni kun kyang zil gyis gnon// dpag chad 'ogan
155a4(rnying rgyud): bdud nas pa// klad du rgyab la thal bar lcogs// yab cig byams rta mchog dbang // rta kun tshul du gar byed kyis// ga dkyi brda' lang tshur spyon// rta kun tshul du dbyugs 'dor gyis// dbyug
155a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rta lang tshur spyod// rta rkun tshul du g.yab 'dor gyis// g.yab mo brda' la nga tshur spyon// hUMgs rgyu drug rtsad nas gcod// phrin las ni bar mdzod cig rta mchog dbang // srid gsum 'gran bla mar
155a6(rnying rgyud): pargyal ba'i mthu// che mtshan kun las 'phags pas pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug che// gar mkhan sbyar drul kun las thabs kyi rgyal por grags// byams ldan gar gyi dbang gis phrid las mdzod// rtag tu grub mchog re zhing
155a7(rnying rgyud): 'bod 'grogs na// byams ldan mgon po bdag la ci phyir thugs mi brtse// lha mchog bdag gis 'bad kyang 'bras bu ma mchis na// ye shes lha mchog khyod kyis thugs rjes rung lags sam// dngos grub stsol bar mi dmig
155a8(rnying rgyud): kyang // sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol// yum chen e ka tsa ti ma// ral pa gcig mas de skad bskul lo// yang yab kyis sku la mkhyud par brten pa'i rnal 'byor ma/ bdud kyi yum la gshin rje lcam// 'dod
155b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma// dpal ldan chen mo re ma ti// ma chen e ka tsa tim// gu h+yagasang chen ral gcig ma// re ta chen mo tsa mun ta// srin mo dkar mo chen mo'i tshogs// dpal ldan rdo rje dam shin te// na mkha'i
155b2(rnying rgyud): khams kyi rnam rgyal dpal// yi das rgyal mo g.yu 'bro ma// las la 'khril cing chos la bstan// dbu rnams 'byin cing bdud pa'i tshul// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// de nas snying po dran tsam gyis// pad+ma
155b3(rnying rgyud): takrid ha ya gri ba// hu lu hu lu/ e a ra li hring hring hring / e ka tsa ti sa ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hU// sngags kyi phyag rgya sbyor ba yi// dbyings gsum rnam par dag pas bsgrubs// de nas skyo nas bsdu ba na// 
155b4(rnying rgyud): hUM hUM zhes ni rab brjod de// phyag rgya chen po sku gnyis ni// sang / na hUM zhes rab tu brjod// yab kyang yum la bsdu// yu dam yang chos kyi dbyingasu bsdu// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu
155b5(rnying rgyud): bzeng po dang // kho na nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rta'agran dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// cha ni bcu gnyis tsha du bya// dkyil 'khor dbang gi rang bzhin dmar po ni// dbus su
155b6(rnying rgyud): / pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri bar bya// pad+mo'i snying po la bcom ldan 'das dpal rta 'grin dbu gsum phyag drug la shar gyi pad+ma la badz+ra he ru ka/ lhor rad na he ru ka/ nub du pad+ma he ru ka/ byang du kar ma he ru ka/ mtshams bzhir
155b7(rnying rgyud): yum bani/ de'i phyi ma du ke'u rim brgyad dang / sing tam brgyad dang bcu drug/ sgo bzhi sgo khyud dang bcas pa'o// sgo bani rims bzhin dang 'thun/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de kho na nyid rab
155b8(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i thugs gnas phyung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// pa byed chen mo tshogs kyi bdag/ yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// rdo rje shugs can dang / rdo rje 'jig su rung ba dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / 
156a1(rnying rgyud): rdorje snying po dang / rdo sgyu 'phrul dang / rdo rje gsus po tshe dang / rdo rje gang mo dang / rdo rje gang rgyangs can dang / rdo rje grags can dang / rdo rje gaha gad mo can dang / rdo rje grags can dang / rdo rje bgegs
156a2(rnying rgyud): gnon pa'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje gshin rje bshad pa can dang / rdo rje las kyi bdag po dang / rdo rje mi g.yo mgon po dang / rdo rje bsgyings pa dang / rdo rje glang po che dang / rdo rje ko brlon pa dang / rdo rje sems dang / 
156a3(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / rdo rje rgyal po dang / rdo rje mig mi zad dang / rdo rje bde ba dang / rdo rje so'i phreng ba can dang / rdo rje dang chen dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje g.yab mo dang / rdo rje dga' ba dang / rdo rje 'degs pa dang / rdo rje hUM chen dang / 
156a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mda' dang / rdo rje gzhu gdung dang / rdo rje ral gri dang / rdo rje rdo rje/ dang / rdo rje g.yul zlog dang / rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rjes dang / rdoHchu dang / rdo rje me dang / rdo rje rlung dang / rdo rje na mkha' dang / rdo rje yang dgapa
156a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sgra 'bar dang / rdo rje 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje mig brgya ma dang / rdo rje sbru ma dang / rdo rje sen mo skyes pa dang / rdo rje zangs kyi lpags pa can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi mche ba can dang / rdo rje spu gri so can dang / rdorje
156a6(rnying rgyud): lpags pa mkhregs pa dang / rdo rje 'phreng ba thogs pa dang / rdo rje rgyan pa dang / rdo rje rnon po dang / rdo rje ki la ya dang / rdo rje dpal ldan pa dang / rdo rje rnam par dag pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje za byed dang / rdo rje 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang / 
156a7(rnying rgyud): chen po dang / rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / rdo rje smra ba dang / rdo rje skyes mchog dang / rdo rje seng ge dang / rdo rje kun tu lta ba dang / rdo rje mchog tu dga' ba dang / rdo rje gzi brjid dang / rdo rje 'od bzangs dang / rdo rje grags pa dang / 
156a8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje snang ba po dang / rdo rje sku dang / rdo rje gsung dang / rdo rje thugs dang / rdo rje 'od gsal dang / rdo rje sprin rnam par 'thor ba dang / rdo rje char bstan dang / rdo rje rnal 'byor chen po dang / rdo rje rin chen kun bdag dang / rdo rje 'cha
156b1(rnying rgyud): bapo dang / rdo rje nyis dang / rdo rje snang ba dang / rdo zla ba dang / rdo rje drim med pa dang / rdo rje chags pa bral ba dang / rdo rje dkyil dkrung dang / rdo 'od po che dang / rdo rje bad+ma skyes dang / rdo rje thams cad ku mkhyen dang / 
156b2(rnying rgyud): mdzod 'dzin dang / rdo rje pha rol phyin pa dang / rdo rje rab tu ldan pa dang / rdo rje ngo rnam par dag pa dang / rdo rje 'khor lo dang / rdo rje gshog pa can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje num can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje sder mo can gyi tshogs
156b3(rnying rgyud): dang rdo rje mche ba can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje bzhad pa dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / rdo rje sprul pa'i sku dang / rdo rje rgyud 'chang ba pa dang / rdo rje phyogs bcur sprul pa 'gyes pa po dang / 
156b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje do byed pa po dang / rdo rje lnga'i dbang po dang / rdo rje lha man pa drag po dang / rdo rje'o tshe med lha'i dbang po dang / rdo rje 'jim par bye rab ding / rdo rje chos kyi sbyin bdag dang / rdo rje byams pa dang / rdo rje
156b5(rnying rgyud): rab rnon po dang / rdo rje thog thog lcags kyi gsor chen 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje teg teg stong gsum 'gyed pa dang / rdo rje thib tri kha myos par byed pa dang / rdo rje'ur 'ur 'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang / 
156b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje chem che ma gnam lcags 'bebs pa dang / rdo rje yud tsam glog 'byin pa dang / rdo rje shig shig khams gsum bskul ba dang / rdo rje ye shes 'bog byed dang / rdo rje mi srung sbyong bar byed pa dang / rdo rje kha T+wAM rgyal ba
156b7(rnying rgyud): byed pa dang / rdo rje dbang phyug sdigs shing sdang bar byed pa dang / rdo rje sbrul gyi zhags pa dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin srog gcod pa dang / rdo rje khrag 'thung snying khrag 'thung ba dang / rdo rje dpal snying sreg pa dang / rdo rje du
156b8(rnying rgyud): thung 'bugs par byed pa dang / rdo rje khrag za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje tshil za bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkang za bar byeng ba dang / rdo rje sha za bar byed pa dang / ye shes las sprul pa'i khro bo 'di rnams kyang 'thung bar byed/ 
157a1(rnying rgyud): zhal du 'dren par byed/ mkha' la rlom par byed/ zhal du rngub cing za bar byed/ dbang du sdud cing tshar gcod par byed/ thobs rgyag par byed/ phur bus 'debs par byed/ ral gris gcos par byed/ 
157a2(rnying rgyud): be con gyis brdung bar byed/ 'khor los lus gtub par byed/ dgra stas gshegs par byed/ rdo rjes mgo mjug med par brdeg par byed/ rdo rje rgya gram gyis phyed tshang du byed/ rdo rje mangs gting 'bugs
157a3(rnying rgyud): par byed mtshon spu gri ma las gsheg cing / bral bar byed cing lcags kyus 'gugs par byed/ zhags pas 'ching bar byed/ lcags grog gis sdom par byed/ rdo rje rgya gram phyed kyis dbang du bsdus na/ 
157a4(rnying rgyud): las thams cad grub par byed do// rdo rje mtshon cha'i sngags so// oM bi shwa badz+ra kro d+ha dza la maN Da la phaT phaT/ ha la ha la hUM/ badz+ra dza ma nu tra suM b+ha ni/ oM bruM hUM bruM traM bruM hi bruM ha bruM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT paH
157a5(rnying rgyud): phaT phaT/ grangs nges pa 'dir bstan to// lan grangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ bzlas te/ de skad ces rdo rje mtshon cha'i char 'bebs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
157a6(rnying rgyud): las tshe bsgrub pa 'di byung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'di dag thams cad ni// cho ga ni dgu yi tshad du bya// thig gis yongasu 'khor bar gdab// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bri// 'khor lo dag gi lte ba la// bcom ldan kun

158a1(rnying rgyud): zhes bzlas pas sku rdo rje dang / gsung rdo rje dang / thugs rdo rje'i dngos grub thob pa dang / tshe srog gi snying po// oM bruM badz+ra A ya she badz+ra hUM a zhes bzlas pas/ che skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung gi sku/

158b1(rnying rgyud): gram bsnams// tshol gnod cing 'gal byed kun bsgral nas// tshe dang ye shes ma lus dbang du sdud// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma rnams bskul ba/ dbyis phyag mkha' lding pad+ma'i dbyings

160a1(rnying rgyud): gang gru ba ni la dbus su gal 'gri' bri/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa la/ ke'u rim brgyad bri/ phyi rim sgo sngam dgod/ dkyil 'khor mdom gang gru bzhi laT kIr ta dbus su dgod/ phyir ma man

160b1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba ste/ sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro// dbugasum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje drag stengs na// dri za bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// shar lho mtshams na
160b2(rnying rgyud): gzugs pa ni// khro bo dbyug pa sngon po can// sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// me lnga bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul
160b3(rnying rgyud): tshul lo// lho yi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// ya man ta ka gshin rje gshed// sku mdog sngo la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// ma he bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs/

160b6(rnying rgyud): gang drug rdzorjo ste na// klu bdag bsnol ba'i khril bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// nub byang mtshams na bzhugs pa ni/ khro bo Ta kI ra dzi ste// sku mdog dud ka 'od zer 'bro// dbu gsum
