160b8(rnying rgyud): mdog ljang khu 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// gnod sbyin bsnol ba'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong pa 'dul tshul lo// byang shar mtshams na
161a1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa ni// khro bo khams gsum rnam par rgyal// sku mdog ljang skya 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje drag stengs na// byi na ya ka yi khrig
161a2(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// steng gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// khro be hUM mdzad hUM kAr// sku mdog dkar la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gshog pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag
161a3(rnying rgyud): stengs na// nyi zla gza' skar khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyong ba 'dul tshul lo// 'og gi phyogs na bzhugs pa ni// ma hA ba la stobs po che// sku mdog gnag la 'od zer 'phro// dbu gsum phyag drug gago/ 
161a4(rnying rgyud): pa can// zhabs drug rdo rje brag stengs na// sa bdag bsnol ma'i khri la bzhugs// 'jig rten skyongs pa 'dul tshul lo// dan sa bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo ya man ta ka'i ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs
161a5(rnying rgyud): nas 'di skad ces bskul lo// bdud ru tra nag po 'dul bar mdzad do// hUM gtum chen rab 'jam 'jig rten 'joms mdzad la// nyi ma 'bum pas lhag pa'i 'od ldan khyod// phyag cha mang
161a6(rnying rgyud): bo bskal pa'i me bzhin 'bar// rab 'bar gshin rje gshed la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje sku la dbang rab brgyan cing // gcan zan gdug pa'i lpags rlon sku la brgyan// rkyang bskum tshul gyis rab 'jigs
161a7(rnying rgyud): gshin rje gnon// zhing chen khrag 'dzag thod rlon sku la brgyan// mi zad rgyal po gdong drug hUM sgra can// phaT kyis khams gsum sngags mdzad zhabs drug po// sha za'i mgo bcad yi rgyan du thogs/ 
161a8(rnying rgyud): spyan bzlog tsam gyis thogs 'bebs me ltar 'phro// ljags 'dril tshems kyi gseb nas thog 'bebs shing // ma mo rnams kyang sgren mor 'dar zhing 'bros// stong gsum mid par mdzad pa'i zhal gas
161b1(rnying rgyud): la 'tshangs pa'i 'khor bcas khrag gi thigs 'dzag cing // nad gtong srin mo'i tshogs rnams 'dar zhing 'bros// rkan sgra gtogs pa lha chen khyab 'jug kyang // 'bum 'gyel bcas par khrag skyug nyid la 'du/ 
161b2(rnying rgyud): phyag na mi thong rlon pa bsnams pa ni// dngos grub phyag gis klang khrag zhal du stobs// tshangs pa'i mgo bcad dbu yi rgyan du byas// zhing chen mgo nas chem chem za bar byed// rgyu phreng khrag dang bcas
161b3(rnying rgyud): bar thogs nas ni// khyod mthong tsam gyis rab 'jigs nyid la 'dud// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang // sprul pa'i khye'u bzangs dbu gsum phyag drug pa brgya rtsa brgyad
161b4(rnying rgyud): byung nas bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis me tog ga/ tror bka' nod pa'i tshul du gong de bzhugs pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dgung la
161b5(rnying rgyud): thig thog mi zad pa// khye'u chung sngon mo mkha' la lding // ya man ta ka khro bo ste// sku yang chel bam ldir bzang / sku mdog stangs zil bcag pa 'dra// phyag gnyis dang po kha T+Ta
161b6(rnying rgyud): ga bar na rdo rje dril bu bsnams// tha ma mda' dang gzhu bsnams te// 'khor ni phra men brgyad kyis bskor// nga nyid yin te bskal pa bzang // skal bzangs nga yi dam tshig gis// dog la chem
161b7(rnying rgyud): chem mi bzad pa// bsgrags pa ral pa gcig ma yin// dam tshig dus las ma 'da' zhig ces sgo'o// ci bka' stsal pa bzhin du// las thams cad kyang grub par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan
161b8(rnying rgyud): 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos ma dang pra men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// las bcol bar mdzad do// kro d+hi shwa ri dpal 'bar ma// khams gsum srid la mnga' mdzad
162a1(rnying rgyud): maHlas su gsod la dga' ba mo// shan pa spu gri rnon po so// rol rngam pa'i kha T+wAM ga/ 'byung po tso ta mchog la rol// mthing ka mchog ston dpal gyi yum// rdo rje thugs kyi dbang
162a2(rnying rgyud): byug ma/ ke'u rim yi mchod pa rol// gser gyi 'od 'phro mnga' gzhu 'gengs// rin chen sku yi dbang phyug ma// tsi'u ri ma yi mchod pas rol// phra mo chu srin rgyal mtshan 'dzin// pad+ma'i gsung gi dbang phyug ma// 
162a3(rnying rgyud): pra mo ha yi mchod pas rol// nag mo ral pa thod pas 'gyangs// dkar ma las kyi dbang phyug ma// pe ta li yi mchod pas rol// gtum mo zhe sdang spu gri so// zhe sdang 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// gasma ri/ 
162a4(rnying rgyud): yi mchod pas rol// pad+ma 'joms pa'i char chen 'bebs// 'dod cha gus 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// puk+ka si yi mchod pas ro ral// rin chen me lce glog phreng 'dzin// gti mug 'joms
162a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbang phyug ma// sma sha na yi mchod pas rol// las su dag sta/ 'bar ba 'dzin// nga rgyal 'joms pa'i dbang phyug ma// tsan d+ha li yi mchod pas rol// sing nga gsod byed seng ge mgo
162a6(rnying rgyud): ro mchog za ba'i phra men ma// bya kri mgo gcod stag gi mgo/ thod rlon za ba'i phra men ma// sri ka dur kun wa yi mgo/ dur sri ma yi 'phra men ma// sho na sha 'drang srung mo mgo/ sha chen za ba'i 'phra men ma// kri ta khrag
162a7(rnying rgyud): 'thung bya rgod mgo/ khrag tshil za ba'i phra man ma// kang ka ma ka dur bya'i mgo/ dug gsum 'joms pa'i phra men ma// kha ba rgyu 'dren po rog mgo/ dgra bgegs 'dul ba'i phra men ma// hu lu tshe 'phrog 'ug pa/ 
162a8(rnying rgyud): mgo/ glo snying za ba'i 'phram nam// stag g.yag sha ba seng ge'i mgo/ byil sbrang khu wa yi mgo/ dom dred pag gi mgo can rnams// thugs dam bzhin du las byos shig/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
162b1(rnying rgyud): chags pa med pa'i sbyor bas sku las 'khril cing las mthar phyin par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sgo ba rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dza dza lcags kyu glo snying 'dren a mo sngon mo thong sbrul zhags// i li par/ 
162b2(rnying rgyud): mo lcags sgrog sdom pas ni ljang ku dril 'khrol dgyes// dka' stsal pa bzhin du nyan par mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las ye shes kyi khro bo dkyil la
162b3(rnying rgyud): gyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal lha mo sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs te sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ 
162b4(rnying rgyud): las phyung ngo // rnal 'byor ma'i dkyil 'khor 'di phyung ngo // dgru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs rnam pa bzhis ni nga rgyan// dar dang dril bu rkun po dang // nyi ma zla bas rnam par
162b5(rnying rgyud): brgyan/ rin chen mu tig 'bras bus spras// do shal rkang gdu ba rnams kyi rgyan// sna tshogs gzugs ni rnam bres pa ka/ sna tshogs phreng ba gos kyi brgyan// srang bu bzhi dang ldan pa
162b6(rnying rgyud): ste/ kab mchog brgyad yang dag ldan// dbusu dga' byed stan la ni// dngul la sogs pas rnam par brgyan// sna tshogs pad+ma'i dar gyis g.yogs// thams cad stan la de dag ces// dbus su rdo rje
162b7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' ni// stan de la ni bzhag par bya// tshad med pad+mo dmar 'dra ba// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// yid bzhin nor bu dbu rgyan ldan// rin chen gtsug ni rnam par mdzes// tshad
162b8(rnying rgyud): med dang ni sbyang ba yi// dbul chun pos mdzes par byas// sna tshogs ye shes rab tu gnas// chu skyes spyan ni rab tu rgyas// dga' byed yid tsam g.yon du 'dud// g.yas kyi phyag gis rdo rje
163a1(rnying rgyud): snying kar gsor la rab tu brtsom// bde la sogs pa yon tan ldan// thog ma nyid du rnam par gzhag/ slob ma 'am yang na gzhan yang rung // mtshan kun gyis ni rnam brgyan la// 
163a2(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhin byin gyis brlabs bya ste// dbus kyi dkyil du bzhag par bya// bdag nyid kyang ni mnyam bzhag ste// de la sogs pa yon tan gtso// dbus kyi stan la 'dug pa ni// bdag ni rab kyi
163a3(rnying rgyud): rjes su smra// der ni slob ma byin brlabs te// thams cad las byed phun sum tshogs// rdo rje pad+ma las byung ba'i// gsang ba yis kyang dbang bskur ro// rab dgyes la sogs yon tan ldan// 
163a4(rnying rgyud): yid 'ong bu mo btsal bya ste// snying ka mtshogs ma mgrin spyi bor// lha rnams la sogs 'bru bsgoms te// mtshan ma phyag rgya rab 'bar ba'i// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor ba'i// rang la 'khyud
163a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya yis// tshul bzhin thams cad bzhag par bya/ mdun du lha mo myos byed ma// ma mchu 'dzin pa'i rol/ dgyes// dkar dmar kha dog 'dres pa yi// thams cad rgyan dang
163a6(rnying rgyud): yang dag ldan// lo ni bcu drug lon pa mchog/ shes rab can gyi mdun du bzhag/ g.yas su lha mo bsod byed ma// mtshon cha'i mda' ni 'dren par brtson// do shal rkang gdub dag gis brgyan// lo
163a7(rnying rgyud): grangs mi shu lon pa ste// gser gyi ri bo zhu ba 'dra// chu skyes spyan ni yid tsam sngo// sems dpa' chel mnyes mdzad cing // de yi tshul bzhin bzhag par bya// rgyab du lha mo rmongs byed ma/ 
163a8(rnying rgyud): bad+ma mar po mdog gi 'ong// mu srin rgyal mtshan mengs pa'o// sku yi tshad ni nyi shu gcig/ dga' byed 'dod pa'i rol dgyes// sna tshogs na bza' yang dag gsol// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// s+dza
163b1(rnying rgyud): tshegs pad+mo sbyor la sogs// gar gyi bya bar rabarlag bzhag/ g.yon du sna tshogs chen po ste// sna tshogs dgos pa rjes brlabs pa// sku yi tshad ni bcu gnyis ldan// rnal 'byor la ni shin tu brtson// lhang
163b2(rnying rgyud): lha min mi yi rnams// 'gro ba thams cad myos mdzad ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sna tshogs dar ni na bza' gsol// grwa rnams dag ni thams cad du// gzugs sgra dri ro rig rnams dang // bdun
163b3(rnying rgyud): pa me tog gsung ldang ba// gzi brjid chen po'i 'od dang ldan// ci rigs par ni bzhag par bya// sgo yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rang gi las kyi phyag rgyar ldan// skal ldan 'ga' la rnam mos pa// sgo srung
163b4(rnying rgyud): bzhi ni bzhag par bya// gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs rnams// bi dang gling bu brdab pa dang // rdza rnga rnga chen ku mu ta// mu ra tsa dang dang rang dang // gar dang dbyangs dang bzhad pa che// rol mo yo byad sna
163b5(rnying rgyud): tshogs rnams// dga' byed dkyil 'khor bzhag par bya// phyi na dkyil 'khor thams cad do// dkyil 'khor gyi ni phyir// du// rdo rje na mkhar 'gro ma bzhag/ yi dgas phyag rgya yang dag zhon
163b6(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo 'jigs byed gzugs 'dzin te// skal ldan rang gi lag char ldan// gdug pa'i sems kyis bsdigs byed cing // ga khrag dang ni rgyu ma dang // rkang dang tshil du za spyod pa// dkyil 'khor byas te/ 
163b7(rnying rgyud): bdug pa ni tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gzhag par bya// dga' bar byed dang 'dren par byed// gsod par byed dang 'phrog par byed// rdo rje mkha' 'gro tshogs kyi rnams// shar gyi phyog su bzhag par bya// 
163b8(rnying rgyud): gzi brjid che dang 'bar byed ma// 'joms byed bong bu lho ru ste// gtsug lag mthon pa'i rgyu yis ni// mkhas pas tshul bzhin gzhag par bya// chags chen po dang chags bral dang // 'khor la
164a1(rnying rgyud): ma dang rgyas 'debs ma// rab tu 'byor pas 'byor byas te// ci rigs nub du bzhag par bya// sna tshogs lus dang srung ba dang // gnod sbyin mo dang yang dag 'brog/ sngags dang phyag rgya
164a2(rnying rgyud): byin brlabs nas// sngags mkhan ci rigs byang du bzhag/ shar gyi gra ru bzhag pa ni// bya rog gdong ni mig 'bru ste// 'jigs pa'i mig dang 'jigs pa'i gdong // ci ltar rjesu 'thun byas te// yi dgas
164a3(rnying rgyud): stan la yang dag 'dug/ sna tshogs mchog gdong 'dzin te// lag par gri dang khar gzhong thogs// mchog tu sha dang khrag za ba'o// nub dang lho'i mtshams bzhag pa// bzhad dang 'ug pa'i gdang ring ma// khros pa'i
164a4(rnying rgyud): khri dang ngag gi gdong // gsus po che la lto 'byangs rnams// nub dang byang gi mtshams dag du// rnga mo bong bu gdong 'dzin ma// khro dpar dang khyi yi gdong // rgyu ma'i mgo nas sha bar byed// shar dang byang gi/ 
164a5(rnying rgyud): mtshams dag tu// keng rus dkar po 'dzin pa ste// khros pa rus pa'i phreng bas klubs// lto 'byangs po la bum pa 'dzin// phan tshun 'thob par brtson pa yi// ce spyang gi ni 'khor gyi rnams/ 
164a6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed gdong ni mche ba 'dzin// rnam par bsgyur ba'i gzugs 'dzin ma// sgo rnams kun ni phyogs rnams kun// sgo bzhi rnams ni bzhag par bya// byang phyogasu ni 'bod 'grogs te// bum pa rnams ni shar
164a7(rnying rgyud): nyid du/ nub tu rnam par 'jig pa'o// lho ru gshin rje rgyal po bzhag/ de dang gzhan yang rgyal po mchog/ namakhar 'gro bas kun tu bskor// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' su
164a8(rnying rgyud): / gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// dgyes shing spyan ni rgyas pa yis// bzhengs nas dgyes pa chen po yi// brjid pa'i phyag gis gar mdzad cing // thal sbyor rabs btsug nyid du// bzhag pa yis ni 'dung ba
164b1(rnying rgyud): byis bskul ba yis ni dbyangs 'di yis// de dag gcol mnyes par byed// kye ma spyod pa ngo mtshar che// kye ma sbas pa ngo mtshar che// kye maber byed yang dag 'byung // kye ma kun tu bzang po don// kye ma rab dgyes yang / 
164b2(rnying rgyud): dag 'grogs// kye ma bde ba dga' ba che// kye ma bde ba bde mchog ste// kye ma sngags kyi yang dag sbyor// kye ma snying po yang dag sbyor// kyes phyag rgya yang dag bzhugs// kyem bsgrub barmad 'byung ba'o// kyem pa
164b3(rnying rgyud): rol phyin pa yis// kye ma ji ltar mthur rigs pa// kye ma dgos pa sna tshogs che// kye ma dge pa gsum sbyar ba// kye ma rdo rje mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma pad+ma rnam phye ba// kye ma dbang po gnyis sbyor ba'i/ kyes
164b4(rnying rgyud): mchog dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// kye ma gar ni dga' ba che// kye mak+Sha/ rab dri ma med// kye ma sil snyan rnam par 'khrol// kye ma gda' dang mun sel ba// kye ma dga' byed me tog phreng // kye ma mar me mun
164b5(rnying rgyud): pasel kye ma dri ni shin tu bsil// kye ma rnal 'byor mnyam s+thA/ ra ba'i// kye ma sgyu ma na mkha' 'dra// kye ma sangs rgyas na mkha' 'dra// kye ma rin chen bde mchog skyed// kye ma sna tshogs sku
164b6(rnying rgyud): ma mdzad// kye ma ngo mtshar sangs rgyas dang // kye ma ngo mtshar dbang po rnams// kye ma ngo mtshar sems dpa' che// kye ma ngo mtshar lha yi rnams// shin tu dgyes che rdo rje la// rgyal ba kun gyis bstod byas te// rdo rje sems
164b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' 'gying ba yis// dga' dang bde byed skyes par 'gyur// chu skyes zhal ni 'dzum bcas pa// yangs pa'i sman gyis gar mdzad de// sman dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// rab tu dgyes ldan smin ma bsgyur/ 
164b8(rnying rgyud): yangs par spyan gyis gar mdzad de// spyan dang zhabs ni bsgyur ba yis// yid tsam mdzes pa'i spyan zur gzigs// sha rgyas brlan nu mar 'dud// rkang pa'i dbyes ni rnam par yangs// rnams kyi
165a1(rnying rgyud): gos kyang chel mdzes// chags pa cung zad tshems kyis gnon// tshems kyi phreng ba kun zla// mi drag zlos pa'i dbugs 'byin cing // rab tu dga' chen dgyes pas bstod// dung sa
165a2(rnying rgyud): gzugs ldan mdangs bzang ba// lo grangs bcu drug lon pa la// byin gyis brlabs kyis gnas gsum gyis// dben par mchod pa rab tu brtsamo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i btsun mo mchog/ spyan la
165a3(rnying rgyud): sogs pa bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur// 'od zer sna lngas khyab pa yis// pad+mo rdo rje bsgom par bya// 'bar bcas zla 'od bzhin du ska
165a4(rnying rgyud): yid du 'ong ba bsgom par bya// bzhin bzangs phan par 'dod pa yis// bud med rnyed na cho ga bzhin// bde bar mchod par brtsam par bya// ye shes sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// dbus su gzugs ni/ 
165a5(rnying rgyud): bsgom par bya// sngags shes pas ni gnas bzhin du// bud med/ rtag tu bzhag par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzog/ sa// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// dben pa'i gnasu khyad par
165a6(rnying rgyud): du// sgrub pa pos ni rtag tu bsgrub// mtshan nyid dag ni yongasu dag/ rab tu bzang la bzhin yang mdzes// rgyan rnams thams cad yongasu rdzogs// bang par bzhag nas rnam par bsgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i sbyor ba
165a7(rnying rgyud): yis/ bu mo ud dpal 'thing ka'i mdog/ 'dra ba dag ni rtag tu bsgrub// sbyor ba'i cho ga de nyid ni// byas na las rnams brtsam par bya// bud med sems ni rab brtan pa// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa la// 
165a8(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi sbyor ba rab bsgoms te// bdag gi khu bas mchod par bya// 'dis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// na chung gzhon nu mig bzangs btsal// gzugs bzangs gzhon pas brgyan pa yi// lo grangs nyis/ 
165b1(rnying rgyud): lnga lon pa'i/ bzung nas byol song skye gnas brtag/ bzhin bzangs shin tu mdzes pa yi// na chung mtshan ldan bskal ba mchog/ mig b.rangs brtan pa'i blo ldan pas// khu ba blangs nas bza' bar bya// dben/ 
165b2(rnying rgyud): zhing rab tu nyams dga' bor// sbyor ba mchod pa kun brtsams na// rdo rje sku dang gsung dang thugs// zla ba phyed kyis nges par grub// smin dkyus ring zhing sku la 'jam// lus ldem dbyings su bro gtsang // ba
165b3(rnying rgyud): ba chags shing bcos su btub// lus nyan ci la thogs pa med// rked pa phral ro smang zlum// stod ni drang la shin tu rgyas// tshems dkar mgul rings phyag sor ring // dkar la dmar chags nor bu'i mdog
165b4(rnying rgyud): gzungs ma mtshan ldan spyad par bya// gnyen lcug 'khril ldemar rab tu mdzes// yid 'ong 'dzum phran spun zur gzigs// khur da chos dkar pos gdab par bya// dkar 'dzin phyir ni mnye bya ste/ 
165b5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i za ba chen pos gdab// pad+ma lan gsum mnyes bya ste/ mtshan khung mngon sum rna ba gnyis// zangs kyi mdo ga gis gzung bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi/ 
165b6(rnying rgyud): btsun mo dang bcas par gyur to// de nas 'di brjod par mdzad do// zhi ba kha dog dkar la 'tsher// btang snyoms kyi spro bsdu yis// gsum pa rdzogs par ldan pa dang // phyag rgya tshegs mchod de dag la
165b7(rnying rgyud): rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs 'dzin// che chung med par gsal bar bsgom// dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ge ldan// gsal ba nyid kyis dus dag tu
165b8(rnying rgyud): cod pan lnga yi rin chen las// rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o// 'thing kha 'bar ba'i yi ge che// rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las/ 
166a1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya gsal ba'i skur gsal ba'i// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du s+ho// sgrib pa kun spang sdig byed stobs// gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las// thams cad blo dbyangs yi ge gter// mam par
166a2(rnying rgyud): 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa// rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyags pa/ las 'di thams cad kun gyi mchog/ rgyal po rnam par rol pa'o// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog/ chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa// gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa
166a3(rnying rgyud): nang pa thams cad ma lus dbang du mdzad// sbyor dang skye dang bsdu ba yis// phyag rgya gsal bar dbang gis bskur// btsun mo dag dang mnyam du skyes// gnyis su med par 'khril ba yin// dbu ru yi ge gnyis par ldan
166a4(rnying rgyud): rin chen rigs kyi spro bsdu las// cod pa ni rigs lnga'i kha dog ste/ ci bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad+mo'i tshul// mnyam par gsal bsad dkyil 'khor yin// mi phyed pa yi/ 
166a5(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin gyis// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog/ pad+mo rigs kyi phyag rgyas gsal// rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgyar ga sal// mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin// gsal dag yid gnyis
166a6(rnying rgyud): med par bsgom// chu skyes 'jam pa 'og tu ldan// steng dang sprod pa'i rol mo yis// dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod pa bsham// 'di ltar gsal ba dbang yang rdzogs// thams cad bsdu ba zhes bya ba// de bzhin dang
166a7(rnying rgyud): ste las thams cad// dus gsum pa yi mdzad pa che// rigs kun 'dus par bde bar gshegs// mnyam pa ci bzhin ting 'dzin te// yi ge 'bru cig kun gyi mchog/ bshad par khyad par las kun rdzogs// chu
166a8(rnying rgyud): skyes gsal bar 'dab ma'i steng // gnyis su med par gsal bas na// rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis// 'dus par gsal bar skur gyur pa// 'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing // blo la yid gnyis med pas na// 
166b1(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya gsal bar rgyal ba'i sku// rgyal mo dang ni mnyam du skyes// ngabul gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan// sbyin pa rgya chen khebs pas na// rang gi 'dod pa'i gnasu bsdu// bong tshod lo grangs khyad par med// gnyisu med par
166b2(rnying rgyud): 'khril bar gsal// dus kun tu ni mnyam ldan pa// gsang ba mchod pa rab tu rdzogs// zla rgyas lta bur gtso bo sgom// chags pa med par 'dod bsdu yi// yum dang lhan cig sgom pa ni// A li kA li
166b3(rnying rgyud): byed pa'i don phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis// bde ba chen por tshul gnas pa// rgyal ba kun kyang de dang mthun// phyag rgya bsnol bar gnas pa yis// kun kyang sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro// phyag rgya
166b4(rnying rgyud): rjethal mo ni/ kun kyang yum gyi rgyab du bsnol// zhal gnyis mdze das par rab sbyar ba// zla gam pa yi ljags gnyis mdzes// dung dgi phur bus mkhur bcos la// 'debs shing rdeg pa'i tshul du bzhug/ 
166b5(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa// rgyal ba kun gyi sku yi mchog/ gzhan yang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzugs sgom// rnal 'byor da ka' thub chen po'i don// gsang ba spyod pa shin tu dgyes// gsang
166b6(rnying rgyud): ba nyid du sems can 'dren// thams cad kun gyi rmongs pa sel// yum gyi las kyis khyad par ni// sa yi rim pa kun sbyor zhing // zas dang mgo dbang med pa yi// nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa// byang chub
166b7(rnying rgyud): sems kyi char chen gyis// pad+mor bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad// dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste// rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin// phyag rgya chen mo mtshogs mchog ste// dga' ba don du rigs mchog yin/ 
166b8(rnying rgyud): myur bar rtag tu ma yang na// gdon mi za bar grub pa ni// 'dod khams lha yi nyin phyed kyis// gsang ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i don dang mnyam pa'i phyag rgya'o// kun tu bzang/ 
167a1(rnying rgyud): mo rnal 'byor mchog/ gsang ba yid kyis mkha' dbyings so// yi ge oM ldan tsheg drag bcas// rnal 'byor bde chen nyid kyis sras// gzugs khams lha tshogs byin brlabs te// phyag mtshan
167a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor lo gsal ba dang // bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs// gtso bo gser gyi kha dog gsal// nyi ma gser gyi 'od bzhin du// gsal ba 'tsher rab bcom ldan 'das// dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa la// 
167a3(rnying rgyud): rin chen myu gu khang pa 'bar// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis// legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po bzhugs tshul dang / ting 'dzin 'thun par 'gro la gzigs// pad+ma ge sar dbus gnas
167a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i thig le gsang ba bzhin dang ldan// mdun du lha mo chags pa mo// lo grangs nyi shu mdzes dang ldan// mahA su khe gnas la dgyes// mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang bcas/ 
167a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs tshul ni// gcol rten pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rgyab du lha mo dgyes chen mo// sangs rgyas bsnyen par mdzes tshul gyis// thal sbyar 'dzin pa sku brten pa// 
167a6(rnying rgyud): sku tshe bcu drug brtsan dmar sku// sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin tshangs par sbyor// 'dod chags can la mthun par mdzad// g.yas su zhe sdang 'dul ba mo// rdo rje pad+mo sbyor la dgyes// ma dad pa rnams dbang med par/ 
167a7(rnying rgyud): drag po sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sel// chags pa chen po bcom ldan 'das// gnyis su med pa sbyor ba yi// stong pa med par bstan pa'i tshul// sngo sangs mdog ldan khyad par che// sku tshad bco lnga chags pa can/ 
167a8(rnying rgyud): dus mtha' med par sbyor la dgyes// steg dang sgeg pa'i cha lugs kyis// sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal 'khru// rab tu smras pa'i 'gog pa rnams// bslangs nas rgyal ba'i sras su mdzad// a rta ma li brin
167b1(rnying rgyud): las kyis 'thams cad byang chub chen po mdzad// mig gnyis 'dzum dang sbom po yis// dbang mor ldan par byas pa na// gnyisu med par sbyor 'dod yin// sna'i rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin// ma ta bzhugs par
167b2(rnying rgyud): brtson byas pa'o// so so rnams bsdams kha bye ba// dus la bab ces bya ba ste// ting 'dzin gsal bar gyur pa na// dus la bab ces bya ba yin// 'di ltar brda ldan ting 'dzin la// dam can bud med rnam
167b3(rnying rgyud): mi 'dud/ dngos grub mi thob dam tshig nyams// tshe rabs kun tu brlag par 'gyur// 'di ltar brtson par byed pa na// g.yon pa skyed pa rnam bzhi yis// skyes pa na chung tshul bzhin du// rdo rje pad+ma'i
167b4(rnying rgyud): mtshams nyid du// dbyings byugs lnga yi sbyor ba yis// ngal pus dal bus gzhug pa dang // dal bus dal bus rab bsku la te// drag po tshig gi spro ba dang // byang chub sems kyis pad+ma/ 
167b5(rnying rgyud): dgang sbom po dbang ngam lnga rnams kyis// yum gyis blang sa la gtsol mchod// nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs te// bste na pa che chung rdzogs par sgom// byang chub sems kyi dkyil
167b6(rnying rgyud): 'khor las/ mchod pa brgyad kyis mchod par ston// de ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang // gnyis su med par lugs bzhin du// mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul du stan// dus gsum kun gyi gdung 'dzin
167b7(rnying rgyud): la/ g.yon phyogs sten pa'i skal dang ldan// na tshod lo ni bcu drug pa// sdong po rul ba dag la dgyes// g.yas pa zur gyi spyan gyis gzigs// dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol la brtson// rdo rje rab tu
167b8(rnying rgyud): sgrogs byed ma// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu brgyan can// mngon du sbyor la rab brtson pa// brda' dang bcas par gar gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma// byang chub sems kyi sprin chen gyis// 
168a1(rnying rgyud): mchod pa chen po rab mchod mnyes// sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas pa// dus gsum 'khor lo bskor bar bskul// so sor chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni// mnyes dang bcas pa'i
168a2(rnying rgyud): gar gyis mchod 'de nas gsang ba chen po dang gnyis su med par 'khril ba chen por gyur te/ g.yon pa skyed pa mang pos mnyes pa dang // pad+ma spang ba la sogs pa 'byung ba mnyes par mdzad nas rab tu dgye
168a3(rnying rgyud): te glu 'di blangs so// chos kun dngos po med par rab gsal ba// 'byung nas chen po ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen// e ma'o ngo mtshar che'o zhes blangs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje
168a4(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' gsungs pas/ mdangs bzang mig gi dkyus kyang ring // sku ni ldem la tsan dan dri// yan lag lcug ma'i bzhi dan du mnyen// tshems dkar sum cu rdo rngo med// 'gul pa
168a5(rnying rgyud): zlum rings rab tu legs// gser la g.yu spras g.yasu 'khyil / gzungs ma 'di dag sten par bya// skad gdangs mi snyan ra/  bo// yang na rmongs pagasung sub po// sbrang bus brtseg pa'i
168a6(rnying rgyud): sna sgra bzhin/ sems can dag la khro zhing 'tshog/ dam can dag la g.yel bar mdzod// phyi nang sra zhing 'bras bu can// de bsnyen na ni dngos grub nyams// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// bud
168a7(rnying rgyud): med kun gyi sgyu ma la// rab tu 'phrul te 'char ba yin// bden gnyis so sor snang ba yis// yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs// ma nor lam chen kun bsgoms nas// kun tu bzang mo bsgoms
168a8(rnying rgyud): pas grub bud med la ni mchod bstan na// ye shes chen po grub par gsungs// dpal kun tu bzang po thams cad shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so// sngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa 'di// phan tshun
168b1(rnying rgyud): du ni dga' spyad na// rnal 'byor bsdom pa gnas pa yin// de la mchod pa dam pa ni// sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste// kun tu khyab par kun tu sbyor// rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog/ de byi dkar shams mdog
168b2(rnying rgyud): dang ldan// bcu drug bong tshod ring ba dang // lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste// lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang // dpral bar dbyas che kos sgo phra// nu ma chung zhing sor ma ring // yid tsam mig
168b3(rnying rgyud): dkyus ring ba dang // so dkar thags pa'ang mtshams thung zhing // skal bzang mdangs dang ldan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste// 'di la btson par byed pa ni// rigs kyi rdo rje gdon
168b4(rnying rgyud): mi za/ tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur// gnas rab bde na par rab rtags te// sha dkar mdangs bzang mdog da snga/ da lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can// so dkar thags bzang mig
168b5(rnying rgyud): dkyus ring skad pra mdog dgod spro ring ba// dpral dbyes la sogs bzang gnas pa// rma na ga la sogs gnas pa ni/ rtag tu chos la 'dud pa yin// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rin chen
168b6(rnying rgyud): las 'di las brtson byas bsgrubs pa yi// de bzhin rigs kyi ting 'dzin las// phan tshun du ni dga' spyod na// tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor
168b7(rnying rgyud): spyod pa dga' ba ni// sbyor ba brtson pas 'grub par gsungs// bud med cha lugs legs pa ni// bong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing // rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba// mig legs ngo zlam rtsan
168b8(rnying rgyud): dmar che// blun du chags pa mi shes med// lus la mtshan gyi rmad 'dras brgyan// tshig gsal rmi lam nyung ba dang // so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan// cho ga shes pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i mkha'
169a1(rnying rgyud): la nyi zla'i 'od// rdo rje pad+mor ldan byas te// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// 'dod pa'i khams lha'i skad cig gis// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// lus zlum gtum pa nga rgyal can// 
169a2(rnying rgyud): khong na sems rnog sems la 'dzin// bya ba 'dra ba mi gtong ldan// bslab pa'i blo rtul sha rus che// mdangs bkrag brtags na phyi phyir gsal// sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dang // rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis
169a3(rnying rgyud): bag chags yi ge tshar gcad cing // ting 'dzin blol gsal ba na// bsgrub pa'i dus la bab pa ste// de tshe rab tu brtson pa yis// yum gyi pad+ma kha bya zhing // bde ba thugs kyi 'phro 'du yis// phan tshun du ni dag
169a4(rnying rgyud): spyad ni/ rigs kyi rin chen grub pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la thob par la gyur// thugs rje mdzad spyong bye brag gis// 'jig rten dag na dadaman pa'i rigs// rab tu bkug ste dga' spyad na// snying rje mchog
169a5(rnying rgyud): dang thabs ldan pa'i// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po gsungs// shan pa/ 'i rigs ngan rmad 'tsheng ma'i// na ba'i rigs dang 'dod spyod rnams// 'joms pa chen po'i ting 'dzin gyis// myur du spyad na
169a6(rnying rgyud): 'grub par gsungs// yi dgas gnod sbyin byol song dang // khyi dang ru sbal spre'u la sogs// mi dang lha yi gnas mchog kun// so so mtsham pa dga' spyad na// las mchog dam pa 'grub par gsungs// rab tu
169a7(rnying rgyud): chags la chags pa'i mchog/ rab tu rmugs pa rmugs pa sel// zhe sdang can la mtsham par ston// grags pa can la zhi ba che// brtson pa dag la brtson par mdzad// thabs kyis mdzad pa kun gyi mchog
169a8(rnying rgyud): sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// phyin ci log tu gang spyod rnams// 'dul bar mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med// shin tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis// gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad
169b1(rnying rgyud): shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis// grags pa can rnams dbang du mdzad// shin tu mdangs ldan che lugs kyis// chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad// e ma'o shin tu ngo mtshar che// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal
169b2(rnying rgyud): 'byor chen pos rab tu brtson par mdzad pa/ yid kyis 'phro ba dang / zla gam med pa dang / gyad 'gyed pa dang / khur ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyod do// sha mdog dkar la nu ma 'bur// stong smad phyed
169b3(rnying rgyud): la smin kyus ring / pad+ma'i dri yang dung ltar 'phro// pad+ma legs pa gro bos 'dra// zlum la che chung snyoms pa'o// sha mdog dkar la sme ba can// stod smad phyed la sor mo ring // nu ma chung zhing mkhrang ba ste/ 
169b4(rnying rgyud): dri yang pad+ma'i dri ru bro// 'gul pa legs la ring thung ran// pad+ma dam/ daral mkhur tshod legs// spyan yang zlum la 'og nas lta// sha mdog ser la nu ma zlum// rked pa pri la ro smad zlum// rkang
169b5(rnying rgyud): nga'i sor mo nang du sbyor// lus kyang legs la che chung snyoms// mas kyang dmar la thags kyang dam// sor mo rnams kyang phra la ring / dri yang tsan dan dri ru bro// yan lag lcug ma bzhin du gnyen/ 
169b6(rnying rgyud): pad+ma ser la phra la ring // spyan yang phra la zur du gzigs// sha mdog gnag la sme ba gnag/ sha yang gnag la rtsu ba pa ste// skad mdangs mi snyan gnyis ra ro// rmongs la mi shes sub sub mo// nu mdog che la
169b7(rnying rgyud): nu bshal ring // rkang pa sbom la sor mo thung // gdong yang lab la sme ba mthug/ smin ma thung la mig mi sdug/ lus po sbom thung 'jing pa thung // pad+ma gnag la yangs pa ste// ba lang can gyi rigs ces bya'o// / 
169b8(rnying rgyud): gzugs ma mtshan dang ldan pa btsal ba'i don ni rang dbang thob pa nga lo yang / bcos su btub la lung nyan pa// skad gsal lta bas thag chod pa// spyod pa la dor rtog pa choms// yid gzhungs blo rno dbang po
170a1(rnying rgyud): gsal/ sems dag gzhung bzang zhal ngo rtag/ dam tshig phog las mi 'da' ba// tshig la rdzun gyi gron theb med// dad pa skyo dang dub pa med// spyod pa blang zhing dor ba med// brtson 'grus thang dang / 
170a2(rnying rgyud): lhod pa med 'ango tsha shes dang khrel yod pa// gom pa dal la spyod pa gzob// mig 'bru tshugs su mi lta zhing // 'og dang zur gyis rtog par lta// dbu lo 'jam la lhung lor 'khyil// spyan bkra phral kyus rang ba// sna
170a3(rnying rgyud): gzur zor la rgyud ma chad// ya yo nyag dang chad pa med// so dkar sum cu thags bzang la// kos sko sogs bu yul gzungs 'dra// mdog sdug dkar dmar mdangs phyed pa// rked phan chag gang zlum
170a4(rnying rgyud): ba dang mgul pa zlum la phra la ring // dang mo bya yi tshul dang bad dra// sna zlum blta mdzes chung ba dang // phyag gi sor mo phra la daring // rna ba gro ba bcus pa 'dra// lce ni dar blta ba khug pa bzhin/ 
170a5(rnying rgyud): dbugs rgyu phyi nang med pa 'dra// gnyid chung sha yang sdud pa med// kha snabs med la dri zhim pa// sna tshogs spos dri lus la bro// bskyod par mkhas shing las la dpa'// sbyor drod rig dang
170a6(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin rig pad+ma dam la spyod na dog/ nu ma dag ni chung la sra// kha mchu srab la bzang ba'o// lha'i sbyor ba cog pu/ mi'i gan rgyal/ yi dgas zur gyis sbyor/ byol song kha sbub tu sbyor ro// gzugs ma
170a7(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang ldan pa rnams la zhag zla'i tshad bzung ste// dam du bcas nas mchod dus mi chag par phyi nang mi bsre// dam bcas pa la ma rtogs pa gzhan dang sbyar bar mi bya'o// gzhan du sbyor ba byas na dam las 'das te/ mangs
170a8(rnying rgyud): gyi srin gu ba dmar du skye'o// dam las ma 'das bka' bzhin du bsrungs na/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o// gzungs ma 'di dag dang bka' 'thun par bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med do// 
170b1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i lha mo mchod pa'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems
170b2(rnying rgyud): dpas ru lu'i bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// zhugs nas nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ru lu chos nyid du shes pa ni oM la dpal chen po yab lnga la yum khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga yang skul
170b3(rnying rgyud): rdzogaso// de nyid lta bas srin por song gis dogs nas ye shes lngar bstan to// a ltar snang ba chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes/ zla tshes me long lta bu'i ye shes/ rna ru so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ ma mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes/ a las
170b4(rnying rgyud): brtags par bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes yab yum rnams kyang dede bzhin du sbyar/ chos thams cad ma byung ma skyes pa'i nga dal skye ba'i cho 'phrul bstan to// ru lu dkyil 'khor du shes pa ni bu
170b5(rnying rgyud): po lnga rigs lnga 'byung ba lnga yum lnga khams dang skye mched byang chub sems dpa' dang sems ma dang sprul pa ldum dral phung po lnga he ru ka lnga 'byung ba lnga khrag 'thung rgyal mo lnga/ khams dang skye mched
170b6(rnying rgyud): phra men bcu drug/ sgal tshigs dbang phyug ma nyi shu rtsa brgyad/ ba spu nyag ma re re sprul pa'i phra men ma dang pho nya/ yan lag sgo ba bzhi/ sprul pa thugs kyi rgyan te/ sngags ma hA yo ga'o// dkyil 'khor la
170b7(rnying rgyud): yang phyogs dang gral ma nor bar dgod do// sgo skyong yan chad rims bzhin du dgod/ ru lu lhar shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na sangs rgyas yin par shes par
170b8(rnying rgyud): bya'o// ru lu mchod par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems kyi don rtogs na/ bdag byang chub kyi sems mchod pas 'phags pa'i tshogs mnyes pa ste/ 'drangs shing tshim par 'gyur ro// tshim pas dngos grub
171a1(rnying rgyud): thob par 'gyur ro// ru lu bsnyen par shes pa ni bsnyen pa ni dpal chen po'i sku'o// nye ba'i bsnyen pa ni yum gro d+ha ga 'o// bsgrub pa ni phra men ma bcu drug/ bsgrub pa chen po ni 'di ltar bsgrubs pas/ 
171a2(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu drod rnam pa gsum dang sbyar ro// 'od kyi drod ni bdag bsgrub pa byed pa'i dus su bdag gi lus la 'od byung ba ni drod dang po dang sbyar ro// 'don pa'i drod ni bdag bsgrub par byed pa'i dus su bdag gi lus bal 'dab
171a3(rnying rgyud): g.yengs pa ltar byed na drod 'bring po dang sbyar ro// drod kyi drod ni bdag gi sems tag tag rang rang na mkhar 'phur snyam byed na tha ma dag sbyar ro// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ don dam
171a4(rnying rgyud): par bsnyen pa ni byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang po'i nye ba'i bsnyen dpa ni byang chub kyi sems kun tu bzang mo'o// de la gnyis su med pa ni bsgrub pa/ rgyu byang chub kyi sems skye ba med pa'i dbyings
171a5(rnying rgyud): las ma g.yos la 'bras bu kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems phyag rgya sna tshigs cir snang yang sgyu ma ye shes kyi phyag rgya tsam du snang / snang tsam nyid na rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka ste/ rgyu 'bras ro gcig
171a6(rnying rgyud): pa'i byang chub kyi sems shes par bya ste/ thig le chen po'i ngang du ye nas ma bcos par lhun gyis grub par gnas pa ni lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub kyi sems zhes bya ste/ bsgrub pa chen po'o// ru lu sgrar shes pa ni
171a7(rnying rgyud): byi khung na bung ba chen po'i skad tsam rang gi rna bas thos pa las ma gtogs pa gzhan gyis tshor bar mi bya'o// ru lu dbyangs su shes pa ni/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis 'dren stengs kyi/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho thugs dam bskul rdo rje srin
171a8(rnying rgyud): po ngur sgra yis// khams gsum ma lus dbang du sdud// mkhun cing gdung ba'i sgra dbyangs kyis// ma dang mkha' 'gro thugs dam bskul// khong kun 'dren pa'i gdung dbyangs kyis// ke'u ri brgyad kyi thugs dam bsku
171b1(rnying rgyud): mjung ba dugs kyi chung byin gyis// seng gdong la sogs thugs das bskul// sngags kyi mig 'brung rnas pa yis// ji tshig la skang mdang sa med// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi bzlas pa 'di sasu
171b2(rnying rgyud): dam tshig ye shes dpa' 'bar ma// oMni sku gsung thugs kyi dang // duni gi ba brjid 'phrul po che// lu ni yum chen dang la 'bar ma// byon ma sring rgya mtsho tshogs// ru lu gser phreng rgya mtsho ste// par smos pas
171b3(rnying rgyud): ni su la dzis// slar bsdus pas ni thugs pa dzim// oM mus ru lu su~M d+d+hong+ku// rdu las rdo ji rje lngab pa las pad+mar gyur pa'i dngus// ma lanyis 'i dkyil 'khor bsam// ga ta pa la sogs pa la// skul bdag na
171b4(rnying rgyud): rdul bzhin du bsnyen pa dag ni nye bsten pa'o// bsgrub pa dang ni bsgyu chen po// yum ni pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde bathugs kyi dkyil 'khor sngo// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus la// dgyes
171b5(rnying rgyud): mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// stong gsum stong gi 'dzin/ rten na// sku yi sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de yang dpal chen nyid kyi sku// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// gsung gi sprul pa
171b6(rnying rgyud): mi khyab/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gsung // stong gsum stong gi 'jog rten na// thugs kyi sprul pa bsam mi khyab// de yang dpal chen nyid kyi thugs// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// shar phyogs stong gi
171b7(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten na/ kun kyang badz+ra he ru kar byin gyis brlabs nas// badz+ra he ru ka'i dngos grub dus 'dir stsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// lho phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// kun kyang rang na he rur byin
171b8(rnying rgyud): brlabs nas// rang na he ru ka'i dngos grub dus 'dir stsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// nub phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// kun kyang pad+ma he rur byin brlabs nas// pad+ma he ru ka'i dngos grub dus 'dir stsol/ 
172a1(rnying rgyud): stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// byang phyogs stong gi 'jig rten na// kun kyang kar ma he rur byin brlabs nas// kar ma he ru ka yi dngos grub dus 'dir stsol// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// gnas ra
172a2(rnying rgyud): gnas ni bsam mi khyab// dur khrod chen po gnas kyi mchog/ bde ba chen po gnas kyi mchog/ yum gyi mkhar dbyings gnas kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi gnas// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// zas rab zas ni bas
172a3(rnying rgyud): mi khyab// rdo rje dri chen zas kyi mchog/ rdo rje ga bur zas kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi rnam lnga zas kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi zas// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// skom rab skom ni bsam mi khyab// rag tu dri chu skom gyi
172a4(rnying rgyud): mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi skom// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// sgyogs rab skyogs ni bsam mi khyab// ban d+ha gsar snyi sgyogs kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi sgyogs// stong gsum stong
172a5(rnying rgyud): gi 'jig rten na// yab rab yab ni bsam mi khyab// kun tu bzang po la ba kyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yab// stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten na// yum rab yum ni bsam mi khyab// kun tu bca
172a6(rnying rgyud): mo yum gyi mchog/ de yang dpal chen nyid kyi yum// oM ru lu 'di ni sku yi sku// ru lu 'di ni sku yi gsung // ru lu 'di ni sku yi thugs// ru lu 'di ni gsung gi sku// ru lu 'di ni gsung gi gsung // ru lu 'di ni gsung gi thugs
172a7(rnying rgyud): ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi sku// ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi gsung // ru lu 'di ni thugs kyi thugs// skur gsal gsung gsal thugs kyi gsal// sku don gsung don thugs kyi don// ru lur ma gyur gang yang med// stong khams
172a8(rnying rgyud): thams cad ru lus bkang // ru lu dngos grub dus 'dir gsol// ru lu dngos su snang ba ni// de nyid ma skyed pa ni gsung // snang ba dang ma byung ba gnyi su med pa ni thugs so// ru lu sku gsum gsung gsum thugs gsum
172b1(rnying rgyud): dgu thugs kyi don to// oM ru lu ru lu hU d+yo hUM/ oM ni dpal chen he ru ka yang yum mo// ru lu gongam brgyad ni ke'u rim brgyad// ru lu 'og ma brgyad ni sing nam brgyad// spu ni slo ba yang yus brgyad// skyo ni dbang phyug ma nyi Tu cwa
172b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad// hUM ni sdud pa byang chub sems// lha re re la snying po grangs brgya rtsa brgyad dbul lo// khro bo rnams ni kro d+ha ni ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ de bzhin ga / 
172b3(rnying rgyud): pa thams cad kyi khro gnyer snying po chen po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM badz+ra b+hI s+phu Ti ma hA kro dA ma/ ha na ha na/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ma ra ma ra/ ban dza ban dza/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hUM druM/ bri bri/ 
172b4(rnying rgyud): pra ma ya pra ma ya/ bidan sarba ba ra na sarba duSh+TAM/ ma ta ma ta/ me ta mo ta/ hU bri tatraM/ bri hU traM traM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po pad+ma 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so/ 
172b5(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje thugs ka nas phyung ngo // pad+ma dza la ma hA kro d+ha pad+ma ba mu ka kha kha/ sarba duSh+TaM/ kha ti/ kha ti/ sarba dus+t+ra ba/ dusta nam/ dam da ma/ badz+ra sho da ka/ ta mtha
172b6(rnying rgyud): mthaHkre d+ha kro d+ha/ badz+ra kha ra tsa/ ba la du ru/ ga be ga tra sa ya tra sa ya ma hA badz+ra pa da ba mu ka/ pra ma pra ma hUM phaT/ ti ha ha ti ha ti/ tsa tur mu ka/ ba pran sha na hUM hri/ hUM hUM hUM hriM/ rdo rje chen po 'jig byed ces bya ba'i khro ba
172b7(rnying rgyud): chen po'i snying po 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs ye shes kyi snying ka nas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra be ka ma hA kro d+ha sarba duSh+TAM/ sa ma ya bak+Sha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ badz+ra sa kA hA na hA na hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po thams cad
172b8(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen po mngon par sprul nas mche ba chen po 'khyil cing zhal mi sdug pa/ spyan stong pa/ nyi ma chen po stong gi gzi brjid can rab tu za bar byed pa'i mdog sngon po'i sku/ dur khrod chen po'i dpal chen gyi phyag cha mi'i
173a1(rnying rgyud): keng rus khrag dang sha dang lung pa dang rkang dang tshil rnams zas su gsol ba/ mi'i lhag pa rnams g.yogs te bsdams pa mi mgo'i phreng ba dbu la 'dzin pa/ seng ge dang / glang po dang / khong bu dang
173a2(rnying rgyud): rnga mo dang / ma he dang phag dang / lce sbrang dang ra dang khyi dang 'ug pa dang / bya rog dang gzhad dang byi ba dang gzig dang stag la sogs pa khro bo'i byol song gi gdong la sogs pa brgya stong mang po rang gi ba spu'i bugan byung ste/ dkyi
173a3(rnying rgyud): 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis shar phyogs 'jigs byed 'dul ba/ zhal rnam par bsnyen pa/ 'jig pa lta bu'i spyan dang / zhal rdo rje mche ba cher gartsigs pa/ 'jigs par byed pa'i khro bo chen po brgya stong gi g.yog
173a4(rnying rgyud): dang / shar phyogs dkyil 'khor du 'khyil bar gyur te gnas so// lho phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du khro nyer can mang po brgya stong ga/ yog dang bcas par gnas so// nub phyog su yang rta gdong khro bo chen po
173a5(rnying rgyud): brgya stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gnaso// byang du yang 'ur 'ur/ chen po khro bo brgya stong mang po g.yog dang bcas te gan so// bcom ldan 'das shin tu khro bo chen po'i tshogs brgya stong mang pos
173a6(rnying rgyud): bskor nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor na bzhugs te/ he ru ka'i khro bo'i tshogs chen po de dag dang / khro bo chen po brgya stong mang po'i ri rab kyi rdul phran dang mnyam pa bskyed byung nas na mkha'i dbyings rab 'byams thams cad
173a7(rnying rgyud): / snang bar byas te/ stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad gang bar byas so// shin tu dgyes pa'i khri chen po khri'i tshogs rnam la bka' stsal pa/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na mash+tsa no Da badz+ra pA NA ye/ ma hA yak+Sha sa
173a8(rnying rgyud): na pA ta ye/ tad ya thA/ oM b+ho b+ho/ ma hA ba re ba dar ba/ ma hA d+hi/ ha ra ha ra/ grih+Na grih+Na/ ma ra ma ra/ ban dza ban dza/ k+Shi kra na ma hA badz+ra tsan Da d+ha/ sarba duSh+TAM duku/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ma tha ma tha hUM phaT/ 'di gsung/ 
173b1(rnying rgyud): ma thag tu 'jigs byed chen po dbul bar byed pa/ rang gi sku na mkha'i dbyings kyi tshul du byed do// khro bo brgya stong mang po zhal rnam par bsnyer ba mche ba gtsigs pa/ 'khyil cing bsgyur ba phyag brgya stong mang po la
173b2(rnying rgyud): mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ zhal brgya stong mang po me lce bzhin du 'bar ba'i sku/ oM ma hA badz+ra ad/ ha sa ha sa/ ha ha ha hUM hA/ oM ti oM ma hA/ be ra ba be/ shing shing / tra tra tr-i traM/ ha ha i ti/ de nas
173b3(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed chen po 'dul bar byed pa'i khro bo des he ru ka'i nga ro 'byin cing mgo bo nas mnan to// rdo rje he ru ka'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyi mthu chen pos 'jigs byed chen po'i nga ro 'byin cing sgyu ma'i sbu gu grangs nas khrag
173b4(rnying rgyud): dang rus pa dang rkang rnams za zhing chem che ma mdzad pas/ de'i 'khoraT la rab tu ston par mdzad/ ma mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang sgren mor byas te sma phab nas he ru ka'i tshogs chen po'i mthu dang gzi
173b5(rnying rgyud): brjid bskyed nas 'khor thams cad thul skyabs 'og tu ya/ nga btsud nas dam tshig la gnas te yang dag par bzhug/ sa so// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo drug po'i bzhad pas bzhad
173b6(rnying rgyud): cing / oM badz+ra b+h+ri ku Ti ha na ha na/ grih+Na gr-i h+na/ ma ta ma ta/ krin tsa ri ya/ si su ra ma hA sa/ sra ti ri ke ba su ra dza la na la re che pra ti dza la te/ ma sur ti/ a ka Ta a ka Ta/ a pya wa/ a pya wa/ kris+t+ra tsakra ber/ 
173b7(rnying rgyud): brtid ya hUM bri/ de nas khrag 'thung gi sngags/ oM badz+ra sur b+hi ku Ti/ khro ta ma hA kri he/ dar ba dar ba/ su ra dur ti/ oM sa me dang ma ni can/ oM pra bra bi bri ba/ de nas rta gdong gi khro bo chen po'i sngags/ badz+ri/ 
173b8(rnying rgyud): / oM ma hA dz+ra bad/ ba mu ka/ kha ba/ khA hi khA hi/ tsa dur mu kang / ba ba bi ba/ a ru ti ra ma/ ma kAr+ya hrid yan/ dran/ dam de'u/ badz+ra ba da pa mu ka/ hi hi/ sha hi/ sha ma hA she sha hi hi/ de nas rdo rje chen po'i ja ga can/ 
174a1(rnying rgyud): po mdzad cing bzhug so// bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen pos khros pa dang bcas pa'i lta bas gzigs te/ oM gu lu gu lu badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha a kar Sham/ a kar Sha ya/ sha kra hri d+ha ya na ma hA badz+ra dang star/ 
174a2(rnying rgyud): hUM k+Sha ya shring / de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po rnal 'byor pa rnams dang rol cing / rang gi shin tu dgyes pa'i kun tu longs spyod pa'i khro bo chen po'i dkyil 'khor du bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
174a3(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad 'du bar mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskal bar mdzad do// oM ma hA su ra ta/ badz+ra ma hA kro d+ha pa sa ho ra/ sarba kro d+ha ma sha ma sha/ pra sha ma pra sha ma/ sarba kro d+ha u sma/ kro d+ha ba ba sa/ 
174a4(rnying rgyud): ma ya ma hA ma dra le sta ma ya/ sarba dustA pra dusta pra dusta/ kro d+ha ma pa da ba ya/ dza la ya sha kra ba dam/ bi sha ra ma ye/ sha ra ma hA/ b+ha gra ban/ su ra ti/ sarba ta thA ga tA sad na/ sa ma ye na tsa ho/ su ra ta/ 
174a5(rnying rgyud): sa ma i ti/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo chen po nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM dza hUM baM ho/ ta ka hUM dzan+d+ra ta ki hUM ta ki hUM/ oM ga ta she hUM dza/ a kar sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ 
174a6(rnying rgyud): ban d+ha ya/ bi shi ku ru/ sarba kro d+ha sa ma ya/ dza hU ya hi/ ta ki hUM dza dza hU~M/ ta gi hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo chen po 'di phyung ngo // oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi'i khro bo'i dbang
174a7(rnying rgyud): mo phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi bA ri/ ud tsa badz+ra a mr-i ta stu a/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ma bdud rtsi chen mo 'di kun tu khros te/ ru lu ru lu zhes bya ba 'byin cing rang gi pad+mo la bcom ldan 'das kyi rdo rje bcug
174a8(rnying rgyud): su kyi ya dag par rlu 'i rigs gyu / ma'i mas pa can ma u su / khri tshig sa can 'a bdasas pa mi med kyi ga yo kyig dri zla dzin / 
174b1(rnying rgyud): kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA shwa ri sarba duSh+TAM/ su ta ni ma hA pra la ya na/ sma shan bi sha tsi/ ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha deSh+Tha ka ra le bi kri ta/ de ba na/ sarba sha du pra ma ni/ suM hUM ma ha kro d+ha ba ri hU~M phaT/ khro bo 'di

174b3(rnying rgyud): mu su dang / 'khor lo dang / ka na ya dang to ma dang / mda' dang / gzhu dang / shag ti dang / gri rnams phyag na 'dzin pa/ thod pa'i phreng ba mgul rgyan du byas nas nyi ma brgya'i me'i 'od 'dra ba'o// de'i dbus mdun du rdo rje khrag 'thung
174b4(rnying rgyud): chen po de dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang cha lugs 'dzin pa rigs pa 'dis pa/ zhag par bya'o// oM badz+ra ma hA d+ha ra/ ma hA kro d+hi sha ra~M/ ma hA sma sha ni/ bi sha ni la dza la ya/ ma hAs pra pra dza la ta/ mu di da ra/ 
174b5(rnying rgyud): ka ba la ma la/ bu shing / ma ku te/ ma ra ru ti/ ra dra ra pa/ tsi bu ri ta/ ka ba la ha sa te/ khA dang kha badz+ra/ tri shu la gan d+ha/ ma hA kr-i/ d+he/ hUM hU hUM hUM hUM hUM/ he hu ru ta mu ta pra ye hUM phaT// de nas bcom ldan
174b6(rnying rgyud): 'das khro bo chen po gzi brjid mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// rdo rje nyi ma nyid kyi khro bo nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM hUM traM a/ su r+ya badz+ra kro d+hi sha ri/ da ma da ma/ 
174b7(rnying rgyud): gra sa gra sa/ a sta ma hUM phaT/ aM hUM dr-i dra dra dra/ khro mo chen mo 'di lho phyogasu bzhag par bya ste/ gzi brjid chen mo rab gtong zhing // shin tu 'jig pa med bzhin 'bar// dpung pa bcu drug rno ba che// dpung rgyan thod
174b8(rnying rgyud): pa brtsigs pa byas// spyan ni rab dmar sngo bsangs mdog/ tshon cha sna tshogs bsnams par brtson// gdug pa thams cad cha byed cing // yi dgas chen po stag la zhon// rang gi g.yog gis mdun du bskor// de nas bcom
175a1(rnying rgyud): 'das pad+mo 'o bar 'phro ba'i 'od zer phreng ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ pad+mo'i khro ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // o hi badz+ra pad+ba ba mu ke/ kha / 
175a2(rnying rgyud): khA si bA hi/ ma sA ma ho dar/ bi ge be hUM/ he s+'uhU~M hUM hUM/ tsU tAha/ sha ti sha mtha ba/ badz+ra ba dpan la maho/ te te hU~M hUM tsihi hUM/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// 'di ni rgya du bzhag par bya// rnob
175a3(rnying rgyud): po zhal gsum pa// rta gdong gyen du ston pa ste// khro bo chen po dpung bcu drug/ rnam par bsgyur ba'i mi sdug gtong // mi lta stan la yang dag zhon// khrag mang po la 'thung byed pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/

175a6(rnying rgyud): dzAkro ta gra ma kha/ ma ha byi ga ru ba da ri ni/ sarba duswa pra sha ma ni/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ 'di nyid kyis ni tsi rigs par// rdo rje gdon mi za dkyil du// g.yag dang bcas pa rnam pa ban// sna tshogs dam tshig bzhag pa ste// sna tshogs pa dang / 
175a7(rnying rgyud): khyad par ldan// kun tu yongasu bskor nas gnas// bkyed pa dang ni btsum pa'i gdong // rab tu drag po'i ro byang zhing // gdong gnyer thod pas rtse mo byas// dpung pa bcu drug gis brgyan pa'i// khro mo chen mo gdung gsum la// tha byed/ 
175a8(rnying rgyud): mi bzhin lta ba yi// de yi bo thams cad kyi// g.yog ni rnam pa bzhi rnams kyang // rang gi phyag dang mtshan mar ldan// dpung ba brgyad dang ldan pa yi// de na chog ci bzhin du// 'byung po phyag rgya yang dag zhon// dur khrod bzhin du/ 
175b1(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed pa/ phyi yi rnal 'byor ma tshogs rnams// de dag kun du yongasu bskor// bzhag gam bri bar bya yang rung // de ni de yi stan la gnas// bzhin mi sdug la dpung bzhi mo// gdug pa'i khro mo rnam bsgyur bcas// de la so ga/

175b3(rnying rgyud): badz+ra a kar sha ni/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri sU dza dzadza hUM hUM hUM/ oM badz+ra d+ha ku la ma nur ki ni ma hA badz+ra kro d+hi shwa ri hU~M hu he phaT ho// oM sarba badz+ra d+hang ro gra ma hA kro d+ha hUM sa sa hU~M phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hi ha ma.a be sha ka sU drA hUM/ a/ 
175b4(rnying rgyud): sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA su ta pri ka ro ke dra tha ta tha/ e sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA bAHrihe ru ka ma hA kro d+ha shwa ri/ ma hA bi tsa yo tsa ra ba ye/ tsu tsU tsu dz+ra dru d+had tha oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha a ta gas ni/ hU tsU dring dring tr-i ta ya tra tra/ 
175b5(rnying rgyud): ya hU phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha bak+Sha ni hUM hU hUM/ bak+ShaHbak+Sha ya hU~M hri/ oM sarba badz+ra ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra badz+ra tig na kr-i ts+tshin ro chen d+ha tshin d+ha/ hU badz+ra tig sna ha ste/ tshad ya tshe da ya/ hU~M hU maH/

175b7(rnying rgyud): kha hUM hUM phaT ba/ oM sarba badz+ra ma hA d+ha ra ma ya ba de/ hu du hang hang hang / phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra yak+Shi ni hUM hUM/ kha ga khA hi khA hi/ a bi ba bI bI hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra pa na di ni ma hA kro d+hi ban d+ha ya ban
175b8(rnying rgyud): d+ha ya/ bi d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra had ni/ ma hA kro d+hi sha ri tsu hUM phaT/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra kro d+hi ma la ni/ hU~M hUM/ glu glu glu/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha gan dgas ni/ hUM hUM gr-i gr-i/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ri ma hA kro d+hi ga rims
176a1(rnying rgyud): mgo/ ka la da rini ti pa ya/ hod hod/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi ka ri ma hA la si hUM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hi sha ri ma le d+ha ra ni hUM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+har d+har ma hA kro d+h+r-i ga ti ni hUM hUM he he/ oM sarba badz+raH/ 
176a2(rnying rgyud): ram hA kro d+hi sha ri ni ri ti ke hUM/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+ha ma hA kar shi na/ dza dza nu hU dza/ oM sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA krod+ha d+ha ra ma hA badz+ra pa sha hA hUM hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA badz+ra kro d+hi/ ban d+he ban d+he ban d+hi ya ban d+ha ya hU ga/ 
176a3(rnying rgyud): sarba ta thA ga tA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he ba she hUM hUM hUM ho ho ho/ oM hUM traM hri ha/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje mkha' la 'gro ba thams cad kyi snying po 'di nyid sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA badz+ra
176a4(rnying rgyud): d+ha ra/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha grI ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha Ta ki ni/ ma hA ha ma pa ti rab hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma ri ri ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni hri sha mu ra ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra mu sti ni/ bi d+ya bi d+ya/ suM b+ha ni
176a5(rnying rgyud): suM b+ha hU~M phaT/ oM sarba Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha ra li hUM phaT/ oM sarbaHki ni ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha tsakra ni/ tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+raT/ ki ni ma hA mi thod pa ti ke hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni saM mya kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT
176a6(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra d+ha na te hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA ma ri ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA yA mr-i ta ka ba li ha ste hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA saM mya kro d+hi shwa ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ti mri bu dan da ri hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta
176a7(rnying rgyud): / ki ni badz+ra pri ga li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni pi pa pi pa ru ti ra ma ma hA badz+ra pa li hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra pa sha ba ba sha kA hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra sha ni pi phe hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra pi she
176a8(rnying rgyud): hu phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni a na la a na ya hU phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra be ga ni gu gu ma ya hUM Ta/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni badz+ra dza la ya/ basmiM ku ru hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA badz+ra mi ka te hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra rba kan
176b1(rnying rgyud): da ma ste rU \u0f7f/ oM gadz+rarba ki ni ma hA ba dz+ra ka li pre pe sha phra ba gcu phaT/ oM badz+raH ka ni mang sums gni nu paT/ oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ma hA kar sulaT/ oM badz+raT ki na ma hAka ra nan mi taka la mug cung nga nu
176b2(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra Ta ki ni ya bi sha ni hU~M phaT/ khro bo spyi'i bsnyen pa'i snying po 'di gsungs so// oM bahUM bi bi ta ro/ drasan ti ta/ yin she she/ sarba bi da na ya/ sarba ta thA ga tA dza le dza le/ pra dza le pra dza la/ gur
176b3(rnying rgyud): / gung bi k+Sha ma sa rngam padren tsu nu ts+tsha/ oM ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo nu/ bsnyen pa'i grangs brgya dang stang dang 'bum mo// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las gsang ba'i khro bar bsnyen par
176b4(rnying rgyud): le'u sde bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rol pa rdo rje khro bar ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thum
176b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje las 'di byung ngo // khro bo rdo rje mgyogs pa'i dbu lnga btsun ga/ phyag brgyan gnyis pa byung ste/ oM badz+radz+ra ki na mdzu / na te/ babapha/ oM dz+ra Te gnam sna gnas yi swA pa/ 
176b6(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra ma hA rak+Sha sa ma su ru ti/ ra ma ti/ da bri ya/ ma hA kum pa ka run/ tsAhUM hUM hUM/ k+Sha oM badz+ra ma hA rak+Sha/ a ga ta ya/ pra be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ sarba badz+ra ga la/ ba shin ba nad/ hUhUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra raH
176b7(rnying rgyud): ban da ya ban da ya/ bi sha ya bi sha ya/ bi bi sha na sarba na/ hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA ra sha sa/ ban da ya ban da ya/ sarba ma hA bi kri ta nan/ d+ha sha gri ba hUM phaT/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka'i sbrul
176b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i ting nge lan la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung nga bugs rje rjelas byung ngo // sdug nag sngon pa/  tsu hru na tsu hru/ kun+da tsu nu na na nu stsu/ u ma
177a1(rnying rgyud): / pa pa pha lalas sa la lag lapa phal pha la lal phal pa yal la sa la la la pa ga
177a2(rnying rgyud): wa wa phaT phaT baT phaT phaT/ l-i Ta phaT phaT biT phaT baT phaT/ phaT/ zhal re re nas cu dang lan kyi sgra mang po phyung bas/ khro 'bum dus gcig tu phyung ste/ su dang ban kyi sgra mang po 'byin cing / 
177a3(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams dus cig tu gang bar gyur te/ dregs pa thams cad brgyal bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa ma dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ 
177a4(rnying rgyud): ma dang mkha' 'gro ma 'bum chos kyi dbyings nas bzhengs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // ma mo dbum gyi rgyal mo dbyings nas bzhengs// khyod ni ye shes lha mo 'bum
177a5(rnying rgyud): gyi gco/ zhing lpags rlon pas sa gzhi 'gengs mdzad ma// zhing chen rlon pas g.yang bzhi ral pa can// gzigs lpags rlon pa stong gi sku smad klubs// sbrul nag 'bum gyis yan
177a6(rnying rgyud): lag rgyan du sgril// thod rlon thong skam tshal mgur chu dpung bud rgyan se ral kha// khyod kyi rdo rje the'u gshog g.yas pa las// ye shes lha mo tshogs ni brgya yang 'tshor// khyod kyi rdo rje the'u gshog g.yon pa
177a7(rnying rgyud): la// las byed lha mo brgyad cu gnas// nyin zhing brgya mtsho gting nas bzhugs pa'i tshe// klu rgyal 'bum gyi bkri shing mchod pa 'dul// mtshan zhing ri rab rtsel bzhugs pa'i tshe// gnod/ 
177a8(rnying rgyud): sbyin bu mo khyod kyi pho nyar gtong // bdud kyi bu mo 'khol zhing nga rgyal drag tu gnon// bshed mngon du gnyer zhing dgra snying tshal bar 'gas// gsur chen dung pas 'jig rten ma lus 'gengs// gachen
177b1(rnying rgyud): rol rngam zhing dpal chen zhal du stob// rang yang za zhing grogs la bdar bar byed// ma dang mkha' 'gro dbyings nas bskul bskyod la// las la 'khril zhing chos kyi dbyings su bstan// mkha' 'gro
177b2(rnying rgyud): za byed mgyogs ma gshog pa can// mkha' 'gro 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can// mkha' 'gro rngam pa'i zhal gdangs mche ba can// mkha' 'gro 'byung ba 'dzin pa'i sder mo can// mkha' 'gro khams
177b3(rnying rgyud): gsum rdum pa'i mchu rings ma// mkha' 'gro dug gsum za byed 'bar ba'i sku// las kyi mkha' la 'gro ba'i shugs can ma// don gyis mkha' la 'gro ba'i ye shes yum// de nas mkha' 'gro ma
177b4(rnying rgyud): brgyad dpal chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi las byed par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa ma dang mkha' 'gro ma de rnams dang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor ba rtse gcig ma'i ting
177b5(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin du mdzad do// 'dod chags zhes sdang gti mug gsum la skyes pa'i bdud bag chags kyi mtshams sbyar ti/ bdud ru tra nag po sems can dang rnal 'byor pa la 'tshe zhing
177b6(rnying rgyud): gnod par byed pa za bar byed pa de la bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pas pho nya'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // til mar sna tshogs kyis lus
177b7(rnying rgyud): bskus pa'i rdo rje mche ba can dang / nag mo mi thod thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ba can dang / rnal 'byor ye shes rdo rje dam tshig ma dang mgo bo gcod pan legs spras rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang / lag na
177b8(rnying rgyud): mtshon thogs pa'i rdo rje phreng ma dang / dgra bgeg dbang du bdud pa'i rdo rje g.yul zlog ma dang / sbrul gyi ska rag 'ching zhing lag na mdung thung ral gri thogs ma dang / zhing lpags rked pas dkris shing khrag gis
178a1(rnying rgyud): myos ma dang / mig rtsa dmar por gyur pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang / mtshan mo dur khrod du rgyu ba'i 'byung mo sgrol ma dang / korlon slang dkris thod pa seral khar thogs ma dang / mi ro rgyu mtshems/ 
178a2(rnying rgyud): kyis 'dren pa'i rdo rje bab mo dang / khrag gi thig les brgyan pa'i rdo rje tsher ma dang / zhing chung 'dzin pa'i rdo rje 'khrug ma dang / rdo rje zhag gi tshem bu can chen mo dang / rdo rje mtshigal che mchemaze ba'i ji
178a3(rnying rgyud): mche ba 'dzin ma dang / drag po 'dul ba'i rdo rje drag mo chen mo dang / ma mo skrag par byed pa'i khams gsum dbang du sdud ma dang / zhing la skam par byed pa'i rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dang / nag ma
178a4(rnying rgyud): lus mdog gnag pa'i rdo rje me stag 'brib mo dang / zas da khrag tshil za ba'i rdo rje srin mo dang / kun la dbang ma dzad rdo rje pad+ma 'dzin pa dang / zas su sha rlon za ba'i rdo rje rnga mo dang / 
178a5(rnying rgyud): e ma mtshogs rdo rje za byed ma dang / dpal ldan chen po rdo rje lcang lo can ma dang / kha nas rdo rje me 'bar rgya mtsho ska mas ma dang / lag na bdud rtsi rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / nag mo mig
178a6(rnying rgyud): gcig rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang / sbrul gyi zhags pa thogs pa'i rdo rje gshog pa can dang / lcags kyi bya khra khyung gi g.yu mig can dang / thal ba'i mtshan mas rdo rje 'byug ma dang / rdo rje ral gcig chen
178a7(rnying rgyud): mo za byed ma dang / rdo rje ji shul thogs pa'i zhag gi tshem bu can dang / 'tsham ngam drag shul spyod pa'i rdo rje sgrol ma dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje bdud 'dul mo dang / rnam par bsgyid
178a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i rdo rje gzugs can ma dang cir yang 'gyur ba'i rdo rje rdzu 'phrul can dang / khro gnyer spyan bgrang rnal 'byor sngo nag chen mo dang / mche ba gartsigs pa'i ral ba 'khyil ma dang / thaMd pa rlon pa'i rdo rje mun tsal/ 
178b1(rnying rgyud): dang / dbu gsum phyag drug rdo rje mi lpags g.yang gzhi gsol ba dang / stir chung ngu mang po brgyus nas brgyan te rdo rje brjid ma dang / 'tsham ngam brkyang bskum rdo rje'i 'jig rten skrag ma dang / bdud bzhi gnon pa'i
178b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ban dang ldan pa dang / stir chen glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang 'jig su rung ba'i rngubs pa'i rje'u chung thogs pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra can dang / log par lta ba'i rdo rje bdud rnams 'dul ba dang / 
178b3(rnying rgyud): rol rngam pa'i rdo rje zab mo dang / gsod cing sbyong ba'i rnal 'byor sngo nag ma dang / khro gnyer spyan dgrang rdo rje mche gtsigs ma dang / 'tshang ngam chen mo mdzad pa'i tri bul mda' 'phen rdo rje 'gengs ma dang / dgyes/ 
178b4(rnying rgyud): bar byed pa'i rdo rje se gol rdebs ma dang / 'gugs par byed dpa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor dmar nag 'jigs pa'i sku dang / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yum chen mo dang / rnal 'byor chen mo dur khrod bdag
178b5(rnying rgyud): mo dang / 'tshang ngam gar mkhan chen mo rdo rje stabs tshul can ma dang / rnal 'byor 'thing nag rdo rje stir chen zab mo da / bdud bzhi 'joms pa'i rdo rje gdug pa glad 'gengs ma dang / 
178b6(rnying rgyud): gsod pa'i las la dgyes pa'i khro mo rdo rje ljang ma dang / khro gnyer 'jigs pa'i dbu gcig phyag drug ma dang / rdo rje tri shul rnge'u 'dzin pa'i rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs ma dang / 'ching zhing sdom pa'i rnal 'byor ser
178b7(rnying rgyud): nag dang / gtum mo zhe sdang stir chen za ba mo dang zhing chen nang grol 'byin cing rdo rje 'tsham ngam can dang / sgrol bar byed pa'i rdo rje 'thing nag dang / spyan bgrad mche gtsigs rdo rje chen mo dang / stir 'dren pa'i rdo rje khrag
178b8(rnying rgyud): 'thung zhal du stobs ma dang / spu gris 'debs pa'i rdo rje ban dar ldan ma dang / zangs gris 'debs shing kha T+wAM ga 'phen pa'i rdo rje sha za mo dang / rol skam pa'i rdo rje za stangs chen mo dang / rdo rje ser nag seng ge mgos
179a1(rnying rgyud): mche ba gtsigs spyan gsum 'jig pa'i rdo rje sdeng mig can dang / mam tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i rdo rje'i sdang 'joms ma dang / 'bring nag rdo rje seng ge ral pa can dang / rdo rje ye shes sku'i cha lugs
179a2(rnying rgyud): 'chang ma dang / mi 'jigs sti ra'i g.yang gni gsol ma dang / srog chags mang po'i snying 'byin rdo rje glang 'gems ma dang / dmar me chen mo ster mgo can dang / ye shes lnga'i rdo rje cha lugs 'chang ma dang / mi 'jigs bzhi'i ga
179a3(rnying rgyud): gzhi se ral khar thogs ma dang / bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong zhing las mdzad ma dang / band rag tas bkang nas gcol stobs shing dgra sdang glang 'gems ma dang / gsod byed sngon ga dur bya'i mgo can dang
179a4(rnying rgyud): mche tshogs 'khor du bskor zhing 'dod chags 'joms pa'i rdo rje zab dmo dang / thal chen rag tas rdo rje sku la brgyan ma dang / spug+sa dmago gcod pa nang 'thung zhing gsod la dga' ba mo dang / rdo rje nags pa
179a5(rnying rgyud): 'ching zhing khrag 'thung zhal du stob pa dang / 'thing nag 'gying ste bas rdo rje shA na khyi mgo can dang / glo snying 'dren pa'i rdo rje/ lcags kyu 'dzin ma dang / phra dog 'joms par byed pa'i rdo rje za ba dang / 
179a6(rnying rgyud): dmar nag 'gying pa'i bya rgod mgo can dang / zhing chen rgyu 'dren gti mug 'joms par byed ma dang / gshog tshogs mang pos bskor ba'i thod rlon 'dzin ma dang / ser nag 'gying ba'i pho rog mgo can dang / klu rnams
179a7(rnying rgyud): 'dum par byed pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya 'chang ma dang / 'thing nag 'gying ba bya rog mgo can dang / ser nag gsod par byed pa'i mgo can dang / sha khrag za ba'i mkha' 'gro dbu gsum ma dang / lcag kyu 'dren pa'i mi
179a8(rnying rgyud): 'jigs sbyor ba dang / rdo rje bka'i lo na spyan gsum mche ba can dang / rdo rje bran mo gtum bag can dang / 'jigs pa'i gzugs can rdo rje khrag 'thung ma dang snying rje pag gi mgo can dang / rdo rje sbrul gyi
179b1(rnying rgyud): gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje gcig gi mgo can dang / rdo rje byi ba'i mgocan dang / rdo rje ba pang mgo can dang / rdo rje dred kyi mgo can dang / rdo rje dom gyi mgacan dang / rjerje sdig pa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje chu'i mgo can dang / 
179b2(rnying rgyud): sdug gi mgo can dang / rdo rje na'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sbrang gu'i mgo can dang / rdorde bu bshud kyi mag can dang / rdo rjeg pa'i mgo can dang / rdorje sbyin gyi gcan dang / rdo rje lag gi mgocan dang / rdo rje rjemam
179b3(rnying rgyud): mgo can dang / rdo rje bya rog mgo can dang / rdo rje srang ti'i mgo can dang / rdo rje ske ka'i mgo can dang / rdo rje khwa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje spre'u mgo can dang / rdo rje khu byug mgo can dang / rdo rje seng ge'i mgo can da
179b4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje pa bang gi mgo can dang / rdo rje sha ba'i mgo can dang / rdo rjesrin bya'i mgo can dang / rdo rje sri mo'i mgo can dang / rdo rjemo mgo can dang / rdo rje dadag pa thang gog gi mgo can dang / rdo rje'i ma
179b5(rnying rgyud): zhags pa can dang / rdo rje me lce klog phreng 'dzin dang / rdo rje srin mo mdung 'phen pa dang rdo rje ral gri sgra 'byin ma dang / rdo rjeklu mo thogs 'bebs mo dang / rdo rje 'jigs byed pa lang gi sna dang / 
179b6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gnod sbyin khyung gdong ma dang / rdo rje lag na khrag thogs ma dang / rdo rje zla ba skar mda' ltar gtong ba dang / rdo rje dam tshig bsrungs ma dpal phreng ma dang / rdo rje lag na phur bu 'dril ma dang / rdo rje ri rab bsnyil ba'i rngam stangs
179b7(rnying rgyud): can dang / rdo rje dmar mo spyan gsum shin tu mi srun ma dang / rdo rje cir yang 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul can chen mo dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje smug nag gtibs pa'i me dpal can dang / rdo rje keng
179b8(rnying rgyud): rus 'cha' ba'i tshems rnon ma dang / rdo rje gzhang ma'i shin tu gang rgyangs chen ma dang / rdo rje nang grol 'dren ma kang ka'i mgo can ma dang / rdo rje sgra 'byin 'brug sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi rin chen char 'bebs ma dang / 
180a1(rnying rgyud): dzin zhugs 'ang dri sgrol ma dang / rje dbang mdzo sder po'i tshogs dang / rdorje gan bsdu gra rnon par sa can dang / rdo rje gas sra par byed pa dang / dri tsun tshogs mang bsdud pa
180a2(rnying rgyud): byed pa dang / rdo rje 'ur 'ur shig shig g.yo bar byed pa dang / rdo rje rkan sgra rdebs pa'i drag shul can chen mo dang / rdo rje za bar byed pa'i phaT phaT sgrogs ma dang / rdo rje brkyang bskum gshin rje gnon ma dang / rdo rje zhing
180a3(rnying rgyud): chem khrag 'dzag thong rlon sku la brgyan pa dang / rdo rje drag po'i ngo ro 'byin pa'i gdong gsum ma dang / rdo rje yud tsam 'dul phyogs bcur 'phro ma dang / rdo rje seng ge stab su mchod pa'i nga rgyal can dang / rdo rje sbrul
180a4(rnying rgyud): pa mang po dgyed pa'i bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje stir gnas nyul bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje dam tshig gi tshogs nyul ma dbya khra khri skyigs can dang / rdo rje phyi nang mtshams nyul ma bya khra khyi
180a5(rnying rgyud): skyigs can dang / rdo rje dam tshig gi rjes gcod ma bya khri khyi smyigs can dang / rdo rje de bya'i sbyor nyul ma bya khra khyi skyigs can da / rdo rje 'dod chags ma bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje dur khrod ros
180a6(rnying rgyud): 'dul ba'i bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje dmar mo bkra gsal dbang sdud ma dang / rdo rje ser mo sbrul gyi ska rags can dang / rdo rje gnam lcags bur mo thog 'bebs ma dang / rdo rje rgyal byed sngags par byed ma
180a7(rnying rgyud): dang / rdo rje bsdams pas srin mo brgyal bar byed ma dang / rdo rje kha nas mi khrag rta khrag 'dzag ma dang / rdo rje dbu stong phyag stong bdud kyi dpung rnams 'dul bar byed ma dang / rdo rje 'bum phrag yangs pa'i mkha' 'gro
180a8(rnying rgyud): chen mo dang / rdo rje ral pa spyi gtsug 'khyil ma dang / rdo rje sku yis rol pa'i mkha' 'gro 'bar ma dang / rdo rje gsung gi sprul pa phyogs bcur 'gyed ma dang / rdo rje thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul mnga' ba chen mo dang / rdo rje
180b1(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi sgyu 'phrul dbang phyug mo dang / rdo rje rjen chen sku'i dbang phyug ma dang / rdo rje drong bang phyug ma dang / rdo rje dbyings la sbyor ning stan byed ma dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dbung dgum dang / rdo rjesgra 'byin ma dang / 
180b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje tsher ma dang / rdo rje myong ma dang / rdo rje rag byed kun la 'khyams dang / rdo rje dmar nag dbu gsum ma dang / rdo rje sngo nag ral pa can chen mo dang / rdo rje ljang nag dbu brgya ma dang / rdo rje ljang sngo dbu drug ma dang / 
180b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ba lang gi mgo can dang / rdo rje ser nag dbu bco lnga ma dang / rdo rje spug nag dbu brgya ma dang / rdo rje ljang ser khro gtum dbu dgu ma dang / rdo rje ser mo dbu gcig ma dang / rdo rje dkar mo dbu lnga ma dang / rdo rje nag
180b4(rnying rgyud): mong bu gsum ma dang / rdo rje bsnyems ma bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / daser mo bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje dur khrod kyi bdag mo bya/ khyi sgyogs can dang / rdo rje gtun khung ma bya khra khyi skyigs can dang
180b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mda' bstag ma bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje skul byed bya khra khyi skyigs can dang / rdo rje rlung 'byin ma bya khra khri smyig can dang / rdo rje rjod byed ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje 'jigs
180b6(rnying rgyud): byed ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi sbyor ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje 'phrog ma brlag byed ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje rmongs byed ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje ying 'phrog ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / 
180b7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje brag 'joms ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje tshe 'joms ma bya khra khyi sbyig can dang / rdo rje chungs byed ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje srin mo snying zan ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje skul ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang
180b8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'bebs ma bya khra khri smyig can dang / rdo rje dpal bdag ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje rgan 'jig ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje gnas ma mgyogs byed ma bya khra khyi smyig can dang / rdo rje sgrub pa che 'dzin ma bya khwa khri smyig
181a1(rnying rgyud): ba dang / dri tho da du sprus nag 'khyil pa pa na dang /  rjem chen sto ga rigs su ma mang gsogs can dang / phre byed pa'ab sa dang / rjenas par rji dang / ji zang 'ab ba dang / 
181a2(rnying rgyud): chen mo dang / rdo rje byan lag dang / rdo rje kang ka'i lus la mu srin gyi mgo can dang / rdo rje gzhog pa gtams pa dang / rdo rje sder mo lpags kyum dang / rdo rjes su rtse gcig ma'i gdong can dang / rdo rje sa gro can dang / rdo rje khag
181a3(rnying rgyud): ma dang / rdo rje kar ma mu ka ra dang / rdo rje 'jigs par byed par byed pa'i gzugs can dang / rdo rje glegs bu'i mgo can dang / rdo rje khwa'i mgo can dang / rdo rje yid las byung ba'i mdun pa mo dang / rdo rje myos pa mo dang / rdo rje drab mo dang / 
181a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje byed pa dang / rdo rje dang ba mo dang / rdo rje khaspu da can dang / rdo rje ral gri spu can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi lpags pa tsa/ na dang / rdo rje zangs kyi kha spu can dang / rdo rje ka li bi ka'i dbyings can dang / 
181a5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dbang sbyin ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dgyes pa chen mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sgyu 'phrul gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje snyoms par 'jug pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje cheng du 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo
181a6(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rab tu gtogs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gsang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gzugs kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje sgra'i tshigs dang / rdo rje dri'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ro'i tshogs dang / rdo rje reg gi tshogs dang / 
181a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje khro mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gos gyon pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bza' btung gi tshogs dang / rdo rje bro gar gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje klu mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dbye bar byed/ 
181a8(rnying rgyud): ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje pad+mo phreng ba ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bde ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo sprin sdud ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dgyes pa mo'i tshigs dang / rdo rje mnyam pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje nyi zla'i 'od kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mkha'
181b1(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje yid bzhin gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje mchog phran 'dzin pa'i tshe dang rlon 'di dang / rjod rgyal can gyi tshogs dang / rdo rje thim par byed pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar chen po tshogs dang / rdo rje 'khor lo ma
181b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang / rdo rje pad+mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje mnyam par rdzogs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bka' nyan sprul pa'i tsho gas dang / rdo rje dngos grub las kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje spyod pas ci la'ang/ 
181b3(rnying rgyud): thogs pa med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rig su thabs mkhas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'od 'phro ba 'bar ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje chags pa med pa'i tshul du gnas pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sdug bsngal sel bar byed pa'i tshogs
181b4(rnying rgyud): dang / rdo rje rigasu skyes pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje me stag phra mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sems ma ye shes su snang ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje snyoms las med pa'i tshogs dang / 
181b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje sgyid lug med pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje the tsom med par bsgrub/ pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gsang ba ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rab tu/ dgyes pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rnam par spros
181b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rgyan bkod pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bstan pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje namakha' la rgyu ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje skyon dag pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje phyogs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdul ba me
181b7(rnying rgyud): dgongs pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rten pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje tshigs mtshon pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gab pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje sbas pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje thugs 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje 'byung ba mo'i
181b8(rnying rgyud): tshogs dang / rdo rje shes rab 'dzin pa mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje bde ba'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rol mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje thugs kyi ye shes 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje drang snang mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje rang 'byung mo'i tshogs dang / 
182a1(rnying rgyud): ma pa'i tshigs dang rje shes pa kyim ga dang ldan pa tshogs dang / phyildan pa ba bas spyo gdas pa chags dang po mos pa myed pa ma chags dang /  rdzogapa ra byang mtshachams dang
182a2(rnying rgyud): rjemam tshigs dang / dri rje thag pa pa'i chogs dang / ji tshol baba'i tshogs dang / rdo ga 'a tshogs dang / rje saung nams gte bang ba'i chogs dang / rderje le shes dkyil 'kho dang ldan pa'i tshogs dang / rje su ma pag
182a3(rnying rgyud): las pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje yon tan ldan las kyi tshogs dang / rdo rje lhun gyis grub pa'i tshogs dang / rdo sprul pa 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rje rje rgya las 'byung ba mo'i tshogs dang / rdo rje gdum pagacan dang / rdo rje gdug pa gto
182a4(rnying rgyud): bskul gyi chun po can dang / rdo rje 'jigs pa'i mgo brgyad pa rdo rje mgo sna tshogs par sprul pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje lus stong/ dal mgo bcu pa dang / rdo rje lus brgyal mgo cig pa'i tshogs dang / rdo rje lus
182a5(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs dang / rdo rje yan lag 'bum yod pa dang / rdo rje gdug pa'i wa ga cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang / rdo rje lus brgyal mgo stong yod dang / rdo rje lus brgya la mgo brgya pa dang / rdo rje lus bcu la mgo gcig pa dang
182a6(rnying rgyud): mgo brgyad pa la rkang pa brgyad pa dang / mgo dgu ba la rkang pa gcig pa dang / de'i 'khor gyi yang sbrul gyi pho nya ni lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po dang / long brgya sbrel ba dang / nag po mgo dgu pa'o// shar gyi dkar mo spyang dung gi khyim
182a7(rnying rgyud): chen mo dang / lho'i sbrul gyi zhags pa can dang / nub kyi dmar mo zangs kyi mche ba can dang / byang giser mo dril bu can dang / 'di rnams kyi po nya mo ni shar gyi rdo rje sder mo dang / lho'i nag mo dung gdub ma dang / nub kyi dmar mo seng+ge maH
182a8(rnying rgyud): can dang / byang gi ser mi las kyi bdag mo dang / rdo rje rjes chen phreng ba can dang / rdo rje zangs kyi phreng ba can dang / rdo rje lcags kyi phreng ba can dang / rdo rje ral gri so can dang / rdo rje namakha'i gung gcod ma dang / rdo rje nyi ma'i zer zhen ma dang / rdo rje chung/ 
182b1(rnying rgyud): gtu grang sa dang / rdo rgya mtsho gta shugs dang / di rnams kyi sku dog na tshogs pa'o// phyag namatshan ma sa tshogs pa'o// drag byed bdag pas sgrol ba byed pa'o// de nas bcom ldan das dpal sedugs sru gsung cu
182b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje las po nya'i las 'di gsungs// ma sru ga sum bcu drug cu rnams// yud tsam gyis ni kun 'dul zhing // mud tsam gyis ni phyogs bcur 'gro// du dang ba kyis sgrogs shing // bskal ba'i 'brug sgra chen po ldo// mgo gsum 'i/ 
182b3(rnying rgyud): la lcags sder can// mi sha za ba'i bdud dpung 'joms// bstas pas bdud rnams tshig byed cing // klu yi khyim rnams rab tu 'joms// rab tu mi srun 'di dag ni// 'di yang dpal gyi pho nya ste// las rnams thams cad grub par gyis
182b4(rnying rgyud): mtshan dang dpe byad gnyis las 'bros// mgyogs pa mgyogs ma dpo nyar ldan// klog 'gyum dang 'dra bar grags// chos nyid khyab pas dmatshan ma dbying su sdud// ye shes thugs rjes 'brel bas kun la khyab// 'drin
