182b5(rnying rgyud): las dra bas 'gro ba brlabs kyis grol// de phyir lha mo rin chen dra ba ma / oM dz+wa la badz+ra hU/ ye shes glog 'gyus mtshan ma dbyingasu gtso// skad cig thugs rjes 'khor ba dbye gsal byed// phrin las glog 'gyus/ 
182b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba yid kyis sgrol// dra bas sdud la glog 'gyu ma yis 'dren// badz+ra a ma ka hUM// 'od zer dud ka 'bro ba ni// hUM dang phaT kyi sgra sgrogs shing // bskal pa'i 'brug sgra chen po bzhin// kun kyang mgyogs ma rlung dang mtshungs// mig
182b7(rnying rgyud): gsum yo la lcags sder can// mgo gsum po la rkang gsum pa// mang du za zhing bdud khyim 'joms// bltas pas bdud rnams tshim byed cing // klu yi gnas kyang nges par 'joms// 'di rnams khro bo'i pho nya ste// ha ha ru
182b8(rnying rgyud): lu'i sgra sgrogs shing // gang gis rlung phyogs song ba yi// khro bo thams cad nges par 'jig/ na mo byi tsir b+h+yo// ha ha ru lu ru lu b+h+yo// mgo brgyad po la rkang brgyad po// lag pa brgyad la mig kyang brgyad// lag pa brgyad ni rdo rje 'dzin// 
183a1(rnying rgyud): 'grin gnas kyang nges par 'joms// mgo drug po la rkang drug po// lag pa drug ni rgyu drug gcod// rkang pa gsum ni bur bu 'dril// g.yon pa gsum ni gtor ma sbyin// gang nas gang du 'gro ba'i tshe// rkang balcag+sa/ 
183a2(rnying rgyud): pubur rab tu drag// 'od zer dud kas reg pa ni// tshangs pa'i gnas kyang rab tu 'jig/ lag pa g.yon pas bskyod pa ni// 'phra men 'khor bcas ral pa 'bar// lcags kyus dgra sta rab thogs shing // zhing chen yan lag 'dzin pa 'phro// 
183a3(rnying rgyud): byang gi phyogs nas 'byung ba ni// lcags kyi khyi ste rkang gsum po// lcags kyi lus la nyi ma'i mig/ spu ni lcags kyu bsregs pa 'dra// bang ni glog pas nges par mgyogs// skad ni 'brug pas shin tu che// rab tu mi srun 'di dag
183a4(rnying rgyud): ni// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang 'phrog/ mgo dgu po la rkang gcig po// lus kya du gnag la 'od phung gnag/ yan lag gnag la sbrul gyis brgyan/ ral pa gnag cing mche ba gnag/ mig kyang gnag la lag gnag po// 
183a5(rnying rgyud): mgyogs kyang rlung gis bskyod du med// 'di dag pho nya'i mchog yin pas// las rnams thams cad grub par gyis// long ba rgyab sbrel phyi ma nang // mangs za zhing ri lu sgrol// mig kyang med la cang mi smra// yang na
183a6(rnying rgyud): lag pa sbrel te 'gro// 'di yang khro bo'i pho nya ste// las rnams thams cad grub par byed// shar gyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// dung gi khyi mo chen mo la// dung gi ba lang sna khrid can// dung gi mi mo chen mo zhon// lag na lcags kyu
183a7(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba thogs// lho yi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// lcags kyi khrid ste rkang gsum pa// lcags kyi sbrang mo mgo dgu la// lcags kyi mi me chen mo zhon// lag na zhags pa sgril ma thogs// nub kyi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni/ 
183a8(rnying rgyud): zangs kyi khyi mo chen mo la// zangs kyi mi mtshan mo zhon// lag na lcags sgrog sgril ma thogs// byang gi phyogs nas 'gugs pa ni// gser gyi khyi mo chen mo la// gser gyi mi mo chen mo non// lag na rdo rje phur bu 'dril// 'di yang dpal gyi/ 
183b1(rnying rgyud): pho nyanye ste/  las rnams thams cad grub par gyis// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka pho nya bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la// dbus su 'khor lo rtsibs pa ni/ 
183b2(rnying rgyud): la dbus su bcom ldan 'das he ru ka'i rol pa/ sku mdog 'thing nag dbu sum phyag drug pa zhig dgod/ shar du rdo rje til mar dgod/ lhor stag gi mgo can dgod/ nub tu g.yag gi mgo can dgod/ byang du sbrul gyi mgo
183b3(rnying rgyud): can dgod/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma la brgya rtsa brgyad rim pa gsum la pho nya sum brgya bcu dgod do// de'i phyi rim snam bu la yang sbrul gyi pho nya dgod do// de'i phyi rim sgo ba bzhi/ po nya las byed bzhi dgod do// ci bgyi dang / 
183b4(rnying rgyud): bka' nyan dang / bka'i pho nya dang / sprul pa dang / yang sprul pa dang / 'di rnam/ nas yang dag pa'i bden du nges par rig par bya'o// bcom lda/ rgan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tu gsang ba he ru ka'i rol pa las
183b5(rnying rgyud): rdo rje pho nya'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom lnga na 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di gsungs shing phyung ngo // bdag med gnyis rtogs
183b6(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa gnyis spangs pa// thugs rje sprul pas 'gro ba ma lus sgrol// yul med ma skyes byams pa'i chos dbyings las// 'dzin pa mi rtog snying rje zhen chags khro// gnyis med dag las phrin las snying rje snyoms// dpal chen khrag
183b7(rnying rgyud): 'thung khyod la phyag 'tsha lo// rtog 'joms spyod pa 'thun pas 'gro 'dul zhing // brda can yan lag len pa'i don go la// lha rgyud brjod pas dngos grub kun dang 'brel// dka' don gtan tshigs rigs pas brjod par 'os zhes bya ba'i don to// 
183b8(rnying rgyud): lung gsum man ngag gsum dang spyi don gsum// lung gi spyi gcod man ngag gdeng du bya// spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog phub la// bzhi bcom drug ldan rtsis mgos sa gcad de// khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i mnyer gyis bgang // 'di
184a1(rnying rgyud): mi brag 'thung rngos brjid rgyal po'i lung // zhes tshig nyung zhing mdor 'dus la don mang por 'byung bas mdo sde zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas bka' stsal pa/ lung gsum gyis sna grangs te/ 
184a2(rnying rgyud): rje'u bya'o// man ngag gsum gyis 'jug bsdus te blo la bzhag pa'i don to// spyi don gsum gyis lung thams cad kyi spyi gcad do// spyi khog bcu bzhis don gyi khog dbub bo// bdud bzhi bcom pas yon tan kun la snang ba'i che ba
184a3(rnying rgyud): bcom mo// rtsis mgo drug gis sa bcad do// khro bo rtog pa mtshan ma'i gnyer gyis bshad pas ni golas dang ni sgrib pa spang ngo // yon tan kun rngom pas brjid gzhan la snang phyir rngom brjid chen po sum cu rtsa drug bstan to// rgyu
184a4(rnying rgyud): po yin pa'i rtags ni rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal por gsol lo// lung gis spyi dril de bshad do// de ltar rnam pa bcur nges nas// da ni phye byang ngo // bstan te gses nas bshad pa de la lung gsum ni zhi gnas mi rtog dngos po
184a5(rnying rgyud): mkha' khyab 'dra// lhag mthong ma rmongs gza' skar mkha' la bkram// dad bcas don dang bstun de 'tsham par bshad// ting 'dzin shes rab bka' lung gsum du nges// de la man ngag gsum ni bdag tu mi rtog sgra
184a6(rnying rgyud): pa mdzod nas mthong // yul du ma grub gzhan med mdzad du gshegs// yul sems gnyis med ma skyes dbyingasu gcig/ nyan thos rang rgyal sems tsam spong man ngag/ de la spyi don gsum ni/ med rgyu btag chags sgrub 'grub bltas
184a7(rnying rgyud): par snang spyod mthun khro drag gdug pa'i dpal sos 'dul// rtog 'joms sman rdzas dngos len dngos grub rgyu// 'di ni khro bo spyi yi don du bshad// de la spyi khog bcu bzhi ni// gang khro gang la ci phyir gang gis khri// gang khro rnam
184a8(rnying rgyud): ba bzhir ni shes bya ste// nga khro shugs khro bar bcas dang bcos// rtogs pa thugs rje rang bzhin 'dul ba'i dbang // gang la snying rjes khros te yul dang gnas// las dang 'bras bu sems can sgrub pa'o// las bzhi sgrol mdzad 'bras
184b1(rnying rgyud): bu sku gsung thugs// ci phyir rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis la ni// dus gsum mi yong sha rus khrag la rol// gang gi ro ni hUM dang he he phaT// gnas na lta 'og mkha' stong ye shes thugs// bskyed thabs cho 'phrul gsum po khro bo'i sku/ 'bras bu/ 
184b2(rnying rgyud): dpal chen tshegs kyis bskor// 'phra men las drag 'gro ba cis 'dul mdzad// de la bdud bzhi gzhom pa ni// tsham ngan drag pos lha chen 'dar 'gyel rdzis// brtul zhugs rol pas gdos bcas phung po bshig/ dug gsum brlab
184b3(rnying rgyud): phyir sha rus khrag la za// rnam shes 'chi meng rgyal ba'i gnas su stobs// rtsis mgo drug ni dbang dang rab tu ldan pa dang // dpal dang gzugs dang grags pa dang // ye shes dang ni nan tan dang // drug dang yang dag ldan phyir ro// 
184b4(rnying rgyud): de la dbang ni chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal phrag dog ni// gnyis stobs yum dang 'jigs tshul sku yi sbrul// dran med thod pa kham por gra yang gzhi ni// kha dang rgyal mtshan che dang lha chen gnon// de la dpal
184b5(rnying rgyud): drug ni khyams las khyab pa thugs dam dmigs kyis bsgral// thugs rjes 'gro ba thams cad bu ltar dgongs// smon lam dbang gis 'khor bar ji srid bzhugs gzhan don mdzad pas bdag don lhun gyis
184b6(rnying rgyud): grub/ yong su rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal// khro rgyal khrag 'thung dpal te rnam drug yin// de la dpal yongasu rdzogs pa bde ba chen po'i dpal ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa bzhi ste/ de yang gang zhe na/ sku gsum sa gsum
184b7(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rtogs dka' ba// bka' khyab sprin bdal char 'bab chu bo'i rgyun// ting 'dzin bsam yas bo d+his thogs pa de// bsam yas bsam khyab mkhas la gza' skar gsal// klu mthu gdul phyir klu lngas sku brgyan pa/ 
184b8(rnying rgyud): mang chen gsung sbra dbyangs dang po nya'i dbang // dug lngas gdos bcas 'du byed rgyan byas pa// khrag sbrul g.yang gzhi khra ta dreg pa 'joms// de la gzugs rnam pa gnyis ni// mithung bus pa'i gzugs 'dral// a go la
185a1(rnying rgyud): ni rkang lag gtams// drang srong khros pa'i cha byad la// shin tu mkhrang zhing skems bags bri// gnod sbyin snying bags mi mthun gzugs dang ni// 'dul dbang yi dgas srin po drang srong 'dra// de la grags pa ni bung / 
185a2(rnying rgyud): d+ha bo d+his bstod dam sras spun dgongs// gti mug gzengs bstod nga rgyal gnon par grags// de la ye shes ni// rnam dag dbyings mkhyen 'khor ba'i skyon dang bral// 'gro ba'i rgyud mkhyen 'khor ba'i mtha' las 'das// gnyi
185a3(rnying rgyud): su med par mkhyen pas dbu ma'i ngang // mdor na thams cad pa yi ye shes yin// de la nan tan ni/ nan tan snying po zag med zag bcas 'du// nan tan phrin las 'gro ba gnas nas 'don// bsam yas nan tan 'gro ba chud mi gson/ 
185a4(rnying rgyud): nan tan mchog gi mchog tu shes par bya// de ni lung rnam pa gsum spyir dril te bshad do// de yang mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung dang // che mtsho gra yon tan gyi lung dang / yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad// de la mi 'ad
185a5(rnying rgyud): brgyan gyi lung ni/ glang chen 'dul stobs theg pa'i rgyan zhes bya// bdud 'a/ joms sman rdzas grub dang lta ba'i gzhung // stag ni dpa' rtun za/ byed rgyan zhes pa// ye shes thugs rje'i phrin las ngang du bstan// sbrul ni ga/ 
185a6(rnying rgyud): lcug phrin las rgyan zhes pa// 'jigs tshul dug gnon 'khrul pa yum gyi rgyan// thod phreng dbang sgrol 'chad pa'i rgyan zhes pa// sku gsum theg gsum dus gsum dbang 'chang sgrol// g.yang ga ni tshul khrims gos kyi rgyan zhes pa
185a7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems tshul dam khrims gos shes bya// rag ta thugs rje chags pa'i rgyan zhes pa// mi rtog dbyings nas thugs rje spyan// gzi chen don dam bcud kyi rgyan zhes pa// bcud kyi thig le don dam kun tu 'od// thal ba 'dul
185a8(rnying rgyud): byed phrin las rgyan zhes pa// yi ge 'khor los mtshan ma thal bar rlog// me ni 'bar 'phro 'du srog glong dkyil zhes// ye shes thugs rje dbyings 'dul 'phrin las te// zad par byed pa'i mtha' 'das dkyil zhes bya// me sgra sgra chen
185b1(rnying rgyud): tha dad sgra zhes bya// chos sku khyab dang ting 'dzin sna tshogs pa// ral pa kham nag snyil zhing phye ma ni// de nas chos nyid dbang drag sprul pa 'phro// sku mdog mthing nag na mkha'i rgyan zhes bya// 'dul dbang mtha' med yon tan dgongs pa gti
185b2(rnying rgyud): mi dpogs/  shes bya'o// de la khrag 'thung zhes bya ba'i sgra ni gong du bshad par zad do// de la dpal he ru'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan cer yang ma nges par 'byung ste// gang ltar bsgyur yang 'grub bo zhes bshad do// de yang mtshan nyid med pa'i
185b3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya dang // de la dngos byung phyag rgya rnams// nges pa med par dpa' bos bshad// mkhas pas bsgoms la ci dgar 'grub ces 'byung ngo // 'o na yang 'di'i gnas skabasu// he ru ka dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad de/ de yang
185b4(rnying rgyud): yan lag rtags kyi lung gis bshad na/ grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya dang / mdzad pa rtags kyi phyag dang gnyis so// de la grub pa rtags kyi phyag rgya da ni dbu gsum dug gsum sku gsung thugs lhun grub// lta spyod rnam gsum
185b5(rnying rgyud): / grub pa'i rtags// spyan dgu sa gsum sku gsum ye shes gsum ste/ dgu// bgrod med thob med dmigs pa las 'das pa// rtag cha da spyan gnyis mtha' yangs dbu ma'i spyan// shangs gsum srog la mang
185b6(rnying rgyud): mdzad ting 'dzin gsum// de bzhin nyid du kun tu snang zhes bya// sgra chen tha dad sgra chen chos sku ting 'dzin snyan// zhal gsum rnam thar sgo gsum lhun gyis grub// ljags gsum theg gsum mthar phyin shes bya'i rtags// mche bzhi/ 
185b7(rnying rgyud): phrin las mthar phyin zhi ba'i tshul// ye shes drug ni mthar byin phye 'u po kyi dru yang byin phyag mtshan drug/ zhabs bzhi lam bzhir bgrod pa med pa thob// de la mdzad pa brtags shes bya ba ni// spyan dgus dgu 'dul ba'i bye brag
185b8(rnying rgyud): gzigs// spyan gsum srid gsum mgo rgyud so sor mkhyen// shangs gsum nas byung sprul pas stong gsum 'gengs// snyan drug 'gro drug gnas nas ci gsol gsan// dbu gsum srid gsum mgon mdzad sku gsung thug
186a1(rnying rgyud): / zhal gsum dbyings su drug gsum zad par rngub// ljags gsum theg gsum bstan pa'i gdangs ngar sgrogs// khams gsum nyug byed rdo rje srin mo lce// mche bzhi skye shi rtsa nas gcod par mdzad// phyag drug
186a2(rnying rgyud): rgyud drug 'khor ba gting nas 'don// phyag mtshan pha rol phyin drug 'gro don mdzad// zhabs bzhir phrin las rnam bzhi bgrod med sgrol// yan lag rtags kyi lung gis 'di ltar yang dag bshad// rdo rje ye shes pha rol phyin pa ni/ 
186a3(rnying rgyud): rang bzhin mi 'gyur las ni 'bigs shing 'joms// chos sku rdo rje tog dang bag chags bsregs// ye shes yin phyir de la de skad bya// ban d+ha bzod pa'i pha rol phyin pa ni// chos dbyings spros med ye shes bzhi dang ldan// ye shes
186a4(rnying rgyud): dbyings rtogs zhen khrag thugs rje skye// mtha' gnyis skyon la mi bsngagaras bzod pa'i mchog/ kha T+wAM stobs kyi pha rol phyin pa ni// dug gsum dga' byed dregs pa'i lha bdud 'joms// stong gsum srid pa yo 'dul
186a5(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i rtags// kun la mnga' mdzad 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// zhing chen smon lam pha rol phyin pa ni// 'bod pa'i g.yab mos 'khor rnams dbang du sdud// sbyin pa'i za bas mkha' gro tshim par byed// 
186a6(rnying rgyud): rdegs pa'i dbyig pas gdon bcas phung po bshig/ rtog pa chos nyid dran med shes lnga bzung // ci ltar smon cing grub pas de skad bya// thong gshol thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa ni// nyon mongs tha ba thugs rjes zlog mdzad cing // yi he
186a7(rnying rgyud): chos dbyings mtha' dang bral ba'i rtags thabs kyis sku gsum lhan grub sprul pa 'phro// brda ni shes rab pha rol phyin bstan pa// yul med ma skyes chos sku rnga sgo la// 'dzin pa bdag med rig pa'i dbyu gus brdungs// gsung rab
186a8(rnying rgyud): rnga sgras 'gro ba shes rab skyed// 'khor lo bsam gtan lhag pa gsum gyi mtshan// tshul khrims ting 'dzin shes rab gsum dang ldan// pad+ma 'angam skyes ma chags thugs rjes spyod// tshul khrims pha rol phyin pa'i ngang du bsta/ 
186b1(rnying rgyud): mi zad par ldan sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// ral gri ye shes thugs rje mtha' gnyis gcod// rtse gcig ting 'dzin gnyis las brtson 'grus mdzad// dgra sta zhags pa la sogs phyag mtshan rnams// rang gnyer las kyi brda' tsam
186b2(rnying rgyud): chos sku rtogs par bstan// de la 'di man chad che mchog yon tan gyi lung gis spyir dril de bshad pa ni/ yon tan gyi brjid la phrin las kyi rngom sum cu rtsa drug bstan pa ni de la sku'i rngom pa bzhi la na mkha'i ri mo phyag rgya
186b3(rnying rgyud): rngom/ cir yang 'gyur bzhi bzhugs tshul rngom// zil gyis gnon pa'i gdan rngom/ tsham ngam chen po'i stobs rngom pa dang bzhi'o// de yang kun rdzob rang bzhin med pa la nam mkha' la sprin da pa'i tshul dang / lha dang 'phags pa
186b4(rnying rgyud): tshangs pa dang / smon lam cir yang 'gyur ba'i bzhugs thabs kyi tshul da dang / srid pa'i 'khor lo zil gyis gnon pa dri med pad+ma nyi zla'o/  du yon tan rtags de gdan khri'i tshul dang / stobs chen bcu'i tshul dang / 
186b5(rnying rgyud): rnam pa ni 'og nas 'chad do// gsung gi rngom bzhi la hom lnga 'brel bar 'byung ba'i zhal rngom/ zla gam cir yang 'gyur ba'i lhag/ sa rngom/ skye shi rtsa ba gcod pa'i tshoms rngom/ gsung sgra 'brug ltar sgrog
186b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i dbyangs rngom pa'o// de yang zhal ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnam pa lnga'i bsreg khang du ro rnam pa lngas tshim zhing mchod pa 'brel pa rnam lnga'i tshul dang / gsung dbyangs tshul 'dus byas dang / rang bzhin zung ma 'dres par ston
186b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i tshul dang / mche ba bzhi ye shes bzhi'i 'phro 'dus dug bzhi ye shes bzhis gcod pa'i tshul dang / 'brug ltar sgrogs pa'i yan lag drug cu'i dbyangs kyis snyan pa'i mdo sdes go bar bsgogs shing zil gyis gnon pa'i
186b8(rnying rgyud): tshul dang rnam par bshad do// thugs kyi rngom pa bzhi la ting nge 'dzin phyag rgya'i rgyan gyi skar tshogs ltar rngom/ 'phrin las rgya mtsho rgyan gyi dba' rlabs ltar rngom/ yon tan sa gzhi rgyan gyi rtsi shing ltar rngom/ mdzad pa rol mo rgyan gyi ga
187a1(rnying rgyud): thabs ltar rngom pa'o// de yang rgya chen po bzhi ni rang bzhin dang rgyan du dbye'o// lhag mthong gi rang bzhin las lhag mthong gi rgyan ma g.yos par snang ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin la zhi
187a2(rnying rgyud): gnas kyi rgyan khyad par du 'byung ba'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin bzod pa las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis phan 'dogs pa'i tshul dang / zhi gnas kyi rang bzhin mi zad ma gol ba las lhag mthong gi rgyan gyis cir yang
187a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur ba'i dga' ba skyed pa'i tshul lo// mthu'i rngom pa bzhi la ru tra bcos pa'i gnas rngom/ lha chen gnon pa'i gdan rngom/ khams gsum sgrol ba'i zhing rngom/ rtogs 'joms spyod pa'i brtul zhugs rngom/ de
187a4(rnying rgyud): yang gnas khyad par can bkra shis shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i tshul dang nga gnas khyad par can thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i tshul dang / nga zhing khyad par can khams gsum yi sgrol bA'i tshul dang / spyod pa
187a5(rnying rgyud): par can srid pa'i rtog pa dus gcig tu bcom pa'i tshul lo// rngo ma chu/ la sum cu rtsa gnyis bshad do// de la brjid chen po la/ sku tshe yan lag rags pas brjid che/ grangs mang rkyen dang 'tsham bra
187a6(rnying rgyud): brjid che bkur 'os gtso bor mthong bas brjid che/ khyad zhugs yid dang 'thad pas brjid che ba ste bzhi'o// de yang chos sku dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sku che/ thugs rje dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul rags
187a7(rnying rgyud): sems 'du byed dang mnyam par 'byung ba'i sgo nas sprul pa grangs mang / smon lam gyi sgo nas rigs dang 'thun pa'i rkyen du 'tsham/ spyod lam gyi sgo nas bkur bar 'os/ rigs btsun pa'i sgo nas gtso bor mthong / rang bzhin
187a8(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i sgo nas khyad zhugs/ phrin las kyi sgo nas yid dang 'thad/ gsung gi brjid bzhi la gdangs che stong gsum gang bas brjid che/ tshig myur the tshom gcod pas brjid che/ bdag la cher ston snyam pas brjid che/ 
187b1(rnying rgyud): khyad zhugs yon tan mthong bas brjid che de yang chos skus khyab pa'i sgo nas sgra che/ sgra tha dad pa'i sgo nas stong gsum gang / sgra dbyangs sgronas kun gyis go bas myur/ nye bar bsgyur ba'i sgo nas the tsom gcod/ 
187b2(rnying rgyud): byams pa'i sgo nas bdag la gzigs// thugs rje'i sgo nas nyi tsher ston// shes pa'i bye brag gi sgo nas khyad zhugs// tshig gi yon tan gyi sgo nas 'dul// thugs kyi brdzi de bzhi la/ yangs pare dogs
187b3(rnying rgyud): med pas brjid che/ gsal ba mtha' gnyis spangs pas brjid che/ thugs rje thugs dam mthar 'byin pas brjid che/ ma rmongs thabs kyis 'dul bas brjid che'o// de yang gnyis med pa'i sgo nas yangs/ spang blang med
187b4(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgo nas re dogs med/ lhag mthong gi sgo nas dbu mar gsal/ zhi gnas kyi sgo nas mi 'gyur bas gnyis mtha' spangs/ mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i sgo nas thugs rje che/ 'khor ba ji srid bzhugs
187b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i sgo nas thugs dam mthar 'byin/ shes rab kyi sgo nas rmongs pa sil/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo nas thabs kyis 'dul yon tan gyi/ brjid bzhi la/ med pa zad mi shes pas brjid che/ gcig la 'dod
187b6(rnying rgyud): dgur ston pas brjid che/ gnod sbyor phan par 'dod pas brjid che/ thabs mkhas skyon gyis mi gos brjid che'o// de yang bdag tu mi 'dzin pa'i sgo nas med/ med pa'i sgo nas zad mi shes/ ye shes kyi sgo nas gcig
187b7(rnying rgyud): sems kyi sgo nas 'dod dgur ston// sems kyi sgo nas gnod par sbyor// grub pa rgyu'i sgo nas phan par mdzad// shes bya'i sgo nas thabs mkhas/ spyod pa'i sgo nas skyon gyis ma gos/ phrin las kyi brjid bzhi la/ 
187b8(rnying rgyud): mi mnyel nyam pag rol pas brjid che/ 'khor ba yun rings mi mnyal bar brjid che/ mgon skyabs rgyun tu mdzad pas brjid che/ dgongs pa'i don rnams mdzad pas brjid che'o// de yang sgyu mar gyur pa'i sgo nas ma
188a1(rnying rgyud): mnyel/  rang bzhin gcig pa'i sgo nas phag tu rol// spyod pa'i sgo nas 'khor bar yun ring por bzhugs/ bya ba med pa'i sgo nas mi mnyel/ mthu yi sgo nas mgon skyabs che// dam bcas pa'i sgo
188a2(rnying rgyud): nas 'gro don rgyun tu mdzad// rtse gcig gi sgo nas mtha' gnyis kyi skyon dgongs// nan tan gyis sgo nas bya ba grub// brjid nyi shu dang sgo bzhi bcu ste spyir drug cu pa'o// de la rin po che sna bdun ni 'khor lo rin po che'i dag
188a3(rnying rgyud): bcus skye ba bzhi la dbang bskur ro// btsun mo rin po ches ni yul gyi rgyal po la mnyes par dbul lo// dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgus pha rol gyi dpung 'jom so// khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhis
188a4(rnying rgyud): rgyal po'i chab srid 'dzin te// glang po rin po che'i stobs bcus pa rol tu bdag dang gzhan gyi don byed do// rta rin po che myur mgyogangs rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis bgrod pa'i gnas sleb par byed do// yid
188a5(rnying rgyud): bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che ni rnam pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi rer/ dod skong ngo // lung rnam pa gsum ni mi 'da' ba rgyan gyi lung la sogs pa gong du rtsis mgo spyir sbyang bar bzang / de nas 'khor lo rin
188a6(rnying rgyud): bo che'i dbang bcu ni/ skye bzhi skur ston skye bzhi sgrol mdzad pa// lha mi sdig sbrul mche ba bzhi ru ston// yo byad bring ba'i 'dod yon lnga dang ni// rtog pa gzhom phyir sman lnga dang len rol// ci ltar mos bzhin 'dod dgu gzu
188a7(rnying rgyud): ston pa/ gar dbang 'thang dga'i tshul du rol pa mdzad// rdzu 'phrul pa spro'i dbyibs nas 'phra man 'phro// lus ni ci rdzu sems ni cho 'phrul ston// gad rgyangs gdangs ngar sgrog pa sna tshogs kyis// mche ba zil
188a8(rnying rgyud): gnon tha dad chos rnams ston// shes rab thabs ldan spun gnyis dbu ma'i ngang // dbyings las ma g.yos cir yang sa le mkhyen// sems kyi bye brag ting 'dzin tha dad 'phro// bsam gyis mi khyab bzhi la rol pa
188b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad// rdo rjer sder mo lpags paspu phreng rgyan// 'khor ba ci srid bzhugs pa'i tshe la dbang // lta ba rnam bzhi spyan zur gyis bskur bas// 'phra men bzhi 'phro phyogs bzhir las bzhi mdzad// smon lam dbang gis
188b2(rnying rgyud): drag po skur ston pa// dus mtha'i bskal pa bzhin du bshol du med// de la btsun mo rin po che'i dbang ni// ma chags rdo rje gzugs kyi yum gyis 'khyud// zhi gnas ting 'dzin mi g.yo yum gyis sbyor// thogs med/ 
188b3(rnying rgyud): shugs 'chang don grub yum gyis skyon// lhag mthong ye shes yum gyis menyes byed 'bebs// 'byung ba bzhi po rdo rje lha mo ste// bde ba chen po'i sku la mnyes par dbul// dmag mi rin po che'i tshul dgu ni/ 
188b4(rnying rgyud): bsgregs pas 'gro ba shes rab bskyed pa'i tshul// nyam nga med pa'ing dpa' bo'i tshul// gdug rtsub gdos bcad brgyan pas 'jigs pa'i tshul// log par lta ba zhe gcod gshe ba'i tshul// rmad du byung ba'i tshe
188b5(rnying rgyud): sgrogs bzhad pa'i tshul// shin tu gdul dka' la khro snying rje'i tshul// / smon lam dbang gis mi shom rngam pa'i tshul// nyon mong // sa grub pa'i gyur mdzad ngo mtshar tshul// khro drag dbyings nas mi g.yo
188b6(rnying rgyud): zhi ba'i tshul// de la khyim bdag rin po che'i tshad med pa bzhi ni// khro gtum tshad med byams par snang // bsod nams snying rje bdag nyid che// bsgral zhing bstabs pa dga' ba'i mchog/ yal bar mi 'dor btang
188b7(rnying rgyud): snyoms so// de la glang po rin po che'i stobs bcu ni// thugs rje chen po'i stobs ni dregs chen bsnyengs phyir gnon// chos nyid stobs ni mi dmigs na mkha'i mdog/ mi 'byed stobs ni dngos grub bdud rtsi'i rgyun// 
188b8(rnying rgyud): ma spangs stobs ni 'dod bcas sku la rgyan// ma g.yos stobs ni don mthun grol ba'i brgyan// smon lam stobs ni bskal par yongs grol mdzad// sprul pa'i stobs ni mgo brnyan 'phra men 'phro// phrag dog log lta/ 
189a1(rnying rgyud): 'khor bar gcig mi gtong // 'dod chags yud tsam 'dral 'dod spyan zlog dmar// de la rta rin po che'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni// chos dbyings med bzhin cir snang ba// mkha' la 'jar
189a2(rnying rgyud): tshon bzhin du rnam par dkam// ye shes rdzu 'phrul chos kyi dbyings rtogs pa// mkha' la nyi shar bzhin du gsal la stong // tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul bye brag ni// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sprin bung
189a3(rnying rgyud): bzhin du gad la// sprul pa'i bye brag 'phro ba'i rdzu 'phrul ni// rol gcig char 'babs snod bye brag phye// de la nor bu rin po che'i rang bzhin ni// 'gro rnams ci ltar 'dod pa'i re 'dod skong // mi zad bdag nyid gter
189a4(rnying rgyud): chen na mkha'i mdog/ srid gsum mun nag sel ba'i ye shes sgron/ dus gsum rgyun mi 'chad pa'i rin chen 'phreng // lung gsum ni rtsis mgo spyir sbyar ba yin no// da ni lha rgyud kyi rtog pa so sor bshad pa bya
189a5(rnying rgyud): ste/ 'gro rnams ci ltar 'dul zhing gshegs mdzad pa// shes rab namakha'i bskal pa dga' rgyud ston// gti mug tshul gyis gti/ mug 'joms mdzad pa// gti mug rdo rje bud d+ha he ru ka/ ye shes rdo rjes
189a6(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs rdo rje 'joms// thabs 'dzin 'chod pa'i dngos po bshig/ zhe sdang tshul gyis zhe sdang 'joms mdzad pa// zhe sdang rdo rje badz+ra he ru ka/ rin tshon dbyig ltar kun skong zhing // bdag med zhi gnas chu yi bskal pas 'khru
189a7(rnying rgyud): nga rgyal tshul gyis nga rgyal 'joms mdzad pa// nga rgyal rdo rje rang na he ru ka/ 'khor ba'i 'dam du bang ltar sku 'khrungs shing // lhag mthong me chen 'bar bas thams cad sreg// 'dod chags tshul gyis 'dod chags 'jom/ 
189a8(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa/ 'dod chags rdo rje pad+ma he ru ka/ phrin las rgya mtshos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i// shes bya thogs med bskal pa'i rlung gis bskyod// phrag dog tshul gyis phrag dog 'joms mdzad pa// phrag dog rdo rje karma ru/ 
189b1(rnying rgyud): ka sku'i longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // shes rab mthar cing gti mug rnam par dag/ phyag rgya gzugs kyi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // chos dbyings nam kha'i dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// thugs kyi longs spyod/ 
189b2(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs mi dmigs shing // brtson 'grus mthar phyin zhe sdang rnam par dag/ rtogs pa reg bya'i mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // sra brtan rdo rje dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// gsung gi longs spyod sna tshogs mi
189b3(rnying rgyud): dmigs shing / tshul khrims mthar phyin 'dod chags rnam par dag/ gsung rab sgra yi mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // lhag mthong ye shes dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// yon tan longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmi/ 
189b4(rnying rgyud): shing / sbyin pas mthar phyin nga rgyal rnam par dag/ ngar 'dzin bro ma chog mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // bdag med zhi gnas dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// phrin las longs spyod sna tshogs mi dmigs
189b5(rnying rgyud): shing / bzod pas mthar phyin phrag dog rnam par dag/ tshul khrims dri/ med mchod pas mnyes mdzad cing // thogs med las la dbang bskur khro mo rgyal// thugs mchog rnam dag ye shes dkar mo'i// 
189b6(rnying rgyud): tshogs// 'gugs mdzad ye shes lnga yi dbyug to can// dran pas rgyud lnga sgrol mdzad zhi bar gzigs// srid gsum 'joms byed dbyug thogs gau rim// sku yi yon tan tshogs sdud rkun mo'i tshigs// mthu
189b7(rnying rgyud): 'phrog zhi gnas lhag mthong zung du 'brel// bden gnyis lta bas khro tshul 'gro la gzigs// dam tshig dbyings mchog skul byed tse'u rim// gsung gis thams cad zil gnan rmongs pa'i tshogs/ 
189b8(rnying rgyud): dbang mdzad mtha' gnyis mi yong mu srin gyi// mi gnas rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing myos par lta// stong gsum dbang mdzad rgyal byed pra mo haM// thal ba byed pas thal byed ma yi tshogs// kun gyi dngos grub rdo rje
190a1(rnying rgyud): dgu 'dzin las dgu rtog 'joms shi ba glong bar gzigs// 'jig rten thal byed rje'u thegs pe ta li// 'byed med shes rab mi rtog lbos mo'i tshogs// 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin 'ching zhing dbang
190a2(rnying rgyud): 'dren las 'khro gar gzigs tshul rgyun gyis thugs rjes sgrol// bde mchog dbyingasu 'dren mdzad pu k+ka si// zhe sdang tshul gyis don mdzad gtum ma'i tshogs// myos mdzad dbyings dang ye shes gnyis
190a3(rnying rgyud): med pa'i / thugs rjes dkrug cing ro za'i tshul du gzigs// bsnod bcud dkrugs nas skongs mdzad g+ha sma ri// chags pa'i tshul gyis don mdzad sme sha can// ma ni rgyud 'phel bzung 'dzin bral ba'i rtags/ 
190a4(rnying rgyud): mtha' gnyis spangs pas rnam par g.yengs tshul bzhugs// 'bar ba stong gsum stobs byed tsan Da li// thams cad 'byung ba'i lhun 'gyur ma tshogs ma// kun gyi las mdzad chos kun snying po
190a5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin// kun la rol pas gzigs tshul kun dang ldan// thugs rje 'jig rten sgrol mdzad sma sha ni// 'joms byed rtsal mtsho/ ga rdo rje thugs kyi yum// mnyen po stobs kyis thams cad zil gyis
190a6(rnying rgyud): gnon / shes rab thabs ldan sku gsum bdag gzhan don// sdug bsngal zhe sdang bsod byed sing ha ma// dpa' brtun za byed ye shes thugs rje'i las// brtson 'grus myur ba'i shugs 'chang 'gro don du// thugs
190a7(rnying rgyud): rje ye shes rtse gcig so sor gzigs// nga rgyal 'chi bdag 'joms mdzad bya khram// mdzes byed dam tshig rnam dag gsung gi yum// thabs mkhas spyod pas bdag dang gzhan don mdzad// don gyi chos sku
190a8(rnying rgyud): ting 'dzin ljags la gtang // 'dod chags dur khrod 'joms mdzad sri ka ma// mi ma byed spyod pas mchog rigs kyi yum// g.yer ba'i phrin las 'gro la thugs rjes srung // chos nyid sku la ye shes spyan gyis
190b1(rnying rgyud): gzigs/ phrag dog las grub za byed shA nam// yid kyi ye shes so so kun la rtog/ rnam shes kyis bas dgod 'brang tshul khrims srung // 'khor ba'i rgyun gcod rgyud 'dzin rgyu gri 'dzin// mgyogs mas sAg/ 
190b2(rnying rgyud): byed khrag 'thung gyi gya ma// rnam shes mnyam nyid yid 'grogs mtshan ma 'joms// gsad pa'i god rnams sbyin pas pha rol phyin// mtha' 'das ches sku gzugs 'dzin spangs tshul bzung // 'gro ba'i sdug
190b3(rnying rgyud): bsngal tshe 'phrog ka ka ma// smad pas mi 'gyur bkrus pas mi 'dag cing // mi mthun gnyen pos mi shig bzod pa'i mchog/ chos skra thugs su chud phyir zhal na thogs// yon tan yid bzhin bdag nyid kang ka ma/ 
190b4(rnying rgyud): dbyings la mi rtog 'gro la thugs rjes gzigs// gnyis la mi gnas shes rab pha rol phyin// dbyings kyi thugs rjes phrin la sa 'dus ma byas// mtha' gnyis spangs pa'i rngam tshul ka/ bcu drug
190b5(rnying rgyud): zhag gis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs// dpal chen bcu drug sa la lhun gyis grub// bsod nams ye shes tshogs gnyis/ rdzogs pa'i sku// thog ma med cing yon tan zla ba med// sbyin pas rigs
190b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i klung du mtsho drang ltar// 'khor bas 'jigs nas thugs rjes lcag sku 'dren// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin don mdzad pa// thugs rje shar mdzad rta gdong lcags kyu ma// don dang 'thun pas kun kyang dga' bar mdzad
190b7(rnying rgyud): byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyun 'dzin cing // rin chen phyag rgyas sems can re 'dod skong // yon tan tshogs rdzogs phag gdong zhags pa ma// gzhan gyi don du spyad pas bdag gi don// shes rab sgron mas mun pa'i
190b8(rnying rgyud): sdug bsngal sel// don nyid mi 'da' dga' ba'i mchog/ kun gnyen ma rig nub mdzad nyi zla'i spyan// snyan par smra bas kun kyang bka' bzhin byed// btang snyoms thabs mkhas thugs rjes 'gro don du// phab nas rnam shes thal
191a1(rnying rgyud): ba'i gzugs kyang 'tsho// chos ston bag chags byang mdzad dril 'khrol ma// da ni srin po'i lha rgyud bshad de// bco brgyad spyan gyis bco brgyad khams la gzigs// bco brgyad shangs nas bco
191a2(rnying rgyud): brgyad sprul par 'byung // bco brgyad khams la bco brgyad skur ston cing // bco brgyad thugs kyis bco brgyad 'dul thabs mnga'// bco brgyad snyan gyis bco brgyad khams gsan cing // bco brgyad ljags/ 
191a3(rnying rgyud): kyis gsung rabs bco brgyad 'chad// brgya rtsa brgyad kyis dgongs pa bsam mi khyab// sa dgur thugs rjes don mdzad dbu dgur ldan// brjod gnon zhabs brgyad phyogs brgyad lha brgyad gnon// ci ltar/ 
191a4(rnying rgyud): rol yang spyan dgu dbyings mi g.yo// 'dul ba'i dbang du bskal pa'i tshul ston cing // rdo rje srin pos ci 'dul yid bzhin rdzogs// rnam thur gsum las sku gsum phrin las 'byung // spyod pa rnam dag
191a5(rnying rgyud): smon lam stobs kyis gshegs// ral bsigs sprul pas 'gro/ don rtse gcig rol// bco brgyad stong pas mnyes mdzad/ rtsa ting ma// brjid pa'i stobs kyis klu rnams zil gnon cing // phra
191a6(rnying rgyud): ma'i skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// 'bad pa med pa'i brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// chos la dbang mdzad ha ya 'gri ba dpal// 'dzin tshul stabs kyis drang srong tshar gcod cing // log lta'i nyes spangs yang / 
191a7(rnying rgyud): dag lha dang ldan// tshul khrims mthar byin drang srong spyod pas che// skye la dbang mdzad bran tshul mi g.yo mgon// shugs 'chang stabs kyis lha tshar gcod cing // 'khyal ba'i spyod spangs dag gi dbang phyug che// 'dod
191a8(rnying rgyud): ba kun la sbyin mdzad rgyal po'i tshul// sems la dbang mdzad 'dod pa'i khro bo rgyal// 'chir ba'i stabs kyis gnod sbyin zhabs kyis mnan// ngag tsub skyon spangs ngag gi dbang phyug che// smon lam mthar byin bdud
191b1(rnying rgyud): 'dul thugs rje'i rtse// las la dbang mdzad bdud rtsi kun ra li// gnon pa'i stabs kyis 'byung po tshar gcod cing // gnod sems nyes spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che// mnyen pa'i stobs kyis mi mthun gnon mdzad cing / 
191b2(rnying rgyud): rdzu 'phrul dbang mdzad 'jigs byed stobs po che// rdeg pa'i stobs kyis srin po tshar gcod cing // bden dang bral ba'i brdzun spangs skyon sel ba// mtshan ma'i thabs kyis mtshan ma 'dul mdzad pa// ye shes dbang
191b3(rnying rgyud): mdzad dbyug pa sngon po can// 'debs pa'i stabs kyis sa bdag tshar gcod cing // brnab sems skyon spangs thugs kyi dbang phyug che// bzod pa sa gzhi lta bu gzhir 'gyur ba// smon lam dbang mdzad 'dam skyes
191b4(rnying rgyud): kuN Da li// zlog pa'i stobs kyis bdud rnams tshar gcod cing // 'dod chags skyon spangs sku yi dbang phyug che// ye shes mthadar phyin nyi zla'i 'od bzhin gsal// skye bzhi mos pas dbang mdzad
191b5(rnying rgyud): hUM ka ra rol pa'i stobs kyis lha rnams tshar gcod cing // ma byin len pa'i skyon spangs bdag nyid che// rab tu shes pa'i shes ra pa mthar 'byin pa// yo byad dbang mdzad gzhan gyis mi thub rgyal
191b6(rnying rgyud): 'jigs byed stabs kyis 'chi bdag zil gnon cing // srog gcod nyes spangs sku yi dbang phyug che// gzung 'dzin skyon spangs bsam gtan dang la gnas// tshe la dbang mdzad 'jigs byed gshin rje gshed// ye
191b7(rnying rgyud): shes thugs rjes zin pas mthar mi 'ching // thugs rjes zin pa'i srid las grol// gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsnyems// 'dod pa'i rgyal po mnyes mdzad la se ke/ rig pa'i sder chen chos
191b8(rnying rgyud): kyi dbyings nyid 'dzin// thugs rje lcags kyus 'khor ba mi gtong zhing // shes rab thabs kyis lcags kyus mtha' gnyis 'dzin// gtso bo dbyug sngon mnyes mdzad dra ti ru// ye shes mtshan sdud thugs rje
192a1(rnying rgyud): khrod 'byung zhing // sprul pas 'gro bsgral sku dang ye shes 'phro// shes snying ma skyes dbu ma'i rig pa skye// stan pa tis khro rgyal gshin rje mnyes// dbying su mtshan ma shes rab thobs brdungs// thugs
192a2(rnying rgyud): / rjes sems can phrin las mtshan ma 'joms// dbu mar ye shes snying rje mi tog dang // mi g.yo mgon po mnyes mdzad mu ha la// rdo rje gtum mo mtshan ma'i dngos po bcom// thugs rje rngam tshul srid pa thal bar brlag/ 
192a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis la mi gnas mtha' bral dbu mar bsdigs// ha ya 'grib mnyes mdzad tsaN Da li// phra mor 'bigs pa'i ye shes dbyingasu 'phen// 'bigs pa'i ye shes gnang du thugs rjes rdeg/ ma khyogs dbu ma chen po'i
192a4(rnying rgyud): don ston pa/ gzhan gyis mi thub mnyes byed sha ya ti// mtshan ma nga med pa'i dbyings thos rig pa'i sgra// dbyings nyid rig shes dbyings la nyan pa'i sgra// de la stan pa gsung gi sgra 'byin pa// bdud rtsir 'khyil
192a5(rnying rgyud): pa sha ya ya tis mnyes// bdag rtog log lta'i mtshan ma bcom/ zhing // za byed mche bas skye bzhi rtsad bcad de// sku dang ye shes/ ma skyes mi dmigs pa// pad+mo 'khyil pa mnyes byed mar na// thugs
192a6(rnying rgyud): dam dbang gis rnam dag dbyings nas bskul// thugs des shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas 'dren// gnyis med mchod bskul dbu ma'i dgyes pa stobs// ma ha ha la mnyes mdzad tsun dam// bskyod pa'i ye shes rnam
192a7(rnying rgyud): / dus gcig gcod// thugs rje shugs kyis 'gro ba gnas nas spor// thabs dang shes rab bskyod pas mtha' gnyis spor// ba ya ba tis khams gsum hUM mdzad mnyes// sdug bsngal thugs rjes mi bzod phrin las dpa'/ 
192a8(rnying rgyud): yal bar mi 'dor brtson 'grus shugs kyis brtan// gdod nas don mdzad 'khor ba mthar thug sgrol// de phyir dpa' brtul za byed bya khram// sdang mig mi 'gyur thugs rje zhi la gnon// mthu rtsal rngom brjid 'gyur med bdu
192b1(rnying rgyud): dpung bzlog tsham ngam ral bsigs gdangs ngar 'jig rten 'gengs// de phyir 'gyur med 'dra med tsa sa ra// rtog pa'i dgra spangs dran pa'i dgon par gnas// 'khrul skyon dri med shes bzhin rdzi mtshor spong // 'gro don dus la
192b2(rnying rgyud): dab na thugs rjes 'jug/ de phyir 'jug par byed pa'i ha ri na// chos dbyings gnas mal rtog pa'i skyon sel zhing // thugs rje spu ris sprul pa bsam mi khyab// dug gsum 'joms mdzad sha rus khrag la rol// sel byed
192b3(rnying rgyud): sprul pas don mdzad d+hu ma// yang dag zon chags 'gro don thabs mkhas ldan// mi 'dul zing thub btang snyoms chen por bzhugs// dus la bab nas brtson 'grus shugs dang ldan// de'i phyir mkhas brtson
192b4(rnying rgyud): mdzad pa'i rtsa la ma// ye shes dbyings la 'jug pa shes bya za// dbyi dngas nyid shes la 'jug pa nyon mongs za// gnyis med ye shes bri ngan las 'khor ba za// de phyir za byed pu ka mu ka ba// rigs btsun ga
192b5(rnying rgyud): por 'gyur bar thams cad 'dul// phrin las rtsal gyis bdud dpung thams cad 'joms// stong nyid sgra bsgrags mu stegs wa tshegs 'jig/ de phyir 'joms byed rtsa mchog sing ha ma// dbyings la ye shes
192b6(rnying rgyud): nyal zhing thugs rje rmi// lhang nag nag po drag po sku ston pa// thugs mchog rnam dag chos nyid dbyingasu mkhyen// de phyir rmi byed 'phra men ri kA ma// ye shes thugs rje stobs kyis mtha' gnyis gnon// tsham ngam ral bsigs
192b7(rnying rgyud): sprul pas bdud dpung 'joms// lus su ci mdzad brtson 'grus stobs kyis rol// de phyir stobs ldan 'phra men ha k+Sha ma// lhag mthong chos dbyings zhi gnas brlan gyis rgyal// thugs rje 'khor bar smon lam stobs kyi
192b8(rnying rgyud): myos/ rtog 'joms rdzas la gtsang sme med par rol// de phyir 'phra men myos byed u ka ru// yid g.yo las can sems par gyur pa ni// ye shes dbang gis thugs rjes 'gro la g.yo// don mdzad god 'brang ye shes dbyi
193a1(rnying rgyud): su mkhyen// de phyir tshul khrims chen po kyi kye ma// bsam pa'i dngos po 'dod la 'dun pa ni// dbyings nyid mnyam nyid ye shes mkhyen pas za// thugs rje 'dun pas 'khor ba bag chags spyong // de phyir 'dra
193a2(rnying rgyud): men za byed don ka ma// dbyings la sems 'dzin yid la byed par 'gyur// ye shes dbyings rtogs drangs pa nyid mo nyal// 'gro mdongs rmongs la thugs rjes mtshan mo ldan// ye shes thugs rjes drangs pa'i u lu
193a3(rnying rgyud): ka/ brtags pa'i dngos la rtse gcig ting 'dzin 'gyur// mnyam nyid mtha' bral dbyings las mi g.yo ba// rtog ge spyod yul byas pas mi mthong ba// de phyir sleb byed 'dra men pa ya ta// las 'bras bden la
193a4(rnying rgyud): yid ches dang gyur te// mnyam nyid dbyings su ye shes thugs kyis mgyogs// zhi gnas spyan rdzi lhag mthong bgrod chags chung / de phyir 'phra men 'gyogs byed b+hag shi ta// nges pa'i dngos la 'dzin
193a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i mos pa 'gyur// lhag mthong ye shes dbyings nyid mnyam 'gyur/ 'dzin// zhi gnas gces par 'dzin pa mi 'phrogs pa// de phyir/ 'phra men 'dzin ma tsa ta ma// 'dris pa'i dngos po ma brjed dran par gyur/ 
193a6(rnying rgyud): dbyings dang ye shes gnyis med ma brjed dran// ting 'dzin 'bum phrag lhag mthong so sor bsal// gnyis la ma rmongs zin ma ti ti la// chos rnams 'byed pa'i byed par gyur pa ni// mnyam nyid ngang du log lta sel byed
193a7(rnying rgyud): cing / rig pa bskyed pas som nyi the tshom gcod// de phyir 'phra men gsod byed na ku la// 'jug pa rang dbang med pa'i gnyid gyur pa// bstan pa'i chos sgrogs log lha myos byed cing // mnyam dang mi mthun log lnga myos byed
193a8(rnying rgyud): phyir/ thams cad myos byed 'phra mena'u shi ka/ gsum 'dus gcod pa'i reg pa gyur pa ni// phrin las bye brag mang po ci mdzad cing // phyag rgya bzhi po ma skyes dbyingasu bros// de phyir 'phra men 'bros byed ka si ka/ 'khor ba'i/ 
193b1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje brjod pas mya ngan 'das// chos sku rdo rje brjod pas mtha' gnyis spangs// rjod byed brjod bral don gyi tshig dang bral// de phyir rjod byed badz+ra pa sham// chos nyid rdo rjes mtshan ma'i dngos po bshig/ ye shes rdo rjes
193b2(rnying rgyud): bzung 'dzin rtog pa bsregs// phyag mtshan rdo rjes dregs pa'i lha bdud bcom// de phyir 'joms byed badz+ra be ra be// 'chi med bdud rtsi yul sems skye 'gag med// grub pa'i bdud rtsi bsam pa'i 'bras
193b3(rnying rgyud): bu thob// thugs rjes 'gro bdud rtsi gtong bla med bsgrub// rtsi mchog ye shes badz+ra a mr-i ta// ye shes 'phro byed yon tan rgya mtsho bsgrub// thugs rjes 'phrog byed 'jig rten dbang du sdud// ye shes thugs
193b4(rnying rgyud): rjes gnyis med dbang du 'ab// de phyir brlag byed brje mar na/ da ni pad+ma dbang chen dang // dbang phyug ma lha rgyud brjod par bya'o// co lnga spyan gyis rgyud lnga'i mi dge 'an// ye shes lnga dang sa sa tsas
193b5(rnying rgyud): 'dul mkhyen// snyan bcus mi dge bcu yi sdug bsngal gsan/ sa lda nas byung rigs lnga'i sprul 'phros pas// rgyud la'i mtsho/ na mdzod brtson ldan rtang bu lnga// dug lnga zhal du shar te rngub mdzad cing / 
193b6(rnying rgyud): ljags lnga the tshom gcod phyir theg lnga 'chang // skye bzhi las bzhis sgrol mdzad shog bzhis bskyod// bcu drug dmyal khams bcu drug phyag gis 'dres// phyogs brgyad 'dul phyir zhabs brgyad khro brgyad bcom/ 
193b7(rnying rgyud): rigs pa ni snod bcud nyi zla 'od dang brdzis// phyogs bzhi rtsal drug dbang phyug yang ches mnan// che ba che yang tshe bla med// bcu drug zhag gis zla dkyil rdzogs pa la// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pas bcu drugs la zhugs
193b8(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhi dbu lngar 'bar ltar rig lnga'i dbu// mkhyen pa'i ye shes thugs rjes gzungs// tshogs chen yongasu rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // dbang chen yong su 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // tshogs chen gnyis
194a1(rnying rgyud): rdzogs ye shes lhun grub pa// dkyil 'khor gsum gyis brjid pa'i khro bo rgyal// thugs rje 'dam skyes spyod pa skyon mi gos// mtha' gnyis dbang mdzad pad+ma he ru ka/ rngam pa'i tshul gyis srin
194a2(rnying rgyud): mo gzugs 'dzin cing // thod rus gdug pa 'bum mar zasu za// srid pa'i sems can chags pa'i snying khrag gsol// dbang drag las mdzad ma bu rak+Sha si// sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das rtog tshangs pa'i gzug
194a3(rnying rgyud): tshad med bzhi rdzogs rtags kyi dbu bzhir ldan// zhabs bzhir smra 'don gling bzhir bkra shis brjod// gti mug yid bzhin rin chen pra ma ti// thams cad mnyam pa nyid rtog gri mchog ma// ma rig du gsum
194a4(rnying rgyud): 'joms mdzad dpal rtso bsnams// bud med chags tshul dbang ma dzad bka' zlog ma// chags pa'i skyon bral te chen re'u tri ma// tham sra cad sgyu ma bzhin du rtogs mkhyen ma// 'brel ba'i thugs rjes san/ 
194a5(rnying rgyud): kun la gtogs// phrin las rgya mtsho sgrol ba'i bzhed chen can// 'khor ba'i rgyud gcod drag mo bo sna be// 'du byed ma rtag dril/ bu'i sgra ltar mkhyen// rtag par bzhin tshul 'khor ba ji srid
194a6(rnying rgyud): bzhugs// nyon mongs tha ba 'bris pa'i mdung thung 'phel// gzhon tshul chags pas dbang mdzad go'u ri// rdo rje las mdzad kun gyi bla na med// lha yi rgyal srid chos la dbang bsgyur zhing // mtshon sbyin brgya mdzad mi/ 
194a7(rnying rgyud): dmigs sku dkar mdog/ gsod byed rdo rje 'bebs byed in tra ma// byams dang thugs rjes dbang mdzad sku mdog dmar// ba nad snod yangs bcud kyi khrag mtsho la// rngam pa'i zhal du du ga gsum za byed ma// sdug
194a8(rnying rgyud): bsngal dbyingasu skyongs mdzad pa ki lam// sems can gdul thabs khro bo mchog tu mkhyen// mun sel sgrol 'bar bdud kyi nad gsos mdzad// 'dam skyes pad ltar 'khor bar sku 'khrungs kyang // chags pa'i
194b1(rnying rgyud): skyon bral dbang mdzad a mr-i ta// zhi ba'i las ni gsod pa'i mchog tu mkhyen// zla ltar yon tan cha shas mthar phyin sku// gdung ba'i nad sel 'jig rten sgrol mdzad cing // gtan mchog thams cad stobs byed sa
194b2(rnying rgyud): mya la/ dbyug pa 'tsheg pa 'dra ba gzhan med mkhyen// thabs kyis ma rmongs phrin las ljang gu'i mdog/ nan dbang drag shul 'tshog pa'i dbyug to bsnams// dregs byed sbyin 'joms mdzad da na ha ma// log par lta
194b3(rnying rgyud): ba 'jigs byed spyan gyi mchog/ skye ba 'phrog byed skye rgyun khrag mtsho gsol// las mdzad chags pa gser gyi rked chings can// drag me rngam tshul klog 'gyu rak+Sha si// phreng ba rgyan gyi nang na mchog tu mdzes// snying
194b4(rnying rgyud): rje rgyun skad pa su zhags pa yis chags med zhing du khams gsum kun 'dren ma// rgyun gyis thugs rjes sgrol mdzad bak+Sha si// 'tshogs pa dbyug pas 'chang ba'i mchog tu mkhyen// gtun bus gdug pa ma
194b5(rnying rgyud): lus 'joms mdzad ma// yon tan mi zad nor gyi gter 'dzin ma// / stong gsum nor gyis rgyas mdzad ral gri ma// ra ro 'dra bar/ dpa' bo gzhan med mkhyen// chos rnams gnyis med don rtags
194b6(rnying rgyud): rtag tu myos/ nyon mongs tha ba bzlog pa'i gshol bsnams shing // dge ba'i lo tog skyed mdzad ru ti ram// brtan pa tsam gyis gzhan pham dpa' bo mchog/ ma lus gsod byed las la 'jug mdzad
194b7(rnying rgyud): cing / bsnyengs pa mi mnga' 'gro don gcig spu spyod// gsod byed 'dra mdzad e ka ra tsam// bud med chags pas 'gro ba dbang du byed// thams cad ma lus mgu byed dge ba'i las// 'dod lha'i mda' 'phen srid
194b8(rnying rgyud): gsum yid 'phrog ma// thugs rjes zhen pa'i ma ni ha ram// khrag lus zas gzhan med par rtogs mkhyen cing // gdon rnams bsgyur ba'i las mdzad sgo gtong can// mi zad nor gyi gter ldan bum pa 'dzin// sdug
195a1(rnying rgyud): bsngal stong thagazugs cig/ reg bya'i sems rlung gi khams te mchog// srid gsum dbugs kyi srog sbyin tshe 'phel ma// bder gshegs ras rgyas sems can sgol mdza tsang / kha
195a2(rnying rgyud): gsum gnas nas skyon mdzad pa ya be// snyigs ma lnga ldan lnga brgya'i tha ma la// srid gsum 'khor ba'i sems can gdul dka' ba// bsad pa nyid la las kyis 'dul bar mdzad// sdug bsngal dbying
195a3(rnying rgyud): su gsol mdzad mo ra na// gzi brjid can de me yi khams te mchog/ 'bar ba mchog gis gdug pa ma lus bsregs// za byed bskal pa dus mtha' tshul ston pa// lhag mthong ye shes 'bar 'phro oMg
195a4(rnying rgyud): ni ye/ mche ba dag pas skye bzhi rtsad gcod bzhugs// nyan thos datha ba bzlog mdzad phag gi dbu// 'og gi phyogs nas srid gsum stobs kyis spor// skye bzhi rtsad gcod za byed pa ra ti// 
195a5(rnying rgyud): 'chi bdag thams cad gnas nas ma 'bos mkhyen// thams cad gsod byed dam nyams 'ching dag mdzad// dam tshig bsrung nga'i 'ching dag zlog mdzad cing // lung gi dur khrod dbang ma
195a6(rnying rgyud): dza mun te// 'jigs las lpags pa'i grags ni gzhan med mkhyen// stong phrag brgyad cu grags la mnga' mdzad cing // sna chen glang sna bdud rtsi 'ge'u wang mthong // sdug bsngal nang gsos mdzad pa'i
195a7(rnying rgyud): pu ta ma/ chu las lhag pa'i nor ni gzhan med mkhyen// nor gyi tshogs rnams ma lus 'phrog mdzad cing // gdug pa 'dul phyir dug gtong sbrul zhags bsnams// zhi gnas ting 'dzin dbang
195a8(rnying rgyud): sdud pa run/ 'gro ba'i don mdzad mi 'gyur sku mdog gnag/ srid gsum 'joms mdzad tri shUl gdengs po bsnams// thugs rje shugs kyis 'dren mdzad lcags kyu bsnams// 'khor bar
195b1(rnying rgyud): thugs rjes shar ba'i ka ma la// chags pa'i thugs rjes don mdzad ra mgo can// byams pa'i zhags pa 'khor ba'i rgyud 'dzin cing // gang la cis 'dul de la des ston pa// yon tan tshogs rdzogs re skong tsa ka lam/ 
195b2(rnying rgyud): ston pa'i bka' dang rang gi dam bcas gnyis// mi 'da' ma grub rab tu brtan par bzhugs// dam tshig sgrog gis sems can 'dul mdzad cing // ma rig nub mdzad kum pa ka rnam// sku gsum yon tan
195b3(rnying rgyud): phrin las mtha' klas pa// stong pa'i sgras bskul 'gro ba'i rgyud la 'bebs// so so'i skad du chos kyi sgra sgrogs pa// ma chags byang mdzad lam po d+ha ra ma// dpal rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las
195b4(rnying rgyud): bzlas pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang dgasung dang thugs rdo rje las thabs dang shes rab kyi byang chub kyi
195b5(rnying rgyud): sems kyi dbang 'di bka' stsal to// dkyil 'khor 'dom ga dgu bzhi la dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pad+ma'i lte ba la rag ta'i maNaDa bya sa te dbus su badz+ra he ru ka/ shar du bud d+ha he ru ka/ lhor rad na he
195b6(rnying rgyud): ru ka zhung la skem khya ga Na e bu// mtshams bzhir khro mo dbang phyug ma bzhi/ de'i phyi rim snam bu la go'u rim brgyad/ de'i phyi rim la sing ham brgyad/ sgo bzhi dang sgo khyud dang bcas pa/ zhing gi rgyan mtshan/ 
195b7(rnying rgyud): ras chen gyi 'phan gdugs/ tsi ti'i thog mang sa'i bla re/ de nas bcom ldan 'das thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems yum gyi sku la bstims te/ yum kun tu bzang mos rang gi mtha' la byang
195b8(rnying rgyud): chub kyi sems blangs te/ nyid las mi gzhan pa'i 'khor rnams dbang bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // byang chub sems nyid sgom pa'i dbang // dbyings dang
196a1(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// sems nyid rtogs pa'i thig btab ste// de ru slob ma bskur bar bya// chos rnams thams cad brtag par dka'// brjod pa'i tha snyad kun las 'das/ 
196a2(rnying rgyud): da ltar sa gsum gnon pa ni// sems can nang na mi yin te// sangs rgyas mis ni bsgrub thag nye// byang chub sems de'i don rtogs nas// 'bras bu yang dag mngon du 'char// de las kyang ni ma gtogs
196a3(rnying rgyud): pa/ de las sangs rgyas gzhan na med// sems nyid dngos po de las med// bstan cing yang mi rtogs par dka'// bsgom pa'i dngos gzhi'ang de las med// sems kyis brtag par dka' na yang
196a4(rnying rgyud): tshig gis 'di yin bstan dka' zhes// sangs rgyas byang chub se mas nyid 'di// de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// bo d+hi tsi ta hUM/ daphyi yi tshul du rtog 'gyur na// sems la srid pa thams cad chub
196a5(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur/ nang gi tshul du rtogs 'gyur na// sems la sku gsung thugs kyang 'phrug par gnas// gsang ba'i tshul du/ snang ba thams cad ni// yum chen kun tu bzang mo zhes kyang bya/ 
196a6(rnying rgyud): sems ni snang ba shar ba'i ye shes yin// gnyis su med par rtogs na chos kyi sku// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// badz+ra tsi ta hUM/ mngon pa'i sangs rgyas che ba yun chen kun tu bzang // bdag nyid
196a7(rnying rgyud): chen po sangs rgyas kun tu bzang po ni// yab yum gnyi su med par gyur pa las// byang chub sems nyid bde ba chen po yin// chos kyi dbyingasu sangs rgyas bde ba chen po ni// yum dang sems nyid gnyis su
196a8(rnying rgyud): med pa yin// rdo rje sems ni ye nas mi 'gyur te// skye 'gag med pa'i sems nyid don yin te// sems dpa' yi ni bdud bzhi med pa'i don// kun du khyab cing bdal ba dpag tu med// thams cad man
196b1(rnying rgyud): ngag la ni thams cad// sangs ni rgya ba'i che bar gsungs// byi ni snod kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na// 'byung ba lnga las sangs rgyas gzhan na med// nang ni bcud kyi 'jig rten rtogs 'gyur na// sems las ma
196b2(rnying rgyud): rtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med// byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// bsdu ba'i gnas su nges pa med ces bya// rang 'byung ye shes nyid kyang tshig gi mtha' las 'das// sems la dngos po
196b3(rnying rgyud): med cing gzung du med// gnas ni yum gyi b+ha ga ya ti ste// rnam par mi rtog chos nyid stong par gsal// byang chub sems kyis dang 'dir dbang bskur ro// rig pa rnyed pa dag la shin tu gsal// byang chub
196b4(rnying rgyud): sems kyi dngos gzhi ma gtogs pa// sangs rgyas gzhan/ na med ces 'byung ba yang // mi rtog pa'i lta ba mi bslad pa'i ye shes te// mi gtong ba'i spyod pa mi 'gyur ba'i sems nyid yin/ 
196b5(rnying rgyud): mi 'da' ba'i dam tshig mi 'bral ba'i gzungs// mi g.yo ba'i chos nyid dbyings dag pas// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dang nga bskur ro// mnyam par shes pa sangs rgyas kun gyi rje// mtho ris
196b6(rnying rgyud): srin mo na rag dmyal ba kun// mnyam pa'i don dang rig pa gnyis med pas// 'di dang phyi ma'i don du bsgom par bya// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// mdzod gsum rton pa sangs rgyas kun
196b7(rnying rgyud): gyi rje/ phyi ma'i don du srid pa'i gnas 'gro bas// nang gi tshul du gnas ni rtogs 'gyur na// sku gsum lus ngag yid gsum gnas 'gyur ni// de yang gsang ba'i gnas su rtogs par bya// kun gzhi
196b8(rnying rgyud): yid dang rnam shes yid dang gsum// gsang ba'i mdzod gsum yin pas bskur bar bya// de la sems kyi gzugs ni ci 'dra ba// tsai ta'i dbyings nas 'od ni mtshon gang 'phro// dkar ser snum la 'dril ba
197a1(rnying rgyud): gcig tu gnas// las 'phro len las gzhan ni len pa'i tshe// sems ni rta dgugs nyid rgyu ba yi 'dul// mi chags mi 'khor ba yi don de ni// 'od dang bcas pa tshon gang gsal bas
197a2(rnying rgyud): bsgom// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rtag pa chen po rnam snang mdzad// mi skyod pa ni sems kyi mchog/ bdag gi lus ni rtag pa ste// bdag gi gsung ni 'gyur ba yin// bdag gi sems
197a3(rnying rgyud): ni mi spyod pa/ sems nyid dus gsum 'gyur ba med par gsung // byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// thig le chen po dgu yi lung bstan pa// man ngag gnyer chen rnam shes tshogs dgu ste// yid kyi
197a4(rnying rgyud): rnam shes las 'phro len pa'i don// rnam par shes pa'i byang / chub sems nyid 'di// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bsku dar ro// med pa'i phyal ba dang ni gcig pu lhun gyis rdzogs// sangs
197a5(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi rje bcan bskal par mi nyams rdul tsam med// rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rang dbang las// gzhan na sangs rgyas bcum 'gyur kyang // brtsal kyang rgyal ba mi brnyed do// thams cad
197a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur med byang chub sems dpa' las// ma gtogs gzhan na med ces bya bar gsungs// byang chub sems nyid mnyam par khyab gdal te// bdag dang gzhan du med par rtogs pa la// de ltar sus rtogs
197a7(rnying rgyud): skyes bu gcig pu yin// lhun gyis rdzogs pa zhes kyang de la bya// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// dran pa'i sems can sems kyi rang bzhin ni// dkar 'tsher snum la 'dril bas byang chub sems/ 
197a8(rnying rgyud): 'dzangs pa zin po sems shes de la bya// blun po byol song sems ni na bun dung bas 'dres// sems gnas phung po tsi ta'i dbyings dkyil na// 'od kyi thig le dkar 'tsher gnas pa ni// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa'i
197b1(rnying rgyud): sems de ni/ ti dang ra dang nas gtags zhabs 'khyud rnams// gu gu zla tshes dag tu gnas gyur te// mi las sangs rgyas dag tu gnas bsgyur nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs kyi sa bon 'di// bdag gi ma/ 
197b2(rnying rgyud): yengs brjed bral med par 'di bsgoms nas// sangs rgyas 'bras bu yang dag byang chub sems// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// nyams pa 'chad pa byung ba la// mgon tshun de las gzhan med do// rnal
197b3(rnying rgyud): 'byor dam nyams gzhan gyis mi skongs kyis// bdag gi sems nyid kun tu bzang po'i ngang gyur na// bya rtsa dang ni bral zhing 'das pa yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das pa yin// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dbyer med mnyam pa
197b4(rnying rgyud): chen po dang // de la sangs rgyas gang nas btsal kyang rgyal bas mnye das par ma gsungs so// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang ba/ skur ro// glang po dpal gyi thugs kha nas// lcags kyi zer chen bzhis
197b5(rnying rgyud): 'phros te/ 'aglang po dpal chen he ru ka'i// lus ngag yid gsum sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// 'od zer dgu 'phros gdug pa ma lus bcom// 'gro ba mtha' dag rnams kyi don byas te// bdag gi
197b6(rnying rgyud): rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad kyang // kun gzhi snying la 'dus pa'i he ru ka/ de ltar lags pas rtogs na byang chub sems// gang nas btsal kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur te// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// bdag med
197b7(rnying rgyud): khams kyi snod gang du// rgya che gsal ba'i khams bkang ste// re dogs med par phung 'gro yang // nyam nga med par lam gyi mchog/ gza' gtad med pas don du bde// de bas rang sems bgrod pa'i sa// byang chub
197b8(rnying rgyud): sems ni yangs zhing rgya che ste// de bas bdag gis lus rtogs na// snod bcud la sogs rtogs pa'i skyes mchog rnams// shes gsal blo ldan rnams la ye nas rnyed pa gsal// bla ma'i rgyud mchog de la yid ces gsungs
198a1(rnying rgyud): te rdzogs rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// bsgoms pas rnyed par mi 'gyur ma bsgoms stong bral med// thugs nas zhal du byung ba 'gro ba'i don du gsungs// na rgyud ston pas
198a2(rnying rgyud): thugs brtol te/ lus dang sems las ma gtogs bsgom du med// bsgoms nas sems nyid gzhan nas btsal yang rnyed par ma gsungaso// dus gsum rgyal bas ye nas ma bcos te// rang sems gdod
198a3(rnying rgyud): nas ma skyes chos kyi sku// chos nyid bsgom par bya ba gang yang med// man ngag shes rab sbyin chen des gsungs pas// lus dang sems las ma gtogs na// bdag gi sku gsung thugs la chang bar gnas// 
198a4(rnying rgyud): gal te brjod pa'i mtha' bzhi yod na ni// don rdzogs sgom pa dpo yang yod par 'gyur// lus sems skye ba med bden pa das// bsgom du med par 'jog pa gang // der kun rdzogs shing chub pani
198a5(rnying rgyud): der gan so// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// zla gsang dkar dmar rlung ka lci// zla ba shes rab gsal ba thabs chen te// thig le byang chub sems nyid dkar la 'tsher ba yi// dmar
198a6(rnying rgyud): ba yug gi rag tu byang chub sems// rlung la shor du mi rtsal thig le sgrom bu sba// de las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med// man ngag tshul du zla ba'i gzugs yin te// gsang ba'i tshul du yid kyi rnam shes
198a7(rnying rgyud): nyid kyang zla ba yin// thig le sems kyi rang bzhin snum la 'dril// man ngag len par byed pas sems kyi thig le yin// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas gzhan na med// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir
198a8(rnying rgyud): dbang bskur ro// rang byung che ba'i ye shes mi 'gyur la// chos nyid rang gis gnas pa'i rang bzhin la// dmigs bral ting 'dzin rgya mtshor rab sprul te// yid ni 'phags pa'i lam ni gnas pa ni// phra zhing
198b1(rnying rgyud): zab pa bstan dka' rgyal ba'i sku// dran pa byed pa'i rtsol dang srog chags gsum// kun gzhi pad+ma'i yig 'bru gsal bar byed// byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rgyu ni skye ba med pas rnam par
198b2(rnying rgyud): dag 'bras bu 'gags pa med pas byang chub sems// byang chub sems de skye med ye shes dbyings// skye med mi 'gyur mi shigs rdo rje'i don// sems la rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu bsgom// byang chub sems
198b3(rnying rgyud): kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// 'byung ba chen po bcom ldan 'das// na mkha' rdo rje snang ba ston pa'i sangs rgyas so// sa rdo rje chos nyid ye nas gnas pa'i sangs rgyas so// me rdo rje chos nyid rin po che'i sangs/ 
198b4(rnying rgyud): rgyas so/ chu rdo rje snying rje chen pos brlan pa'i sangs rgyas so// rlung rdo rje 'dod pa sgrol ba'i sangs rgyas so// 'byung ba bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang bskur ro// dngos grub stsol ba rnam gnyis te// 
198b5(rnying rgyud): nges pa'i lung dang rang bzhin no// chos kyi dbyings las mnga'/ bsnyen nas// gang ltar bsgrubs kyang dbyings kyi don// cho/ kyi dbyings la 'char ba dang // dbang chen dbang bsgyur 'chi ba med// 
198b6(rnying rgyud): sprul pa kun tu bzang po nyid// sgrib dang 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro// lhun gyis grub pa'i dbang chen ni// de yangs gser zla ba me// gser dang 'dra ba'i byang chub sems/ 
198b7(rnying rgyud): / byang chub sems ni sa zhes bya// zla ba me dang 'dra ba yi// byang chub sems nyid kun tu bzang // gsal zhing dro la nyan mongs sreg/ byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur ro// don ni dbyings dang ye shes yin// yab
198b8(rnying rgyud): yum gnyis med rol pa yi// rag ta byang chub sems dkyil na// ma skyes rdzogs pa'i he ru ka/ sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// yon tan phrin las rdzogs mdzad pa// gsang ba'i don gyis dbang
199a1(rnying rgyud): bskur ro// gsang ba yum chen kun tu bzang // rag tu byang chub sems dkyil na// ma hA su kha'i dkyil 'khor dbyings// sems kyi thig les thig btab ste// dkyil 'khor zlum po/ 
199a2(rnying rgyud): 'khyil ba la 'chos kyi dbyings las spros pa'i sku// don gyi dbyings nas lha dang lha mo dgod// nges pa'i don gyis dbang bskur te// nga dang rang bzhin bdag nyid chen po ste// lhun gyis rdzogs
199a3(rnying rgyud): dang spros pa med pa yi// thugs kyi dkyil nas 'byung ba rigs kyi sras// kun tu bzang po yum dang don gyi thabs tshon las// man ngag dang bcas pa yi ye shes snying po'i don// bcom/ 
199a4(rnying rgyud): ldan gsang ba'i mchog gi dkyil 'khor na// dpal/ chen kun tu bzang po ye shes te// gsang ba'i byang chudab sems kyis dbang bskur ro// dkyil 'khor ma hA su kha'i
199a5(rnying rgyud): gnas/ ma hA su kha'i dbyings nyid na// byang chub se mas nyid de kho na// ye shes chen po lhun gyis rdzogs nas gnas// ma hA su ka gsang ba chen po 'di// don dang ldan te/ 
199a6(rnying rgyud): kun tu bzang po yin// ngang las ma g.yos kun tu bzang po ni// gnyis su med par rnam par dag pa'i phyir// gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// yum gyi nags tshal
199a7(rnying rgyud): chen po 'dul med du// rtag tu mnyam pa nyid kyi ngang du bzhugs// dang ni dus gsum bzhugs shing rang bzhin 'gyur ba med pa yin// bdag nyid 'dus ma byas pas skye ba med par lhun gyis grub
199a8(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// srid pa byang chub sems sum bcos thig ler zlum// sngar 'das dang ldan pa zhugs dang phyis 'byung ba'i// sems nyid rtogs pa'i byang chub/ 
199b1(rnying rgyud): sems dpa' rnams// nyon mongs dri ma yenas med pa'o// ye nas sangs rgyas ma skyes lhun gyis grub// byang chub sems nyid gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro// dpal chen kun tu bzang po dbye ba med
199b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i don// sku gsung thugs kyi rgyud las sprul pa mang po 'phro// lhag pa'i ye shes bye brag gcig 'du'o// phyag rgya 'gyur ba med pa rgyan gyi phyag rgya'o// sku ni thams cad chos kyi sku ru
199b3(rnying rgyud): 'dus lam ni thams cad rol pas chub pa'o// yum gyi dbyings chen rang bzhin rnam par dag/ zas ni thams cad bdud rtsi lnga yi don// spyod pa bya ba med pa chen po'o// thugs ni rtog pa mi mnga'
199b4(rnying rgyud): sa la ba'o// ldem dgongs don dam byang chub sems kyi don byang chub sems kyis deng 'dir dbang bskur ro// rnar brgyud ste/ ngan pas thugs brtol te// nges pa'i lung dang don yang sangs
199b5(rnying rgyud): rgyas yin/ sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyingasu 'gro ba zhes// byang chub sems ni kun tu rtag pa'i don// rdzogs pa'i ye/ shes bde ba chen po nyid// dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskuro// sku
199b6(rnying rgyud): rgyan 'khor lo lung chen zab mo nang nas gsal// lnga bzhin nang du 'khor ba yang // ye shes sangs rgyas de las med// lta ba 'di la gnas shing rnal 'byor skal pa bzang // bder gshegs kun gyi
199b7(rnying rgyud): thugs dam byang chub sems kyi don// don dam dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// dbyings nas gsal shar bdal ba la// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor 'byam re yas// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor
199b8(rnying rgyud): yid la thim/ 'greng ldog spyi'u tshugs gar 'gyur yang // gang ltar byas pa byang chub sems kyi don// thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor du// mun nag langs kyang khams gsum gsal// ye shes khrus
200a1(rnying rgyud): kyi rdzing bu ru// dril dag pas rdul mi 'go/ dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das nyid las gzhan pa'i 'khor rigs bzhis 'khor ba'i 'phra men ma dang / khro ba
200a2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje bka'i po nya rnams la bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje dbang // de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas rnams su grub bya'i phyag/ rdo rje 'di ni khyod kyis long // shes rab thabs kyi
200a3(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya 'dzin// rnam grol dag pas gsung skad sgrogs// dril bu 'di ni sgra snyan gyis// phyogs bcu kun tu sgrogs par byed// dbang mchog 'dis ni dbang bskur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du/ 
200a4(rnying rgyud): bya rag ta'i mgo ma yin gyis byugs la// de ru dpal chen dgod par bya// phra men 'khor dang po nyas bskor// de ru slob dam gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid
200a5(rnying rgyud): dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na/ dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das
200a6(rnying rgyud): kyis phyi dang nang dang gsang ba gsum gyis bka' stsal to// phyi yi dbang rin po che sna bdun la sogs te dbang rdzas lnga bcu rtsa lngas dbang bskur ro// nang dbang dpal chen po yab yum dang khro bo dang pra men rnams
200a7(rnying rgyud): kyis phyag mtshan gyis dbang bskur ro// gsang dbang thabs dang shes rab byang chub sems kyis dbang bskur ro// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa gsang ba zab mo las dbang gi le'u ste bdun
200a8(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas kyis kyang mkhyen pa'i ye shes
200b1(rnying rgyud): la sku gsung thugs mnga' ba'i rtags su dang po phyag rgya chen po drug dang ldan par bsgom mo// de nas kun mkhyen ye shes kyis thabs mkhas pa'i thugs rjes go shag gis phye la kun tu snang gi ting nge 'dzin du bsgom
200b2(rnying rgyud): mo de nas rgyu'i ting nge 'dzin du yi ge hUM 'thing nag las sku smug nag 'jigs pa'i sku// gsung gi drag shul spyod pa'i sngags// thugs ting nge 'dzin hUM 'thing nag las 'phags pa'i skur bsgom mo// de nas he/ 
200b3(rnying rgyud): ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang gnyi su med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'khyil ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyes pa chen po'i ting nge
200b4(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dang / grub pa rdzas kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje tshogs kyi ti dang nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje bza' ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bdud rtsi btung ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lha'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 
200b5(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdzogs pa chen po'i ting ngo / 'dzin dang / rdo rje gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dkyil 'gro/ ra chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bla na med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje
200b6(rnying rgyud): gsang ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dgyes pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / don yod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu 'dus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa 'joms pa chen po'i
200b7(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin dang / tshul khrims chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbu ma chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bden pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra sgrogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dam tshig gi ting nge 'dzin dang / lhun gyis
200b8(rnying rgyud): grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu bzang po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'bar ba chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gtum po rngam pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi ting nge
201a1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin dang / rdo rje 'gugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje las kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / khrag 'thung chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje ltos pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng gdong chen po'i ti
201a2(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / gzhad gdong chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje mtshon cha'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje'i dur khrod kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / dregs pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje ngo mtshar gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / 
201a3(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mthor ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rngam pa'i byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glo snying nang khrol 'dren cing za ba'i ti/ 
201a4(rnying rgyud): nge 'dzin dang / sprul pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / cho 'phrul gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / byin gyi rlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa'i dating nge 'dzin dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// bcom ldan
201a5(rnying rgyud): 'das he ru ka rol pa'i rgyud gsang ba zab mo las ting nge 'dzin gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa'i mnyes pa chen po'i mchod/ 
201a6(rnying rgyud): pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // de la mchod pa dam pa ni// thog mar rtog bsgoms bdag nyid bsgral// de nas gnyis med blo yis ni// blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje// gnyis
201a7(rnying rgyud): su med par ba sgrol bar bya// 'khril ba'i 'jig rten mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mchod par bya// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ bdag dang mnyam pa'i tshogs la 'bul// bza'
201a8(rnying rgyud): dang gtung dang bca' dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khol ni dbul bar bya// mnyes pa'i mchod pa chen pos rab tu mchod// sha chen dang ni dri chen dang // ga bur rag ta'i dri chu dang
201b1(rnying rgyud): ma he rta dang khyi sha dang // na ge ge rgya gshog pa can// 'di dag 'phags pa'i tshogs la dbul// pad+ma can dang gdung can dang // b.lang can dang ri mo can// 'di dag mnyes pa'i mchod par dbul// zhing gi rgyal
201b2(rnying rgyud): mtshan sha chen tog/ ras chen dag gi bla re dang // zhing gi dbyug pa tsi ta'i tog/ til mar dag tu bcas pa rnams// 'di dag mchod par dbul bar bya// mnyes pa'i mchod pas rab mchod na// thams cad
201b3(rnying rgyud): ma lus mngon sangs rgyas// phyi yi mchod pa dang nang gi mchod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las mchod pa gsang ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das
201b4(rnying rgyud): he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // bla med mi spang ba dang / bla ma bskur ba dang / sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / yang dag pa'i lam la zhugs pa dang / gsang
201b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i don tu mi smra ba dang / rtsa ba lnga dang sgrub pa dang / bsrung ba/ dang / gti mug dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / nga rgyal dang / phrag dog dag mi spang ngo // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri
201b6(rnying rgyud): chen sha dag pa'i snod bcud mi 'ongar// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste// ye nas ma nyams rtogs pas spyad// bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ni// rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spong mi 'dor gnyis
201b7(rnying rgyud): po ni// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba ni// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob gyur nas// 'das na sangs rgyas ma yin no// rtsa nyams pa yi phyal ba
201b8(rnying rgyud): dag/ gsol nye bar mi brtson dang // skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed// nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams 'gyur na// bsgrub pa thams cad nyams par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna
202a1(rnying rgyud): tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung // dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag nyid
202a2(rnying rgyud): yin/ rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni// gcig la gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su med// bsrung bar bya ba dang mi spang ba brgya nyi shu/ dang du
202a3(rnying rgyud): blang ba brgya nyi shu/ spyad par bya ba brgya nyi shu/ spyir sum brgya drug cu'o// dam tshig 'di rnams ma nyams sangs rgyas so// nyams na dmyal ba yin par shes par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa
202a4(rnying rgyud): las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // blang bar bya
202a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i snod ni gang // spang bar bya ba ci lta bu// mtshan nyid rnam pa du zhig mchis// spyad par bya ba du zhig mchis// de nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka rol pa'i don bka' stsal pa/ dum
202a6(rnying rgyud): bugacig dang / dum bu gnyis gsum dang gni dang lnga pa dang / drug pa dang ni bdun pa dang // dum bu brgyad pa rab tu grags// bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u rigs dang // dmangs rigs bud med rigs ma nges/ 
202a7(rnying rgyud): dkar dang dmar dang dkar sngo dang // sngo dang de bzhin ser skya te// thal ba'i mdog dang mdog mi sdug/ kha dog bdun tu rab tu grags// nyi rim dang ni glang po'i rgyab// 'khor ba de bzhin bya rog rjes// dung
202a8(rnying rgyud): sngo gcig dang dung gnyis dang // chag pa dang ni mtshams gyes pa// 'di dag thams cad rab brtags te// rab tu brtags de spyad par bya// shin tu mnyam pa'i sa phyogs sam// snyi ba'am yang na dul ba'i sar/ 
202b1(rnying rgyud): sngags kyis btab ste gnam du bsgyur// ltung ba'i mtshan nyid 'di rig bya// lho phyogs kha bltas bram ze med// srin po'i phyogs bltas glang po stsol// nub kyi phyogs bltas rigs ngan te// rlung gi phyogs
202b2(rnying rgyud): bltas gsang mi thub// byang gi phyogs bltas phyug por 'gyur// dbang ldan phyogs bltas sngags grub ster// shar du bltas na bdag nyid gsod// ma yi phyogs bltas she'u shing med// 'og tu
202b3(rnying rgyud): bltas na rkun por spyod// steng du bltas na bud med gsod// glor bltas de ni rigs ngan te// snod kyi mtshan nyid 'di rnams so// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// dge ba sprul pa'i snod dag ni// dum bu gci
202b4(rnying rgyud): pa sa la dbang // gnyis pa de ni rgyal phran 'gyur// gsum pa de yang nor la dbang // bzhi pa de yang sngags sgrub 'gyur// lnga pa de yang chos kyang sgrub// drug pa de ni slong ba yin// bdun pa de ni
202b5(rnying rgyud): brtul shugs so// brgyad pa yongasu spang bar bya// dum bu gcig pa bram ze'i rigs// gnyis pa de na rgyal po'i rwa gas// gsum po rje'u rigs yin pa ste// bzhi pa de ni dmangs
202b6(rnying rgyud): rigs so/ bu gu med dang mang ba ni// mkhas pa shin tu spang bar bya// bong chung ba dang srab pa dang // gang dag ser bar 'gyur ba ni// bud med yin par shes par bya// bud med rab tu smad pas na// de dag rab tu
202b7(rnying rgyud): spang bar bya// ser skya dang ni dkar ba dang // kha dog sna tshogs spang bar bya// dung med pa dang dung gnyis dag/ lha mo sprul pas mi blang ngo // dung sngo ba dag sdug bsngal te// bya rog rjes ni 'thab rtsod 'gyur// nyi rim gyis
202b8(rnying rgyud): ni gsod par 'gyur// glang po rgyab ni nang du 'gyur// 'di las gzhan yang bshad bya ste// gsang ba sgrub thod mtshan nyid ni// yan lag che phra mang ba'i bdag/ dpag bsam shing ni yod gyur na// 'dod pa'i 'bras
203a1(rnying rgyud): bu thob 'gyur ste// sngags pa de la the tshom med// dbus nagashong bu bzhi yod na// 'di ni 'dod 'job zhes bya// mdun na gshong bu gnyis yod na// yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya'o// de yi
203a2(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid ldan pa'i snod// su dag rtag tu 'chang ba ni// longs spyod thar pa thob 'gyur te// de la lha mo the tshom med// de nas rigs ni rnam bshad de// snod rnams kyi ni bye brag dang // dung dang kun zla 'dra/ 
203a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i mdog/ snam la mnyam du sdug pa ni// sngags rnams thams cad 'grub ster yin// dbang phyug chen por shes par bya// thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che// pad+ma'i dbyings su 'dab mar brgyan// tshangs pa'i
203a4(rnying rgyud): skung pa gsol ba yod// 'di dang tshangs par rig par bya/ sbrang rtsi ser skya'i mdog 'dra ba'i// zhi ba'i thig les rnam par brgyan// khyab 'jug pa yi snod yin te// zug rngu dgra rnam
203a5(rnying rgyud): 'joms par byed// kha dog dmar zhing lnga pa la// pad+mo dam ra bas brgyan pa dang // zlum pa shin tu rnam pa ste// snod 'a/ de gzhon nu ma zhes bya// cung zad ser zhing zlum la zab// gang
203a6(rnying rgyud): dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa// de yi mtshan ldan gang yin pa// dbang phyug chen mo rigs chen yin// phag mo'i gdong dbyibs 'dra ba la// rab tu mkhregs shing mu tig 'phro// sha yi dri dag mnam pa yi// 
203a7(rnying rgyud): snod ni phag gdong ma zhes bya// thal ba'i mdog la bong yang che// thig le chen pos rnam par brgyan// khrag 'dzag pa yi dri mnam pa// 'jigs byed ma yi snod ces bya// snod kyi khyab par shes
203a8(rnying rgyud): byas nas// sngags pas 'di dag rtag 'chang na// bdag bka' byed na bzhin bzangs ma// de la bgegs kyis tshugs mi 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// snod kyi dngos po khyad pa ni// tshangs
203b1(rnying rgyud): ba bram ze bcang bar bya// rtag tu dngos grub sbyin par byed// sgrub pa chen po'i dus dag tu// khyab 'jug dang ni 'byor kun la// rtag tu las rnams 'grub par byed// rgyal rigs kyis ni gzhon nu ma// pa
203b2(rnying rgyud): rol yul ni rnam par 'joms// rje'u rigs kyi ni dam chen mo// blo dang ldan pas bzlog phyir bshad// gsang dang bsgral dang bstabs pa'i phyir// dmangs rigs kyis ni phag gdong bcang // las
203b3(rnying rgyud): dang rigs rnams thams cad dang // 'jigs byed mas ni dngos grub ster// re ba med pas bdag nyid mas// grub pa'i khyad par 'di shes pas// 'du ba med pas bdag bsams te// rtag tu 'di dag
203b4(rnying rgyud): spyad cing bcang // bdag gi dngos grub skye ba yi// sngags dpas de nas bshad par bya// oM na ba ba to// ba du ba ya sma sha na/ ba si ni i tang ka pa la/ a be sha ya/ a be sha ya/ 
203b5(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT swA hA/ thal ba dang / me tog dang / chu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad snod la btab ste blang bar bya// ri mo rdo rje 'khor lo dang // mchod rten dang ni rin po che// pad+ma dang ni ljon shing dang // 
203b6(rnying rgyud): dbus na bu ga gnyis yod pa// mdun na gshong bu gsum dang gnyis// gang dag rdo rje mtshan yod pa// dpal dang ldan pa'i snod gnaso// srubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis dang // srubs gsum pa dang srubs bzhi
203b7(rnying rgyud): pa lnga dang drug dang bdun dang brgyad// dgu dang bcu dang bcu gnyis dag/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// bcu drug pa dang nyi shu drug/ 'di dag rab tu spang bar bya// bcom ldan 'das he ru
203b8(rnying rgyud): ka rol pa las kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol pa snod brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas dbang phyug chen po bsgral ba'i thabs 'di bcom ldan 'das dpal kun
204a1(rnying rgyud): tu bzang po'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo // ma hA ru dra'i rgyud dur khrod ma hA ru dra brgyud pa'i dang du bsdus pa'i mchog/ phyi rol phyogs gar bde ba'i sar zhing chen stan gar 'os pa/ 
204a2(rnying rgyud): gcig tu maN Da la byugs te/ gnas chen dur khrod kyi bdag po chen po'i cha lugs ci ltar nyal tshigs bcad las byung ba bzhin tshon gyis bris/ yang na thal ris dang / yid kyis bkod kyang rung / sta na'i
204a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bsham/ de'i dbus su hom khung gru gsum pa zhig bkod/ rdo rje slob dpon gyis ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bca' ste/ mnyam pa nyid du bsgom pa'i sngags la/ a sa ma hA tsa la d+harma d+ha tA swa b+hA
204a4(rnying rgyud): ba Ad ma ko hUM zhes cung zad bsgoms pa'i rjes la mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po dang / chos kyi sku las bzhengs pa yi// gnyi das med phyag rgya rol pa yis// dus la bab po sa ma ya zhes brjod
204a5(rnying rgyud): nas/ rnal 'byor gzhan gyis 'di ltar byin gyis brlabs nas/ mkhas pa gcig gis las 'di bgyi/ dbang gi gtam rgyud bshad/ rgyud kyi gtsug lag chen po dang bden pa'i tshig gis
204a6(rnying rgyud): bsgrags nas/ 'phags pa thams cad bdag la gson// 'byung po mang po kun nyon cig/ thugs rje ngang dang shes rab dang // thabs la mkhas pa'i byin brlabs kyis// 'gro ba thams cad sbyong bar
204a7(rnying rgyud): mdzad// 'gro ba'i bdag po tshe dang srog/ gson po bde ba'i bar gcod pa// bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// bcom zhing gsod pa'i gnyen po ni// 'jam dpal 'phrul gyi khro bo des// sred gsuM
204a8(rnying rgyud): thar byed rngam pa dang // thod dbyug drag po mi mdzad pas// gshin rje bcom ste bsad nas kyang // ro yang lho yi 'dzam gling du// bor nas sa gzhi dur khrod kyi// bdag po gdol ba drag po yis// ro linya
204b1(rnying rgyud): thabs gan rkyal te// mgo ni lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// de yang cung zad bsnol ba'o// lag pa g.yas g.yon khrig ma la// khyi gnyis dang ni bya rgod do// thal ba'i mdo// 
204b2(rnying rgyud): la sku sgreng ba de yi lus snying yan lag ni// ma mo chen mo rnams kyis gnas// dur khrod chen po 'di dag go/ de yi snying ni ma hA'i lto// dur khrod chen po gsil mtshal na// ma mo chen mo go'u
204b3(rnying rgyud): ma mkhas pa snying stobs che ba'i gnas// de yi mgo ni lho phyogs kyi// sing ga la yi gling bran na// ma mo chen mo tse'u rim// mthong thos rngam pa'i rdzu 'phrul mang // lag pa g.yas ni shar lho mtshams// 
204b4(rnying rgyud): bal yul na ni pu ga si// 'khor dang longs spyod sna tshogs lnga na// lhag par zas kyi 'byor pa che// lag pa g.yon ni lho nub mtshams// sa yi tshal na be ta li// phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas
204b5(rnying rgyud): de nas mthu dang dbang yang che// rkang pa g.yas pa byang shar mtsham sa// li yul na ni tsaN Da li// shang ga na zhes grags pa de/ de yang 'khor dang longs spyod ldan// rkang pa g.yon pa nub byang mtshams
204b6(rnying rgyud): skad ni skad sna mthun pas na// ma mo chen mo pra mo ha// bde skyid ldan pa'i sa la gnas// pho mtshan steng gi byang phyogs na// u rgyan yul na g+hasma ri// sbyor bas longs spyod 'jug pas na// dngos grub can yang de/ 
204b7(rnying rgyud): na mang de nas sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// bris te bsams nas dgongs pa ni// dur khrod bdag pos 'dus pa dang // dbang du sdud pa'i las brtsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs zhes brjod do// de
