204b8(rnying rgyud): nas 'geng la rdo rje khu tshur sku g.ya su gzhag cing // mig gis phyogs bcur bltas te// 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'jig rten 'di// skye shi gnas ni dur khrod kyi// rang bzhin yid ni rnam gzigs nas// sa gzhi dur khrod gnas
205a1(rnying rgyud): su bstan la bdag gis yid ches par bya zhing // stana'i dkyil 'khor bsams la gar bris pa'i sar bltas te/ de'i bdag po la sdigs pa'i phyir ldan pa g.yas byo zhing sdang mig drag tu bgrang / 
205a2(rnying rgyud): mig gi 'bras bu dril la/ sarba pa pa ka ra he ru ka/ byi sta na ma haM ka ru dra hUM phaT/ rigs lnga'i 'khor dang bcas pa yang khro bo'i ngang du gyur te/ bdag dang 'dra bar bsams la/ de nas 'gying rngam pa las ral
205a3(rnying rgyud): papabasigs la/ lag pa g.yas pa bsgreng ser mo gyen du bgra la ba ya ke tsi ta dza la hUM phaT/ ces brjod nas lag pa sta zur du gzhag cing lag pa g.yon pa rngam pa bzhin du skra gyen du gteg la/ pradz+nyA ke shi tsi ta dzA/ 
205a4(rnying rgyud): la hUM phaT/ ces brjod la rngam pa'i ro bgyi/ mche ba 'dar rkan sgra drag tu gtogs la rngom brjid chen po'i tshul dang ldan par bsam/ oM pradz+nyA su pa ya na hUM phaT/ rkang pa g.yas pa bskum/ oM badz+ra
205a5(rnying rgyud): kro d+ha oM sha ya hUM/ de nas slar go cha'i phyag rgya snying kar bcings la btang ste/ oM badz+ra ka be tsa zhes brjod nas go bgo bar bsam sa te/ gnas lngar bsrung zhing / oM na ma d+hu ba bi spyi bor thal mo sbyar te/ 
205a6(rnying rgyud): sarba bud d+ha mu tra sa ha ra na/ a bi shiny+tsa hUM phaT ces brjod pas sku cir yang 'gyur ba'i phyag rgya bcas te/ rkang lag bzhi'i tshogs bskum mgo mgrin 'khril cing bsgril la hUM zhes tshig 'bru drag pos g.yas
205a7(rnying rgyud): g.yon du lba ba'i tshul drag po re re bgyi/ sum bla ni sum b+ha hU~M zhes drag tu brjod do// rdo rje dril bu bsil te/ brkyang bskums bsgreng la 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyog su mchongs la/ khams gsum/ 
205a8(rnying rgyud): nas 'byung sems can rnams// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul du bsdus nas kyang // de dag bdag gi lus la gzung // spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyang // sku dang ye shes mchog gis bya// thar
205b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i bla med dkyil 'khor 'dir// brod pa can rnams dar bltar// skal dang ldan pa rigs kyi bu// bde bar 'ongs pa legs pa 'ongs// rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir// bo d+hi tsi ta'i gnas nyid du// kham
205b2(rnying rgyud): gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu'o// chos nyid skye 'gag med pa las// dbyingasu thim pas gnyis su med// kun gyi ngo bo mnyam nyid do// thams cad snying po byang chub las// ma skyes pas na 'gag pa 'jig/ bdag ni/ 
205b3(rnying rgyud): med pas mnyam pa'i sku// thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad// sems can ma rig rmongs pa'i blos// bdag dang bdag gis so sor bye// log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings// 'khor ba rgyud lnga yi kha brims// 
205b4(rnying rgyud): mya ngan mi 'da' yun rings te// thugs rje chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur bkye// gsung gis mtha' yas sems can sgrol// thugs ni tshad med bzhi dang ldan// sku
205b5(rnying rgyud): gsum 'gro ba'i tshul ston pas// dus la bab pa'i sems can dag/ las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du// thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni// yang dag nyid la/ 
205b6(rnying rgyud): yang dag grol/ yang dag bsgral nas bde chen thob// mi ldog sa la nges par phyin// byin pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas// rgyal ba'i zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong // rgyud drug gnas su mi skye phyir/ 
205b7(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag/ phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// 'khrug pa'i bag chags bag la nyal// bde 'gro lam la sgrib pa'i rnams// ye shes 'bar ba'i mes bsregs te// mtshan nyid
205b8(rnying rgyud): med par stong par 'gyur// sbyor ba'i lhum su phaT kyis phaT// gsang ba'i dbyings hUM gis bsdu// skur bskyed ye shes skur bsdus pas// 'og min gnas mchog dam pa ru// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor
206a1(rnying rgyud): zhing gshegs stong gsum ma lus gdon pa ni// 'bum gyi char yang ma 'ong ngo // skyes bu chen po'i rnal 'byor gyis// bskal pa'abang ning snying rje'i mchog/ nyan thos dgra bcom
206a2(rnying rgyud): rang rgyal dang / ras bcu byang chub sems dpa' dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod// de nas 'gying zhing dkyil 'khor phyog su mchongs la// ma tang gi gnas dang lung gi tshul du smos pa bzhin gsal
206a3(rnying rgyud): bar bsgoms te/ de'i 'khor 'byung po mang po yang mngon du bkug par bsams te/ rkang pa gnyis bsnol ba'i drung du phyin nas byang shar mtshams su kha bltas te/ bdag nyid brkyang bskum gyi tshul du 'greng la/ 
206a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzub ma gnyis rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la/ gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad// sems kyi bdag pos bcad dam ci// gzung 'dzin rga lag bsnol ba'i sgo// yul las 'das
206a5(rnying rgyud): ba'i zhabs kyis bye// de nas hU phaT pra be sha hU phaT// rkang pas shag gis phye bar bsam// de nas lag pa g.yas pa rdo rje gsu ma pa'i phyag rgya bya// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo snying khar bsgreng ste/ 
206a6(rnying rgyud): oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+TA na sa ma ya mu dra pre ban tsa hUM phaT swA hA// bzung thar byed kyis bzung / las thar byed gang gis mnam nas kha lho phyogasu bltas te/ brkyang bskum du bsgreng la a a zhes brjod la/ 
206a7(rnying rgyud): lcags kyus snying kar sgo phye bar bsam/ g.yas nas rgyab du bskor te/ lus kyi nang du zhugs ma thag tu rkang pa bshibs te/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcas te/ hUM zhes sgo phye bar bsam/ g.yas
206a8(rnying rgyud): rgyab kyis bskor bas 'bod par bya// e he hi ma hA ka ru sha/ dr-i karma badz+ra hUM phaT/ ma hA de ba ma ta rung dza zhes rdo rje gar gyi gom pa 'dor zhing lte ba'i phyogs su song la/ shin tu dmar po bzhi lta ba'i phyogs bzhir dgod do// 
206b1(rnying rgyud): yi ge hUM mchog tu brjod cing / g.yas g.yon du lan cig tu gar gyis bskor bar bya'o// de nas snying po 'di brjod par bya'o// d+ho tsi pya d+ho tse pya ma nu d+ha raM/ a ma d+ha raM/ shrI ma hA kA pA la/ d+ho tsa phye/ pad+ma rag ta d+ha ra/ 
206b2(rnying rgyud): badz+ra d+ha raM/ badz+ra ma hA maM ba d+ha raM/ zhes brjod do// de nas gar gyi tshul du snying kha phyogasu song la/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings nas ci ltar bde ba gtor ma sbyin par mkhyen pa ni shes rab mkha' dbyings dang / ma tang
206b3(rnying rgyud): gi lus su dbyer med par gzhal yas khang 'bar ba'i nang du khro bo he ru ka byi'i 'phra men la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bkod do// spyan drang ba'i phyir thabs dang shes rab kyi dbyings nas yi ge dza las lcags kyus
206b4(rnying rgyud): gsal bar phyogs bcur 'bros te/ phyi'i rnal 'byor dgug cing spyan drang ba'i phyag rgya gsal ba las 'khor dang bcas pa spyan drang ngo // mi gsad pa'i bsad pa chen po chos nyid kyis bsgral ba dang / 
206b5(rnying rgyud): sku gsung thugs che ba'i yon tan gyis bsgral ba dang / bdag nyid che/ po lhun gyis grub pas bsgral lo// bcom ldan 'das he ruH
206b6(rnying rgyud): rol pa gsang ba zab mo'i don bdud 'dul ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis he ru ka'i las kyi bzlas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di blo
206b7(rnying rgyud): 'das pa'i dus na sngon byung ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rab las// 'gro ba'i tshul du sngon 'byung ste// de tshe sems can thams cad kun// shin tu khro zhing gdug par gyur// shin tu khro drag gtum pa yang ni
206b8(rnying rgyud): ba'i phan par mi 'gyur te// shes rab thabs kyi ngo bo yis// khro bas de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad// sangs rgyas thugs rjes khros pa yis// thams cad 'jigs pa'i mchog yin te// rdo rje sems dpa' de
207a1(rnying rgyud): bzhin gshegs dam tshig ldang rnams sbyang bye// dus thong gang gyi phyag rgya gsapa// chu shes drug pa pa/ ma du la sags par rlos// ces ming ga ma chags pa bsgom
207a2(rnying rgyud): ces sgo ba la sogs pa bsgom// tsug ce pan kyis ting nge 'dzin bzlas sngags 'dis spyan drang ngo // sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mung tra pra ban dza kras+'u Ta/ e h+ye gi blab+ha ga pan/ ma rbun ho// ru lu ru lu/ ma nu so// 
207a3(rnying rgyud): h+ye Ni tri ka co sa ma ya ho/ e bye hi a ra la d+hi d+hing / dad pa dang ni dam tshig gis// tshur gshegs tshur gshegs he ru ka/ chos sku ni ba'i ngang las ma g.yos kyang // gzugs sku 'jigs tshul bstan du gsol/ 
207a4(rnying rgyud): thugs rje chen po thabs mangs pas// gdug pa 'dul phyir ga/ gshegs su gsol// tshogs rje tshogs bdag dngal dang lnga na/ tshogs kyi slob dpo gshegs su gsol// ye shes rtogs pa'i
207a5(rnying rgyud): khyad par las// sprul pa mang po'i tshogs dang gshegs// m-i he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu dra pra be sha ya shrI he rukadz+dza phaT/ oM dza tsub ho/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ras rba duSh+Ta sa ma ya su pra/ 
207a6(rnying rgyud): ban tsag hUM phaT/ bde gshegs pho brang dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i phyir// don gyi dbang du dgongs nas kyang // 'khor bcas rab 'bar gshegs su gsol// oM shrI he ru ka ma hA \u0f7f
207a7(rnying rgyud): sarba sa ma ya hi/ sarba duSh+Ta~M ka ya bAg tsit+ta badz+ra hUM phaT/ sems can don phyir nan tan mchog bskyed cing // ye shes thugs rjes bdag la dgongs nas kyang // mi gnyis don phyir dngos grub mchog
207a8(rnying rgyud): / gis rnams/ bdag cag stsal cing brtan par bzhugs su gsol// oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu tra a ma bstam b+ha ka hUM phaT/ oM gu h+ya tri sha sa ma ya/ gu h+ya ti sha sa ma ya ho/ oM badz+ra gu/ 
207b1(rnying rgyud): rgya thigs mas su/ dam tshigs la bzhengs pa yi// dpal chem khrag 'thung 'khor dang bcas// dam tshig tshul bzhin mi gshegs sam// grub pa mchog dag ma stsal na// sku gsung bum
207b2(rnying rgyud): dang 'gal bar ro// dzaHhUM ba ho/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba duSh+paM sa ma ya mu dra pra ban tsakra b+hak+Sha ya bak+Sha ya bi togs ya bi togs ya/ he b+ha ga ban/ bud d+ha k+She tra pra ti stam b+ha ka hU~M phaT/ sku gsung thugs su
207b3(rnying rgyud): bdag sbyor bas// pho brang dkyil 'khor rang las sprul// nga ni bdud kyi bdud bdag ste// mkha' 'gro tshogs bcas bsdus pa'o// oM shrI badz+ra ka ra mu ka sha ra yA ya na maHoM badz+ra ra ga sa ma yA ya na ma/ 
207b4(rnying rgyud): oM shrI badz+ra kha T+wAM ga pra ma yA ya na maHoM shrI ga naM d+hi ya ya namaHa ti bu ho/ pra ti bu ho/ ta thA ban d+ha na ka raHmi ma hA yo gi ni/ a ti bu ho/ pra ti bu ho// bdag med byo/ 
207b5(rnying rgyud): bral don dam thugs chud cing // byams dang snying rje sgra thun rma mnga' yang // gdug pa 'dul phyir dus las mi 'da' ba'i// 'jigs byed he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// namakha'i lus can
207b6(rnying rgyud): gar yang thogs med cing // 'dod dgur sgyur ba'i gzugs can 'phrul mo che// ma srid byams pa'i tshul gyis 'grogs mdzad ma// phyi nang mkha' 'gro'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// dzaHhUM ho
207b7(rnying rgyud): shrI he ru ka ya hA i dan pu ya ti ba lin ta/ pra ti dza ho/ shrI ban kha khA hi khA hi/ dzaHhUM baM ho/ shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra a be sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ hU khA hi/ he ru ka yi gnas bcu
207b8(rnying rgyud): dang / dur khrod chen po gnas brgyad nas// dpal chen 'khor bcas spyan drang te// dur khrod mchog gi gnas 'di ru// zhing chen gsar rnying sti lar bcas// dmar gyi arba rgya mtshor bskyil/ 
208a1(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs bcas kyis// ma lus gshegs shing mnab su gsol// rma hUM ba ho shri he ru ka ma hA badz+ra sarba dub+hA sa ma ya mu dra pra ban tsakra/ kha pa dA si gyi
208a2(rnying rgyud): da yan pi pa hUM phaT// nga ni za byed chen po ste// khams gsum ma lus bsgral bar bya// gdul dka' ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya// dzaHhUM baM hoHshrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra/ 
208a3(rnying rgyud): sarba duSh+TAM sa ma ya/ ma hA maM sa ma hA rag ta/ ma hA tsi ta/ ma hA ba su ta/ ma hA pan tsa a mr-i ta kha kha le le hUM b+h+yo hUM b+h+yo hUM/ rang 'byung gdod nas dag pa'o// rtsa brgyad stong la sbyar ba'i sman// rigs lnga dam tshig
208a4(rnying rgyud): lnga yi dngos ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga'i sems can kun sgrol ba'i// dug lnga sel ba'i bdud rtsi ste// phyogs bcu sangs rgyas thams cad dang // byang chub sems dpa'i
208a5(rnying rgyud): tshogs chen gyis/ thugs dam dbyings nyid bskul ba'i mag/ sku gsung thugs kyi ngang nyid 'di// bdag cag dad pas 'bul lags na// bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzod la// 'phrul gyi/ 
208a6(rnying rgyud): dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA arga ma pra ti dza ho// dpal ldan shrI he ru ka dang // yum chen kro d+hi shwa ri la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// bzhes te kun tu dges mdzad la// 
208a7(rnying rgyud): 'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA argam pra ti dza ho// dpal chen badz+ra he ru dang / badz+ra kro d+hi shwa ri la// dam tshig gi ni mchod pa 'bul// dpal chen rang he ru dang
208a8(rnying rgyud): radwa kro d+ha shwa ri la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// dpal chen pad+ma'i ru dang // pad+ma kro d+ha ga ri la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'dul// dpal chen karma he ru dang // karma kro ti sha ri la// dam
208b1(rnying rgyud): tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma hA arga ma pra ti dza ho// dpal chen mi pham rdo rje dang // mtshegs dbang phyug 'khor gyi rkyen// go'u ri la sogs brgyad rnams dang // sing ha la sogs
208b2(rnying rgyud): brgyad rnams la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod pa 'bul// ma mo chen mo bdun rnams dang // sring mo chen mo bzhi rnams dang // mkha' 'gro 'khor bcas thams cad la// dam tshig mchog gi mchod
208b3(rnying rgyud): pa 'bul bzhes te kun tu dgyes mdzad la// 'phrul gyi dngos grub bdag la stsol// oM sarba ta thA ga tA ma lnga argam pra ti dza ho// shrI ban khe he/ dpal chen sems dpa' 'khor rgya mtsho dang bca
208b4(rnying rgyud): pa dang dpal chen po shrI he ru ka badz+ra DA ki nI 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / gzhan yang rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dang nga phyug chen mo mched lcam dral 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa thams cad dgod
208b5(rnying rgyud): su gsol lo// ding gnas mchog dam pa 'dir 'phags pa tha/ mas cad mchod pa dang / rdo rje mched lcam dral phyogs bcu na bzhugs pa dang / da ltar bzhugs pa'i thugs dam bskang ba dang / 
208b6(rnying rgyud): sems can thams cad bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral ba'i phyir rgyud mchog rkang bzhi pa zhig yon du 'bul zhing mchis na/ thugs rjes bzung zhing bsgral du gsol lo// rgyu mchog 'di thugs rjes bzung nas ma bsgral/ 
208b7(rnying rgyud): na 'di la spyod pa zhig mchis te/ rnal 'byor theg pa'i gzhung las kyang tshul bzhin du ma bgyis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshad ma khyad du bsad pa dang / rdo rje slob dpon dang / mched dang lcam dral la ngan
208b8(rnying rgyud): sems dang dpyad sems bskyed pa dang / mched la 'khus pa dang / dam las 'das pa dang / sba lo dang sgyu gsog/ brdzun dang kha gsag/ phyi tshul dang rgyab nyan bgyis nas rdo rje slob dpon snying nas slong
209a1(rnying rgyud): cing bla ma la dbang thos pa dang mnyam pa'i spyod yul sun byung ste/ spyod sgrol sgo bkag pa dang / dad pa can gyi tshogs bcag ste/ gdung sems kyi rgyun bcad pas phrag don/ 
209a2(rnying rgyud): dbang gis sku gsung thugs kyi gdung 'tshe ba pa'i bar chad kyis da ltar ngan song gi gnas nas 'khyam zhing rtog pa'i dra bas ni bcings/ 'khor ba'i snyis ni zin nas dmyal khams kyi gting brgyud par nges te/ zhing
209a3(rnying rgyud): bcu dang ldan pa 'di dam tshig tshul bzhin du bsgral bas/ 'di'i rnam par shes pa bla na med pa'i gnas su bsgral ba yang gnas stobs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ lnga phung gi yan lag ni kun tu bzang
209a4(rnying rgyud): po mchod pa'i sprin bung du gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham ngas cad kyi ye shes dgyes pa'i ngang du thim par smon to//  ngan lam brjod de bsgral bar bya'o// spyi gtsug tu e lag pa
209a5(rnying rgyud): g.yas par swA/ g.yon pa la hA/ snyisting kar su/ lus la a/ oM ma hA su ra tas+t+waM/ dzaHnub ho sa ma ya s+t+waM/ mr-i badz+ra kro d+ha shrI tsi ru ka a a hU phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha gadz+ra hU~M phaT/ 
209a6(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra kro d+ha yak+Sha ha na ha na hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ni la tan tra da ha da ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya mAn ta ka pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ar+ya a tsa la baM d+ha bai d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ha ya gri ba hu lu hu
209a7(rnying rgyud): lu hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a ba ra tsi ta tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kuN DA li ts+tshin dats+tshin da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lokya bi dza ya b+hin da b+hin da hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA ba la s+pho ta s+pho ta/ 
209a8(rnying rgyud): hUMphaT/ ma ma ma ma bo bo bo bo/ dza dza dza dza/ mi 'gyur na mkha'i rang bzhin las// gzugs snang rtog pa rnam par bsgribs// bag chags ma lus sbyong ba'i phyir// khams gcu
209b1(rnying rgyud): ma lus bsgral bar bya// nga ni zla bed chen po ste// sems can thams cad gsad par bya// ma skyes phyir yang gsad par bya// rnam shes sdu gis bsdus nas kyang // sha rus la sogs bza' bar bya// 
209b2(rnying rgyud): nga ni khrag 'thung chen po ste// 'khor ba'i dra bas chags pa yi// dmar chen dag gi rgya mtsho la// 'khor gyi mkha' 'gro tshogs dang rol// ma rungs gdug pas ma chags shing // dam tshig la
209b3(rnying rgyud): sdang dgra chen rnams// thugs rje byams sems ldan pa yis// ngo mthon stobs kyis bsgral bar bya// pra be sha ya phaT/ tsi ta zlu/ suM b+ha ni suM b+ha ni hUM/ grih+NA pa ya grih+NA pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga
209b4(rnying rgyud): ban bi d+ya rA dz+wa la hUM/ a na ya ho// badz+ra DA ki ni/ a ya/ spar na phaT/ badz+ra yu ti dza/ drag po las kyis bsgral ba'i rnams// 'khor ba'i lam lnga sgo yang gtsang // rnam shes surgyas
209b5(rnying rgyud): bsdus brngubs nas// 'og min gnas mchog bla med 'dir// kho lnga dang gcomo lnga// sems pa dang ni sems ma dang // khro bo dang ni khro mo yi// sbyor ba'i lhum su phaT kyis 'phang // 
209b6(rnying rgyud): zhe sdang rdo rje 'khor bcas pas// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// skad cig yud la brlag mdzad de// brlag par ma gyur gang yang med// 'dod chags rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams// 'jig rten khams
209b7(rnying rgyud): ni rab 'byam kun// yud tsam gyis ni dbang mdzad de// dbang du ma gyur gang med// nga rgyal rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// dpal ldan gzi brjid chen po rnams// yud tsam
209b8(rnying rgyud): gyis ni rgyas par mdzod// gti mug rdo rje 'khor bcas rnams// 'jig rten khams ni rab 'byam kun// yud tsam gyis ni ni mdzad de// zhi bar gyur pas dbyings la rol// bdag cag mched ldum bral
210a1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyis rdo rje slob dpon dbang zos pa dang / phrag dog gi dbang gis mched lcam dral mngan sems dang dbye sems bgyis pa dang / gnyid dbang gis le lor gyur pa dang / sems g.yengs pas
210a2(rnying rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya zur chag pa dang / dam tshig dang du len rngo ma thog pas smad pa'i dam tshig nyams so 'tshal thams cad mthol zhing bshag so// rgyu mchog rkang bzhi pa 'di phrin las rnam bzhis bsgral ba'i yang gnas
210a3(rnying rgyud): stobs par smon to// bdag cag mched lcam dral 'di tshogs pa rnams kyis yid la rtag pa'i dngos grub par gyur cig/ shrI he ru ka bya shan/ badz+ra be rab na shan/ ka ra dza li ta/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ru lu ru lu sU phaT/ ur ta ke/ 
210a4(rnying rgyud): sha bra la ban/ sha ta sha pra dra/ sha ma ba ra na shra ma la ha ha ha hUM/ ka ra baM ba dz+ra ka ra baM/ badz+ra ka ran ta tri shu la a gu dza/ pa ra sha ra na su sho ma ma/ pra yo ma hA tsaN+Da/ su re ba ru na/ ku be ra na/ nir ba dri tsi taM ma
210a5(rnying rgyud): hA ku ru nan/ shrI he ru ka tan ti/ la la gan du sa ta ma hang ya kur/ ka te/ ku she la dzi mo ha/ bar mo/ gan+ta gan+ta/ kar ta ka/ ga bo dza la ni/ ba bur ti ba ta/ ko sha bi sha la/ i san pad+ma tsan dr-i/ 
210a6(rnying rgyud): naka mang gu nang ro// tsi ri ka ta/ tsi tasti/ dza bi s+t+ra/ ban+d+ha he ru ka/ badz+ra ma rang sa na sa rang / ba mun ka na/ tig shwa/ traM stang ga ya dza ya bko dong / bi ka ra be ra/ ma ra ma hA/ ring yang sang sa ra/ ma hA ru na/ dz+wa la/ 
210a7(rnying rgyud): pa ni/ ho ho ha/ ro na ro hUM hUM/ re na ro de na/ he he ra na ro/ bzhi la bstod/ tha med tad ba ting / ba ba ti ka ba ra many+dzu/ gri na dza la pa ra ho/ he he ro na ro/ oM phur bu sra sti sra ho/ oM phur bup+ta shaM ka/ phur bu ba ta ba ti ho/ bur bu ba
210a8(rnying rgyud): sA sar du/ byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM e gtsu ba she dus ma ya bak+Sha hUM/ ru sa ru lu tsu b+h+yo hUM/ kha ra pra ti dzi haM/ mchod pa 'bul bshags pa bya/ smon lam gda'/ phyogs bcu mthas klas mu med pa'i sangs rgya
210b1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa'i 'khor rgya mtsho dang bcas pa dang / dpal chen po shrI he ru ka badz+ra TA ki ni tshogs kyis dam tshig gis sa la gzhes pa'i nang gi rnal 'byor dang / phyi'i grub pa la sogs te/ phra men gyi
210b2(rnying rgyud): 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa rdo rje theg pa bsrung bar zhal 'ches pa'i 'phags pa thams cad dang / rigs 'dzin rtsal 'chang du gyur pa'i mi la sogs te/ sprul pa sna tshogs sku bzhengs nas slob dpon gyi
210b3(rnying rgyud): sa la bzhengs zhing sems can gyi don mdzad pa la/ bdag cag mched lcam dral 'dir tshogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa'i zhal zas 'di dag tshul bzhin du byin gyis brlabs nas 'bul bas mtha' yas pa'i sems can
210b4(rnying rgyud): thams cad ye shes bla ma'i sa non dam tshig nyams pa thams ca/ da skongs par gyur nas so so'i thugs dam skongs par smon to// rnal 'byor snga rabs sku tshe 'das pa rnams kyang sgrib pa rnam gnyis ni
210b5(rnying rgyud): byang/ tshegs gnyis ni rdzogs/ bdag cag gi stong grogasu gyur ci / bdag gis snga slad dam rdzas bsgral ba dang / sems can gyi srog bkum mo 'tshal thams cad kyang ye shes ngang gis
210b6(rnying rgyud): sgrol shing rnal 'byor gyi skal pa can du gyur cig/ bdag cag rnams kyi tshe snga ma nas da ltar gyi slob dpon du gyur pa dang / rgyud gcig cing yi dam gcig pa'i thugs dam la mnyes par phog pa dang / bdag gi snying/ 
210b7(rnying rgyud): rje chungs pa'i rkyen gyis 'phags pa thugs dam bskul ba'i rtsa la 'phang dmas pa dang / gnang ba'i dbang las pham par gyur pa dang / gti mug ma tshor ba'i rkyen gyis bde ba dang sdug bsngal gyi rkyen mi bzod
210b8(rnying rgyud): de lus ngag yid gsum gyis sems dkrugs nas ma yin pa'i chos smra ba dang / spyod lam mi mkhas pa'i rkyen gyis dam tshig gi lha dang / slob dpon dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / rdo rje mched lcam dras
211a1(rnying rgyud): thugs dam gyi lha yal bar bzhag nas dngos grub thams cad 'phang bar gyur pa dang / mkhyen gsal gong ma rnams dang bral ba'i rkyen gyis mchod pa'i yo byad rgyun mi gcig pa dang / 
211a2(rnying rgyud): mchod pa ma yin pa'i grogs po la brten nas rgyun mi gcig pa dang / bsod nams 'dres pas tsal tshad mar gyur te/ le lo dang btang snyoms kyi dbang du gyur nas/ thugs rje'i gnas su ma gyur te/ ye shes lha dang
211a3(rnying rgyud): srungs ma rnams 'phang bar gyur pa dang / rgyang phan gyi chos kyis gdungs nas bde ba'i yo byad dang bral te/ nyes pa bsags pa'i cha shas dang / mchod sprin mi chud pa'i sgrib pa dang / bla na med pa'i byang
211a4(rnying rgyud): chub tu sems bskyed pa las the tshom gcod pa'i bsam pa ma yin pa byung ba dang / shin tu sdug bsngal bar gyur pa rnams rjesu dran ni dang gnong pa'i sems kyis mthol zhing bshag so// bshags bya 'di na
211a5(rnying rgyud): brjod pa tsam gyis tshor ba dang ma tsher dang bag chags byang bar smon to// gnas thob pa dang rgyud byang bas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa thob pa ra gyur cig/ lha dang slob dpon gyi dbang dang sngon ci ltar dkyil 'khor
211a6(rnying rgyud): gnang ba dang / mi skyol zhing dngos grub rnam bzhi yang thob par gyur cig/ skyon brjod pa thams cad dang bral zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa rnams yon tan tshad ma bzhin thob par gyur cig/ de nas tshogs kyis gtor ma
211a7(rnying rgyud): gtang oM shrI he ru ka ma hA badz+ra DA kaM ni nA~M/ badz+ra go'u ri ha/ badz+ra tse'u ri ha/ badz+ra pra mo ha/ badz+ra be ta li/ badz+ra pu ka si/ badz+ra g+ha ma ri/ badz+ra tsan+da li/ badz+ra sma sha ni badz+ra he ru ka sa ma ya yo gi shwa ri/ sarbaT+Ta
211a8(rnying rgyud): ki nan/ ru lu ru lu hU~M b+h+yo hUM/ dbyug pa'i brda' yis mtshon nas kyang // mtshogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis// dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// thal mo brda' yis mtshon nas kyang // mchogs
211b1(rnying rgyud): dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis// dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegs su gsol// glu'i brda' yis mtshon nas kyang // mchogs dbang phyug spyan 'dren gyis// dam tshig tshul bzhin gshegasu gsol// bskal pa
211b2(rnying rgyud): me ltar 'bar ba yi// 'od zer 'du 'phro gling dkyil na// sku ni dud kha chen po la// zhal gsum po la phyag drug ste// gnag dang mthing ka dmar pa'i dbu// g.yas kyi gsum na thogs pa ni// rdo rjes bkug cing
211b3(rnying rgyud): zhal du gsol// khyung gi khri chen 'bar ba'o// g.yon pa gsum na thogs pa ni// sti ri'i rgyu ma'i zhags pa dang // thong rlon dmar gyis bkang ba dang // stir phra mo gsus pa nas// glo rnying nang khrol 'byin cing
211b4(rnying rgyud): glang chen ko rlon gos su gyon// zhing lpags g.yang gzhi sham thabs can// thong rlon phreng bas rgyan du byas// ma lu sa pa dag gsan du gsol// rgyu las byung bas de bzhin gshegs
211b5(rnying rgyud): sngon ni ma nor don mdzad pa// mngag pa'i gnas yud tsam gyis/ thams cad kho nar dbang mdzad mdzod// srungs shig/ myur du rnam rgyal dpal// thal ba bzhin du rab tu lhogs// rol
211b6(rnying rgyud): cig dgongs cig de bzhin gshegs// mA ra na ta tha/ 'byung po'i sha ni zan pas zhim// 'byung po'i khrag ni chang bas zhim// 'byung po'i rus pa zhim pa ste// thams cad gsol te dgyes par mdzod// 
211b7(rnying rgyud): dpal chen he ru ka/ mkha' 'gro 'bar ba'i tshogs chen po// shin tu mi zad 'jigs pa'i gzugs// na mkha'i khams kun khyab par sprul// lding nag gcer bu ral pa can// mi lpags rlon
211b8(rnying rgyud): pa gosu gyon// thal ba'i mtshan mas byugs pa ste// khrag dang zhag gi thig les brgyan// phreng ba mang pos rgyan du byas// lag na tri shul thod pa thigs// dug gsum bshig par dam bcas pa'i// rdo rjes
212a1(rnying rgyud): pung 'khrug pa'i tshul// re ba thams cad skongs mdzad pa'i// khyod kyi thugs dam dus la bab// theg chen rnal 'byor spyod pa la// gnod pa'i dgra bgegs gtan nas byung // thams cad
212a2(rnying rgyud): gcig tu bsdus nas kyang // rdul phran bzhin du brlag pa dang // sems nyid theg pa chen po yi// rnam thar la ni dgod par mdzod// rnal 'byor bde mchog sgyu mas sprul// dam tshig dag la 'jug tu gsol// 
212a3(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs kun la rgyal bar mdzod// ma lus pa dag bsnams su gsol// rnam pa sna tshogs 'dod chags rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
212a4(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro bde mchog sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// dren te the hUM/ rnam pa sna tshogs dag pa'i rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun
212a5(rnying rgyud): gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu ma'i bdi mchog thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul// hUM hUM hUM/ rnam pa sna tshogs khro bo rgyud kyis sems can ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi
212a6(rnying rgyud): mkha'agro sgyu mas thams cad rab sprul rnam par sprul/ ru lu ru lu huM b+h+yo hUM/ rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyi rgyud kyis sen ma lus lus pa med par 'dul mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi mkha' 'gro sgyu mas tsha
212a7(rnying rgyud): rab sbrul rnam par sprul/ hUM e sha hUM be sha hUM/ na mo rad na tra yA ya/ na ma sh+tsa Na Da d+ha badz+ra pA Na ye/ ma hA yak+Sha se na pA ta ye/ tad+ya thA/ e he h+ya sa ma ya/ a na ya badz+ra shan ting / badz+ra tsakro d+ha ni/ badz+ra
212a8(rnying rgyud): tsakro badza gan/ badz+ra mu sting / badz+ra ti ba ti/ badz+ra gan ti/ badz+ra gnang / badz+ra a kring / badz+ra rak+Sha/ badz+ra dang Sh+TaM/ badz+ra shan ting / badz+ra e kar tsam/ badz+ra ma no par ma/ badz+ra dun ting / badz+ra nI lam/ badz+ran lam/ 
212b1(rnying rgyud): badz+ra gri ta/ badz+ra mu kr-ing / badz+ra ki lam/ badz+ra us sma/ badz+ra ma ka rang wA/ badz+ra'i d+ya car tsanaka/ kha na kha/ tu ta kha/ sarba.a shas pa/ sarngam a kar 'a ya/ pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ sarba Ta ki ni nan/ 
212b2(rnying rgyud): e a ra li ma nu s+pha ra ya phaT/ mi yi srin mo tshangs ma dang khro bo dang ni 'jug sred mo// gzhon nu ma dang dbang po dang // rdo rje dmar mo bdud rtsi mo// zhi ba ma dang be con mo// zin mo dang ni zab mo// rdo rje dga' ba ma
212b3(rnying rgyud): dang ni shin tu khrag 'thung mo// gcig pu spyod dang yid 'phrog mo// grub mo dang ni rlung mo dang // rdo rje yang ni gsod chen mo// me mo phag mo rgan byad mo// sna chen mo dang chu lha mo// rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang // / 
212b4(rnying rgyud): rjer ste dmar ser mo// rdo rje sngo nag bum rna mo// rdo rje dmar seradadril 'khrel ma// ma mo chen mo khyed rnams kyis// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// ye
212b5(rnying rgyud): shes thob par bya ba dang // bsgrub pa rnams kyi las bya zhes// rdo rje byin nas ming btags te// dam bcas bzhin du he ru ka/ dzaSh+Thar khyod kyis gzugs mchog rnams// mngon par ston la grub pa bru
212b6(rnying rgyud): ci snyed grub mchog ma phul zhing // khyed rnams mngon du ma gyur na// rab tu sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// gdug la las rnams kun gyis shig/ oM pad+ma bad mu mu ka/ a kar Sha ma/ a kar Sha ya/ pra be sha ya/ 
212b7(rnying rgyud): pra be sha ya/ ban+d+ha ya ban+d+ha ya/ to sha ya to sha ya/ badz+ra DA ki ni hrid yan/ oM oM hUM/ gtor ma dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du bsgyur la kha banang dang ras chen gyis bcad la rta mgrin dbang gi phyag rgya bcas la mchod
212b8(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las khro bo bskyed rdzogs las kyi bzlas pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po nyid kyi/ 
213a1(rnying rgyud): sku nga gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di byung ngo // zhi ba'i mchog gtan phreng ba'i phrin las rab bsdus pa/ tshad med snying rje skyed pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' dag la na// sngon du
213a2(rnying rgyud): ba'i lam mchog ste// sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// khrag 'thung thugs su gnas pa ni// ye shes gtsom mchog nyid de// gsum pa las ni 'das pa'i phyir// rtse mo med pa'i las su bstan// de ni gzugs
213a3(rnying rgyud): dang byin rlabs dang // bzlas brjod dang ni phrin las dang // dus dang gnas dang bdag nyid dag/ phun sum tshogs pa bdun pa ste// btab na ci 'dod sbyin no zhes// dam tshig bdag pos rab tu gsungs// 'das na lnga
213a4(rnying rgyud): yang brlag pa'i phyir// rang gi bka' las rang mi 'da'// gzugs ni thugs kyi phyag rgya dbyings la ste// lcags dang lcags lnga seng ldeng la sogs pa tsher ma can gyi shing las sor brgyad dam bcu
213a5(rnying rgyud): gnyis par byas pa mgo mjug ma nor bar shing rtsa ba phyog su mgo byas la/ sor brgyad la sor gcig la rgya mdud rked par sor gci ga la rgya mdung stong zur brgyad/ smad zur gsum du byas la/ ri rab
213a6(rnying rgyud): ltar brjid pa 'dug pa ni gzugs so// byin rlabs ni thog ma nyid sku gsum du byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ de'i 'og tu rgya mdud gzhal med khang du dmigs te/ phyogs bzhi dbus dang ldar/ sku sgril ma lnga
213a7(rnying rgyud): bzhag ste/ dbus su he ru ka/ shar du khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba/ lhor gshin rje gshed/ nub tu rta mgrin/ byang tu stobs po che/ 'di rnams so so'i snying po dran pa tsam gyis bskul te/ phyi nang gi
213a8(rnying rgyud): mchod pa ci 'byor pa phul te/ dam tshig rjes su bkug nas gnyisu med pa'i rgyan rdzogs par mdzad pa ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur byin gyis brlab bo// de nas sras phur bu'i khro bo bskyod pa ni/ oM badz+ra kroH
213b1(rnying rgyud): kI li kI la ya ma na paT ces brjod pas lte ba yan chad mthing nag la dbu skra kham pa zur gsum pa'i thabs su bsgreng la/ brang gis 'gro chen po dang / thod rlon gyis bcings shing bshams la/ spyan gsum sdang
213b2(rnying rgyud): mig tu bgrad de/ phyag g.yon pa'i phur bu la gzigs/ mche ba gtsigs pa/ rab tu rngam pa/ dur khrod kyi me phung gi nang du lte ba man chad lcags kyi phur ba zur gsum pa/ e'i nang du sum cha tsam nub pa
213b3(rnying rgyud): la phyag bzhi la g.yas kyi gong ma sta re kha yar bstan te brdeg par bya ste/ g.yon pa ri rab kyis gnon pa'i stobasu 'dzin pa/ g.yon dang pos rdo rje kha T+wAM ga 'khrol zhing bdud kyi khams 'jigs pa/ 'og ma
213b4(rnying rgyud): bur bu zur gsum 'debs pa'i stabasu gzas shing / ngan song gsum du 'jigs pa/ stobs dang mthu la sogs pa khro bo thams cad 'angus pas kyang che ba gcig phyung ste/ rtag pa chen po zhugs par
213b5(rnying rgyud): bstan pa ni sprul pa'i skur byin gyis brlab po// de la rigs lngar byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ 'bru lngas gnas lnga byin gyis brlab po// sku gsung thugs byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ spyi gtsug tu oM/ rkeng/ 
213b6(rnying rgyud): par hri/ rtse mor phaT bsam mo// de'i 'og tu thugs kyi ye shes rtse gcig par byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ zur gsum du phaT gsum/ nges gsum du hUM bzhag go// de nas sku bltas pa dang / rigs so so'i khro bo
213b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyis dbang bskur bar bya ste/ khro bo dkyil 'khor de dag nyid phyogs bcur 'phros pa slar 'dus nas/ hUM hUM phaT phaT kyis sgra 'byin cing de'i sku la bstims te/ dbang dang byin rlabs thams cad basman par bya'o// de
213b8(rnying rgyud): nas 'gro ba'i don la gshegs nas phyogs bcu'i bde bar gshegs pa thams cad dang / sngon thugs dam du zhal gyis bzhes pa lags pas des grong mdzad cing bskul ba la bzhugs pa dang / bdag nyid kyang bdag nyid
214a1(rnying rgyud): chen po yin pas phur pa yang bdag nyid chen po nyid du dbang bskur zhing byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ lag pa ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du hUM/ g.yon pa'i
214a2(rnying rgyud): steng du a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng du ta bsam mo// gung mo la oM/ mthe bo la hUM/ 'dzub mo la traM/ srin lag la hri/ mthe'u chung la ha/ 'di rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'i steng
214a3(rnying rgyud): du gzhag ste/ su ra da s+t+waM zhes brjod pas thal mo mnyam par sbyar la/ oM badz+ra a dza li hUM/ zhes brjod pas sor mo cung zad bsnol lo// oM badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM zhes brjod pas sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la bsnam mo// sa ma ya
214a4(rnying rgyud): s+t+waM zhes brjod pas phur pa blangs te chang ba'i nang du bcug la/ lag pa chang ba phye la mthe bo dang srin lag dang mthe'u chung dang gnyis kyi bar du yang gzhug/ mthe bos chung zad bsgral zhing drud do// oM badz+ra
214a5(rnying rgyud): a be sha ya/ a a zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu dus gsum du gshe/ gas pa yab yum sras dang bcas pa thams cad zhe sdang rje/ sa su dran pa'i sku yungs 'bru tsam par mtshams med par phur pa la
214a6(rnying rgyud): bsdu zhing bstim mo// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag po chen po nyid du rdzogs pa'i byin gyis brlabs cing dbang bskur bar bya ste/ sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la gung mo bshibs te/ bsgreng ba'i bar du bur ba bcug la/ 
214a7(rnying rgyud): oM badz+ra sa tra ra dza hUM phaT/ zhes brjod pas bzlas so// de nas sor mo pug pug byas te/ lag pas phur ba bzung la/ oM hUM hriH/ pur bu pa paT zhes brjod pas de nas sor mo rgyab tu bsnol la the bong gnyis
214a8(rnying rgyud): bshibs pa'i chang bar bcug nas/ oM ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ ha na ha na ti pa ta tsakra hU~M phaT/ ces brjod nas dril te/ bdag nyid chen po thams cad gnyisu med pa'i sbyor ba mdzad pa'i gzi byin thams cad phur pa'i sku la
214b1(rnying rgyud): bstims pas stong gsum gang bar me stag 'phro zhing dmigs pa thams cad sgrub pa'i byin dang / dbang dang ldan par gyur te/ mdun gyi na mkha' la e'i gdan la bzhugs par gsol nas yungs kar gyi rgyal
214b2(rnying rgyud): pos brab cing gu gul sbyar bas gdugs la/ phyi nang gi mchod pa thams cad mchod par bya'o// de nas yid la brnag pa'i 'phrin las col te de'i byin brlab so// bzlas brjod ni bdag nyid las kyi lha'i ting nge 'dzin
214b3(rnying rgyud): du bzhugs la snyeng khar nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la hUM 'thing nag pa cig bsams la/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ki li ki la ya mA ra ya phaT ces brjod pas phur bu'i khro bo ci 'dra ba zhig de las byung ste phyogs bcu thams cad du sen
214b4(rnying rgyud): gyi don byas nas phur bu la bstim mo// 'di 'bum 'am/ bdun 'bum 'am/ sa ya bye ba snyed bya ste bsnyen pa gtong bar la 'dod na phur bu nyid snying ka la bsdu ste/ 'di ni bzlas brjod do// 'phrin
214b5(rnying rgyud): las ni thog ma nyid brtag pa'i sa rnyed nas bskrad pa dang mtshams pa cad pa la sogs pa byas nas skad cig ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis khro bo'i sdang mig dang / mtshon cha'i char dang / rdo rje gnod
214b6(rnying rgyud): sprin la sogs pas bskrad nas phur ba bcu khro bo bcur byin gyis brlabs te phyogs bcur btab nas ci tsam 'dod pa thams cad mtshams gcad do// rigs lnga'i lha mnyes par bya te/ de nas las kyi lha
214b7(rnying rgyud): mnyes par byas nas de nas ting nge 'dzin gong nas byung ba dang / bsnyen pa tshang nas gnas chen por dkyil 'khor gru gsum la rtse mo lho phyogs su bstan te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba dang / ske tshe dang / lan tshwa
214b8(rnying rgyud): dang zhing chen gyi rag ta dang / srub mi'i lo ma'i lo ma dang / khre dang ci tse dang / sum ma dang / grog mkhar gyi sa dang / bung bu'i bdud rtsi las spras te/ zhing chen gyi thal ba ma rnyed na til nag po las bzhi
215a1(rnying rgyud): blangs te gzugs byas kyang rung / ri mo bris la mdog smug nag tu bgyis te shul ba la sogs pa la zhing chen gyi rag tas hUM che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ ces bris te/ snying kar glan te dkyil
215a2(rnying rgyud): 'khor gyi steng du ga na rgyal du bzhag ste/ mgo bo lde phyogs su bstan de gdon de nyid dgug pa ni mngag gzhug gam/ khro ba sum b+ha ni sbyor ba yang rung ste/ gsang ba'i thugs kha'am snying khar zla
215a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor dmar po zhig bzhag la dzaHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra a gu sha che ge mo zhig hUM/ zhes brjod nas khro bo lcags kyu can grangs med pa brgyud ma she dag byung bas bgegs kyi snying kha nas bzung ste/ 
215a4(rnying rgyud): der 'ongs pa dang / dzaHhUM baM hoche ge mo ma ra ya pra pe sha pha raT ran tsam du brjod la/ gzugs sam ri mo la phab la lcu gras kyu dang / zhags pa dang lcags sgrog gi phyag rgya bcings pa dang / 
215a5(rnying rgyud): sngams pa dang / de'i sems ma 'khrugs par byas nas e'i nang du rtse mo 'og tu song bar bsam/ de nas phur pa bla/ ngas te/ las kyi lha'i snying po dang bcas pas drag tu chung zad
215a6(rnying rgyud): bskul lo// thal mo sbyar phur bu thabs kyis gsol la rdo rje sder mo'i sngags bzlas nas ting nge 'dzin gsal bar ma khugs kyi bar du dril na ting nge 'dzin la zhugs pa dang / gdan gyi steng du rtse mo nas gang tsam
215a7(rnying rgyud): ma rig par gzas la khro bo'i skye 'am rked pa nas lag pa g.yon pas bzung ste/ rdo rje tho ba'i sta re lag pas rdog cing rdo rje sder mo'i sngags lan gsum dang nyi shu rtsa gcig gdab cing bzlas te/ seng ldeng gi
215a8(rnying rgyud): bur pa sor brgyad pa gcig snying khar btab dpral bar gcig gdab/ dpung mgo gnyis dang brla'i nang rol gnyis su yang gdab/ lte ba khung du yang gdab/ sder mo'i sngags/ na maHsa man ta kA ya
215b1(rnying rgyud): bAka tsi ta badz+ran na/ oM ga ga ga ta ya/ sarba du shAn ma ra ya phaT/ ki li ki lA ya sarbapa pam phaT/ hU~M sU badz+ra ki li ki lA ya badz+ra d+ha rod/ a dz+nyA ba ya ti kA ya bA ka tsi ta 'adz+ra ka la ya sU Ta drag tu brjod do// bur ba de ba
215b2(rnying rgyud): zin nas de'i steng du las kyi lha phyag rgya dang sngags kyis mnan te lag pa gnyis sor mo bsnol ba mthe bo dang mthe'u chung rtse sbyar brkyang nas gzhan ni drag por rgyab tu bkyed de'i sngags/ oM badz+ra karma kro d+ha hUM phaT/ lan nyi
215b3(rnying rgyud): shu rtsa gcig bzlas te g.yas phyogs su bskor te ki la ya'i mgo la lan gsum bdug go// de nas phur pa slar mi 'byung ba dang / sus kyang mi phyin pa dang / lhag par yang zad cing thal phyin par bsam mo// de nas
215b4(rnying rgyud): dam tshig gi phyag rgya bstan te/ sor mo rnams rgyab tu bsnol la ba/ cangs nas gung mo gnyis rgyab sbyar rtse mo rnon por bsgreng la dpur pa'i glad du gnan/ phur pa'i lha dang bgeg che ge mo khyod dam tshig
215b5(rnying rgyud): 'di las ma 'da' zhig par bsgo zhing sngags 'dis lan bdun bzlas/ oM sarba ta thA ga tA sa ma ya hUM phaT ces bya'o// 'di ni sems ma dam tshig gi sngags dang
215b6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya ste/ bsgo ba thams cad nyan par bsam sor mo gnyis nang du bsnol te/ mthe bo dang mthe'u chung ngo sbar la bsgreng / khu chur mi bcang bar sor mo rnams phyir bkyed de phur pa'i steng du mnan cing sngags 'di brjod do// oM
215b7(rnying rgyud): badz+ra kro d+ha ha na ha na/ da ha da ha pA tsa pA tsa/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ ts+tshin dats+tshi nad/ rbe narba na phaT/ nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas so// stobs po che'i sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ gong du bka' nyan pas bdag gi dbang du gyur nas ci bsgo
215b8(rnying rgyud): ba thams cad bran bzhin du las byed par 'gyur ro// yungs kar gyi rgyal pos brdeg/ gur kum sbyar mas bdugs la gzhag go// de nas lag pa gnyis sbyar la/ mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud
216a1(rnying rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis sbyar te mthe'u chung gnyis gcig la gcig 'khyud/ mdzub mo gnyis bgram la g.yas g.yon du skyeng / yid tsam dgu bar bya lcag ma rnams nang du bcas
216a2(rnying rgyud): la mdzub mo gnyis mche bar bsams te/ rkang pa g.yon pas bgegs kyi snying kar mnan ti lan bdun bzlas/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha ya k+Sha ga ba/ khA he khA hi/ hUM hUM phaT phaT ces brjod do// de nas rdo rje
216a3(rnying rgyud): con gyi sngags dang phyag rgya ste/ lag pa gnyis rdo rje lu gu rgyu du sbrel la mthe bong g.yon pa'i steng du bzhag/ mdzub mo gnyis ngo sbyar te bsgreng nas sdang mig tu bskrad la rdeg cing sngags 'di lan bdun gsum ni
216a4(rnying rgyud): shu rtsa gcig gam brgyad brgyad bzlas so// oM badz+ra kr-id+b+hadapal/ han ha na daha pa tsa bi d+hi sa ya dza Ti lam po d+har su des kro d+ha rU paT ces brjod do// de nas yungs kar gyi rgyal 'dzim
216a5(rnying rgyud): tsing las 'di shin tu brtan ning grub par bcol lo// rdo rje brji gnon gyi bsam gtan gyis mnan par bya'o// khro bonamo sa kyi skyo bo nas 'dus pa'i steng du rdzu mthing nag la rdo rje lpags
216a6(rnying rgyud): kyu'i rgya gram me lce'i phreng bas bskur ba'i rgya gram gyi dkyil 'khor yi ge gsum gser bco ma'i mdog 'dra ba zhig tu gnas pa las/ oM badz+ra badz+ra me rta hUM sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pa las gser gyi ri rab dpag tshad
216a7(rnying rgyud): bye ba gru bzhi pa gcig tu gyur la de'i steng na bcom ldan 'das don yod grub pa sku mdog ljang ku dbu gsum phyag drug la/ phyag g.yas dang po rdo rje 'bar ba phyar te bsnams/ g.yon dang po rdo rje rgya gram
216a8(rnying rgyud): thugs kar brtan/ 'khor dpag tu med pa'i pho brang btams pa khro bo rnams kyis shin tu gzir zhing mi g.yo ba dang / las ma grub na bskal pa mthar thug yang gnas par bsam/ phrin las kyang de bzhin
216b1(rnying rgyud): du bcol te gzhag go// yo byad thams cad kyang nag por bsam/ gtor ma nag po cha gcig bshams te dam tshig can gyi 'khor dang bcas pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la bsngo zhing dbul lo// drag po'i gtor ma/ 
216b2(rnying rgyud): cha gcig gnod byed de nyid bkug ste zar gzhug go// phrin las 'di'i dus su pra men ma dang / gnod sbyin mo dang / srin mo rnams kyang spyan drang / gtor ma dbul lo// dzaHhUM baM hoH/ e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ bya da ya
216b3(rnying rgyud): dzaHb+h+yo ru lu ru lu hUM zhes lan gsum brjod de spyan drang / pra tits+tsha ho zhes brjod la btong / oM sa ma ya arbaM pra ti tsa hUM swAhA zhes lan gsum brjod la a mr-i ta phul la las bcol lo// 'di'i phrin las so// dus
216b4(rnying rgyud): ni tshes bcu bdun nam mar gyi ngo la nyin mtshan gyi gung du bza' dang sbyar ba dang / bsnyen pa tshang ba dang / rtags byung ba la sog/ ngas te 'di ni dus so// gnas ni shing rkang gcig pa dang gnod
216b5(rnying rgyud): par nges pa te/ 'di ni gnas so// bdag nyid byang chub se mas la gzhol zhing mang du thos pa dang / lha nye bar gyur/ ba dang / mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob pa dang / drag cing ltos pa med
216b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog med pa dang / gzhan la re ba med pa dang / dam tshig ma nyams pa'o// 'di ni bdag nyid do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo
216b7(rnying rgyud): rje las 'di phyung ngo // zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang / mnan bzlog drug tu bka' stsal to// zhi ba'i zhi ba chen po ni dkyil 'khor 'dom gang thab khung zlum po chag gang thab kyi dkyil du 'khor lo rtsibs
216b8(rnying rgyud): bzhi mtho gang zlum po par sor gcig/ 'jim pa'am bong ba la 'bur du brkos te gzhag/ thab kyi kha khyer rdo rje rabs bskor/ de'i phyi rim zlum po la pad+ma 'dab brgyad bri/ bkra shis kyi lha mo dang / mchod
217a1(rnying rgyud): pa'i lha mo dgod/ bsreg pa'i rdzas shu gu shug shags/ mar dkar/ kha ra/ sbrang rtsi/ 'bras can/ 'bras thug/ 'bras yos/ til zho nas thug so ba/ gro so ba/ til so ba/ 
217a2(rnying rgyud): sran ma sha/ yungs kar 'bras kyi lag pa na/ gtor ma dkar po/ 'bras la bgyi/ yo byad thams cad dkar po/ mtshon dkar pos bri/ chas gos gos gsum dkar po/ lha'i sku mdog kyang dkar po
217a3(rnying rgyud): grangs dang sbyar nas mchod par bya'o// rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi/ lha ni snga ma'i steng du gnod sbyin mo brgyad kyis bsnan/ pho nya yang 'byung ngo // yo byad thams cad kyang ser po/ dgang gzar
217a4(rnying rgyud): ser po phrugs su bcas pa grangs bzhin du dbul lo// dab rang gi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dkyil 'khor dgyi steng du zla gam byed par bcad pa'i tshul du bya/ las kyi lha ba
217a5(rnying rgyud): gar gyi dbang phyug dgod/ bsreg rdzas dmar po/ gtor ma dam ra bo/ chas gos dmar po lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul/ dragapo'i dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi dbus su gru gsum zab sa
217a6(rnying rgyud): khru phyed/ gru gsum du mda' gzhu/ mtha' thod pa gsar rnying gis bskor/ dpal chen mo dang khro bcu dgod yo byad thams cad nag po/ bsreg rdzas nag po/ dkyil 'khor yang nag po/ gtor ma yang nag
217a7(rnying rgyud): bo lus kyis khro bo bcu dang / pra min ma chas gos nag po/ sbyin bsreg lha'i grangs bzhin du dbul lo// oM shAn ting gan ting ti ka ra pra sha ma ni ran+na ta/ a ba bsra ba ba/ a mu ka si/ sau ste shi ba~M/ ku ru sA hA/ 
217a8(rnying rgyud): zhi ba'o/ ba shing ku ru pra sha ma na ye ho puSh+Ti ku ru swA hA/ sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka rol pa las khro bo mnan bzlog gi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// 
217b1(rnying rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po thugs gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la thig pa ni brdabs pas re'u cha dgu/ dbus su zla ba phyed par bcas pa'i tshul du
217b2(rnying rgyud): de'i phyi rim phra men ma bcu drug/ spro ba bzhi/ kham por ri mor bris pa dgu/ snang ba'i 'od bcas pa dgram/ tshil chen dngan tsi ta'i tog/ ras chen 'phan gdugs la sogs pa// dkyil 'khor rgyun du bring
217b3(rnying rgyud): bya ban da'i gdam yol/ zhing gi rgyal mtshan/ thod pa'i phreng ba la sogs pa dgod/ rag ta dri chen gyi maN+Dal bya/ yo byad thams cad tshang bar bsogs la/ 'phags pa mchod cing bdag kyang
217b4(rnying rgyud): bza'o// dam ma 'dres shing mi gcig pa/ spyod lam yan chad ci'i sgo nas kyang sgrub pa'i zhal zas dang tshogs rnams phyi rol du byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa po ni
217b5(rnying rgyud): ting nge 'dzin gnyid dbang du mi btang / spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pas sku gsung thugs dngos grub kyi dbyigs bsgrub pa dang / srid pa gsum gyi sems cad rgyu'i sdug bsngal gyis gdungs pa rnams
217b6(rnying rgyud): grol bar mdzad pa'i tshul mkhas pa dang / spyod pa gzob pas rnal 'byor bsgrub pa la 'jug par bya'o// de la dang por bsgrub pa la bgegs mi 'jug par bya ba'i phyir mtshams bcad do// ting nge 'dzin
217b7(rnying rgyud): dang lta ba dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rdzas 'di dag gis rab tu gcad par bya'o// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang yang rdzogs// rdzogs nas dngos grub blang bar bya// lha'i
217b8(rnying rgyud): grangs bzhin bsnyen pa dbul bar bya'o// snying po ni/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+rUM hUM zhes drang ngo // de nas bsnyen bsgrub lags pa dang / yo byad rnams phyi rol du mi 'byung / gnas su mi 'gyer/ lha dang bdag
218a1(rnying rgyud): mchod la sogs pa'i rjes la lhag ma dkyil 'khor sa'i 'og tu rin po ches pa bcad la sba bar bya'o// don de ltar byas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sras su skye'o// de ltar/ 
218a2(rnying rgyud): ma byas na dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis phra men ma'i bsgrub pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su gos
218a3(rnying rgyud): riHde'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la shar du stag gi mgo can lho ru g.yag gi mgo can/ nub du seng ge'i mgo can/ byang du gzig gi mgo can/ shar lho pha bang gi mgo can/ lho nu du phug
218a4(rnying rgyud): shud kyi mgo can/ nub byang du srin bya'i mgo can/ byang shar du ske ga'i mgo can/ sgo ba bzhi bgod/ dkyil 'kho dar 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su tse'u ri/ de'i phyi ram pad+ma
218a5(rnying rgyud): 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar du skrigs bu'i mgo can/ lhor bya rgod kyi mag can/ nub tu sha ba'i mgo can/ byang du khu b+hu ga mgo can/ mtshams bzhir pa wang gi mgo can/ khwa
218a6(rnying rgyud): mgo can dang / byan lag gi mgo can dang / pho rog gi mgo can rnams so// sgo ba bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su pra mo ha/ de'i phyi rim 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi/ 
218a7(rnying rgyud): la shar du 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / lhor sbyang gu'i mgo can dang / nub du sbrul gyi mgo can dang byang du gzig gi mgo can/ mtshams bzhir sri mong mgo can dred mogo can dang / sdig pa'i ma
218a8(rnying rgyud): can dang / wa'i mgo can rnams so// sgo ba bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su be ta li/ pad+ma 'dab ma bcu drug la ye shes kyi khro mo bcu drug dgod do// mtshams bzhi
218b1(rnying rgyud): ye shes kyi khro mo bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su phugs/ de'i phyi ma pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rta'i mgo can/ lhor nam kha'i lding gi mgo can/ nub du khyi'i mgocan/ byang du srang / 
218b2(rnying rgyud): ti'i mgo can mtsham bzhir yang sprul bzhi dgodo// de'i phyi ro ma sgo ba bzhi dgod // dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su g+ha sma ri/ de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la shar du rdo rje dbyings phyug ma/ lhor rin chen dbyings
218b3(rnying rgyud): byug ma nub du pad+ma dbyings phyug ma/ byang du las kyi dbyings phyug ma/ nub du khyi'i mgo can/ mtshams bzhir phag gi mgo can ma/ byi la'i mgo can/ chu srin gyi mgo can/ ra'i mgo/ 
218b4(rnying rgyud): can rnams so// sgo bzhi dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang grub zhi la dbus su sma sha ni de'i phyi rim pad+ma 'a ba brgyad la shar du sti ngara'i gnas nyul ma/ lhor rdo rje phung nyul ma/ nub tu mchod pa'i tshogs
218b5(rnying rgyud): nyul ma/ byang du de byi'i sbyor nyul ma/ shar lhor dam tshig rjes datu dam/ lho nub tu phyi nang gi mtshams nyul ma/ dur khrod gnas phyug ma'i lhag nyul ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje sgrol nyul/ 
218b6(rnying rgyud): ma bsnyen pa'i mtshams nyul ma/ dgongs pa'i don nyul ma/ dur khrod gnas nyul ma dgod do// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su tsaN Da li/ pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi la/ shar du rdo rje sder mo/ lhor rdo
218b7(rnying rgyud): rje gtum mo nub du dur khrod bdag mo/ byang du rdo rje sgrol ma/ de'i mtshams bzhir rdo rje tib tib dang / rdo rje teg teg dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma dang / rdo rje yid g.yo ma dang sgo bzhi dgod dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ 
218b8(rnying rgyud): dbus su sing ha mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la/ chu srin gyi lus la seng ge'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su bye kri mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la
219a1(rnying rgyud): ka ka'i lus la stag gi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su sril mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la seng ge'i lus la wa'i man/ 
219a2(rnying rgyud): can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su shA na mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la pho rog gi lus la khyi'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod
219a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la/ dbus su kri kya mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la kang ki'i lus la bya rgod kyi mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus
219a4(rnying rgyud): su kang ka mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la spyang ku'ilus la kang ka'i mgo can brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgo/ da/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su kang ka mu kha/ 
219a5(rnying rgyud): pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la 'ug pa'i lus la pho rog gi mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi la dbus su u lu mu kha/ pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad la
219a6(rnying rgyud): po rog gi lus la 'ug pa'i mgo btags pa brgyad kyis bskor/ sgo bzhi dgod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das pa men ma'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs nas 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu
219a7(rnying rgyud): bzang po rdo rje sems dpa' he ru ka rol pa las pha men ma bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sku dang gsung dang thugs dngos grub kyi ting nge
219a8(rnying rgyud): 'dzin du zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las 'di phyung ngo // sku dang gsung dang thugs la sprul pa'i he ru ka/ chos dbyings don dam rig pa'i dbyings na bzhugs// phyag rgya yum gyi mkha' la
219b1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs nas kyang // sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub bdag la stsol// ye shes khro rgyal sprul pa mang po 'phro// phyag mtshan sna tshogs 'gro don mang por mdzad// las byed mkha' 'gro chos dbyings sku la 'khril/ 
219b2(rnying rgyud): ye shes khro rgyal dngos grub bdag la stsol// pa min za byed mche ga shog 'bar ba'i tshogs// dbang phyug 'jug byed yid 'phrog nu ma can// rdo rje mchu can sder chen gshog pa can// phra men za byed chen po dang / 
219b3(rnying rgyud): grub bdag la stsol// rdo rje yang sprul chen po chos dbyings mkha' la shar// mtshon thogs sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad// rtag tu don mdzad thugs rje shugs las byung // phra men yang sprul chen po dngos
219b4(rnying rgyud): grub stsol// smon lam grub pa 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid ca na// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa/ sems ca dan rnams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// ye shes chos
219b5(rnying rgyud): dbyings skad tshogs zla nya'i zhal// las mdzad ye shes nan tan/ don la zhugs// rgyu 'bras gnyis kyis 'gro ba'i don mdzad/ ba// sgo ba yab yum dngos grub stsal du gsol// rdo rje mkha'agro
219b6(rnying rgyud): dbyings kyi ye shes yum// las byed ma mo kun la dbang mdzad ma// phyag brnyan sprul pa sna tshogs 'gro don mdzad// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// rdo rje gshog pa thog pa yid 'phrog ma// rdo rje sder
219b7(rnying rgyud): mo phyogs bcur sprul pa 'phro// rdo rje las byed ma mo brgya yang 'gyed// dbang phyug pho nya'i dngos grub bdag la stsol// mi mnyam pa yi lha khyod rtag tu ni// thugs rje spun gyis gzigs shing 'gro ba'i dpal// 
219b8(rnying rgyud): bla med byang chub bsgrub par dam bcas pa// bdag cag las kyi 'bras bu mchis par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das la 'khor rnams 'dus nas gsol pa/ sngon tshe ye shes brnyes pa'i lha// de yi 'khor du gtogs
220a1(rnying rgyud): ba ma dang mkha' 'grol// rtse gcig rten kyang me shes lha dang bra men khyod// bsnyen bsnyen pa'i dus na rgyang ma ring // bsgrub pa'i dus namathum rung // yang bsnyen ni yang yang bsnyen na// dpal tshe
220a2(rnying rgyud): phra men khyed ltar ma lags kyi// lang ga tshogs kyi srin mo yang // phabs byams shing khubs gdung // yang bsgrubs pa ni yang bsgrubs na// lang ka'i tshogs kyi srin mo yang // ma bas byams shing srid pas
220a3(rnying rgyud): gdung gdus pa'i mchi ma'i tshul du dku// ye shes lnga yi thugs kyis bzed lags sam// dngos grub skal dang ldan par mi dmigs kyang // sngon gyi thugs dam dbang gis dngos grub stsol// de skad ces gsol
220a4(rnying rgyud): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gsung thugs kyi sprul pa'i dngos grub 'khor rnams la stsal to// 'khor rnams kyis kyang rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa po dngos grub stsal to// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol
220a5(rnying rgyud): pa las sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub dbyig bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu du ga pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i dam pa'i don gyi gsang bzab mo
220a6(rnying rgyud): 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung nas sprul pa lcam dral 'di mgo 'jug gi don rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis/ dbyings dang ye shes gnyis/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis/ kun rdzob dang don dam gnyis/ mdor
220a7(rnying rgyud): bsdus na don dpa la lhun gyis grub pa'i byang chub sems su bsdu'o// rgyung 'dir go badrug gi don dpal kun tu babang por 'dus so// kun tu bzang po sku mi zang rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / gsung mi zad rgyan gyi 'khom
220a8(rnying rgyud): dang thugs mi zang rgyan gyi 'khor lo dang / sku gsung thugs bde ba chen po ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor nyid kyang byang chub kyi sems kyang 'dus so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang
220b1(rnying rgyud): por 'dus pa'i don ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad // sku gsung thugs kyi don gsang bzab mo 'di rdo rje chos kyi sdung pa po la gtad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje chos kyi sdud pa pos lus pa/ 
220b2(rnying rgyud): yid gsum rjes su yid rang skyes te bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa kun gzhi rnal 'byor rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor na// zab cing gting dpag dka' ba rgyal ba'i sku bzhug so// sprul pa mang pos
220b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro don rdzogs par mdzad// dpal chen kun bzang khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes khro bo chos nyid dbyings na bzhugs// sprul pa'i khro bos las rnams rdzogs par mdzad// phra men yang sbrul ye
220b4(rnying rgyud): dbyings 'khyil// khro bo 'khor mo'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// sku gsung dngos grub ya mtshan cho 'phrul can// sku gsudathugs la sprul pa mang po 'phro// mkha' 'gro ba byed phra min pa
220b5(rnying rgyud): nya ma/ mgyogs pa'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// las rnam sa drag shul mdzad pa'i khro rgyal sku// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i man ngag gsang chen rnams// klung nas grol bar mdzad pa
220b6(rnying rgyud): ye shes yum// sgo bsgo ma'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rnams rjes su yid rang ste/ legs so legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ bka' dam pa gsang ba zab mo'i tan
220b7(rnying rgyud): tra 'di sdud pa po rdo rje chos la gtad do// de nas sdud pa po rdo rje chos kyis bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po he ru ka 'khor dang bcas pa rnams la sku gsung thugs kyi bshags pa phul lo// 'dod chags zhe
220b8(rnying rgyud): sdang gti mug dbang du gyur pas na/ lus ngag sems kyis sdig bgyis mthol zhing bshags// theg pa dman pa'i dbang du gyur pas na// thabs chen spyad dang ma spyad mthol zhing bshags// ma rig
221a1(rnying rgyud): log pa'i dbang du gyur pas na// yang dag don ma rtogs pa mthol zhing bshags// snying rje chungs shing zhe sdang dbang du gyur pas na// / 'gro ba'i don ma bgyis pa mthol zhing bshags// le lo gnyid// 
221a2(rnying rgyud): kyi dbang du gyur pas na// sgom dang bsgrub la g.yel ba mthol zhing bshags// ser sna 'jur bgegs dbang du gyur pas na// mchod pa lo zla 'das pa mthol zhing bshags// nga rgyal khengs sems dbang du
221a3(rnying rgyud): bsdus pa na/ slob dpon sku ma mnyes pa mthol zhing bshags// rtse gdung chung ba'i dbang du gyur pas na// grogs ched thugs dang 'gal ba mthol zhing bshags// za rags ngan pa'i dbang du gyur pas na// phung
221a4(rnying rgyud): dang lhag mar gyur pa mthol zhing bshags// phung dang lhag ma nyams pa'i skyon dbang gis// phud nyul thugs dang 'gal bam thol zhing bshags// phung nyul thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang
221a5(rnying rgyud): gis// mkha' 'gro bka' chad gnas su gyur pa mthol zhing / bshags// sgrol ba'i dus su snying rje chungs pa yis// se mas can gnas ma stobs pa mthol zhing bshags// nyon mongs
221a6(rnying rgyud): gnas ma stobs pa'i skyon dbang gis// yun gyi sgrib par gyur pa mthol zhing bshags// sbyor ba'i dus su ting 'dzin ma gsal bas// gzungs ma thugs dang 'gal ba'i skyon dbang gis// chags shing 'khor ba'i
221a7(rnying rgyud): gnas su mthol zhing bshags// bshags nas sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub stsol// de skad ces bzod pa phul nas bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshangs pa gnang ste/ bka' dam pa 'di yang nas yang du rdo
221a8(rnying rgyud): rje chos kyi sdud pa po la gtad ngo // de nas rdo rje chos kyis bka' dam pa 'di ma chags pa'i dbang gis bka' bzhin byas so// de nas 'khor de dag thal mo sbyar nas rjes su yi rang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
221b1(rnying rgyud): gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das he ru ka rol pa las yongasu gtad pa'i le'u sde bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / 
221b2(rnying rgyud): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yid rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bzhi nus so byang // gsang ba'i snying po zab mo mchog dpal snying rje rol pa'i rgyud rdzog s+ho// 
221b3(rnying rgyud): rgya gar gyi lo tsA ba mkhas par lobs pa bal po shrI kIr tis gtan la phab ste/ skad gsar pas bsgyur nas sog po mchog gi snying po dang / an bkra shis dang / bal mo bzang bkra shis rgya mtshos yon bdag brgya
221b4(rnying rgyud): nas mang yul byams sprin gtsug lag khang gi ya thog gi dbu rtser shin tu gsang ste/ skad gsal bar bsgyur ro// / rgya gar skad du/ sarba pany+tsa a mri ta/ sa ra sid+d+hi ma hA duka/ 
221b5(rnying rgyud): hri ta yAn par bid tran aSh+Ta/ bod skad du thamasacad bdud rtsi lnga'i rang bzhin dngos grub chen po nyeb 'i snying po mchog
221b6(rnying rgyud): bam po chen po brgyad pa// dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan gsang ba mchog gi dkyil 'khor na// shin tu rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// rgyal ba rgya mtsho 'khor dang bcas// skal
221b7(rnying rgyud): ldan rnams dang thabs gcig bzhugs// gnas mchog yum gyi dkyil 'khor na// gnyis med lhun gyis gnas pa'i tshe// de tshe nyan thos dge 'dun dang // rang rgyal theg chen mdo sde dang // byang chub sems dpa'i
221b8(rnying rgyud): dge 'dun dang // nyan thos dge 'dun chen po dang // dgra bcom ming yang med nang du// kun bzang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dgongs ste 'di skad bstan pa'i lung // bshad cing 'grol ba'i dus gcig dang // 'di skad
222a1(rnying rgyud): bstan pa'i dus gcig na// srid gsum ye nas bdud rtsi lnga// ma bcos ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas// kun tu bzang po'i thugs dkyil nas// dus gsum srid gsum sku
222a2(rnying rgyud): gsung thugs// ye nas bdud rtsi yin pa'i phyir// nges pa'i klong nas bka' stsal pa// zab mo'i klong nas phyung ste bstan// de nas bder gshegs thams cad dang // thabs gcig bzhugs te dgongs pa ni// bla na med
222a3(rnying rgyud): ba'i byang chub du// ye shes mnyam nyid nyams snyed nas// rdo rje gsang ba'i gral bkod de// kun gyi dam par 'di gsung so// bka' yi dam pa mchog gi lung // nges par phyung ste gsungs pa 'di'o// sgrub dang bsgrub par bya ba
222a4(rnying rgyud): dang 'bras bu thob par bya ba'i phyir// gsang sngags gsang ba de'i man ngag 'di// bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung // snying por bsdus pa'i nges par 'di// byang chub 'byung ba snying po mchog/ lha
222a5(rnying rgyud): ba dang ni spyod pa dang // dam tshig bsgrub pa 'phrin las dang // nges par sgrub dang bsgrub bya'i phyir// zab mo bsdus pa'i lung / 'di gsungs// bsam gyis mi khyab bstan pa dang // brgyad khri
222a6(rnying rgyud): bzhi stong rnam grangs kyang // theg pa'i sgo ni gsum du gsungs// gsang nyid theg par bsdus dang bzhi// ldem por dgongs dang don dam yang // bkri ba'i don de sangs rgyas yin// rna brgyud bstan pas thugs brtol te// 
222a7(rnying rgyud): thig le chos skus khyab pa'i phyir// nges pa'i lung yang sangs rgyas so// sangs rgyas mnyam dang dbyingasu 'gro// nges pa'i lung yang rnam gcig tu// gsang sngags gsang bas sangs rgyas te// byang chub sem/ 
222a8(rnying rgyud): 'di kun tu dag/ rdzogs pa'i ye shes bde chen nyid// ma lus mtha' dag nyid kyi rgya// ye nas bya med bya ma dgos// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'i sgra// mi rtog sbyong ba'i yul min no// de lta'i yul du rtog 'dzin
222b1(rnying rgyud): gyis/  'khor ba'i rgya mtshor gyur pa yin// nges 'byung chos sku chen po la// b+ha gar ji bzhin bzhag pas na// byang chub nyid de ltang gnas med// bu gcig ma rtsol bde bar gnos// rgyud dang lung dang man ngag
222b2(rnying rgyud): kyang / rlangs dang rje'u dang rgyal po'i tshul// khyad par rtsal 'phang thag ring yang // gcig la gcig rten gcig gi dang // dbyer med tshul gcig rang bzhin pas// cig ste rnam grangs yongs kyis med// dbyer med
222b3(rnying rgyud): ngang du rtogs pa la// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o// de bas sku gsung thugs kyi bdag/ sku dang rgyan dang 'khor lo yang // lung chen zab mo'i nang na gsal// lnga bzhi nang du 'khor ba yang // ye shes
222b4(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas de las med// dbyings su gyur pas mnyam gnas pas // ye nas sangs rgyas bde chen nyid// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la brjod// skye shi med pa'i dbyingasu gyur// dbyings 'gyur
222b5(rnying rgyud): dag mnyam lhun grub pas// lta ba 'di la gnas pa yi// rnal 'byor 'di ni skal ba bzang // ci spyad ci bsgoms ci bsgrub kyang // bdud rtsi nyid te sman gyi mchog/ bder gshegs
222b6(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi thugs dam nyid// byin brlabs ngo mtshar rgya cher 'byung // rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams kyi gsos// sangs rgyas bde chen nyid las byung // thams cad ma lus bdud rtsi 'di// spros med theg ler
222b7(rnying rgyud): gnas pa las// mtha' yas sems can don gyi phyir// rang la mchod cing rang gis bza'// bsgrub pa pos ni nan tan byos// zhes bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos/ ye shes chen
222b8(rnying rgyud): po'i thugs nas dgongs te bka' stsal pa'o// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las/ byang chub sems de kho na nyid lta bar bstan pa'i man ngag chen po gsang ba'i don dang po ste/ thugs kyi rgya mtsho
223a1(rnying rgyud): na nas gas pa'i mdzo na polas pam mtshan po brgyad pa'i nga rgyag gang du/ mr-i rnam san rdzu/ drug tu zam / 
223a2(rnying rgyud): gang thug sa man mo// bang nang du/ mas pa la sogs pa drang srong dang / lha dang kru nga 'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas tshangs pa'i gtsol mag/ du / 
223a3(rnying rgyud): gizang rdugs khong seng can// tshangs pa kun grol chen po dang // drang srong chen po ldang sngo dang // car gdang nas sa skyes// rdza gar bung dang lnga skabs dang // rgyun shes pa dang ga yon phyogs pa// khrang sa / 
223a4(rnying rgyud): da ma bzhin 'ju// dag gnyis spyod dang kal lam/ khyer dang ni ljang sngon nu// nyim zlab k+Shu ru bcis// shi / lha mo 'da'achang maM// sman gyi lha ma na gyi rgyun// 'di rnal
223a5(rnying rgyud): dang las pa las// kun bzang lhal phyog 'tshal nas// slan gyid/ bang dang dam tshig mnas// drang srong rnams la rje su gnang / de nas kun pa'ang bde gshegs kyis// sman gyi rgyal po bdud
223a6(rnying rgyud): mchag/ nges pa'i lung 'ad dka' stsal to// de nas thugs rje'i tshe 'phrul gyis// sarnams rab tu gnas nas ni// slong gsus 'jig rtenas stengs su// thams cad spyan chen ngas lam/ 
223a7(rnying rgyud): med las thams cad skyes// de ltar smin par byed pa yang // thugs rje rgya mtsho chen po las// thugs rje sprin ni khyab pa yis// sprin chen glog gi dreng ba can// yud tsam sgra dang bcas pa yis// sastengs khengs
223a8(rnying rgyud): pa sar ngab nas// da nyid thugs rje sgongs pa'i mgan// dumi phung po bdud rtsi yig/ ma lus pa ning ras par byas// bdud rtsi'i rgyam mjigs chen gyis// sa dang snga rnams kun gyis gsas// rim rtse dang
223b1(rnying rgyud): ri sul dang sman ljongs dang ni nags tshal dang // lcang lo can gyi 'khor kun du// sprin chen bdud rtsi char gyis rlan// chung thams cad ro gcig ste// chu yi bcud las skyes pa ni// dpag bsam shing dang gel par
223b2(rnying rgyud): shing la ljon shing dang ni tsu ta'i shing // sa stengs khengs par skyes pa ste// bdud rtsir gyur te thams cad rgyas// sdong po dang ni sdong chen dang // rtsa ba sdong bu shun lpags dang // snying po yal ga lo ma dang // 'dab ma me
223b3(rnying rgyud): tog 'bras bur bcas// de bzhin 'bru yi rnam grangs kun// thams cad bangs shing smin par mdzad// 'thungs na ngoms te rgyas par gyur// so so'i yul dang gnas dag dang // mdog dang ro dang dri dang mthu// gang gis
223b4(rnying rgyud): sa bon de nyid las// de dag rang rang 'byin par byed// de bzhin sgo dag chags thams cad kun// ra sa ya na'i rdzas la spyod// 'gro ba drug gi gsos su 'gyur// bdud rtsi sgo ni rnam par phye/ 
223b5(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten mgon pos bka' stsal to// de nas byang chub sems da pa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal rnon pos bsdus te pa ka' stsal pa/ lha dang klu dang drang srong dang // mi'i byang chub sam/ 
223b6(rnying rgyud): dpa'i dge snyen chen po dri ma med par grags pa li tsa byi la sogs pa la bdud rtsi ra sa yan ta nan dz+nyA ya 'di dag bstan no// dang por bsgrub pa'i yul dang gnas ni/ u hu si ti pa tsa zhes bya ste/ ba tris zhes kyang bya ba
223b7(rnying rgyud): ri'i rgyal po gser mdog can gyi rtse mo rta rna ri zhes bya ba der/ ra sa ya na zhes bya ba drang srong rnams kyis bsgrubs so// de yang thang cig yud kyis 'grub// la la nyin zhag cig gis 'grub// la la nyin zhag
223b8(rnying rgyud): bdun gyis 'grub/ tha ma nyi shu gcig gis 'grub// de la the tshom med pas 'grub// de dag kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// rtsa ba sdong bu ya ga dang // lo ma 'dab ma me tog dang // shun lpags 'bras bu
224a1(rnying rgyud): snying por bcas// ro dang mthu dang mdog dang las// rtsa ba gcig las yan lag brgyad// yan lag brgyad las yon tan stong // 'di dag kun gyi yon tan yang // bzhi brgya
224a2(rnying rgyud): rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing // bdud bzhi nges par 'joms par byed// sman gyi rgyal po bdud rtsi'i mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// drang srong chen po 'di kun kyang // mngon shes lnga dang ldan
224a3(rnying rgyud): 'gyur zhing // rig pa'i gnas mchog bco brgyad shes// de nas sman ni bsgrub par bya// stegs bu khru gang ba gcig la// man Dal gtsang ma'i dris byugs la// de yi dbus su sman gyi mchog/ bdud rtsi
224a4(rnying rgyud): cong zi rnam gsum dang // ser skya ba las byung ba yi// 'o ma bre gang btsigs nang du// a sho kan 'da' yi phye ma dang // bsres nas pa skol ba'i nang du gdab// lcags las byas pa'i snod du glugs// stegs
224a5(rnying rgyud): bu'i dbus su bzhag nas ni// byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags 'di dag/ stong ngam brgya ni rtsa brgyad bzlas// oM badz+ra a mr-i/ tha/ ba la li ka/ be la lig tsan da lig swA hA// dngos grub blang
224a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i sngags 'di'o// a mr-i ta sid+d+hi byi tsu rna ya swAhA// pu tsa l+ya ha kan/ byin gyis brlabs cing bza' ba yang // nyi ma'i gung la bza' bar bya// don dam thig le bden pa las// snying po med las snying po blang // 
224a7(rnying rgyud): rnam smin 'bras bu rigs 'dzin 'grub// nad med lo brgya 'tsho bar byed// de nas drang srong nyi shu gcig/ grub pa'i rigs 'dzin mchog tu gyur// de yi 'og tu drang srong mchog/ bco lnga yis ni bdud rtsi sman/ 
224a8(rnying rgyud): ra sa ya na dam pa 'di// tshe'i rigs 'dzin 'dod pa'i phyir// gzhon nu sred ces bya ba dang // 'dron skyob ces ni bya ba dang // rtsibs kyi mu khyud la sogs pas// chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram du bsgrubs// lha
224b1(rnying rgyud): rdzas dge ba a ru ra// rigs bdun sa la lhung ba ni// brgya byin bdud rtsi 'thung ba'i tshe// thigs pa bdud mi kha nas ltung // rlung gis byer te sa las skyes// bdud rtsi gtso bor rab tu grangs// rlung dang mabris
224b2(rnying rgyud): pa bad kan dang // 'dus pa'i nad dang dus kyi nad// dus min 'chi las thar bar byed// rlung 'khris bad kan 'di kun yang // gcig la'ang lnga lnga yod par bshad// de kun rab tu bsal ba'i phyir// phung po'i bdud dang / 
224b3(rnying rgyud): nyon mongs bdud// lha bu bdud dang 'chi bdag bcom// bdud rtsi 'di yis sel bar byed// shar lho nub byang gang yang rung // brag phug stong pa yod pa las// bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'i khu ba ni// rin chen
224b4(rnying rgyud): sna lnga 'byung ba'o// ming ni shi la mdza' du zhes// ra sa ya na pa dung rtsi'i mchog/ a ru ra brgya rtsa brgyad dam// yang na nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// sul bu zlum por gyur bcos te// de dag
224b5(rnying rgyud): rab tu btses pa dang // lcags bzang mkhar ba'i snod nang du// bkang ste stegs bu gong ma yi// dbus su bdud rtsi sman de bzhag/ byin gyis brlab pa snga ma bzhin// 'od dang dri bro ba'ang med
224b6(rnying rgyud): rtags 'di rnam gsum gang byung yang // lag pa g.yon pa bkan te phyar// mthe 'ong srin lag mthil du gug/ blangs te btung ba'i sngags 'di'o// oM a mr-i ta si ti byi tsu rna ya// lha ha kan zhes brjod do// 
224b7(rnying rgyud): de yi yon tan brjod mi lang // rdo rje brag dang 'drar 'gyur te// nad med rtag tu dar la bab// grub pa'i rigs 'dzin dam par 'gyur// srid pa chags nas srubs shing gis// bsrubs pa'i 'bras bu rin
224b8(rnying rgyud): che me shel chu shel gnyis byung ba// de yang thabs dang shes rab ste// nyin mtshan gnyis la dbang byed pa'o// de nyid zung yang 'khor du bcas// de nas bdud rtsi zags pa ni// sa dman dag tu mi skye ste// al
225a1(rnying rgyud): pe ta sas dkal ba sgra dang dri ba gnod sbyin dang // rin chen sna tshogs byung khungs gnas// legs ldan gangs riganyan gyi shod// ri drag chu klung bgegs gan su// lhung nas badra/ 
225a2(rnying rgyud): te skyes pa ni/ oM li ka dang bris rtsika/ nyi ma gzi brjid ldan pa'i chu// a la be ta sa ra sra kal ba 'brig sha 'bru// de bzhin zla ba gzi ldan chu// de yi sa bon lhung ba ni// gser mdog bdud rtsi 'dra bar
225a3(rnying rgyud): gsal 'damar ba mer blugs pus pus zer// gzugs bzang mdzes pa phun gsum 'tshogs// cher ma rno ba dpal dang ldan// bdud rtsi shing dang 'bras bur ldan// dug rnams 'joms shing slar yang
225a4(rnying rgyud): zlog/ sna tshogs nad rnams sel bar byed// nyi ma'i 'od dang zla ba'i ma dog/ ro yang rnam pa sna tshogs ldan// rag ta'i gtso bor 'di sbyor cig/ tshangs pa tshe dang ldan par gyur// nyi ma zla ba'i dngos grub
225a5(rnying rgyud): thog ras ya na'i gtso bo yin// de nas drang srong gzhon nu srid// khyab 'jug spang gnyis bya ba yi// rwa yi ga nu thogs mi srun pa// / lag na tshon cha sna lnga thogs// de yis srid pa chags pa'i btsu
225a6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi rnam lnga bkus pa las// kha nas thigs gnyis sa la ltung // de nas bdud rtsi dam pa'i mchog/ ra sa ya na phye ma'i rgyu// bu mo bzang mo gcig tu gyur// chu klung gang gA'i bye ma la// yod de skye ba bstan pa ni// nye'u
225a7(rnying rgyud): shing ram nye'u zhes bya'o// 'gan ta ku le par ba ta// gnang bri ya kum hagon sig ham kha// tsher ma yar lta mar lta ba'o// de la lha bran tshogs kun gyis// bskor zhing mchod pa byed pa yin// ston zla
225a8(rnying rgyud): tha chungs dpyid zla 'bring // nya yi tshen btsal bar bya'o// btsal ba'i thabs ni 'di ltar ro// byis pa lo drug lo bdun pa// khrus byas dang ldan gos bskon nas// shar phyogs ngos su kha bltas te// lha phyag lan
225b1(rnying rgyud): gsum byas nas ni// de dag rtsa nas dbyung ba'i sngags// tad+ya thA sho hod ga te da re swA hA/ phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi mchog khyod la// phyag 'tshal bdud rtsi las 'byung ba// stobs dang gzi brjid 'phel mdzad ma// 
225b2(rnying rgyud): rang 'byung ston pa'i bka' bzhin du// lha mo khyod ni dbang gyur cig/ khu ba ra sa ya na'i mchog/ dngos grub mchog tu nye ba khyod// tshe dang stobs ni bdag stsol gcig/ ye shes thams cad gsal bar mdzod/ 
225b3(rnying rgyud): shun lpags dang ni rgyud pa bsal// tho to bsnyil te slar la sba'o// snying po brdungs la khu ba yang // ras ni ser po'i nang du btsir// bdag nyid lus kyang khrus byas te// dar ldan gos bzangs gyon nas ni// 
225b4(rnying rgyud): sman du bsgrub pa'i 'jab la 'jug/ bsnyen dang 'dzab bsgom byas na sa ni// stong ngam 'bum 'am ci nus bzlas// bza' ba' ma yang na 'thung ba'i tshe// nyug chu ba'i 'o ma btung // yang na phye ma
225b5(rnying rgyud): mchog tu bgam// bza' zhing tung ba'i sngags 'di'o// nam hA ra a ga dza tu swAhA/ zhag gam za ma re re yang // srang cha nas skyed te bza'// zos pa'i yon tan 'di rnams so// 
225b6(rnying rgyud): lus ngag yid gsum dbang po gsal// bdud rtsi 'di dag su 'thung ba// ji ltar lha rnams 'chi med ltar// klu rnams la ni sman bzhin no// shing rnams la ni chu bzhin no// me tog la ni zla ba bzhin// lo na
225b7(rnying rgyud): lnga brgya lon bar du// bcu drug mdog ni gzhon nu 'dra// nad med rtag tu dar la bab// stobs kyang glang po che dang 'dra// mngon shes lnga dang ldan par 'gyur// 'o ma dag dang btung ba'am// 
225b8(rnying rgyud): mar khu 'am sbrang rtsi dag dang btung // zhag gcig zos na yon tan bcu// zhag bdun zos na yon tan brgya// nyi shu rtsa gcig zos na ni// brgya rtsa brgyad 'dis thob par 'gyur// bud med stong
226a1(rnying rgyud): la khyab par sbyor// sa bon mi zad 'bras bu yang // bu phor 'phel zhing dpa' dang ldan// mi rnams kyis ni mi sod do// zla gcig zos na yon tan ni// ngo yang zla ba nyang
226a2(rnying rgyud): bzhin la gnod sbyin srin pos mi sod do// lha rnams kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// zag pa zad nas na mkhar 'phur// rdo rje 'gros kyis na mkhar 'gro/ rigs 'dzin go 'phang 'dir thob bo// 'dres pa
226a3(rnying rgyud): gang zag mi yi zas// zos na dngos grub mi thob nges// zhes lung du bka' stsal to// de nas drang srong tag sha na// rgyal po bshes gnyen can zhes bya// lha dang drang srong thams cad la// mchod sbyin
226a4(rnying rgyud): rgya chen byas pa las// ma sbed pa ha chen po// kun gyi mjug tu spyan drang bas// lha chen drag po de khros te// lha chen de yi dpral ba las// mig gcig lhag par byung ba ste// lha dang drang srong
226a5(rnying rgyud): thams cad la// rlung khris bad kan sna tshogs dang // dzaM/ bzhin mi la rims nad dag/ rlung lha'i lag par bsku ra nas gtor// lha dang drang srong mang pos kyang // ma shes ma tshor myos
226a6(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur/ phye ma'i rgyal po 'dab ma 'di// sa stengs khyab par smyos pa la// drang srong rnams kyang mchod pa byed// lug mege ma tog chen po 'di// ra sa ya na'i rgyal mo ste// ba'i 'o ma dag dang bsko
226a7(rnying rgyud): rngubs cig 'thungs pas ba spu langs// rngubs gnyis 'thungs pa'i yon tan ni// rims nad thams cad byang bar byed// rngubs gsum 'thungs pa'i yon tan ni// mig rtsa dmar zhing mdog
226a8(rnying rgyud): kyang bzhon// phye ma grim mar bskams pa dang // ma to la yi khu bar sbyar// drung na dgra rnams myos par 'gyur// lha yis bsrungs kyang 'chi bar 'gyur// byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags 'di'o// 
226b1(rnying rgyud): ngam brgyani rtsa brgyad bzlas/ oM so ru gri bA han han nu ma ra ya ma ra ya/ tse ta la tse ta ya su gr-i pa phaT/ bdud rtsi ras yana'i gtso// shu dag dang ni ru rta dang // phye mar byas te su drung ba// rgyal ba
226b2(rnying rgyud): bud med dbang du 'gyur// 'grig 'gro lo ki dang sbyar// dgral blud na rna ba 'on// lug mig grib mar bskams pa dang // su ti'i 'o mar sbyar ba ni// dgral blung na 'chi bar 'gyur// lha chen drug
226b3(rnying rgyud): thos bskyed pa ni// 'jam dpal gzhon nus mkhyen pa las// lha dang drang srong gzhan mi bres// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nus mi mjed kyi bdag po lha tshangs pa dang / drang srong
226b4(rnying rgyud): dang klu rgyal po 'jog po dang / bskal pa bzang dpe'i mi'i byang chub sems dpa' li tsa byi la sogs pa rnams dal bka' stsal te// de yang tshe phyi ma 'am dus phyi mar mi sdod par
226b5(rnying rgyud): skal ba babang po'i 'bras bu mngon du zab pa yang 'bras du 'di nyid la smon to// de nas rtsi mi lha mo mchog mini grub pa'i blo gros ma/ bu mo mul zhes bya'o// de yis ban byung
226b6(rnying rgyud): ba ni// 'dzam gling shing shing gnags las skyes// rag te zhes ni 'dir grags pa// ra sa ya na'i gtso mo ste// rtsa ba rag ta mu la kha// rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu rnams// 'thun par zad par dmar ba ste/ 
226b7(rnying rgyud): 'bras bu sran ma ma sha tsam// gyen du zug pa de bsko ba// ston zla ra ba'i nyal brko'o// srid pa'i na dang nags las skyes// khrag gi zhungs ma zhes ni grags// rlon pa'i khu ba btsir ba dang // pad+ma'i
226b8(rnying rgyud): rag ta cha bskams sres// de dag bsgrub pa'i sngags 'di'o// oMn mo rag rag ta yul phunen swAhA// 'gro ba dbang byed dam pa yin// rtsi yaM lha mos bka' stsal to// ming gas med du ma rung ngo // rgyal
227a1(rnying rgyud): bu don grub bya ba de// mya ngan 'das pa'i sku gdung ni// sha ri ram zhes grags pa yin// de yi sa bon 'phel ba ni// 'jam glings stengs khyab par skyes// ma dzA di la
227a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba// ming ni tha skor rdo rje yin// me tog tha skar bzhin du ste// snye ma zur gsum til gang 'dra// rdo rje brag kyang 'joms par nus// sha ri ram dang rus pa yis// sbyar ba'i 'phrad kyi dam par
227a3(rnying rgyud): rung ming gis med du mi rung ngo // de yi yon tan thams cad kyang // rus pa sra 'khregs rdo rjer 'gyur// phyag na rdo rje'i mthu yang mnyam// re sa ya na'i mchog tu gsungs// de nas lha yi dbang po mchog
227a4(rnying rgyud): brgya byin bu yi lag pa ru// gnod sbyin rgyal pos mda' brgyab pra// de yi dum bu lag sor yang // sa stengs khyab par skyes pa ni// li bi rtse lag dbang po lag/ sdong bu yal ga mdzer pa med// 
227a5(rnying rgyud): / me tog zur gsum mda' sgro 'dra// rtsa ba lag sor lnga pa/ ste// dbyar zla tha chungs nyal brko// bsgrub pa'i lag mthil g.yo/ na du gzhag/ ra sa yan thams cad kyi// dngos grub blang ba'i
227a6(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya yin// de tshe med du mi rung ngo // mang du 'phel 'gyur ba sgrub rdzas yin// lus la 'byung ba'i dri chen dang // bsgral bi'i dri chen yungs dkar gsum// cha bskams 'thungs na dug
227a7(rnying rgyud): rnams thub// 'chi byed drug ni sel ba'i phyir// bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // 'chi bdag bdud kyang des bcom mo// pun+da zhes bya'i rna ba yang // srin mo bu na yi ste/ 
227a8(rnying rgyud): bsgral ba'i rna ba dag dang sbyar// rna ba'i mngon shes thob par byed// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // b+ha hu lug mig me tog dang // mkha' lding bya yi mig dang sbyar// A la bi ga shang shang de lu
227b1(rnying rgyud): rma bya dang pa ko ki la// 'di rnams bsgral ba'i mig dang sbyar// mig gis mngon shes der thob ste// stobs ldan gyis ni mig yin no// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // tsi tra ka dang snying zho sha// thams cad gnod
