227b2(rnying rgyud): sbyin snying gi brla// bsgral ba'i tsi ta dag dang sbyar// mngon shes lnga yi dngos grub thob// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // bud med gong bshad 'dra ba yi// glad pa go ro tsan 'byung // de ni ban glang rigs
227b3(rnying rgyud): con yin/ bsgral ba'i glad pa thams cad dang // thang pa la hA yi rtsa bar sbyar// mdangs kyi dngos grub des thob 'gyur// ha lU ki ya kha 'a bar ma'i// lce yin pas na lce dang sbyar// dbang po lcags kyi dang
227b4(rnying rgyud): grub dang / spyan ras gzigs kyi dngos grub thob// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // srid pa'i bdag po tshangs pa'i gtso// ming ni mgo nu btsun phye zhes bya'o// nal gyi bu nau dzi hA zhes// skad ma
227b5(rnying rgyud): phyung gi lce zhes bya'o// skad byung ba ni tshangs pa ste// skad ma phyu nga gi grubs par bcad// de dang sbyar ba'i 'phrad du ni// me tog rme lo kril kril ste// ming ni ba ya sa ya'o// rtsa
227b6(rnying rgyud): ba ma hA go na sig/ me tog gser gyi mdun zhu can// shar phyogs su ni kha lta ba// 'di'i kun ha ki ya ste// cha bsnyams btags te phye mar bya// zla ba bza' yis zin pa'i tshe// yi dam lha la mchod
227b7(rnying rgyud): bya zhing // phye ma rgya chang nang du gdab// thang cig yud kyis 'grub pa ste// rta mgrin dbang gis dngos grub thob// bsgral ba'i lce ni thams cad dang // sbyar ba 'phrad kyi dam par rung // ming gis med du mi rung ngo // 
227b8(rnying rgyud): sna dang sna ma'i 'bras bur sbyar// tshangs pa'i gsung dpyad sgrogs nus 'gyur// bsgral ba'i sna ni thams cad sbyar// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // dung dang 'brug rus gdung dang ni// bsgral ba'i rus pa thams cad
228a1(rnying rgyud): sbyar/ lus kyi rdo rje mngon shes thob// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // rgya mcho bu nga 'dus pa'i chu// sna tshogs chu dang gangs kyi chu// lan tshwa sna tshogs dra chu rnams// bsgral ba'i chu/ 
228a2(rnying rgyud): ni thams cad sbyar// rdo rje chu yi bdud rtsi ste// rtag tu 'gro ba'i don byed nus// ming gis med du mi rung ngo // dgongs pa'i don du sems can mtha' dag la snang ba dang / nus mthu'i yon tan gyis sems can kun la
228a3(rnying rgyud): pan 'dogs par nus so// 'gro ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad par dgongs nas/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos ye shes kyi thugs nas dgongs nas/ 'gur gyi bum par dril te/ ljags kyi/ 
228a4(rnying rgyud): dbang po la bkram ste/ zhal 'dzum pa 'dzad nas/ mkhyen rangs dkyi dbang po 'jam dpal rnon po dang / rdo rje chos la bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sras mchog te
228a5(rnying rgyud): ba dang / tshangs pa dang drang srong dang / lha dang klu dang / ma'i byang chu ba sems dpa' ba ma la g+hir ti rnams la bka' stsal to// bdu da rtsi chen po mchog gi lung gi sde las/ sman ra sa ya ni bsgrub pa'i
228a6(rnying rgyud): lung / 'bum sde las btus pa bam po chen po gnyis pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra b+ha ga ban ma hA rA dzA/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis med kyi rgyal po chen po la
228a7(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// de nas spong pa bstan te/ lung a nu yog pa rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor du bstan te/ lta ba dang ni spyod pa dang // gzungs kyi mtshan nyid 'di gsung so// de bzhin dam tshig chen po'ang bstan// las
228a8(rnying rgyud): 'di lung gis bsgrub bya na// mi spong ba ni dang du blang // spyod pa dam tshig bco lnga bsrung // shes pa lnga dang bsrung ba gsum// stong rtsa brgyad du bsrungs pas ni// rtsa brgyad stong zhing de la bya'o// de yang ma hA sa ma ya/ 
228b1(rnying rgyud): bzhi pa rdzogs na kun tu bzang // zhi rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod dang // gnan bzlog drug ni gcig tu'o// dngalag ni lung bshad de// khru tshad bzhi dang ldan pa ni// yon tan bcu gcig dang yang ldan// bzhin bzangs
228b2(rnying rgyud): mig gis dkyus ring ba// stong smad byed la rked pa pra// tshigs pa zlum la ser mo rang // yon tan 'od can bcu gcig lo// ye shes rigs can yin par bshad// bcu gsum rdo rje rig su 'grub// bcu drug sngag/ 
228b3(rnying rgyud): pas 'grub nges pa'o// rin chen rigs mchog yin par bstan// nyi shu gcig pa pad+ma'i rigs// spyan ras gzigs dbang rta mchog 'grub// nyi shu rtsa lnga lon pas ni// thogs med byang chub sems kyang 'dren// thams/ 
228b4(rnying rgyud): cad las kyi rigs mchog 'grub// sum cu rtsa gcig phan chad kyis/  sems phebs tshun chad kun tu dge'o// yid du 'ong ba dam pa yin/ dbader gshegs rig su 'grub par bshad// bde chen 'du 'dral med
228b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i gzungs de dag ma lus gang rnyed pa// lus kyang khrus bya sa gtsang mar bya'o// dri zhim tsan+dan go pan dang // dz+ha ti pa/ la ku ru tse// ka ko la dang ga bur dang // a ka ru dang du ru ska/ g+hi
228b6(rnying rgyud): hAng glang po'i spos rnams kyis// byugs nas rgyan dang phreng ba gdags// dar dang ras bal 'jam po dang // gos rgyan chas klubs bskon nas ni// gser gyi rna cha gdub kor dang // do shal dpung rgyan se mo do// rin chen
228b7(rnying rgyud): sna tshogs brgyan du gdags// ji bzhin bde ba'i stan dag la// g.yon phyogasu ni gzhag par bya// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen dang // bsgrub dang bsgrub chen bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// 'phang du sor
228b8(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i chang du bya// rdo rje dri chus man la byug/ sha chen gu gul 'og gis bdug// dkyil 'khor de la bskor te 'dug/ g.yon du de byi bzheg nas ni// p+la ga de nyid byin gyis brlab/ spyi bor mi dkar 'od ldan pa// lcel ma
229a1(rnying rgyud): dmar dam pa bsam// snying dkar zla dkyil hUM mthing ka/ lte bar swa sngon 'od ldan pa// rkang par ha ljang 'od ldan pa// pa las pad+ma'i dbyingasu yang // gru gsum me 'od 'bar ba bsam// nyon mongs ldarnam
229a2(rnying rgyud): sbyang ba dang // sdug bsngal lnga ni tshar gcad phyir// lag g.yas gzhan gyis mi thub ma// g.yon pa ro langs chen mo ste// de yi kha la khro gnyer ma// ral pa gcig ma pad+ma la'o// gsang yum lnga dang khro mo bzhi// byin gyis brlabs/ 
229a3(rnying rgyud): tau sngags bzlas pa// oM eHhUM swA hA/ b+ha ga ban ni nyid kyi bka'// phyag brgya bzhi ru bdag gyur pas// gnyisu med par mnyam sbyar nas// lha yi bdud dang phung po'i bdud// nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bcom// phyag rgya
229a4(rnying rgyud): chen po bzhi dang ldan// mkha' la sems phebs 'bros pa'i tshe// byad chub 'khor ba mya ngan 'das// gnyisu med pa'i sar phyin no// bcom da ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad
229a5(rnying rgyud): dang mtshan mar btags pa thams cad kun// bde chen nyid las ga/ zhan ma yin// bde chen nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgya kyi/ dkyis mi mkhyen to// phyinang ma lus snod bcud kyang // byang chub sem
229a6(rnying rgyud): rnam dag pas/  skye med ye shes yum gyi dbyings// gnyis med bdud rtsi chen po ste// yab yum bde ba'i ngang du gsal// 'di ni snying po byang chub sems// bder gshegs kun gyis bka' stsal to// lus kun yongasu 'khyud pa/ 
229a7(rnying rgyud): yis// rdo rje pad+mar ldan byas nas// rang 'byung rnams ni bde mchog sems// phul bas myur du grub pa ni// oM ra ga pu tsa ho// dngos grub blang zhing 'di brjod do// byang chub sems kyis dbang skur te// dngos grub bsgrub pa la
229a8(rnying rgyud): gzung do/ bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung gi nang nas/ bsgrub pa chen po'i lung dang gzungs kyi mtshan nyid dang / sbyor ba'i man ngag dang / gAn bsgrub pa'i lung dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi yon tan dang / a mr-i ta sgrub pa'i lung
229b1(rnying rgyud): / kham pochen po gsum dug/ rgyag gang du/ sman pa d+hA ban+d+ha/ ba na du/ bras rdzun po lta smral pa'o/ pal chen tshu rgyal gakho nga ma pal phyag 'a
229b2(rnying rgyud): mi byed dang bas phyag 'tshal na// de nas stana'i lung bshad de// ye nas rgyu nyid dag pa las// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// khams gsum 'khor ba'i rgyu ru gyur// khams gsum de dag bsgral ba'i zhing // A sa ma tsa la d+ha/ 
229b3(rnying rgyud): d+ha tu swa ba b+ha ad ma ko N+Da/ ra yaM khaM ta tha phaT/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal to// mi g.yo phyag rgya chen po'i ngang // dbang phyug chen po'i bsgral thabs no// 'tshe ba'i bdag po'i tshe dang srog/ thugs rje'i ngang dang shes rab dang / 
229b4(rnying rgyud): thabs la mkhas pa'i byin brlabs kyis// 'gro ba thams cad sbyong ba mdzad// bdud dang gshin rje 'khor bcas kun// gnyis med phyag rgyar rol pa yis// dus la bab po sa ma ya// oM sarba pA pa kar tegs
229b5(rnying rgyud): si stam tra ka ru ni sU dza dza/ ma tang gi ni rnam shes de// nges par ga/ thugs la bab nas ni// Ta ki zhal ni nub tu bstan// dbang dud/ sdu ba'i las mdzad kyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin gyis rlobs/ 
229b6(rnying rgyud): gsum ma lus bsgral ba'i zhing // stan chen po bya ba'i phyir// bder gshegs mang po kun 'dus shing // byams dang snying rje ldan pa yis// nyon mongs 'khor ba'i rgya dral to// gnas kyi sgo 'di su yis bcad// sems kyi bdag
229b7(rnying rgyud): bos bcad dam ci// gzung 'dzin rkang pa bsnol ba yis// yul las 'das pa'i sgo phye shig zhes brjod de/ sgo dbye'o// ka ta ra ka na pra be sha/ g.yon pa'i zhabs kyis ru tra'i gzugs// gnas kyi sgo 'di bcad bzhin du// bde
229b8(rnying rgyud): bar gshegs pa'i skyabasu gsol// shi ba'i sdug bsngal 'dir dbyung ngo zhes lha chen po brgyad kyis dus cig tu tshig de smras so// Ta ki brgyad kyis bka' stsal pa// drags pa ma rungs lha chem khyod// sems kyi sgo kun dbye yis
230a1(rnying rgyud): rdo rje 'bar ba'i spu gri yis// gnas kyi sgo kun des phye nas// sems kyis bdag pos gzung bar bya// ston pas gsungs pa/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis 'chi ba yin// sdig pa'i rkyen gyis bcom pas 'chi// bdag kya
230a2(rnying rgyud): dngos por lta bas 'jig/ nga yi bstan pa 'di la gzung // 'on kyang 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal bral// gzugs 'dzin rka lag yul las bzlas// pho mo bsnol te mnan pa yang // mgo ni lho nub 'tsham su bsnan// rkang pa badza shar 'tshams
230a3(rnying rgyud): su N+yangaShaT ki'i zhabs ni g.yas pa yis// ru tra li ga'i steng du gnan// de ltar ling ga mnan byas nas// thar byed chen po'i 'gying stabs kyis// rngom brjid chen pos 'di skad do// sa ma ya ke sha tsi Ta dz+wa la hUM phaT/ zhes mnan no// 
230a4(rnying rgyud): ma hA da ba ru tra dza zhes pa dang / khams gsum nas 'byung sems can rnams// rdo rje sku yi khyad par gyis// 'od zer tshul du bsdus nus ni// de dag bdag gis gzugs la gzung // spro ba rdo rje thams cad kyis/ 
230a5(rnying rgyud): sku dang ye shes mchog gis bya'o// thar pa'i lam 'byed dkyil 'khor 'dir// brod pa can rnams 'ong ba ltar// skal dang ldan pa/ rigs kyi bu// bde bar 'ongs pa legs te 'ongs// rnal 'byor dbang phyug
230a6(rnying rgyud): chen po yis// rtse rgyal bstan pa'i gnas chen 'dir// b+ho de tsi ta'i dbyings nyid du// khams gsum 'khor ba kun bsdu'o// chos nyid skye 'gag med pa la// bde bar gshegs dang 'gro ba zhes// dbyingasu gcig pas gnyi su med// 
230a7(rnying rgyud): kun kyang ngo bo mnyam nyid de// thams cad snying po byang chub sems// ma skyes pas na 'gag pa 'jig/ bdag nyid med na mnyam pa'i sku// thugs rje chen po cir mi mdzad// ye gnas de ltar de bzhin du// sems can ma rig
230a8(rnying rgyud): rmongs pa'i blos// bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// rtag chad mtha' gnyis ma spongs te// nor pas btags pa'i phung po lnga// log rtog phyin ci log bzhis bcings// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rgyu bsags te// 'khor ba'i rgyud// 
230b1(rnying rgyud): lnga kha brims pas// mya ngan mi 'da' yun rings te// phung po khams dang skye mched la// 'khrul pa'i bag chags bag la nyal// bde 'gro'i lam la bsgribs pa'i rnams// 'khor ba'i lam lnga rgyun bcad phyir// ngan song rnam par/ 
230b2(rnying rgyud): sbyong ba'o// ma ta ma ta sarba pe ta ga te he huM hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa sarba tir ya te tuM phaT/ da ha da ha sarba na ra ga te he tuM hUM phaT// de ltar ngan song rnam sbyangs te/ sdug bsngal gsum gyi sgo bcad phyir// raM yaM khaM zhes brjod la// ye shes
230b3(rnying rgyud): 'bar ba'i mes bsregs ste// mtshan nyid med par stong par 'gyur// dus la bab pa'i sems can de// las la bab pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// thugs rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni// 
230b4(rnying rgyud): skal dang ldan pa'i rnam shes des// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// sku yi sprul pa phyogs bcur bkye// gsung gis sem ngas can mtha' dag grol// thugs ni tshad med bzhi dang ldan// nyi zla gsal
230b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor du// tshe dpag med par dbang bskur nas// yang dang / nyid la yang dag sgrol// yang dag bsgral na bde chen thob// mi ldogs la nges par phyin// phyin pa tsam gyis dbang thob nas// rgyal ba
230b6(rnying rgyud): zhing khams dbyings nyid mthong // rgyu drug gnasu mi skye phyir// dpa' bo 'bru lngas lam lnga dgag/ oM A~M hUM swA hA/ 'og min dga' ldan lha yul du// ye shes rlung gis brten nas ni// sbyor ba'i lhum su phaT gyis 'phang / 
230b7(rnying rgyud): a nri su tri pri du/ gang yang rung ba'i rnam shes de// gsang ba'i dbyings su hUM gis bsdu// skur skyed ye shes skur spros te// dbyings dang ye shes lhun grub pas// sangs rgyas zhing khams rab 'byam dang // bde gshegs po
230b8(rnying rgyud): brang dkyil 'khor du// rdzu 'phrul zhabs dang ldan pa yis// 'phags pa'i lam du rlung zhugs nas// chos kyi 'khor lo skor zhing gshegs// 'jig rten lha yi gtso bo dang // nyan thos dgra bcom rang rgyal dang // sa bcu
231a1(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' yis// 'jig rten 'das pa'i mchod pas mchod// stug pos brgyan pa'i sa 'das nas// pad+ma spyan gyi sa la bzhag/ 'chi ba med pa'i chos sku thob// stong gsum ma lus
231a2(rnying rgyud): bton pa bas// 'bum gyi char yang mi phod de// rang sems ma bcos ye nas chub// skyes bu chen po rnal 'byor gyis// bsgral ba 'ba' zhig snying rje'i mchog/ de nas ma trang ru tra de bsgral te// sngon 'byung ba yi gleng bzhi
231a3(rnying rgyud): dang gtan tshigs su dgongs nas/ phyi rabs kyi sngags 'chang rnams yid ches par bya ba dang / dad pa can gyi rnal 'byor pa rnams drang ba'i phyir/ dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad dang / ma mo chen mo brgyad
231a4(rnying rgyud): dang rang 'byung gi mchod rten chen po brgyad/ 'di man chad gtan tshigs dang ba cas te bstan to// gong du bsgral ba'i bsam rgyud ni 'og nas zhib tu bstan no// 'di yang bsnor te lung bcus nas bstan no// 
231a5(rnying rgyud): bdud dang dbang phyug gshin rjed// thugs rje tshad med bzhis bsgral nas// ro yi nyal thabs gan rkyal te// 'dzam bu gling le'i g+ha nga khamasu// bor nas sa gzhir gyur pa ni// dur khrod chen po brgyad
231a6(rnying rgyud): du gyur// mgo ni lho nub mtshamasu bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshamasu bstan// lag pa gnyis ni g.yas g.yon brkyang // mgo dang lus snying yan lag kun// gnas kyi dur khrod chen po brgyad// de ni dpal chen bzhugs
231a7(rnying rgyud): gnas yin// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// ro yi srungs mchen mo ni// ma mo chen mo brgyad bzhag go// de yi gnas rten chen por yang // mchod rten chen po gzi byin can// rang 'byung re re bzhag pa yin// de/ 
231a8(rnying rgyud): sa gzhi 'di kun yang // bkra shis ya mtshan thugs rje can// chos dang dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas// cho 'phrul 'byung bar bka' stsal to// de yi lus snying ma ga ta// dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal// ma mo chen mo kiru
231b1(rnying rgyud): riganas 'amakhas shing stobs che nga'i sa'o// mchod ten ming ni ba byed rten/ de yi mgo bo lnga phyogs kyi// dur khrod chen po bzhag pa ni/ sang g.yul gyi gling phran yin/ mamatshan metsa bu gnas// mthong thos nas/ 
231b2(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'phrul bag can// mchod rten ri bo ta la la// lag pa g.yas pa sha sgo'i mtshams// dung khring chen po ba la yul yin// ma me chen mo pu kas// lhag par zas kyi longs spyod che// mchod rnam pa
231b3(rnying rgyud): khakhong lag pa g.yon ni lho nub mtshams// dur khrod chen po sa la'i yul// ma me chen mo pe ta li// phyag na rdo rje dbang gi gnas// de ni mthu dang dbang yang che// gyang yul chen po'i si las ni// mchod rten ma las
231b4(rnying rgyud): gan dang rkang pa g.yas pa bya gar mtshams// dur khrod chen po li yi yul 8/ ma mo chen mo can la li// lha mo shang ka ni zhes grags/ chu dang me grub rdzu 'phrul can// mchod rten ming ni ge ru t+yo shan// rkang pan / 
231b5(rnying rgyud): banub byang mtshams// du khrod chen po ba che'i yul// ma mo chen mo thamos/ bde skyed ldan pa phun sum tshogs// mchod rten meng nis ni // ngo mtshan stong gi byang phyogs na/ dur khrod chen po u rgyan yul
231b6(rnying rgyud): me chen mo kas s+pha ri// 'byor ba'i longs spyod lnga dang ldan// dngos grub can yang de na mang // gzi'i mchod rten chen po ste// ming yang d+harma tsakra'o// de yi nang khrol thams cad kun// dur khrod chen po za hor yul// rgya mtsho'i sgo gling
231b7(rnying rgyud): ma hA do// lang ga pu rangs srin po'i gnas// ma mo chen mo sma sha ni// mngos shes rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// srin po srin mo sha za rnams// de dag kun la dbang sgyur zhing // rin chen nor bu dpag bsam shing // 'byor pa'i lo
231b8(rnying rgyud): bya kun dang ldan// mchod rten pade byed gzhon nu'o// 'jig rten kun tu bstan pa yi// dur khrod chen po gnas brgyad do// de ltar sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'das pa'i dus na sngon 'byung ba'i// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlas
232a1(rnying rgyud): de ltar gyur pa'i 'jam gling du// skye shi gnas pa'i yul yin pas// phyi rabs sngags kyi sgrub pa pos// 'jigs byed chen po khrag mthung gi// dus gsum rgyal ba'i bka' bzhin du// bskyed nas
232a2(rnying rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa ni// sngags mchog bdud rtsir bsgrub pa'i phyir// rgyu dang dam rdzas thams cad ni// sangs rgyas grub pa'i rgyu dang bzhi// dam tshig dam par bsrung ba'i rdzas// byin gyis brlab par bya ba'o// 
232a3(rnying rgyud): de nas 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bskyed de/ nges don gcig tu lam rgyud lnga ni 'bras bu chen po lnga yin te/ de dag thams cad 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyis dus gcig tu bsgral bar
232a4(rnying rgyud): phyir/ bdud yag sha ma hA ru tra zhes bya ba zhig/ dus der bsgral zhing gnas sbar ro// de la bdag nyid sku ni smug nag 'bar// phyag nam tshon cha sna tshogs bsnams// pradz+nyA ke sha tsi Ta dz+wa la hU~M phaT/ ma nu da ram te
232a5(rnying rgyud): shabyung um da ram badz+ra ma sA mangs/ rngam kha'i zhes bsgral te// eHli ma hA ru tra/ sha tum kar/ badz+ra na hU~M phaT/ ma hA ruHsU dza dzA zhes brjod de/ stan dang glan chen por byas ste/ rnam par
232a6(rnying rgyud): shes pa byang chub sems dbang bskur ro// de na sta na'i dkyil 'khor 'dir// dur khrod bdag po btul nas ni// 'khor bcas ma lus dbang du bsdus// 'jig rten gtso bo lha brgyad dang // srin mo brgyad dang bu mo brgyad// dbang
232a7(rnying rgyud): phyug nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// 'di skad ces ni khas blangs te// mgrin gcig tu ni rab smras pa// ho rdo rje 'bar ba'i me dpung gis// bskal pa bas kyang sreg mdzad pa// 'jigs tshul rngam pa'i khyad par can// dbu mang
232a8(rnying rgyud): rtsub pa'i tshig sgrogs shing // phyag mangs 'jigs pa'i mtshon cha bsnams// zhi ba'i phyag stong spyan stong yang // 'jig rten khams kun spa gong na// khro gnyer phyag stong spyan stong gis// dpa' bo sgeg dang 'jig su rung // 
232b1(rnying rgyud): nod dang ga she dang 'jigs par byed// snying rje rngam dang zhi bar ston// 'bar ba'i tshogs chen sna tshogs can// khams gsum lha chen thams cad dang // 'jig rten thal bar rlog mdzad pa// sem he che mchog he ruH// khro rgyal
232b2(rnying rgyud): khyod la sbyangs su paci'o// thugs rjenan tan dag gag zung // gal te bka' bzhin ma gyis na// bdag cas rnams kyi mgo lus snying // dus bu brgyar ni gtungs 'gyur bgyid// de bying bar bas bdag ma gtang // zhes
232b3(rnying rgyud): mthun par smras so// khams gsum thams cad bsgral ba'i zhing // rgyu drug gnas pa'i sems can rnams// bsdu ba'i sbyor bas kun bsdus nas// me ldog dbyings su yang dag nyid// thig le chen pos dbang skur te// zlags
232b4(rnying rgyud): dbus na byang chub sems// rdzogs sangs rgyas la som nyi med// sha tsha na bshang gci khub khrag/ bde gshegs lnga yi sa bon ste// rnam par dri chen snang bar mdzad// phyi rol chen po lnga dag la// nang gi rgyu 'bras
232b5(rnying rgyud): ye nas dag/ mi bskyod byang chub sems nyid de// dmigs su med pas da/ ga pa yin// mangs rin chen 'byung ldan po// mnyam dang / mi mnyam dbyer med do// snag pa rag ta mtha' yas thugs// skye 'gas
232b6(rnying rgyud): med de ye nas dag/ don yod dri chu las grub pa// dri med rgyu nas rnam par dag/ kun kyang gtsang zhing dri med pas// thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas lnga// lus pa med pas ye shes dang // ma bcos ye nas de nyid do// de phyir
232b7(rnying rgyud): sman chen bcud kyi mchog/ bdud rtsi zhes ni de la bya'o// rtogs pa'i glong du su 'dris pa// mi zhes bya ba sangs rgyas yin// bcom ldan 'das ni gud na med// 'byung ba lnga las gyur pa'i rgyu// sprul pas rigs lnga'i sangs rgyas
232b8(rnying rgyud): yin// rang gi lus la sdu ba'i phyir// sku gsum rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur// de phyir bsgrub pa'i rdzas su gsungs// de skad ces sman spyod pa'i lung du bka' stsal to// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung // 'bum sder bzhugs
233a1(rnying rgyud): badzin nas lungs num ga byung ba blan med bstan pa ste/ bam batshan pa bdag// rgyag nang du banag tab tu byud+d+hAnam/ bang nang du/ rigs ldang de bar
233a2(rnying rgyud): gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// ma hA yo ga'i don du bsgrub pa'i thabs 'di bstan to// ri ni nyams dga' mdangs bzang ba'i// yid 'ong gnas su 'dug nas ni// byin brlabs mtshams bcad brtan byas nas// 
233a3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi pa// dri sna lnga yis marga' la bya'o// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// margaral brgyad pa'i gzhung bzhin bri// de yi rtse mo brgyad la yang // yid bzhin nor bu 'bar
233a4(rnying rgyud): bri/ de yi dbus su bsam pa yang // srid gsum ban d+ha bzang kong yu dag/ ye nas ma bcos rang 'byung snod// dpal dang ldan pa de'i snod bzhag la// de yi nang du glugs pa'i sman// ye nas rang byung / 
233a5(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi lnga// sha chen bshang gci khub khrag/ dag pa'i rgyu ste bdud rtsi'i dngos// stong las sbyar bas ye nas dag/ bta/ dang btsag dang ba gzhal ba'i// nyi zla gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor du/ 
233a6(rnying rgyud): 'bru lnga ye shes 'phro 'du las// stong khams khyab par don byas ste// bcud kyi dal kun bsdus nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas mchod pa'i phyir// bka' bzhin bstan pa'i dngos grub blang // mu tig dkar po dri med
233a7(rnying rgyud): ltar/ sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya'o// 'gu ya lag pa'i phyag rgya yis// gzhung bzhin brtan zhes 'phro 'du bya// de dbus klu bdag sa bon gyis// dngos grub dam pa blang bar bya// dgu pa'i sngags kyis btab nas ni// le
233a8(rnying rgyud): lo med pa'i brtson 'grus kyis// bar chad med pa'i 'phro 'du bya'o// oM gyis ye shes 'od phyung zhing // A yis mes bsregs thal bar 'gyur// hUM gis bdud rtsi rnam par dag/ gsal la 'byung 'jug lhan ne bos// rtags
233b1(rnying rgyud): dang mtshan ma bdun gyis zung / 'ad dang badri //  ma gzugs don par gyur// mang bu selan stsu rdzas la// de la sam tshan rnyed pa pa/  can pa'i da sa dgas rgya sa 'angs sa rgya / 
233b2(rnying rgyud): spogs thags bsgyur la rtsal shugs dbyung // dam tshig chen po bskang ba'i phyir// bsgrub rdzas rnams kyang bstar nas gzhag/ de nas mchod cing dngos grub blang // slob ma la yang dbang bskur ro// bla ma lung ldan des kyang ni// tshig tu/ 
233b3(rnying rgyud): bcad pa 'di dag brjod do// gdod nas ma skyes rnam dag chos kyi dbyings// dag dang mdag mi rtog rtog las 'das// snga ma 'das dang da ltar phyis 'byung ba// dus gsum gcig la sku bstan phyo ba shol med// dngos grub sna tshogs
233b4(rnying rgyud): brlabs chen 'bar ba can// su 'dod sbyin gyis da lta 'di la long // skal pasbubs dang gti mug mun nag la// sprin mthongs nyi shar khung par dro ba bzhin// bdud rtsi rgyal po dbang chen 'di byin pas// rigs/ 
233b5(rnying rgyud): 'dzin rgyal po gtso bo rigo 'bang thob// tshe dang skangs dang yid du'o// bge/ gas rnams zhi ba la sogs te// nang dang bral nas kyi dpa'i// yon tan rtsa brgyad 'di yis thob// zhes bka' stsal nas// de
233b6(rnying rgyud): nas yang bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das kyi lung 'di las// dbang bskur gnang ba gang yin pa// 'khor rnams kun gyis thob par shog/ zhes bka' stsal to// yang 'kho/ 
233b7(rnying rgyud): nye ba'i sras mchog dam pa 'jam dpal la sogs pas dbang mnos nas/ yang rigs lnga dang rigs rgya mtsho'i gtso bo la lung gi don zhus pa/ rtog pa dang mi rtog pa'i don ji ltar blta/ don gyi 'bras bu gang lags zhes
233b8(rnying rgyud): gsol ba las// kun tu bzang po dang rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// tshangs dang drang srong gtsang ma za// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// klu dang bram ze gtsang ma za// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// byol
234a1(rnying rgyud): song rtsa mchog za ba yang // ji srid 'tsho ba'i bar du za// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// yang dag don gyi lung 'di nyon// rnal 'byor thabs dang ldan pas ni// chos sku gcig las tha dad pa'i// ri/ 
234a2(rnying rgyud): lnga'i kha dog 'di bshad do// 'di ltar rtogs na grol zhes bshad// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa'i rdzas// mnyam pa'i dbyingasu rab rtogs na// gnyis med don gyis zin pa yin// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// dngos
234a3(rnying rgyud): dang dngos med rtog pa'i mtshan// gtsang dang mi gtsang rtog pa'i mtshan// mkhas pas dbus la gnas mi 'gyur// ye shes sku lnga bstan pa'i phyir// byang chub sems ni dkar bas na// dri med dkar bas ye shes sku'o// rag ta/ 
234a4(rnying rgyud): chags med dmar bas na// chags med rnam dag chos kyi sku'o// mangs yid bzhin rin chen sngo// sna tshogs 'byung gnas mnyam nyid sku'o// rin chen gser mdog snang mdzad de// mngon 'byung sprul pa chos kyi sku'o// 
234a5(rnying rgyud): dri chu dag byed ljang khu'i mdo// kun tu don grub las rab sku'o// sku lnga lhun grub bdud rtsi 'di// so so'i lus la gnas pa yin// dri chen dri chu rag ta dang // mangs sems chu 'di rnams kun// sems can rtog
234a6(rnying rgyud): bzlog pa'i phyir// gtso ru dang du blang bar bya'o// gtsang sme med par kun gyis spyod// 'di dag grol bar ngas bshad do// the tsom med pas dngos grub thob// spyod pa'i skyes bu rnal 'byor pas// tshe 'di nyid la grub par 'gyur/ 
234a7(rnying rgyud): ces bcom ldan 'das rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pas bka' stsal to// 'di yan chad ma hA yo ga'i don gyi lung dang bsgrub thabs bdud rtsi chen po 'bum sde las btus pa'i// / bam po chen po lnga'o// 
234a8(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta kun d+ha la lin ma/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi 'khyil pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal nas// bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs bstan te// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis bdud
234b1(rnying rgyud): rtsi bsgrub pa'i dgongs pa la zhugs te// de nas bdud rtsi rgyal po yis// bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i thabs 'di bstan te bka' stsal to// dang por phun sum tshogs pa'i yul// dga' zhing bar chad med pa'i gnas// btsal nas
234b2(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi dbang du bya'o// de nas rang lus bsrung ba'i phyir// lag cha phun sum tshogs pa yis// bar chad byed pa'i dgra dgegs bzlog/ de nas bsgrub pa'i yo bya rnams// 'tshe ba zas kyi yo byad rnams// bsgrub pa
234b3(rnying rgyud): dam rdzas yo byad dang // rkyen zlog sman gyi yo byad dang // de ltar phun sum tshogs ldan nas// ji bzhin bde bar 'dug nas ni// sa gzhi rab tu sbyang byas te// tshes grangs yar gyi brgyad la brtsam// snga dro'i dus nas
234b4(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor bya// ma zhar la 'dom gang balnga bri// bsgrub pa chen po bya ba'i byor// dri chen dri chu'i bskyad nul bya'o// dur khrod thod pa lta nang du// tshil chen me ma re re re yang // me mar sdong bu lnga brgya bya'o// ma
234b5(rnying rgyud): mar lnga brgya bltam nas ni// de nas bsgrub pa brtsam bya zhing / rdzogs pa'i las ni rnam bzhi bya// zhi ba'i tshe na byang du blta'o// / gA na'i tshe na nub tu blta'o// sten chen po lho ru blta'o// rgyas pa'i
234b6(rnying rgyud): na shar du blta'o// yang na phrin las rnam pa bzhi// so so'i phyogs phyogs dag nas blta'o// de ltar 'dug stangs bstan nas ni// shar gyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// bsgrub rdzas thams cad bzhag par bya'o// lho ma
234b7(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor steng du ni// me mar lnga brgya smos pa gzhag/ nub kyi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// bsgrub pa yab yum gnas par bya// byang gi dkyil 'khor steng duni// rgyu mchog chen po gzhag par bya// dbus kyi dkyil
234b8(rnying rgyud): 'khor steng du ni// bram ze bkra shis gtsang ma'i rigs// bkra shis thod pa gnag par bya'o// yang na pand dpal ldan rdzogs// zlum zhing 'khyil pa pad+ma 'dra// dbus ni bu ga gcig yod pa// de yi nang du hri zhes bri'o// 
235a1(rnying rgyud): de yi nang du thugs pa ni// snying po tshim byed bcud kyi mchog/ gtso ba lnga dang 'bras bu lnga// dri zhim bcud ldan thams cad kun// 'di dag rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir// mang po 'dus pa mthu/ 
235a2(rnying rgyud): byin che/ yang na rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar// go tsa hA dang leng leng du// 'ga'i hwang ci'u hwang ras yan// ga bur mu tig lan cha rnams// 'di rnams rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar// yang na gtso bo lngar sbyar ba// sa 'bras chun/ 
235a3(rnying rgyud): 'brum pa na se// ger rgyas rur dang lnga// 'di ni nang gi 'bras bu lnga'o// sha lnga dag dang sbyar ba yang // dbang po lnga yi gzugs dang sbyar// de yi phrad du dgos pa yang // mig dang rna ba sna dang lce// gtso bo tsa ta nyid / 
235a4(rnying rgyud): lnga'o// shing tog rgun 'brum ka ko la// a 'bras pa na bum sha lnga'o// dri na chen po sna lnga dang // cha'i grangs dang mnyam ste sbyar// na ga ge sar shing tsha dang // sug smel 'gan da pa tra dang // kun du ra dang dri
235a5(rnying rgyud): sna lnga'o// yang na dri yi rgyal po lnga// rgya spos 'dza' ti pa la dang // ga bur tsan d+ha li shi lnga'o// de bzhin spos lnga'i dam pa yang //  ka ru dang du ru ska// pog dang sbrang rtsi lce pog dang // gser dngul zangs
235a6(rnying rgyud): lcags g.yu dang lnga// bdar ram zhib du btags te blugs// 'di dag rab tu bsnyam zhing bsog/ 'di dag sbyar zhing btags pa'i sngags// oM a mr-i ta mu sa la/ gra he ha na ha na hUM phaT/ 'di rnams sbyar ba'i bdud rtsi
235a7(rnying rgyud): mchog/ dngos grub 'bras bu nges thob bo// 'bras bu rnam lnga bsgral ba'i phyir// byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// mi lce gA gli snying la sogs// gsang ba'i brda' tshig dag gis ni// de dag rab tu sba zhing bsgrub// 
235a8(rnying rgyud): phyogs bzhi dbus dang lnga ru bzhag/ rgyu mchog chen po khrus byas nas// mngon spyod mngon spyod ya mtshan gyi// 'jigs byed 'jigs byed chen po yi// e yi dkyil 'khor sum rtseg gi/ steng du bzhag nas dbang bskur mo
235b1(rnying rgyud): de nas dpal chen che ru// dur khrod bdag po chen po ni// tshe mchog shin tu mi bzang pa// dbu mangs phyag martsub pa bsnabs// spug nag sku ni 'bar ba can// zhal ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste/ phyag kyang bzhi lu rtsa bats+tsha/ 
235b2(rnying rgyud): so/ oM badz+ra ma hA shri he ru ka/ ra dza la hUM/ gsang ba'i yum yang yab dang mthun// ma hA kro ti sha ra~M// oM sarba ta thA ga ta mu tra e b+hi Shiny+tsa hUM/ zhes yum dbang bskur nas// gzhan yang rigs dang mthun pa ru/ phyo/ 
235b3(rnying rgyud): bzhi dag tu dgod par bya'o// de yang tshul bzhin byin gyis rlob// e ha hi ma hA ru tra hUM phaT/ sarbed a a zhes brjod pas tsi ta drang ngo // yang nas yang du slar byas te// dug gsum rtsa ba der bcad do// rgyu 'bras
235b4(rnying rgyud): mthun zhing sbyar ba yang // yangs shing rgyud la goms pa dang // chos sku zhi ba'i ting 'dzin yod// yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa la // nges pa'i don dbang thos par bya'o// 'byung ba bzhi las spyad pa'i yul
235b5(rnying rgyud): tshul bzhi dag dang ldan pa 'am// yang na mtshan bzangs sum cu ni// lu/ sa la rdzogs par yod pa la// zla gsang dkar dmar rlung / dkar lci// de bzhin sring mo rnal 'byor ma// btsal nas bsgrub pa chen
235b6(rnying rgyud): po bya'o// 'o ma spos chus mgo lus bkru// dkyil 'khor nang du gzhag par bya// 'dzag pa'i dus su sbyar ba yi// khrag chen po ni sems dang bcas// ra sa ya na'i gtso bor bya'o// bdud rtsi dam pa'i snod bstan pa// kun byed
235b7(rnying rgyud): thams cad za ba yin// slob ma dpa' brtul gtsang sbra can// skyon drug rnam par spangs pa yi// mi phyed pa ni dgu dang ldan// dam tshig thams cad ma nyams shing // srog lus bu dang chung ma dang // rin chen sna tshogs
235b8(rnying rgyud): 'bul byed pa// sring mo shin tu brgyan pa yang // slob dpon bla ma de la dbul// de ltar 'bul ba'i slob ma'i mchog/ yung yang pan rtsa yan chad kyis// rab tu 'bru ni gdams pas bya'o// thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa 'di// 
236a1(rnying rgyud): rang byung nga yis bstan pa'i phyir// re ba med pas blang bar bya// ma dag pa ni mtshams gcad do// las kyi gtsor ni bskang ba dang // sbrang dang mtshams dang gsal bar bya'o// nyi zla pad+ma yang dag gnas// 
236a2(rnying rgyud): bdag nyid dpa' bo 'bru lnga yis// gnas lnga dag tu bsam par bya'o// dngos grub rab 'bring tha ma gsum// ma thob par du mi gtang zhing // gtang na bar tshad chen por 'gyur// gsang sngags bdud rtsi yon tan 'di// sad pa'i
236a3(rnying rgyud): phyir yang bsgrub dgos na// mkhas pas bden pa'i don shes nas// don la the tshom ci ste za// zhes the tsom bcad la// dngos grub blang ba'i sngags 'di'o// a ho su ka d+ha ra ma ka ya ni// a mr-i ta si ti hri zhes dngos grub blang ngo po/ 
236a4(rnying rgyud): gnas lnga dag tu bsam pa yang // spyi gtsug dbus su blang ba ste// der ni oM dkar 'od ldan pa// 'od zer lnga ni 'phros pa las// slar 'dus snang mdzad gtso bo ste// rtag pa'i phyag rgya bcings pa'o// lce la hri dmar/ 
236a5(rnying rgyud): 'od 'phros pas// slar 'dus mtha' yas chos kyi gsung // mnyam pa'i/ phyag rgyar gnas pa'o// snying dkar yi ge hUM mthing ka/ 'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba'o// slar 'dus mi 'khrugs sems pa ste// phyag ni
236a6(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dril bu bsnams// yang na bdud 'dul sa gnon no// lte bar yi ge swa ser po// 'od zer lnga ni 'phro ba las// slar 'dus rin chen dam pa'i gtso// phyag rgya yid bzhin sbyin pa'o// gsang bar yi ga ha ljang ku// 'od zer sna
236a7(rnying rgyud): lnga 'bros pa las// slar 'dus don yod grub pa ste// zhi ba'i phyag rgyar mnyam rdzogs pa'o// rigs lnga gtogs pa 'di kun yang // rang 'byung gi ni dkyil 'khor yin// de ltar 'od zer lnga lnga yis// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i 'phro 'du lwa/ 
236a8(rnying rgyud): khams gsum 'gro ba'i don byas nas/ slar 'dus sman lnga nyid la bsdu/ sman nying phyag rgyar gsal 'bar nas// 'od zer snga lnga spar 'dus nas/ phyag mtshan so sor gsal 'gyur te// gser gyi 'khor lo bur brgyad las/ dri drin du
236b1(rnying rgyud): zhu ba'o/ tshulas rje rtse ldag/ 'bar nas byang chub sems su nu// swa las rin chen 'od 'bar ste// ma mangs bdud phyir nu'o// dri las 'od zer sna tshogs pa'o// padA rag 'thig le nu'o//  ldang 'od 'gro sa tshogs pas// ngag
236b2(rnying rgyud): dri chu bdud rtsir zhu'o// de ltar 'phro 'du bya ba yang // goms pas yang nas yang du bya'o// de nas bdud rtsi rnam lnga la// sam pa'i yi ge dam pa lnga// oM hUM swA hri a/ rtsa ba'i yi ge lnga po yang // 'od zer 'phro ba snga ma bzhin// de nas
236b3(rnying rgyud): 'jab bsgom bzlas pa'i sngags// dgu pa 'di ni 'dzab tu drang // oM badz+ra tsi ta sa ya hUM hUM Ta// de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni// lag pa g.yon pa'i dpung pa brgyad// mthe bong srin lag mthil du dgug// rdo rje mtshon gang bcas pa dang / 
236b4(rnying rgyud): mo gung mo mthe'u chung brkyang // sbyar te lag pa'i mthil gyis ni// bdud rtsi snodadagyi steng du mnan// de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab// ting 'dzi/ dan me dang 'dra ba las// bzlas brjod rlung dang 'dra ba yis// glal dang lung ba
236b5(rnying rgyud): bar ma gcad// de nas bdud rtsi byin gyis brlab// badz+ra a mr-i ta oM A hU hri thA/ 'di ni rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor lnga'o// dzaHhUM baM hoHma yA sa m+l-i ta a be sha ho zhes bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi rgyal bas bka' stsal to// 
236b6(rnying rgyud): bdud rtsi dam pa mchog gi lung las// 'bras bu chen po lnga bsgral ba'i lung nges pa dang / de bsgral nas de sman du sbyar ba'i thabs bstan pa'i bdud rtsi chen po sa ma ya 'bum sde las// / bam po chen po drug go/ 
236b7(rnying rgyud): rgya gar skad du/ a mr-i ta ka la sha sid+d+hi/ bod skad du/ bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung // dpal bdud rtsi bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// phyan byed mgon la phyag 'tshal nas// bsgrub pa'i yul dang gnas bstan te// shar lho nub byang phyog
236b8(rnying rgyud): bzhi'i ri// drang srong chen po'i bsgrub lugs dang // 'phra med ma'i sbyar lugs dang // rtsi sman 'khrungs pa'i yul khams dang // shing dang nags kyi lha mo'i gnas// ri bor sman ljongs tsan dan gnas// bzhugs pa'i gnasu bsgrub par bya'o// 
237a1(rnying rgyud): / dug rnams bdud rtsi sbyar ba'i thabs// rtsa ba dang ni yan lag bcas// ras yan la sogs rdzas// tshang bar bsogs nas bsgrub par bya'o// ri bor nags 'dab chu ngog sam// drag phug stong pa thibs po 'am/ 
237a2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog der bya'o// sa gzhi rab tu brtag par bya// mnyam zhing snum pa'i sa snag can// zug rdo srin brag med pa dang // tsha rgos sa dang ba tsha med// ma grum ma gas mnyam po la// bsgrub pa'i gnas mchog der/ 
237a3(rnying rgyud): bya'o// rang 'byung khro bo chen po bcus// phyogs mtshams phur pa btab nas ni// gnas deng sa gzhi dag par sbyad // oM badz+ra kI la ya ma hA kro d+ha hUM hUM phaT phaT/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ ha na ha na hUM phaT/ da ha da ha hUM phaT/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM
237a4(rnying rgyud): phaT/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ hu lu hu lu hUM phaT/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ tshin+d+ra tshin+d+ra hUM phaT/ b+hin+d+ha b+hin+d+ha hUM phaT/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya hUM phaT/ phyogs bcu dag tu mtshams bcad de// sa gzhi rab tu sbyangs nas/ 
237a5(rnying rgyud): ni// dkyil 'khor 'dom gang gru bzhi bya// dri sna lnga dang rag ta yis// byugs pa'i maN Da la bzang du bya'o// ba su ta yi rgyu phre nga gis// thig ni bcu drug char yang gdab// de la thig le bcu drug gam// yang
237a6(rnying rgyud): na phyag mtshan bcu drug dgod// de'i dbus su bzhag pa'i snod ni// thod pa ma gas ma chag pa// yang na rus sbal mgo yang rung // dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su bzhag/ bdud rtsi sna grangs brgya rtsa brgyad// btags
237a7(rnying rgyud): te thod pa'i nang du dgang // 'khor lo lte ba'i dbus su bzhag/ phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad rnams su yang // snod ni bzhi 'am brgyad bzhag la// rigs dang kha dog mthun pa'i dar// ban da lnga yi kha nas
237a8(rnying rgyud): dga'/ yang na bum pa'i 'gul chings bya'o// ra sa yan la sogs rdzas// ji snyed 'byor pas ma lus kun// dkyil 'khor de la bskor te bzhag/ de bzhin dang dkar mthing yol gyis// dkyil 'khor
237b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor bar rab bskor nas// dkyil 'khor grwa bzhi mda' bzhi gzugs// me long bzhi dang rang na bzhi// ral gri bzhi dang phur pa brgyad// dkyil 'khor 'khor bar bskor te bzhag/ ting 'dzin rnam gsum rigs
237b2(rnying rgyud): bzhin bsgom// rgyu yi ting 'dzin 'bras bu las// de nyid byang chub semasu 'gyur// 'byung lnga yum gyi dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems las rims bzhin bskyed// ra ya kha su bruM/ nam
237b3(rnying rgyud): mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// gzhal yas gsal bar 'gyur bar bsgom// dbus su byang chub sems chen po// shar du rdo rje dri chen tshe// lho ru mangs sha sna tshogs// nub tu pad+ma rag ta'i tshegs// byang du
237b4(rnying rgyud): dri chu sna tshogs ste// 'di rnams rims bzhin bkod pa la// gtsudangos sbyor ba tshul bzhin bgyis nas// me long yu ba can gyi steng du/ byang chub kyi sems blangs te/ dbus kyi snod blangs
237b5(rnying rgyud): lar kha shar phyogs su bltas ste/ byang chub sems kyis g.ya bcing / dbyangs 'di brjod do// byang chub sems de'i ye shes rang bzhin te// dri med rnam dag char bzhin bab pa las/ 
237b6(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba kun bskyed yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// gdod nas dag pas bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// gnyis med sbyor bas rdo rje'i rigs chen 'grub// me long ye shes de nyid yin par bshad// zhes brjod do// dbus kyi
237b7(rnying rgyud): ban da'i nang du/ shel por bzhag la/ byang chub sems thams cad dang / gdung dang go ro tsa na la sogs pa kun bsdus la blugs so// 'gu ya lag gi phyag rgya yis// de yi steng du bzhag nas ni// sgrub pa po
237b8(rnying rgyud): kun kha shar phyogs su bltas te/ byang chub kyi sems kyis g.yab cing sngags 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas so// oM a hUM badz+ra satwa hUM/ sarba e shud de/ a mr-i ta su ka ma hA yo ga hUM/ tsit+ta hUM oM a hUM/ a ge sho bya te/ 
238a1(rnying rgyud): shar ti sa ma ya s+thAm zhes brjod nas/ dbus su blugs la bzhag go// lho phyogs su kha bltas te/ ma hA mang sa'i snod blangs la 'di skad brjod do// sems can rnams ni gnas la chags// no/ 
238a2(rnying rgyud): pas bdag nyid gtsang mar 'dzin// don gyis sun ni ma phyung na// bsod nams thams cad dang bral ba'i// yi dgas skam thag chad pa yang // bdag lus gtong bar mi phod na// lha la sogs pa'i bsod nams
238a3(rnying rgyud): kyis// lus can rnams la smos ci dgos// de bas 'di kun sun dbyung zhing // rang 'byung bdud rtsi bstan pa'i phyir// lhas kyang lha yi bdag nyid bza'// mi la sogs pa de bzhin du// rnal 'byor pas kyang spyad
238a4(rnying rgyud): cing brda'// 'di ltar bdag gzhan mi 'byed pas// blang dor med pa dgrol ba yis// mnyam pa nyid kyi don mthong na// thams cad mnyam nyid ye shes sku// bde gshegs rin chen rigs mchog 'grus
238a5(rnying rgyud): oM AHhUM ma hA mangs/ sa ma ya ra ho ha ma/ rang na ra ti sa ma ya stan/ zhes brjod de/ rin po che'i rigs yab yum spyan drang zhing brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de/ ma hA mangs dang / sha sna tshogs bstabs
238a6(rnying rgyud): shing lhor bzhag go// kha nub phyog su bltas ste/ rag ta sna tshogs kyi snod blangs la/ 'di skad brjod do// rag rag ta pad+ma 'byung // smad pa mi gtsang rdzas 'di dag/ chags yul bde ba'i gnas te// pad+ma rigs kyi
238a7(rnying rgyud): dam tshig 'grub// so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes yin// zhes brjod cing / nub phyogs kyi snod kyi nang du thugs la bzhag/ oM AHhu ma hA bang+gA rag ta bul/ a mi thi ba ragar ti/ sa ma ya nu su ka hr-i zhes
238a8(rnying rgyud): brjod der nub phyog su bzhag go// kha byang phyogs su bltas te/ dri chu'i snod blangs nas 'di skad brjid do// kun 'byung zag pa gur kum chu// rdo rje dri yi chu yin te// chu las ma byung gang yang med// las kyi rigs
238b1(rnying rgyud): kyi dam tshig dang / nan tan ye shes mchog kyang 'grub// oM AHhUM a mo ka si ti/ badz+ra ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wam zhes brjod de/ byang phyogs su gzhag go// shar gyi snod dang dri chen blangs te 'di skad brjod do// smad ba mi
238b2(rnying rgyud): gtsang sdigs ma 'di// rtog pa de nyid snyigs ma yin// tshe mchog 'dzin pa'i bdud rtsi ste// gdod nas dag pa'i rang bzhin pas// bde gshegs kun gyi thugs ngapa nyid// gnyis med sku ru sbyor bas na// chos dbyi
238b3(rnying rgyud): ye shes dam tshig 'grub// oM bai ro tsan mo ha ra ti sa ma ya s+t+wam/ ma ha yo ga a ti s+phar na ba lin te/ a mr-i thA u tsi tha a ti tista oM zhes brjod do// de nas sgrub pa po kun gyis thal me sbyar te/ dbus kyi snod
238b4(rnying rgyud): yum gyis blangs te 'di skad brjod do// ye shes snying po can rnams kyi/ sangs rgyas kun gyi chos nyid 'di// snying po chos kyi don la su 'byung // byang chub spyod pa'i gnas 'di yin// smad par bya ba'i rdzas/ 
238b5(rnying rgyud): lnga po gcig la yon tan lnga lnga'am// gcig la'ang yon tan gsu ma du dbye// dam tshig rtsa ba bco lnga yin// yan la/ gnyi shu rtsa brgyad do// snod bcud dbus su 'dus nas ni// bcu drug
238b6(rnying rgyud): por yang bstan par bya'o// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa las// sems dpa' sems ma'i tshigs su blta'o// rtsa ba brgyad dang yan lag brgyad // rdzas ni sems dpa' bcu drug ste// snod dbyings sems
238b7(rnying rgyud): ma bcu drug yin// 'khor lo rtsibs ni bcu drug kyang // rang bzhin mi gnyis dbyings cig pas// phyag rgya thig le ldan par bsgom// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan ldan pa// dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus
238b8(rnying rgyud): brgyan rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs// rgyu yang gsang la 'bras bu'ang gsang // rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la// mdzod ldan dpal gyi phyag rgya dang // kha 'byed rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni// 'khor
239a1(rnying rgyud): lo rtsibs kyi dbus su bzhag/ bdud rtsi lnga dang rtsa ba brgyad// mig dang rna ba sna dang lde// mtshan dang rnam shes yul dang bcas// 'dus lam byas rdo rje ste// dgongs pa 'dus pas
239a2(rnying rgyud): rdorje bshad// rdo rje sems dpar rab sbyar nas// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur// oM AHhUM sarba pan tsa a mr-i ti badz+ra swa ta hU zhes brjod de/ bdud rtsi rnam lnga byin gyis brlab cing bskul lo// de nas yang rtsa
239a3(rnying rgyud): babargyad dang yan lag stong du 'dus shing sbyar ba dang / bskul ba'i tshig 'di brjod do// de nas yang snod stong par dgun chang dang / sbrang chang dang / rgya chang dang / bu ram chang dang / 'bras chang dang / 
239a4(rnying rgyud): chang sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod do// 'bru rnams la ya dang chang med de// chu la chang gi rang bzhin med// mkhas pa ngas 'bru dang chur sbyar na// mnyam pa nyid kyi chang du 'gyur// chang byin
239a5(rnying rgyud): gyis brlab pa'i sngags/ oM a mr-i tha dza gad pra ba sA hA/ oM dza~Md swA hA/ sman chad du blugs la/ skrag pa'i sngags/ mu sa la mu sa la/ ro mchog go 'phang thob par 'gyur// mi gtsang ba la'ang / 
239a6(rnying rgyud): gtsang ba med// man ngag can gyi grub pa pos// mkhas pas gnyis med sbyar bas na// mnyam pa nyid kyi don thob 'gyur// kro ti shwa ri sho ta ya sang shod ta ya/ yang 'o ma sna tshogs sbreng zhing 'di skad brjod/ 
239a7(rnying rgyud): rta dang mi la sogs pa yi// ji ltar 'o mar gyur pa las// mkhas ldan chen pos rab sbyar na// yon tan zho dang mar ltar snang // de bzhin rdzas rnams bsgyur bas na// mnyam nyid yon tan mar ltar 'grub zhes
239a8(rnying rgyud): brjod de/ byang chub sems kyi gnod du sgreng ngo // de nas rin po che sna tshogs bdar zhing 'di skad brjod do// dper na gser dang rin chen ltar// gcig tu bsres dang so sor gnas// so sor gnas kyang rang rang gi/ kha dog
239b1(rnying rgyud): mtshan nyid so sor gsal// rin chen yon tan de 'dra yang // bsdus nas yon tan rmad du 'gyur// de bas gnyis spras mdzes par snang // de bzhin rdzas kyi yon tan yang // rang gi yon tan rin chen snang // gnyi
239b2(rnying rgyud): med mnyam par sbyar bas na// bla med yon tan rmad du 'gyur// thams cad gcig tu bsdu ba'o// de nas bdud rtsi ra sa ya na sna tshogs bsdus te/ snod stong par chu sna tshogs sbreng zhing / 'di brjod do// chu rnams sna tshogs
239b3(rnying rgyud): tha dad pa// rgya mtshor phyin na lan tshwa'i ro// de dag thams cad bsdus pa'i dpal// rgya mtsho tsam du rlabs che la// chos kyi dbyingasu ro gcig go/ 'byung ba lnga yi thugs rje las// sman dang bdud rtsi rnam lnga po/ 2
239b4(rnying rgyud): ba yongs kyi gsos mdzad pa// thugs rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'o// dngos po med las dngos grub blang // byang chub sems kyi sprin yi/ ngan pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/ de skad ces brjod
239b5(rnying rgyud): de sman lag tu blangs nas/ ngos ngos nas sman che ba'i yon tan brjod/ do// rang 'byung gdod nas dag pa yi// rtsa brgyad stong las sgra/ ra ba'i sman// ra sa ya na la sogs rdzas// rtsa ba 'bum phrag yangs pa'i
239b6(rnying rgyud): bcud gnyis med bde chen las 'byung ba'i// byang chub sems ni rdo rje ste// sha chen mchod pa rin po che// zas mchog tshe'i dri chen po// pad+ma me tog yang dag ldan// rdo rje chu ste bdud rtsi mchog/ ga bur shel gyi spos por bri/ rin
239b7(rnying rgyud): / chen me ltar 'bar ba'i tshogs// yon tan 'bum phrag yangs pa'i bcud// rigs lnga dam tshig lnga yi dngos// ye shes lnga rdzogs grub pa'i rdzas// rgyud lnga semaHna kun sgrol ba'i// dug lnga sel ba'i thabs mchog ste// thams
239b8(rnying rgyud): cad rnal 'byor bdud rtsi che// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ste// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor phyir// gcig tu dpa' bo ro rnams dang // gnyis su med par mnyam sbyar nas// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 
240a1(rnying rgyud): rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la mchod zhes brjod de/ de nas shes rab yum rnams kyis// sman lag tu gzhag la yang / bkra shis pangon la dam pa'i di brjod do// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos// nam pa
240a2(rnying rgyud): dang ni mnyam pa'i gnas// rnam par mi rtog snang ba las// kun rdzob tsam du bstan pa mtshar zhes brjod do// sman snod bcud chas par lag tu blangs la// yum gyi gtso bo la bdud rtsi phul te/ gtso bos blangs te phyag rgya chen/ 
240a3(rnying rgyud): bor bsgyur zhing bsgom mo// de nas bsgrub pa po'i gtso bos dpal chas su zhugs te/ ba yang nyo ba ti dang / ba yang shang gir dang / na ra sir dang / thal chen gyi thig les brgyan te/ sro tsha an dza na dang / dgug cing
240a4(rnying rgyud): g.yab pa'i dam rdzas/ mchog gi hasta dang / brta sha ril dang / shun chen gyi 'breng ba 'dre brdab pa'i lcag dang / rkang gi gling bu bud cing ku sha'i glu blang / mchog gi tshar ma dang / shun chen gyi g.yang
240a5(rnying rgyud): bzhi bting la/ gu gul gi 'go ma yeng gis bskus la/ rag ta/ 'i thig le dgu byas ste/ mtshon re re'i steng du ta krid brgyad ga/ zhag go// bye kra tshar ma'i g.yang bzhi ta gis gyon la/ mdung la ba dan phyar
240a6(rnying rgyud): nas thogs te/ dkyil 'khor yang 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad/ dbus su zla gam dmar po gcig bris nas/ de'i steng du sman spungs la/ bsgrub pa po yab yum yang sbyor ba tshul bzhin du bgyi/ lha mo bcu drug gi bsnyen pa
240a7(rnying rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad yan chad gdon no// de nas byin dbab cing / dbab pa'i phyag rgya yang bya'o// g.yab mo'i brda la sogs te/ brda sna tshogs dang / thabs kyi rdo rje badz+ra sha ri rim la sogs pa dang / yang na mchog gi lag
240a8(rnying rgyud): ba g.yon gyis/ sman dgug cing g.yab cing / mkhar gzhong gi nang du bsres te btsags la/ sman pa na da'i nang du blugs la/ rdo rjes dkrug cing glu dang gar dang rnga dang / dam pa'i tshig gis bstod do// 
240b1(rnying rgyud): smos kyis bdug cing gar gyi bro thags dang / rdo rje 'gros kyi dkyil 'khor du/ bdud rtsi dbus su bzhag la bskor ro// de nas ngos ngos nas kyang che ba'i yon tan brjod do// yang zhi ba'i lha'i dkyil 'khor yang / 
240b2(rnying rgyud): rigs so ma'i yig 'bru kun sman la gtim zhing 'di brjod do// oM a mr-i ta sa rba ma hA mo ga hUM/ oM badza sa rba ma ya hU~M/ oM ma hA sa rba a mr-i ta ma hA suka hriM/ oM sarba e shud de/ kro ti sha ri/ sarba shod ya/ oM
240b3(rnying rgyud): hUM badz+ra a mr-i ta hU hri tha zhes rab tu yang bzlas so// de nas hom dang sbyin sreg dang / me'i bud kyang nang du blugs so// de nas sems sbyang ba'i sman/ leng leng ha dang / shel ga bur dang / snying zho sha dang / 
240b4(rnying rgyud): kha zho sha dang / skra gor zho sha dang / shu dag ku be ra dang / shu de dag bra me dang / shu dag nab se dang / ra sa ya na dang / ra sa ya na tan dz+nya ya dang / khrus mkhan ut+pal li'i thig les rgyan la/ 
240b5(rnying rgyud): gdod sman bsre zhing sbyar nas/ dgugs la ban dar stsal te/ ban da gnyis kha sbyar la/ dar gyis bcings la mtsham su rgyas btab la gzod dkyil 'khor zla gam gyi dbus bzhag go/ sngags
240b6(rnying rgyud): dgu pa 'dzab du drang ngo // 'di mgo 'jug tu tshogs kyi mchod pa bar mi gcad/ mdzad pa bcu gnyis kyi 'phro 'du yang bya/ sman bsgrub pa'i don dang sbar thabs bstan pa'i lung dang / las kyi rim pa'i skul tshig dang / 
240b7(rnying rgyud): yo byad du byas pa'i rnams bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung las/ bdud rtsi bum pa'i lung gi bam po bdud rtsi 'bum sde las 'byung ba'i don// / bam po chen po bdun pa'o// 
240b8(rnying rgyud): rgya gang skad du/ b+hag ba na sany+dzu shrI tig sna nam si dam/ bod skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal rnon po la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal nyid sku rdo rje lta bu byang chub kyi dgongs pa nyid la
241a1(rnying rgyud): bzhugs pa la/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems rdo rje kun tu bzang po ni/ dus gsum 'du 'bral med pa'i// yum gyi tshal chen po na dgongs pa chos kyi dbyings zhi ba chen po la bzhugs so// 
241a2(rnying rgyud): rigs lnga bde bar gshegs pa rnams kyang / gsang ba'i yum bzhi dang / 'khor byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang / sems ma'i tshogs dang / rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor na// sras mchog dam pa nye ba'i 'khor
241a3(rnying rgyud): rigs kyi rgyal po ma lus pa rnams dang / tshangs pa chen po rnams dang / drang srong chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / li tsa byi la sogs pa'i mi rnams kun la dpal kun tu bzang po'i bka' stsal pa/ nan tan gyis
241a4(rnying rgyud): ni brtson 'grus bskyed// the tshom med na nges par 'grub// bdud rtsi chen po rnam lnga 'di// spyad cing bcangs pa'i yon tan dang / darang bzhin dang ni ngo bo dang // mthu dang byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub
241a5(rnying rgyud): ma brjed rgyun gyi ting nge 'dzin// nges par bsgrubs pa'i yon tan ni// nges pa'i man ngag gsum du bstan// zhes bka' stsal na sa/ sdud pa po chos kyi don/ 'jam dpal rnon po la gtad do// de nas
241a6(rnying rgyud): 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'khor tshogs rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams la 'di skad brjod do// e ma ho sangs rgyas kun tu bzang // gsang chen thig le nyid la rdzogs// ma rig mun sel
241a7(rnying rgyud): ye shes sgron// dpa' bo khyod la skyabasu mchi'o// rang 'byung dri med bdud rtsi 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags pa'i mchog/ mi shes dri ma kun bcom nas// nges pa'i dbyings la mgod mdzad pa// gnyis med gus pa
241a8(rnying rgyud): phyag 'tshal lo// snang mdzad rdo rje rgyal can dang // mi bskyod nyi ma snang mtha' yas// don yod bdud rtsi 'khyil ba la// dgyes shing gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// dbyings phyug yum gyi tshogs rnams la// dga' ba'i yid kyis
241b1(rnying rgyud): 'dud phyag 'chal/ lag na rdo rje rgyal po dang // kun bzang blo gros chen po dang // don rabs snying la sogs la// rab tu gus pas phyag 'tsha lo// nam pa'i 'jig rten dbang po dang // 'gro ba 'dzin mchog dpa
241b2(rnying rgyud): ba la gnyis med gus pas phyag 'tshal lo// dag la rang bzhin dri med sku// tshul bzhin phreng ba dbyangs dang gar// spyod mchog dga' sdug phyag 'tshal lo// bdug pa me tog mar me ho// gzugs
241b3(rnying rgyud): mchog mnyes mdzad lha mo la// mos pas 'dud cing phyag 'tshal lo// rigs byed tshigs kyi bdag po mchog/ rdo rje srin po 'dul mdzad pa// khro rgyal yab yum 'khor bcas la// gus pas bstod de phyag 'tshal lo// 
241b4(rnying rgyud): de nas 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang bcas pa rnams kyis leg so legs so// a la la ho zhes brjod nas gnang ngo // de nas dbang byin te/ da'aphags pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyod kyis/ 
241b5(rnying rgyud): thams cad bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin la// mkhyen rabs dang spos kyi mtsha da pa chen po mdzad do// de yang nyid kyis nyid la mchod de/ 'di man chad ye shes kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi
241b6(rnying rgyud): sems bdud rtsi chen por thim nas/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings la mi snang bar byas nas/ ma hA su ka la sbas te bzhugs pa las/ de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po dang / rigs lnga bde bar gshegs
241b7(rnying rgyud): pa rnams kyis 'phags pa 'jam dpal la bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' mkhyen rabs kyi dang po khyod la da nged kyi chos 'di bsdus te bshad do// 'jam dpal rdo rje chos 'di lta ste/ e ma hogs
241b8(rnying rgyud): ba las byung ba'i// ma rig mun sel sgron me'i mchog/ dpa' bo khyod la skyabasu mchi'o// nan tan gyis ni brtson 'grus byos// zhes pa dang / 'jam dpal bdud rtsi 'di'i chos kyi don ni/ dper na me dang
242a1(rnying rgyud): 'dra ste/ chung ste rdul tsam nas che ste srid pa'i ri bo yang sreg go// de bzhin du bdud rtsi 'di ni dper na nyi ma dang 'dra ste/ nyi ma'i 'od zer chen po ni 'dzam bu gling du thog ma nyid du/ 
242a2(rnying rgyud): ri rgyal po chen po brgyad la snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu kho ra khor yug tu snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu ri bo che rnams la snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu ri nag po rnams la snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu gangs na
242a3(rnying rgyud): mthon po rnams la snang bar byed do// de'i 'og tu 'dzam bu gling 'dir sa phyogs dma' ba rnams la snang bar byed do// nyi ma'i 'od zer chen po de la/ blang dor med de mi rtog mi sems so// rnam par yang mi rtog
242a4(rnying rgyud): mi sems so// rdo rje chos dang 'jam dpal nyi ma'i 'od rnams ni/ rang bri bskol med do// de bzhin du sems can gyi rnam par shes pa la yang / de dang 'dra ste dbri bskol med do// phye ba dang bskyed
242a5(rnying rgyud): ba dang / bskyangs pa yang med do// de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi 'di yang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyingasu bstan pa yin pa'i phyi/ ra/ bdud rtsi chen po 'di dbu las bsam gyis mi khyab pa bstan zhes
242a6(rnying rgyud): smos pa yin no// de bzhin du chos 'dud rtsi chen po'i lung 'di yang ma skyes mi 'gag mi rtog pas/ mtshan ma dang mtshan ma med pa dang / mi gnas pa la rnam par khyab ste gnas so// de bzhin du chos bdud rtsi
242a7(rnying rgyud): chen po 'di yang nyi ma'i 'od zer dang 'dra bar kun la khyab par gnas te/ skal ldan rigs lngas 'byung ba lnga la khyab cing / 'byung ba lnga nyid rigs kyi yum lnga'i tshal chen po ste/ yum lnga dang yab lnga yang gdod
242a8(rnying rgyud): nas ngag ste/ nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du shar ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams la khyab bo// de nas srid pa'i
242b1(rnying rgyud): 'jig rten du mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i lha rnams dang klu rnams la khyab bo// de nas mi'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang rims pas namakha'i nyi ma bzhin khyab cing shar ba ste/ thugs rje'i bdud rtsi 'di yang srid pa/ 
242b2(rnying rgyud): gsum du nyi ma bzhin du shar bar bya ste/ 'jam dpal stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing phra rab snyed la/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lus phul bas ni/ bdud rtsi chen po
242b3(rnying rgyud): 'di lus la bcangs pa bsod nams che'o// 'jam dpal dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba bas ni/ bdud rtsi 'di lus kyi 'gul du btags pa 'bum gyi char yang mi phod do// 'jam dpal/ 
242b4(rnying rgyud): bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas rnams la spyi bos bkur zhing phyag bya ba'i don ni/ bdud rtsi chen po 'di spyi bo la bkur ba'i yon tan ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad bkur ba yin no// 
242b5(rnying rgyud): 'jam dpal bskal pa stong gi bar du sems can gyi don bya ba bas ni/ bdud rtsi chen po 'dis lan cig gis 'gro ba'i don bya/ sa pas/ dmyal khams brgyad kyi 'jig rten yang thar pa'i lam du
242b6(rnying rgyud): 'dren pa yin no zhes gsungs pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi tshig su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bdud rtsi chen po'i rang bzhin no// kha dog dbyings dang mtshan ma med// 'gog pa med cing dbye ba'ang
242b7(rnying rgyud): med rtsa ba med cing rten pa'ang med// bdud rtsi che la brjod pa'ang med// nyon mongs dug dang bdud bzhi bcom// dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems// nges don de la sdud par byos// de nas bcom ldan
242b8(rnying rgyud): 'das dang dam pa'i chos bdud rtsi'i lung 'di la 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis slar la lan gsum du bstod pa/ na mkha'i mtshan nyid sangs rgyas te// mtshan nyid med pas na mkha' 'dra'o// bya ba med pas grol ba
243a1(rnying rgyud): ste/ bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// chu zla bzhin du dri bral bas// thams cad rtog pa yongasu spangs// bdag tu 'dzin med rnam par dag/ bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshalo// 
243a2(rnying rgyud): dus gsum chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam// bdud dang ngan song gsum las thar// len pa med cing gtong ba'ang med// dri med dag pa'i byang chub sems// bdud rtsi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dus
243a3(rnying rgyud): gsum sangs rgyas skyed pa'i rgyu// khams gsum sems can 'dren pa'i dpal// 'gro ba drug gi sgrib sbyong ba// bdud rtsi rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces gsol nas phyi nang gi snod bcud ril sman ras
243a4(rnying rgyud): ya dang bdud rtsir gnas so zhes lung dang man ngag du bsdus tre bka' stsal pa'o// bdud rtsi chen po mchog gi lung / lung gi rgyal po chen po rtog pa'i mchog las/ 'khor lo bskor ba'i
243a5(rnying rgyud): nang nas lung gi bam po chen po brgyad pa'i 'grel pa chen po'o// don/ bam po chen po brgyad pa rdzogs so// / spyir bdud rtsi 'bum sde las nyung gas tsam cig/ 
243a6(rnying rgyud): bi ma la mi tras bshad cing / lots+tsha badz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur ba'o// rdo rje yang dbang gter gyi lagra rdzogs so// rdo rje khros pas zhe sdang gcod// mtshon chen sngon po 'bar ba'i ngang // namakha'i dkyil nas
243a7(rnying rgyud): thigs pashar// srog gi sgo ru shar ba dang // snying gi sgo ru bsgom par bya// snying rjes bsgral ba'i dam tshig ni// gsad cing gnan pa ma yin te// phung po rdo rje gtam byas nas// rnam par shes pa rdo rjer
243a8(rnying rgyud): bsgos/ oM badz+rag mi ges ya/ barbab sten bcu tshul/ rdo rje gnon nu ga 'dzin rnams// sring brji grub mdzod cig/ drid pa rdo rje ngur pa'iste// leshes khro ba nub par mdzod/ sas
243b1(rnying rgyud): rgyas kun gyi ye shes sku// nga nyid rdo rje chos dbyings las// 'bar ba'i khro bo mi bzad pa// sku yi dbyig tu bdag gyur cig/ thabs kyi spyod pas 'gro don du// byams dang snying rjes gang 'dul ba// sangs rgyas
243b2(rnying rgyud): phrin las rdzogs mdzad nas// dbang dang byin brlabs 'dir gsol cig/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha hU ka ra hUM/ gardza gardza hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po hUM ka ra dang / yum rdo rje sgra 'byin ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma/ phag
243b3(rnying rgyud): gi mgo can dang / sdigs bu'i mgo can no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha bi dza ya hUM/ ha na ha na hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal ba dang / yum rdo rje rnam snyengs ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma/ rtag gi mgo can dang / bya rgod/ 
243b4(rnying rgyud): kyi mgo can no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ni la dat+ta hUM/ dahad ha hU phaT/ khro ba chen po dbyug pa sngon po dang / yum rdo rje sder mo/ sU dal pa'i phra men ma/ g.yag gi mgo can dang / bya rog gi mgo can no// 
243b5(rnying rgyud): oM ladz+ra kro d+ha ya man tag hU~M/ patsa pa tsa nu phaT/ khri na po gshin rje gshed po dang / yum rdo rje dur khrid kyi 'di ga mo/ sprul pa'i phra me na ma/ sha ba'i migacan dang / drug pa'i maH
243b6(rnying rgyud): canan/ oM 'adz+ra kro d+ha A r+ya sa tsal hUM/ ban+d+ha baN+Da su la/ khro ba chen po migs mgon po dang / yum rdo rje gtum du ma/ sprul pa'i phra mnas/ gcig gi mgo can dang // khwa'i mgotshan no// mi rdza
243b7(rnying rgyud): drugam grib hU/ hu lu su lu hUM/ khri ba chen po rta 'gron dang / yum rdo rje gtum mo/ sprul pa'i phra men ma/ byi la'i mgo can dang / bu shud kyi mgo can no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a par nIHhUM/ ShiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha dru
243b8(rnying rgyud): khro bo chen po dpal ldan gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang / yum rdo rje mda' snyems ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma/ sbyang gi'i mgo can dang / khwa'i mgo can no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a mr-i ta kun Da li hUM/ tshin+d+ra n+d+ra hUM phaT+Ta
244a1(rnying rgyud): khro ba chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang / yum rdo rje rlung 'byin ma/ sprul pa'i phram nam/ seng ge'i mgo can dang / pha wang gi mgo can no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha trai lo kya bi dza ma hUM/ bin+d+ha n+tu/ 
244a2(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ khro bo chen po khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba dang / yum rdo rje gsod byed ma/ sprul pa'i bre men ma/ dred kyi mgo can dang / zer mo'i mgo can no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA bA la hUM/ s+pho ta s+pho ta hU phaT/ khro bo sta
244a3(rnying rgyud): po che dang / yum rdo rje bskyod byed ma/ sprul pa'i phra men ma/ dred kyi mgo can dang / byi ba'i ma go can la sogs pa rnams kyis gtams pa'o// srid pa'i phur bu bsgrub pa dang // dbang dang dngos grub blang ba'i phyir// ye
244a4(rnying rgyud): shes khro bo gshegs su gsol// khro bo chen po gshegs nas kyang / rtags dang mtshan ma bstan pa dang // ki la ya yi dngos grub gsol// dam tshig chen po'i dus la bab// sprul pa chen po'i
244a5(rnying rgyud): dus la babang phyag brnyan chen mo'i dus la bab// shon mu hu dus la bab// bdag nyid chen mo'i dus la bab// khyed kyi tshwa na las dus la bab// sa bdag chen mo'i dus la babe// mthu rtsal
244a6(rnying rgyud): dbyung ba'i dus la bab// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed cing // dus gsum rgyal ba'i gdung 'tshe ba pa// rig 'dzin bdag cag rnams la ni// gnod cing gdug pa'i ngag dang dgegs// bdud dang bar du gcod pa rnams
244a7(rnying rgyud): khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// yud tsam gyis ni 'dir bkug nas// mngon spyod tshul bzhin bsgral ba dang // lus ngag rdul du bshig nas kyang // sdug bsngal nyam su myong bar mdzod// oM le/ hU le/ stapa
244a8(rnying rgyud): nan mo hags b+ha ga bAn/ shi kr-i ba kri/ shri badz+ra tsu ka ra hU hUM la phaT/ badz+ra ki li ki lo ya/ dza nub heHsarba bi g+hanan/ oM badz+re ki li ki la ya hU~M phaT phaT/ badz+ra zhu kar srungs hru kar sdus// dngos grub
244b1(rnying rgyud): chad byed pa'i bgegs// gdug cing sdang sems byed pa rnams// zung zhig rgyob cig rnam par chings// gtogs shig grogs dang bral bar gyis// rings par khug la slar dugacig/ khob cig rnam par gzir bar / 
244b2(rnying rgyud): ngayi dbang du myur nas kyang // bsgo ba'i bka' rnams mnyan par gyis// rtsubar 'di tAn tu phaT/ tshin+d+ra tshin+da hU phaT/ bin+d+ha n+d+ha hU phaT/ grih+Na gr-id+da hU phaT/ ha na han hU phaT/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hU phaT/ ta tha ya ta/ 
244b3(rnying rgyud): tha ya hUM phaT/ ha sa ya/ ra na ha ta na hU phaT/ shri krin a na ya hUM phaT/ dz+wa la pa ya dz+wa la ba ya hUM phaT/ a be sha ya a be sha ya hUM phaT/ bid d+ha ya bid d+ha ya hUM phaT/ bran dang po nya bka' nyin tshogs// khyed
244b4(rnying rgyud): kyi dam tshig dus la bab// sngon chad ji bzhin dam bcas pa'i// mngon spyod phrin las myur du mdzod// ha na ha na badz+ra/ da du ha badz+ra/ pa tsa pa tsa badz+ra/ mtha ma tha badz+ra/ dz+wa la dz+wa la badz+ra/ 
244b5(rnying rgyud): su ru su ru badz+ra/ mu ru mu ru badz+raH/ ka tang ka te ya/ dza ye bi dza ya ya a tsing te a pa ra tsi ta ma/ ma ra sa na pra marda na ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' las ni// sdig can gang zhig 'da' byed pa// 
244b6(rnying rgyud): stobs chen khro bo chen po yis// klad pa tshal pa brgya ru khos// nyon cig bgegs dang log 'dren tshogs// nga yi bka' las 'da' ma byed// hUM ma ma pa shi ku ru/ ma tham/ Sh+ya ka ra/ i nan dasti/ ma ma karma shri krang
244b7(rnying rgyud): ka re ya/ gdug cing sdang sems ldan pa yi// lha 'am 'on te bdud kyang rung // nga la bar chad byed pa rnams// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul med par byos// sarba a na ya hUM phaT/ tad tha ya tad tha ya hUM phaT/ brdungs
244b8(rnying rgyud): shig rdo rje 'bar ba'i gtun// bka' las 'da' byed sdig can rnams// rdo rje me dpal snying sregs nas// lus ngag rdul phran bzhin du lcogs// khro mo 'bar ba'i gtun khung du// rdo rje tho bas brdungs byas nas
245a1(rnying rgyud): sku lang du ste bskal bar bya// khajam/ kham/ tsunanu/ phaT la/ bajas pA kro ta kha ti/ kha \u0f7f/ kha \u0f7f/ 6/ 6/ dunu rbu/ phaT la la/ chos nyid kyi bden pag/ 
245a2(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags kyi byin gyi rlabs so// sangs rgyas kyi mthu'o// a bi tsar+ya'i dus la bab pa'i brnag pa de kho na la'o// ki li ki la ya nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas/ bco brgyad dkar nag gi 'tshams su'o// hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ 
245a3(rnying rgyud): tsam bzlas so// rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ DA ki ni ak+Shi dzaM badz+wa la tan tra/ bod skad du/ mkha' 'gro me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud// srid gsum 'jigs byed drag po rdo rje
245a4(rnying rgyud): sku// bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal gyur snying rje can// bdud las rnamargyal ye shes lnga dang ldan// phyag na rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal ba stod// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ ri rab
245a5(rnying rgyud): ri'i rtse mo gshin rje 'bar ba'i pho brang / gnod sbyin ut+pal yi gdong gnas pa'i dur khrod srin po mthang ka ru NA/ ka'i 'chags/ bdud gtsug pud nag po'i khang pa/ brtsub 'gyur
245a6(rnying rgyud): gyi tshal chen po/ lha dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa'i gnas/ 'byung po dge ba kha TA kha'i shing nag po ti sha ka skyes/ srin mo kang ka la zangs kyi gshog pa me ltar 'bar ba'i zhing khams mi ri sar rnying
245a7(rnying rgyud): mang po yod pa/ namakha' las ti shu la dang / 'khor lo dang lce 'bab pa/ sa gzhi las ral gri dang / spu gri dang mdung rtse lnga pa skyes pa/ ri bo thams cad keng rus su snang ba/ chu klung thams cad
245a8(rnying rgyud): rnag khrag tu 'bab pa/ sa phyogs thams cad ni mi ro ut+pal sngon po yi dri mnam pa/ nye 'khor na/ rngam pa dang / ngu ba'i nga ro rab tu 'jigs pa drag ste/ shin tu 'jigs pa rab tu skye g.ya' ba'i gnas de na/ 
245b1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dpal 'jigs byed kyi rgyal po/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi bdag po// babs dang shes rab kyi dbang phyug/ sku dang ye shes kyi rang bzhin/ drag po chen po dpal phyag na rdo rje/ hrI
245b2(rnying rgyud): chen po gtum zhing khro ba/ lus bskal ba'i me chen po ltar 'bar ba/ srid pa gsum dang bdud bzhi dang / nyon mongs pa brgyad khri dang / sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis las rab tu rgyal ba/ sangs rgyas
245b3(rnying rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad kyi thugs yang dag pa'i ye shes las grub pa/ lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis mchod cing phyag byas pa/ nyi ma stong gi gzi dang ldan pa/ dbu skra kham pa gyen la rjes pa/ spyan sdang mig me ltar 'bar ba/ 
245b4(rnying rgyud): shangs kyi rlung sgrom nas bskal pa'i rlung 'byung ba zhal gyi mabardo rje zla tshes su gtsigs pa/ rin po che mar nad da'i dang rgyan pa/ rigs lnga'i rgyal ba mi bskyod pa bzhugs pa/ thod pa
245b5(rnying rgyud): skam rlon gyi dbu rgyan dang mgur chu can mchog dang glang gi ko bas brgyan pa/ lag na ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'dzin pa/ klu'i rgyal po gzi can gyis thod du bcings pa/ klu tag sha kas/ 
245b6(rnying rgyud): rked cings byas pa klu kun nas gdugs dang / sog ma med kyis gdan khri byas te/ khro bo chen po'i cha byang du byas nas bzhugs so// de'i 'khor ni tshangs pa dang / 'jug sred dang / brgya byin dang / ma hA/ 
245b7(rnying rgyud): ka li dang / drang srong me bzhi 'jug dang / thang la gnas dang / gshin rje rtel ba nag po dang srin por man dang / chu'i lha dang / rlung gi lha dang / gnod sbyin chen po ku be ra dang / 'byung po dbang ldan dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba dang
245b8(rnying rgyud): skar ma dang / sa bdag lag chen dang / ma mo nag mo ral gcig ma dang / lto 'phye rab brtan dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / rnam thos kyi bu dang / lha ma yin dang / na mkha'
246a1(rnying rgyud): lding dang / 'byung po pho mo dang / gcan gzan gyi tshogs ni/ seng ge dang / stag dang / khwa dang / spyang ki dang / dom dang / chu srin dang / gung dang / gzig dang / lce spyang dang / srem
246a2(rnying rgyud): dang / khyi li 'du dang / 'bar ba dang / sram dang / bya'i tshogs kyang bya rgod dang / chu glag dang / dur bya kang ka dang / gzhang dang / khyung dang / bya rog dang / so bya dang / 'ug pa dang / khra dang / skyug dang / srin bya
246a3(rnying rgyud): dang shang shang ti'u dang / ne co yang yod do// gzhan yang glang po dang / sha sbrang dang / sbrul gdug pa can dang / ru sbal dang / rnga mo dang / bse dang / phag rgod dang / ba men dang / khyi skra dang / sha ba dang / gla
246a4(rnying rgyud): ba la sogs pas bskor te bzhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa de rnams kyi nang nas glang po che rab tu brtan pa gtsug na gser gyi dra bas brgyan pa/ mgo bo sum cu rtsa gsum yod pa'i steng na/ 
246a5(rnying rgyud): nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi dbus nas/ lha rnams kyi dbang po pa rgya byin zhes bya ba/ spyi bo gtsug na yid bzhi/ nor bu rin po che 'bar ba/ lus la gser dang / bai DUr+yas brgyan pa/ des 'khor
246a6(rnying rgyud): los sgyur ba'i cha byad du byas nas/ glang po che'i stan las langs te/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la skor ba lan gsum byas nas/ rgyal srid rin po che sna bdun gyis mchod pa byas so// de nas brgya byin gyis 'di skad
246a7(rnying rgyud): ces gsol to// rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang dbang po// yid bzhin nor bu rab 'dra zhing // dngos grub tshogs la mnga' brnyes khyod// snying rje bdag po yin pas na// ma 'ongs sems can skal ldan gyi
246a8(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro go 'bang mchog/ nag mo me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud// bdag ni khyod la dri bar 'tshal// dang 'dir ston pas skabs 'byed du// ces gsol ba dang / dpal su mdzad chen po des me 'bar ba'i
246b1(rnying rgyud): gdan las bzhengs te/ rdo rje rnam par bsgyings pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ brgya byin la seng ge'i lha stangs kyis gzigs nas/ glang po che 'gying bag tu gom pa gsum bor te/ rU hUM hUM gi sngags
246b2(rnying rgyud): bzlas te/ ye shes kyi phyag gis rdo rje lan gsum na mkha' la dril te/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// snying rje'i yid kyis
246b3(rnying rgyud): brgya byin nyon// skal ldan dus mtha'i sems can rnams// mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang // rdo rje mkha' 'gro me lce'i rgyud// bdag gzhan don la 'jigs med pa// ngas bshad khyod kyis zung // ces/ 
246b4(rnying rgyud): bka' stsal pa dang / brgya byin la sogs pa'i 'khor shin tu dga' ba dang / spro ba skyes nas/ la las ni me tog maN DA ra ba dang / puN DA ri ka dang / pad+ma dang / uta pa la dang / tsam pa ka dang / 
246b5(rnying rgyud): bu ram dang / bdug spos dang / mar me dang / byug pa dang / kha zas dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang / bsil yang dang / bla re dang / rgyal mtshan dang / phan la sogs pa bya'i
246b6(rnying rgyud): mchod pas mchod do// 'khor la las ni bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa nang gi mchod pas mchod do// 'khor la las lha mo dang gnod sbyin mo'i cha byad du byas nas gsang ba'i mchod pas
246b7(rnying rgyud): bul lo// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ 'di skad ces gsol to// khro chen dus mtha' me ltar 'bar// drag po hUM mdzad rdo rje 'dzin// da ltar 'dod pa'i khams 'di na/ 
246b8(rnying rgyud): lha mo nag mo zhes bya ba// gtum zhing khro la lus kyang 'jigs// srid gsum skrag pa'i nus mthu can// dngos grub dam pa'i gzhir gyur 'di// dang po glang gzhi rgyu yi rgyud// slob dpon slob ma gang gi rgyud// 
247a1(rnying rgyud): don dam kun rdzob lta ba'i rgyud// dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum gyi rgyud// thang ka lha rten sku gzugs rgyud// dpon dang g.yog ni dam rdzas rgyud// bskyed dang rdzogs ni ting 'dzin rgyud
247a2(rnying rgyud): rje dang khol gyi sngags kyi rgyud// bca' ba phyag rgya bcu gnyis rgyud// mchod pa gtor ma sbyin sreg rgyud// 'da' bar bka' ba dam tshig rgyud// grub pa'i drod tshad mtshan ma'i rgyud// spogs dang gnad la dbang
247a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i rgyud mi 'bral 'grogs pa gzungs kyi rgyud// pra dang mtshan ma dpa' ba'i rgyud// dbang bskur gnang ba sbyin pa'i rgyud// so so las kyi bye brag rgyud// mar me dang ni bdud rtsi rgyud// thig le yis/ 
247a4(rnying rgyud): mnag rgyud// lha srin sde brgyad stong pa'i rgyud// 'khor la yo// ngas su gtad pa'i rgyud// tha ma lung du bstan pa'i rgyud// dge sa 'brel nyi shu rtsa gnyis gang // ston pas bka' stsol bdag
247a5(rnying rgyud): nyan 'tshal/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ brgya byin la sogs pa khyed rnams kyis rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud chen po zhu
247a6(rnying rgyud): bzhus pa legaso legaso// khyed kyang rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig/ ngas rnam par phye ba bstan par bya'o// sngon 'dod pa'i khams 'di nyid na/ ri rab kyi rtse byang shar gyi mtshams/ shing
247a7(rnying rgyud): yongs 'dus rtol zhes bya ba/ rtse mo na bya khyung ka run gnas pa/ lo ma la 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rang 'byung ba/ 'bras bu la rin po che sna bdun lo tog ltar smin pa/ lag gi rtse g.yu'i ze ba'i bar
247a8(rnying rgyud): bar na/ lha dang lha mo dang gza' dang skar ma dang / nyi ma dang zla ba'i tshigs kyis brgyan pa/ rtsa ba'i ngos la khrus kyi rdzing bu bdun la/ re re la shing rte re re/ shing rta re rel bu mo bdun bdun/ bu mo re re
247b1(rnying rgyud): la g.yog mo bdun bdun/ g.yog mo re re la rma bya bdun bdun yod do// shing rta de'i sa phyogs na/ sman gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / lo tog gi rigs khri phrag bzhi rang skye ba can dan dang / ga pur dang / 
247b2(rnying rgyud): gor shi sha dang sbrul gyi snying po rdzing bu lnga brgyas bskor te/ de lta bu'i shing de thun mong gi bsod nams kyis bskyes so// de'i dus na 'dod pa'i shing de ni lha rnams kyis dbang byed pa'i tshe// ri rab kyi rtsa ba na
247b3(rnying rgyud): 'od mi snang ba zhes bya ba'i gnas na lha ma yin gyi rgyal po sum rtsegs dang / thag zangs ris dang / he ran na ke shun dang / rnam par snang byed dang / rab tshim dang / sgra gcan 'dzin laso/ 
247b4(rnying rgyud): pa bye ba dung phyur tsam shin tu mi sdug pa'i cha byad nas/ 8 rab tu rngam pa'i nga ro dang / 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mtshon cha thogs nas/ ri rab kyi kha chos bzangs zhes bya bar lhags so// 
247b5(rnying rgyud): de nas ri rab kyi kha la lha ba su de ba dang / lha ma hA de ba dang / brgya/ byin nyid la sogs pa/ lha bye ba dung phyur la lha ma yin rnams/ kyis 'di skad ces smras so// ri rab rtse gnas sum cu rtsa gsum
247b6(rnying rgyud): lha ga shing 'di lha dang lha min thun mong las// da lta 'dod pa yi khyed cag lha dbang na// da ni nged cag lha min bdud la blang zhes smras pa dang / lha rnams kyis slar smras pa/ dpag bsam shing la 'dod yon pas
247b7(rnying rgyud): yas kyang bsod nams dbang gis lha la yongasu grub// gzhan la yod na skams shing med par 'gyur// de bas khyed la ljon shing nged mi gter// zhes smras pa dang / slar lha la smras pa/ thun mong las grub bde
247b8(rnying rgyud): ldan ljon pa'i shing // lha yis dbang byas nged la mi gter na// 'jig rten sreg pa'i mtshon gyi char phab la// lha dang lha min g.yul chen 'gyed ces zer// ces smras te/ slar yang song nas lha ma yin gyis dmag
248a1(rnying rgyud): drangs so/ glang po ches srungs kyi mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis la/ gnod sbyin sum cu rtsa gnyis zhon ste/ dbus kyi mgo la dbang po thag zangs ris zhon ste/ glang po che'i sna la ka ma la nag
248a2(rnying rgyud): po btags te/ lha ma yin gyi dmag bye bdung phyur gyis bskor ste/ rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mtshon gyi char chen po me lce 'bar ba 'dra ba'i char 'bebs te/ dmag drangs so// de nas chos bzangs zhes bya ba'i
248a3(rnying rgyud): gdan sar rnga lha rnams 'tshogs te/ 'thab par brtsams pa dang / dang po lha rnams kyis khrom shes nas/ brtsub 'gyur gyi khang pa na/ khro bo lang gnag po khros pa'i kha chu/ khro chu'i rdzing bu bdun 'khyil ba las 'thun
248a4(rnying rgyud): so/ der lha rnams zhe sdang skyes te/ shin tu khro bar gyur nas/ bzo'i lha bi sho kar mas nub gcig la gser khrab bye ba phrag dgu 'bum rang brdung so// lha ma hA khro das nub gcig la mtshon ral gri dang / 'khor
248a5(rnying rgyud): lo dang thod pa dang / lcags kyu dang / dgra sta dang / mdung rtse gsu/ ma pa bye ba phrag dgu khri dgu 'bum rang brdungs so// dus de tsam na lce rnams go mtshon thogs te/ glang po cha rab tu brtan pa'i
248a6(rnying rgyud): mgo sum cu rtsa gnyis la nye dbang sum cu rtsa gnyis zhon/ dbus kyi mgo bo la lha'i dbang po brgya byin zhon/ lha dmag bye ba dung phyur gyis mtha' brten ste/ glang po che'i sna la ral gri btags nas/ lha dang lha ma yin gnyis
248a7(rnying rgyud): g.yul bkye'o// dus de tsam na lhas mtshon rgyab pa rnams ni/ khrag gar phog pa la bdud kyi dmag mi khri khri tsam du 'phel lo// lha ma yin gyis mtshon brgyab pa la ni khrag la dmag mi 'phel bar shi'o// der lha thams
248a8(rnying rgyud): gta bar ste/ lha ma yin rab tu rgyal ba'i dus su/ byag na rdo nyid kyis lharnams rgyal bar bya ba'i byi/ dang la ba rung dus nas tshum zing dga' bar ba gc-ig smral ste/ s+ya byi nu tsa dpal 'a'u dbyas rgyam kyi
248b1(rnying rgyud): mdzer pa cig tu gyur to// mdzer pa gtol ba'i nang nas bud med sngon mo dbu skra du r+ya'i chun 'phyangs can/ mig ud pa la'i 'dab ma 'dra ba/ mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa cig byung ngo // de la lha rnams kyis ming btags pa/ 
248b2(rnying rgyud): lha mo um de 'a bya bar btags// lha'i bu mo de kun gyi chung mar 'dod pa la// namakha' la phyag na rdo rjes nga'i sprul pa'i tshigs bshad 'di bsgrags so// lha yi rgyal srid mtho zhing brtan pa dang // ris drug sems can
248b3(rnying rgyud): dge la dgod pa dang // lha min bdud kyi g.yul chen bzlog pa'i phyir// dbang phyug lha la u ma chung mar byin// zhes bsgrags so// dus de'i tshe na 'dzam bu'i gling gi nub byang mtshams// yag sha ka ma la 'bar ba'i dur/ 
248b4(rnying rgyud): khrod na/ lha ma snye pa dge slong gi cha lug su 'gog pa'i brtul zhugs dadrag po la zhugs pa'i drung du u ma deg khrid nas zhag bdun phrag bdun dol bcas pra/ 'dod pa'i 'khrig pa spyad do// khrig pa spyad pa'i'adis
248b5(rnying rgyud): gis bar snang la gza' dang skar ma byung ngo // der lha mo u ma de ba la bu tsha mi sring gnyis skyes so// ming po ni gshin rje ma hA ka la zhes grags so// sring mo ni lha mo dmar mo tsa muN Di zhes bya bar grags so// 
248b6(rnying rgyud): gshin rje ming sring de gnyis chos bzang lha'i mdun sar khrid nas phyin to// de nas phyag na rdo rje nyid kyis/ gshin rje'i ming sring la ma hA yag sha bdud las rnam par rgyal ba'i dbang bskur te/ sngar bzhin du lha dang lha ma yin gci
248b7(rnying rgyud): g.yul chen po bkye'o// de nas gshin rje ma hA ka las/ lag na gsal shing ri rab tsam gcig gis/ lha ma yin gyi g.yul ngor dril bas g.yul bzlog go// tsa muN Di'i ral gri me lce phreng ba zhes bya bas/ lha ma yini he ran na ke/ 
248b8(rnying rgyud): shu'i mgo bcad do// de nas lha dmag mang pos kyang / lha ma yin la mtshon cha'i char phab nas khrag rnams dmag mir sprul pa 'dra ste/ lha mo tsa muN Dis he ran na ke'i shu'i thod pas/ khrag bcus shing rol pas 'phel
249a1(rnying rgyud): mnus par byed kyin mtshon gyi char pa ba nas/ tsa mu na 'i lte ba la lnga bye bdung phyur rnams kyi rdzong byas pas 'thab so// lhad ga dkar po rgyal bar byas gang dpag bsam gang gi mnga' bdag tu gyur
249a2(rnying rgyud): te/ rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs kyang rang byung du yod do// lha ma yin 'pham par gyur to// brgya byin nyon cig/ de nas lha'i bu mo tsa mu na Di des/ ri khrod chen po mdangs dga' zhes bya bar/ shing ri khrod
249a3(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba'i lo ma gyon nas/ lo bdun du 'phags pa mi 'pham pa'i gzungs bzlas pas/ lha mo brna sha ba ri ri khrod lo ma can zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas lha mo des klu dung gi mdzer pa can zhes bya ba'i byang chub sems/ 
249a4(rnying rgyud): dpa' de bya khyud ka ru na zhes/ lha mo brna sha ba ri des bya khyung brtul ba ngas klu bskyangs te/ lha mo dkar mo dung skyong ma zhes bya bar gyur to// lha mo dung skyong ma de ni re rab rtse mo rnam par rgyal ba'i khang bzangs rtsa/
