249a5(rnying rgyud): bya bar gyi 'tshams byang chub kyi shing drung na/ rin po che'i khang pa bdun rtsigs kyi gzhal yas kyi khang na/ rin po che'i khri ste/ na/ gser dngul bai dUr+ya'i dbu rgyan dang mgur chus brgyan te/ 
249a6(rnying rgyud): lus 'gying bag tu bzhug so// lha'i bu dang bu mo mang pos kyang longs spyod dang / glu dang dbyangs dang / rol mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mchod pa byed do// brgya byin nyon cig/ de nas yul yang ka pu rangs su/ 
249a7(rnying rgyud): srin po 'grong khyer bdun 'bum yod pa la/ lha rnams kyis skyon phab ste/ srin po da sha grI ba dang / de'i sring mo rnal rtse gnyis lus so// de nas srin po dag gribs/ lha dang mi 'dul 'dod pa'i don ched du/ sring
249a8(rnying rgyud): mo lham hride ba la btsun mor phul lo// de nas lha dbang phyug ma sbed pa dang / sring mo rnal rtse gnyis tshogs pa las/ phas ni khye'ur smon lam btab/ mas ni bu mor smon lam btab/ ma'i smon lam mthu
249b1(rnying rgyud): brtsan pas/ ya mtshan can gyi bu mo gcig byung / pha khros pas thal khung du bor ro// mas slar blangs nas lus kyi drod la btsas nas/ A su bruM zhes tshe drangs gsos te/ phas ming btags pa sbas pa'i thal/ 
249b2(rnying rgyud): mdog mar ming btags/ mas ming mi pham khro gnyer ro langs mar ming btags/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rjes dmod brtsugs nas ming btags pa/ dus thams cad du nag mo re ma ti zhes bya bar grags par gyur/ 
249b3(rnying rgyud): nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i nus mthu dang ldan par gyur cig ces ming du btags pa'i tshe/ bar snang gi lha ma srin sde brgyad po yongs kyis kyang de ltar gyur cig ces bzlas so// de nas skye ba thams cad
249b4(rnying rgyud): dunag mo re ma ti zhes bya bar grags so// lha mo dung skyong mas ming dbatags pa ni/ srin mo dmar 'dab phur ba'i lha gser can zhes/ bya bar ming btags so// dus der srin po da sha grI ba des/ nga ni lce
249b5(rnying rgyud): bopo lcib bo'i sgras 'jig rten du grag so// sring mo dang rnal rtse gnyis kyis ming po ma lceb par ci 'dod pa nga la spros shig/ ces gso la lo// dasha grI bas gsol pa/ nga ni lha mo dung skyong 'dod do// zhes
249b6(rnying rgyud): gsol to// sring mos smras pa/ nga'i nu mo phur pa'i lha mo dung skyong gi khol mo byed du gsal te/ de nas gdod bsku'o zhes smras so// de nas rna la rtse yis bu mo khrid nas/ dkar mo dung skyong gi g.yog tu phulo// 
249b7(rnying rgyud): de nas re ma tis dkar mo dung skyong la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye che zhe chen mo rigs kyi yum// bdag nyid chen mo ga gar ma// dbu bzangs rin chen thor tshugs la// be dA sngon mo 'od lam lam// zhal bzang
249b8(rnying rgyud): pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// nyi zla phrugs gcig brgyan bkod de// tshems bzangs dung la lcags bzangs me// khyod 'dra 'jig rten khams na med// bdag ni khyod kyi gtan 'bangs bgyi// khyod kyis bdag la
250a1(rnying rgyud): thugs brtser dgongs// bdag kyang glo ba nye bar bgyi// ces gsol to// de nas lha mo'i g.yog mo byas nas glo ba nye bar byas te/ lha mo'i yid la ci 'dod pa dgos pa byas so// de nas lnga/ 
250a2(rnying rgyud): mo yang kho mo de la dgyes nas/ gces par byed de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na yul lang ka pu rangs su/ spre'u 'bal le dang mgrin bzangs 'thabs pa la lha thams cad ltad mo la 'gro bas/ lha mo u mas bu mo dung skyong
250a3(rnying rgyud): ma la 'di skad ces smras so// di ring khyod kyi gan du su 'ongs pas khyod bsdu ste 'ong bas/ de la ma lha cig ces bstan tsam na/ khol mos skabs der dag gri ba la spun no// der srin po dang sha gribs/ srin gyi
250a4(rnying rgyud): bu dmar ga la zhon nas/ lha mo'i pho brang sgor phyin ste/ srin po dbadag ni mi'i cha byad la shin tu gzugs bzang la mdzes pa gcig tu sprul/ bong bu ni ri dgas go dor smug po cig tu sprul te/ lha mo
250a5(rnying rgyud): dungadu skyong ma'i spyan sngar phyin nas/ rol mo'i sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs byas pas bslus so// lha mo rol mo la dga' ba / 'dzum cig shor ro// de nas srin pos glags rnyed de/ lcags kyi
250a6(rnying rgyud): lham sgrog sngon po bkrol nas/ gzungs de glu 'di skad blangs te/ kye yongs 'du shing gi gnas mchog na// rin chen mdzes pa'i pho brang nas// bde ldan 'phrul gyi lding khang na// 'gying bag tshul du gar mdzad pa// dbang
250a7(rnying rgyud): phyug sras mo ma lags sam// dga' byed dung skyong ma lags sam// lha mo mang po'i tshigs dang rol// dbu'i snyan cha gdub 'khor ni// rin chen mdzes pas kun nas spras// spyan ni ud pal 'dab ma 'dra// shangs ni bil
250a8(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'bras bu 'dra// zhal nas u dpal dad kyang bro// sku ni 'khril ldem gzhon nul 'dra// gsung ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs snyan mchog/ nu 'bur stong spad byed pas 'gying // khyod 'dra'i sku ni gzhan na dkon// lha'i long stsu
250b1(rnying rgyud): mdzad pas mi brel yang // zhabs kyi chas su lpags sgrog 'di 'dul zhes/ ci mdzad ci sdug ci yang gsung bstan// khams gsum dag na khyod 'dra shin tu dkon// sems can kun gyis lta bas mi ngoms khyod// bdag
250b2(rnying rgyud): gis dbul 'di bzhes par gnang bar mdzod// ces phul ba la/ lha mos lcags sgrog blangs so// de nas rang gi rkang pa g.yas pa la dkris te rgyan byas so// de nas khol mo des/ jo mo dung skyong ma la zhus pa/ 
250b3(rnying rgyud): kye jo mo bde mchog dung skyong ma// bdag zhu ba gcig mchis na gnang ngam byas pa la/ jo mo na re khyod glo ba nye bas ci nus pa gnang ngo zer ro// de nas lha ni ngag bden pa'i sdom pa yod pas/ ji skad smras
250b4(rnying rgyud): pa ltar byed pa yin no// de nas khol mos gsol pa/ kye ba dedag gi yum gyi rjer gyur dung skyong ma/ khyod 'dra 'jig rten gzha nan med// 'grogs pas zla med skar ma gcig shar 'dra// deng 'dis
250b5(rnying rgyud): mchis pas lcags sgrog 'bul mkhan de// gtan gyi grogs zla mdzad par nub 'bul// bdag kyang rtag tu khyod kyi bran mo byed// zhe sa zhus pa las/ lha mo des sngar khas blangs pa des mi bya ba'i dbang
250b6(rnying rgyud): med nas/ lha mo na re khyod bya'i mi de gang na 'dug/ su yin byas pa la/ khol mos smras pa/ de ni bdag gi zhang po srin po dasha grI pa yin/ yul lam kha bu rangs na 'dug ces smras pa dang / de nas dung skyong ma dbang
250b7(rnying rgyud): med du srin po'i chung mar song ngo // de nas lha mo u mas bu mo dung skyong ma la dmod pa bor pa/ nga'i bu mo rab tu gces par byas te/ lha'i longs spyod mdzes pas mi brel yang // nga la gsangs la srin po'i chung
250b8(rnying rgyud): mar song // phyin chad bu mo khyod kyang srin dang 'grogs// mau sha za yi mi lpags gyon par gyur// srog gcod byed cing mi yi thong khrag thogs// bong bu zhon la lha yi kha dog nyams// srin gyi kha dog nag la 'jigs
251a1(rnying rgyud): par shog/ de yi khol mo ri ma ti khyod kyang // nga yi bu mo bsdus te srin la byin// khyod kyang mi sdug 'jigs pa'i gdong du gyur// tshe rabs kun tu khyod dang ma phrad cig/ ces dpod pa bcu gcis/ 
251a2(rnying rgyud): pa bor ro// de nas bu mo la ma'i dmod pa sdig nas/ lha'i kha dog dkar po nyams te/ mthing nag tu gyur/ mi sha za me khrag 'thung / mi lpags gyon bong bu zhon// gcer bur bud nas 'dug go/ bu ni srin po phru gu
251a3(rnying rgyud): seng ge zla dang / me tog cod pan dang / gangs can dang / mtsha ba bdun pa la sogs pa lnga brgya skyes tsam na/ khyo srin po dag grI ba shi'o// de nas bu mo dung skyong ma yang lugs sa'i cha lugs byas te/ skra mdun/ 
251a4(rnying rgyud): sgralan bu gcig la blas so// bran mo phur ba'i lha yang dmod dpas sdig pas/ srin gyi phag rdzi byed tsam na/ phag rdzi dun dbu srin bya bas mo la dbang med du chags pa spyad do// de nas phur pa
251a5(rnying rgyud): lha yang na bu sbrum mo// de nas dpon g.yog gnyis kyis/ srin bo'i bong bu bskus pa zhon nas/ dasha grI ba'i ral gri sngo/ pa can brkus pa g.yas na thogs/ srin po'i nor bu rin po che brkus
251a6(rnying rgyud): nas rnga ne'u lo'i rgyal bur sbas nas/ lag pa g.yon du thogs nas bros so// phyi nas srin po'i dmag gis bsad kyis dogs nas/ bong bu skyon nas kha phyir bstan te/ phyin srin po byar byed cing phyin no tha mar du du
251a7(rnying rgyud): khrod gcig tu phyin na/ skyes pa g.yul du bsad pa'i ro gcig dang phrad do// de nas khong gnyis sha de bsregs nas za 'dod pa la/ gtsub shing phyed nas/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram na rdo sol gyi ri la char bab nas me 'bar ba
251a8(rnying rgyud): mthong nas rdo sol me blangs nas sha bsregs nas zos so// phyin khyi dkar po gcig 'brangs pa yang bsad nas zos so// pags pa la rgyal mtshan byas so// de nas khol mo re ma til nal phrug skyes so// khong
251b1(rnying rgyud): gnyis kyis nam drug gi sha yang zos so// de nas jo ma bong bu la non khol mos gakhring byas nas rgya mtsho'i khar byin nas/ gshin rje rlung ga 'khor lo can nag bdun bsgoms pas/ rlung nag nub ma nag pog ci/ 
251b2(rnying rgyud): drung der grub bo// de nas lha mo dpon g.yog gnyis kyis/ snang srid kyi lha 'dre mthu bo che bos nas/ smon lam btab pa/ nga yang tshe 'di 'phos ma thog tu gsang sngags kyi grub pa thob nas rgyal ba'i zhal mthong ste/ 'dod
251b3(rnying rgyud): pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar shog shig/ nga'i bram ze phur ba'i lha 'di yang dus thams cad tu nga'i 'bangs ka ma lar shog shig/ nor du mi mgo la longs spyod par shog shig/ zhon pa bong bu la byed la lag cha ral gri
251b4(rnying rgyud): la byed par shog shig ces smras so// brgya mtsho skor zhing rlung tshub ma la pra yu be ba yu be zhes bos tsam na/ tshub ma byung bas dpon g.yog ga nyis ka rgya mtsho'i nang du bskur te btang ngo // de nas lha mo dung skyong ma de misha
251b5(rnying rgyud): zos pa'i mthu dang / rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis/ rgya mtsho'i/ gram du dur khrod chen po ro'i tshal zhes bya bar/ gshin rje'i lham thu can gyi bu mor skyes te/ gnod sbyin ma chen mo la kha dog mthing
251b6(rnying rgyud): nag la rab tu 'jigs pa/ mig rtsa dmar ba mche bzang yag la ral po ting za bad du 'dug pa tsag tu gyur te/ gshin rje ma ru rtse dang sbyor ba byas pa la bu bdud khram nag po bya ba byung / bong bu yang dmar ga la g.yu'i
251b7(rnying rgyud): rnab can rlung gi gshog pa can mig 'jug ma la yod pa gcig tu byung nas nor skal byed do// de nas khol mo re ma ti ro langs ma 'di ni skye ba gang blangs zhe na/ rgya mtsho'i nang du bud med lus po phyed skams la chu srin gyi mag
251b8(rnying rgyud): can gcig tu skyes te/ ming yang klu mo gzhogs skams chu srin mgo klu me re ma ti zhes bya bar gtags nas/ zhag dgu bcu na tshe 'phos nas/ skye ba blangs pa ni yul dri za'i grong khyer gser sdings mos tshal zhes
252a1(rnying rgyud): bya ba na/ dug shing nag po 'gyur med kyi rtsa ban bdud ri ti 'god nyag dang / dran pa dbang byed gnyis byi byas pa la/ zhag drug cu rtsa gcig na bu mo gcig skyes te/ bas ni srid pa gsum gyi
252a2(rnying rgyud): 'brog mar btags/ mas ming btags pa ni ya mtshan 'phrul gyi gshog pa can du btags/ bdud pham gnyis kyis rang gi bu mo la/ skra nyag ril gser dang / bai DUr+ya'i rgun 'phyang dang / rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang / 
252a3(rnying rgyud): nyizla'i thong rdeng dang / thod pa'i mgur chu dang / sbrul gyi gdubus rgyan te/ byi byas pa'i nal phrug yin pas/ bdud kyis rin po che sna lnga'i khang pa'i dbus su thod pa'i gzhal yas khang byas/ thod pa'i nang du yang thod su
252a4(rnying rgyud): gyi lding khang grub/ de'i nang du khang pa bdun rtsegs kyi bdun tshogs kyi/ nang du/ mi ro 'bum gyi khri stengs su bu mo de sus ma mthong sus kyang /  tshor bar sbas te/ sgo smra bo lag rings dang / nam gru khram thogs kyis
252a5(rnying rgyud): bcad do// bdud kyi dmag gi rgyal mo dang / gling bzhi'i rgyal mo dang / sa bdag gi rgyal mo dang / de rnams kyis khang pa de rab tu srung zhing khod do// brgya byin nyon cig/ de'i tshe na lha mo dung skyong ma ni/ sngon gyi khol
252a6(rnying rgyud): mo re ma ti ro langs ma bdud kyi bu mor skyes pa bkug nas/ khol 'dod pa las/ phyag na rdo rje nga'i gsang sngags bye ba phrag bco brgyad bzlas pas/ gsang sngags de'i byin gyi rlabs las/ mkha' 'gro'i ting nge 'dzin grub pa mo// 
252a7(rnying rgyud): lag na pad+ma he ru ka thogs pa gcig rang byung bas/ ma bdud kyi yul dang pho brang kun byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshe na/ bdud kyi rgyal mo dang / blon po dang / 'khor rnams dran pa med par myos par gyur to// bdud kyi bu mo re ma ti des
252a8(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi jo mo lha mo dung skyong ma dran pas/ yid phyogs te dung skyong ma'i spyan sngar 'gro 'dod pa'i bsam pa drag po byung nas/ bdud risti 'gong nyag gi mtshon bdud kyi khram pa ma nag po de/ bu mo re ma tis bskus nas/ lag bags
252b1(rnying rgyud): su thogs/ ma'i mtshon gyi gru gu sngon dmar de brkus nas lag pa g.yon na thogs nas/ nam par phyed chur phyed na jo ma dung skyong ma'i gan du byos te phyin nas/ lus gcer bur 'dug pa la/ khyim bdag rab sbyin gsal gyi brdzi ma
252b2(rnying rgyud): dmangs rigs mo bya ha ru zhes bya ba de re lde nag po gyon nas 'dug pa dang phrad/ mos dmangs rigs mo bsad nas sha zos/ pags pa rked la dkris/ de'i gos re lde pa shus nas bdud mo nyid gyon nas byin tsam na/ la mkhar srin mo bum na
252b3(rnying rgyud): shi ba'i gsum khrag/ nad kyi rdzing bu cig yod pa'i khar phyin pa las/ bdud mo re ma tis skom nas thog cig 'thungs tsam na/ kharlangs las nang du song bas/ mo'i kha rlangs gar phog pas rims nad byung ngo // der mo rang yango tsha skyes nas/ 
252b4(rnying rgyud): sngar gyi dmangs rigs mo bsad pa'i rlung bu rked las bkrol te/ nang nang kyi rdzing bus bkang nas/ kha sbrul gyis bcings te/ mchan khung du sbrus nas/ sems can la gdug par bya bar bsams te/ phyin tsam na btsan skya rdo
252b5(rnying rgyud): rje zla ba dang phrad pa na re bdud mo chen mo chags pa spyad dgos/ rngan par/ nga sbyin zer nas/ mo bzung nas chags pa spyad pa'i khu ba thigs pas/ cig 'dza m+bu'i gling du bo ba ni dzong ji dkar por song / der btsan skya rdo rje zla na
252b6(rnying rgyud): lag na shong rde'u dkar nag gang la bor ba phung bar byed pa bdun yod pa la/ mo la byi rngan du byin pa de blangs te/ lag pa g.yon du bzung nas/ grong khyer brang ldan zhes bya bar phyin tsam na/ rgyal po seng ge rtsal la bsod snyoms byasate/ 
252b7(rnying rgyud): sbrang rtsi lhung bzed gang phul nas/ sbrang rtsi lag tu len kar phyag tshang bas hub byas nas mo la byin/ mos blangs tsam na/ bar snang gi lha rnams kyis bdud mo// rgyal po'i khol po'i lhag ma dang kha 'phro 'thung ngam/ che ba nyam so zhes zer tsam
252b8(rnying rgyud): na bdud me rem ti khros pas yid 'khrugs te/ rgyal rigs la der rims nad btang ngo // der rgyal po'i dkor zangs kyi dra ba dgu phul nas rims bcang ngo do// de nas nag mo ri ma ti des/ rgya mtsho'i 'gram du dung khrod chen po ro'i tshal du
253a1(rnying rgyud): sngon gyi jo mo dung spyong ma'i spun sngar byin to// de nas dpon g.yog gnyis 'grogs nas/ srid pa gsum gyi sems can zad cing stongs par byed pa'i dus de tsam na/ jom dung skyong ma'i zhon pa srin gyi bong bu dmar ga
253a2(rnying rgyud): dang / srin mo rnal dun rtse'i rgod ma zangs kyi so can gnyis chags pa spyad pa las/ dre'u mo sngon mo rlung gi shog pa can gcig byung ba de/ rgyu ma'i 'thub la/ zangs kyi rga bsnyad nas/ lha mo dung skyong ma'i khol mo re ma til zhon par
253a3(rnying rgyud): byin/ der jo mo ni bong bu dmar ga la zhon/ khol mos dre'u sngon mo la zhon/ rje mos mi lpags gon/ thod pa dang ral gri lag na thogs/ khol mos re lde nag po gyon/ lag na khram bam dang / shod rde'u thogs/ de nas shin tu maH
253a4(rnying rgyud): tsal che ste/ skye ba rnam bzhi'i sems can yo zad cing stongs pa tsam du zos so// 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro ma dkar mo'i tshigs dang / sngon mo dang dmar mo dang / ser mo'i tshigs dang / lha mo dang / bdud mo dang / srin mo dang
253a5(rnying rgyud): bsam gyis mi khyab pa mang po yang / lha mo rje khol gyis 'bangs brgya zer zhing bran du 'ongs so// brgya byin nyon cig dus de tsam na lha mo dang na g.yog gnyis bud med kyi rang bzhin du gyur pa nyid kyis/ rtag par 'ad
253a6(rnying rgyud): ba'i 'khrid pa spyad pa'i ched du/ khyo dgu dang sbyor ba byed de/ jo mo la khyo lnga khol mo la khyo bzhi yod de/ rje mo'i khyo lnga ni/ gza' ra hu la/ srin po sgra ldan/ gshin rje ma ru rtse/ bdud char gnag po/ klu kun da la dang lnga khol
253a7(rnying rgyud): mo'i khyo bzhi ni 'byung po dge ba dang / bgegs bi na ya ka dang / gnod sbyin yag sha ka pa la dang / rlung ba yu de ba dang bzhi'o// de ltar dpon g.yog gnyis kyi khyo dgu ni/ nyin par ni mchan khung g.yon du bsrungs shing sbed la
253a8(rnying rgyud): mtshan mo dur khrod du bskung zhing sbyor ba byed do// brgya byin nyon cig de nas lha'i bu mo la sngon gyi las 'phros 'brel zhing dge ba spyad pa'i shugs kyis/ byang chub kyi shing drung na/ bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i spyan sngar phyin nas/ 
253b1(rnying rgyud): ngas byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pas 'phyag 'jal nas/ rang ga snying po dul lo// dad+yagra/ yo ru ru ba tin pardos/ ru ru bste sta bdam/ tsab la ma gug se nu nga?/ zhes phul
253b2(rnying rgyud): khol mos rang gi snying po dul ba tu thA/ oM ru ru bo ru tsU tista tos/ rag mo tsota kha rag mdun b+h+yo/ ma ma drag rag sha kha mun trab tra rag gcig kha rag ma du hUM b+h+yo/ ru lu sa ma ya pra ma ma hA T+Ti pri b+h+yAM nas phul lo// 
253b3(rnying rgyud): de nas byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas/ lha mo dpon g.yog gnyis kyis/ a su ra'i brag phug du phyin pa las/ bram ze mchog sred bsgrub pa dang phrad do// lha mos khyod 'di na ci byed byas pa la/ bram ze mchog
253b4(rnying rgyud): sred kyis smras pa/ sngon khams 'di nyid na/ dge slong brtan pa'i sde dang / dge slong ma dang ri sde gnyis khrims nyams te/ rgyal po chad pas bsad do// de skye ba 'phos pa ni/ bdud laM nga 'ge'u ri dang / 
253b5(rnying rgyud): ro sha kha 'dar gnyis su gyur te/ yul mi ci yod zad par zos nas de nas ngal za res bab pas/ nga ni bdud 'dul ba'i phyir yum e ka tsa ti ral cig ma bsgrub bo zhes zer ro// dung skyong ma na re 'o na nged
253b6(rnying rgyud): dpon g.yog kyang bsgrub par bya na/ yon tan de lta bu yod dam byas na/ bram ze na re khyed gnyis dngos grub ci 'dod pa yin/ lha mo na re nged gnyis 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang mo cher gyur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung
253b7(rnying rgyud): pa'i grub pa 'dod byas pa la/ 'o na grub par bya'o zhes zer nas/ bram ze dang lha mo dpon g.yog bsgrub pa byas pas yum e ka tsa ti zhal mthong nas grub pa thob bo// yum e ka tsa tis/ lha mo dung skyong ma'i ming ni/ dpal
253b8(rnying rgyud): lha mo nag mo ma hA ka li zhes btags so// khol mo'i ming ni yag sha re ma ti zhes bya bar btags so// 'dod khams 'dul ba'i dbang tsho ba chu'o// ma hA ka lis kyang chos bskyong zhing bstan pa bsrung bar khas blangs so// rang gi
254a1(rnying rgyud): snying po 'di phul lo// oM ru ru be tista ba dos/ ru ru ro ru be tista ba dos/ tsa ba la a shug me b+h+yo dza/ re ma tis kyang / oM ru ru ro ru be tista bdos/ rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma hA b+h+yo/ ma ma trag rag ga kha mun trag
254a2(rnying rgyud): tra trag rag sha tsi ta kha rag ma re ma ti sa ma ya phra ma ya phra ma ma hA te pra dun b+h+yo// dza dza ru lu b+h+yo zhes phul lo// bdud laM nga 'ge'u ri dang ro sha kha d+har bsgral lo// de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas kyang nam gru mched brgyad kyang dra
254a3(rnying rgyud): su phul lo// srin yul du dmags drangs pas/ srin po yag sha ko ra bsgral lo// brgya byin nyon cig/ de nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyis/ dpal rta mgrin du sprul pa'i bsgrub pa byas te/ rta mgrin zhal
254a4(rnying rgyud): mthong zhing gsang ba'i gzungs ma byas te/ rje mo'i ming dpal lha dmo nag mor gtag so// khol mo'i ming ni rdo rje glog mo srin du ming btags so// des phyag rgya chen po'i dbang bskur ro// 
254a5(rnying rgyud): las kyi lhar byin gyis brlab so// de'i tshe na dpal lha mo nag mos/ da bal rta mgrin la snying po mdor sol du phul lo// bstan pa srung bar khas blangs so// de nas sngon gyi u ma de ba dang rnal rtse gnyis
254a6(rnying rgyud): kyang / sngon gyi bu mo gnyis la srin lag rtse la mu no blugs pas bros nas/ dred mo'i ral pas g.yab mos 'bod do/ bu mo gnyis ma'i drung du phyin tsam na/ dbang bskur zhing ngam bsgrags/ bstan pa bsrung bar dbang byin to// 
254a7(rnying rgyud): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal pos kyang / rang gi rtsa dang khrag dang khu ba'i mchod pa byas nas/ lha dang mi'i rgyal srid phul nas/ rma bya rin po che'i gshog pa can spyi bon nor bu rin po che yod pa/ jo mo la nor bskal du byin no// 
254a8(rnying rgyud): byed monag/ me spyi bo na nor bu rin po che yod pa cig/ khol mo la nor skal du byin nas/ lha me khol gnyis/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal pos byin pa'i drub dang / de mo nag mo gnyis gtan gyi nor skal byed cing / 
254b1(rnying rgyud): chags/ de nas dpal lha mo ni gsang ba'i gnas dur khrod ro khang nag po'i dbus ma ru tse'i sgo 'gram du/ dpal phyag na rdo rje'i he ru ka'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i tshe/ dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub grub ste/ dpal phyag na
254b2(rnying rgyud): lha mo dpon g.yog la spyi bo gtsug tu dpal rta mgrin gsang ba'i dbang bskur/ lus ngag yid gsum la khrag 'thung he ru ka'i dbang bskur/ thugs kyi dpal be'ur rigs lnga sangs rgyas kyi dbang bskur/ sku stod
254b3(rnying rgyud): kyi rgyan du 'phra men ma bcu drug gi dbang bskur/ ljags kyi dkar dmar la lcags kyu gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro// gnad mdo chen drug tu tshim bu gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro// gsang ba pad+ma la thig le ye shes shar po'i dang
254b4(rnying rgyud): bskur rdo rje pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhi 'khor du dbang bskur/ pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug ni sprul pa dang yang sbrul du dbang bskur/ de'i'ajig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug du g.yos so// de nas dpal
254b5(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes jo mo'i ming ni dpal ma hA ka li zhes btags so// khro/ la mo'i ming ni gnod sbyin shan pa nag ma raM ma ti zhes btags so// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar gnyer gtad do// de nas dpal bya/ 
254b6(rnying rgyud): na rdo rje nyid la/ dpal lha mos rang gi snying po phul te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dus rtag tu bsrungs par khas blangs so// de nas dpal lha mo de mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab par gyur to// 'dod pa'i
254b7(rnying rgyud): khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur pa'i tshe/ lha tshangs pas nyi ma'i rgyan phul/ khyab 'jug gis zla ba'i rgyan phul/ rnam thos sras kyis seng ge'i rna cha phul// na mkha'i lha bran rnams kyis dril bu'i rgyan phul/ 
254b8(rnying rgyud): srin po dang sha za rnams kyis thod phreng dang khrag dang zhag gi thig le phul lo// klu dga' bos sbrul gyi gdengs ka phul/ lha mo de srid pa gsum na 'gran pa'i zla med par gyur to// de nas brgya byin gyis gsol ba/ kye bcom
255a1(rnying rgyud): ldan 'das gsang ba'i bdag po/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug ma 'di/ dang por lha'i bu mor gyur pa dang / bar du srin po'i chung mar gyur pa dang / da ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar
255a2(rnying rgyud): gyur pa 'di/ sngon gyi rkyen ci las grub lags zhes gsol pa dang / gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ brgya byin nyon cig/ da ltar lha mo nag mo 'di sngon sangs rgyas 'khor ba 'jig kyi bstan pa la/ lha mo 'ong
255a3(rnying rgyud): zer can du gyur te/ dge ba bcu sha stag sprad do// de nas sangs rgyas gser thub kyi bstan pa la/ lha mo dpal bstan ma zhes bya bar gyur te/ zhe sdang kha mar spyad do// de nas sangs rgyas 'od srung gi bstan pa la/ lha ma
255a4(rnying rgyud): man 'dzu zhes bya bar gyur te/ dus de tsam nai shAkya thub pa ni/ dge slong dbang phyug dpa' bo zhes bya bar grags so// dge slong de la lha mo man 'dzus mchod gnas byas shing / smon lam gcig tu btab bo// 
255a5(rnying rgyud): brgya byin nyon gcig/ de da lta na ni lha mo 'di la sangs rgyas gsum gyi ra nga gi rnam par smon pa shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa la dus gcig tu smi na no// lha mo 'di dang por ma hA de ba'i bu mor skyes pa ni// dang por dge ba
255a6(rnying rgyud): spyad pa'i mthu'o// bar du srin po'i chung mar gyur nas rang lcib pa ni zhe sdang spyad pa'o// tha mar da ltar 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug mar gyur pa ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dbang bskur nas/ shAkya thub pa'i bstan bsrung
255a7(rnying rgyud): ba ni/ sngon shAkya thub pa la sdig bshags byas kyi smon lam btab bo// khol mo re ma ti sdigs kyi bsod nams las grub pa'o// mkha 'gro ma me lce 'bar ma'i rgyud las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// 
255a8(rnying rgyud): denas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ gsang ba'i bdag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan mgon po gsang ba'i bdag/ ma 'ongs phyi ma'i sems can rnams// mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor rab bsgrub
255b1(rnying rgyud): pa'i slob dpon slob ma'i mtshan ma'i rgyud// gang yin bdag gis nyan par 'tshal// zhes zhus pa'i tshe/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa/ dpal ldan lha mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// thun mong ma yin kun gyi bya ba min/ 
255b2(rnying rgyud): de yang slob dpon mtshan nyid bshad// slob dpon chos la rab 'dud pa// tshad med bzhir ldan snying rje can// phyi nang gsang ba'i dbang thob nas// dam tshig srog bzhin 'dzin byed cing // bden pa gnyis rtogs lta ba can// 
255b3(rnying rgyud): sngags dang phyag rgya mi spong zhing // rtag tu phyag rgya che la gnas// sems can don byed man ngag ldan// de ni slob dpon mtshan nyid ste// slob ma dul la dad pa can// bla ma'i zhabs la rab 'dud cing // dad dang gtong phod
255b4(rnying rgyud): snying rje can// 'dul dang sdom pa dam tshig 'dzin// lha dang slob dpo ngan rtag tu bcang // gsang sngags 'dzin pa'i snod ldan la// slob ma rabya ba nga yis bshad// dpal mkha'agro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ 
255b5(rnying rgyud): slob dpon dang slob ma'i tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje 'di skad ces gsol to// rdo rje sems dpa' dpa' bo che// dus mthar
255b6(rnying rgyud): rnal 'byor bskyad slad du// rdo rje gsang ba'i mkha' 'gro ma'i// lta ba dam pa bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes zhus pa'i tshe/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ bdag dang rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i// gdod nas ma skyes gzung 'dzin yul
255b7(rnying rgyud): dang bral/ yang dang bdag 'dzin mtshan ma'i rtog pa bcom// don dam kun rdzob skye ba med pa'i gzhi// gnyis med chos kyi dbyingasu dbyer med cing // stong nyid chos sku na mkha' ye shes lnga// sprul pa'i phyag rgya lha dang lha mo'i mtshan mar/ 
255b8(rnying rgyud): snang / mkha' la 'ja' 'dra rang bzhin ga la yod// snying rje'i dbang gis 'gro don byed pa na// mdor na sangs rgyas sprul pa yin pa ste// khol mo byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'o// mtshan ma'i srin mo bdud mor blta mi bya// mkha
256a1(rnying rgyud): 'gro ma me lce' bar ba'i rgyud las/ lta ba bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// gsang ba'i bdag po len
256a2(rnying rgyud): thugs rje can// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor rnam pa gsum gyi rgyud bshad 'tshal zhes zhus pa'i tshe/ phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ brgya byin la sogs 'khor rnams rab tu
256a3(rnying rgyud): nyon dkyil 'khor rnam gsum mtshan ma'i phyag rgya ni// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor byang shar ri rab rtse// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor sems kyi yul// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor gnas gzhi'i sa la bya/ 
256a4(rnying rgyud): tshon rtsi mi rus ldong ros rams dang skegs// mthing nag gru ba bzhi'i dbus ni e gru gsum// dbus su gtso bo phyag na rdo rje ste/ de yi g.yas su lha mo nag mo ste// g.yon du ma mo'i ting nge 'dzin grub
256a5(rnying rgyud): pa mo/ gtso mo'i mdun du khol mo re ma ti// de'i phyi rims srad pa'i ma mo dang // stag spyang bya rgod seng ge khyung gis bskor / phyi rims thod phreng me ri keng rus bri// tsa ka li'am yig 'bru phyan
256a6(rnying rgyud): mtshan bri// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis// dpal phyag na rdo rje la
256a7(rnying rgyud): 'di skad ces gsol to// kye 'jigs byed che mchog 'gro kun 'dul ba'i gtso// rdo rje mkha' 'gro nag mo dam pa yin// dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rdzas rnams gang lags pa'o// gsang ba'i bdag po bad/ 
256a8(rnying rgyud): la bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa dang / phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub 'dod pa'i mis// rdzas rnams med na de ngos grub mi thob ste// rmongs pas sa bon gtsugs shing gtsugs
256b1(rnying rgyud): bstan 'dras/ kun ka tshang na dngos grub mtshan ma ster// mkha' 'gro ma la rdzas ni rnam pa bdun// 'bod pa'i rdzas dang ma mo bsten rdzas dang // mchod pa'i rdzas dang dam tshig bsre ba'i rdzas// bskul ba'i rdzas dang mtshan ma
256b2(rnying rgyud): dbab pa'i rdzas// tha mar gnad la 'bebs shing bzlog pa'i rdzas// bdun po 'di tshang grub pa'i mtshan ma 'byung // gtso bo phyag na rdo rje'i dam rdzas ni// go ro tsa na gtso bo bod pa'i rdzas// gtso bo'i rten ni seng ldeng mi rus
256b3(rnying rgyud): bur// gsal ba lnga dang bdud rtsis gtso bo mchod// dam tshig bcu yis rdo rjes ni mchod// gu gul nag po yungs nag til gyis bsku// spos dang lce pog mi tshil mtshan ma 'bebs// gtso bo'i gnad la 'bebs pa a/ 
256b4(rnying rgyud): mr-i ta/ dpal ldan lha mo'i bod rdzas ni// g.yab dar dang ni ha sta mi tshil dang // cong zhun spos lngas bsreg la bong // lha mo'i rten ni bu mo gtsang ma dang // rgya mtshor shi ba'i bud med thod pa gnyis// mkha
256b5(rnying rgyud): du brtsigs pa dkyil 'khor dbus su kha sprad la// mi bsad mtsha na gyi ral gri sor brgyad pa// yub ma bris dkyil 'khor dadu su gzugs// rma bya seng ge g.yang gzhi go zung nag pa'o// rje mo lnga/ 
256b6(rnying rgyud): mo nag mo'i dam rdzas ni// dge slong sha dang mi ro seng ge'i snying // dri rgod sha dang dbang po rnam pa lnga// ru tranag po'i snying dang bdud rtsi lnga// sman ma'i khrag dngag khrag sna tshogs dang // phye ma lnga yis gtor bas gur gum
256b7(rnying rgyud): brdzi pad+ma'i rag tas byugs la rgyun gtor bya// lha mo nag mo 'di dang dam tshig bsre ba'i rdzas// ru hi rdo rje pad+ma mi de sngags// bskul rdzas mi yi tshil dang gu gul bsreg/ mtshan ma 'bebs pa bu mo gtsang ma'o// gnad la
256b8(rnying rgyud): 'bebs shing bzlog pa yugs sa'i rkang / khol mo re ma ti'i 'bod rdzas ni// dred mo'i ral bas g.yab cing srin lag bstan// gu gul dang ni mi tshol gsur gyis bod// re ma ti yi rten du lug nag gam// de sonag
257a1(rnying rgyud): mo dri mo yi thong ba'o// khol mo ro ma ti'i mchod rdzas ni// bum pa gang ba'i drag dang a mr-i ta/ nal bu'i ga dang mi sha chang phud do// dam tshig bsre ning rtag tu mchod pa'i rdzas// ru sa rdo rje pad+ma dag gi shig/ 
257a2(rnying rgyud): bskul rdzas gu gul nag dang lcong zi'o// mtshan ma 'bebs pa bu mo gtsang ma'o// gnad la 'bebs shing bzlog rdzas dre'u yi rkang // 'di rnams gtsang zhing ma nyams tshogs gyur na// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i tshogs rnam
257a3(rnying rgyud): bus pas u dum 'bar ba mthong ba ltar// dga' ba skyes nas mi la dngos grub ster// de bas nan tan bskyed la brtson par bya// mkha'agro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las dpon g.yog gi dam rdzas bstan pa
257a4(rnying rgyud): le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye gsang bdag phyag na rdo rje 'dul ba'i
257a5(rnying rgyud): gtso// bsgrub pa'i rten gyi rdo rje mkha' 'gro sku// thang ka bri ba'i nan tan 'dri bar 'tshal// zhes zhus pa'i tshe/ gsang ba'i bdag sa bka' stsal pa/ mkha 'gro'i rten gyi sku gzugs ni// mis ma
257a6(rnying rgyud): 'phrigs par dur khrod 'gro// dang po phyag ni rdo rje dang // lha mo'i bsnyen pa 'bum 'bum bzlas// de la sbyin sreg gtor ma 'bul// ri mo mkhan la dbang bskur ro// dam tshig rab tu sbyin par bya// de nas bud med zhabs
257a7(rnying rgyud): ma dang wa ro dkris dag gi ras dag ni// ro bsregs 'gal ba'i shing gis kyang // bro ba'i mtshon rtsi rnam pa lnga// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i 'phro 'du las// rgyal po rigs lngar byin brlabs la// dbus su phyag na rdo rje
257a8(rnying rgyud): 'bri mdun du lha mo nag mo ni// bong zhon ral gri thogs par bri// g.yon du khol mo re ma ti// dre'u la zhon khram bam thogs pa'o// g.yas su bram ze mchog sred ni// mgrin pa slar dkar la ring // khri stan stan/ 
257b1(rnying rgyud): la long bre 'dzin// rma byane'u le thogs pa'o// de'i g.yon du bdag nyid ni// khri sna'i stan la long phreng 'dzin// rma bya'i spu dang ne'u le thogs// de nas rang gi srin khrag gis// sku gzugs rnams kyi spyan bye la// mdun du
257b2(rnying rgyud): gtor ma'i sbyin sreg 'bul// zhabs la btud de phyag byas la// dngos grub gang 'dod gsol ba gdab// dkyil 'khor dbus su bzhug su gsol// lha yi sku yi thugs khar ni// srin lag khrag gis zla kham bri// de/ 
257b3(rnying rgyud): yi dbus su snying po bri// de'i dbus rgyas chen sum sgril gdags// rtse mo bdag bzung bzlas pa bya// yang na lugs ma dag la bya// de ltar byas na dngos grub rgyu// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ sku
257b4(rnying rgyud): gzugs bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ gsang ba'i ba dag po dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye gsang mdzad
257b5(rnying rgyud): / drag po hUM mdzad che// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i// ting dz+ri/ na sgom thabs bdag la shod// ces gsol pa dang / phyag na rdzo/ rjes bka' stsal ba/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyon cig/ skye ba med/ 
257b6(rnying rgyud): pa'i ngang las sprul pa'i cho 'phrul ni// hUM las rdo rje rtse ni lnga pa ste// de nas bdag nyid phyag na rdo rje yin// mdog ljang sngol khro bo'i cha byad de// lus 'gying bag can/ dbus ska ral pa gyen la rjes pa la/ rigs lnga'i das
257b7(rnying rgyud): rgyan can phyag na ye shes kyi rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba lus la glang chen gyi ko ba dang / mchog gi g.yang gzhi dang / stag gi sham thabs dang / thod pa'i phreng ba dang / sbrul gyi chun pos lus brgyan pa/ spyan dmig
257b8(rnying rgyud): dmar ba mche ba gtsigs pa/ bskal pa'i me dpung ltar 'bar ba'o// de'i mdun du dpal lha mo nag mo bskyed de/ ma hA ka li ba ya be s+pha ra na ya/ de ni rlung nag tshub ma'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o// ma hA ka la~M dz+wa la
258a1(rnying rgyud): de ni me'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'o// de'i dbus su bruM b+hi shud te ka ba la hUM/ de ni thod pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo // garda ba hUM/ de ni bong bu dmar ga la mig 'jug ma na yod pa/ rlung gi gshog pa can no// 
258a2(rnying rgyud): sti ra bam bong bu'i thog tu zhing bsnol ba'o// ma sur+ya maN+Da la a/ nyi zla'i gdan no// b+h+yo nag mo'i 'phro 'du las// lha mo'i ting nge 'dzin// oM de ba'i sri ma hA ka li hUM zhes pa la/ rang gi byang chub kyi sems la/ lha mo
258a3(rnying rgyud): nag mo ni kha dog nag mo la/ ral pa gting za bad du 'dug pa/ mig rtsa dmar ba kha gdangs pa/ mche ba gtsigs pa lus la sbrul dang / thod pas brgyan pa/ lag na ral gri dang / ne'u le thogs pa'o// thal ba
258a4(rnying rgyud): dang khrag dang zhag gis mtshon pa'o// rna brgyan dril bu dang seng ge la bya sa pa/ nyi ma dang zla bas lus brgyan pa'o// sku smad glang gi ko ba sa brgyan pa'o// rkang pa la lcags sgrog gis brgyan pa'o// lha mo de
258a5(rnying rgyud): spyan sngar re ma ti khol mo bskyed de/ yaM ba ya be rlung gi tshub ma'o//  bi ha ran hUM/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang ngo // de'i na nga du ka pa la bruM las thod pa'i gzhal yas khang ngo // de'i nang rti rje ste
258a6(rnying rgyud): bruM las 'phrul gyi lding khang ngo // de'i nang du khang pa bdun bskyed do// de'i nang du dre'u rlung gi gshog pa can bskyed do// de'i steng du bse'i gdan no// de'i steng du ma nag mo'i 'phro 'du las/ rakA re ma ti hUM zhes pa las/ 
258a7(rnying rgyud): bdud kyi bu mo re ma ti de nag mo ral pa kham pa la/ me stag dang rin po ches brgyan pa'o// mig dmar ba mche ba gtsigs pa/ re lde nag po dang mi lpags gyon pa/ lag na khram bam dang / shod rde'u thogs
258a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang / nyi zla'i thod rdengs dang / nad kyi khams can/ stag gi sham bu dang / zangs kyi dra ba dang / mtshon gyi gru gu dang ldan pa rnams bskyed do// b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes brjod pa las
258b1(rnying rgyud): 'khor nag po bum bskyed do// dpal me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ ting nge 'dzin bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol
258b2(rnying rgyud): to mnyam nyid rdo rje'i sku bsnyems gsang ba'i lha// mtshan ma 'joms pa'i dpa' bstan drag shul can// rdo rje mkha' 'gro me lce phreng ba'i// srog snying bsgrub pa'i sngags rnams bshad par zhu zhes gsol ba dang / dpal phyag
258b3(rnying rgyud): na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ sngags zhes bya ba mkha' 'gro'i srog rtsa yin// grangs kyang mngal zur yang ma chag ste// gug skyed tsheg drag dag kyang mnor na// lha mo nag mo sngon du 'gugs pa yin// zhes bka' stsal pa
258b4(rnying rgyud): dang / dpal phyag na rdo rje de/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ dpal phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po 'di thugs pa nas phyung ngo // oM badz+ra na na Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ gtso bo phyag na rdo rje'i bsnyen pa
258b5(rnying rgyud): 'di sngon du 'bum tsho bdun du bzlas pa byas la// gtor ma dang ni sbyin sreg gis mchod de/ des ni phyag na rdo rje'i grub pa thob/ lha mo bkug cing dbang du byed par nus// de nas sdod cig lha mo'i
258b6(rnying rgyud): sngags la 'jug/ sngags 'di ni dpon mo'i snying dang g.yog mo'i srog/ mngon du 'gugs pa srog gi snying po'i sngags// gtso bo'i spyan 'dren g.yog mo 'gugs pa'i sngags// mi g.yo brtan pa rdo rje gdan
258b7(rnying rgyud): gyi sngags mnyes par bya phyir gtor ma 'bul ba'i sngags// ging du dbang bskur dam la gdags pa'i sngags// mnga' zhugs phan gnod las la bskul ba'i sngags// mi bya dbang med gnad la 'bebs pa'i
258b8(rnying rgyud): sngags sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub blang ba'i sngags// zhabs la bdud pa'i slob ma dbang bskur sngags// lha dang bgegs kyi nyams len brtags pa'i sngags// brda' dang mchod pa rdo rje gsang ba'i sngags par
259a1(rnying rgyud): chod mtshan ma ngan pa zlog pa'i sngags// bcu gnyis rdo rje'i gsang sngags bstan par bya// dpal lha mo nag mo'i srog snying la// oM ru ru be tista ba dos/ ru ru ro ru be tiSh+Tha bdos/ tsapa la a buH
259a2(rnying rgyud): me b+h+yo dza/ khol mo ri ma ti'i srog snying la/ oM ru ru ro ru/ hU tiSh+Tha ba tos/ rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma tsu b+h+yo/ ma ma trag rak+Sha/ kha mun tra ba trab trag rak+Sha tsi ta kha rag ma/ re ma ti sa ma ya/ pra ma ma hA ste pra dun b+h+yo ru lu ru
259a3(rnying rgyud): lu b+h+yo dzA dzA// de ni srog las 'dren pa'i sngags yin te// sa ya bzlas na ma mo mngon du yod// bye ba bzlas na phyag brgya ston par byed// 'bum phrag gis kyang dngos grub mtshan ma gter// khol mo'i snying po bzlas ma thog nas
259a4(rnying rgyud): 'od sa ma ya du ling rak+Sha saM/ he rak+Sha/ b+h+yorak+Sha/ durak+sha/ mA ra/ rak+Sha si/ mA mA mA mA/ ru lu ru lu/ ru lu ru lu/ b+h+yo b+h+rU~M b+h+yo b+h+rU~M/ da ru ru ru ru/ de ni 'khor ma mo 'bum gyi skye'i stong po'o// oM ma hAH
259a5(rnying rgyud): mnar la ma tre/ a gad dza la a gad dza ya/ pra pre sha ya pra br-inaya~M/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ a ba lo ka/ a ba lo ka ye hU dza/ daM ni spun hA nga ba'i sngagaso// oM ma hA ka li me ma sa ma ya/ shi ti tiSh+Tha s+t+waM/ mahA/ 
259a6(rnying rgyud): li a be sha ya/ re ma ti sa ma ya bres/ de ni gdan gding ba'i sngag so// a maSh+Ta bi ma hA ka li re ma ti b+ha li kha ba khA hI khA hI/ ma hA pu tsa ho/ a mr-i ta kha kha le le/ de ni gtor ma 'bul ba'i sngags so// ma ma sa ma ya
259a7(rnying rgyud): mA hA ka li sa ma ya/ ma hA ka li ka ya sa ma ya/ ma hA ka li bAg sa ma ya/ ma hA ka li tsit+ta sa ma ya/ ma hA mu tra ka ba la hUM/ de ni dam tshig brtan pa'i sngagaso// oM badz+ra dze gi ni ti bi ma hA ka li sa ma ya/ badz+ra kro ta karma/ 
259a8(rnying rgyud): rak+Sha hUM/ de ni las la bskul ba'i sngags so// oM ru ru ru tsa hUM/ a shug me ba tri ru tra kha shal nag mo hUM/ rag sha tsit+ta ma hA sa ma ti/ ma ru kha tsi ta nan/ rag mo ti ki ma dza/ ma ma ti tihUM b+h+yo// de ni dpon g.yog
259b1(rnying rgyud): gnang nas bskul ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ra Da ki ni de bi ma hA ka la re ma ti/ kA ya bAg tsit+ta si ti sa ma ya pha la a be sha ya a/ de ni dngos grub blang ba'i sngag so// oM ma hA ka li ye hUM phaT/ ru ru tsa ba la a
259b2(rnying rgyud): shug me hUM ma hA ka li a b+hi shin+da/ ka pa la tri ni/ ma hA dz+nyA na/ kA ya bAg tsit+ta si ti hUM/ de ni dbang bskur ba'i sngags so// hring hring tsa muN Di gur tse hUM/ de ni nyams len brtags pa'i sngags so// hUM phaT/ mahA/ 
259b3(rnying rgyud): de bi ka la~M duSh+TAn ta ka can/ dab tsa du munan/ da ha ba tsam ra ya nu baT/ de ni mtshan ma ngan pa zlog pa'i sngags so// tsU n+dats+tshi ts+tsha hUM/ dring rdzing dring rdzing dring dring rdzing dzing / ta ki ti ki ti ki taH
259b4(rnying rgyud): taki ta ki ta ki ta kaM/ bruM gem bruM gem bruM gem bruM gem bruM gem bruM gem bruM ges/ hUM du hU dum+bu hU drA hUM du hUM du hU drA hUM drA/ phaT ta ka phaT ta ka phaT ta ka phaT ta ka phaT taka phaT ta ka phaT ta ka/ 
259b5(rnying rgyud): de ni rdo rje ma hA mkha' 'gro ma'i rnga sgra'o// mkha' 'gro ma me lce'ab/ ra ba'i rgyud las/ sngags bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po ba
259b6(rnying rgyud): byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan mgon po rgyal tshab las kyi lha// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i rnal 'byor ma'o// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bdag la bstan par 'tshal zhes zhus pa dang / 
259b7(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ rnal 'byor gsang ba'i phyag rgya dam pa ni// spang bar mi bya rtag tu bcang bar bya'o// dang po gtso bo rdo rje rgyal la gnas// rlung gis me sbar bong zhon dbang phyug ma// lcags
259b8(rnying rgyud): kyus bzung nas gshog pas zil gyis gnon// bong bus gdan la dngas thod pas dbang bskur te/ thod rnon dam brtan gnyis med dngos grub blang // rtag tu mtshan ma ngan pa phyag rgyas bzlog/ dang po gtso bo rdo rje rje lnga/ 
260a1(rnying rgyud): ni// lag gnyis sor mo rgyab du bsnol bcangs la// the bong gung mo the'u chung ba shibs la bsgreng // rdo rje rtse lnga phyag na rdo rje'i rgya'o// dang po rlung nag chub ma'i phyag rgya ni// lag na thal sbyar
260a2(rnying rgyud): sprad bsgreng pa dang // the chung srin lag tshigs bsnol bskrad pa dang // de brkyang the bong grad gtad 'dzub mo gnyis bsgreng rdzong// rtse mo bkug pa rlung gi rgya'o// me ri smug nag 'bar ba'i phyag rgya ni// 'dzub mo// 
260a3(rnying rgyud): gnyis ni sor mo dgug byas te// the bong bkug ste de la gtad byas la// gung mo the'u chung bsgreng sde phyar ba'o// lha mo nag mo'i ral gri yi byig rgya ni// lag g.yas the'u chung bkug ste the bos gnan// gung
260a4(rnying rgyud): 'dzub srin lag gshibs te bsgreng ba'o// khol mo re ma ti'i phyag ni// da lag pa g.yas bkug the bos gnan byas te// lhag ma gsum/ brkyang bas ni khram bam phyag rgya yin// ma mo dgug pa lcags
260a5(rnying rgyud): kyu phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis rgyab sprad the'u chung bsgreng nas ni// 'dzub mo gnyis bkug gung srin theb mos bsdu// brkyang ste phral nas snying khar lcags kyu gnyis// zil gyis gnan pa khyu/ 
260a6(rnying rgyud): gshog phyag rgya ni// the'u bong gnyis gshibs sor mo gshog ltar brkyang // gad na mchog bong bu dag gi phyag rgya ni// the'u chung bsnol bas srin lag gnan byas te/ srin lag thor to the bos gnas pa'o// de bzhin/ 
260a7(rnying rgyud): gung mo gnyis ni nang du bstan// byin brlabs dbang bskur theng 'phreng phyag rgya ni// lag pa g.yas g.yon khu tshur bcangs pa la// theb 'dzub bzhi po lcags sgrog lta bur sbrel// lag gnyis thong rlon dam tshig
260a8(rnying rgyud): phyag rgya ni 'the bong 'dzub mo bkug nas bzlum byas te// bkug nas srin lag gnyis bcug mig 'bras 'dra// gung mo the'u chung gnyis ni thod rlon kha// dngos grub blang ba'i bdud rtsi bum pa ni// lag gnyis sor
260b1(rnying rgyud): bcu rtse bsdus bkug la zlum// mtshan ngan bzlog pa rdzi bul phyag rgya ni// lag g.yas theb 'dzub srin lag mthil du 'akug// the bo gung mo the'u chung phyar la bsgreng // mkha 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ phyag rgya bstan pa
260b2(rnying rgyud): le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol// kye stobs po che la gnod sbyin grags pa can// rig sngagags na mad kyi mnga' bdag gis// rdo rje ma
260b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// mchod pa'i rim pa bdag la bshad du gsol zhes zhus pa la/ gsang ba'i bdag pos bka' stsal pa// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub myur bya'i phyir// mnyes par byas te mchod pa rtag tu
260b4(rnying rgyud): dbul/ dang por mchod pa'i rdzas kyi gtor ma 'bul// gnyis pa la da ni sbyin sreg 'bul ba'o// de bzhin gsum pa gsang ba'i mchod pa 'bul// dang por gtor ma sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga// mchod pa'i rdzas dang
260b5(rnying rgyud): 'dza gad rag ta rnams// pad+ma mdzes pa'i snod du bkang byas nas// rU ngagis me sbar a yi thong ba dkol// hUM gis rdo rjes rab tu dkrugs nas kyang // a dkar 'bar bas kha zas drug bcom la// 
260b6(rnying rgyud): dpa' bo 'bru lngas bdud rtsir byin gyis brlabs// dang pos gtso bo phyag na rdo rje mchod// gnyis pas lha mo 'thungs par bsam// tha ma re ma tos yis brngubs par bsgom// oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM/ DA ki ni ma hA ka li/ 
260b7(rnying rgyud): yag sha re mA ti ma ma sha trum a mu ka/ ma tsa me ta ba sa ma mas/ ru ti dzi baM/ pri ya bag shi ni/ i daM b+ha li grIh+na g+hihA/ kha ga kha kha/ khA hi khA hi/ gsang sngags des ni rtag tu gtor ma
260b8(rnying rgyud): 'bul ba'o// de nas sbyin sreg 'bul ba bstab par bya// sku gzugs mdun du me thab bskor byas te// 'o ma tsher ma yod pa'i shing brtsigs la// bram ze khyim nas me blangs me sbar la// bsreg rdzas mi sha mar
261a1(rnying rgyud): nag sbrang rtsi chang // khrag la sbyar la khri phrag gcig tu dbul// bsgom thabs me nyid me lhar skyes zhon pa la// phyag bzhi g.yas na dbyug pa dang ni mchod sbyin no// g.yon/ 
261a2(rnying rgyud): namagu De dang ni bgrang phreng rab tu 'dzin// de yi snying khang phyag na rdo rje dang // lha mo nyid dang khol mo ri ma ti// gsal bar skyed la sbyin sreg dbul bar bya'o// gnyis pa gtso bo phyag na rdo rje
261a3(rnying rgyud): mchod/ gsum pas lha mo nag mo de la 'bul// de bzhin tha mas re ma til mchod// so so'i snying po bzlas shing dbul bar bya'o// oM badz+ra tsarka Da ma hA ro Sha Na na hUM/ ma hA d+he bi ka li hUM/ yag/ 
261a4(rnying rgyud): sharem ti n+tu/ ag ne ha pa phyaka 'bya/ ma hA ti ba tib ti \u0f7f/  sarba duSh+Ta Na bag sha ni kha ra khA hi swAhA// de nas thal bdur khrod du bskyal// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pas rab
261a5(rnying rgyud): bzhad bya/ dngos la mkha' 'grogs la lam ting 'dzin la/ gsang ba ye shes hUM dang yaM gnyis la// rdo rje pad+mas rab tu 'thugs nas kyang // zlabs mkha' 'gro rab tu mnyes 'gyur te/ 
261a6(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi thig les bdag gi gzi byin bskyed// thugs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i mnangag go// ma hA ka li sA mA yA bo de tsi ta/ ma hA pa tsa 'gu ya sngam spro ba'o// ma hA ka la~M sa mA yA/ ma sA ga ta mgus
261a7(rnying rgyud): snum/ a be sha sa bsdu ba'o// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ mchod pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ 
261a8(rnying rgyud): dpel phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// ye shes lngang ldan dpa' brtan thugs rje can// dpal ldan mi bskyod rdo rje sems dpa' khyod// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i dngos grub ni// srog dang 'dra ba'i das
261b1(rnying rgyud): tshig bdag nyan 'tshal// zhes gsol pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ mkha' 'gro ma'i dam tshig ni// gsang ba'i phyag rgya mda' dka' ba// mi shigs rgyal pos dbang bskur te/ 
261b2(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mtshan ma 'joms pa'i rgyu// dam tshig de nyid rab bshad bya// 'das na rdo rje dmyal ba'o// ma 'das dngos grub dam pa'i rgyu// gtso bo phyag na rdo rje dang // lha mo nag mo dpon g.yog la// sku gsung
261b3(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dam tshig ni// gtso bo sku'i dam tshig ni// sku yi phyag rgya mi spong zhing // lha dang slob dpon mnyes par bya// rdo rje spun la gdung ba bskyed// gtso bo'i gsung gi dam tshig ni// bzlas brjod
261b4(rnying rgyud): snying po rgyun mi gcod// me yengs rdzun spangs gsang sngags 'dzin// gtso bo'i thugs kyi dam tshig ni// gsang ba gzhan la mi spel zhing // stan 'gran 'bras bu lnga la spyod// de nas gtso
261b5(rnying rgyud): mo'i dam tshig bshad// lha mo'i sku yi dam tshig ni// bong bu la ni byams par bya// khal gyis mi gnad dubyug mi brdog/ rma bya'i mdongs ni rtag tu bcang // me yi dkyil 'khor mthong
261b6(rnying rgyud): ba na/ me tog skyes ltar dga' bar bya// rtag tu yi dam mi 'da' ba'i// zhag re phyag rgya gnyisu bstan// lha mo gsung gi dam tshig ni// rgyun tu bzlas pa byed pa dang // ne'u le mthong na bstod pa bya// phyag rgya
261b7(rnying rgyud): bstan zhing dga' bar bya// zhing lpags rdzas kyi snod du bya// tshub ma dag dang phrad gyur na// rked par mi gcod rgyab mi bstan// tshes grangs shis dang nam gung la// phyag rgya bya zhing bstod par bya// lha mo'i
261b8(rnying rgyud): thugs kyi dam tshig ni// 'jig rten gang da gang dag na/ bud med yugs sa yod pa la// byams par bya zhing chags pa spyad// rtag tu bu mo gtsang ma bsten// lha mo zla mtshan rgyu dus su// gsang ba'i mchod pas/ 
262a1(rnying rgyud): dam bsre'o// lha mo'i khol mo ram ti'i// de yi sku yi dam tshig ni// byis bdag gi nang phrug la// gos dang khazas mgron du sbyin// rtag par de la byams par bya/ 
262a2(rnying rgyud): shing lo sor bzhi rkang par gcad// byed la ma mo'i sku bris te// byed la dngos grub gsol bar bri// de ni rtag tu bcang ba'o// khol mo gsung gi dam tshig ni// ma phebs bar du srog snying drang // nub re gto// 
262a3(rnying rgyud): ma 'dar mi rung / kha 'phro dag kyang bsre ba min// phreng ba la yang reg pa bsrung // bdag gis dgra la byams byas te// phyis ni bcos par ma bshad do// khas blangs yol du ga la rung // phud kyang nyams
262a4(rnying rgyud): par bya ba min// rdo sol chur ni bsgyur mi bya// khol mo thugs kyi dadam tshig ni// nal bu yod pa'i sbrum ma la// me tog gtor nga zhing byams par byams par bya// kha zas sbyin zhing rngan mi bgrag
262a5(rnying rgyud): sna khrag zla mtshan blang bar bya// dam tshig yod rung med rung ste/ bdag ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor la// rang gi lha dang snying po dang / rdzas dang phyag rgya mi bstan no// mtshan ma rdo so la zhu bas bsku// bya
262a6(rnying rgyud): nag lug nag rtag tu bcang // the tsom zar ni mi rung ngo // dpon g.yog spyi yi dam tshig ni// ru hi rdo rje pad+ma yi// rtag tu bcangs la brten cing mchod// de dang bral du mi rung ngo // rnal 'byor dngos grub
262a7(rnying rgyud): thob bya'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig bstan// brgya byin dag gis rab zhus pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i skyon ni gang // dam tshig bsrung ba'i yon tan gang // 'byung po'i gtso bos bshad du/ 
262a8(rnying rgyud): gsol/ phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// rab tu bshad kyis brgya byin nyon// gtso bo phyag na rdo rje yi// sku yi dam tshig nyams pa na// mtho ris go 'a'ang rgyud lam 'chad// gsung gi dam tshig/ 
262b1(rnying rgyud): nyams pa na bsgrubs kyang dngos grub mi 'thob cing // bsngags la nus mthu med par ro// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa na// mkha' 'gro'i chad pas rab bcad nas// nges par rdo rje dmyal bar skye/ 
262b2(rnying rgyud): dngos grub med par bar chod 'byung // dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi// sku yi dam tshig nyams pa na// rgyal po tshad dang sbrul gdug dang // me dang chu yi bar du chod// gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa
262b3(rnying rgyud): na// bsgrub la g.yel zhing nus mthu med// bsgrub pa rtsom res bar chod 'ong // thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa na// nyams len 'ong zhing rims nad 'ong // khol mo bdud mo re ma ti'i// sku yi dam
262b4(rnying rgyud): tshig nyams gyur na// 'khor la rims nad spro 'bige 'ong // de dag rnams tshe dang bsod nams 'phel// gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa na// bu dang chung ma 'chi ba dang // snying mi dga' zhing
262b5(rnying rgyud): kha yang yo// nor dang longs spyod zad par 'gyur// thugs kying/ tshig nyams pa na// rang gi tshel bar chod 'ong // mdzod rgyu gzer na zhing 'bog/ spyi yi dam tshig nyams pa na// rtag
262b6(rnying rgyud): par bsgrubs kyang 'grub dus med// rtag par dgra dang mi 'bral lo// yang ni lha dbang rgya byin nyon// dam tshig bsrung ba'i yon tan la// gtso bo phyag na rdo rje yi// sku yi dam tshig ma nyams na// bla med byang chub
262b7(rnying rgyud): go 'phang 'thob/ gsung gi dam tshig ma nyams na// phyag na rdo rje'i zhal mthong nas// rdo rje'i ngag la dbang thob 'gyur// thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams na// phrin las rnam bzhi mngon du 'grub/ 
262b8(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma rnams mngon du 'khol// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul bsams pas 'grub// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo yi// sku yi dam tshig ma nyams na// lha srin pho mos phyag byed te// 'dod pa'i khams
263a1(rnying rgyud): sa rgyal srid 'jog// gsung gi dam tshig mnyams na// sngags bzlas mkha' 'gro mngon du'ong // ba cad med par dngos grub ster// zugs kyi dam tshig mnyams/ 
263a2(rnying rgyud): na bdud dang dgra yis mi tshugs shing / rtag tu rims nad mi 'byung zhing / dag rnam tshe 'ad pa yi// lha mi yongs kyis bkur bar 'gyur// tshe rang nor dang ldan par 'gyur// de nas nag mo re ma ti'i// sku'i dam tshig
263a3(rnying rgyud): mnyams na// 'khor ni bkra shis dang cing rgyas// dgra dang bgegs rnams lung bar byed// gsung gi dam tshig ma nyams na// bu dang chung mdar ba dang // nor dang longs spyod rgyas
263a4(rnying rgyud): par 'gyur// mig rnon rkang mgyogs ro langs 'grub// thugs dkyi dam tshig mnyams na// tshe ring grags pa thob pa dang / da lus la chad kyis mi thebs shing // sems la sdug bsngal med
263a5(rnying rgyud): bar 'gyur/ athun la chen po thob par 'gyur// spyi mi sa tshigs nyams na// gtsa phyag na rdo dang // wan ga meng ba g.yog sus ga tu bdag dang mi 'phral lo// 
263a6(rnying rgyud): ji ltar 'dod pa'i don de 'grub// gang ltar mngag po'i las de byed// mkha' 'gro me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las// dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// 
263a7(rnying rgyud): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dbul phyag na rdo rje la 'di gad ces gsol to// du mdzad cu'i rgyal ba / rdo rje gakhang 'gro drong chang mtshan mthong// ces nus pa sa/ 
263a8(rnying rgyud): dngal phyag na rdo rje ka' phrul pa/ skyes bu sgo ldan san ngag rgyal can gyis// gas sngags ti dzin phyag rgyar rab ldanan// rdo rjes kha' 'phro brub dgas 'di ltar 'byung// grub dgas phyi/ 
263b1(rnying rgyud): gsang ba gsum du bshad// nang gi grub rtags mig dang rna ba dang // sna dang lce dang lus dang snying la 'byung // gal te mig gis srid pa gsum mthong na// gtso bo phyag na rdo rje'i mtshan ma yin/ 
263b2(rnying rgyud): mig gis lha mo mthong na lha mo yin// mig ni 'dang zhing 'gul na ram ti// rna bas srid pa gsum po thos na rdo rje 'dzin// mkhar 'gros gtam zer thos na lha mos bstan// bud med 'jug sgra sgrogs nam
263b3(rnying rgyud): ti sAl ga bur dron rdorje rje 'dzin// ku mu ta ye drin lha mo nyid // spos samagur gum dron rem ti// lce la dam chos 'chad na rdo rje 'dzin// lce la gsang sngags blag na l+h+wam
263b4(rnying rgyud): yim legs nyes mtshan ma sman ra ma ti// lus ni 'khrin phyag na rdo rje yin// lus la 'od 'byung ba ni lha mo'i rtags// lus po 'ang Tam skyi sha bung ba dang // sha rtsa 'gul na re ma ti yi btags// glal
263b5(rnying rgyud): lam skrag cing mchi ma 'ong ba na// lha mo dpon g.yog yog phebs pa yin// gal te snying gis skye ba dran pa na/ phyag na rdo rje'i dngos grub mtshan ma'o// snying ni dga'
263b6(rnying rgyud): la tshig na rje mo yin// snying 'di khril 'jig na khol mo yin// da ni gsang ba grub rtags bstan par bya// sngags dang ting 'dzin nus pa skyes tsam na// rdo rje dbus kyi rtsa yi nam mkha' la
263b7(rnying rgyud): byang chub sems kyi dga' bde skye ba na// mkha' 'gro rtsa la rang la shar bar bshad// da ni phyi yi grub rtags bstan par bya// phyi yi rtags ni rab 'bring tha ma gsum// rab ni lha mo nyid kyi sku
263b8(rnying rgyud): mthong ste nam mkha'i dbus su phyag na rdo rje mthong // bud med dkar mo gzhad cing byung ba na// gsang ba'i ye shes dngos grub gter ba'o// nag mo ral pa can du byung ba na// 'dod
264a1(rnying rgyud): khams 'dul ba'i mthu rtsal dngos grub bdag la ster// dmar mo bse yi ral pa can du byung ba na/ 'jig rten dbang du sdud pa'i dngos grub ste/ 
264a2(rnying rgyud): ser mo thod pa'i phreng ba can du byung ba na// tshe dang longs spyod rgyas pa'i grub pa ster// mkha' 'gro grub rtags 'bring po ni// rdo rje nam mkha' las dbab gtso bo yin// rje mo lha mo dung skyong / 
264a3(rnying rgyud): grub rtags la// rdzas lud dang ni mun pa shin tu nag/ me tog char 'bab 'brug dang rlung dmar dang // bud med gzugs dang gzha 'tshon ston pa'o// khol mo re ma ti'i grub rtags na/ 
264a4(rnying rgyud): 'brug dang rlung dmar sgo rdung khang thog 'tshog/ thibs thibs gnan dang thol thol smra ba'o// grub rtags tha ma rmi lam dag du ston// byang chub sems dpa' rmis na gtso bo yin// 
264a5(rnying rgyud): ma dang sring mo rmis na jo mo yin// chung mkhol mo rmis nas/ yog mo yin// bong bu sha ba rmis na rje mo yin// dri'u/ dang bya nag rmis na khol mo yin/ ma mo grub nas dbang du
264a6(rnying rgyud): 'dus pa na// bud med dag gis bdag la phyag 'tshal na// 'dzum zhing 'khrig go byed pa spyod pa yin// ma mo grub nas dbang du ma 'dus na// mi sdug gzugs su ston zhing rje mar rdzu// gcan
264a7(rnying rgyud): gzan zar 'ong ma mo byag sngags so// dam tshig nyams nas ma mo 'khrugs gyur na// ma ma~M nang 'thab mtshon gyi char ba 'bab// bya nag nang 'thabs khrag ni ni bun 'khrigs// lngas de mthong na
264a8(rnying rgyud): bka' chad 'ang ba'i rtags// gal te ste lur dag po la sogs pa'o// dang khri rnams kyis bsgrub par bar gcod na// grang la 'khrigs shing khyim du 'gro snying 'dod// khakhA sma ni 'dod la tshwa
264b1(rnying rgyud): zhing 'tshig 'bud med rkub dang mo mtshan sngon 'chi// gal te gtor ma dus las yol ban// mo mtshan dang ni sngon gyi dbang rtags ston// dub 'khrigs nas bud med glal ba mthong // bu tse/ 
264b2(rnying rgyud): du ba mthong na nyams pa gnod// mig ni btsums pa ting nge 'dzin yal ba'i rtags// thal mo rdeb na dam tshig ma tshang zer// lce rtse ston na snying po chad pa yin// so sgra 'khrig na gzhan dang 'thab
264b3(rnying rgyud): memo 'ong rgod pa thos na dgra bgegs bsgral ba'i rtags// khron bar chad 'ong ba sgron pa yin// sbyor bar byed na dngos grub gter ba yin// rgyang glu len pa mthong na grub thag ring // mchi ris
264b4(rnying rgyud): ngo la yod na rims nad 'ong // gar thobs byed cing byung na ci bsam 'grub// gling bu 'bud pa mthong na gtor ma 'dod pa yin/ phreng ba bgrang ba mthong na sbyin sreg 'dod pa yin// kha la 'o byed
264b5(rnying rgyud): sbyor ba 'dod pa yin// bong bu zhon pa rmis na rje mo yin// dre'u zhon pa rmis na khol mo yin// sti sbams thogs pa mthong na rang la chags// g.yab dang thogs pa mthong
264b6(rnying rgyud): norang la chags pa'o// me long thogs pa mthong na chung ma'i lus la chags// stang bstabs byed pa slob ma'i lus la chags// bya dang gcan gzan gtor ma za ba bzang // kha rog 'dug na snying po phyag
264b7(rnying rgyud): rgya nom 'dzum pa mthong na bdag nyid tshe ring brtags// gos la me rag yod na slob ma nyams// sha bzhon na nor rnams 'phel ba'i rtags// ma mo grub pa'i brtags rnams gang byung
264b8(rnying rgyud): yang 'de nas grub rtags bzang po mthong ban// bdud rtsi bum pa'i phyag rgya bcas la ni// dngos grub blangs pa'i sngags ni bzlas byas la// snying la ci 'dod pa yi dngos grub blang // ma dang sring
265a1(rnying rgyud): mo zol mo dmal gdags// mtshan ma ngan pa dag ni mthong ban// mtshan mngan pa bzlog par tri shul phyag rgya bca'// mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog pa sngags kyis brjon/ 
265a2(rnying rgyud): gal te bdag ni gzhan du don gnyer na// bud med lag na rdzas ni gang ba thogs// bya dang gcan gzan sngon du 'gro na bzang // de tshe gtor ma 'dul la don la 'gro// spyad stong thogs pa mthong na don mi gnyer/ khrub
265a3(rnying rgyud): pa'i drod chang rnal 'byor skyil ces// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ drod tshad bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas dpal
265a4(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rje la/ lho'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// thabs dang shes rab mnga' mdzad rdo rje 'dzim/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro bsgrubs kyang ma grub na// spobs shing gnad la
265a5(rnying rgyud): dbab par zhu ces gsol ba dang / dpal ldan phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// skyes bu ting 'dzin rdo ldan rtsal can gyis// / rdo rje mkha' 'gro mo'i gsang sngags gtsor blangs te// gang
265a6(rnying rgyud): 'dod dngos grub mi thob ma srid do// 'on kyang bsgrub thag ring ba na// de la nyis dmigs rnam pa bzhi// sngon gyi las 'phros me'abrel dang // bstan pa zhag grangs nyungs pa dang // bgags
265a7(rnying rgyud): kyis par du gcid pa dang // rnal 'byor dam tshig nyims pa bzhi// bsgrub pag rang ba'i rgyu ba ni yin// de bzhin pa ngan sangs gzung ste// snron gyi las 'bros pa 'bre na// bsgrubs pa
265a8(rnying rgyud): rim gru batshan ma med// bzlas brjid bsnyen pa grangs nyungs na// gru dgasa'ong zhing las minyan// bgegs kyis par du gcod pa na// sring mi dga' la khronang 'jigs// rnala'i byang da kyi
265b1(rnying rgyud): nyams pa na// bar chod rkyen dbang drag po 'byung // 'on kyang mi gnag bsgyur zhing bsgrub// sngon gyis las 'phros ma 'brel na// dang por bsnyen pa yun rings la// de nas gnad la dbab pa ni
265b2(rnying rgyud): bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor byang shar du// dur khrod sa la grub gsum dkyil// 'phang du khru gang yod pa brtsig/ mi yi khrag gis chag chag gdab// de nas zhing sogs g.yas pa la// lha mo nyid kyi sku
265b3(rnying rgyud): bris la rgyus pa'i gzungs thag snying khar gdags// gru gsum steng du gan rkyal gnan// gzungs thag rtse mo sos gzungs la// hUM mdzad chen por gsal bsgoms la// ma mo gsod pa'i
265b4(rnying rgyud): snying po bzlas rag mo tsi ta rak+ta sti ra ti ti mA ra ya hUM dza/ de skad gsang sngags bzlas nas ni// ma mo'i snying khra/ dag rngub par bsgom// ma mo bong bur bcas pa rnams// mthang
265b5(rnying rgyud): bzhin du 'gyel bar bsam// de nas snying khar rdog pas gnan/ tsi ta dz+wa la re zhes pas// bdag gis zhal nas me byung bas// ma mo thul gyis bgegs par bsam// ma mo'i sa
265b6(rnying rgyud): zin mo nag mo// bdag gi zhabs 'og rgyud pa las// ma ma ru lu zhes brjod pa las// bdag nyid dpal gyi zhabs 'og nas// lha mo nus pa'i thong phreng can// thal mo sbyar nas 'dug par bsgom
265b7(rnying rgyud): rtamagrin phyag rgyas dbang du bsdu// khyung gshog phyag rgyas zil gnan nas// gnad la dbab pa'i dam rdzas bsreg/ de ltar lan cig bsad pa des// gzugs ni rdog pa'i 'og nas dbyung // byangs
265b8(rnying rgyud): mjams su bzhug su gsol// smes bshegs bya zhing gdung glu blangs// bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga yis gso// mtshang nas 'bru zhing gnang nas bskul// de nas bsgrub pa bskyal la brtsam// the tshom med
266a1(rnying rgyud): par 'grub par 'gyur// bsnyen pa zhag grangs nyungs pa na// mi rus sam ni ru rag sha/ lung thang dag gi phreng ba la// ma yengs grangs kyi bsnyen pa ni// 'bum tshe bdun
266a2(rnying rgyud): du bzlas kyang rung // yang na mtshan ma'i bzlas pa shig/ bgegs kyis bar du gcod pa na// gru gsum e dong nag po brko// mi khyi bag gi chag chag gdab// khams rdza yi ling ga la// snying khar dam srig
266a3(rnying rgyud): ming bris la/ rabs chad nag po'i thod par gzhug/ thod pa dong gi nang du gzhug/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom// dam sri bkug cing bstim byas la// mi rus sor brgyad phur pa yis// 
266a4(rnying rgyud): mi g.yo mgon por gsal bsgom gdab// mtshan ma ngan pa bzlog sngags bzlas// de brting rdo ba nag po la// ri rab rdo rje rgya gram bri// 'brug khung de yi kha bcad la// de gting sku gdung
266a5(rnying rgyud): nag po rtsig de ni dam sri gnan par bshad// rnal 'byor dam tshig/ nyams pa la// mkha' 'gro ma yi chad pa 'byung // nyams tshad/ chen bskang tshad che// bsgrub pa grub rtags med pa dang // rang nyi
266a6(rnying rgyud): srog la 'bab pa'o// nyams pa 'bring gi bka' chad ni// 'khor la rkyen dang rims nad 'byung // nyams pa tha ma'i bka' chad ni// dgra dang nor la gong ka 'byung // de nas nyams pa bskang ba ni// gtor ma khri dang
266a7(rnying rgyud): sbyin sreg khri de bzhin ra tsa gsum gyis bskang // des kyang skongs par mi 'gyur na// dang po mkha' lding gsum gyis bskang // de nas shel nag gsum gyis bskang // bka' chad 'bring po byung ba na// gtor ma stong/ 
266a8(rnying rgyud): dang sbyin sreg stong // mkha' lding gnyis dang sbyinag gnyis// de bzhin ra tsa gnyis kyis bskang // mdangs kyi mar me bco brgyad dbul// bka' chang tha ma byung ba na// gtor ma brgya dang sbyin sreg brgya// mkha'
266b1(rnying rgyud): lding gcig dang shel nag gcig/ ra tsa gcig gis bskongs par bshad// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las spogs shing thugs dam bskong ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum
266b2(rnying rgyud): pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// drag po dpal 'bar gnod sbyin khros pa'i gtso/ 
266b3(rnying rgyud): rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dngos grub bsgrub 'dod pas// rtag tu bsten pa rdo rje 'dzin pas bshod// ces gsol pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// nyon cig mkha' 'gro rtag tu bsten pa ni// dang po grub
266b4(rnying rgyud): cing mtshan ma thob pa ces// de nas phyi nang gsang ba gsum du ba/ desten// dpon mo'i phyi'i rten ni rma bya bo// rma bya'i snying kha/ ra b+h+yo las lha mo bskyed// khol mo'i phyi yi rten ni bya nag mo// snying la
266b5(rnying rgyud): b+h+yo las re ma ti bskyed la// rma bya de mo nag gam shel nag la// sna la ma mo dpon g.yog legs par dbab// de nas phyi nang gas nga ba'i dbang bskur la// dus su gtor mas mchod rten nang du gzung // 
266b6(rnying rgyud): nang gi rten ni sku dang gsang mtshan no// rang gi gzugs dang gsang mtshan kha sprad la// bar du ru ti rdo rje pad+ma mi// gsang ba ga bur stsal te lus la bsrel// gsang ba'i rten ni lhan cig grub pa'i lha/ 
266b7(rnying rgyud): gsang ba ye shes thig le ma mor blta'o// de nas rtag tu sngags dang phyag brgya dang // ting 'dzin rdzas dang dam tshig mi spong ngo // rtag tu zas kyi phud kyis bsten par bshad// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las
266b8(rnying rgyud): ma mo rtag tu bsten pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje la/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye dpal 'bar che gyi
267a1(rnying rgyud): nyim stong gi gzi// rdo rje lha mo mkha' 'gro ma dpal gyi lha mo yi// pra rtags dpab dang slob ma dbang bskur ba'o// ma mo dbab pa'i gsang sngags bdag la shod ces gas/ 
267a2(rnying rgyud): ba dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ lha mo 'bebs shing slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// slob dpon nyid kyis ma mo grub pa ces// de nas ma mo grub pa'i slob dpon des// dur khrod chen por zhag bdun
267a3(rnying rgyud): bsnyen pa bya// sngags dang man ngag rdzas su ldan par bya// nga la rang lam mo pheb par dbab// de nas slob ma dkyil 'khor 'jug pa dang // me tog dor dang lha ngo bstan bya dang // dang po phyag na rdo rje'i dbang bzhi
267a4(rnying rgyud): bskur dang po rdo rje rje lnga 'bar ba'i dbang // gnyis pa shes rab dril bu dag gi dbang // de bzhin gsum pa la ning dbu rgyan te// bzhi pa rigs lnga ye shes lnga yi bang // de nas
267a5(rnying rgyud): lha me nag mo'i dbang bani bskur// dang po la ni thod pa'i dang // gnyis pas shes rab ral gris dbang bskur te// gsuM ma bal na ne'u le'i rgyal bu'o// de bzhin bzhi pa dpa'
267a6(rnying rgyud): sbyin de nas re ma ti yi dbang bzhi bskur// dang po dur khrod ga yang gzhi'i dbang // gnyis pa rdo rje rnam ru'i dbang // gsum pa kha rje bdud kyi khram pa ma dbang // de bzhin bzhi ba cu khri gdod pa da / sa
267a7(rnying rgyud): ni bskur ba'i sngags kyang bzlas par bya// bcu gnyis rim pa sngon du rjes pa dang // sku dang gsung gi dam tshig 'jog par bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i dbang la 'jug par bya ste// dbang po bram ba rgyal rigs rje'u rigs kyi/ 
267a8(rnying rgyud): bumi brgyad dang bu drug gi gus// mig gi dkyus rings spobs la nus rgyas// sgra bobangs so dka/  ut+pal bri// de la khrus byas me tog gser gyis brgyan// dbang po lnga la bdu rtsi dag gis ga ga sa
267b1(rnying rgyud): bar phyag na rdo rje'i gsang sngags bri// de yi snying khar lha mo'i snying po la// lte ba re re ma ti yi snying po bri// sman lnga bdud rtsi lnga yi zas byin la// gsang ba'i pad+mar ru hu rdo rje bskul// de nas bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor
267b2(rnying rgyud): nub phyogs su// dbang bskur stegs bu zlum po dmar po brtsig/ de yi steng du bu mo de bzhag la// phyogs mtshams kun tu tshil dang lcong zi bsreg/ steng 'og kun tu zhing gi bla re gdan// mdun dang rgyab du gto/ 
267b3(rnying rgyud): mi sbyin/ de nas ma mo'i snying po 'bum du gdon// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gu ru yis// / Dam ru rdung zhing ma mo drag du bod// srog snying drang zhing g.yab dar g.yab// de nas bu mo de la sems gtad la/ 
267b4(rnying rgyud): sngags 'di bzlas shing gdong tu rtag tu blta/ bu mo ma yengs/ des le bsgom du bzhug/ oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM sa ma ya pra thA ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me sa ma ya pra thA/ khu mun+ta pra ma ya ma
267b5(rnying rgyud): tiSh+Tha pra yo ga sid+d+hi sa ma ya pra thA A be sha A// drag tu ma mo bskul zhing dbab par bya'o// phebs par dka' na gdan la 'bebs rdza sa bsreg/ lan gsum ma mo 'bum gyis nges par phebs// bzang
267b6(rnying rgyud): ngan legs zhes mtshan mthol thol smra'o// yang na mi smra bar yeng phebs par byed// de nas bu mo de'i lus po la// spos dang me tog mar me dri chab kyis// dang po la ni ma'i mchod pa bya// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga dang
267b7(rnying rgyud): bza' btung gis// de nas gnyis pa nang gi mchod pa dbul// gsang ba'i mchod pa khu ba'i thig le des// dang pos gtso bo rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod// gnyis pas lha mo dpon g.yog mchod par bya// gsum
267b8(rnying rgyud): pas khu ba bdag btung dngos grub blang // gzungs ma mkha' 'gro yin par nges bskyed la/ gzungs ma'i lce la gzhag la dam tshig bsre// de nas thig le slob ma'i lce la gzhag/ de nas ma mo thugs kyi
268a1(rnying rgyud): dbang sbyin no// de nas bu mo de'i mdun du ni// dbang gi rtag su zla kham dmar po brtsig/ de nas slob ma stegs bu'i kha la gzhag/ mkha' 'gro kun la sbyin sreg gtor ma dbul// 
268a2(rnying rgyud): de nas bu mo shes rab ma de yis// ma mo 'dod kyi slob ma de la gdab// ma mo bskul ba'i rdzas rnams bsreg par bya// phyi dang nang gi drod tshad mtshan ma dbab// mtshan ma phebs nas thugs kyi dam tshig dbab// dam tshig
268a3(rnying rgyud): bsre ba'i gsang ba'i dbang bskur ro// des ni mkha' 'gro mngon du 'grub par bshad// ma mo mkha' 'gro thugs kyi gsang rgyud 'di dbang dang dam tshig med pa'i slob ma la// tshig gcig bstan yang tshe'i 'du byed skul// myur du shi nas
268a4(rnying rgyud): rdo rje dmyal bar skye// de bas dbang bskur gnang ba thob la sbyin par bshad// mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ dbang bskur ba'i lce da'u ste bco lnga pa'o// 
268a5(rnying rgyud): de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di/ skad ces gsol to// kye ma phyag na rdo rje che// ngo mtshar byin gyi brlabs kyi mchog/ lha mo grub pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// las kyi rim
268a6(rnying rgyud): pa bshad du gsol// ces gsol pa dang / dpal rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha'i dbang po brgya byin nyon// lha mo'i grub pa thob pa'i rnal 'byor pas// so so'i las la ched du ma brtsams
268a7(rnying rgyud): kyang yid la ci 'dod bsams pa rtsam gyis 'grub// 'on kyang ched du sgrub pa rtsom pa na// las kyi bye brag dam pa ngas bshad do// ma mo grub pa rnams kyis bya ba yin// dang po'i las can rnams kyis mi brtsam
268a8(rnying rgyud): mo brgya byin nyon cig/ zhi ba'i las kyi khyad par ni// bu ram sbrang rtsi 'gi wa nga dang // gu gul spos dang 'o ma dang // mar khu til dang 'bras chen dang // a ga ru dang du ru ska// gang la bya ba'i ming dang bcas// 
268b1(rnying rgyud): ri lu khri cho gcig byas la// zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po dang // 'o ma yod pa'i shing brtsigs la// mkha' 'gro ma rnams dkar po la// bdud rtsi'i bum pa thogs nas kyang // gang la bya ba'i spyi bo nas// dbang bskur lus po ni// 
268b2(rnying rgyud): bar bsgom// me sbar ri lu rim gyis bsreg/ gong ma'i srog snying bzlas shing 'bul// srog gi snying po'i gzhug rgyan du// shan ting ku ru swA hA bzlas// 'bum tsho bzhi ru bzlas byas la// bdud dang bgegs rnams
268b3(rnying rgyud): zhi ba dang / 'dagra dang nad yams zhi bar byed// rgyas pa'i las su bya ba ni// gu gum sta rga'i dgun 'bru dang // ut+pal mar khu 'gi wang dang // bdud rtsi lnga dang dpag bsam shing // gang la bya ba'i ming dang bcas/ 
268b4(rnying rgyud): khri tshe gnyis kyi ri lu bya// rgyas pa'i thab khung gru bzhi pa// 'bras bu yod pa'i shing brtsigs la// gtso bo phyag na rdo rje dang / da mkha' 'gro ma kun ser po la// rin chen mdzod dang bum pa thogs// gang
268b5(rnying rgyud): la bya ba'i snying kha ru// dbang bskur phung po rgyas par shog/ me sbar ri lu rim gyis 'bul// oM tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ kha mun tra ba tra ba ta trag rag mo puSh+Ti ku ru swA hA/ 'bum tsho brgyad du bzlas
268b6(rnying rgyud): ba bya tshe dang rigs rgyud 'phel bar byed// nor dang longs spyod 'phel bar 'gyur// dbang gi las su bya ba ni// sbrang rgod ra khrag chad dang chab tshan dang // khug chos lug mig pa dang ni// yung dang gla rtsi lcong zhun dang / 
268b7(rnying rgyud): nya sha mar khu rgya skegs ni// ri lu khri tshe gsum byas la// dbang gi thab khung zla gam la// tsher ma can gyi shing brtsigs la// gtso dang 'khor gyi ma mo kun// mdog dmar lcags kyu thogs pa yis// gang la
268b8(rnying rgyud): bya ba bkug par bsgom// me sbar ri lu rims kyis bsreg/ oM tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ pa tsa la a shug me pra ma ma hA sti pra che ge mo a kar sha man ya hri dza/ 'bum tsho bcu drug bzlas pa na// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal
269a1(rnying rgyud): po dang // stag dang glang po nor bu dang // 'gro ba bzang dang blon po dang // dmag mi dang ni lha mi dang // klu dang gnod sbyin bu mo dang // kun kyang bdag gi dbang du 'gyur// bsreg pa'i/ 
269a2(rnying rgyud): las su bstan pa ni// drag po'i mthab gru gsung du// dug shing tsher ma'i me bus la// rta dang mgrin ring ba dang tshil// khwa yi sgo dang thar nu'i ching // gang la bya ba'i ming dang bcas// 'bum tshe du ni bzlas pa/ 
269a3(rnying rgyud): byarlung gi dkyil 'khor steng du ni// rlung gi rnga mo sngon mo bskyon// de steng gang la bya ba skyon// re ma ti las sna nas khrid// lha mo nag mos phyi nas ded// phyag na rdo rjes rgyab nas phul// dpag tshad brgyad
269a4(rnying rgyud): khrir bskrad par bsam// snying po bzlas shing yas stags pas gra/ snying po tha ma skrod ces bskul// yul nas 'byung zhing la khyams par nus// phaT tsa ba la a shug me// s+phar na ma yaM phaT phaT
269a5(rnying rgyud): skrod cig/ dbye ba'i las su bstan pa ni// rta g.yag bya rog 'ug/ pa'i sha/ btsan dug skye che spyang ki'i tshol// mdza' bo gnyi/ sa kyi ming bcas la// tsher ma'i shing la me bus la// 'bum tshe
269a6(rnying rgyud): gcig tu bstabs pa bya// srog gi snying po'i mtha' bar ni// ma ma trog rag sha ru tra ma ra ya hUM phaT/ ga tsa phaT zhes ni bzlas pa bya// the tsom med par dbye bar nus// bud med 'gugs pa'i sbyor ba ni// lan tsha
269a7(rnying rgyud): rgya skyegs rdo sol dang // lcong zi bu ram nya sha dang // sbrang rtsi mngal khrag khu ba dang // gang la bya ba'i ming ngam skra// ri lu rgya rtsa brgyad byas la// seng ldeng me la bsreg par bya// dub byung na 'dod chags lang/ 
269a8(rnying rgyud): mi 'bar nas zhugs par byed// sngags ni mkha' 'gro'i snying pos bya// tha mdud med 'dis khrug bya// des ni zi tsom med par nus// lkugs par bya ba bstan pa ni// khams pa'i rjes la dgrag drug
269b1(rnying rgyud): bya// lug gi rkan la ming bris la// de yi snying khar gzhug par bya// kha yi nang du na mgo gzhug/ kha ni tshe rams rab tu gtur// gzugs ni khyi mgo'i khar gzhag la// khyi'i mgo spyang ki'i rgyus pas bris// 
269b2(rnying rgyud): gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// oM badz+ra tsaN Da ro Sha Na hUM/ re ma ti che ge mo bag sha hUM/ sos par byan slar la bshig/ gal tam bshig mnan na ni// ma shi'i bar du kha 'thams so// spro ba'i
269b3(rnying rgyud): lus su bya ba ni// btsan dug ldong ros sbrul nag go// sdig pa'i rwa dang bye'u chung ro// gang la bya ba'i ming dang bcas// de nyid kyi ni gan su bsreg/ che ge mo sha trun na sha pra ma ya hUM phaT/ thi tshom
269b4(rnying rgyud): med par 'bog cing spro// rengs par bya ba bstan pa ni// dri rgod do// sregs rus pa dang // a pra nag po'i 'bras bu dang // dmas rigs khyim kyi dud pa dang // byi la'i sha dang bcan dug dang // phabra
269b5(rnying rgyud): dang sug pa gu gul nag po dang // phye ma dag tu rab sbyang la// snga gas ni 'bum du bzlas pa dang bya// oM pa Ni badz+ra ma hA ka li tsa pa la hUM/ s+pho ta grum sngo sreng hUM hUM hUM/ de rnams kyi ni phye ma de/ 
269b6(rnying rgyud): gang la gtor bas rengs par nus// rang lus sba ba'i sbyor ba ni// khA ta nag po'i tshang shing la// ut+pal nag po'i bu bas byug/ bram ze'i go ro tsa nas bsku// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus su gzugs/ 
269b7(rnying rgyud): phyag na rdo rje'i snying po bzlas// de nas na pun bu mo bdun// srin bal nang du dril la bzhag/ lha mo dpon g.yog snying po bzlas// srin bal thum po shing la gdags// mi mthong bar lus la btsa'// bdag
269b8(rnying rgyud): ni sus kyang mi mthong ngo // nyon cig lha dbang brgya byin nyon// bstan pa gnyen po bshig pa dang // rdo rje slob dpon brnyas pa dang // gsad pa'i sbyor ba rab tu bshad// rje mos gsad pa'i las bzhi dang // khol
270a1(rnying rgyud): mo nag mo'i thun drug ni// nga gsungs pa la the tsom med// gsad pa'i las bzhi bstan pa ni// dang por khrag nad dbab pa dang // gnyis pa rims nad dbab pa dang / 
270a2(rnying rgyud): gsum pa tsha ba 'brum nag 'bar// bzhi pa snying gzer 'bar ba'o// nad gzhi gang 'dod 'bar bas bsad// khrag nad dag gis dgra gsad na// ro tshas ras la ling ga bri// tsha ba gsum gyi khu bas bska// bzlas pa bya
270a3(rnying rgyud): zhing gtor ma btang // phebs par gdab cing bskul bar bya// oM badz+ra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ ai ru ru tiSh+Tha ba to si/ ru ru be ro ru be tiSh+Tha ba to si/ tsi ba la a shug me/ che ge mo rag ta ro ge nag ma ra ye hUM phaT/ khri tsha
270a4(rnying rgyud): gcig tu bzlas byas la// ling ga gtor mar dbul bar bya// khrag nad kyis ni 'chi bar 'gyur// da ni rims nad dbab pa bshad// btsan dug mda' dug rgya gzer khrag/ chang dang lo dug khrag dang bzhi// thod pa
270a5(rnying rgyud): dum bu brgyad par stsal// zhing ras dag gis kha bcad la// sngags/ 'di sum 'bum bzlas pa bya// oM badz+ra tsaN Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM/ ru/ ru be tiSh+Ta ba tau si/ ru ru ro ru ho ru Sh+Ta ba to si/ tsa pa la a
270a6(rnying rgyud): shug me hUM bya had mi ro ge nag a be sha ya/ ma ra ya phaT/ rang nyid khros pa'i cha lugs bya// dgra yi phyogs su mtshan mo gtor// rims nad dag gis phung bar nus// tsha ba'i nad kyis gsad pa ni// rabs chad
270a7(rnying rgyud): nag po'i sha khrag dang // bya rog 'ug pa'i sha tshil dang // seng stag bya rgod lhung ka'i steng // rta na gar rog phag gi snying // spyang mo'i snying dang rme gri'ig/ lcong zhun dang ni 'gi wang sbyar// dug dang khrag
270a8(rnying rgyud): kyang bsres byas la// ri lu khri tsho bzhi byas la// ma tang nag po'i zhal bcas la// ma tang de'i kha nang du// dug shing nag po'i hom sbar te// rdo rje mkha' 'gro dpon g.yog kyang // nag mo ral ba rngam pas
270b1(rnying rgyud): can/ lag na ral gri thogs pa yi// dgra sha bcad cing za bar bsgom// ri lu re dang dgra ming re// bsdebs shing bsregs pa'i las bya'o// ma mo bskul ba'i rdzas re bsreg/ nag mo chen mo'i dmod pa ni// oM badz+ra
270b2(rnying rgyud): tsanaDa ma hA mo ra Na hUM/ ru ru be tiSh+Tha ba to si/ ru ru ro ru be tiSh+Tha ba to si/ tsa ba la a shug me/ ma ma sarba sha truM a mu ka shri kra ma ma ra na/ dz+wa la ram tsi te dz+wa la dzi bai ru ti ri ma ra ya na sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas thal ban/ 
270b3(rnying rgyud): khung gnan// tsha ba'i nad la the tshom med// snying gzer 'bar bas dgra gcad na// lcags sam dug shing phur bu la// lus la bcangs la bsnyen pa dbul// spyi bor phyag na rdo rje bsgom// rkeng par lha mo nag mo
270b4(rnying rgyud): bsgom// rtse mor re ma ti yang bsgom// logs la 'khor gyi ma mo bsgom// ki la ya la bsgom pa rnams// sku stong rgyan dang lag char nga ldan// rked par zhe sdang sbrul gyis dkris// sku smad gdug pa'i bu/ 
270b5(rnying rgyud): bu 'bar// lus la bcangs la bsnyen pa dbul// oM badz+ra tsaN+Da ma hA ra/ Sha Na hUM/ ru ru be tiSh+Tha ba to si/ ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha ba to si/ tsu/ pa la a shug me re ma ti badz+ra ki li ki li ya hUM ma ra na hU / 
270b6(rnying rgyud): rtag tu bsnyen pa dbul byas la// gtor ma sbyin bsreg dag gis mchod// de nas dgra yi gzugs byas la// rkang lag dag la btab pa na// snying la btab na 'chi bar byed// snying gzer 'bar ba'i cho ga'o// khal mo nag
270b7(rnying rgyud): mo'i thun drug ni// 'gu li nag mo'i thod pa'i thun// nir ti nag mo mda' yi thun// rag ta nag mo khrag gi thun// tsa ra nag mo sgo nga'i thun// byi sha nag mo dug gi thun// tsi ta nag mo snying gi thun// nag mo'i thun drug
270b8(rnying rgyud): rab bshad bya// 'gu li nag mo'i thod mda' ni// me ro dkris pa'i dkris ma la// dug dang khrag gi snag tsha yis// dbus nas bskor la yi ge bri// oM tsan ra ma hA rau Sha Na hUM/ zhes bya ba dbus su bri/ de yi phyiram
271a1(rnying rgyud): du ru ru be tiSh+Tha bdos/ ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha ba do si/ tsa ba la shug me hU b+h+yo zhes bri/ de'i phyi rim du ru ru be ro ru hUM tiSh+Tha ba dos/ rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma hUM b+h+yo// ma ma trag rag sha kha mun trab trag
271a2(rnying rgyud): trag rag sha tsi tra kha rag ma/ re ma ti sa ma ya ma hA pra ma sti pra dun b+h+yo dzA dzA// ru lu b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes bri/ de'i phyi rim du ma nag mos bskor/ de'i phyi rim du b+h+yos bskor/ de nas sngags kyi 'khor lo de// mnol thod dum bu brgyad par stsal/ 
271a3(rnying rgyud): zod pa de yi nang du ni// baM dang khyi rgyar rog snying // yugs me yi mngal khrag dang // nad gang 'dod pa'i sha rus khrag/ dug sna tshogs dang khrag sna tshogs// chang dang sbyar la thod par byug/ thod pa g.yang bzhi'i steng du gzhag// de rag maH
271a4(rnying rgyud): tita baM dang mkha' 'gro ma la phul nas ni// ske tshe yungs nag thal chen la// sngags 'di bzlas la thod par blug/ oM ru ru be ro ru hUM tiSh+Tha ba ho si/ hUM hUM/ tsi pa la a shug me/ karma de byi mu di ra ga baM hUM hU tsa
