271a5(rnying rgyud): ba la a shug me/ mu ye rak+Sha thum dun nan/ kha rag tsa mun ti hU hU tsa pa la a shug me ar+g+haM ma ra na hU phaT/ sngags de khri tshe thon par+tha tshe// go re tsa nas kha bcad la// dur khrod dag tu gnas dag ste// nam
271a6(rnying rgyud): phyed thod mda' dgra la 'phang // ma mo bskul ba'i dam rdzas bsreg/ de ni phung zhing rlag par byed// nir sti nag mo'i mda' thun ni// mda' sgro bya lhung ka yis sgron// dug shing nag po'i mde'u btsugs la/ bam gyi
271a7(rnying rgyud): snying khrag yug sa'i khrag/ btsan dug yungs dkar skye tshe dang // mi rigs dgu'i so sen dang // bya dang spyang ka'i sder mo dang // tsher ma dgu dang mtshon dpal dgu// dri rgod khrag dang g.yul sprangs// de rnams bsres pa
271a8(rnying rgyud): bye ma la/ ma mo las la bskul ba dang // gnang la dbab pa'i sngags kyis gdab// de yi gting la thun gyi mthu// dme gri nag mo'i zer sngags bzlas// rag mo tso ta mo tsa tsa me b+h+yo// hi lo hi la ma ma b+h+yo// badz+ras kyi
271b1(rnying rgyud): ga srig si hU b+h+yo// badz+ra ma ma ti b+h+yo// de skad sngags ni bzlas nas ni// rdzas dang phur thun mda' sbubs blug/ mda' nyid dug dang khrag gis byug/ dur khrod 'gal ba'i gzhu brdungs la// mde'u yi rtse mo bsreg byas la// mda' de nam
271b2(rnying rgyud): byed dgral 'phong // gang la bya ba gri ru 'chi// rag ta nag mo'i khrag thun ni// mi rtar khyi phag khrag dang // rims nag khrag dang gu gul dang // tsher ma dgu dang mche sder dgu// klu yi chu dang btsan dug dang // rngar gri/ 
271b3(rnying rgyud): 'bum tri nang du stsal// yungs kar dag la thun sngags 'di// bdun khri bzlas la khrag gi nang du blug/ ru ru tsa dug a shu me ba ti ru tra kha shal mo// che ge mo a mu ka rag ta tsa ra nan// ma ra ya ma ra ya ru ti raM/ a kar ShA ya/ 
271b4(rnying rgyud): a hUM phaT/ de skad khrag la sngags bzlas la// ma mo las la debaskul sngags gdab// de nas khrag gi zor mda' de// ro bkris dadag gi 'ur rdor srul// nam phyed dgra la 'phang bar bya'o// des ni
271b5(rnying rgyud): gang la bya ba 'chi// tsar nag mo'i sgong thun ni// bya mo nag mo'i sgo nga wi / spyi bo brtol ba'i sgong stong du// rims kyi khrag dang btsan dug stsal// yungs kar thal chen mtshon dpal la// srog gi snying
271b6(rnying rgyud): 'bum du bzlas// tha mar sgong thun gdab sngags bzlas// kha mur trab trab traka sha rag ma te ke ma dzA dzA// kha rag te kem b+h+yo b+h+yo// de nas sgong kha bcad la// hasta lag par bcug la 'bang // mkhar la brgyab kyang 'jig pa
271b7(rnying rgyud): nus/ dgra la 'phang na the tshom med// byi sha nag mo'i dug thun ni// ma he'i rwa 'am pa men du// mda' dug btsan dug lo dug dang // rims nad khrag dang chang blags la// rA ru nang nyid khar bcug la// dang la mkha'
271b8(rnying rgyud): 'gro'i snying po dang // las la bskul sngags ming dang bcas// de nas dug gi dpal sngags bzlas// hUM ma ti ma ma ru lu ra ga Sha b+ha~M// re ma ti byi shi ma ya sta yag sha kr-i ta che ge mo ma ra ya phaT/ rwa rtse phra mo bcad par ni// dug
272a1(rnying rgyud): gi khub mi mgos gting // mi mgo dug gis khengs tsam na// ma mo bskul ba'i rdzas bsregs la// khyam pas phyag rgya bcas la ni// nab phyed khros te dgral 'ang // the tshom med
272a2(rnying rgyud): par dgra brlag go// tsi ta nag mo'i snying thun ni// spyang gi stag dang sre mong snying // khyi dang bug pa wa yi snying // po rag khrag dang sbrul gyi snying // thod pa'i nang du sAl la ni// dang po'i ma mo dpon g.yog gi/ gnad la bskul ba'i rdza
272a3(rnying rgyud): bzlas shing ma mo bskul ba'i dam rdzas bsregs// de nas snying gi thun sngags ni// trag rag sha tsi ta dung ro ta ma ta s+pha re re b+h+yo// de skad bzlas pa'i snying thun des// grong la brgya kyang bung bar byed// nag mo 'bar ba'i thun
272a4(rnying rgyud): / drug 'dis 'amakhar la brgyab kyang 'jig pa la// g.yul ngo chen por nga nga rgyab kyang zlogs// gzhan gyi byad dang sngags kyang zlogs// dgra dang bgegs la the tshom med// yang ni bshad kyis brgya byin nyon/ bstan
272a5(rnying rgyud): pa gnyen po'i sku dgra la// ltas ngan bya nag dbab pa ste// dang po byan ga bzung byas la// bcu gnyis dbang gi rim pa bskur// de nas bya lam mo dbab// bya de mig rtsa rgod pa dang // skad 'byin gshog pa gdeng
272a6(rnying rgyud): ba na ma mo phebs pa'i rtags yin pas// phyi dang nang gi mchod par bya// phyag rgya dgu ni rab bstan la// dbang bskur dam tshig sbyin par bya// de nas ma mo bskul sngags bzlas// las la bskul ba'i dam rdzas bsreg// sngags
272a7(rnying rgyud): 'dis byede s+phar la gtang // oM kA rag sha tsi ta kha rag ma tsi ta tu tung dza sha yu ta ti b+h+yo/ re ma ti rag Sha sa ru lu ru lu pra ma ma hA sti pra dung b+h+yo// kar ma sa ma ya b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo zhes gtang ngo // des ni bya nag gang du smos par 'gro'o// 
272a8(rnying rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i las kyi rgyud las/ so so ma mo'i bye brag bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ dpal phyagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces
272b1(rnying rgyud): gsol to// kye rigs sngags gsang sngags bdag po gsang dbang po// phyag na rdo rje thig le bstan bsrung ba yi don du// bdud rtsi 'chang bzhin mar me gsod pa yi// skyes bu chen po mnga' bdag bshad du gsol// zhes zhu
272b2(rnying rgyud): pal dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ lnga brgya tha ma me ltar 'bar ba'i tshe// nyams pa gsod pa'i sbyor ba bshad kyis nyon// dang po mkha' 'gro me lce bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor pas// skabasu gsad pa'i las la
272b3(rnying rgyud): 'jug pa ni/ dngal mtshan ma phebs pa'i bsnyen pa bya// gtor ma sbyin bsreg sti ras pu tsa bya// khams rkang rjes dri chus shad la// gang la bya ba'i snying khar ming // dug dang bdud rtsi'i gtor ma'i nang du stsal// de nas ma
272b4(rnying rgyud): mo zhag bdun gdab cing bstab// bskul ba gnad la gdab pa'i dam rdza sa bsreg/ gnad la dbab cing las la bskul sngags bzlas// ting 'dzin khrag 'thung bdud mo'i bar du ni// snying gi 'od zer dag gis drangs
272b5(rnying rgyud): byas te/ bdud rtsi drangs pa'i sbyor ba ston pa ni// gsal ba dngos grub spyi ste log pa yis// gsang sbubs bdud rtsi bdud mo'i zhal dud nga // thugs kyi dkar dmar pad+ma'i sbu gur spro// bdag gi sbubs na thugs
272b6(rnying rgyud): kyi dpa' be'u rgyas// de nas mar me gsad pa'i ting 'dzin ni// bzhis bsdus dbus nas ni las 'od 'bar bas// bdag nyid bdud mo'i rang bzhin gsal ba la// spro ba'i rlung gis mar me gtang nas 'bar// bud pa'i rlung gis
272b7(rnying rgyud): mar me khad kyis gsang // 'dren pa'i rlung gis thig le'i rtse mor drang // dang pos bkrag shor gnyis pas sum cha nyams// gsum pas phyed la bzhi pas sum gnyis med// lnga pas mun khang ltar gyur bdag la gsal/ 
272b8(rnying rgyud): mar me bdud rtsi lo grangs du lon thub// de nas dgra gzugs 'gu ling nag por gzhug/ sau khung nang du rtswang nganang phur bus bskor// nag mo ro zam bal me 'bar ma/ ma bdud rgyal mo lhag pa'i snying rje can// khrag 'thung re mchin
273a1(rnying rgyud): dmod pa ni/ trag rag sha re ma ti sU sa mu ka sa kram ma ran ya ma rag mo ar tsatsa thi gi ma kha la b+h+yo b+h+ya// rag mo tso ta kha rag ma b+h+yo// rag mo tog ma dzaH/ kha le dun b+h+yo// kha rag tigs
273a2(rnying rgyud): dza kha le nun b+h+yo// ma rag thun ma b+h+yo che ge mo ma ra ya hU phuT/ gsang sngags de ni khri tshe gnyis su gdab// yungs kar thal chen dag la sngags la gdag// 'gu ling dur khrod rnying ba'i gting du mnan// gang la bya ba de ni nas
273a3(rnying rgyud): bdun len/ mkha' 'gram mo lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ mar me bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
273a4(rnying rgyud): gsol to// kye bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang // 'khor ba'i rgyun lam/ bcad pa dang // ye shes nus pa bskyed pa'i phyir// thig le ye shes man ngag 'di// snying rje can gyi bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa'i tshe/ 
273a5(rnying rgyud): dpal phyag na rdo rje des gsang ba'i thugs kha nas// ye shes 'byung / zhes bya ba'i 'od zer bkye nas// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis/ 'di/ de ces bka' stsal to// ye shes rdo rje thig le ni// thun mongs ma yin
273a6(rnying rgyud): shes par dka'// don dam kun rdzob gnyis su bshad// don dam kun rdzob spyod yul lo// kun rdzob las kyi phyag rgya dngos// rgyal rigs bu mo de la bsten// rang rig rtsal gyis rlung g.yos te// rlung gi thig le ye shes me// 
273a7(rnying rgyud): rdo rje gsang bas sa bon bskul// rtog med gsang ba'i thig le la// mi bskyod mnyam par sems gtad na// mar me'i rtse mo lta bur brtan// gnas pa'i rtsa yi na mkha' la// srog 'dren thig la bsgoms pa'i tshe// brtan
273a8(rnying rgyud): dang g.yos pa'i dngos po kun// bden gnyis byang chub don gsal nas// dang ba'i tshul gzugs brnyan bzhin// rgyal ba'i go 'bang rang la 'char// mkha' 'gro ma yi rang bzhin grub// lhan cig skyes pa'i/ 
273b1(rnying rgyud): lha mo'i don 'amakha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ ye shes kyi thig le bshad pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des/ dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces
273b2(rnying rgyud): gsol to 'bagegs kyi gtso bo dbang phyug rje// 'gro ba thugs rjes bskyang ba'i phyir// bcu drug rdo rje 'phrul gyi rgyud// dpa' bo chen pos bshad du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa/ ma 'ongs
273b3(rnying rgyud): phyi ma'i sems can rnams// dad dang spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir// rdzu 'phrul bcu drug bshad kyis nyon// dang po'i lha'i rnal 'byor la// drod dang mtshan ma thob par bya// de nas 'phrul la 'jug pa ni// a nu sa ti'i ri lu
273b4(rnying rgyud): sbyar rma ba khrung khrung ne co sha/ nya dang spre'u dang byi la'i sha/ rnga mo khA ta dang pa'i sha/ ne'u le so bya mthing ril sha/ de rnams skams pa'i phye ma dang // bil ba'i shing dang a ru ra// shing tsha sug smel rus sbal rus// ka ka ru
273b5(rnying rgyud): dang me khyer srin// mi rus dang ni phag rgod khrag/ mi rgod skra dang chu glag sgro// de rnams bsres la ri lu bya// sbrang rgod dag gis mgo bsdus la// dur khrod thod pa'i ga bur gsal// phyag na rdo/ 
273b6(rnying rgyud): rje'i snying po dang // ma mo'i srog snying bdun 'bum bzlas// bar bar bram ze'i ma la bsro// de nas sna yi ri lu la// 'od dang me stag 'phros tsam na// zangs sam lcags kyi ga bur stsal// de nas rdo rje mkha' 'gro la// dug
273b7(rnying rgyud): dang khrag gi sbyin sreg 'bul// a pu si ti'i ri lu de// rang gi lce la myangs pa na// rtag tu btsan dug 'thung bar nus// yang na ma mo mkha' 'gro la// so bya rog mo'i sbyin sreg 'bul// a pu si ti'i ri lu de// rkang
273b8(rnying rgyud): pa'i mthing du bskus pa des// chu'i steng du 'gro bar byed/ ma mo mkha' 'gro dpon g.yog la// chang dang bya rgod sbyin sreg 'bul// ri lu yan lag bzhi la sku// bdag ni namakhar dag la 'bur// rdo rje mkha 'gro
274a1(rnying rgyud): mngag la mi sha'i mam bu sbyin sreg dbul// ri lu lce la myangs pa na// skye bas phyi dran par nus// ma mo dag dang mkha' 'grol// mar dang khrag sbyin sreg dbul// ma bus te 'om ru
274a2(rnying rgyud): de/ bud med gang gi dpral bar bskus// des ni bdag gi dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje nag mo chen mo la// chang dang sbrang rgod sbyin sreg 'bul// de nas ri lu mig la bsku// srid pa gsum ka dus gcig mthong // rdo rje mkha' 'gro chen me/ 
274a3(rnying rgyud): lang ar dang khwa ti'i sbyin sreg dbul// ri lu nang ba'i mthil la bsku// nyin gcig dpag tshad brgyad khrir phyin// rdo rje lha mo nag mo la// khrag dang mar khu'i sbyin sreg dbul// ri lus mchan khung gnyis bskus na// rang
274a4(rnying rgyud): lus su kyang mi mthong ngo // dpal ldan lha mo dpon g.yog la// 2das bu bu ram sbyin sreg 'bul// ri lu khong par 'thungs pa na// tshe/ lo stong ni thub par nges// dpal ldan rdo rje lha mo la// 'bru dang mar khu'i
274a5(rnying rgyud): sbyin sreg dbul/ ri lu lus la bsrel ba na// nor gyi gter la spyod par 'gyur// de nas mkha' 'gro ma la ni// til dang mi sha'i sbyin sreg 'bul// a pu si ti'i ri lu de// mi ro sar pa'i khar bcug nas// 
274a6(rnying rgyud): ma mo'i snying po 'bum bzlas na// mi ro langs nas dngos grub gter// gser dang dngul du 'gyur yang rung // yang na de la ral gri sbyin// ci 'dod pho nya'i mngag gzhug byed// phrin las rnam bzhi gang bcol 'grub// rdo rje dpal ldan
274a7(rnying rgyud): lha mo la/ go ro tsa na'i sbyin sreg dbul// ri lu nad pa'i lus la bsku// nad pa rnams ni 'tshe bar byed// yang ni rdo rje lha mo la// chang dang 'gi hang sbyin sreg dbul// ri lu bgyis pa lte bar bsku// srin bu dag ni 'tshe/ 
274a8(rnying rgyud): ba'o rdo rje dpal ldan nag mo la// til mar ske tshe'i sbyin sreg dbul// ri lu me ru bsreg pa na// dgral thog dang ser ba 'bebs// rdo rje lha mo nag mo la// mar dang mu tig sbyin sreg dbul// ri lu dpral ba'i dbyings
274b1(rnying rgyud): bsku/ rgyal po'i chad pa mi 'byung zhing // me dang chus kyang mi tshug so// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma kun la// me tog bu ram sbyin sreg dbul// ri lu lte bar bskus pa na// sbrul dang btsan gyis mi tshug so// byang stems kyang ni bzlog/ 
274b2(rnying rgyud): papar 'gyur/ mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ rdzu 'phrul bcu drug gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa'i nang nas/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin stan las langs te/ 
274b3(rnying rgyud): dpal ldan phyag na rdo rje la bstod pa bcom ldan mgon pa rdo rje 'dzin// sku gsung ye shes lngar ldan lha// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid can// rig sngags gsang sngags dngos po 'dzin// srid pa gsum gyis
274b4(rnying rgyud): bskur ba'i gnas// lha srin brgyad kyis mchod cing bstod// nyon mongs bdud las rnam par rgyal// phyag na rdo rje che la phyag 'tshal bstod// dpal lha mo la dge bcu'i sgo nas bstod pa// brgya byin gyis
274b5(rnying rgyud): bstod pa/ de nas dpal lha mo la lha ma srin sde brgyad kyis so sor da bal lha mo bstod pa/ de nas g.yog mo re ma ti la/ bdu ri ste 'gong nyag gis/ 'dul thabs kyi dbang gis sgo nas bstod pa// 
274b6(rnying rgyud): la dbang bsgyur lha mo dpal 'bar ma// dbang phyug sras mo lha mo gzi ldan ma// sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi gtso mo ste// lha mo re ma til phyag 'tshal stod// bdud las dbang bsgyur bdud mo dpal 'bar ma// 
274b7(rnying rgyud): ri ti 'gong nyag bu mo re ma ti// nag me rtsi dgu gnas kyi gtso mo ste// bdud mo re ma ti la phyag 'tshal bstod// klu la dbang bsgyur klu mo dpal 'bar ma// gtsug na rin chen bu mo yid 'ongs ma// rol mtsho
274b8(rnying rgyud): bdun gyi gnas kyi gtso mo ste// klu mo re ma til phyag 'tshal bstod// gnod sbyin dbang bsgyur gnod sbyin dpal 'bar ma// gang ba bzang po'i bu mo shang ki na// nag tshal dra ba can gyi gtso mo ste// gnod sbyin re ma ti la phyag 'tshal
275a1(rnying rgyud): bstod/ bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas dpal phyag na rdo rje des/ pad+ma'i gdan las sku bzhengs te// 'di skad ces gsol to// sras mchog 'khor gyi dam
275a2(rnying rgyud): pa brgya byin nyon// lha dang lha min mi dang na mkha' lding // bgegs dang gshin rje ma mo dang // sha zo lto 'phye dri za dang // srin po grul bum bdud dam mi// sngags 'chang rnal 'byor gnod sbyin dang // nga yi 'khor rnams rang / 
275a3(rnying rgyud): tunyan par gyis// rangs ni rdo rje ting 'dzin lhun gyis grub// ngas ni mtshan ma 'joms pa'i phyag rgya rnyed// ngas ni thun mong ston pa'i bdud las rgyal// ngas ni snying rjes 'gro kun dge la bkod// ngas ni thabs dang shes
275a4(rnying rgyud): rab kun la byed/ ngas ni rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i gas rgyud 'di// thun mo dang ma yin me lce 'bar ba 'di// ngo mtshar thabs mchog dngos grub dam pa'i gzhi// ngas ni bshad zin khyod la rab tu gtang // skal ldan/ 
275a5(rnying rgyud): dad la brtson 'grus yod la gtad// snying rje gzhol zhing brtul zhug/ sa che la gtad// bden gnyis don rtogs yid rangs brtan lag nga // brnag pa'i gzugs thub snod ldan yongs la gtang // zung zhig rdzo
275a6(rnying rgyud): shig snod ldan rnams la shod// 'di yi don rnams rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// 'dis ni mi nub chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po thob// 'dis ni chos kyi dbang phyug go 'bang thob// 'dis ni yid bzhin rin chen 'bar bathos
275a7(rnying rgyud): 'dis ni ci 'dod thogs med dngos grub thob// blo dman shes chung nyan thos rnams la gsang // log pa'i mthar 'khyams mu stegs can la gsang // dbu rgod mi ma khas bskur ba mkhan la gsang // dad med snying / 
275a8(rnying rgyud): rje spangs pa rnams la gsang // ma rig rmongs pa'i le lo can la gsang // zhes bka' stsal nas/ brgya byin gyis spyi bos blangs so// 'khor la gtad pa'i le'u ste ni buM rtsa gcig pa'o// 
275b1(rnying rgyud): denas lha'i dbang po brgya byin des// dpal phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das lung bstan du gsol// bde bar gshegs pa mkha' 'gro ma lung bstan du gsol// zhes zhus pa dang / 
275b2(rnying rgyud): dpal phyag na rdo rjes bka' stsal pa// mkha' 'gro ma lha mo nag mo 'dis// bskal pa mang po'i sngon rol nas// dus gsum rgyal ba'i zhal mthong ste// dman pa'i zhing 'dir sbrul sku yis// lha mo'i tshul du sku bstan nas/ 
275b3(rnying rgyud): 'gro ba'i don la rab tu brtson// nyon mongs sgrib pa rab tu spangs// da ltar shes bya'i sgrib pa sbyong // de yi khol mo ram ti// smon lam dbang gis 'gro don byed// bsgom pa'i lam la rab gnas nas// da ltar nyon mong/ 
275b4(rnying rgyud): sgrib pa sbyong / 'di nas dus 'di phyi ma'i tshe// mkha' 'a dgro lha mo nag mo 'di// bya shar 'tshams kyi 'jig rten khams// ba ra d+mo rnam par rol pa dang // yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su// pad+man/ 
275b5(rnying rgyud): dpal zhes bya bar ni// ngas ni lha mo lung bstan to// de'i g.yog mo ra ma ti// pad+ma can gyi zhing khams de// bde ba'i byang chu/ ba sems dpa' ni// blo gros pashes gnyen bya bar ni// de 'dir ngas
275b6(rnying rgyud): ni lung bstan no/ mkha' 'gro ma me lce 'bar ba'i rgyud las/ yongasu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// / mchod na rgyal ba rigs lnga
275b7(rnying rgyud): rtag tu mchod// srung na dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad srungs// dag byung lha mo nag mo mtshon char phyung // nyes chung kha 'thab tsam la mtshon mi dbyung // nga yi dkor khang 'jig na mtshon char phyung // dkon mchog dbu
275b8(rnying rgyud): 'bang smod na mtshon char phyung // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig na mtshan char phyung // dkon mchog sku dgra dar na mtshon char phyung // zhes slob dpon pad+mas/ slob bu glang dpal gyi seng ge la/ de skad ces/ 
276a1(rnying rgyud): dka' yul zhing gdams so/ rgyag sa du/ 'jam 'i rusan ta ma tan tranam bod skad du/ drag drugs pa su pa rji nu bar
276a2(rnying rgyud): zhes bya ba/ bcom ldan 'das mthus stobs kyi bdag po la phyag 'tshal lo/ 'di skad bdag gi thos pa dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyidaHrib chen po'i yangs stengasalcang lo can gyi
276a3(rnying rgyud): gnas mchogarab tu brgyan pa'i pho brang chen po na/ yum chen mo 'byung ba lnga'i bdag modang gnyis su med par snrums par bzhugs te/ skulas 'od zer sna tshogs ra tu smos nasa'ajig rten gyi/ 
276a4(rnying rgyud): khams kyi gdug pa can dang dregs pa can dang gzeb rjid can dang \u0f7fdrag shul can la sogs bdag gis gnas thams cad rab tu g.yo zhing spyod par mdzad pasade dag gi sde dpon
276a5(rnying rgyud): dang bcas 'khor dang g.yog du bcas pa rnamasaHrlung gi / gas kyis spyod pa bzhin du lpags pa ni 'di lta ste gshin rje tshe bdag nag po chen po yum dang bcas pa dang bdud
276a6(rnying rgyud): nag po chen po me'i kha spangs can dang yum bdud mo nag mo khrag 'dzag ma dang srin po'i rgyal po gsod byed nag po sum dang bcas pa dang gnod sbyin chen po gang ba bzang po dang / yum gon/ 
276a7(rnying rgyud): sbyin mo sha za ral cig ma dang lha'i rgyal po dang du phyug chen po dang ru ta'i bdag po thar pa nag po dang rmu rje rtsan po rgyal po chen po dang \u0f7fphyi rol lha'i bdag po ka la nag po dang \u0f7fkhyab 'jug
276a8(rnying rgyud): chen po kun tu rgyu ba dang klu'i bdag po gzhon nu gtum po dang lha'i rgyal po li phyir chen po dang gnod sbyin chen po la ga rgyu ba dang bdag nyid chen po rdo rje mdzes pa dang klu bdud chen/ 
276b1(rnying rgyud): po lam shud dmar po dang \u0f7fgzhan yang lha dang \u0f7fklu dang / lha ma yin dang / za byed dang / yi dgas dang / 'byung po'i tshogs dang / pho nya'i tshogs 'jigs par byed pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa
276b2(rnying rgyud): rab tu 'dus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gdug byed chen po'i 'khor de dag rab tu 'dul bar mkhyen nas/ dur khrod chen po'i dkyil 'khor mngon par sprul par mdzad de/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
276b3(rnying rgyud): dkyil 'khor dag/ gzugs su brnyan pa rab tu 'jigasaHsgra ni mi snyan drag cing gtum drini mi zhim rul myags bsung ro ni kha sgyur tsha bar bro/ reg bya tshe rtsub mi gdug spyod zhe sdang chen po'i/ 
276b4(rnying rgyud): me 'bar zhing \u0f7fnga rgyal keng rus brag tu snyamasaHgtiru gra mun nag rab tu 'thibasaH'dod chags khrag gi chu chen 'bru gra phrag dog rlung ni rab tu 'khrugs stir chen po'i longs
276b5(rnying rgyud): spyod laHstag gzig gcan gzan skye spyang dang kang ka dur bya 'dab chags tshogasaHsha za khrag 'thung rus pa 'jomasaHbam dang rul dang myags pa dang bye dang bral dang gzhigs pa dang
276b6(rnying rgyud): zos dang 'thor dang rab tu 'thor brul dang zags dang brlag pa dang rtso dang rgod dang bral ba dang \u0f7f'jigs shing gdug dang rngam pa dang \u0f7frol pa'i longs spyod rab tu sprulaHkun kyang gdug pa'i sems 'chang
276b7(rnying rgyud): zhing \u0f7fgsod gcod shag gtub lus kyi las tshig rtsub brlang pa'i nga ror 'byin 'khros pa'i brtul zhugs drag po yis ma lus 'dul zhing tshar gcod pa'iHmngon par gcod la rab tu ba/ 
276b8(rnying rgyud): 'di ltar 'thong zhing snang gyur pa kun rdzob tsam du snang ba lasaHsems can gcig gi bas sprul cung zad gnod pa yod med de/ rang gi rnam rtog bde bar spyod nges pa'i de nyid kho na'o// cho 'phrul
277a1(rnying rgyud): chen po bstan pa'i gling gzhi 'i le'u ste dang pa'o// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rdorje nga pa'i rgyal thams dus gsus rgyal bsras
277a2(rnying rgyud): las kyis/ thogs med pa'i dus nyid las/ ma lus bstan pa bsrung badzad pa'i gsang bdag chen por dbang bskur bying gnad sbyin lag na rdo rje dang lnga brgya grogs dang las pa yis/ sa so gtso chen du/ 
277a3(rnying rgyud): nyid nas/ rang gi stan las rab tu langasaHmngon du spyod pa'i sprul pa mdzad/ thugs kyi gnas pa'i sa bon las phyogs btsun ma kha'i mthar thug kunaHljang nag rlung gis rab tu dgrogs khrag gi cha slong bcu
277a4(rnying rgyud): cing g.yo/ sha rus snyams pa'i sa gzhi lasaHbskal pa'i me ri rig/ 'baraHban bla 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang \u0f7fgdug cing 'jigs rung niHstobs chen rnams kyang nye mi spyod/ 'phrin las ma lus rdzog/ 
277a5(rnying rgyud): mdzad lus/ phyi nang mtha' dbus kun la khyabaHbstan la rab sdang la boHphung po zhabs kyis gdan du gting / 'od gdan gtsang ma dadu ma dang bcas/ che ba mchog gi skur mdzod de/ rig can mthar gnas
277a6(rnying rgyud): dbur gnan cing stong pa bco brgyad dag cing snang phyag gi dregs pa'i lha brgyad bsgralaHban+d+ha tsi ta g.yas g.yon bsnams/ thugs kyi dbang rtags dang pos gzung thugs rje mi 'gyur 'thing nag mdog \u0f7fmi
277a7(rnying rgyud): 'jigs rig par mnan pa'i zhabs bdud bzhi phyogs dang bcas pas gnon ma lus dbang du bsdud pa'i phyir ral pa kham nag sring rtser 'bar 'bar ba'i spyan gyis khams gsum gzigs \u0f7fgdangs
277a8(rnying rgyud): pa'i gangs kyis sring gsus chu snyan gyi rlu zhes stong gsus khyab/ no la mas kyis gdu pa sgris ljags 'dris gang sgra drag por brdzengs/ khro gnyer 'ad kyis dbang du bsdud dpa' ba
277b1(rnying rgyud): kyis rab tu brgyan/ bsrung ba'i lha rnams sku la rdzogasaHstobs ldan de nyid mnyes mdzad pa'i 'byung ba che la dbang bsgyur ma dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi ma/ gri gug tri shul bdud rtsi g.yas/ \u0f7fban bla zhing / 
277b2(rnying rgyud): chen g.yang gzhi g.yon gco dag tshul 'dzin rab tu bsgeg/ dgyes mdzad rab tu rol pa lasaH'dul byed sprul pa rab tu 'phro/ phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams kun gyigatum po gdug pa'i tshul 'chang
277b3(rnying rgyud): ba'iHdrag sngags bdag po ma lus kun rang nyid so so'i 'khor bcas pa'iHbrten dang gnas la re re snangaHrang dbang med par 'dud cing g.yoHoM badz+ra sarba duSh+TAn e ka ya ma ma b+he ra b+ha g+nisahA/ 
277b4(rnying rgyud): hUM phaT/ bdud dang gshin rje srin po dang \u0f7fgnod sbyin lha dang log da lta canachu rje che dang phyi rol phyogs/ gdug byed mkhan da la rgyu ba dang \u0f7fbyol song ltos 'gro lus 'dzin dang \u0f7fnga rgyal 'tsha
277b5(rnying rgyud): dang sprul pa can mtha' 'khob gnas mtha' ma lus rgyuHlba dud mi ma yin gyi gnas kha ba can du phyogs shing bsre las kyi lus kyi nus pa 'byinam lus pa rnams thams cad
277b6(rnying rgyud): kun shugs drags rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin rab tu 'dar zhing mdun du gnas thugs rje bdag pos dgongs mdzad kyang gtum rngam 'jigs byed chen po'i skuHgsang tshig drag po gsung gi

283a8(rnying rgyud): gri'i so yis 'gemasaHgnod sbyin gnam lcags thog gis 'jomasaHlha ni 'dod pa'i mdung gis soram mo dpag med mda' bzhin 'bigs gza' bdud stobs chen sgyogs kyis brdegaHklu ni sa 'og

288b1(rnying rgyud): gsang bdun gyi spod pa'o// byig mi kau du ru mi dzika ta dz+wa la a ta dza sash+tsa tsa pa ti yu la ma klo ta pa shar shang ta shar ti su Ta/ ba~M shul du bzhi sha dz+wa la yanaHmahA can d+ha rag shadz+ra d+ha nIm sa rungs dzubanan
288b2(rnying rgyud): big a nan ta rag sha ti san d+ha ra k+Shin tsata b+ha mi ku ru/ mu tsan d+ha dum bu dum bu/ kha la rag shu thum ri li li/ ma ma sa ma ya trag rag sha trag rag sham tri ga naHma sa kha ya ku ru ti rtsi b+ha la~M mu tad rad ra/ tri kar mi tra/ 
288b3(rnying rgyud): dul dul/ snying khrag la ril ril rtsa lathun thun/ trag rag mo dril hril/ shag shag shar shar rbad/ ma ma tsag sha trag tu phrom/ a sel mo byai ru lu ru lu ma ma trag rag sha trai la hril shar b+h+yoHmar ya ra~M dril sha ts+tsha
288b4(rnying rgyud): shel rnga cu drug du rtsa ra shu ti pro kar pro/ phyir ma te ba shaHmi ki ri ra hudashag dril pob/ khrag la tsar mu b+h+yoHtrag ra mthun shag ri/ ram shar b+h+yoHbdud phrom na gahril sen shags dum dril b+h+yoHpra ta pa
288b5(rnying rgyud): sha ya ya ma snying ya ma khrag/ ra hu la hri la hril shag shag/ ser ser/ tug tug/ ya ya phob phob/ mu ka ye/ ka pa ye/ a pa / hristi byaM kren te/ dza pa ti ra tsu la ma hA kro ta ka bab ta shar shal ta
288b6(rnying rgyud): chub ga zig nig/ shu 'phreM/ bdud gro / mthongs bye/ lcags sgrog khrol/ mi ring sod// rgyang rje rgyang mo/ tsu ru tsu ru/ haH/ br-i br-i/ mur mu ra ga/ du blo/ thog tu nu mod song// rlung dang sprin dang rabargyu dang / phyogs dang brtags
288b7(rnying rgyud): ldan pas/ dba' po'i sbyong ba shes par bya snying rig par gsung drag po'i las gzhug dang gto dang bsregs pa'i dang / bskal dang kug dang sbeng ba dngango / bong dang dza dang gdung ba dang / gakho dang dang gzhi
288b8(rnying rgyud): ba dang gas dang dril pa'i las rnams kyis spod pa'i la zag 'jams par byed/ nag pa ti 'amalan ga ga/ ra gul leg gaganas khri zag shig zhig/ bum bu la/  mtsha la/ kal dag la na/ dgra mas/ 
289a1(rnying rgyud): ra ya dza/ nag po ti ba tsa ya phe sha rag sha dza/ nag ka ka la pe sha rag sha dza dza/ a sha na nag ti ba tsa la dgra bo mar ya dza/ nagar tsa shag ti srog ti la rbad/ snying la rol/ sham sham rbad/ i sha na nan/ 
289a2(rnying rgyud): sha rag sha u nan/ na ga nan thi li nan/ pi li nan/ rtsi ri nan/ a pa ra sod rmag/ dul dul ka la rngubs myogs thibs/ ma ra ya 'dus 'dus/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ ru ru ra ra/ ti ti/ tri mo ti ti/ ga ru gar gtor dzam
289a3(rnying rgyud): ra te gad/ man dza le shan rag sha u tananaHbA sha ni/ sha ra le/ shu ru mu le/ d+ha ta ma re na/ sU ya hU ya/ ra tir ti/ thi raM shag tsag gi/ nI ma ra tI ya ma du ya ma snying ya ma khrag tshal ba bai ril/ nag po ti ba rag shanan/ khug re
289a4(rnying rgyud): la ba/ dgra bo mar ya dza/ nag po ti ba tsa/ snying la dza/ shag shanan/ na// khug zhu ba rol rbad/ tsan dri rag sha rol khug thun ka la snying / dathum ril rbad/ ka la sho rare snying la trag sha har ka/ a mu ka ma ra ya
289a5(rnying rgyud): thum ril rbad nanaHkhugs dang 'gro dang las byed pa'iHrang gi rtags dang ldan pa naHdmigs pa'i las la sbyar bar bya/ zlog dang ma gru ba 'khyil pa dang \u0f7f'byams dang bsngags dang zad mthar gtugs//

289a7(rnying rgyud): bcwog/ bral du rtsi thob// brda 'grog gos ma la dza b+h+yoHsan ta ma rung / yam trag b+hu k+Shi ba ma nu/ bzlog brgyar gdug pa'i drag sngags kyis/ las kyi mthang sgyur ma lus par/ nga'amang dang 'dra ba / rdo rje
289a8(rnying rgyud): bgazhan rnams kyis/ byinang gsang ba'i las rnams kyis/ gang la mngags pa de dag sbyar gzhin gyis the chem ma bya ste/ nga dang dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis/ de la rig par snang ba yin zhes bka' stsal / 
289b1(rnying rgyud): drag sngags 'dus partsa ba'i rgyud las/ 'phrin las dmigs pa'i khyad par las sbyar ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ yon tan stong pa 'di gsungs so// cu dur khrod chen
289b2(rnying rgyud): po'i rol pa'i dkyil 'khor nasaHgtum drag me ltar ba'i gzhal yas na/ gdug byed ru s+thi ra'i khri stengs naHmdangs ldan nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan stengs na \u0f7fdregs po'i bdag po rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gtsoHbcom ldan dpal

289b7(rnying rgyud): lha brgyad sku la rdzogasaHg.yas g.yon zhabs kyi dregs pa gziraHma rungs gdul ka rnams kyi gshedaHlog lta ru tra 'dul ba'i dpalaH'byung lnga'i bdag mo gnyis med yumaHdbu gsum phyag drug zhabs

291a1(rnying rgyud): ston 'ad chags can la mi gdug ston gti mug can la myos pa ston se sngacan gyis 'phrog par byed/ khrag dog cang 'jigs par ston/ khyod kyis mi 'dul cig med kyis mchod cing nang pa'i yu

291a4(rnying rgyud): rnams kyi ston par 'gyur/ thun mongs pa dang nye ba dang / mchog 'gyur ni/ radra ba'i dngos grub kun/ dpa' bo de las mngon du 'byung yon// mchog gi stobs rnyed cing / 'jig rten chos las rab sngags pa'i

291b7(rnying rgyud): brdo rje rtsa ba'i rgyud zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po slob dpon pad+ma 'byung gnas dang \u0f7fbod kyi lo chu ba bdag bai ro tsa nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//

292a1(rnying rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba

292a6(rnying rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od zer sna tshogs bkye nas/ tshig 'di skad du bskul te/ kye kye gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin/ khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyisaHbstan pa dam pa bsrung ba yiHmthu/

292a8(rnying rgyud): gdul kam lus 'dul ba'i phyir/ sprul ba snga 'phrul phrin las kyis sngon gyi thugs dam rol par mdzod/ zhes bskul mthag tu bcom ldan 'das de/ sangs rgyas kyi phrin las mdzad pa'i dus la bab pa ma khyer ma
292b1(rnying rgyud): nyid kyi sku gsung thugs zhi ba chos nyid de bzhin las ma g.yos kyang / gdul ba bya ba'i yul drag bul can rnams la gzigs nas/ phyogs btsun mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad du/ 
292b2(rnying rgyud): sku'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa khro bo chen po'i gzugs 'di lta ste/ sku mdog 'thing nag zhal dgu pa la/ g.yas kyi zhal ni kham nag rtsigs pa/ g.yon gyi zhal ni sdug nag bsdus pa/ dbus kyi
292b3(rnying rgyud): zhal ni 'thing nag 'khro zhing rngam pa/ phyag g.yas kyi rdo rje bar bas g.yon gyi thod khrag dkrug cing gsol ba/ g.yas 'og ma brgyad na lha chen po sgral ba'i mgo gcad de snams la/ g.yon gyi 'og brgyad na klu
292b4(rnying rgyud): chen po brgyad kyi mgo snams pa/ de dag kyang g.yang gzhi dang bcas pa/ g.yas kyi spyan dgu gyen la bzlog pa/ g.yon gyi spyan dgu 'phreng la gzigs pa/ dbus kyi spyan dgu thur la sdang mig mdzad pa/ khro gnyer
292b5(rnying rgyud): dragrag po dpral bar bsdus pa/ shangs nas srid pa'i rlung drag po 'tshub pa/ zhal nas bskal pa'i me 'bar ba/ mchi ba dmar po bar snang / kham su brtsigs pa/ sma ra ag tshe ma sprin bzhin du stobs pa/ dbu skra
292b6(rnying rgyud): ral pa kham nag srid pa'i rtse mor 'bar zhing 'khyil ba/ sman nas bdu ga ba'i sgra chen po 'byin pa/ sbrul gyi chun pos yan lag bkris pa bdud dang ru tra bsgral ba dang glang po che'i lpags pa nam bzar gsol pa sngag
292b7(rnying rgyud): gi lpags pa sku slad dkris pa/ khrag dang zhag gi thig le dang ri mos brgyan pa/ thal chen gyis lus la byugs pa/ thod pa skam po dang / rlon pa dang / sha drag ra ri can gyis 'phreng bar byas nas brgyan pa/ zhabs brgya
292b8(rnying rgyud): kyis tshangs pa dang khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug chen po dang / brgya byin chung ma dang bcas pa dag mnan pa/ yum chen po rab tu gtum mo 'jigs byed ma/ rang gi sku dang 'tshungs pa zhig dang mnyam par sbyor ba/ grangs
293a1(rnying rgyud): med cing brjod kyis mi lang 'bye ba til gyi gang bu bzhin du gyur pa thams cad kyang / oM badz+ra tsan drA sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na daha pa tsa Ta/ zhes bya ba'i gsung sgra drag po 'byin paHde dag re
293a2(rnying rgyud): las kyang sprul pa dang sprul pa yang sbrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu snang bar mdzad pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dregs pa can lha'i tshogs dang / bdud dang / gshin rje dang / srin po dang / gnod sbyin dang / gza' bdud da
293a3(rnying rgyud): klu dang rgyal po dang / ging dang / ma mo chen mo rnams dang / mkha 'gro'i tshogs dang / ru tra dang / mu stegs dang / srog gi bdag po dang / nor gyi bdag po dang / tshe'i bdag po dang / sngags kyi bdag po dang / srid
293a4(rnying rgyud): pa'i bdag po dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang / dur khrod chen po dang / yul chen po dang / 'dzam+bu'i gling gi mtha' 'khob kyi sa dang / ri'i rgyal po dang / ri phra mo dang / rgya mtsho dang
293a5(rnying rgyud): chu bran dang / yongasu 'du ba'i shing dang / nag tshal chen po dang / gnas phra mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag na gnas pa'i 'jig rten gyi dregs pa can po dang mo'i rnam par 'dug pa dang / gtso bo dang 'khor/ 
293a6(rnying rgyud): dang khyad par rgyu ba dang / bran dang g.yog gi tshogs dang bcas pa dag gisaHrang rang gnas nas myur brngang zhing skrag la 'jigs pa dang / yang ba'i sems dang / dul ba'i sems kyi 'thon ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i spyan
293a7(rnying rgyud): sngar rlung drag po'i shugs kyis rab tu spyod pa'i shing bal gyi 'dab ma bzhin du rang dbang med par lhags par gyur te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa dang / khyad par du mi 'jed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gling bzhi
293a8(rnying rgyud): dang / rgya mtsho chen po dang / rol bI chu klu'i gnas dang bcas pa/ ri rab chen po dang / ri bdun gyi gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang / lha'i gnas 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang bcas pa
293b1(rnying rgyud): dang / dmyal ba dang / yi dgas dang / byol song gi skye gnas na gnas pa dang / 'dzam+bu'i gling gi sa'i cha na gnas pa'i dregs pa can rnams so so nas rang rang gi mdun na drag po chen po'i sku gzi bin dpag tu med pa/ gzhan dag gis
293b2(rnying rgyud): nye ba'i thugs mi thub pa re re 'dug pa mthong ste/ de dag thams cad tha dad du rang rang gi sde dpon chen po rnams la skyabasu 'gro bar byed do// sde dpon chen po rnams ni 'jigs byed chen po'i sku gsang ba pa'i bdag po de la rang

302b7(rnying rgyud): dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugasaH'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skad shugs ldan rta nag la sogs paHkhyed kyi bzhed pa'i skor du 'bul rin chen dar mi la sogs pa/ rnal 'byor rnams kyi blung du 'bulaHdam rdzas mchod gtor la lo/

303a1(rnying rgyud): 'jigs gzugs canaHnag mo sha zlog bdud kyisaHskul mthing nag ber chen gsol/ chib su bong bu ga mar chibs/ khyod kyi tshe 'phrul bstan pa ni ma bdud 'bum phrag po nyar 'gyed/ nag mo stong rje/ 
303a2(rnying rgyud): las la 'dzud \u0f7fsnang srid bdud mo khyod kyi 'khor \u0f7fdam tshig dbang gis gnas 'dir bzhugs cang shes bong bu la sogs paH'thun pa'i rdzas kyis thugs dam skangasrid pa'i bdud mo 'khor bcas kyis/ ji ltar bcos

307b8(rnying rgyud): de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya 'jig rten dregs pa'i sde dpon rnams drag po'i las la sbyar ba ni/ dur khrod bdug pa'i gnas dag tu rtsa ba'i sten pa sngon song nas/ so so'i 'thun pa'i/ 
308a1(rnying rgyud): rdzas bsar ste drag po'i las kyi khang pa ni e dbyis sum cu ldan par bsham phyi nang gsang bsku gsu thugs gnas byin brlab dang skang dang mchod/ spying
308a2(rnying rgyud): sor sngags pa dang / \u0f7frab tu bde bar 'dod pas dmigasagazugs sgra bsam pa'i nus pa yis lus dang lus kyi 'khrul 'khor dang / srog dang srog gi gnyen po yis sems dang sems kyi ngo
308a3(rnying rgyud): bopolas phyi nang kun tu bsngags pa ste/ 'phro 'du 'od kyis drang zhing bgug rang gzhan dmigs pa de la stim sha lus khrag sogs ma lus bzas dregs pa'i sde dpon sku gsung
308a4(rnying rgyud): thugs ma lus mnyes pa 'di yis byaHgang la dmigs pa cha da kyis sgrolaHting nge 'dzin gyis brtul shugs kyisaHphul ba dang myur ba'i blo'o stobs/ 'di la the tsom mi bya ste/ rdo rje
308a5(rnying rgyud): 'chang chen gsang ba'i bka' gal te 'bar bas mngon spyod cing myur du 'pho bar bya ba niHrno sbal tshwa rtsub dri nga ba'i yam shing gdug pas dbyibs ldan rtsig/ rdol pa rigs
308a6(rnying rgyud): ngan shan pa dang g.yung mo grogs bral khyim gyi mes spar zhing dug khrag mngar ba la gzugs brnyan rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i slar yang dmigs te lhag ma 'dul cha gtso dang 'khor gyi/ 
308a7(rnying rgyud): rab phye ba'i drag po'i tshig gis rab tu bgrang dregs pa'i bdag po so so'i che brjod gnad dang bcas pa yis stob bcing sbyin pa rim bzhin bya/ drang srong phrin las rdzogs par bskul thal
308a8(rnying rgyud): chen dang ni drag po'i rdzas tshe khrag gsum dang gsod byed gsum/ mtshon bran rin chen gsum gyis dbyig/ rang byung bkra shis bzlog pa'i rdzas nang du du 'dra sbyar ba ni sgra tshig ting nge 'dzidi ldan pas
308b1(rnying rgyud): stobs chen 'khor los dbab cing 'phang dregs pa 'khor bcas las su dmigs gzhan yang mchod rdzas gzugs brnyan byas/ rab tu bstan pa'i dmigs pas stima'agyu gnas sa dang chu phug dang sra
308b2(rnying rgyud): bsher 'thab dang pung shul dang rgya mtsho'i dbus dang lam po chematshon gyis brdegs dang rlung gi skyal bag med lhung zhing me chus 'joms lugs nas byung ba'i rten 'brel te/ brnag pa'i yid kyis
308b3(rnying rgyud): 'dzin pur gdab gdug byed 'khor dang zas su gtadaji srid 'khor ba ma stongs par thar par mi 'gyur las kyi ging byams dang snying rje'i sems ma rtogs 'di ltar mngon par spyad pa
308b4(rnying rgyud): yis bstan la rab sding phyir gyur pa'i rjes 'brang log dpar lta ba rnamasatshar gcod sgrol zhing 'dug pa yiHzhes/ bka' stsal toH'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po'i 'phrin las
308b5(rnying rgyud): drag po'i las la sbyar ba'i le'u ste/ bdun pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang bshad pa ni 'jig rten dregs pa rang gi gnas gsang ba'i
308b6(rnying rgyud): snying po drag shul gzungs kun bsdus dril dang phye mas mnan \u0f7fbadz+ra sarba dustan \u0f7fe ka pa ra a sta na ya ma hA shwa ra de ba de bi du phrag dun ting ma yaHpre ta bi kri sta na rag sha rag sho yag k+Sha k+Shi ta
308b7(rnying rgyud): byi tri pa tra a se la dza na ga gu ling sha dzaHtsa du tri tsa ra tsa la ma du triHma ma ru lu man tra ra tsa dum tiHma ka la ru tra tig sna tir thi ka tha a b+hi shu tri pa sha li ha shaM tri dza ra tsa ging ka ra sa du trin tha ka
308b8(rnying rgyud): la a gad tsha/ hring hring dza/ bod pa'i sngags so/ badz+ra sarba dustan e ka pa ra sarba pan tsa a mri ta a gad dzaH/ b+ha ling ta gri a me ta gra hen du ma hA ga na pu tsa kha ga khA hi khA hi/ 'di dag sbyar bas
309a1(rnying rgyud): mchod par 'gyur/ sarbas su ma tra sing dri bu thab tan sing dri bu khA gu b+ha kan su ra ra na dan pus ting sang d+hi ma gadzun sa rba d+ha rma ga blags
309a2(rnying rgyud): dag kA dza~M ha sing d+hi sid d+hi/ pha la sing d+hi ma hA sing d+hi a b+ha~M sha ma a gag nyid rab tu sbyar bas dngos grub bla sarba ga tru yak+Sha rbang rbang d+ho b+h+yo/ 'di yis rab tu rbad par byarnaMm
309a3(rnying rgyud): thums dza dza sha tru rtsi ta ma ra ya rbad ru ba ya ka nang drung drud phaT phaT ma ra ya thus dzus han han/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa ba tsa/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ thun drang thun rbad/ 'di yis dmigs pa
309a4(rnying rgyud): rab tu gsad/ ma ma ra ya phrin pre ta ka hri hring tig pa mi ru ba ya/ bin d+ha bin d+ha/ hu lu hu lu/ rbad nan le nan/ oM nan tshu nan ste pa ya staM ba ya nan/ zhes pa yis ni gnan par
309a5(rnying rgyud): bya/ sarba mar ta ka rer dza la ra dzar/ s+pho ta ya/ s+pho ta ya/ ho ha ya ho ha ya/ re tsa ma ra ku ya/ zhes pa/ sa ma lus bsregs par bya/ mar sha tru thun b+h+yo thum ril skyon ce/ 
309a6(rnying rgyud): / thun a b+h+re sha sa b+h+yo dmigs pa 'di yis 'phang bar bya'o/ badz+ra u tsa ta ya bta a gris rba b+h+yo bzlog/ sa ma ya rbangs myags bzlogs/ pha rol nus pa 'di yis bzlog ma bla ga sa a b+hi na le
309a7(rnying rgyud): pra tsa ya/ be tsa ya/ zhi bas lugs du byung chu bab pa'o/ nag gra he bi tse la phro phro hril hril/ shar shar ran tsag ne phreM dril shar shar phob phob/ drag pos bzlog cing stab pa'o// ma sA shan
309a8(rnying rgyud): ting pus ting bshad ku ru mar ya dza la kar ma ma la~M a mu ki sid ti su sid ti ga sa ti swAts+tsha// phrin las thams cad rab sgrub pa'i/ bathun pa'i rjes dang ting
309b1(rnying rgyud): 'dzin gyis las kyi khyad par so sor dbye gnas sgyur dang ni grub pa'i mtha' snying rje byams pas rab skul zhing kun tu khyab pa'i mchod sbyin byazhi dang rgyas dang dbang du bya/ 
309b2(rnying rgyud): drag pos sgral zhing tshar gcod pa'i las kun rang gzhan don du spyad 'jig rten gnas shing srog dang snying yi ge gsal bar rang 'byung gnas mngon du rgyu ba thugs kha ste/ ring
309b3(rnying rgyud): thung po mo khrag dang dus chags sdang snying srog snying rje gtser/ rdo rje pad+ma rlung dang gnas/ thabs dang shes rab chos can dang chos nyid las dang 'bras bu yisaHmi 'tshang gnad 'tshang bong dang 'draHgrogs dang ldan
309b4(rnying rgyud): bas las la sbyaraHzhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpo// don chen po rnams kyi las sna tshogs kyi rtsa ba'i snying po gnad kyi le/ 'u ste brgyad pa'o// 
309b5(rnying rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba 'jig rten dregs pa'i gtsen na rnams tshul bzhin rab tu bsgrubs pa yis grub cing nye ba'i rtags rnams niHnyams dang rbad rtags rmi lam rtags
309b6(rnying rgyud): 'di la so sor 'byung 'gyur te/ dga' zhing mdangs ldan stobs rnyed dang / bde dang rtogs pa spro bskyed cing mngon rgyu yid kyis gdang thob kyisaHnyams dpag tsha dogs med cing / nus ldan 'phrin las
309b7(rnying rgyud): mthar phyin rtogs 'di dag la sogs rim par 'byung lus 'jam dbugs kyis mi gnod cing / yang zhing brtan la khyad par dga'and dang gdon gyis brdzi mi nus 'byung ba'i nus pas mi
309b8(rnying rgyud): spyod cing kha dog dang ldan sdug cing mdzes 'di la sogs pa lus 'byung gda' ji ltar sgo ba gzhan gyis 'dzin rang dang sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs 'thun pa'i tshul gyis tsha
310a1(rnying rgyud): dor laHsnyan dang mi snyan ci brjod rnamasatshangs pa yi dbyangs bzhin du 'ong grag thos tsam gyis dbang du byed/ tshul mdzes 'jug pa dag gi brda'aHgang
310a2(rnying rgyud): la brtsams pa de 'grub cing ma nub mo spong mi 'dod bas dbang dang ldan zhing mi g.yol gsang ba'i mthu stobs rab tu thob yid kyi yul du brda' 'byung ba'i snga phyi mthag
310a3(rnying rgyud): ba'o// bag chags ma yin rmi lam ni rgyal po mkhan po slob dpon dang che ba can rigs ldan brgyan bcas ldanaHbcan zan 'dab chags dud 'gro dang skyes pa bud med bus pa sogs
310a4(rnying rgyud): rang gi gnas su lhags pa ni nye bar 'grub pa'i rtags yin no/ bran 'bangs mngag pa'i tshul 'chang zhing bka' bsgo las byed nyan pa brtags ring ba'i gnas nas glu len
310a5(rnying rgyud): cing rgyang mig blta ba g.yel ba'i rtags rang la chad pa'i las rtsom zhing nyes lan 'dod pa ba zlog pa'i rtags zas skom 'dod cing 'khrig lan bsgag
310a6(rnying rgyud): rang nyid gnod 'gyod ma skongs rtags 'jom zhing dud mos 'debs byed pas ma dag lus snang nyams pa'i rtagasarang gi sgob mi nyan zhing spar zhi chur la 'khol 'dod pa gnyen pos
310a7(rnying rgyud): dbang du ma gyur rtags mtshon cha brdungs zhing tshad ma ldan nus med bya ba mi 'grub pas sngags kyi nus pam grub rtags gzhan 'dod rang la med pa dang / rang gi yod pa 'dod med rnams
310a8(rnying rgyud): mchod skad thun rdzas ma tshang rtags she rus khrag sogs longs spyod cing ngo mthon rab tu che ba na las byas 'grub pa'i rtags yin no/ pha rol dmag tshogs ma byung zhing
310b1(rnying rgyud): sgo med khang par bdag zhugs la ngan sngags gzhan gyis bzlog pa'i rtags bye brag sde brgyad so so niHmi dang dud 'gro 'dab chags bsogs pho tshogs nag po bdud kyi rtags mo
310b2(rnying rgyud): tshogs brgyan bzang ma mo ste/ che btsan 'bag seng gtsug lag khang bus pa sgra ste rgyal ba'i rtags mi rta khwa spyang ri dgas ni drag btsan ri btsan rtags yin no/ chu gnas
310b3(rnying rgyud): dud 'gro klu'i rtags ma he ra lug dmig mangs dang mun pa bu yug gza'i rtags skyes pa chas bzang 'byor pa can ri mtsho la gnas gnod sbyin rtags nya pa shan pa bya ba
310b4(rnying rgyud): dang dpag gi go mtshon srin po'i rtags 'di dag sngar bshad bzang ngan sbyaraHbye brag sgrub pa'i rtags su 'gyur/ zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen po bsgrub
310b5(rnying rgyud): ba'i rtags kyi le'u ste/ dgu pa'o// / de nas gzhan yang ba bshad pa dregs pa can gyi khyad par rdzas mdzes
310b6(rnying rgyud): ba'i gzugs brnyan sku'i brten ming nas bod pa gsung gi rten phyag mtshan dam pathugs kyi rtenaHlug galag dkar po sbal sbrul nya/ glang na sngon po rin pogayul ba shams myur
310b7(rnying rgyud): bsgral bya gcan dang rnal bu shel nag bya nag dang / rta lug khyi dang rgod nag dang ra phag bya khyi dkar po dang kA k+ko re rog dom khyi gnag sbrul nag bya rgod ra skye dang
310b8(rnying rgyud): bya byidamar po yi snying khrag mgo dang rgyal mtshan ni/ lha klu gnod sbyin srin po dang / ma mo bdud dang rgyal po gang gshin rje gza' dang bcan rnams kyi rim bzhin so so brten pa'i rdza
311a1(rnying rgyud): rab tu gsang ba nyid yin no// e ldan gdug bcas rgyud med kyi thod pa mtshon ma phur pa dag dug khrag rin chen drag po'i 'bru kun tshogs
311a2(rnying rgyud): rab tu gsad pa'i rdzas/ klu bzung sdod ni sha drag bcas ru bzangs rigs med myur song chu myug gu sna tshogs dri ldan rdzasaHchu drag dpa' rabs dud pa'i rdzas yin no/ mchod rten
311a3(rnying rgyud): rirab brgyar bcas rme rdzas rigs ngan mgo bo gsum dmigs pa'i 'dab rdzas pad ma ni slar la bzlog pa'i rdzas yin no/ nad gdug pa ril mgo rkang rnams rab tu mnan pa'i rdzas
311a4(rnying rgyud): yin no/ dug khrag tshogs dang mtshan ma nganaHdmigs dpa'i brten la 'phang ba'i rdzasangan pa'i sa'i rten khang dang \u0f7fgdug cing rab tu tsha ba'i shing 'bru nag dug drag sres
311a5(rnying rgyud): pa'i rdzas/ gzhan yang dbang can dregs pa'i 'khor so so'i rigs dang sder bcas pa'i 'thun pa'i ma 'thun gtsang dang rme sngags pa'i kun rdzas shes par
311a6(rnying rgyud): 'gyur/ ma 'ongs dus na rdo rje 'chang rang gi rigs 'dzin byang chub sems brtul zhugs can gyis 'grub pa yis/ dbus dang mtha' 'khob yul rnams dang sangs rgyas zhing
311a7(rnying rgyud): gi 'jig rten khams kun nas sde dpon g.yog bcas pa'i yid dang dngos po'i lus can rnams khams dang rigs pa bsam pa dang skyed pa brten gnas yo byad dang
311a8(rnying rgyud): ma lus rdzogs par rab tu rtogs shes ldan mig can rnams la ston/ de tshe dregs pa'i gtso chen rnams/ da lta nga yis gdams pa yin yang dag don la ma 'da' cig/ khyed
311b1(rnying rgyud): rnams kyang na dus nam zhig las kyi gnas ngan len sbas te byang chubs la myur 'gro yis de bas bka' das mnas la ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin bsgrubs shing gsang
311b2(rnying rgyud): chen nga'i snyan pa'i tshul phyi rol phyogs la sogs pa yis nyams zhing sbas par mi 'gyur bsaHrgyas shing snyan par khyod kyis byos zhes bka' stsal to// 'jig rten gyi sde dpon chen pos
311b3(rnying rgyud): brten rdzas dang las kyi gnyer sgo ba'i le'u ste/ bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
311b4(rnying rgyud): gsung dang thugs kyi bdag nyid gsang ba chen po'i sku'i rnam par rol pa chen po de dag nyid kyi sku la rab tu bsdus mdzad de/ dgyes pa'i gsung gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kye ma 'dus
311b5(rnying rgyud): pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams bdud dang gshin rje la sogs pa'i 'jig rten dbang chen gtso chen rnams ma thar thug mya ngan 'das nas kyang dus gsum sangs rgyas
311b6(rnying rgyud): thams cad kyi stan pa'i mtha' tshigs sgrub pa dang / rnal 'byor lam gyi grogs mdzad phyir drag po'i sku gsung thugs nyid dang yon tan phrin las sna tshogs ston phyim
311b7(rnying rgyud): dus na rig pa 'dzin skyes bu brtson ldan rnams kyi ni gnyis su 'dzin par yong mi bya yul snang phyi nang ma lus kun rang rig sems kyi rgyal por bsgrub de ni ma bcos
311b8(rnying rgyud): yul mi bral ma chad ma lhung bdag po med gnyis med mnyam nyid lhun gyis grub nges 'gyur spang blang rtsol sems bral ma lus rtsa ba snying gi srog
